# closest ISO 639-3:    ppk
# ISO_15924:            Latn

# notes:                
40001001	Toi-mi pomeduncu-duncu to mpomuli-ki Yesus Kristus . Yesus muli Magau' Daud , muli Abraham .
40001002	Ngkai Abraham rata hi Daud , hanga' ntu'a-na Yesus toi-ramo : Abraham mpobubu Ishak , Ishak mpobubu Yakub , Yakub mpobubu Yehuda pai' ompi'-ompi'-na ,
40001003	Yehuda mpobubu Peres pai' Zerah ( hanga' tina-ra : Tamar ) , Peres mpobubu Hezron , Hezron mpobubu Ram ,
40001004	Ram mpobubu Aminadab , Aminadab mpobubu Nahason , Nahason mpobubu Salmon ,
40001005	Salmon mpobubu Boas ( hanga' tina-na : Rahab ) , Boas mpobubu Obed ( hanga' tina-na : Rut ) , Obed mpobubu Isai ,
40001006	pai' Isai mpobubu Magau' Daud . Daud mpobubu Salomo ( tina-na : balu-na Uria ) ,
40001007	Salomo mpobubu Rehabeam , Rehabeam mpobubu Abia , Abia mpobubu Asa ,
40001008	Asa mpobubu Yosafat , Yosafat mpobubu Yoram , Yoram mpobubu Uzia ,
40001009	Uzia mpobubu Yotam , Yotam mpobubu Ahas , Ahas mpobubu Hizkia ,
40001010	Hizkia mpobubu Manasye , Manasye mpobubu Amon , Amon mpobubu Yosia ,
40001011	Yosia mpobubu Yekhonya pai' ompi'-na .
40001012	Ngkai karatawani-ra to Yahudi hilou hi Babel rata hi kaputu-na Yesus , hanga' ntu'a-na Yesus , toi-ra : Yekhonya mpobubu Sealtiel , Sealtiel mpobubu Zerubabel ,
40001013	Zerubabel mpobubu Abihud , Abihud mpobubu Elyakim , Elyakim mpobubu Azor ,
40001014	Azor mpobubu Zadok , Zadok mpobubu Akhim , Akhim mpobubu Eliud ,
40001015	Eliud mpobubu Eleazar , Eleazar mpobubu Matan , Matan mpobubu Yakub ,
40001016	Yakub mpobubu Yusuf tomane-na Maria .
40001017	Jadi' , ngkai Abraham rata hi Daud , kadea pomeduncu to mpomuli-ki Yesus hampulu' opo' lapi . Ngkai Daud rata hi karatawani-ra to Yahudi lou hi Babel , hampulu' opo' lapi wo'o . Pai' ngkai karatawani-ra to Yahudi lou hi Babel rata hi kaputu-na Kristus , hampulu' opo' lapi wo'o .
40001018	Hewa toi tutura kaputu-na Yesus Kristus . Tina-na to rahanga' Maria mokamae' hante Yusuf . Aga kako'ia-ra ncamoko , muu-mule' motina'i-imi Maria . Potina'i-na toe , ngkai baraka' Inoha' Tomoroli' .
40001019	Yusuf , tauna to mengkoru hi Atura Musa . Toe pai' na'uli' hi rala nono-na : " Kupohu lau-mi pokamae'-ku hante Maria . " Aga uma-i dota mpaka'ea' Maria . Jadi' , patuju-na bona napohu bongo-wadi , uma mingki' ra'incai ntodea .
40001020	Bula-na Yusuf mokanono mpopekiri toe , mo'ompo'-i . Ompo'-na toe , mpohilo-i hadua mala'eka Pue' to mpo'uli'-ki : " Yusuf , muli Magau' Daud ! Neo'-ko morara' mpotobine-i Maria . Apa' ana' to napotina'i-ki toe ria , jadi' ngkai baraka' Inoha' Tomoroli' .
40001021	Mo'ana'-i mpai' , hadua ana' tomane . Ana' toei mpai' , kana nuhanga'-i ` Yesus , ' apa' Hi'a mpai' to mpohore ntodea-na ngkai jeko'-ra . "
40001022	Hawe'ea toe majadi' bona madupa'-mi napa to na'uli' Pue' hante wiwi nabi-na owi , hewa toi :
40001023	" Hadua toronaa mpai' motina'i , mpo'ana'-ki hadua ana' tomane . Ana' toei mpai' rahanga' Imanuel . " Batua-na : " Alata'ala mpodohei-ta . "
40001024	Pemata-na Yusuf , natuku' mpu'u-mi napa to na'uli'-ki mala'eka Pue' toe-e we'i . Napotobine moto-imi Maria .
40001025	Aga ko'ia-ra hampoturua , duu'-na Maria mo'ana' . Kaputu-na ana' toei , Yusuf mpohanga'-i Yesus .
40002001	Yesus putu hi ngata Betlehem tana' Yudea nto'u poparenta-na Magau' Herodes . Nto'u toe , ba hangkuja dua tauna rata hi Yerusalem ngkai ngata to molaa tono' mata'eo . Torata toera , tauna to nginca mponaa tanda hi betue' .
40002002	Mepekune'-ra hi pue' ngata Yerusalem , ra'uli' : " Hiapa-idi Ana' to lako' putu to jadi' Magau' to Yahudi-e ? Hi mata'eo kihilo betue' to mpobatuai kaputu-na . Toe pai' tumai-kai doko' mpopue'-i . "
40002003	Kana'epe-na Magau' Herodes karia-na ana' to jadi' magau' mpai' , konce pai' koro'-imi , wae wo'o hawe'ea tauna hi Yerusalem .
40002004	Ngkai ree , kanakio'-rami hawe'ea imam pangkeni hante guru-guru agama Yahudi tumai moromu . Kahiruru'-ra omea-mi , napekune'-ra : " Hiapa mpu'u-koiwo kaputua-na Magau' Topetolo' to najanci Alata'ala owi-e ? "
40002005	Ratompoi'-i hewa toi : " Hi ngata Betlehem tana' Yudea . Ki'inca toe , apa' ria Lolita Pue' to na'uki' hadua nabi owi-e . Na'uli' Pue' :
40002006	` Ngata Betlehem hi tana' Yehuda , ngata to kedi'-wadi . Aga nau' wae , bohe lau-pi mpai' hanga'-na ngkai hawe'ea ngata bohe hi tana' Yehuda . Apa' ngkai Betlehem toe mpai' , mehupa' hadua Pangkeni to mpokeni ntodea-ku to Israel . ' "
40002007	Kana'epe-na Herodes lolita toe , nakio' bongo-ramo to nginca mponaa betue' toera mpohirua'-ki bona uma ra'incai tau ntani'-na . Napekune'-ra ba nto'uma mpu'u betue' toe lomo'-na mehupa' .
40002008	Oti toe , nahubui-ramo hilou hi Betlehem , na'uli'-raka : " Hilou-mokoi hi Betlehem , nipewulihi' lompe' kahiapa-na Ana' tetui . Ane nirua'-ipi , tumai-mokoi mpo'uli'-ka , bona hilou wo'o-a-kuwo mpopue'-i . "
40002009	Kahilou-rami . Hi lengko ohea , rahilo wo'o-mi betue' to rahilo hi tono' mata'eo-e wengi . Uma-pi mowo kagoe'-ra mpohilo betue' toe . Betue' toe mpori'uluhi-ra duu'-na mento'o hintoto po'ohaa' Ana' toei .
40002010	
40002011	Karata-ra , mesua'-ramo hi rala tomi , mpohilo Ana' toei hante Maria , tina-na . Mowilingkudu-ramo mpopue'-i . Oti toe , karabongka-nami pontimamahia rewa-ra , pai' rajuju-mi pepue'-ra hi Ana' toei . Pepue'-ra toe : bulawa , pai' anu mohonga to masuli' oli-na to rahanga' dupa' pai' mur .
40002012	Oti toe , Alata'ala mpololitai-ra hi rala ompo'-ra , na'uli'-raka : " Neo'-pokoi nculii' hi Herodes ! " Jadi' ponculia'-ra toe , uma-rapa ntara hi Yerusalem , meleli'-ramo ntara hi ohea ntani'-na .
40002013	Pe'ongko'-ra to nginca mponaa betue' toera , mehupa' wo'o-mi mala'eka Pue' hi Yusuf hi rala ompo'-na . Na'uli' mala'eka toei : " Yusuf ! Herodes mpopali' Ana' tetui doko' napatehi . Memata-moko , keni-imi Ana' tetui hante tina-na , malai-koi hilou hi tana' Mesir ! Mo'oha'-mokoi ulu hi ria duu'-na ria lolita-ku mpai' mpo'uli'-kokoi . "
40002014	Pemata-nami Yusuf , pai' hi bengi toe palai-nami mpokeni Maria pai' Yesus hilou hi Mesir .
40002015	Mo'oha'-ramo hi ria duu'-na Magau' Herodes mate . Jadi' , Yesus rakeni hilou hi tana' Mesir toe , bona ane rakeni nculii'-ipi mpai' , madupa'-mi Lolita Pue' to napohowa' nabi owi to mpo'uli' : " Kukio' Ana'-ku tumai ngkai Mesir . "
40002016	Kana'inca-na Herodes karapakawa'-na to nginca mponaa betue' toera , uma-pi mowo roe-na . Toe pai' nahawai' tantara-na hilou mpopatehi hawe'ea ana' tomane hi Betlehem pai' hi ngata to ntololikia-na , bona ngalai' ana' to jadi' magau' toei mpai' rapohipatehii . Na'inca moto Herodes nto'uma lomo' pehupa'-na betue' toe , apa' napekune' wengi hi to nginca mponaa betue' toera . Toe pai' napehubui bona hawe'ea ana' tomane hi Betlehem rapatehi , ngkai ana'lei to lako' putu duu' rata hi ana' to rompae-mi umuru-ra .
40002017	Kajadia' toe mpopadupa' Lolita Pue' to napohowa' nabi Yeremia owi , to mpo'uli' hewa toi :
40002018	" Hi ngata Rama uma mowo pogeo' pai' potantangi' . Rahel mpotantangii' ana'-ana'-na . Uma-i ma'ala tanta'ua , apa' uma-rapa ria . "
40002019	Bula-ra Yusuf , Maria pai' Yesus hi Mesir , Magau' Herodes mate . Oti toe , mehupa' wo'o-imi mala'eka Pue' hi Yusuf hi rala ompo'-na .
40002020	Na'uli' mala'eka toei : " Tauna to doko' mpopatehi Ana' tetui , mate-imi . Wae-pi , memata-moko , keni-imi Ana' tetui ntali tina-na , nculii'-mokoi hilou hi tana' Israel . "
40002021	Memata mpu'u-imi Yusuf mpokeni Ana' toei hante Maria , nculii' hi tana' to Israel .
40002022	Tapi' na'epe Yusuf , Arkelaus ana' Herodes mposampei tuama-na jadi' magau' hi tana' Yudea . Toe pai' me'eka'-i hilou hi ria . Ngkai ree , ria wo'o-mi petudui' Pue' to nahilo Yusuf hi rala ompo'-na . Toe pai' hilou-ramo hi tana' Galilea ,
40002023	pai' mo'oha'-ra hi ngata to rahanga' Nazaret . Ngkai toe wo'o-mi , madupa'-mi lolita nabi owi to mpolowa Ana' toei , to mpo'uli' : Hi'a mpai' rakahangai' to Nazaret .
40003001	Ba hangkuja kahae-na oti toe , rata-mi Yohanes Topeniu' hi papada to wao' hi Yudea , pai' natepu'u-mi mpopalele Lolita Pue' hi ntodea ,
40003002	na'uli'-raka : " Medea-mokoi ngkai jeko'-ni , apa' neo' rata-mi tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia' . "
40003003	Yohanes toe-imi to nalowa nabi Yesaya owi . Na'uli' Yesaya hewa toi : Ria tauna to mekio' hi papada to wao' , na'uli' : ` Neo' rata-imi Pue' ! Porodo ami'-miki ohea-na . Nipakalempe ami'-mi ohea to natara mpai' . ' "
40003004	Pohea-na Yohanes rababehi ngkai wulu porewua to rahanga' unta . Salepe'-na ngkai kuliba . Koni'-na lari pai' ue wani .
40003005	Wori' tauna to hilou hi papada to wao' doko' mpo'epe lolita-na . Ria-ra ngkai ngata Yerusalem , pai' ngkai humalili' tana' Yudea , ria wo'o ngkai ngata-ngata to hampanca'ua ue Yordan .
40003006	Hilou-ra mpangaku' jeko'-ra , pai' naniu'-ra hi ue Yordan tanda kamedea-ra ngkai jeko'-ra .
40003007	Wori' wo'o pangkeni agama Yahudi to rahanga' to Parisi pai' to Saduki tumai mpopeniu' hi Yohanes . Kanahilo-ra rata , na'uli'-raka : " He koi' to bengku' gau'-ni ! Napa pai' tumai mpopeniu'-koie ? Ba ni'uli'-koina , ma'ala mpai' nipasalewa roe Alata'ala to neo' mporumpa'-koi !
40003008	Ane bongko medea-mokoi ngkai jeko'-ni , babehi-mokoi gau' to lompe' .
40003009	Pai' neo' nipoperaha kamuli-na Abraham-koi , neo' ni'uli' hi rala nono-ni : ` Uma-hawo mpai' nahuku'-kai Alata'ala . ' Tetu-e uma makono ! Bona ni'inca : muli Abraham bisa napajadi' Alata'ala ngkai watu-watu toe lau .
40003010	Neo' rata-mi pehuku' Alata'ala ! Pehuku'-na hewa pati to rodo ami'-mi hi tawu kaju . Butu ngkaju-na to uma lompe' wua'-na , bate ratoki pai' ratene' hi rala apu . "
40003011	Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yohanes : " Aku' toi mponiu'-koi hante ue , tanda kamedea-ni ngkai jeko'-ni . Tapi' tumai-i mpai' ngkabokoa' ngkai aku' hadua to meliu kuasa-na ngkai aku' . Bangku' jadi' pahawaa'-na to mpokeni sapatu'-na , uma-a-kuwo natao . Hi'a mpai' to mponiu'-koi hante Inoha' Tomoroli' pai' hante apu .
40003012	Hi'a ma'ala rarapai'-ki tauna to mpowiri' pae . Nagaa' pae to mo'ihi ngkai to lopa'-na duu'-na me'itu' . Pae to mo'ihi napuna' hi rala wilulu , pai' to lopa'-na nasuwe hi rala apu to jela' ncuu duu' kahae-hae-na . "
40003013	Nto'u toe , Yesus tumai ngkai tana' Galilea rata hi ue Yordan . Rata hi ria , mpopeniu' wo'o-i-hawo hi Yohanes .
40003014	Tapi' Yohanes , uma-i daho' mponiu'-i , pai' na'uli'-ki : " Kakoo-kono-na , aku' toi-dile to toto-na mpopeniu' hi Iko-e , hiaa' Iko lau-di to tumai hi aku' ! "
40003015	Natompoi' Yesus : " Niu'-ama-hana . Natao moto tababehi toi , bona tatuku' hawe'ea konoa Alata'ala . " Ngkai ree , naniu' mpu'u-imi .
40003016	Ka'oti-na Yesus raniu' , mencore-imi ngkai rala ue . Tebea ncorobaa-mi langi' , pai' nahilo-hawo , Inoha' Alata'ala mana'u tumai hewa danci mangkebodo , hompo hi Hi'a .
40003017	Oti toe , ra'epe-mi lolita Alata'ala ngkai langi' to mpo'uli' : " Hi'a toi-mi ana'-ku to kupe'ahi' . Hi'a-mi to mpakagoe' nono-ku . "
40004001	Oti toe , Inoha' Alata'ala mpopakeni Yesus hilou hi papada to wao' , bona Magau' Anudaa' mposori-i .
40004002	Opo' mpulu' eo opo' mpulu' bengi mopuasa'-i . Ngkai ree , mo'oro'-imi .
40004003	Rata Magau' Topesori mpo'uli'-ki : " Ane Ana' Alata'ala mpu'u-ko , wae-pi hubui watu toe-ra lau mewali pongkoni' ! "
40004004	Natompoi' Yesus : " Hi rala Buku Tomoroli' te'uki' hewa toi : ` Manusia' uma tuwu' ngkai pongkoni'-wadi . Tuwu'-ra ngkai kampotuku'-ra butu mela lolita to napohowa' Alata'ala . ' "
40004005	Oti toe , Magau' Anudaa' mpopakeni-i hilou hi Yerusalem , ngata to moroli' , napopokore-i hi lolo wumu Tomi Alata'ala ,
40004006	pai' na'uli'-ki : " Ane Ana' Alata'ala-ko , mengkanawu'-ko ngkai rei ! Uma-ko mpai' moapa-apa , apa' ria te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' : ` Pue' Alata'ala mpohubui mala'eka-na mpetalawai'-ko ngkai silaka . Rahorongko-ko bona witi'-nu uma dungku hi watu . ' "
40004007	Natompoi' Yesus : " Aga ria wo'o te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' to mpo'uli' hewa toi : ` Neo' tasori Pue'-ta , Pue' Alata'ala ! ' "
40004008	Oti toe Magau' Anudaa' mpakeni tena Yesus lou hi lolo bulu' to molangko lia , pai' napopohiloi-i hawe'ea kamagaua' hi dunia' hante ka'uaa'-na .
40004009	Na'uli'-ki : " Hawe'ea toe lau kuwai'-koko , ane motingkua'-ko mpopue'-a . "
40004010	Hampetompoi' Yesus : " Palai-ko topesori ! Apa' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' te'uki' hewa toi : ` Kana mepue'-ta hi Pue'-ta , Pue' Alata'ala . Muntu' Hi'a-wadi to natao tapengkorui . ' "
40004011	Ngkai ree , malai mpu'u-imi Magau' Anudaa' mpalahii Yesus , pai' oti toe rata-ramo mala'eka mpomawai-i .
40004012	Ko'ia mahae ngkai ree , Yohanes Topeniu' rahoko' pai' ratarungku' . Kana'epe-na Yesus kareba toe , hilou nculii'-imi hi ngata Nazaret hi tana' Galilea .
40004013	Oti toe , kaliliu-imi ngkai Nazaret hilou mo'oha' hi ngata Kapernaum . Kapernaum toe , ngata hi wiwi' rano Galilea , hi tana' Zebulon pai' Naftali .
40004014	Yesus mo'oha' hi ree , alaa-na madupa'-mi lolita to napohowa' nabi Yesaya owi , hewa toi moni-na :
40004015	" Ane tana'-ra to Zebulon pai' to Naftali , tana' to mohu' hi rano Galilea , pai' tana' to hi dipo ue Yordan . Tana' toe rapo'ohai' wori' tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi .
40004016	Ri'ulu , tauna toera hi rala kabengia-na , pai' me'eka'-ra mpoka'eka' kamatea . Aga wae lau , mpohilo-ramo-rawo baja to bohe , apa' mehupa'-mi eo to mehini mpohinii-ra . "
40004017	Ntepu'u ngkai ree , Yesus mpoparata Lolita Pue' , na'uli' : " Medea-mokoi ngkai jeko'-ni , apa' neo' rata-mi tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia' . "
40004018	Bula-na Yesus momako' hi wiwi' rano Galilea , mpohilo-i rodua to ntali ompi' , hanga'-ra Simon ( to rahanga' wo'o Petrus ) hante Andreas ompi'-na . Nto'u toe , bula-ra mebau' hi rano mojala' , apa' toe-mi-rawo bago-ra .
40004019	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Mai-mokoi ntuku'-a ! Uma-pokoi mebau' mpali' uru . Ngkai wae lau kuwai'-koi pobago mpotudui' tauna mepangala' hi Aku' . "
40004020	Karapalahii-nami jala'-ra , pai' ntepu'u eo toe mpotuku' Yesus-ramo .
40004021	Oti toe , Yesus mpokaliliu pomako'-na , nahilo wo'o-mi rodua to ntali ompi' : Yakobus pai' Yohanes , ana'-na Zebedeus . Hira' toe , bula-ra mpokolompehii jala'-ra hi rala sakaya hante tuama-ra . Yesus mpokio'-ra jadi' topetuku'-na .
40004022	Karapalahii-na wo'o-mi-rawo sakaya-ra pai' tuama-ra , mpotuku' Yesus wo'o-ramo-rawo .
40004023	Yesus modao' hobo' hi tana' Galilea pai'-i metudui' hi rala tomi posampayaa . Mpoparata-i Kareba Lompe' , na'uli' : " Neo' rata-mi tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia' . " Yesus mpaka'uri' wo'o hawe'ea tauna to peda' pai' to keru .
40004024	Pobago-na Yesus toe tetolele hi hawe'ea ngata hi propinsi Siria , alaa-na wori' tauna tumai doko' mpohirua'-ki . Mpokeni-ra hawe'ea doo-ra to mpotodohaka to wori' nyala haki'-ra pai' kasusaa'-ra , ba to nahawi' seta , ba to limpuangaa ba to pungku . Napaka'uri'-ra omea .
40004025	Nto'u toe , wori' lia tauna to mpotuku' Yesus . Ria-ra to ngkai tana' Galilea , ngkai Dekapolis , ngkai Yerusalem , ngkai tana' Yudea , pai' ria wo'o-ra ngkai dipo ue Yordan .
40005001	Kanahilo-na Yesus tauna to wori' toera , manake'-imi hilou hi bulu'-na , pai'-i mohura . Rata-ramo topetuku'-na mpomohui'-i .
40005002	Natudui'-ra , na'uli'-raka :
40005003	" Marasi' tauna to mpo'inca kampe'ahii' tuwu'-ra hi poncilo Alata'ala , apa' hira' toe-mi mpai' to jadi' ntodea Alata'ala , pai' Alata'ala jadi' Magau'-ra .
40005004	Marasi' tauna to susa' nono-ra , apa' Alata'ala moto mpai' mpotanta'u-ra .
40005005	Marasi' tauna to dingki' nono-ra , apa' hira' mpai' to mporata napa to najanci Alata'ala .
40005006	Marasi' tauna to doko' lia jadi' monoa' hi poncilo Alata'ala , apa' Alata'ala moto mpai' to mpowai'-ra napa to rapali' toe .
40005007	Marasi' tauna to ma'ahi' hi doo-ra , apa' Alata'ala wo'o mpai' mpoka'ahi'-ra .
40005008	Marasi' tauna to moroli' nono-ra , apa' hira' mpai' to mpohilo Alata'ala .
40005009	Marasi' tauna to mpopohintuwu' doo , apa' hira'-mi mpai' to rahanga' ana' Alata'ala .
40005010	Marasi' tauna to rabalinai' sabana mpobabehi-ra konoa Alata'ala , apa' hira' toe-mi mpai' to jadi' ntodea Alata'ala , pai' Alata'ala jadi' Magau'-ra .
40005011	" Marasi'-koi ane raruge'-koi tauna , rabalinai' pai' rabalihi-koi hante wori' nyala lolita pebalihi sabana petuku'-ni hi Aku' .
40005012	Nabi-nabi to owi , rabalinai' wo'o-ra-rawo hewa toe . Jadi' , pakagoe'-mi nono-ni , apa' bohe mpai' rasi' to nirata hi rala suruga .
40005013	" Koi' to mpotuku'-a ma'ala rarapai'-ki poi' , to mpokeni kalompea' hi manusia' . Aga ane uma-di nituku' tudui'-kue , koi' hewa poi' to mononto , uma-pi bisa rapomopoi' nculii' , pai' uma-pi ria kalaua-na , alaa-na ratadi-mi pai' rapolisaa .
40005014	" Koi' to mpotuku'-a , hewa baja to mpobajahi hawe'ea tauna . Ngata to rawangu hi lolo bulu' uma kalerua .
40005015	Pai' uma ria tauna to mposuwe palita pai' napopoi' hante kura . Bate natu'u hi pontu'ua-na bona hini-na rahilo hawe'ea tauna to hi rala tomi .
40005016	Wae wo'o baja to hi rala nono-ni neo' niwuni . Kana lompe' kehi-ni , bona hawe'ea tauna mpohilo , alaa-ra mpo'une' Tuama-ni to hi rala suruga .
40005017	" Neo' nipekiri katumai-ku tohe'i-e , ba tumai mpokero Atura Pue' to na'uki' Musa hante tudui' nabi-nabi owi . Uma-a tumai mpokero . Katumai-ku toi-le , bona mpopadupa' napa to te'uki' hi rala Atura toe .
40005018	Mpu'u-mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : butu mela lolita to te'uki' hi rala Buku Atura Pue' bate kana madupa' . Ane da rii-ria-pidi langi' pai' dunia' toi , uma ria hamelaa lolita hi rala Atura Pue' to uma madupa' , nau' to kedi' lia .
40005019	Toe pai' ku'uli'-kokoi , hema-hema to mpotiboki nau' hanyala-wadi parenta to hi rala Atura Pue' , nau' parenta to kedi' lia , pai' mpotudui' tau ntani'-na mpobabehi hewa toe wo'o , tau tetui mpai' to kedi' lia katuwu'-na ngkai hawe'ea ntodea-na Alata'ala . Aga hema to mpotuku' hawe'ea parenta to hi rala Atura Pue' pai' mpotudui' tau ntani'-na mpobabehi hewa toe wo'o , tau tetui to bohe lia katuwu'-na ngkai hawe'ea ntodea Alata'ala .
40005020	Jadi' , ku'uli'-kokoi : ane uma-koi jadi' monoa' hi poncilo Alata'ala , bate uma-koi jadi' ntodea-na hi rala Kamagaua'-na . Pai' kamonoa'-ni tetu kana meliu ngkai kamonoa'-ra guru agama pai' to Parisi .
40005021	" Ni'inca moto parenta to ra'uli'-raka ntu'a-ta owi to mpo'uli' : ` Neo' mepatehi , pai' hema to mepatehi kana rapohurai kara-kara-na pai' rahuku' . '
40005022	Aga Aku' mpo'uli' : hema to mpokaroe doo-na , bate rapohurai mpai' kara-kara-na . Hema to mpotipo' doo-na , bate-na rakeni hi topohura bohe . Pai' hema to mpakiwojo doo-na , masipato' lia-i ratadi hi rala apu naraka .
40005023	" Jadi' , ane rapa'-na mesua'-ta hi Tomi Alata'ala doko' mpokeni pepue'-ta , pai' muu-mule' takiwoi karia-na doo-ta to peda' nono-na hi kita' ,
40005024	bahaka-mi ulu pepue'-ta hi nyanyoa meja' pontunua pepue' , nculii'-tamo ulu momekalompei' . Oti toe-di , pai' lako' nculii'-ta hilou mpotonu pepue'-ta hi Alata'ala .
40005025	" Wae wo'o , ane ria to doko' mpakilu-ta hi topohura , pari-pari mpali' kahintuwuaa' nto'u-ta hi lengko ohea-pidi hilou hi topohura . Apa' ane uma ria kahintuwuaa'-ta , bate nabua'-ta mpai' hi topohura , pai' topohura mpotonu-ta hi polisi , pai' polisi mpopesua'-ta hi rala tarungku' .
40005026	Mpu'u-mpu'u ku'uli' : uma-tapa tebahaka ngkai rala tarungku' ane da koo-ko'ia oti tabayari waya'-ta .
40005027	" Ni'inca moto karia-na parenta owi to mpo'uli' : ` Neo' mobualo' . '
40005028	Aga Aku' mpo'uli' : hema to mponaa tobine pai' ria nono-na mpokahina-i , mobualo'-imi hi rala nono-na .
40005029	Jadi' , ane rapa'-na mata ka'ana-ta to mpakeni-ta mojeko' , jungki' lau-imi pai' petadi . Agina lau-pi moronto mata-ta hamali , ngkai hawe'ea woto-ta ratadi hi rala naraka .
40005030	Ane rapa'-na pale ka'ana-ta mpakeni-ta mojeko' , pua' pai' petadi . Agina lau-pi moronto pale-ta hamali , ngkai hawe'ea woto-ta ratadi hi rala naraka .
40005031	" Ria wo'o lolita owi to mpo'uli' : Ane ria tomane to mpogaa'-ki tobine-na , kana nawai'-i sura pogaa' .
40005032	Aga Aku' mpo'uli' : hema to mpobahaka tobine-na , bo tobine-na toe uma-hawo mogau' sala' , mojeko'-i , apa' hi'a to mebahaka toei mpakeni tobine-na mobualo' , ane motomanei nculii'-i . Pai' tomane to mpotobine kabulisa doo , mobualo' wo'o-imi-hawo .
40005033	" Ni'inca wo'o karia-na parenta to ra'uli'-raka ntu'a-ta owi to mpo'uli' : ` Neo' mo'ungkere' ngkai pojanci-nu ba posumpa-nu . Napa to nujanci-mi hi nyanyoa Alata'ala , bate kana nubabehi . '
40005034	Aga Aku' mpo'uli' : neo' lau-ta mosumpa . Ane mpobabehi-ta janci , neo' mosumpa mpokahangai' langi' ba dunia' . Apa' langi' pohuraa Alata'ala , pai' dunia' pentodua-na . Neo' mosumpa mpokahangai' ngata Yerusalem , apa' toe ngata Alata'ala , Magau' to bohe .
40005035	
40005036	Neo' wo'o mosumpa mpokahangai' woo'-ta , apa' uma tapakulei' mpakabula ba mpomo'eta wuluwoo'-ta , nau' ba hangkaho-wadi .
40005037	Ane patuju-ta mpo'uli' io' , uli'-mi ` Io' . ' Ane patuju-ta mpo'uli' uma , uli' wo'o ` Uma . ' Uma-hana lompe' ane taperohoi lolita-ta hante mosumpa , apa' kehi to hewa toe mehupa' ngkai Magau' Anudaa' .
40005038	" Ni'inca moto parenta owi to mpo'uli' : ` Ane ria to motuda' pai' to hadua mpojungki' mata doo ba mpowuka ngihi' doo , jungki' wo'o-ki-hawo mata-na , pai' wuka wo'o-ki-hawo ngihi'-na . '
40005039	Aga Aku' mpo'uli' : neo' tapehawai doo to mpobabehi to dada'a hi kita' . Ane rapa'-na ria to mpohopo' kulimpi-ta hamali , tonu wo'o-ki to hamali .
40005040	Ane ria to mpakilu-ta hi topohura pai' mperapi'-i baju-ta , wai' lau wo'o-i abe'-ta .
40005041	Ane hadua tantara mpewuku-ta mpokolo-ki kenia-na nte hakilo kalaa-na , kolo lau-miki kenia-na nte rokilo kalaa-na .
40005042	Ane ria to mperapii'-ta ba napa-napa , wai'-i-hawo . Pai' neo' takabosii' doo to doko' mpeboloi-ta ba napa-napa .
40005043	" Ni'inca wo'o tudui' to mpo'uli' : ` Poka'ahi' hingka doo-nu , pokahuku' bali'-nu . '
40005044	Aga Aku' mpo'uli' : kana tapoka'ahi' bali'-ta , pai' taposampayai-ra to mpobalinai'-ta .
40005045	Apa' ane lompe' nono-ta hi bali'-ta , tatuku'-mi po'ingku Alata'ala , Tuama-ta to hi rala suruga . Apa' lompe' nono-na Alata'ala hi hawe'ea tauna : napopehupa' eo hi tauna to lompe' pai' hi tauna to dada'a , napopana'u uda hi tauna to monoa' pai' hi tauna to bengku' nono-ra .
40005046	Ane tapoka'ahi' muntu' tauna to mpoka'ahi'-ta-wadi , uma mpai' nahiwili-taka Alata'ala kehi-ta toe . Bangku' topesingara' paja' to dada'a gau'-ra , mpoka'ahi' moto-ra-rawo tauna to mpoka'ahi'-ra .
40005047	Ane lompe' nono-ta muntu' hi ema'-ta-wadi , napa pelabia-na kehi-ta toe-e ? Bangku' tauna to uma mpo'incai Alata'ala , bate toe wo'o-rawo po'ingku-ra .
40005048	Kita' kana lompe' po'ingku-ta hante uma ria ruke-ruke-na , hewa po'ingku-na Alata'ala Tuama-ta to hi rala suruga .
40006001	" Pelompehi-e' , neo'-ta mpobabehi ada agama hi mata ntodea bona rahilo doo-wadi . Ane hewa toe gau'-ta , uma-ta mpai' nagane' Alata'ala , Tuama-ta to hi rala suruga .
40006002	Jadi' , ane mewai'-ta doi hi tauna to kabu , neo'-hawo ntora ra'uli' hilau , hewa kabiasaa-ra tauna to lompe' hi mali-na-wadi . Hira' toe mpopehilo kalompe' nono-ra hi rala tomi posampayaa ba hi karajaa bona ra'une' doo . Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : uma mpai' ria napa-napa to rarata ngkai Alata'ala , apa' mpolia' rarata-mi-rana pe'une' doo .
40006003	Jadi' ane kita' mewai' , agina tatonu bongo pewai'-ta , neo' ra'uli' hilau .
40006004	Agina tatonu pewai'-ta tetu , hante uma ria to mpo'incai . Tuama-ta to hi rala suruga-wadi to mpo'inca . Nahilo kehi-ta to uma ra'incai doo , pai' nahiwili-taka mpai' .
40006005	" Ane mosampaya , neo'-ta hewa tauna to lompe' hi mali-na-wadi . Konoa-ra , mosampaya ngkokore hi rala tomi posampayaa ba hi porompengaa ohea bona rahilo doo . Jadi' , apa' mpolia' rarata-mi-rana pe'une' doo , mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : uma-rapa mpai' mporata napa-napa ngkai Alata'ala .
40006006	Jadi' , ane mosampaya-ta , mesua' hi rala tomi , unca wobo' , pai'-ta lako' mosampaya-di hi Tuama-ta to uma kahiloa . Apa' nahilo moto-di kehi-ta to uma ra'incai doo , pai' nahiwili-taka mpai' .
40006007	" Ane mosampaya , neo' ntora rahuu-hulii' hante uma ria pekiri , hewa tauna to uma mpo'incai Alata'ala . Ra'uli'-rana , ane moloe pololita-ra , madupa' mpai' posampaya-ra .
40006008	Neo' mpenau' kehi-ra toe ! Na'inca ami'-mi Tuama-ta to hi rala suruga napa to taparaluu kako'ia-na taperapi' .
40006009	Jadi' , mosampaya hewa toi : Tuama-kai to hi rala suruga , Pomperapia'-kai , bona hawe'ea tauna mpobila' hanga'-nu to moroli' ,
40006010	bona Iko jadi' Magau' hi dunia' , bona hawe'ea tauna hi dunia' mpobabehi konoa-nu , hibalia hante ihi' suruga .
40006011	Wai'-kai pongkoni' to kiparaluu eo toe lau .
40006012	Ampungi sala'-kai , hewa kai' wo'o mpo'ampungi sala' doo hi kai' .
40006013	Neo'-kai nupelele' rasori , bahaka-kai ngkai kuasa anudaa' . ( ( Apa' Iko-mi Magau' to mokuasa pai' to bohe tuwu'-nu , duu' kahae-hae-na . Amin . ) )
40006014	" Ane ta'ampungi doo-ta to masala' hi kita' , Tuama-ta to hi rala suruga wo'o mpo'ampungi sala'-ta .
40006015	Aga ane uma ta'ampungi doo to masala' hi kita' , wae wo'o Tuama-ta to hi rala suruga , uma-ta na'ampungi .
40006016	" Ane mopuasa' , neo' mengkamonto' hewa tauna to lompe' hi mali-na-wadi . Ane mopuasa'-ra , mengkamonto'-ra pai' tungkai' uma-ra monoku ba mokarabii , bona rahilo doo kamopuasa'-ra . Kiwoi-e' : apa' mpolia' rarata-mi-rana pe'une' doo , uma-rapa mpai' mporata napa-napa ngkai Alata'ala .
40006017	Jadi' , ane mopuasa'-ta , monoku pai' mokarabii-ta ,
40006018	bona neo' ra'incai doo kamopuasa'-ta . Muntu' Tuama-ta to hi rala suruga to uma kahiloa , Hi'a-wadi to mpo'inca kamopuasa'-ta . Nahilo moto kehi-ta to uma ra'incai doo , pai' nahiwili-taka mpai' .
40006019	" Neo' mporumpu rewa hi dunia' . Apa' rewa hi dunia' ma'ala naserohi anutuwu' ba jadi' ta'igaraa' . Pontimamahia rewa-ta ma'ala rabongka pai' rewa-ta rapanako .
40006020	Kana mporumpu-ta rewa hi rala suruga . Rewa-ta hi rala suruga toe , uma mpai' moronto , apa' uma-hana ria to meta'igaraai' hi ria , pai' uma ria anutuwu' to mposerohi , pai' uma ria to mpanako .
40006021	Apa' hiapa pontimamahia rewa-ta , hi retu wo'o nono-ta .
40006022	" Mata-ta ma'ala rarapai'-ki hulu' . Ane lompe' mata-ta , monoto pehilo-ta .
40006023	Aga ane mogawu mata-ta , hewa mobengi pehilo-ta . Jadi' , ane Pue' mpobajahi nono-ta pai' tapomobengi nculii' , uma mowo kamobengi riki-na .
40006024	" Uma-hawo ria hadua tauna to mobago hi rodua tua . Apa' hadua mpai' nape'ahi' , hadua napokahuku' . Hadua natuku'-ki hawa'-na , hadua nasapuaka . Wae wo'o kita' , uma-ta bisa mpotuku' konoa Alata'ala , pai' hamali-ta ntora mporumpu rewa dunia' .
40006025	" Toe pai' ku'uli'-kokoi : neo'-koi me'eka' ba mpo'uli' : ` Napa-le' to takoni'-e pai' to ta'inu-e ? ' Neo'-koi me'eka' ba mpo'uli' : ` Napa-le' to tapohea-e ? ' Apa' tuwu'-ni meliu ngkai pongkoni' pai' pohea .
40006026	Penonoi-dile danci to ngkalimoko hilou tumai-e . Uma-ra molia' , uma-ra mepae , uma ria wilulu-ra . Aga nau' wae , Tuama-ni to hi rala suruga mpowai' moto-ra pongkoni' . Hiaa' hi poncilo Alata'ala , koi' meliu katuwu'-ni ngkai katuwu' danci , pai' meliu pompewili'-na hi koi' ngkai pompewili'-na danci .
40006027	Napa-mi kalaua-na wori' rahi pekiri-ni pai' kakoroa'-ni . Apa' nau' sese' ncuu-ta mpopekiri wori' nyala , uma-ta bisa mpodonihii umuru-ta nau' kampa' hamengi .
40006028	" Napa pai' sese' rahi-koi mpopekiri pohea-ni ? Penonoi-dile katuwu' wunga hi papada-e . Uma-ra mobago , uma-ra mpobabehi pohea-ra .
40006029	Aga ku'uli'-kokoi : bangku' Magau' Salomo-hawoe' hante hawe'ea ka'uaa'-na , pohea-na uma hewa kancola-na wunga toera lau .
40006030	Jadi' , ane Alata'ala mpakancola kowo' to hi papada toera lau -- to ria hi eo toe lau , pai' rasuwe mepulo -- peliu-liu-nami koi' ! Meliu pompewili'-na hi koi' . Jadi' , napa-di pai' uma nipangala' pompewili'-nae ?
40006031	" Toe pai' ku'uli'-kokoi : neo'-koi me'eka' ba mpo'uli' : ` Napa-le' to takoni' pai' to ta'inu-e ? Napa-le' to tapohea-e ? '
40006032	Hawe'ea tetu lau to ntora rapenonoi tauna to uma mpo'incai Alata'ala . Koi' , neo'-pi nipoka'eka' tetu lau , apa' Tuama-ni to hi rala suruga mpo'inca kaniparaluu-na hawe'ea tetu lau .
40006033	To kana tapenonoi , toi : babehi napa to monoa' hi poncilo Alata'ala , bona Hi'a jadi' Magau'-ta . Ane toe-pi to tapopori'ulu , to ntani'-ntani'-na nawai' moto-ta mpai' omea .
40006034	Jadi' , neo'-ta sese' mpopekiri napa to jadi' eo mepulo . Eo toe lau hono'-mi-hawo kasusaa'-na , neo'-pi radonihii tena mpekiri to jadi' hi eo mepulo .
40007001	" Neo'-ta mposalai' doo , bona uma wo'o-ta mpai' nasalai' Alata'ala .
40007002	Apa' pohuka' to tapake' hi doo , tetu wo'o-hawo mpai' to rapopohuka'-taka . Batua-na , ane liu rahi-ta mposalai' doo , hewa toe wo'o mpai' Alata'ala mpobotuhi kara-kara-ta .
40007003	" Napa pai' mponaa-ta gege' hi mata doo , hiaa' wince' kaju to hi mata-ta moto uma ta'incai karia-na !
40007004	Beiwa-ta ma'ala mpo'uli'-ki doo : ` Mai kulali gege'-nu , ' bo ria moto wo'o-di wince' kaju hi mata-ta .
40007005	Neo' mpetolompei' kehi ! Kana talali ulu wince' to hi mata-ta , bona monoto mata-ta mpolali gege' doo .
40007006	" Anu to moroli' neo' rawai'-ki dike' , nee-neo' mpai' tumai nahoko' lau-ta-wadi . Anu to masuli' oli-na neo' rarora-ki wawu , apa' na'ihe' mara-wadi-hana .
40007007	" Perapi'-mi hi Alata'ala , nawai' moto-ta mpai' . Pali' kaparaluua-ta hi Alata'ala , tarata moto mpai' . Neo' tabahakai mpopebea wobo' , Alata'ala mpobea moto-taka mpai' wobo'-na .
40007008	Apa' hema to merapi' bate rawai' . Hema to mpali' bate mporata . Hema to mpopebea wobo' , bate rabea-ki wobo' .
40007009	" Ha ria-koi to mpowai' watu hi ana'-ni ane ana'-ni mperapi' koni'-e ?
40007010	Ba mpowai'-i ule ane mperapi'-i bau'-e ? Uma-hawo .
40007011	Nau' hewa apa-mi kadada'a-nie , ni'inca moto mpowai' to lompe' hi ana'-ni . Peliu-liu-nami Tuama-ni to hi rala suruga ! Na'inca lia mpewai' to lompe' hi tauna to merapi' hi Hi'a .
40007012	" Hawe'ea po'ingku to tapokono rababehi doo hi kita' , toe wo'o to kana tababehi hi doo . Toe-mile tudui' Atura Pue' pai' tudui' nabi-nabi-e .
40007013	" Mesua'-koi ntara wobo' to jopi' , apa' mowela' wobo' pai' ohea to mpotoa' naraka , pai' wori' wo'o tauna to ntara hi ohea toe .
40007014	Tapi' kedi' wobo' pai' jopi' ohea to mpotoa' katuwua' to lompe' , hangkedi' lia-wadi tauna to mpotara .
40007015	" Mo'inga'-inga'-koi , apa' ria tauna to mpo'uli' , nabi-ra . Ntaa' boa'-radi . Hiloa-ra hewa tauna to mepangala' hi Alata'ala . Tapi' patuju-ra doko' mpokero pepangala' doo-wadi .
40007016	Ta'inca pebagiu-ra ane tanaa wua' pobago-ra . Wua' anggur uma rahopu' ngkai walaa to morui . Wua' ara uma rahopu' ngkai jilata .
40007017	Kaju to morudu' , wua'-na lompe' . Kaju to kee' , uma wo'o lompe' wua'-na .
40007018	Uma ria kaju to lompe' mowua' dada'a , pai' uma ria kaju to dada'a mowua' to lompe' .
40007019	Kaju to uma mowua' lompe' , bate ratoki pai' raropu . Wae wo'o Alata'ala bate mpohuku' nabi to boa' toera . Ta'inca kaboa'-ra ane tanaa wua' pobago-ra .
40007020	
40007021	" Wori' tauna to mpokio'-a ` Pue' ! Pue' ! ' aga uma hawe'ea-ra to jadi' ntodea Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua'-na . Muntu' tauna to mpobabehi konoa Tuama-ku-wadi to jadi' ntodea-na .
40007022	Hi Eo Kiama mpai' , wori' tauna mpo'uli'-ka : ` Pue' ! Pue' ! Ha uma nu'incai , kai'-mi to mpoparata Lolita Alata'ala hi rala hanga'-nue ? Hi rala hanga'-nu kipopalai seta . Pai' wori' wo'o tanda mekoncehi kibabehi hante hanga'-nu Pue' . '
40007023	" Kutompoi'-ra mpai' : ` Uma-kuna ku'incai-koi ! Palai-koi ngkai rei , koi' to dada'a po'ingku-ni . '
40007024	" Hema to mpo'epe lolita-ku toi pai' natuku' , tauna toei hewa tauna to pante mpowangu tomi-na hi lolo parawatu to moroho .
40007025	Karata-na uda , mowo' ue , pai' ngolu' mporumpa' tomi toe , tapi' uma-i modungka , apa' rawangu hi lolo watu to moroho .
40007026	" Aga tauna to mpo'epe lolita-ku toi pai' uma natuku' , tauna toei hewa to wojo to mpowangu tomi-na hi lolo wo'one .
40007027	Karata-na uda , mowo' ue , pai' ngolu' mporumpa' tomi toe , kamodungka-nami , mokero hangkani . "
40007028	Kahudu-na Yesus mpololita hawe'ea toe , rapokakonce tauna to mpo'epe tudui'-na .
40007029	Apa' uma-i metudui' hewa guru-guru agama . Petudui'-na , hewa tauna to mokuasa mpu'u .
40008001	Kamana'u-na Yesus ngkai lolo bulu' , wori' tauna to mpotuku'-i .
40008002	Nto'u toe , ria hadua tauna to mohaki' poko' tumai motingkua' hi nyanyoa Yesus mpo'uli'-ki : " Pue' , ane ma'ala , paka'uri'-a-kuwo ! "
40008003	Yesus mpojama-i , pai' na'uli'-ki : " Ma'ala moto . Kupaka'uri'-moko ! " Hampinisi mata mo'uri'-imi , uma-pi ria haki'-na .
40008004	Oti toe , na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus mpo'uli'-ki : " Neo' nulolita hi hema-hema napa to jadi' tohe'i-e . Hilou-moko ulu mpopehuwu woto-nu hi imam bona nahilo kamo'uri'-numi , pai' keni pepue'-nu hewa to te'uki' hi rala Atura Musa , bona monoa' hi hawe'ea tauna kamo'uri'-nu mpu'u-mi . "
40008005	Pesua'-na Yesus hi ngata Kapernaum , rata hadua tadulako tantara to Roma mpohirua'-ki pai' mpopetulungi ,
40008006	na'uli' : " Tuama , batua-ku peda' lia-i ria hi tomi . Ntora turu-i-wadi , pai' ntora ntodohaka-i . "
40008007	Na'uli' Yesus : " Tilou moto-a mpaka'uri'-i . "
40008008	Natompoi' tadulako tantara toei : " Tuama , aku' toi-le , bela-a to Yahudi , uma-a-kuna natao nupencuai' . Nau' hamela-wadi lolita nu'uli' , mo'uri'-i mpai' batua-ku .
40008009	Apa' aku' toi-e , pahawaa' wo'o-a-wadi-kuwo , pai' ria wo'o-ra-kuwo to kuhawai' . Ane rapa'-na ria hawa'-ku hi hadua tantara mpo'uli'-ki : ` Hilou-ko ! ' bate hilou-i . Ane mekio'-a hi tantara kahadua-na ` Mai-ko ! ' bate tumai-i . Ane ku'uli'-raka batua-ku : ` Babehi toe ! ' bate rababehi . Wae wo'o Iko Tuama , uma-ko mingki' hilou hi tomi-ku . Lolita-nu-wadi nu'uli' hi rehe'i , bate madupa' mpai' hi tomi-ku ria . "
40008010	Konce-i Yesus mpo'epe lolita tadulako tantara toei . Toe pai' me'ili'-i hi tauna to mpotuku'-i , na'uli'-raka : " Uma mowo pepangala'-na tau tohe'ii ! Nau' hi to Yahudi muli Israel , ko'ia ria haduaa kurata to bohe pepangala'-na , hewa tau toii .
40008011	Jadi' , bona ni'inca : hi eo mpeno ane Alata'ala jadi' Magau' , wori' tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi to jadi' ntodea-na . Tumai-ra ngkai tono' mata'eo pai' ngkai kasoloa , mohura goe'-goe'-ra hangkaa-ngkania hante Abraham , Ishak pai' Yakub , ntu'a to Yahudi owi .
40008012	Kakoo-kono-na , ke to Yahudi-hana to natao jadi' ntodea Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua'-na . Hiaa' wori'-ra mpai' to ra'uncahi hi mali-na pai' ratadi hi rala kabengia-na to molaa ngkai Alata'ala . Hi ria-ramo mpai' ntora geo' pai' ntodohaka . "
40008013	Oti toe , Yesus mpo'uli'-ki tadulako tantara toei : " Nculii'-moko , apa' napa to nupangala' bate madupa' . " Hinto'u toe , mo'uri' mpu'u-imi batua-na to peda' hi tomi-na .
40008014	Hangkani , Yesus hilou hi tomi Petrus . Hi ria mpohilo-i piniana-na Petrus tobine hi poturua-na apa' ngkelengi'-i .
40008015	Yesus mpokamu pale-na , ncaliu mo'uri'-imi . Kaliliu memata-imi-hawo , pai'-i mpolayani Yesus .
40008016	Ncimonou' toe , wori' tauna tumai hi Yesus , mpokeni doo-ra ba ompi'-ra to mohaki' ba to nahawi' seta . Yesus mpopalai seta toera hante hamela lau-wadi lolita-na , pai' napaka'uri'-ra hawe'ea tauna to mohaki' .
40008017	Ngkai hawe'ea to nababehi Yesus toe , madupa'-mi lolita nabi Yesaya owi to mpo'uli' : " Hi'a-mi to mpokolo pontodohakaa-ta pai' mpaka'uri' haki'-ta . "
40008018	Rala-na ha'eo , wori' lia tauna mpotipuhi Yesus . Kanahilo-ra , na'uli'-raka ana'guru-na : " Hilou-tamo hi dipo rano . "
40008019	Nto'u toe , ria hadua guru agama Yahudi tumai hi Yesus , mpo'uli'-ki : " Guru , hiapa kahiloua-nu , doko' kutuku'-ko ! "
40008020	Yesus mpotompoi'-i , na'uli' : " Bangko' ria pulo'u-ra , pai' danci ria peta-ra . Aga Aku' Ana' Manusia' , uma-kuna ria tomi-ku kupoturui . "
40008021	Oti toe , ria wo'o hadua topetuku'-na to mpo'uli'-ki : " Pue' , piliu-a-kuwo ulu nculii' hi tomi-ku . Ane mate-damo tuama-ku pai'-i ratana , bo kutuku'-moko . "
40008022	Yesus mpotompoi'-i hante walatu toi : " Tuku'-ama ! Pelele' moto-ramo tomate mpotana hingka tomate-ra . "
40008023	Ngkai ree , ngkahe' mpu'u-imi Yesus hi rala sakaya hante ana'guru-na , pai'-ra me'ongko' .
40008024	Muu-mule' rata ncorobaa ngolu' bohe mpojago rano , alaa-na balumpa mporumpa' sakaya-ra . Nto'u toe , leta' moto-i Yesus .
40008025	Ana'guru-na hilou mpolike-i , ra'uli'-ki : " Pue' ! Tulungi ! Mate-ta toi-e ! "
40008026	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Napa pai' me'eka'-koi ! Kura' rahi pepangala'-ni . " Pemata-nami Yesus mpo'uli' : " Mento'o-ko ngolu' ! Rodo-moko balumpa ! " Hangaa molino-mi omea .
40008027	Kampohilo-ra toe , rapokakonce ra'uli' : " Hema mpu'u-idi-hana tauna toii-e ? Ngolu' pai' rano molino-di-hana ntuku' hawa'-nae ! "
40008028	Rata-imi Yesus hante ana'guru-na hi dipo rano hi tana'-ra to Gadara . Rata hi ria , mehupa' rodua tauna ngkai daeo' , tumai mpohirua'-ki Yesus . To rodua toera , tauna to napesuai' seta , buko' lia-ra , alaa-na uma hema to daho' ntara hi ree .
40008029	Mekio'-ra , ra'uli' : " Ee Ana' Alata'ala ! Napa-di-kona pai' tumai-koe ? Neo'-kai nusesa'-e' ! Ko'ia rata tempo-na . "
40008030	Uma molaa ngkai ree , ria wori' wawu mojume .
40008031	Seta to mehawi' hi tauna toera merapi' hi Yesus , ra'uli' : " Ane kana nupopalai-kai ngkai rei , hubui-kai mesua' hi wawu toera mai . "
40008032	Na'uli' Yesus : " Koi'-mokoi ! " Malai mpu'u-ramo seta toera , kaliliu mesua' hi wawu . Ngkai ree , mparampuli-ramo-rawo wawu hilou mengkajuala' hi rano , kaliliu hi rala ue , pai'-ra mate bonga-mi .
40008033	Karahilo-na tauna to mpodoo wawu toera napa to jadi' hi wawu-ra pai' napa to jadi' hi tauna to kahawia' toera , pokeno-rami hilou hi rala ngata mpoparata kajadia' toe .
40008034	Toe pai' mo'iko-ramo tumai pue' ngata doko' mpohirua'-ki Yesus . Karahilo-na Yesus , raperapi' bona malai-i ngkai ngata-ra .
40009001	Ngkai ree , mehawi' sakaya wo'o-imi Yesus hante doo-na , pedipo-rami nculii' hilou hi po'ohaa'-ra hi ngata Kapernaum .
40009002	Rata hi ria , ria to mpokowa' hadua topungku tumai hi Yesus . Kanahilo-na kabohe pepangala'-ra , na'uli' hi topungku toei : " Ana'-ku , pakaroho nono-nu ! Te'ampungi-mi jeko'-nu . "
40009003	Ba hangkuja dua guru agama mpo'epe lolita-na Yesus toe . Mololita bongo-ramo hi rala nono-ra , ra'uli' : " Dada'a lia-i tau toii ! Na'uli'-hana hibalia tuwu'-na hante tuwu'-na Alata'ala ! "
40009004	Ntaa' na'inca moto-di Yesus to hi rala nono-rae . Toe pai' na'uli'-raka : " Napa pai' kedi' rahi nono-ni !
40009005	Aku' Ana' Manusia' , ria mpu'u kuasa-ku hi dunia' mpo'ampungi jeko' . Tapi' ane ku'uli' : ` Te'ampungi-mi jeko'-nu , ' uma ni'incai ba te'ampungi mpu'u-di jeko'-na ba uma-di . Aga ane ku'uli' : ` Memata pai' momako'-moko , ' nihilo mpai' kadupa'-na ba ka'uma-na . Jadi' , kupopohiloi-koi karia-na kuasa-ku mpo'ampungi jeko' . " Ngkai ree , kamewili'-nami hi topungku toei , na'uli'-ki : " Memata-moko , ongko'-mi pokowaa'-nu , pai'-ko nculii'-mi ! "
40009006	
40009007	Pemata-na mpu'u-mi topungku toei , pai'-i nculii' hilou hi tomi-na .
40009008	Karahilo-na ntodea to jadi' toe , me'eka'-ramo , ra'uli' : " Uma mowo-e' baraka'-na Alata'ala ! Nawai' mpu'u-tano kuasa to bohe hewa toe hi manusia'-e ! "
40009009	Oti toe , Yesus malai ngkai ree . Hi lengko ohea , mpohilo-i hadua topesingara' paja' bula-na mohura hi kantoro'-na , hanga'-na Matius . Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki : " Tuku'-ama ! " Kamokore-nami Matius kaliliu mpotuku' Yesus .
40009010	Oti toe , Yesus pai' ana'guru-na ngkoni' hi tomi Matius , pai' wori' wo'o-ra topesingara' paja' pai' tau ntani'-na to ra'uli' ntodea dada'a kehi-ra tumai ngkoni' dohe-ra .
40009011	Ria-ra to Parisi to mpohilo toe . Ra'uli' mpo'uli'-raka ana'guru-na Yesus : " Napa pai' guru-ni ngkoni' hangkaa-ngkania hante topesingara' paja' pai' tauna topojeko'-e ! "
40009012	Yesus mpo'epe lolita-ra toe , toe pai' na'uli'-raka : " Tauna to uma peda' , uma mingki' rapokulii' . Tauna to peda'-wadi-hawo to paraluu rapokulii' .
40009013	Uma-a tumai mpokio' tauna to monoa' ingku-ra . Katumai-ku toi-le , mpokio' topojeko'-a-kuna bona medea-ra ngkai jeko'-ra . Jadi' , paresa'-koi ulu napa batua-na Lolita Alata'ala to te'uki' hewa toi : ` Uma kuperapi' porewua to nipopepue' hi Aku' . To kuperapi'-le , bona ma'ahi'-koi hi doo . ' "
40009014	Ngkai ree , rata-ra ba hangkuja dua topetuku' Yohanes Topeniu' hi Yesus . Mepekune'-ra , ra'uli' : " Napa pai' topetuku'-nu , uma-ra mopuasa'-e ? Hiaa' ane kai'-kaina hante to Parisi , biasa mopuasa'-ka-kaina ntuku' ada-kai . "
40009015	Yesus mpotompoi'-ra hante lolita rapa' toi , na'uli'-raka : " Tauna hi posusa' poncamokoa bate goe'-goe' dohe topemua' , uma-ra mopuasa' bula-na topemua' ria-pidi dohe-ra . Tapi' rata mpai' tempo-na , topemua' ra'ala' ngkai laintongo'-ra . Nto'u toe-damo , pai' lako' mopuasa'-rada . "
40009016	Oti toe , Yesus mpo'uli' lolita rapa' to ronyala-pi , na'uli' : " Uma ria haduaa tauna to mpotelepei baju to hae hante pontaia' to bo'u . Apa' pontaia' to bo'u mongkuru' mpai' , duu'-na mpoheu' baju to hae toe , alaa-na kaboo-bohea lau-mi mpai' heu'-na .
40009017	Wae wo'o uma lompe' mpotua anggur to bo'u hi pontu'ua to hae . Apa' ane dede'-i-damo , mopengka pontu'ua to hae toe , alaa-na mobowo lau-mi anggur , pai' mpadaa' wo'o-mi pontu'ua-na . Anggur to bo'u kana ratua hi pontu'ua to bo'u , bona lompe' omea . "
40009018	Bula-na Yesus mololita-pidi , rata hadua pangkeni hi tomi posampayaa to Yahudi , kaliliu mowingkotu' hi nyanyoa Yesus mpopetulungi , na'uli'-ki : " Ana'-ku tobine lako' mate lia-i . Lou-ta hi tomi-ku , nujama bona tuwu' nculii'-i . "
40009019	Kamokore-nami Yesus mpotuku' tauna toei , pai' ana'guru-na hilou wo'o-ra mpotuku'-i .
40009020	Hi lengko ohea , tumai hadua tobine mpomohui'-i ngkai tilingkuria-na . Tobine toei hampulu' rompae-imi moraa' ncuu , uma ria katoo-tontoa'-na . Na'uli' hi rala nono-na : " Nau' kureo baju-na-wadi , bate mo'uri'-ale mpai' . " Ngkai ree , kanaganga-nami wuntu baju Yesus .
40009021	
40009022	Nto'u toe wo'o-hawo , me'ili'-imi Yesus hi tobine toei , pai' na'uli'-ki : " Ana'-ku , pakaroho nono-nu ! Mo'uri'-moko , sabana pepangala'-nu hi Aku' . " Ngkai ree , mo'uri' mpu'u-imi .
40009023	Oti toe , Yesus kaliliu momako' hilou hi tomi pangkeni agama Yahudi toei we'i . Karata-na hi ria , nahilo-hawo wori' tauna to molalowe pai' to motantangi' .
40009024	Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Malai-koi omea ngkai rei . Uma-ile mate-e . Leta'-i-wadi . " Mpo'epe toe-e we'i , rapotawai lau-i-wadi .
40009025	Ka'oti-na napopalai tauna toera , mesua'-imi hi poturua ana' toei , pai'-i mpokamu pale-na . Kaliliu memata-imi ana' toei .
40009026	Kareba toe molele-mi hobo' hi ngata toe pai' hi hawe'ea ngata to mohu' .
40009027	Bula-na Yesus mpopaliliu pomako'-na , hi lengko ohea ria rodua towero mpotuku'-i , pai'-ra mekio' : " Muli Magau' Daud ! Poka'ahi'-ka-kaiwo ! "
40009028	Kamesua'-na Yesus hi rala tomi , metuku'-ramo towero to rodua toera mpohirua'-ki . Napekune'-ra : " Ha nipangala' karia-na kuasa-ku mpaka'uri'-koi ? " Ratompoi' : " Kipangala' , Pue' ! "
40009029	Ngkai ree najama-mi mata-ra pai' na'uli'-raka : " Kupaka'uri'-mokoi ntuku' pepangala'-ni . "
40009030	Kaliliu pehilo-ramo . Ngkai ree , Yesus mpotagi-ra , na'uli'-raka : " Neo' nilolita hi hema-hema napa to kubabehi hi koi' toi-e' ! "
40009031	Ntaa' we'i , hilou lau-ramo mpopalele kareba toe hi hawe'ea ngata to mohu' .
40009032	Kamalai-ra towero toera , ria wo'o-mi to mpokeni hadua tauna to peda' tumai hi Yesus . Tauna toei uma howa' mololita apa' nahawi' seta-i .
40009033	Wae kanawuso-na Yesus seta to mpesuai'-i toe-e , howa'-imi-hawo mololita . Konce-ramo ntodea mpohilo to jadi' toe , ra'uli' : " Uma mowo kabaraka'-nae' ! Ko'ia ria hangkania tahilo to hewa Hi'a toe hi tana' to Israel ! "
40009034	Aga to Parisi , uma rapangalai' kuasa-na Yesus , ra'uli' : " Ah ! Kuasa-na tetu-le ngkai magau' seta . Toe-hawo pai' ria baraka'-na mpopalai seta-e . "
40009035	Yesus modao' mpokinomo butu ngata-na . Metudui'-i hi tomi posampayaa , mpoparata Kareba Lompe' , na'uli' : " Neo' rata-mi tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia' . " Mpaka'uri' wo'o-i hawe'ea tauna to peda' pai' to keru .
40009036	Tuna nono-na mpohilo tauna to wori' , apa' wori' kasusaa'-ra , pai' uma hema to mpotulungi-ra , hewa bima to uma te'ewu .
40009037	Na'uli' mpo'uli'-raka ana'guru-na : " Tauna to wori' toera hewa pae to taha' . Wori' pae to kana rapepae , aga topepae uma-ra wori' .
40009038	Toe pai' kana mekakae-koi hi pue' bonea , niperapi' bona nahubui tauna hilou mepae hi bonea-na . "
40010001	Yesus mpokio' ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua bona morumpu , pai' nawai'-ra kuasa mpopalai anudaa' pai' mpaka'uri' hawe'ea tauna to peda' pai' to keru .
40010002	Hanga' suro Pue' Yesus to hampulu' rodua toera , toi-ramo : Lomo'-na Simon , to rahanga' wo'o Petrus ; oti toe , Andreas ompi'-na Simon , Yakobus ana' Zebedeus ; Yohanes ompi'-na Yakobus ; Filipus ; Bartolomeus ; Tomas ; Matius topesingara' paja' ; Yakobus ana' Alfeus ; Tadeus ; Simon to Zelot ; pai' Yudas Iskariot ( hi'a mpai' to mpobalu' Yesus hi bali'-na ) .
40010003	
40010004	
40010005	To hampulu' rodua toera nasuro Yesus hilou ngkeni Kareba Lompe' . Kako'ia-ra me'ongko' , natudui'-ra hewa toi : " Neo'-koi hilou hi ngata to bela-ra to Yahudi . Neo'-koi hilou hi ngata to Samaria .
40010006	Hilou-koi ulu hi hingka to Yahudi-ta muli Israel . Hira' toe hewa bima to puha .
40010007	Uli'-raka hewa toi : ` Neo' rata-mi tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia' . '
40010008	Paka'uri' tauna to peda' , potuwu' tauna to mate , paka'uri' tauna to mohaki' poko' , popalai seta to mpohawi' manusia' . Hawe'ea rasi' to nawai'-kokoi Alata'ala , nawai' mara , uma ni'oli . Jadi' , kana nipewai' mara wo'o-wadi-koiwo to ria hi koi' .
40010009	" Neo' ngkeni wori' rewa hi pomakoa'-ni . Neo' ngkeni doi ba bulawa ba pera' .
40010010	Neo' ngkeni boku , neo' mpokeni rontonga' baju ba sapatu' ba lua' . Apa' masipato' moto-koi rawai' kaparaluua-ni ngkai tauna to nikarebai Lolita Pue' .
40010011	" Ane rata-koi hi hameha' ngata , pali' hi retu tauna to lompe' nono-ra to doko' mpotarima-koi hi rala tomi-ra . Mo'oha'-mokoi hi retu duu'-ni kaliliu mpai' hi ngata ntani'-na .
40010012	Ane mesua'-koi hi rala tomi , uli'-raka pue' tomi : ` Pue' mpogane'-koi ! '
40010013	Ane lompe' nono-ra pue' tomi , bate nagane'-ra Pue' Ala . Aga ane uma-di lompe' nono-ra , uma raratai kalompea' tuwu' ngkai Pue' .
40010014	Ane ria pue' tomi ba pue' ngata to uma dota mpotarima-koi ba to uma dota mpo'epe lolita-ni , palahii tomi ba ngata toe , pai' nitonta awu to mentaka' hi palanta' witi'-ni , rapotanda kanahuku'-ra mpai' Alata'ala .
40010015	Penonoi : hi Eo Kiama , meliu pehuku' Alata'ala mpohuku' tauna toera ngkai pehuku'-na hi pue' ngata Sodom pai' Gomora owi .
40010016	" Pelompehi , apa' kuhubui-koi hilou hi olo' tauna to dada'a . Koi' mpai' hewa bima hi olo' serigala . Kana mo'akala-koi hewa asi , aga mo'alusu' nono-ni hante uma ria patuju-ni to dada'a .
40010017	Pelompehi mpu'u-koie' , apa' rahoko'-koi mpai' pai' rapakilu hi topohura agama . Raweba'-koi hi rala tomi posampayaa .
40010018	Rakeni-koi hilou hi topoparenta pai' hi magau' sabana petuku'-ni hi Aku' . Hinto'u toe-mi mpai' ria loga-ni mololita hi topoparenta pai' hi tau ntani'-na to bela-ra to Yahudi , mpololita pepangala'-ni hi Aku' .
40010019	" Ane rakeni-koi hilou hi topohura , neo'-koi me'eka' ba napa-mi mpai' to ni'uli'-raka ba beiwa petompoi'-ni . Apa' nto'u toe mpai' , Alata'ala moto mpo'uli'-kokoi napa to masipato' ni'uli' .
40010020	Jadi' , napa to ni'uli' nto'u toe , bela ngkai pekiri-ni moto . Lolita-ni tetu mpai' mehuwu ngkai Inoha' Tomoroli' to nawai'-kokoi Tuama-ni to hi rala suruga . Hi'a-mi mpai' to mponotohi-koi napa to ni'uli' nto'u-ni mololita .
40010021	" Rata mpai' tempo-na , hawe'ea tauna mpokahuku'-koi sabana petuku'-ni hi Aku' . Ria mpai' tauna to mpewai' ompi'-ra ba ana'-ra moto bona rapatehi sabana petuku'-ra hi Aku' . Ria wo'o ana' to mpo'ewa totu'a-ra pai' mpopatehi-ra . Aga tauna to tida mepangala' hi Aku' duu' hi ka'omea-na , bate mporata-ra kalompea' hi eo mpeno .
40010022	
40010023	Ane rabalinai'-koi hi ngata to hameha' , malai-koi hilou hi kahangata-na . Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : kako'ia-na hudu bago-ni mpokeni Kareba Lompe' hi hawe'ea ngata to Israel , Aku' Ana' Manusia' rata nculii' .
40010024	" Ana' sikola uma meliu karabila'-na ngkai guru-na . Hadua batua uma meliu ngkai maradika-na .
40010025	Biasa-na ana' sikola mpotuku' kehi guru-na , pai' batua mpotuku' kehi maradika-na . Jadi' , pelompehi , apa' Aku' Pue'-ni , pai' koi' topetuku'-ku . Ane Aku' rahanga' Beelzebul , magau' hawe'ea seta , peliu-nami koi' to mpotuku'-a . Bate raruge' wo'o-koi mpai' .
40010026	" Aga nau' wae , neo' nipoka'eka' tauna to mpo'ewa-koi . Apa' hawe'ea kehi-ra to tewunii' bate kahiloa mpai' . Hawe'ea to hi rala nono-ra bate telohu mpai' .
40010027	" Napa to ku'uli'-kokoi to uma ra'epei tau ntani'-na , kana nilolita hi hawe'ea tauna . Napa to kuwara'-wadi-kokoi hi tilinga-ni , uli' pakalonto' hi tilinga ntodea .
40010028	Neo'-koi mpoka'eka' manusia' to doko' mpopatehi-koi , apa' uma ria kuasa-ra mpohuku'-koi hi rala naraka . To nipoka'eka'-le , Alata'ala , apa' mokuasa-i mpatehi-koi , pai' mokuasa wo'o-i mpohuku'-koi hi rala naraka .
40010029	" Roma'a rone biasa-na rapobalu' nte hampepa' doi see-wadi . Aga nau' wae , uma ria hama'aa to mate ane uma konoa Alata'ala Tuama-ni .
40010030	Hiaa' meliu pompewili'-na Alata'ala hi koi' . Na'inca lia-koi , bangku' kawori' wuluwoo'-ni nabila' pai' na'inca omea .
40010031	Jadi' , neo'-koi me'eka' . Meliu-pi pompewili'-na Alata'ala hi koi' ngkai pompewili'-na rone to wori' .
40010032	" Hema-hema to mpangaku' hi doo kahi'a-na topetuku'-ku , hi'a wo'o mpai' kupangaku' hi Tuama-ku to hi rala suruga , ku'uli' : ` Tau toei topetuku'-ku . '
40010033	Aga hema to mpo'uli' hi doo kabela-nai topetuku'-ku , hi'a wo'o mpai' kusapu hi Tuama-ku to hi rala suruga , ku'uli' : ` Tau toei , bela-i topetuku'-ku . '
40010034	" Neo' ba ni'uli' wae , katumai-ku toi mpopohintuwu' tauna . Uma-e' ! Katumai-ku toi , tumai mpoposisala tauna .
40010035	Apa' katumai-ku toi , tauna hantomi mome'ewa lau , hantongo' mpotuku'-a , hantongo' uma . Ana' tomane mposisala-ki tuama-na , ana' tobine mposisala-ki tina-na , minia mposisala-ki piniana-na .
40010036	
40010037	" Tauna to mpoka'ahi' tina-na ba tuama-na meliu ngkai ahi'-na hi Aku' , uma-i masipato' jadi' topetuku'-ku . Tauna to mpoka'ahi' ana'-na meliu ngkai ahi'-na hi Aku' , uma-i masipato' jadi' topetuku'-ku .
40010038	Tauna to jadi' topetuku'-ku ma'ala rarapai'-ki tauna to mpopaha'a kaju parika'-na pai' mpotuku' laa'-ku , apa' bate mporata kaparia-i mpai' , ba paiana rapatehi mpu'u-i sabana petuku'-na hi Aku' . Jadi' , hema to uma sadia mporata kaparia hewa toe , uma-i masipato' jadi' topetuku'-ku .
40010039	Hema to mpobahaka konoa-na moto pai' mpotuku'-a nau' rapatehi-i mpai' , hi'a-mi to mporata katuwua' to lompe' . Aga hema to mpentaei konoa-na moto , uma-i mpai' mporata katuwua' to lompe' .
40010040	" Hema to mpotarima-koi , hibali mpotarima Aku'-ramo . Hema to mpotarima-a , hibali mpotarima Alata'ala wo'o-ramo , apa' Hi'a-mi to mposuro-a .
40010041	Hema to mpotarima hadua suro Alata'ala apa' suro Alata'ala mpu'u-i , hi'a mpai' mporata hiwili-na hewa to rahiwili-ki tauna to nasuro Alata'ala . Hema to mpotarima hadua tauna to monoa' apa' monoa' mpu'u-i , hi'a mpai' mporata hiwili-na hewa to rahiwili-ki tauna to monoa' .
40010042	Hema to mpotulungi hadua topetuku'-ku apa' topetuku'-ku mpu'u-i , bate mporata-ra hiwili-na hi eo mpeno . Nau' ue mara-wadi nawai'-ki hadua topetuku'-ku to kedi' tuwu'-na , bate mporata-i mpai' hiwili-na . "
40011001	Kahudu-na Yesus mpotudui' ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua , hilou-imi metudui' pai' mpopalele Kareba Lompe' hi rala ngata-ngata to mohu' .
40011002	Nto'u toe , Yohanes Topeniu' bula-na ratarungku' . Na'epe Yohanes napa to napobago Kristus . Toe pai' nahubui ba hangkuja dua topetuku'-na hilou hi Yesus mpekune'-i hewa toi :
40011003	" Ba Iko mpu'u-midi Magau' Topetolo' to najanci Alata'ala-e , ba ria-pidi to ntani'-na to kipopea ? " Hilou mpu'u-ramo mpoparata pompekunea' Yohanes toe hi Yesus .
40011004	Kana'epe-na Yesus pompekunea' toe , na'uli'-raka suro toera : " Nculii'-mokoi , uli'-ki retu hawe'ea napa to ni'epe pai' to nihilo :
40011005	To wero pehilo-mi , to kejo momako' monoa'-mi , topohaki' poko' mo'uri' , to wongo pe'epe , tomate kupotuwu' nculii' , pai' Kareba Lompe' kuparata-mi hi tauna to mpe'ahii' tuwu'-ra .
40011006	Marasi'-ra tauna to uma morara' nono-ra hi Aku' . "
40011007	Kanculii'-ra suro Yohanes Topeniu' toera , mololita-imi Yesus hi ntodea , mpotompo'wiwi Yohanes . Na'uli' : " Napa patuju-ni hilou mpohirua'-ki Yohanes hi tana' to wao' ? Ba doko'-koi mpohilo tauna to morara' nono-na , to hewa pimpi to nawui ngolu' molue hilou tumai ? Uma-hawo , apa' uma hewa toe kehi-na Yohanes .
40011008	Jadi' , hilou doko' mpohilo napa-dikoie ? Ba doko' mpohilo tauna to ncola pohea-na ? Uma wo'o-hawo , apa' tauna to ncola pohea-ra , hi tomi magau'-ra-wadi-hana .
40011009	Jadi' , hilou doko' mpohilo napa-dikoie ? Ba doko' mpohilo nabi-dikoi ? Ane tetu , makono lia . Apa' Yohanes tetui meliu ngkai nabi to ntani'-na .
40011010	Apa' hi'a tetu-mi to mporodo nono-ra ntodea mpotarima-a , hewa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' owi . Na'uli' Alata'ala : ` Hi'a toi-mi suro-ku , kuhubui-i meri'ulu ngkai Iko , bona mporodo ohea-nu . ' "
40011011	Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus : " Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : ngkai hawe'ea tauna to putu hi dunia' toi , uma ria haduaa to meliu kabohe tuwu'-na ngkai Yohanes Topeniu' . Aga ngkai wae lau , marasi' mpu'u-ra tauna to jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua'-na . Nau' to kedi' lia tuwu'-ra , meliu kamarasi'-ra ngkai Yohanes .
40011012	Ngkai lomo' pobago-na Yohanes Topeniu' rata hi tempo toi , tauna to dada'a mpohuduwukui mpo'ewa topetuku' Alata'ala doko' mpokuasai-ra .
40011013	Ngkai nabi-nabi owi duu' hi Yohanes tempo toi , hawe'ea nabi pai' Atura Musa mpolowa napa to kana jadi' .
40011014	Ria nabi owi to mpolowa karata-na nculii' nabi Elia . Jadi' , ane dota nipangala' , Yohanes toe-mile nabi Elia to ralowa owi-e .
40011015	Hema to tilingaa , pe'epei lompe' !
40011016	" Uma mowo tauna to tuwu' tempo toi ! Toi-mi lolita rapa'-ku to kurapai'-raka . Hira' hewa ana' to mohura hi wiwi' karajaa to mpobawai ema'-ra ,
40011017	ra'uli' : ` Kibawai-koi molalowe , uma-koi dota goe' dohe-kai . Kibawai-koi motantangi' , uma wo'o-koi dota geo' dohe-kai . '
40011018	Batua-na : Yohanes Topeniu' uma rapokonoi , Aku' wo'o uma rapokonoi . Katumai-na Yohanes , mopuasa'-i pai' uma-i nginu to melanguhi . Rapoka'oja'-i , ra'uli' : ` Kahawia'-i-hanale ! '
40011019	Hiaa' katumai-ku Aku' Ana' Manusia' , nginu-a pai' ngkoni'-a . Rapoka'oja' wo'o-a-wadi , ra'uli' : ` Hilo-i ! Tojampa , topalangu-langu , bale-ra topesingara' paja' pai' doo-ra topojeko' ! ' Aga nau' wae , ta'inca kamonoto-na patuju Alata'ala ane tanaa gau' topetuku'-na . "
40011020	Ngkai ree , Yesus mpokamaro to Yahudi to mo'oha' hi ngata-ngata hi tana' Galilea , apa' nau' jau moto-mi nababehi anu mekoncehi hi ngata-ra , uma oa'-ra medea ngkai kehi-ra to dada'a .
40011021	Na'uli' Yesus : " Silaka-koi to Korazim pai' to Betsaida ! Wori' moto-mi tanda mekoncehi kubabehi hi ngata-ni , aga uma oa'-koi medea ngkai jeko'-ni . Ane rapa'-na tanda mekoncehi toe rababehi hi rala ngata Tirus pai' Sidon , ke mahae-ramo-rana medea ngkai jeko'-ra , nau' bela-ra to Yahudi . Ke mpo'ala' karu'-ramo rapohea , pai' mpohawui' woto-ra hante awu , tanda kasoho' nono-ra .
40011022	Jadi' , bona ni'inca : hi Eo Kiama mpai' , meliu-pi pehuku'-na Alata'ala hi koi' ngkai pehuku'-na hi to Tirus pai' to Sidon .
40011023	" Pai' koi' wo'o to Kapernaum ! Ha ni'uli'-koina wae , na'ongko' napomolangko-koi mpai' Alata'ala-e ? Uma-e' ! Natadi pai' nahuku' lau-dakoi mpai' . Ane rapa'-na tanda mekoncehi to kubabehi hi ngata-ni tetu rababehi owi hi ngata Sodom , ke uma-hawo nakero Alata'ala , ke ria-pidi ngata toe duu' hewa toe-e lau .
40011024	Jadi' , bona ni'inca : hi Eo Kiama mpai' meliu-pi pehuku'-na Alata'ala hi koi' ngkai pehuku'-na hi to Sodom owi . "
40011025	Nto'u toe , Yesus mosampaya , na'uli' : " O Mama , Pue' langi' pai' dunia' ! Mpo'uli'-a tarima kasi , apa' hawe'ea toe lau nupopohiloi-raka tauna to uma pe'incai , tapi' nuwunii'-raka tauna to nginca pai' tauna to pante ,
40011026	apa' wae-mi konoa-nu Mama .
40011027	" Hawe'ea-na natonu-maka Tuama-ku . Uma ria haduaa to mpo'incai-a , Aku' Ana' Alata'ala , muntu' Tuama-ku to mpo'inca-a . Wae wo'o uma ria to mpo'incai-i Tuama-ku , muntu' Aku' Ana'-na to mpo'inca-i , pai' hema-hema to kupopo'incai kahema-nai Tuama-ku .
40011028	" Mai-mokoi omea to lenge' , pai' to motomo kinolo-ni , Aku' moto mpobole kinolo-ni .
40011029	Kolo-mi kinolo to kupopokoloi-kokoi , pai' mpopetudui'-koi hi Aku' , nirata moto mpai' kalompea' tuwu' kao'-ni . Apa' mo'olu-a pai' dingki' nono-ku .
40011030	Hawa'-ku uma mokoro , pai' kinolo to kupopokoloi-kokoi monangko'-wadi . "
40012001	Hangkani , Yesus pai' ana'guru-na ntara rala bonea hi Eo Sabat , eo pepuea'-ra to Yahudi . Bula-ra mpotara bonea toe , ana'guru-na mpotepo' wua' gandum pai' raru'a apa' mo'oro'-ra .
40012002	Ria to Parisi to mpohilo-ra . To Parisi toera mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Hilo-dile ana'guru-nue ! Mpotiboki-ra atura agama-ta , mobago-ra hi eo pepuea' ! "
40012003	Natompoi' Yesus : " Ha uma ria nibasa napa to nababehi Daud hante ema'-na owi apa' mo'oro'-ra-rawoe ?
40012004	Mesua'-ramo hi rala tomi pepuea' , pai'-ra mpokoni' roti to rapopepue' hi Alata'ala . Ane ntuku' ada agama-ta , imam-wadi-hana to ma'ala mpokoni' roti toe . Aga nau' wae , gau'-na Daud toe uma-hawo naposala' .
40012005	Penonoi wo'o napa to te'uki' hi rala Atura Musa : imam-imam hi rala Tomi Alata'ala , mobago moto-ra hi eo pepuea' , hiaa' uma-hawo raposala' .
40012006	Jadi' , peliu-nami Aku' , apa' Aku' meliu ngkai Tomi Alata'ala .
40012007	Apa' Aku' Ana' Manusia' , ria kuasa-ku mpo'uli' napa to ma'ala rababehi hi eo pepuea' . " Hi rala Buku Tomoroli' , Alata'ala mpo'uli' hewa toi : ` Uma kuperapi' porewua to nipopepue' hi Aku' . To kuperapi'-le , bona ma'ahi'-koi hi doo . ' Jadi' , ane ke ni'inca-hawo batua-na lolita toe-e , ke uma-hawo nisalai'-ra to uma masala' . "
40012008	
40012009	Pe'ongko'-na Yesus ngkai ree , hilou-i hi hantomi tomi posampayaa to Yahudi .
40012010	Hi ree , ria hadua tauna to mate pale-na hamali . Ba hangkuja dua tauna mpali' kasalaa' Yesus , meka' ba mobago-i-hana hi eo pepuea' . Toe pai' mepekune'-ra hi Yesus , ra'uli' : " Guru , ha ma'ala moto-hawo mpaka'uri' topeda' hi eo pepuea'-e ? "
40012011	Natompoi' Yesus : " Rapa'-na ria bima-ta hama'a , pai' bima toe monawu' hi rala wulou'laa hi eo pepuea' , ha tapelele'-imi hi rala wulou'laa-e ! Ha uma tahore-i nau' hi eo pepuea'-e !
40012012	Hiaa' manusia' meliu tuwu'-na ngkai bima . Jadi' ane wae , ma'ala lia-ta mpotulungi tauna hi eo pepuea' . "
40012013	Oti toe Yesus mpo'uli'-ki tauna to mate pale-na toei : " Tanoa pale-nu ! " Kanatanoa-nami-hawo pale-na , ncaliu mo'uri'-mi , moroho nculii' hewa pale-na to hamali .
40012014	Ngkai ree , malai-ramo to Parisi ngkai tomi posampayaa , pai'-ra mpali' akala bona Yesus rapatehi .
40012015	Na'inca Yesus karia-na patuju-ra to Parisi to dada'a hi Hi'a . Toe pai' malai-imi ngkai ree , pai' wori' tauna to mpotuku'-i . Mpaka'uri'-i hawe'ea-ra to peda' .
40012016	Pai' na'uli'-raka : " Neo' nitolele hilau napa to kubabehi-kokoi toi . "
40012017	Jadi' , madupa'-mi Lolita Alata'ala to napohowa' nabi Yesaya owi . Hewa toi moni-na :
40012018	" Hi'a toi-mi Batua-ku to kupelihi , kupe'ahi'-i , pai' napakagoe' nono-ku . Inoha'-ku kuwai'-ki . Kamonoa' poparenta-ku naparata hi hawe'ea tauna .
40012019	Uma-i mehono' , uma-i mejeu' , uma napesukui mololita hi karajaa .
40012020	Tauna to lente pepangala'-ra , uma-ra na'oho' . Natulungi-ra to ncaruku' mepangala' . Mobago ncuu-i duu'-na poparenta-na Alata'ala to monoa' rata hi dunia' .
40012021	Hawe'ea manusia' mposarumaka-i . "
40012022	Oti toe , ria wo'o tauna to tumai hi Yesus mpokeni hadua tauna to kahawia' . Tauna toei , wero pai' uma-i howa' mololita . Yesus mpaka'uri'-i , alaa-na pehilo pai' howa'-imi mololita .
40012023	Konce-ramo tauna to mpohilo toe , alaa-na momepekune'-ramo , ra'uli' : " Meka' Hi'a toi-mi Magau' Topetolo' muli Magau' Daud to rajanci owi-e ! "
40012024	Kara'epe-na to Parisi lolita toe , ra'uli' : " Ah , kuasa-na tetu-le ngkai Beelzebul , magau' hawe'ea seta . Toe-hawo pai' ria baraka'-na mpopalai seta-e . "
40012025	Ntaa' na'inca-di Yesus napa to hi rala nono-rae . Toe pai' na'uli'-raka : " Ane rapa'-na ria hadua magau' , pai' ntodea hi rala kamagaua'-na ntora mome'ewa , bate mogero mpai' kamagaua'-na toe-e . Ane tau hangata ba tau hantina ntora motuda' , uma mpai' hintuwu' ngata ba posantinaa toe .
40012026	Wae wo'o hi kamagaua' seta . Ane magau' seta mpopalai hingka seta-na , batua-na seta mpo'ewa hingka seta-na , alaa-na mogero mpai' kamagaua'-na seta toe .
40012027	Ni'uli' Aku' mpopalai seta hante kuasa ngkai Beelzebul . Aga ria wo'o doo-ni moto to mpopalai seta . Hante kuasa napa doo-ni tetu mpopalai seta ? Tantu hante kuasa Alata'ala . Jadi' , ngkai pobabehi doo-ni moto , monoto-mi kamasala' pebalihi-ni tetu .
40012028	Aku' mpopalai seta hante baraka' ngkai Inoha' Alata'ala . Jadi' , ngkai toe monoa'-mi ni'inca karata-nami tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi laintongo'-ni .
40012029	" Seta ma'ala rarapai'-ki tauna to parimuku . Ane mesua'-ta hi rala tomi tauna to parimuku doko' mpo'ala' ihi' tomi-na , kana tahoo' ncala'-i , pai' lako' ma'ala tapatau' rewa-na . Wae wo'o , ane Aku' mpopalai seta , batua-na , meliu kuasa-ku ngkai seta .
40012030	" Hema to uma tono' hi Aku' , kakono-na bali'-ku-imi . Hema to uma mpotulungi-a mobago , hi'a to mpobalinai' pobago-ku .
40012031	Jadi' , bona ni'inca : hawe'ea jeko' pai' lolita pesapuaka manusia' ma'ala ra'ampungi . Ane ria tauna to mposapuaka-a ka' Aku'-na Ana' Manusia' , ma'ala-pidi te'ampungi sala'-na toe . Aga ane mposapuaka-i Inoha' Tomoroli' , uma ria ampungia-na , lompe' tempo toi , lompe' hi eo mpeno-na . "
40012032	
40012033	Na'uli' tena Yesus mpo'uli'-raka to Parisi : " Ane kaju to lompe'-i , lompe' wo'o-hawo wua'-na . Ane kaju to uma lompe'-i , uma wo'o-hawo lompe' wua'-na . Kalompe'-na kaju ba ka'uma-na , incana hi wua'-na .
40012034	Dada'a lia-koi ! Uma ami'-koi ma'ala mpohowa' lolita to lompe'-e , bo dada'a-dakoie . Apa' napa ihi' nono-ta , toe wo'o to howa' hi wiwi-ta .
40012035	Tauna to lompe'-hana , bate mpohowa' lolita to lompe'-ra , apa' ntora mpoinono-ra to lompe' . Wae wo'o tauna to dada'a , dada'a wo'o lolita-ra , apa' ntora mpoinono to dada'a-ra .
40012036	Jadi' , bona ni'inca : hi Eo Kiama mpai' , butu dua tauna kana mpotangku butu mela lolita-na . Nau' lolita to uma motuju , kana natangku .
40012037	Apa' ngkai lolita-ta moto-hawo mpai' , rabotuhi kamasala'-ta ba kamonoa'-ta . "
40012038	Oti toe , ba hangkuja dua guru agama pai' to Parisi mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Guru , doko'-ka-kaina mpohilo-ko mpobabehi tanda to mekoncehi , bona monoa' ki'inca kangkai Alata'ala-na mpu'u-ko . "
40012039	Na'uli' Yesus : " Uma mowo kada'a-ni koi' tetu lau ! Meleli' oa'-ko-koina ngkai Alata'ala ! Merapi'-koi bona kupopohiloi-koi tanda to mekoncehi . Aga uma hanyalaa tanda mekoncehi to rapopohiloi-kokoi . Sampale to rapopohiloi-kokoi , tanda hewa to jadi' hi nabi Yunus owi .
40012040	Hewa nabi Yunus tolu eo tolu mengi hi rala ta'i uru bohe , wae wo'o mpai' Aku' Ana' Manusia' hi rala daeo' tolu eo tolu mengi .
40012041	Hi Eo Kiama mpai' , pue' ngata Niniwe rapotuwu' nculii' hangkaa-ngkania hante koi' to tuwu' tempo toi , pai'-ra mpotudo' sala'-ni . Apa' hira' , medea-ramo-rana ngkai jeko'-ra kampo'epe-ra pololita nabi Yunus . Hiaa' ria-mi hi laintongo'-ni to meliu kabohe tuwu'-na ngkai nabi Yunus , aga uma oa' nipangala' lolita-na .
40012042	Wae wo'o hi Eo Kiama , raja bine ngkai Selatan rapotuwu' nculii' hangkaa-ngkania hante koi' to tuwu' tempo toi , pai' natudo' sala'-ni . Apa' momako'-i tumai ngkai ngata-na to molaa lia , apa' doko' mpu'u-i mpo'epe lolita Magau' Salomo to pante lia . Hiaa' ria-mi hi laintongo'-ni to meliu kabohe tuwu'-na ngkai Salomo , aga uma oa' nipangala' lolita-na .
40012043	" Tauna to dada'a to tuwu' tempo toi ma'ala rarapai'-ki hadua tauna to napesuai' anudaa' . Malai-imi anudaa' ngkai tau toei , pai'-i modao'-dao' hi kawaoa'-na mpali' po'ohaa'-na . Apa' uma ria naruai' , na'uli'-mi : ` Agina nculii' lau-ama hi po'ohaa' to kupalahii toe wengi ria . '
40012044	Ponculi'-nami hilou hi tauna to napalahii-e wengi , nahilo-hawo uma ria to mpo'ohai'-i . Tauna toei hewa tomi to boa-wadi , molela' tepehaii , hinapa' hiloa-na .
40012045	Toe pai' hilou ncala'-i mpokio' pitu hingka anudaa'-na to meliu kadada'a-ra ngkai hi'a . Tumai-ramo mesua' hi tauna to napalahii toe-e wengi , pai' mo'oha'-ramo hi ree . Ka'omea-na tampai kampe'ahii' tauna toei ngkai lomo'-na . Wae wo'o mpai' to majadi' hi tauna to dada'a tempo toi : meliu lau-mi mpai' kasilaka-ra , apa' oja'-ra mpotarima-a . "
40012046	Bula-na Yesus mololita-pidi mpololitai tauna to wori' , rata-mi tina-na hante ompi'-ompi'-na . Mokore-ra hi mali tomi doko' mpololitai-i .
40012047	Hadua tauna mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Guru , oe-ra ria tina-nu pai' ompi'-nu hi mali-na , doko' mpohirua'-koko . "
40012048	Ngkai ree , Yesus mpotudo' ana'guru-na pai' na'uli' : " Ane tina-ku pai' ompi'-kule , hira' toe-ramo lau .
40012049	
40012050	Apa' hema-hema to mpobabehi konoa Tuama-ku to hi rala suruga , hira'-mi ompi'-ku pai' hira'-mi tina-ku . "
40013001	Hi eo toe wo'o , malai-imi Yesus ngkai tomi toe hilou hi wiwi' rano , pai'-i mohura .
40013002	Wori' lia tauna morumpu mpotololiki-i , toe pai' hilou-imi mpohawi' sakaya , mohura hi rala-na , pai' tauna to wori' mokore hi talinti .
40013003	Wori' nyala lolita rapa' natudui'-raka , na'uli' : " Ria hadua topohawu' hilou mohawu' .
40013004	Rala mpohawu'-na toe , ria hawua'-na to monawu' hi mata ohea . Rata danci mpotilo' hawua' toe duu'-na oti .
40013005	Ria wo'o to monawu' hi tana' to watua , hangkedi'-wadi tana'-na . Hinawu'-na toe sohi' lia tuwu' , apa' moreni' tana'-na .
40013006	Kamorani'-na eo , molaju-imi duu'-na bangi , apa' uma monala rali'-na .
40013007	Ria wo'o to monawu' hi laintongo' rui . Tuwu' rui mpo'upi' hinawu' toe , alaa-na mate .
40013008	Ria wo'o hawua' to monawu' hi tana' to morudu' . Mowua' hawua' toe , ria to ha'atu ngkani ngkai hinawu'-na , ria to ono mpulu' , ria to tolu mpulu' .
40013009	Hema-koi to tilingaa , pe'epei lompe' ! "
40013010	Tumai-ramo ana'guru-na mpomohui'-i , pai'-ra mepekune' , ra'uli' : " Guru , napa pai' mpake' lolita rapa'-ko ane mpotudui' ntodea-e ? "
40013011	Na'uli' Yesus : " Owi , Alata'ala ko'ia mpopo'incai manusia' beiwa-i mpai' jadi' Magau' hi dunia' . Aga hewa toe lau , napopo'incai-mokoi tudui' toe . Tapi' ane ntodea-hana , uma napiliu-ra omea mpo'inca tudui' toe . Toe pai' kuwalatu-raka hante lolita rapa' .
40013012	Tauna to mpotarima Lolita Alata'ala , ranotohi nono-ra bona kawoo-woria' Lolita Alata'ala to ra'inca . Aga tauna to uma dota mpotarima Lolita Alata'ala , nau' ria hangkedi' to ra'inca , ra'alai' lau-ra .
40013013	Toe pai' mololita hante lolita rapa'-ae ane mpololitai-a ntodea , apa' tilingaa moto-ra aga uma ra'incai batua-na to ra'epe . Mataa moto-ra aga uma ra'incai batua-na to rahilo .
40013014	Ngkai toe , madupa'-mi Lolita Alata'ala to napohowa' nabi Yesaya owi . Hewa toi moni-na : ` Pe'epe moto-ra , aga uma oa' ra'incai batua-na . Pehilo moto-ra , aga hewa to uma oa' rahiloi mpu'u .
40013015	Apa' moko'o nono-ra , mengkawongo-ra pai' mengkawero-ra : oja'-ra pehilo hante mata-ra , oja'-ra pe'epe hante tilinga-ra , oja'-ra ranotohi nono-ra . Toe pai' uma-ra mpai' nculii' hi Aku' , pai' uma-ra kuwai' kalompea' . ' "
40013016	Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus mpo'uli'-raka ana'guru-na : " Aga koi' , uma mowo kamarasi'-ni , apa' nihilo-mi-koina napa to kubabehi , pai' ni'epe-mi-koina tudui'-ku .
40013017	Mpu'u-mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : wori' nabi pai' tauna to monoa' owi to doko' mpohilo napa to nihilo koi' toi , aga uma-rana rahiloi . Doko' lia-ra mpo'epe napa to ni'epe-mi koi' , aga uma-rana ra'epei .
40013018	" Pe'epei , ku'uli'-kokoi napa batua-na lolita rapa' topohawu' toe we'i .
40013019	Hawua' to monawu' hi mata ohea mpobatuai tauna to mpo'epe moto kareba to mpo'uli' beiwa Alata'ala jadi' Magau' , aga uma rapoinono . Rata anudaa' mpohagoi-ra lolita toe ngkai rala nono-ra .
40013020	" Hawua' to monawu' hi tana' to watua-hawo mpobatuai tauna to mpo'epe Kareba Lompe' , ncaliu goe' nono-ra mpo'epe .
40013021	Aga uma moroho pepangala'-ra , toe pai' uma-ra ntaha mahae . Ane rabalinai'-ra ba rapakasusa' sabana pepangala'-ra hi Kareba Lompe' toe , kamo'ungkere'-rami .
40013022	" Hawua' to monawu' hi olo' rui-hawo mpobatuai tauna to mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala , aga sese'-ra ntora mpenonoi katuwu'-ra hi rala dunia'-wadi , pai' doko'-ra mporumpu rewa dunia'-wadi . Hawe'ea toe mposesei'-ra , alaa-na uma ria po'ohaa' Lolita Alata'ala hi rala nono-ra , pai' uma ria kalaua-na Lolita toe hi katuwu'-ra .
40013023	" Hawua' to monawu' hi tana' to morudu'-hawo mpobatuai tauna to mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala pai' rapoinono mpu'u . Hi tauna toe-ramo Lolita Alata'ala mowua' mpu'u . Ria to mowua' hangkedi' , ria to mowua' wori' , ria to mowua' wori' lia . "
40013024	Yesus mpololita hanyala-pi lolita rapa' hi ntodea , na'uli' : " Ane Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia' , kajadi'-na hewa jarita toi : Hadua topobonea hilou mpohawu' hinawu' to lompe' hi bonea-na .
40013025	Rala-na hamengi bula tauna leta' , rata bali'-na topobonea toei , mpohawui' bonea toe hante wua' kowo' to neo' hibalia pae poraui-na , pai'-i malai .
40013026	Tuwu' mpu'u-mi pae toe duu'-na huwu , incana wo'o-mi-hawo kowo' hi olo' pae .
40013027	Rata-ramo to ngkoni' gaji' mpo'uli'-ki topobonea toei : ` Tuama , hawua' to lompe' moto-di to tahawu'-e . Ngkaiapa-di kowo' toe-e ria ? '
40013028	" Na'uli' pue' bonea toei : ` Tetu-le pobago bali'-ta . ' " Ngkai ree , ra'uli' wo'o-mi to ngkoni' gaji' toera : ` Ane nupokono , hilou kiwuka kowo' toe ria ! '
40013029	" Na'uli' pue' bonea : ` Neo' , apa' ane niwuka kowo'-na , nipoiwukai mpai' pae-na .
40013030	Pelele' moto-mi kowo' tuwu' hangkaa-ngkania hante pae , duu'-na tempo mepae . Kuhubui-ra-damo topepae mpowuka ulu kowo' , rarumpu , ratomo' pai' rasuwe . Oti toe , pai' lako' rapalimpuru-di pae-e , pai' ratimamahi hi rala wilulu-ku . ' "
40013031	Oti toe Yesus mpo'uli' tena hanyala-pi lolita rapa' hi ntodea , na'uli' : " Ane Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia' , kajadi'-na hewa jarita toi : Ria hadua tauna ngala' unto' hawi , lou nahawu' hi pampa-na .
40013032	Unto' toe monete' lia , meliu kakedi'-na ngkai unto' to ntani'-na . Aga ane tuwu'-i-damo , meliu-mi kabohe-na ngkai ngkojo to ntani'-na . Tuwu'-i hewa hangkaju kaju , alaa-na rata danci mpobabehi peta-ra hi ra'a-na . "
40013033	Ria-pi hanyala lolita rapa' to na'uli' hi ntodea . Na'uli' : " Ane Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia' , kajadi'-na hewa toi : Hadua tobine mpo'ala' ragi hangkedi' , nagalo hante lunu to wori' . Mahae-hae , woke'-mi omea . "
40013034	Yesus mpotudui' ntodea hawe'ea toe we'i lau mpake' lolita rapa' . Uma ria to natudui'-raka ane uma hante lolita rapa' .
40013035	Ngkai toe , madupa'-mi lolita to na'uki' nabi owi-e : Kutudui'-ra hante lolita rapa' . Kuparata-raka tudui' to tewunii' ngkai lomo' kajadi' dunia' . "
40013036	Oti toe , Yesus mpalahii tauna to wori' toera , pai'-i mesua' hi rala tomi . Tumai-ramo ana'guru-na mpomohui'-i , ra'uli' : " Guru , uli'-kakai pe' batua lolita rapa' kowo' to hi olo' pae-e . "
40013037	Na'uli' Yesus : " Pue' bonea to mpohawu' hawua' to lompe'-le , mpobatuai Aku'-mi , Ana' Manusia' .
40013038	Bonea , mpobatuai dunia' toi . Hawua' to lompe' , mpobatuai tauna to jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua'-na . Kowo' mpobatuai tauna to mpotuku' Magau' Anudaa' .
40013039	Bali' to mpohawu' kowo' , hi'a-mi Magau' Anudaa' . Tempo mepae , mpobatuai Eo Kiama . Pai' tauna topepae , mpobatuai mala'eka .
40013040	Hewa kowo' rarumpu pai' rasuwe , wae wo'o mpai' tauna to dada'a nto'u Eo Kiama .
40013041	Aku' Ana' Manusia' mpohubui mala'eka-ku hilou mporumpu hawe'ea to dada'a pai' hawe'ea to mepahala'nawu' ngkai laintongo' ntodea-ku .
40013042	Hawe'ea tauna toera ratadi hi rala apu to wewo' . Hi ria-ra mpai' ntora geo' pai' ntodohaka .
40013043	Tapi' tauna to monoa' po'ingku-ra , uma mpai' mowo kabohe tuwu'-ra nto'u toe . Mehini-ra hewa eo hi rala Kamagaua' Alata'ala Tuama-ra . Hema to tilingaa , pe'epei lompe' ! "
40013044	Na'uli' Yesus : " Ane kita' jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua'-na , toe meliu kalompe'-na ngkai hawe'ea to ntani'-na . Kajadi'-na hewa lolita rapa' toi : Hadua tauna mporua' bulawa to tetawu hi rala tana' , masuli' lia oli-na , kaliliu natawuhi nculii' . Ngkai kagoe' nono-na , kahilou-nami hi tomi-na mpobalu' hawe'ea rewa-na , na'oli-ki tana' pomporuaa'-na bulawa toe .
40013045	" Wae wo'o , ane kita' jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua'-na , kajadi'-na hewa lolita rapa' toi : Ria hadua padaga to mpali' hanyala watu to rahanga' mutiara .
40013046	Wae kanarua'-na hameha' mutiara to masuli' lia oli-na , kahilou-nami mpobalu' hawe'ea rewa-na , pai' na'oli-ki mutiara toe .
40013047	" Ane Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia' , kajadi'-na hewa lolita rapa' toi : Hameha' jala' to bohe ratene' hi rala rano . Wori' nyala bau' mesua' hi rala-na .
40013048	Ka'ihia'-nami jala' , topebau' mpohore jala'-ra hilou hi role-na , pai' mohura-ramo mpopelihi bau' woko' jala'-ra . To lompe' rapuna' hi pontu'ua-ra , to uma lompe' rapetadi .
40013049	Wae-mi mpai' hi Eo Kiama-e : mala'eka-mala'eka hilou mpogaa' tauna to dada'a pai' tauna to monoa' .
40013050	Tauna to dada'a rapetadi hi rala apu naraka . Hi ria-ra mpai' ntora geo' pai' ntodohaka . "
40013051	Oti toe , Yesus mpekune'-ra ana'guru-na , na'uli' : " Ha nipaha wa lolita rapa'-ku toe-e we'i lau ? " Ratompoi' : " Kipaha moto . "
40013052	Ngkai ree , na'uli' wo'o-miraka : " Ane wae , oi wo'o-pi hanyala lolita rapa'-ku : Ane ria guru agama Yahudi to mpopetudui' tudui' to mpo'uli' kamoparenta-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau'-ta , guru agama toe ma'ala rarapai'-ki pue' tomi : ngkai pontimamahia rewa-na na'ue' pai' napopehuwu rewa to hae pai' rewa to bo'u wo'o . "
40013053	Kahudu-na Yesus mpololita hawe'ea lolita rapa' toe , malai-imi ngkai ree ,
40013054	hilou hi ngata-na moto . Hi ria-i metudui' hi rala tomi posampayaa . Konce-ramo tauna to mpo'epe lolita-na , ra'uli' : " Hema-di to mpotudui'-i pai'-i pante hewa toe-e ? Pai' ngkaiapa baraka'-na mpobabehi anu mekoncehi-e ?
40013055	Bo ana' topowangu tomi-i-wadi-hawo . Tina-na , Maria . Ompi'-na hira' Yakobus , Yusuf , Simon pai' Yudas .
40013056	Ompi'-na tobine , ria omea wo'o-ra dohe-ta hi rehe'i . Napa-di-hana pai' ria-ki baraka'-na mpobabehi hawe'ea toe-e lau ? "
40013057	Toe pai' oja'-ra mepangala' hi Yesus . Ngkai ree , Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Hadua nabi bate rabila' hiapa kahilouaa-na . Aga hi ngata-na pai' hi tomi-na moto , uma lau-i rabila' . "
40013058	Toe pai' Yesus uma mpobabehi wori' tanda mekoncehi hi ria , apa' uma-ra mepangala' .
40014001	Nto'u toe topoparenta hi Galilea , Herodes Antipas . Na'epe Herodes napa to nababehi Yesus .
40014002	Toe pai' na'uli'-raka topobago-na : " Bate Yohanes Topeniu'-le Yesus toei lou ! Tuwu' nculii'-imi ! Toe-hana pai' ria baraka'-na mpobabehi tanda to mekoncehi . "
40014003	Hewa toi tutura kamate-na Yohanes Topeniu' . Magau' Herodes mpo'ago Herodias , tobine ompi'-na moto to rahanga' Filipus . Wori' ngkani Yohanes mpokamaro Herodes ngkai gau'-na toe , na'uli'-ki : " Uma-ko ma'ala mpotobine tobine tetui ! Gau'-nu tetu mpotiboki Atura Musa ! " Ngkai ree , Herodes mpopahawa' tantara-na mpohoko' Yohanes . Rahoko' mpu'u-imi , rahoo' , pai'-i ratarungku' .
40014004	
40014005	Kakono-na , Herodes doko' mpopatehi lau-imi , aga me'eka'-i mpoka'eka' ntodea , apa' ra'uli' ntodea , Yohanes toe hadua nabi .
40014006	Ngkai ree , nto'u-na Herodes mpobabehi karamea mpokiwoi eo kaputua-na , ana'-na Herodias tobine modero' hi nyanyoa torata . Goe' lia-i Herodes mpohilo podero'-na .
40014007	Nakeni kagoe'-na rahi , mojanci pai' mosumpa-i hi toronaa toei , na'uli'-ki : " Napa-napa to nuperapi' , bate kuwai'-ko ! "
40014008	Mpo'epe toe , Herodias mpo'ukei' ana'-na bona mperapi' woo' Yohanes Topeniu' . Jadi' , na'uli' toronaa toei mpo'uli'-ki Herodes : " Merapi'-a woo'-na Yohanes Topeniu' ratu'u hi lolo dula toi ! "
40014009	Mpo'epe pomperapia' toe-di , kasoho'-nami nono-na Herodes . Aga nau' wae , apa' mpolia' mosumpa-imi we'i ra'epe torata-nae , toe pai' mohawa'-imi bona pomperapia' toronaa toei rapadupa' .
40014010	Nahubui-mi tantara-na hilou hi rala tarungku' mpopata' wuroko' Yohanes .
40014011	Woo' Yohanes toe rakeni hi lolo dula , ratonu-ki toronaa toei , pai' hi'a mpokeni hilou hi tina-na .
40014012	Kara'epe-na topetuku'-na Yohanes kamate-nami , hilou-ramo-rawo mpo'ala' woto-na pai' ratana . Oti toe pai'-ra hilou mpokeni tolele-na hi Yesus .
40014013	Kana'epe-na Yesus tolele kamate-na Yohanes toe , pehawi'-nami hi sakaya , pai'-i malai ngkai ree hilou hi kawaoa'-na . Patuju Yesus bona ntodea neo' mpotuku'-i . Ntaa' we'i , kara'epe-na ntodea kahilou-nami Yesus , pe'ongko'-ra wo'o-mi-rawo ngkai ngata-ra hilou mpotuku'-i , aga merole-ra-rana .
40014014	Pehompo-na Yesus ngkai sakaya , nahilo-hawo wori' tauna mpopea-i . Metumu'-mi ahi'-na mpohilo-ra , pai'-i mpaka'uri'-ra to peda' .
40014015	Ncimonou'-mi , tumai-ramo ana'guru-na mpomohui'-i , ra'uli'-ki : " Guru , neo' limpa-mi eo-na , pai' wao'-hana hi rehe'i lau . Agina tahubui-ramo ntodea toera lau hilou hi ngata to mohu' mpo'oli pongkoni'-ra . "
40014016	Na'uli' Yesus : " Uma-ra mingki' hilou . Koi'-mi-hawo to mpopokoni'-ra . "
40014017	Ratompoi' ana'guru-na : " Uma-kaiwo ria napa-napa hi kai' , wuwu lima meha' roti pai' bau' uru rongkaju-wadi . "
40014018	Na'uli' Yesus : " Keni tumai . "
40014019	Oti toe nahubui-ramo ntodea toera mohura hi kowo' . Kamohura-rami-rawo hi kowo' , pai' na'ala'-mi roti to lima meha' pai' uru to rongkaju-e we'i , pai'-i ngkongoa' hi langi' mosampaya . Oti toe napihe-pihe-mi roti toe , pai' natonu-raka ana'guru-na bona rabagi hi ntodea .
40014020	Ngkoni' omea-ramo duu'-ra bohu . Ka'oti-ra ngkoni' , rarumpu-mi toro-na , hampulu' roluncu-pi .
40014021	Kawori'-ra to ngkoni' nto'u toe , ba ria-ra lima ncobu tu ? paka' tomane-pidi , ko'ia tebila' tobine pai' ana'-ana' .
40014022	Oti toe , Yesus mpohubui ana'guru-na mosakaya meri'ulu hilou hi dipo rano , pai'-i mpohubui tauna to wori' toera nculii' hilou hi tomi-ra .
40014023	Kanculii'-ra tauna toera , manake'-imi Yesus hilou hi lolo bulu' , pai'-i mosampaya hadudua-na . Duu' bengi , hi ria oa'-i-pidi .
40014024	Hiaa' ana'guru-nae we'i , hi laintongo' rano-ramo , molaa-mi ngkai role-na . Bingko-bingko-na sakaya-ra nakeni balumpa , apa' ngolu' mewui tono' ngkai nyanyoa sakaya-ra .
40014025	Parabaja , Yesus momako' hi lolo ue mpototoaka-ra .
40014026	Pehilo-ra ana'guru-na ria to momako' hi lolo ue , wilingkoroa-ramo , pai' ra'uli' : " Etu tope'ekahi ! " Me'au-ramo nakeni eka'-ra .
40014027	Ncaliu na'uli'-raka Yesus : " Pakaroho nono-ni ! Neo' me'eka' ! Aku'-mile toi-e . "
40014028	Na'uli' Petrus : " Ane Iko mpu'u-mi tetu-e Pue' , kio' wo'o-a-kuwo tilou momako' hi lolo ue . "
40014029	Natompoi' Yesus : " Tumai-moko ! " Pehompo-nami Petrus ngkai rala sakaya , momako' hi lolo ue mpototopa Yesus .
40014030	Aga kanahilo-na bohe rahi ngolu' hi rano , me'eka'-imi , pai' katenoo-nonoa'-imi . Kamekio'-nami : " Tulungi-a-kuwo Pue' ! "
40014031	Kana'ulu-nami Yesus pale-na mpentoe Petrus , na'uli'-ki : " Kura' rahi-kona pepangala'-nu ! Napa pai' morara' nono-nu ! "
40014032	Kangkahe'-ra hi rala sakaya , ncaliu ora-mi ngolu'-na .
40014033	Ana'guru-na to hi rala sakaya toe mponyompa-i , ra'uli' : " Makono mpu'u , Ana' Alata'ala-ko ! "
40014034	Karata-ra hi dipo rano , mencore-ramo hi tana' to rahanga' Genesaret .
40014035	Kara'inca-na pue' ngata ria Yesus hi ngata-ra , ratolele-mi hilou hi ngata-ngata to mohu' , alaa-na hawe'ea to peda' rakeni-ki Yesus .
40014036	Merapi'-ra hi Yesus , bona napiliu-ra mporeo nau' kampa' wuntu baju-na-wadi . Hawe'ea to mporeo baju-na , haliu mo'uri'-ramo .
40015001	Hangkani , ria-ra to Parisi hante guru agama Yahudi ngkai Yerusalem mpohirua'-ki Yesus . Rakamaro-i , ra'uli' :
