40015002	" Napa-di pai' ana'guru-nu mpotiboki ada totu'a-tae ? Hangaa ngkoni'-ramo , uma-ra mowano ncala' ntuku' atura . "
40015003	Na'uli' Yesus : " Bangku' koi'-koiwoe' , napa pai' nitiboki parenta Alata'ala hi kampotuku'-ni ada-ni moto !
40015004	Alata'ala mpo'uli' : ` Kana tabila' tuama pai' tina-ta . ' Pai' na'uli' wo'o : ` Hema to mpotipo' tuama ba tina-na kana rapatehi . '
40015005	Hiaa' koi' metudui' hewa toi : uma-pi mingki' tabila' tina pai' tuama-ta , asala ta'uli'-raka hewa toi : ` Napa to masipato' kuwai'-kokoi totu'a , mpolia' kutonu-mi hi Alata'ala . ' Jadi' , Lolita Alata'ala uma nisaile' . Ada-ni moto to nipomobohe .
40015006	
40015007	Hi mali-na-wadi petuku'-ni hi Alata'ala tetu-e ! Makono mpu'u lolita nabi Yesaya owi to mpolowa-koi , hewa toi moni-na :
40015008	Na'uli' Alata'ala : ` Tauna tohe'era mpobila'-a hi wiwi-ra-wadi , nono-ra molaa ngkai Aku' .
40015009	Uma ria kalaua-ra mpopue'-a , apa' tudui'-ra tudui' manusia'-wadi , bela tudui' ngkai Aku' . ' "
40015010	Oti toe , Yesus mpokio' tauna to wori' mpomohui'-i , na'uli'-raka : " Epe-koi bona ni'inca :
40015011	Pongkoni' to mesua' hi nganga-ta , bela-hawo toe to mpakada'a-ta hi poncilo Alata'ala . Lolita to mehupa' ngkai nganga-ta , toe-die to mpakada'a-ta hi poncilo Alata'ala-e . "
40015012	Ngkai ree , tumai-ramo ana'guru-na mpo'uli'-ki : " Nu'inca wa kapeda' nono-ra to Parisi mpo'epe lolita-nue we'i ? "
40015013	Na'uli' Yesus : " Pelele'-ramo to Parisi toera lou ! Apa' butu nyala hinu'a to uma nahu'a Tuama-ku to hi rala suruga , bate rawuka . To Parisi toe-rale hewa pangkeni to wero , apa' uma ra'incai ohea to makono hilou hi Alata'ala . Pai' ane towero mpotete' hingka towero-na , bate moluli' roduaa-ra mpai' hi rala kinali . "
40015014	
40015015	Na'uli' Petrus : " Guru , notohi-kakai lolita rapa' tetu-e we'i . "
40015016	Na'uli' Yesus : " Ha uma oa'-di nipaha-e !
40015017	Pongkoni' to mesua' hi rala nganga-tale kaliliu hi rala ta'i-ta , pai' ngkai ree kaliliu tatadi . Bela-hawo toe to mpakada'a-ta hi poncilo Alata'ala-e .
40015018	Aga lolita to dada'a to mehuwu ngkai rala nono-ta pai' to howa' hi wiwi-ta , toe-mi to mpakada'a tauna hi poncilo Alata'ala .
40015019	Apa' ngkai rala nono pehupaa' pekiri to dada'a , pai' alaa-na ria to mepatehi , mobualo' , mogau' sala' hi tobine ba tomane , manako , mosabi' boa' pai' metipo' .
40015020	Kehi to hewa toe-mi lau to mpakada'a tauna hi poncilo Alata'ala . Ane ngkoni' uma leba' mowano , bela-hawo toe to mpakada'a tauna hi poncilo Alata'ala . "
40015021	Ngkai ree hilou-imi Yesus hi tana' to mohu' ngata Tirus pai' Sidon .
40015022	Ria hadua tobine to Kanaan , bela-i to Yahudi . Tobine toei tumai hi Yesus ntora mekio' , na'uli' : " Pue' , muli Magau' Daud ! Poka'ahi'-a-kuwo ! Ana'-ku tobine kahawia' seta , hangaa uma-ipi katonoa toe-e ria . "
40015023	Uma-i winihi Yesus . Tumai ana'guru-na mpomohui'-i , ra'uli'-ki : " Guru , popalai-i tobine tetui , daa' kakakio'-kio'-i mpotuku'-ta . "
40015024	Na'uli' Yesus hi tobine toei : " Alata'ala mpohubui-a tumai mpotulungi muli to Israel-wadi , apa' hewa bima to puha-ramo , uma-rapa mpotuku' konoa Alata'ala . "
40015025	Ngkai ree , tumai lau-imi tobine toei motingkua' hi nyanyoa Yesus , mpo'uli'-ki : " Pue' , tulungi-a-kuwo ! "
40015026	Na'uli' Yesus : " Uma lompe' mpo'ala' koni' ana' pai' rarora-ki dike' . "
40015027	Na'uli' tobine toei : " Makono moto-di Pue' , aga biasa moto-hawo dike' ngkoni' rupu' koni' to mohewu' ngkai lolo meja' hi tomi pue'-na . "
40015028	Ngkai ree , Yesus mpo'uli'-ki : " Bohe mpu'u pepangala'-nu , totina ! Wae-pi , jadi'-mi hewa konoa-nu . " Hinto'u toe , mo'uri' mpu'u-imi ana'-na .
40015029	Oti toe , me'ongko' wo'o-imi Yesus ngkai ree , mako' mewiwi' rano Galilea . Manake'-i lou hi bulu'-na , pai'-i mohura metudui' .
40015030	Mo'iko tauna mpotoa'-i , ngkeni to pungku , to keru , to wero , to uma howa' mololita pai' to peda' ntani'-na wo'o . Ratu'u-ra hi nyanyoa Yesus , pai' napaka'uri'-ra .
40015031	Konce-ramo ntodea mpohilo hawe'ea tauna to napaka'uri' Yesus : tauna to uma howa' mololita , howa'-mi mololita , to keru mo'uri'-mi , to pungku momako'-mi , to wero pehilo-mi . Toe pai' mpobila'-ramo Alata'ala to rapue' to Israel .
40015032	Oti toe Yesus mpokio' ana'guru-na , na'uli'-raka : " Tuna-kuna nono-ku mpohilo tauna to wori' toera lau . Tolu eo-ramo dohe-ku , uma ria pongkoni'-ra . Uma lau nono-ku mpohubui-ra nculii' ntali oro'-ra , molinga'-ra mpai' hi ohea . "
40015033	Ra'uli' ana'guru-na : " Beiwa-mile , apa' wao'-di hi rehe'i-e lau . Tarata hiapa-mile pongkoni' tapokoni'-raka tauna to hewa toe lau kawori'-rae ? "
40015034	Yesus mpekune'-ra : " Hangkuja roti to ria hi koi'-e ? " Ratompoi'-i : " Pitu meha' , pai' bau' uru to kedi' ba hangkuja ma'a-wadi . "
40015035	Ngkai ree nahubui-ramo tauna to wori' mohura hi tana' .
40015036	Na'ala'-mi roti to pitu pai' bau' kedi' to ba hangkuja ma'a toe , pai'-i mpo'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala . Oti toe napihe-pihe-mi pai' nawai'-raka ana'guru-na bona rabagi-raka tauna to wori' toera .
40015037	Ngkoni'-ramo omea duu'-ra bohu . Ka'oti-ra ngkoni' , ana'guru-na mporumpu toro-na , pitu luncu-pi .
40015038	Kawori'-ra to ngkoni' nto'u toe , opo' ncobu tomane , uma tebila' tobine pai' ana' .
40015039	Oti toe , nahubui-ramo nculii' hilou hi tomi-ra , pai'-i mpohawi' sakaya hilou hi tana' Magadan .
40016001	Ria wo'o ba hangkuja dua to Parisi pai' to Saduki rata hi Yesus doko' mposori-i . Merapi'-ra hi Yesus , ra'uli'-ki : " Babehi anu to mekoncehi bona monoto ki'inca kangkai Alata'ala-nu . "
40016002	Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Ane neo' limpa-mi eo pai' mperelei langi' , ni'uli' : ` Morawa mpai' raoa . '
40016003	Ane mepupulo ni'uli' : ` Udaa mpai' toi-e , bo mperelei pai' mojimuu'-di oo lau . ' Ni'inca lia mpelence raoa . Aga uma ni'incai mpelence napa to nababehi Alata'ala tempo toi .
40016004	Uma mowo kadada'a-ni , nisapuaka oa'-pidi Alata'ala ! Merapi'-koi tanda mekoncehi . Aga uma hanyalaa tanda mekoncehi to rapopohiloi-kokoi . Sampale-wadi to rapopohiloi-kokoi , tanda hewa to jadi' hi nabi Yunus owi . " Oti toe malai-imi mpalahii-ra .
40016005	Hilou-ramo Yesus hante ana'guru-na medipo rano , aga ana'guru-na uma mpokiwoi ngkeni boku . Ngkai ree , na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka :
40016006	" Pelompehi , mo'inga'-inga'-koi hi ragi to Parisi pai' to Saduki-e' ! "
40016007	Aga uma ra'incai batua-na walatu toe , helee momepololitai moto-ramo , ra'uli' : " Pai' na'uli' hewa toe-le , apa' uma takiwoi ngkeni roti we'i . "
40016008	Ntaa' na'inca-di Yesus napa to ra'uli' ana'guru-nae , toe pai' na'uli'-raka : " Napa pai' ntora mpololita ka'uma-ni ngkeni roti-e ! Kura' rahi pepangala'-ni !
40016009	Ko'ia oa'-tano nipaha-e ! Ha uma-pi nikiwoi roti to lima meha' to kupokoni'-raka tauna to lima ncobu-e ? Pai' hangkuja luncu-pi toro-na to nirumpu ?
40016010	Pai' beiwa wo'o hante roti to pitu meha' kupokoni'-raka tauna to opo' ncobu-e ? Hangkuja luncu wo'o-pi toro-na to nirumpu ?
40016011	Napa pai' uma oa' nipaha kabela-na roti mpu'u to ku'uli'-e ! Mo'inga'-inga'-koi hi ragi to Parisi pai' to Saduki . "
40016012	Lako' ra'inca-di we'i ana'guru-nae kabela-na ragi to ragalo-ki roti to na'uli' Yesus-e . Patuju lolita-na , bona mo'inga'-inga'-ra hi tudui' to Parisi pai' to Saduki .
40016013	Hilou-ramo Yesus hante ana'guru-na hi tana' to mohu' hi Kaisarea Filipi . Hi ree mepekune' Yesus hi ana'guru-na : " Ntuku' ponguli'-ra ntodea , hema-a Aku' Ana' Manusia' toi-e ? "
40016014	Ratompoi' ana'guru-na : " Ria-ra to mpo'uli' Yohanes Topeniu'-ko tuwu' nculii' . Ria wo'o-ra to mpo'uli' Iko hadua nabi to owi mehupa' nculii' , hewa nabi Elia , nabi Yeremia , ba nabi to ntani'-na . "
40016015	Napekune' tena-ra , na'uli' : " Hiaa' koi'-koiwo mpo'uli' hema-a Aku' toi-e ? "
40016016	Natompoi' Simon Petrus : " Iko-mile Magau' Topetolo'-e , Ana' Alata'ala to Tuwu' . "
40016017	Na'uli' Yesus : " Marasi' mpu'u-ko , Simon ana' Yunus , apa' bela manusia' to mpopo'incai-ko tetu-e , Tuama-ku to hi rala suruga-hana .
40016018	Jadi' , toe pai' rahanga' Petrus-ko -- batua-na ` watu . ' Pai' hi lolo parawatu tohe'i kuwangu tomi-ku -- batua-na , kurumpu hawe'ea tauna to mpopangala'-a . Hawe'ea kuasa anudaa' uma mpokulei' mpodagi-ra .
40016019	Kuwai'-ko kuasa mpototu'ai ntodea Alata'ala . Napa to nubotuhi hi dunia' , tetu wo'o to nabotuhi Alata'ala hi rala suruga : Ane nu'uli' neo' , Alata'ala-mi to mpo'uli' neo' . Ane nu'uli' ma'ala moto , Alata'ala-mi to mpo'uli' ma'ala moto . "
40016020	Oti toe , Yesus mpo'uli'-raka ana'guru-na : " Neo' ulu ni'uli' hi hema-hema ka' Aku'-na Magau' Topetolo' . "
40016021	Ntepu'u ngkai tempo toe , Yesus mpakanoto hi ana'guru-na napa to kana jadi' hi woto-na . Na'uli'-raka : " Kana hilou-a hi Yerusalem . Hi ria mpai' totu'a ngata , imam pangkeni hante guru-guru agama mpobalinai'-a pai' mposesa'-a . Rapatehi-a mpai' , aga hi eo katolu-na tuwu' nculii' moto-a . "
40016022	Aga Petrus mpo'ai'-i hi ncori-na pai' nakorai'-i na'uli' : " Neo' Pue' ! Kuperapi' hi Alata'ala bona nawi'iha tetu lau ngkai Pue' . "
40016023	Hampe'ili' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki Petrus : " Palai-ko topesori ! Doko' nulawa'-a , bona ngalai' neo'-a mpotuku' konoa Tuama-ku ? Pekiri-nu tetu-le pekiri manusia' , bela pekiri Alata'ala . "
40016024	Oti toe Yesus mpo'uli'-raka ana'guru-na : " Hema to doko' mpotuku'-a kana mpobahaka konoa-na moto , pai' kana napaha'a kaju parika'-na -- batua-na : kana natuku' hawa'-ku nau' napopate-ki . Oti toe-di pai' lako' ma'ala-i mpotuku'-a .
40016025	Hema to mpentaei konoa-na moto , uma-i mpai' mporatai katuwua' to lompe' . Aga hema to mpobahaka konoa-na moto sabana petuku'-na hi Aku' , nau' napopate-ki , hi'a mpai' to mporata katuwua' to lompe' .
40016026	Napa kalaua-na tarumpu hawe'ea ka'uaa' dunia' , ane uma taratai katuwua' to lompe' hi eo mpeno-na . Apa' uma ria napa-napa to ma'ala tasula'-ki katuwua' to lompe' toe .
40016027	Bate rata mpai' tempo-na , Aku' Ana' Manusia' tumai ngkai suruga mpopehuwu kabaraka'-ku , to hewa kabaraka' Tuama-ku , pai' wori' wo'o mala'eka mpodohei-a . Nto'u toe mpai' , bate kuhiwili kehi butu-butu dua tauna .
40016028	Mpu'u-mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : ngkai olo'-ni koi' toi , ria-koi mpai' to ko'ia mate kako'ia-na nihilo-a , Aku' Ana' Manusia' , rata jadi' Magau' . "
40017001	Ono mengi ngkai ree , Yesus mpobawai tolu ana'guru-na hilou dohe-na hi bulu' to molangko . Ana'guru to tolu toera : Petrus , Yakobus pai' Yohanes ompi'-na Yakobus . Muntu' Yesus hante ana'guru-na to tolu toera-wadi to hi ria .
40017002	Bula-ra hi ria , mobali'-mi lence-na . Lio-na mehini hewa eo , pai' pohea-na mengea' meringkila' .
40017003	Muu-mule' rahilo-rawo ana'guru-nae , ria wo'o rodua nabi to owi mpololitai Yesus . Nabi to rodua toera , Musa pai' Elia .
40017004	Ngkai ree Petrus mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Pue' , lompe' lia-ta mo'oha' hi rehe'i . Ane nupokono Pue' , kubabehi tolu bamaru' hi rehe'i : hameha' bagia-nu Pue' , hameha' bagia-na Musa pai' hameha' wo'o bagia-na Elia . "
40017005	Bula-na mololita-pidi Petrus , muu-mule' hompo-mi limu' to mehini mpokamoui-ra , pai' ngkai rala limu' toe mpo'epe-ra topololita to mpo'uli' : " Hi'a toi-mi Ana'-ku to kupe'ahi' . Hi'a mpakagoe' nono-ku . Pe'epei-mi lolita-na ! "
40017006	Wae kara'epe-na ana'guru-na lolita toe , tetumpopo'-ramo hi tana' apa' me'eka' lia-ra .
40017007	Tumai-i Yesus mpoganga-ra , na'uli'-raka : " Memata-mokoi , neo' me'eka' ! "
40017008	Kamenaa-ra , uma-pi ria hewa to rahilo-e we'i , muntu' Yesus-damo .
40017009	Pana'u-ra ngkai lolo bulu' toe , Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Neo' ulu ni'uli' hi hema-hema napa to nihilo we'i duu'-na Aku' , Ana' Manusia' , rapotuwu' nculii' ngkai kamatea . "
40017010	Mepekune'-ramo ana'guru-na , ra'uli' : " Napa pai' guru agama mpo'uli' nabi Elia ncala'-di to ri'ulu rata , pai' lako' rata-idi Magau' Topetolo'-e ? "
40017011	Na'uli' Yesus : " Makono mpu'u-di , Elia kana rata mperi'ulu , apa' hi'a to mporodo hawe'ea-na .
40017012	Aga ku'uli'-kokoi , mpolia' rata-imile Elia-e , aga pangkeni ngata-ta uma mpo'incai-i . Ra'ewa lau-idi ntuku' konoa-ra . Wae wo'o mpai' Aku' Ana' Manusia' ra'ewa ntuku' konoa-ra . "
40017013	Ngkai ree , rapaha-mi ana'guru-na lolita Yesus-e we'i : to rarapai'-ki nabi Elia , hi'a-mi Yohanes Topeniu' .
40017014	Kanculii'-ra Yesus hante ana'guru-na to tolu toera mpohirua'-raka ntodea , ria hadua tomane tumai mowingkotu' hi nyanyoa-na , mpo'uli'-ki :
40017015	" Pue' , poka'ahi'-ka-kuwo ana'-ku . Mohaki' limpuangaa-i , pai' jau-i molimpu' nakeni haki'-na . Jau-i modungka hi rala apu , jau wo'o-i modungka hi rala ue .
40017016	Kukeni-imi hi ana'guru-nu , aga uma-di rapakulei' mpaka'uri'-i . "
40017017	Na'uli' Yesus : " Uma mowo-koie' ! Ko'ia oa'-tano mepangala'-koie ! Mesapuaka oa'-pidi-koi mposapuaka konoa Alata'ala ! Ni'uli'-koina hangkuja tena-pi kahae-ku dohe-ni , hangkuja tena-pi kahae-na kupengkatarii kalente pepangala'-nie ! Keni tumai ana' tetui ! "
40017018	Ngkai ree , Yesus mpopetibo' anudaa' to mpopedahi ana' toei . Palai-nami anudaa' , pai' mo'uri'-imi-hawo topeda' toei .
40017019	Oti toe , Yesus pai' ana'guru-na malai ngkai ree , pai' ana'guru-na mpekune'-i , ra'uli' : " Guru , napa pai' uma kipakulei' mpopalai anudaa' toei-e we'i ? "
40017020	Na'uli' Yesus : " Wae moto-hawo-le , apa' hangkedi' rahi pepangala'-nie . Ku'uli'-kokoi : ane rii-ria-mi pepangala'-ta nau' hangkutuno'-wadi , uma ria to uma-na madupa' . Ma'ala ta'uli'-ki bulu' toe mai : ` Mentoli-ko ngkai retu ! ' bate mentoli-ile . ( (
40017021	Aga seta to hewa toe we'i , sampale-i malai ane mosampaya pai' mopuasa'-koi . ) ) "
40017022	Nto'u Yesus hante topetuku'-na morumpu hi Galilea , na'uli'-mi Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Aku' Ana' Manusia' , ratonu-a mpai' hi kuasa manusia' .
40017023	Rapatehi-a mpai' , aga hi eo katolu-na tuwu' nculii'-a . " Peda' lia-mi nono topetuku'-na mpo'epe lolita-na .
40017024	Karata-na Yesus hante topetuku'-na hi ngata Kapernaum , rata to mpesingarai' paja' Tomi Alata'ala hi Petrus pai' mpekune'-i : " Ha nabayari moto-hawo Guru-ni paja' Tomi Alata'ala-e , ba uma-di ? "
40017025	Na'uli' Petrus : " Nabayari moto ! " Ngkai ree , nculii'-imi Simon Petrus hilou hi tomi po'ohaa'-ra . Rata hi ria , ko'ia-di napoka'alai mololita-e , ncaliu Yesus-mi mpekune'-i : " Simon , beiwa-kowo pomporata-nu : hema to kana mpobayari paja' pai' pepue' hi raja to mpokuasai ngata doo ? Ntodea-na moto-di , ba pue' ngata to nakuasai-di ? "
40017026	Na'uli' Petrus : " Tantu pue' ngata to nakuasai to kana mpobayari . " Na'uli' Yesus : " Ane wae , ntodea-na moto uma mingki' mpobayari . Wae wo'o kita' to jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala , uma-ta mingki' mpobayari paja' Tomi Alata'ala .
40017027	Aga nau' wae , agina mobayari moto-tamo , bona neo' kedi' nono-ra hi kita' . Jadi' , hilou-moko hi rano mopeka . Ala' bau' uru to lomo'-na nupeka . Nurata doi hi rala nganga-na hono' pobayari paja' hi kita' rodua . Ala' doi tetu , pai' nubayari-ki paja' Tomi Alata'ala . "
40018001	Hinto'u toe , tumai-ra ana'guru Yesus mpomohui'-i , ra'uli' : " Pue' , ane jadi' Magau'-poko mpai' , hema to meliu kabohe tuwu'-na hi rala Kamagaua'-nu ? "
40018002	Yesus mpokio' hadua ana' to kedi' , napopokore hi laintongo'-ra ,
40018003	pai' na'uli'-raka : " Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : ane uma nibalii' kehi-ni pai' jadi' hewa ana' to kedi' toii , uma-koi mpai' jadi' ntodea Alata'ala .
40018004	Hema to mpakadingki' nono-na pai' jadi' hewa ana' to kedi' tohe'ii , hi'a-mi to bohe mpu'u tuwu'-na ngkai hawe'ea ntodea Alata'ala .
40018005	Hema to mpotarima hadua ana' to kedi' hewa ana' toii sabana petuku'-na hi Aku' , batua-na Aku'-mi to natarima .
40018006	" Aga hema to mpopanawu' hadua ana' to kedi' alaa-na uma-ipi mepangala' hi Aku' , bohe mpu'u pehuku' Alata'ala hi tauna tetui . Agina lau-pi hameha' watu po'ahaa' to bohe ratoe hi wuroko'-na pai'-i ratene' hi rala tahi' .
40018007	Silaka tauna hi dunia' toi , apa' wori' to mpopanawu'-ra . Bate ria mpu'u-di to mepanawu'-e , aga silaka-ra tauna to mepanawu' toera .
40018008	" Ane rapa'-na pale-ta hamali ba witi'-ta hamali to mpakeni-ta mojeko' , pua' lau-mi pai' petadi . Agina hamali-damo pale-ta ba witi'-ta , asala mporata-ta katuwua' to lompe' dohe Alata'ala . Agina lau-pi toe , ngkai palea ntimalia pai' witia' ntimalia , hiaa' ka'omea-na ratadi-ta hi rala apu to jela' ncuu .
40018009	Pai' ane rapa'-na mata-ta hamali to mpakeni-ta mojeko' , jungki' pai' petadi . Agina hamali-wadi mata-ta pai' mporata katuwua' to lompe' moto-ta dohe Alata'ala , ngkai mataa ntimalia , hiaa' ka'omea-na ratadi-ta hi rala apu naraka .
40018010	" Jadi' , pelompehi mpu'u-koi , neo'-koi uma mposaile' ana'-ana' to kedi' hewa ana' tohe'ii , nau' hadua . Apa' mpu'u-mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : mala'eka to mpodoo-ra tida ncuu hi nyanyoa Tuama-ku to hi rala suruga . ( (
40018011	Apa' patuju-ku Aku' Ana' Manusia' tumai hi dunia' , bona mpopali' tauna to molaa ngkai Alata'ala pai' mpohore-ra ngkai huku' jeko'-ra . ) )
40018012	" Beiwa pomporata-ni ? Ria hadua tauna to ria bima-na ha'atu ma'a-na . Ane moronto hama'a , napa to nababehi ? Tantu napalahii bima-na to sio mpulu' sio hi panapa bulu' , pai'-i hilou mpopali' to hama'a to moronto toei .
40018013	Pai' ane narua' nculii'-ipi , mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi meliu-mi kagoe'-na mpokagoe' bima to hama'a toei , ngkai bima-na to sio mpulu' sio to uma-ra-rana moronto .
40018014	Wae wo'o Tuama-ni hi rala suruga , uma napokonoi ane ria hadua ngkai ana' to kedi' toi to molaa ngkai Hi'a .
40018015	" Ane ria ompi' hampepangalaa'-ta to masala' hi kita' , hilou-ta mpohirua'-ki , pai' uli'-ki sala'-na . Tababehi toe hante uma ria to ngincai , muntu' kita' tau rodua-wadi . Ane napangala' lolita-ta , lompe' nculii'-mi pohintuwu'-ta .
40018016	Aga ane uma-i dota mpangala' lolita-ta , po'ema' hadua ba rodua dohe-ta hilou mpololitai-i . Apa' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' owi te'uki' hewa toi : ` Ane ria tauna to rapakilu mpobabehi sala' , kana ria nte rodua ba tolu to jadi' sabi' , bona monoa'-mi kara-kara-na . '
40018017	Ane uma-i dota mpangala' lolita sabi' toera , bua'-imi hi hawe'ea ompi' hampepangalaa' . Ane uma oa' napangalai' nau' hawe'ea ompi' hampepangalaa' mpoparesai'-i , pelele' lau-imi-hana , taponcawa hewa tauna to uma mpo'incai Alata'ala lau-imi , pai' hewa tauna to dada'a kehi-ra .
40018018	" Penonoi-koi ! Napa to nibotuhi hi dunia' , tetu wo'o to nabotuhi Alata'ala hi rala suruga : Ane koi' mpo'uli' neo' , Alata'ala-mi to mpo'uli' neo' . Ane koi' mpo'uli' ma'ala moto , Alata'ala-mi to mpo'uli' ma'ala moto .
40018019	Ku'uli' wo'o : ane ria-koi hi dunia' toi nte rodua to hintuwu' mekakae mperapi' ba napa-napa , posampaya-ni toe natompoi' Tuama-ku to hi rala suruga .
40018020	Apa' hiapa tauna morumpu sabana Aku' , nau' rodua ba tolu-ra-wadi , ria-a dohe-ra . "
40018021	Oti toe , Petrus mpomohui' Yesus pai' mpekune'-i , na'uli' : " Pue' , ane ompi' hampepangalaa'-ku masala' hi aku' , hangkuja ngkani kana ku'ampungi-i ? Nte pitu ngkani ? "
40018022	Na'uli' Yesus : " Uma wule' pitu ngkani-wadi . Nau' mo'atu-atu ngkani-nai masala' hi kita' , kana ta'ampungi-i .
40018023	Apa' Alata'ala hewa magau' to hi rala lolita rapa' toi : Ria hadua magau' doko' mpowile inta batua-na .
40018024	Lomo'-na , ria hadua batua rakeni hi nyanyoa-na to mo'inta hi juta-na .
40018025	Uma mpu'u-hawo nakulei' mpobayari inta-na toe . Jadi' , mohawa'-mi magau' toei , na'uli' : ` Pobalu' lau-imi batua tetui hante ana'-na pai' tobine-na pai' hawe'ea rewa-na , pobayari-ki inta-na . '
40018026	" Powingkotu'-nami batua toei hi nyanyoa magau' , mpopepoka'ahi' , na'uli' : ` Mosabara-ko Magau' , kubayari moto-kuwo mpai' inta-ku ! '
40018027	" Ngkai ree , metumu' lau-mi ahi'-na magau' mpoka'ahi' batua-na toei . Nabahaka-imi pai' na'uli'-ki : ` Inta-nu , uma-pi mingki' nubayari . '
40018028	" Palai-na batua toei , napohirua'-ki hadua hingka batua-na to mo'inta hi hi'a hi ncobu-na-wadi . Napentoe doo-na toei , nabaga' pai' na'uli'-ki : ` Bayari omea-mi inta-nu ! '
40018029	" Powingkotu'-nami-hawo doo-na toei mpopepoka'ahi' , na'uli' : ` Mosabara-ko ulu bale , kubayari moto-kuwo mpai' inta-ku ! '
40018030	Aga uma napangalai' pomperapia'-na toe . Napopesua' lau-imi hi rala tarungku' duu'-na tebayari omea inta-na .
40018031	" Karahilo-na batua to ntani'-na napa to jadi' tohe'e , peda' lia-mi-rawo nono-ra . Hilou-ramo hi magau' mpo'uli' kehi batua toei-e we'i .
40018032	Mpo'epe toe we'i , kamoroe-nami magau' . Mpohubui-i tauna hilou mpokio' batua to dada'a gau'-na tohe'ei . Karata-na , na'uli'-ki : ` Dada'a lia-ko ! Inta-nu kupori-mi ngkai rala buku-ku , apa' moranempale-moko hi aku' .
40018033	Napa-di-kona pai' uma nupoka'ahi' hingka batua-nu , hewa aku' mpoka'ahi'-koe ! '
40018034	Uma-pi mowo roe-na magau' . Batua to dada'a gau'-na toei napopesua' hi rala tarungku' duu'-na tebayari oti inta-na . "
40018035	Napohudu Yesus lolita rapa' toe , na'uli' : " Wae wo'o Tuama-ku to hi rala suruga mpobabehi hi koi'-e , ane uma-koi mpo'ampungi doo-ni ngkai nono-ni mpu'u . "
40019001	Kahudu-na Yesus mpololita hawe'ea toe , malai-imi ngkai tana' Galilea hilou hi tana' Yudea to hi dipo ue Yordan .
40019002	Wori' tauna mpotuku'-i , pai' to peda' napaka'uri' .
40019003	Ria ba hangkuja dua to Parisi tumai mposori Yesus . Rapekune'-i : " Ntuku' atura agama-ta , ba ma'ala moto-hawo tomane mpogaa'-ki tobine-na nau' to uma kojerea' ? "
40019004	Natompoi' Yesus : " Kiwoi napa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' owi : lomo'-na Topejadi' mpajadi' hadua tomane pai' hadua tobine .
40019005	Pai' oti toe na'uli' : ` Tomane kana mpalahii tina pai' tuama-na , pai' kana tuwu' hintuwu' hante tobine-na , bona hira' tau rodua toe jadi' hewa hadua lau-ra-damo . '
40019006	Jadi' , hi poncilo Alata'ala , tau hancamoko uma-pi rodua , hadua lau-ramo . Toe pai' ku'uli'-kokoi : ane ntoa' Alata'ala mpoposidai'-ra , manusia' uma ma'ala mpogaa'-ra . "
40019007	Mehono'-ra to Parisi : " Ane wae , napa pai' Musa mohawa' bona tomane mpowai' sura pogaa' hi tobine , ane doko' napogaa'-ki ? "
40019008	Na'uli' Yesus : " Musa mpiliu-koi mogaa'-le , apa' ngkai kamotu'a nono-ni , uma tuduia' . Aga kakoo-kono-na , uma hewa toe ngkai lomo'-na .
40019009	Bona ni'inca : hema to mpogaa'-ki tobine-na pai'-i motobinei to ntani'-na , mobualo'-i-hana . Sampale-di ane mobualo' tobine-nae , ma'ala-mi napogaa'-ki . "
40019010	Ngkai ree , ana'guru-na mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Ane wae-di kamokoro-na ada poncamoko , agina lau-pi-hawo neo' ncamoko . "
40019011	Na'uli' Yesus : " Uma hawe'ea tauna bisa ntarima lolita tetu . Aga ria moto tauna to napakatantu Alata'ala bona uma-ra ncamoko .
40019012	Ria tauna to uma ncamoko apa' lawi' hewa toe-hawo ngkai kaputu-ra . Ria wo'o to uma ncamoko apa' babehia tau ntani'-na . Ria wo'o to uma ncamoko apa' lawi' kadota-ra moto-rawo , bona mologa-ra mpobago bago Alata'ala . Hema to mpakule' mpotuku' tudui' toi , lompe' ane natuku' . "
40019013	Hangkani , ria tauna to mpokeni ana'-ra hi Yesus bona najama-ra pai' naposampayai . Aga ana'guru-na mpokaroe tauna toera .
40019014	Yesus mpo'uli'-raka ana'guru-na : " Pelele' moto-ra ana' tetura tumai hi Aku' , neo'-ra nitagi . Apa' tauna to hewa toe-ramo to jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua'-na . "
40019015	Ngkai ree , najama-ramo ana' toera , pai'-ra nagane' . Oti toe , malai-imi ngkai ree .
40019016	Hangkani , ria hadua tomane rata hi Yesus mpopekune'-i : " Guru , kehi napa to lompe' kana kubabehi bona mporata-a katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-nae ? "
40019017	Na'uli' Yesus : " Napa pai' nupekune'-a beiwa kehi to lompe'-e ? Uma ria ntani'-na to lompe' , hadua Alata'ala-wadi . Ane doko' mporata katuwua' to lompe'-ko , tuku'-mi parenta Alata'ala . "
40019018	Mepekune' tena-i tau tohe'ei : " Parenta to'uma ? " Natompoi' Yesus : " Neo' mepatehi , neo' mobualo' , neo' manako , neo' mosabi' boa' ,
40019019	kana tabila' tina tuama-ta , pai' poka'ahi' doo-ta hewa kampoka'ahi'-ta woto-ta moto . "
40019020	Na'uli' kabilasa toei : " Hawe'ea parenta tetu lau , kutuku' omea-mi . Napa-pi to kana kubabehi ? "
40019021	Na'uli' Yesus : " Ane doko'-ko mpotuku' Alata'ala hante karoli'-roli' nono-nu , lou-moko ulu mpobalu' rewa-nu , pai' doi oli-na wai'-raka tokabu . Ane nubabehi hewa toe , bohe mpai' rasi' to nurata hi rala suruga . Oti toe , pai' tumai-moko mpotuku'-a . "
40019022	Mpo'epe toe we'i , kapeda'-nami nono-na pai'-i malai-mi , apa' wori' rewa-na .
40019023	Toe pai' na'uli' Yesus hi ana'guru-na : " Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : mokoro rahi tauna to mo'ua' jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua'-na .
40019024	Ku'uli' wo'o : mojoli-pi hama'a unta ntara hi wulou' jaru ngkai tauna to mo'ua' mengkoru hi Alata'ala bona Hi'a jadi' Magau'-ra . "
40019025	Kara'epe ana'guru-na lolita Yesus toe , rapokakonce lia , ra'uli' : " Ei' , ane wae-di , hema lau-damo to ma'ala mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-nae ! "
40019026	Yesus mponaa-ra pai' na'uli'-raka : " Ane hante pakulea' manusia'-le , uma ami' hema . Aga ane Alata'ala , uma ria to uma napakule' . "
40019027	Ngkai ree , na'uli' wo'o-mi-hawo Petrus : " Hiaa' kai' , kipalahii omea-mi-kaina bona mpotuku'-ko . Hiwili napa mpai' to kirata ? "
40019028	Na'uli' Yesus : " Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : hi eo mpeno-na nto'u Alata'ala mpobo'ui omea , Aku' Ana' Manusia' mohura hi pohuraa to ncola moparenta . Nto'u toe mpai' , koi' to mpotuku'-a toi-e , mohura wo'o-ko-koiwo hi pohuraa to hampulu' romeha' , mpoparentai to Israel to hampulu' rontina .
40019029	Hema-hema to mpalahii ompi'-na , tuama-na ba tina-na , ana'-na ba tomi-na ba bonea-na sabana mpotuku'-a , bate mporata-i mpai' ha'atu ngkani hiwili-na , pai' mporata wo'o-i katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na .
40019030	Aga wori' tauna to bohe tuwu'-ra tempo toi jadi' kedi' tuwu'-ra hi eo mpeno . Pai' wori' wo'o tauna to kedi' tuwu'-ra tempo toi jadi' bohe tuwu'-ra hi eo mpeno . "
40020001	Na'uli' Yesus : " Ane Alata'ala jadi' Magau' , kajadi'-na hewa lolita rapa' tohe'i : Hadua pue' bonea anggur hilou mpopali' tauna to dota mobago hi bonea-na . Mepupulo modao'-i mporua' tauna ,
40020002	na'uli'-raka : ` Hilou-koi mobago hi bonea-ku , kuwai'-koi hore hampepa' doi pera' gaji'-ni ha'eo . ' Rapo'io'-mi lolita-na toe , hilou mpu'u-ramo .
40020003	Jaa sio , hilou wo'o-imi mpali' to ntani'-na , nahilo ba hangkuja dua tauna ntora-ntora hi wiwi' karajaa .
40020004	Na'uli'-raka : ` Hilou-koi mobago hi bonea-ku , kuwai' moto-koi gaji' to masipato' . ' Hilou mpu'u-ramo-rawo .
40020005	Tebua' eo , hilou wo'o-imi mpopali' tauna , na'uli'-raka : ` Hilou-koi mobago hi bonea-ku . ' Wae wo'o jaa tolu libe eo .
40020006	" Ncimonou'-mi , ba neo' jaa lima , modao' wo'o-imi mporua' tauna to ntora . Napekune'-ra : ` Napa pai' ntora-ntora mara-wadi-koi ha'eoa , uma-ko-koina mobago-e ? '
40020007	" Ratompoi'-i : ` Apa' uma hema to mpopobago-kai . ' " Na'uli' pue' bonea toei : ` Ane wae , hilou-mokoi mobago hi bonea-ku . ' Hilou mpu'u-ramo-rawo .
40020008	" Limpa-mi eo , na'uli'-mi pue' bonea hi mantoro'-na : ` Kio'-ramo topobago toera ria , pai' wai'-ramo gaji'-ra . Wai' ulu gaji' hi tauna to lako' ntepu'u mobago jaa lima we'i . Oti toe , wai' gaji' hi tauna to ntepu'u mobago jaa tolu , duu' rata hi tauna to mobago ngkai mepuloa . '
40020009	" Tumai mpu'u-ramo to mobago ntepu'u jaa lima ncimonou' , mporata-ramo gaji' himpau hampepa' doi pera' .
40020010	Kawae-kawae-na duu'-na rata wo'o-ra-rawo to mobago ngkai mepuloa-e ngone . To mobago ngkai mepulo toera mpo'uli' hi rala nono-ra : ` Tantu meliu mpai' to nawai'-taka kita' , apa' ha'eoa-ta-tana mobago ! ' Ntaa' we'i , bate hampepa' doi pera' wo'o-wadi-rawo to rarata-e .
40020011	Kampohilo-ra gaji'-ra tohe'e , ngkunuti-ramo mpongkunutii pue' bonea , ra'uli' :
40020012	` To lako' rata mobago hi ka'omea-na , muntu' hajaa-ra-wadi mobago . Hiaa' kai' , mobago ha'eoa-ka-kaina , nahimai' eo to ngkerepa' . Napa-di pai' nubayari-ra hibaa-balia hante kai' ? '
40020013	" Hampetompoi' pue' bonea toei : ` Uma-a masala' hi koi' , bale . Ha uma pojanci-tami mporata-koi gaji' hampepa' doi pera' rala-na ha'eo ?
40020014	Ala'-mi-koiwo gaji'-ni pai' hilou-mokoi ! Konoa-kumi mpowai' gaji' hi tauna to rata ka'omea-na hibalia hante to kuwai'-kokoi koi' .
40020015	Ha uma ma'ala kubabehi ntuku' konoa-ku hante doi-ku ? Napa pai' mohingi'-koi hi doo ane lompe' nono-ku hi hira' ? ' "
40020016	Napohudu Yesus lolita rapa' toe , na'uli' : " Wae wo'o mpai' hi eo mpeno-na : wori' tauna to kedi' tuwu'-ra tempo toi jadi' bohe tuwu'-ra hi eo mpeno . Pai' wori' wo'o tauna to bohe tuwu'-ra tempo toi jadi' kedi' tuwu'-ra hi eo mpeno . "
40020017	Nto'u toe , Yesus mako' mpotoa' ngata Yerusalem . Hi lengko ohea nakio'-ra ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua morumpu mopatani' , pai' na'uli'-raka :
40020018	" Epe-koi ! Hilou-tamo tohe'i-e mpotoa' Yerusalem . Hi ria mpai' , Aku' Ana' Manusia' ratonu hi imam pangkeni pai' guru agama , pai' rabotuhi bona rapatehi-a .
40020019	Oti toe mpai' , ratonu-a hi tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi , rapopo'ore' , raweba' , pai' rapatehi-a hi kaju parika' . Aga hi eo katolu-na tuwu' nculii' moto-a . "
40020020	Nto'u toe , rata tobine-na Zebedeus hante ana'-na rodua hi Yesus . Motingkua'-i hi nyanyoa-na apa' ria to naperapi' .
40020021	Napekune' Yesus : " Napa to nuperapi'-e ? " Na'uli' totina toei : " Pomperapia'-kule , bona ane jadi' Magau'-poko mpai' , ana'-ku to rodua tohe'ira mohura pai' moparenta hangkaa-ngkania dohe-nu , hadua hi mali ka'ana-nu , hadua hi mali ki'ii-nu . "
40020022	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Uma ni'incai napa to niperapi' tetu . Ha nipakule' mpai' mpokolo kaparia to kana kukolo-e ? " Ratompoi' ana'guru to rodua toera : " Kipakule' moto ! "
40020023	Na'uli' Yesus : " Makono mpu'u , bate nikolo mpai' kaparia hewa to kukolo . Aga hema to mohura hi mali ka'ana-ku pai' hi mali ki'ii-ku , bela Aku' to mpakatantu . Tuama-ku-hana to mpakatantu hema to mporata bagia tetu . "
40020024	Kara'epe-na ana'guru-na to hampulu' pomperapia' doo-ra to rodua toera , kamoroe-rami mpokaroe-ra .
40020025	Toe pai' Yesus mpokio'-ra omea pai' na'uli'-raka : " Ni'inca moto kasoa-ra topoparenta to uma mpo'incai Alata'ala mpoparentai ntodea-na . Tauna to bohe pangka'-ra mpewuku ntodea-na mpotuku' hawa'-na .
40020026	Aga koi' , neo' hewa toe kehi-ni . Hema-koi to doko' bohe pangka'-na , kana jadi' pahawaa' .
40020027	Pai' hema to doko' bohe hanga'-na kana jadi' batua-ni .
40020028	Kana nituku' po'ingku-ku , Aku' Ana' Manusia' . Patuju-ku tumai hi dunia' , uma bona jadi' topohawa' . Pai'-a tumai-le , bona jadi' pahawaa' , duu'-na mpewai' woto-ku rapatehi mpotolo' sala' tauna to wori' . "
40020029	Kamalai-ra Yesus pai' ana'guru-na ngkai ngata Yerikho , mo'iko-ra-damo tauna mpotuku'-i .
40020030	Hi wiwi' ohea , ria rodua tauna to wero mohura . Kape'epe-ra towero toera Kayesus-na to liu , mekio'-ramo , ra'uli' : " Pue' , muli Magau' Daud ! Poka'ahi'-ka-kaiwo ! "
40020031	Tauna to wori' hi ree mpokaroe-ra , ra'uli' : " Ngkalino-koi ! " Uma-rawo rapangalai' , rahuduwukui lau-mi mejeu' : " Pue' , muli Magau' Daud , poka'ahi'-ka-kaiwo ! "
40020032	Mento'o-imi Yesus , pai'-i mpokio'-ra tumai , na'uli'-raka : " Napa to nipokono kubabehi-kokoi ? "
40020033	Ratompoi'-i : " Pue' , doko'-ka-kaiwo pehilo ! "
40020034	Metumu'-mi ahi'-na Yesus , toe pai' naganga mata-ra . Ncaliu pehilo-ramo , pai'-ra mpotuku' Yesus .
40021001	Mohu'-ramo hi Yerusalem , rata-ra hi ngata Betfage hi Bulu' Zaitun . Hi ree , Yesus mpohubui rodua ana'guru-na hilou meri'ulu ,
40021002	na'uli'-raka : " Hilou-koi hi ngata to tanyanyohi toe mai . Rata-koi mpai' hi ria , nihilo hama'a keledai to tehoo' pai' ana'-na mohu' dohe-na . Bongka koloro-na pai' keni-ra tumai .
40021003	Ane ria to mpokamaro-koi , uli'-raka : ` Apa' Pue' mparaluu-ra . Napoponculi' moto-kokoi mpai' . ' "
40021004	Tohe'e majadi' bona madupa' napa to na'uli' nabi owi , hewa toi :
40021005	" Uli'-raka pue' ngata Sion : Hilo , etu-imi tumai Magau'-ni ! Dingki' nono-na , mpohawi'-i hama'a keledai , mpohawi'-i hama'a ana' keledai to mongura . "
40021006	Jadi' , hilou mpu'u-ramo ana'guru-na to rodua toera , rababehi hewa to nahubui-raka .
40021007	Rakeni keledai to ntali ana' toera , ralampii hante baju-ra . Oti ralampii , mehawi'-imi Yesus .
40021008	Hilou-ramo mpotoa' Yerusalem . Hi kaliua-na Yesus toe , wori' lia tauna mpokodo pohea-ra hi mata ohea , pai' hantongo' mpoho'a rau kaju pai' rakodo hi mata ohea bona mpobila'-i .
40021009	Wori' tauna mpotuku'-i , ria-ra to meri'ulu , ria wo'o-ra to hi boko' . Ntora mogora-ra mpo'uli' : Une'-imi muli Magau' Daud ! " Pue' Ala mpogane' Magau' to tumai mpokeni hanga'-na ! " Une'-imi Pue' Ala to hi rala suruga ! "
40021010	Pesua'-na Yesus hi ngata Yerusalem , konce-mi pue' ngata , ra'uli' : " Hema-idie ? "
40021011	Ratompoi' tauna to dohe-na : " Yesus-le , nabi ngkai Nazaret tana' Galilea . "
40021012	Oti toe , mesua'-imi Yesus hi berewe Tomi Alata'ala , pai'-i mpopalai hawe'ea tauna to mobabalu' hi ree . Nabilingko-raka meja'-meja' posulaa'-ra doi , pai' nabilingko wo'o pohuraa topobabalu' danci mangkebodo .
40021013	Na'uli'-raka : " Hi rala Buku Tomoroli' Alata'ala mpo'uli' hewa toi : ` Tomi-ku mpai' rakahangai' tomi posampayaa . ' Hiaa' koi'-koina , niponcawa tomi toperampaki-di ! "
40021014	Hi Tomi Alata'ala , tauna towero pai' topungku rata hi Yesus , pai' napaka'uri'-ra .
40021015	Aga imam-imam pangkeni pai' guru-guru agama , moroe-ra mpohilo tanda mekoncehi to nababehi Yesus . Gigi nono-ra mpo'epe ana' to mogora hi rala Tomi Alata'ala to mpo'uli' : " Une'-imi muli Magau' Daud ! "
40021016	Toe pai' ra'uli' mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Nu'epe wa napa to ra'uli'-e ! " Na'uli' Yesus : " Ku'epe moto . Ko'ia-tano nibasa hi rala Buku Tomoroli'-e to mpo'uli' : ` Nutudui'-ramo ana'-ana' pai' ana'lei mpohowa' lolita pe'une' hi Iko . ' "
40021017	Ngkai ree , malai-imi Yesus mpalahii-ra hilou hi mali ngata , turu hi Betania .
40021018	Kampeneo-na mepulo ngkii , hi pomako'-ra Yesus pai' ana'guru-na nculii' hilou hi Yerusalem , mo'oro'-imi Yesus .
40021019	Mpohilo-i hi wiwi' ohea hangkaju kaju ara . Hilou-i hi tawu-na mpali' wua'-na , aga uma ria nau' hantakua , muntu' rau-na-wadi . Toe pai' Yesus mpototowi kaju toei , na'uli' : " Ngkai eo toe lau , uma-poko mowua'-wua' kaju toi-ko ! " Kamolaju-nami kaju ara toei .
40021020	Wae karahilo-na ana'guru-na to jadi' toe , rapokakonce , ra'uli' : " Beiwa pai' kaliliu molaju kaju ara toei-e mai ? "
40021021	Na'uli' Yesus : " Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi , ane nipangala' pai' uma-koi morara' , ma'ala wo'o-ko-koiwo mpobabehi hewa to kubabehi hi kaju toe we'i . Pai' uma muntu' tohe'e , ma'ala-koi mpololitai bulu' tohe'i : ` Te'ongko'-moko , pengkanawu'-ko hi rala tahi' ! ' bate majadi' tetu .
40021022	Napa-napa to niperapi' hi rala posampaya-ni , ane nipangala' , bate nitarima . "
40021023	Mesua' wo'o-imi Yesus hi rala Tomi Alata'ala pai' metudui' . Bula-na metudui' , rata-ramo imam pangkeni hante totu'a to Yahudi mpekune'-i , ra'uli' : " Uli'-kakai , ngkaiapa huraa-nu mpobabehi hawe'ea tetu hi Tomi Alata'ala ! Hema to mpowai'-ko kuasa hewa tetu ? "
40021024	Na'uli' Yesus : " Aku' , ria wo'o-kuwo pompekunea'-ku hi koi' . Ane nitompoi'-ka , bo ku'uli'-kokoi kangkaiapa-na kuasa-ku mpobabehi hawe'ea toe lau .
40021025	Uli'-ka pe' : ngkaiapa kuasa-na Yohanes Topeniu' mponiu' tauna ? Ngkai Alata'ala-di , ba ngkai manusia'-di ? " Momepololitai-ramo pangkeni to Yahudi toera , ra'uli' : " Beiwa-tale' mpotompoi'-ie ? Ane ta'uli' ngkai Alata'ala kuasa-na , na'uli'-taka mpai' : ` Ane wae , napa pai' uma-i nipangala' ? '
40021026	Hiaa' ane ta'uli' ngkai manusia'-wadi kuasa-na , mpoka'eka'-ta ntodea , apa' ntodea toera mpo'uli' Yohanes toe hadua nabi . "
40021027	Jadi' , ratompoi'-i : " Uma ki'incai . " Toe pai' na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Ane wae , uma wo'o-kuwo ku'uli'-kokoi kangkaiapa kuasa-ku mpobabehi toe lau . "
40021028	Napokaliliu Yesus lolita-na hi pangkeni agama Yahudi toera , na'uli' : " Beiwa pomporata-ni tohe'i : Ria hadua tuama , rodua-ki ana'-na , paka' tomane . Hilou-i hi to tuaka , na'uli'-ki : ` Uto' , eo toe lau , hilou-ko mobago hi bonea . '
40021029	" Natompoi' : ` Oja'-a Mama ! ' Aga ka'omea-na mobali' nono-na , hilou moto-i mobago hi bonea .
40021030	" Ngkai ree , hilou wo'o-i hi ana'-na to tu'ai , na'uli'-ki : ` Uto' , hilou-ko mobago hi bonea . ' " Natompoi' ana' toei : ` Io' , hilou moto-a Mama . ' Ntaa' uma-idi hilou-e ! "
40021031	Ngkai ree , mepekune'-i Yesus hi pangkeni agama Yahudi , na'uli' : " Jadi' , ngkai ana' to rodua toera , hema to mpotuku' hawa' tuama-ra ? " Ra'uli' pangkeni to Yahudi toera : " To lomo'-na . " Na'uli' Yesus : " Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : tauna topojeko' , hewa topesingara' paja' pai' tobine to uma tumotoa gau'-ra , hira' lau-mi to natarima Alata'ala jadi' ntodea-na hi rala Kamagaua'-na , bela koi' .
40021032	Apa' Yohanes Topeniu' mpotudui'-koi ohea to monoa' , aga uma-koi dota mpopangala'-i . Hiaa' topesingara' paja' pai' tobine to uma tumotoa gau'-ra , rapangala'-i-rana . Pai' nau' nihilo-mi toe , uma oa' nibalii' gau'-ni pai' uma oa' nipangala'-i . "
40021033	Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus mpo'uli'-raka pangkeni agama Yahudi : " Epe wo'o-koi lolita rapa' tohe'i . Ria hadua pue' bonea mpohu'ai bonea-na hante anggur . Nawala ntololikia-na , nababehi pompeaa' anggur , pai' natunya' wo'o pongko pompodooa . Oti toe , napewai' bonea-na rapobago hi ba hangkuja dua tauna , pai' hilou-imi hi ngata to molaa .
40021034	Rata-mi tempo pohopua' wua' anggur , napahawa'-ra ba hangkuja dua batua-na hilou mperapi' bagia-na .
40021035	Aga topobago bonea toera mpohoko' batua to napahawa' : ria-ra to rapao' , ria to rapana' watu , ria wo'o to rapatehi .
40021036	Pue' bonea toei mpahawa' tena batua-na to ntani'-na , meliu kawori'-ra ngkai to lomo'-na . Aga rapohewa toe wo'o-ra-wadi .
40021037	Ka'omea-na , na'uli' : ` Agina ana'-ku moto-mi kupahawa' hilou , bate rapengkorui-i mpai' . '
40021038	" Ntaa' we'i , karahilo-na topobago bonea toera ana' pue' bonea tohe'ei , mohawa'-ramo ra'uli' : ` Etu-imi tumai ana'-na , hi'a mpai' to jadi' pue' bonea toi-e . Kita tapatehi-i , bona bonea toi kita'-mi mpai' pue'-na . '
40021039	Karahoko'-nami ana' toei , radii' hilou hi mali bonea pai' rapatehi . "
40021040	Ngkai ree , Yesus mpo'uli'-raka pangkeni agama Yahudi : " Jadi' , ane rata nculii'-ipi pue' bonea-e , napopai-ra topobago bonea-na toera-e ? "
40021041	Ratompoi'-i : " Tantu napatehi-ra tauna to dada'a toera , pai' bonea-na nawai'-raka tau ntani'-na to dota mpowai'-i bagia-na hi tempo-na . "
40021042	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Tantu nibasa-mi lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpolowa pesapuaka-ni hi Aku' , hewa toi moni-na : ` Watu to ratadi topowangu tomi , watu toe lau-mi to jadi' poko parawatu . Tohe'e majadi' ntuku' konoa Pue' Alata'ala , uma mowo kalompe'-na hi poncilo-ta . ' "
40021043	Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus : " Jadi' , apa' oja'-koi mpotarima-a jadi' Magau'-ni , wae-pi , bagia-ni hi rala Kamagaua'-na Alata'ala , ra'ala' ngkai koi' pai' rawai'-raka tauna to mpobabehi po'ingku to natao hi ntodea Alata'ala . ( (
40021044	Hewa kura to monawu' hi watu mopengka , pai' hewa kura to napitihi watu moreja' , hewa toe wo'o mpai' tauna to mposapuaka-a . ) ) "
40021045	Kara'epe-na imam pangkeni pai' to Parisi lolita-lolita rapa' Yesus toe , ra'inca kahira'-na to natoa' .
40021046	Toe pai' rapali'-mi ohea-ra mpohoko'-i . Aga uma-ra daho' , apa' mpoka'eka'-ra ntodea , apa' ntodea mpo'uli' Yesus hadua nabi .
40022001	Mololita tena-i Yesus hi pangkeni agama Yahudi toera , mpo'uli'-raka hanyala-pi lolita rapa' . Na'uli' :
40022002	" Alata'ala hewa magau' to hi rala jarita toi : Hadua magau' mpobabehi karamea hi poncamokoa ana'-na .
40022003	Mohawa'-i hi pahawaa'-na hilou mpokio' tauna to rahinta' hewa toi : ` Hilou-tamo ngkoni' hi posusaa' poncamokoa ! ' Aga hawe'ea to rakio' toera , uma-ra dota hilou .
40022004	Toe pai' nahubui tena pahawaa'-na to ntani'-na , na'uli'-raka : ` Uli'-raka to rahinta' : pongkoni' taha'-mi , japi hante porewua to morudu' ntani'-na rasumale'-mi , rodo-mi omea . Kita-mi hilou hi posusaa' poncamokoa ! '
40022005	Aga hawe'ea to rakio' toera uma mposaile' pekio' toe . Hore-hore hilou hi pobagoa-ra moto-ra . Ria-ra to hilou hi bonea-ra , ria-ra to hilou hi bago-ra ntani'-na .
40022006	To ntani'-na wo'o-ra mpohoko' pahawaa' magau' toe , rapao' pai' rapatehi .
40022007	Kana'epe-na magau' napa to jadi' tohe'e , moroe lia-imi . Nahubui tantara-na hilou mpatehi topepatehi toera , pai' mposuwe ngata-ra .
40022008	" Oti toe , nakio' wo'o-ramo pahawaa'-na , na'uli'-raka : ` Susa' poncamokoa rodo-mi , aga tauna to kukio' , uma-ra natao mpokaralai .
40022009	Wae-pi , hilou-mokoi hi ohea kama , hema-hema to nirua' , bawai-ramo tumai mpokaralai susa' poncamokoa . '
40022010	Kahilou-rami-rawo pahawaa' toera hi ohea mporumpu hawe'ea tauna to liu , uma mpenara' ba to lompe' gau'-ra ba to dada'a . Ka'omea-na ihia' mpu'u-mi tomi posusaa' hante torata .
40022011	" Mesua'-imi magau' toei mpokamata torata . Nahilo-hawo hi olo' torata , ria hadua to uma moheai pohea posusa' .
40022012	Na'uli' magau' : ` Bale , napa-kona pai' tumai-ko hi posusaa' uma-ko moheai pohea posusa'-e ? ' Uma-i-hawo winihi .
40022013	Ngkai ree , mohawa'-imi magau' mpo'uli'-raka pahawaa'-na : ` Hilu' witi'-na , hoo' pale-na , petadi-i hi mali-na rala kabengia-na ! Hi ria-i mpai' geo' pai' ntodohaka . ' "
40022014	Napohudu Yesus lolita rapa'-na hewa toi : " Wori' tauna to nakio' Alata'ala , aga hangkedi'-ra-wadi to napelihi jadi' ntodea-na . "
40022015	Ngkai ree , malai-ramo to Parisi ngkai Tomi Alata'ala . Mohawa'-ra mpali' akala beiwa-ra ma'ala mpo'opa kahala' lolita-na Yesus mpotompoi' pompekunea'-ra .
40022016	Rarata-mi akala-ra : mpahawa'-ra ba hangkuja dua topetuku'-ra hante ba hangkuja dua tauna to tono' hi Magau' Herodes hilou hi Yesus . Ra'uli' mpo'uli'-ki : " Guru , ki'inca Guru tau manoa' . Monoa' lia tudui'-nu mpo'uli' napa konoa Alata'ala hi manusia' . Uma nupengkorui ba hema-hema , apa' uma-ko mpelence tauna .
40022017	Toe pai' kiperapi' bona nu'uli'-kakai , beiwa pomporata-nu Guru : ntuku' atura agama-ta , ba ma'ala moto-ta mpobayari paja' hi Kaisar , ba uma-di ? "
40022018	Na'inca Yesus patuju nono-ra to dada'a toe , toe pai' na'uli'-raka : " Hilo mpu'u-koie' topebagiu ! Napa pai' doko' ni'opa kahala' lolita-ku !
40022019	Popehuwu-ka pe' doi to biasa nibayari-ki paja'-e . " Ratonu-miki hampepa' doi pera' .
40022020	Na'uli' Yesus : " Lence hema pai' hanga' hema to hi doi toi ? "
40022021	Ratompoi' : " Lence pai' hanga' Kaisar . " Na'uli' Yesus : " Ane wae-di , wai'-ki Kaisar napa to kasipato'-na rawai'-ki Kaisar , pai' wai'-ki Alata'ala napa to kasipato'-na rawai'-ki Alata'ala . "
40022022	Kara'epe-na petompoi' Yesus tohe'e , rapokakonce . Kamalai-rami mpalahii Yesus .
40022023	Hi eo toe wo'o , ba hangkuja dua to Saduki rata hi Yesus . To Saduki toera , pangkeni agama Yahudi to mposapuaka tauna to mate tuwu' nculii' hi eo mpeno .
40022024	Rata to Saduki toera mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Guru , nabi Musa metudui' hewa toi : Ane hadua tomane mate , hiaa' uma-ki ria ana'-na , pudupuhe-na kana mpotobine balu-na , bona ria-ki-hawo muli-na tomate toei .
40022025	Jadi' , ria pitu to ntali ompi' paka' tomane . To ulumua' motobinei , mate-i uma ria ana'-na . Balu-na napotobine tu'ai-na .
40022026	Ko'ia wo'o rapoka'alai mo'anai' , mate wo'o-imi-hawo to tu'ai toei . Wae oa'-mi majadi' hi katolu-na duu'-na hi kapitu-na .
40022027	Ka'omea-na , mate wo'o-imi-hawo tobine toei .
40022028	Jadi' hi eo mpeno-na , ane tuwu' nculii' mpu'u-di hawe'ea tomate-e , hema-ramo mpai' pue' tobine toei ? Apa' hawe'ea-ra mpotobine-imi . "
40022029	Na'uli' Yesus : " Sala' rahi pekiri-ni tetu , apa' uma nipaha ihi' Buku Tomoroli' , uma wo'o ni'incai baraka'-na Alata'ala .
40022030	Apa' ane tuwu' nculii'-ramo tauna to mate , katuwu'-ra hewa katuwu' mala'eka hi rala suruga , uma-rapa motobinei ba motomanei .
40022031	Ha ko'ia ria nibasa lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpakanoto katuwu'-ra nculii' tomate-e ? Ria Lolita Alata'ala owi to mpo'uli'-kokoi hewa toi :
40022032	` Aku' toi-mi Alata'ala to napue' Abraham , Alata'ala to napue' Ishak , Alata'ala to napue' Yakub . ' Batua-na , nau' mahae-ramo mate Abraham , Ishak pai' Yakub , bate tuwu' moto-ra . Apa' bela tauna to mate to mepue' hi Alata'ala , tauna to tuwu'-hana to mpopue'-i . "
40022033	Kara'epe-na ntodea tudui'-na Yesus toe , rapokakonce .
40022034	To Saduki uma-pi tepehono' , apa' nadagi-ramo Yesus . Kara'epe-na to Parisi toe , moromu wo'o-ramo-rawo mpopali' akala-ra mpo'akalai Yesus .
40022035	Hadua ngkai laintongo'-ra , hadua guru agama , mperao mpo'opa petompoi' Yesus hante pompekunea'-na , na'uli' :
40022036	" Guru , ngkai hawe'ea parenta hi rala Atura Pue' , parenta to'uma to meliu kabohe-na ? "
40022037	Na'uli' Yesus : ` Kana tapoka'ahi' Pue'-ta Pue' Alata'ala hante nono-ta mpu'u , tatonu hawe'ea katuwu'-ta hi Hi'a , pai' tapoka'ahi'-i hudu inca-ta . '
40022038	Toe-mi parenta to meliu kabohe-na , pai' to lomo'-na mpu'u .
40022039	Pai' parenta karonyala-na to hibalia hante to lomo'-na toe : ` Kana tapoka'ahi' doo-ta hewa pompoka'ahi'-ta woto-ta moto . '
40022040	Hawe'ea Atura Pue' pai' tudui' nabi-nabi mentoe hi parenta to ronyala toe . "
40022041	Bula-ra to Parisi ria-pidi morumpu hi retu , Yesus mpekune'-ra :
40022042	" Beiwa pomporata-ni , hema-i Magau' Topetolo' to najanci Alata'ala-e ? Muli hema-i ? " Ratompoi' : " Muli Magau' Daud . "
40022043	Na'uli' Yesus : " Ane wae-di , napa pai' Daud mpokahangai'-i Pue'-na ? Hante petete' Inoha' Tomoroli' , Daud mpotompo'wiwi Magau' Topetolo' hewa toi :
40022044	Pue' Ala mpo'uli'-ki Pue'-ku : ` Mohura-moko hi mali ngka'ana-ku , duu'-na kupopengkoru hawe'ea bali'-nu hi Iko . '
40022045	Jadi' , ane muli Daud mpu'u-idi Magau' Topetolo'-e , napa pai' Daud mpokahangai'-i Pue'-na ? "
40022046	Uma ria haduaa to mpotompoi'-i . Ntepu'u ngkai eo toe , uma-pi hema to daho' mpekune' ba napa-napa hi Yesus .
40023001	Ngkai ree , Yesus mpololitai ntodea pai' topetuku'-na , na'uli' :
40023002	" Guru-guru agama pai' to Parisi mohura hi pohuraa Musa , apa' hira' to mpotudui'-koi Atura Musa .
40023003	Toe pai' kana nituku' omea napa to ratudui'-kokoi . Aga neo' nipenau' po'ingku-ra , apa' hira' toe uma mpotuku' napa to ratudui'-kokoi .
40023004	Hira' toe mpopokoloi ntodea hante parenta pai' ada to motomo , hiaa' hira' moto , uma-ra mpotulungi ntodea mpotuku' parenta pai' ada toe .
40023005	" Wori' moto-hawo po'ingku-ra to lompe' , aga patuju-ra mpobabehi po'ingku toe , bona rahilo doo-wadi . Mpopake'-ra tali posampaya to mopepa'-pepa' , pai' rapokaloe wua' baju-ra , bona petuku'-ra hi Atura Musa ma'ala rahilo doo .
40023006	Goe'-ra ane rapopohura-ra hi pohuraa to lompe' hi posusaa' . Goe'-ra rapopohura hi pohuraa karabilaa' hi tomi posampayaa .
40023007	Goe'-ra ane ria tauna hi wiwi' karajaa motingkua' mpotabe-ra pai' mpokahangai'-ra ` Guru . '
40023008	" Aga koi' , neo'-koi mpopebila' pai' doko' rakahangai' ` Guru , ' apa' hadua-wadi Guru-ni , pai' koi' omea ntali ompi'-wadi .
40023009	Pai' neo' wo'o nipomolangko rahi ba hema-hema hi dunia' toi pai' mpokahangai'-ra ` Tuama , ' apa' Tuama-ni hadua-wadi , Hi'a-mi Tuama-ni to hi rala suruga .
40023010	Pai' neo' wo'o-koi doko' rakahangai' ` Pangkeni , ' apa' Pangkeni-ni hadua-wadi , Hi'a-mi Magau' Topetolo' .
40023011	Hema-koi to doko' bohe tuwu'-na , kana jadi' pahawaa' hi doo-na .
40023012	Tauna to mpakalangko nono-ra , Pue' Ala bate mpodingkihi-ra , pai' tauna to mpakadingki' nono-ra , Pue' Ala mpomolangko-ra .
40023013	" Pai' koi' guru agama pai' to Parisi ! Bate mporata silaka-koi mpai' ! Lompe' hi mali-na-wadi-koi ! Tauna to doko' jadi' ntodea Alata'ala , nitagi-ra . Koi' moto uma dota jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala , pai' tau ntani'-na to doko' jadi' ntodea-na , nihalawai' lau-rada . ( (
40023014	" Silaka-koi , guru agama pai' to Parisi ! Lompe' hi mali-na-wadi-koi ! Nibagiu tobine tobalu pai' nihagoi tomi-ra . Pai' mosampaya-koi nipomoloe-loe , bona tewunii' gau'-ni to dada'a tetu . Motomo lia mpai' huku'-ni . ) )
40023015	" Silaka-koi , guru agama pai' to Parisi ! Lompe' hi mali-na-wadi-koi ! Mako' molaa-koi medipo tahi' modao' hi role-na , bona ngalai' ria nte hadua tauna to jadi' topetuku'-ni . Pai' ane ria-pi topetuku'-ni , nitudui'-ra mpotuku' pebagiu-ni , alaa-na meliu kadada'a gau'-ra ngkai koi' , pai' meliu kamasipato'-ra rahuku' hi naraka ngkai koi' .
40023016	" Bate silaka-koi mpai' ! Koi' hewa to wero to doko' mpotete' doo ! Metudui'-koi hewa toi : Ane ria tauna to mpobabehi pojanci pai' mosumpa-i mpokahangai' Tomi Alata'ala , ni'uli' uma-i tehoo' hante sumpa-na toe . Hiaa' ane mpokahangai'-i bulawa to hi rala Tomi Alata'ala , tehoo'-i hante sumpa-na toe .
40023017	Wojo mpu'u-koi , hewa to wero-koi ! Ha ni'uli'-koina bulawa to meliu ngkai Tomi Alata'ala ! Hiaa' bo Tomi Alata'ala toe-di to mpomoroli' bulawa to hi rala-na .
40023018	Metudui' wo'o-koi hewa toi : Ane tauna mosumpa mpokahangai' meja' pontunua pepue' to hi rala Tomi Alata'ala , uma-i tehoo' hante sumpa-na toe . Aga ane mpokahangai'-i pepue' to ratunu hi lolo meja' toe , ni'uli' bate tehoo'-i hante sumpa-na .
40023019	Hewa to wero mpu'u-koi ! Ha ni'uli'-koina , pepue' to meliu ngkai meja' pontunua pepue' ? Uma-e' , apa' meja' toe-di to mpomoroli' pepue' to hi lolo-nae .
40023020	Ane tauna mosumpa mpokahangai' meja' pontunua pepue' , batua-na mpokahangai'-i meja' toe pai' hawe'ea to ratunu hi lolo-na .
40023021	Pai' ane tauna mosumpa mpokahangai' Tomi Alata'ala , batua-na mpokahangai'-i Tomi Alata'ala pai' Alata'ala to mo'oha' hi tomi toe .
40023022	Pai' ane tauna mosumpa mpokahangai' suruga , batua-na mpokahangai'-i pohuraa Alata'ala , pai' mpokahangai' wo'o-i Alata'ala to mohura hi pohuraa toe .
40023023	" Silaka-koi , guru agama pai' to Parisi ! Lompe' hi mali-na-wadi-koi ! Ntahawe' hinu'a to kedi' , hewa tarangkada' , ngkoromonyi' pai' wunga bonea , nipopepue' hampobagiahampulu' hi Alata'ala . Hiaa' parenta hi rala Atura Pue' to bohe mpu'u , hewa po'ingku to monoa' , ma'ahi' hi doo , pai' mpo'ihii' janci , uma nisaile' . Kakoo-kono-na , ke parenta to bohe toe-hanale to kana nituku'-e , pai' neo' wo'o nilipo' mpotuku' parenta to kedi' .
40023024	Koi' hewa towero to mpotete' doo . Koi' hewa tauna to mpolali koromu' nete' ngkai ue ininu-ni , hiaa' hama'a unta , to bohe lia , ni'ome' lau .
40023025	" Silaka-koi , guru agama pai' to Parisi ! Lompe' hi mali-na-wadi-koi ! Koi' hewa tauna to mpobohoi' sangkiri' pai' piri hi mali-na-wadi , hiaa' hi rala-na babo' moto . Ada agama to kahiloa hi mali-na-wadi nituku' lia . Hiaa' hi rala nono-ni jampa pai' mpokahina anu doo-koi .
40023026	Hewa towero mpu'u-koi , koi' to Parisi ! Bohoi' ulu rala-na sangkiri' , bona lompe' wo'o to hi mali-na .
40023027	" Silaka-koi , guru agama pai' to Parisi ! Lompe' hi mali-na-wadi-koi ! Hewa daeo' to rasapuru' bula-koi : hi mali-na lompe'-damo hiloa-na , hiaa' bo hi rala-na paka' wuku kiu pai' wori' nyala to merungkui .
40023028	Wae wo'o koi' : ane hi pogau' to hi mali-na to rahilo doo , monoa'-koi . Hiaa' hi rala nono-ni topebagiu-koi pai' dada'a kehi-ni .
40023029	" Silaka-koi , guru agama pai' to Parisi ! Lompe' hi mali-na-wadi-koi ! Nipenasa-damo mpakalompe' daeo'-ra nabi-nabi pai' tauna to monoa' owi .
40023030	Molangko nono-ni , ni'uli' : ` Ane ke rapa'-na tuwu'-makai hingkala'ia hante totu'a-kai owi , ke uma-ka-kaina mpodohei-ra mpatehi nabi-nabi . '
40023031	Jadi' , nipangaku' moto kakoi'-na muli-ra to mpatehi nabi-nabi , pai' kehi ntu'a-ni tetu bate ni'uhi .
40023032	Wae-pi , pokaliliu lau-mi mpobabehi jeko' hewa to rababehi ntu'a-ni tetu !
40023033	" He topebagiu , he koi' to bengku' gau'-ni ! Ha ni'uli'-koina tewi'iha-koi mpai' ngkai huku'-ni hi rala naraka-e ?
40023034	Ntu'a-ni owi mpopatehi wori' tauna to monoa' ingku-ra , ntepu'u ngkai kampopatehi-ra Habel , tauna to monoa' ingku-na owi , rata-rata hi kampopatehi-ni Zakharia ana' Berekia , to nipatehi hi berewe Tomi Alata'ala hi olo' tomi to moroli' pai' meja' pontunua pepue' . Jadi' , hi koi' to tuwu' tempo toi , kupahawa' wo'o mpai' nabi , tauna to pante pai' guru to mpotudui'-koi lolita-ku . Hantongo'-ra mpai' nipatehi , hantongo'-ra niparika' , ria wo'o-ra to niweba' hi rala tomi posampayaa-ni , ria wo'o-ra to nidapa' hilou hi ngata-ngata petiboa'-ra . Ka'omea-na mpai' , koi' to tuwu' tempo toi-mi to mpokolo hawe'ea kasalaa' totu'a-ni to mpatehi tauna to monoa' owi .
40023035	
40023036	Wae mpu'u-di ! Koi' to tuwu' tempo toi bate rahuku' sabana hawe'ea kasalaa'-ra totu'a-ni toe .
40023037	" Ee to Yerusalem ! to Yerusalem ! Nipatehi-ra-koina nabi-nabi , pai' nipana' watu-ra-koina tauna to nasuro Alata'ala hi koi' . Wori' ngkani-mi kupehuka' ngkupui-koi , hewa hama'a manu' tina mpo'urui ana'-na hi une' pani'-na , aga uma-koi dota .
40023038	Bona ni'inca : tomi pepuea'-ni toi napalahii-kokoi mpai' Alata'ala .
40023039	Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi , uma-apa nihiloi , duu'-na rata tempo-na ni'uli' : ` Une'-imi to rata mpokeni hanga' Pue' Ala ! ' "
40024001	Malai-imi Yesus ngkai Tomi Alata'ala . Tumai-ramo ana'guru-na mpotudo'-ki kalompe' pompowangu-na tomi toe .
40024002	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Nihilo wa hawe'ea tohe'e-e lau ? Bona ni'inca : uma mpai' ria hamehaa' watu to bate pomeduncu-na . Bate ragero omea mpai' . "
40024003	Oti toe , hilou-imi Yesus mohura hi Bulu' Zaitun . Bula-na mohura , rata-ramo ana'guru-na nto'u uma ria tau ntani'-na , pai'-ra mpekune'-i : " Uli'-kakai ba nto'uma kadupa'-na to nu'uli' toe-e we'i , pai' napa mpai' to jadi' tanda karata-nu pai' kahudua dunia' toi . "
40024004	Natompoi' Yesus : " Pelompehi , neo'-koi ma'ala rabagiu .
40024005	Apa' wori' mpai' to mehupa' to mpo'uli' kahira'-na Magau' Topetolo' . Wori' mpai' tauna to rabagiu .
40024006	Mpo'epe-koi mpai' kareba panga'ea ngkai kalaa-na , ni'epe wo'o moni panga'ea to mohu' . Aga neo' me'eka' , apa' hawe'ea toe kana jadi' ulu , aga kajadia' toe uma mpobatuai karata-nami kahudua dunia' .
40024007	Nto'u toe mpai' , wori' ngata mosipanga'ei , magau' hadua mpo'ewa magau' kahadua-na , pai' hiapa-apa ria oro' pai' linu .
40024008	Aga hawe'ea toe lau lako' pontepu'ua-na-pidi , hewa pontodohaka hadua tobine to neo' mo'ana' .
40024009	" Nto'u toe mpai' , rahoko'-koi pai' ratonu hi tauna to mposesa' pai' mpopatehi-koi . Tauna humalili' dunia' mpokahuku'-koi sabana petuku'-ni hi Aku' .
40024010	Wori' tauna ngkala'ura ngkai petuku'-ra hi Aku' . Ria to mpewai' doo-ra hi bali'-ra . Wori' tauna momepokahuku' .
40024011	Pai' mehupa' wo'o wori' nabi boa' to mpobagiu wori' tauna .
40024012	Nto'u toe , kada'aa tauna katedoo-donihia , duu'-na mere'-mi ahi' tauna to wori' .
40024013	Aga tauna to tida mepangala' hi Aku' duu' hi ka'omea-na , hira'-mi to mporata kalompea' hi eo mpeno .
40024014	Pai' Kareba Lompe' to mpo'uli' beiwa Alata'ala jadi' Magau' , bate rapalele hi humalili' dunia' , bona hawe'ea manusia' ma'ala mpo'epe . Oti toe-di pai' lako' rata kahudua dunia' .
40024015	" Owi nabi Daniel mpolowa karata-na to rahanga' ` Topegerohi to dada'a . ' ( Hema to mpobasa lolita pelowa toe , penotohi batua-na ! ) Jadi' , ane nihilo to nalowa Daniel toe mokore hi tomi to moroli' ,
40024016	agina tauna to mo'oha' hi Yudea metibo' hilou hi bulu'-na .
40024017	Tauna to mohura hi parawa-na , neo'-pi leba' mesua' hi rala tomi-na mpo'ala' rewa-na .
40024018	Tauna to hi bonea , neo'-pi nculii' hi ngata mpo'ala' pohea-na . Kaliliu metibo' !
40024019	Mpe'ahii'-ra mpai' tobine to nto'u-ra motina'i pai' to mpentii' ana'-ra nto'u toe , apa' mokoro mpai' petibo'-ra .
40024020	Mekakae-koi hi Alata'ala bona eo petiboa'-ni toe neo' nto'u tempo lengi' ba nto'u eo pepuea' .
40024021	Apa' uma mowo pesesa' to mporumpa' manusia' nto'u toe , ko'ia ria jadi' ngkai lomo' kajadia' dunia' duu'-na rata tempo toi , pai' uma wo'o-pi mpai' ria jadi' hi eo boko'-na .
40024022	Aga naredehi moto mpai' Alata'ala tempo kaparia toe , apa' ane uma naredehi tempo-na , bate uma ria haduaa to tuwu' . Jadi' , apa' napoka'ahi'-ra tauna to napelihi , toe pai' naredehi mpai' tempo kaparia toe .
40024023	" Nto'u toe mpai' , ane ria to mpo'uli'-kokoi : ` Hilo , Magau' Topetolo' ohe'i-imi , ' ba ` Ohe'e-i mai , ' neo' nipangalai' .
40024024	Apa' mehupa' mpai' wori' tauna to boa' to mpo'uli' kahira'-na Magau' Topetolo' , ba to mpo'uli' kahira'-na nabi . Mpobabehi-ra tanda to mekoncehi lia pai' tanda to mobaraka' , bona mpobagiu-ra wori' tauna . Ane ke ma'ala , ntahawe' tauna to napelihi Alata'ala rabagiu wo'o .
40024025	Kiwoi-koi ! Ku'uli' ami'-mikokoi kako'ia-na jadi' .
40024026	" Jadi' , ane ria to mpo'uli'-kokoi : ` Hilo , Magau' Topetolo' oe-i ria hi papada to wao' ! ' neo'-koi hilou . Ane ra'uli' : ` Hilo , oe-i ria hi rala tomi ! ' neo' nipangalai' .
40024027	Apa' ane rata nculii'-apa mpai' Aku' Ana' Manusia' , karata-ku kahiloa hobo' hi dunia' , hewa pehini kila' to mehupa' hi mata'eo pai' mehini hilou hi kasoloa .
40024028	Ane ria anu mate , incana moto apa' wori' danci morumpu mpokoni' . Wae wo'o mpai' karata-ku nculii' hi dunia' , uma-a tumai ngkawuni , incana moto mpai' .
40024029	" Ane timpaliu-damo tempo kaparia toe , hawe'ea anu to mobaraka' hi langi' ralengo . Eo mobali' mobengi , wula uma-pi mehini , betue' roda' ngkai langi' .
40024030	Nto'u toe-damo mpai' , mehupa'-mi tanda hi langi' to mpobatuai karata-ku Aku' Ana' Manusia' . Pai' hawe'ea manusia' hi dunia' motantangi' , apa' rahilo-a hi lolo raoa mana'u tumai hi rala limu' , mobaraka'-a pai' uma mowo pehini-ku .
40024031	Sangkakala to bohe ratuwui' , pai' kuhubui mala'eka-ku hilou mporumpu tauna to kupobagia ngkai humalili' dunia' , ngkai wuntu-na hamali rata hi wuntu-na hamali .
40024032	" Petonoi-koi napa to kutudui'-kokoi hante lolita rapa' kaju ara . Ane nihilo rau-na mela' pai' mohulu-i , ni'inca-mi kaneo'-na mara eo .
40024033	Wae wo'o ane nihilo-damo hawe'ea kajadia' toe we'i lou , ni'inca-mi neo' madupa' mpu'u-mi to ku'uli' we'i .
40024034	Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : hawe'ea toe we'i bate madupa' kako'ia-na mate omea tauna to tuwu' tempo toi .
40024035	Langi' pai' dunia' mogero mpai' , tapi' lolita-ku bate-bate-na duu' kahae-hae-na .
40024036	" Aga ane eo pai' jaa kadupa'-na hawe'ea toe , wuwu Tuama-ku-wadi to mpo'inca . Uma ria to ntani'-na to mpo'inca . Bangku' mala'eka to hi rala suruga-hawoe' , uma wo'o-rawo ra'incai . Bangku' Aku' Ana'-nae' , uma wo'o-kuwo ku'incai .
40024037	Hewa to majadi' hi tempo nabi Nuh owi , hewa toe wo'o mpai' to jadi' hi eo karata-ku Aku' Ana' Manusia' .
40024038	Hi tempo nabi Nuh owi , kako'ia-na rata ue mowo' , manusia' lempe' moto , uma ra'incai napa to neo' mporumpa'-ra . Ntora ngkoni' pai' nginu-ra-wadi , rapoponcamoko pai' mepoponcamoko moto-ra , kawae-kawae-na duu'-na nabi Nuh mesua' hi rala sakaya bohe .
40024039	Karata-nami ue mowo' mpoliu'-ra , lako' monoto-rada napa to majadi' . Wae wo'o mpai' kalempe'-ra manusia' nto'u Aku' Ana' Manusia' nculii' tumai hi dunia' .
40024040	Nto'u toe mpai' , rodua tauna mo'ema' mobago hi bonea , hadua ra'ala' , to hadua rapalahii .
40024041	Rodua tobine to motongke' momanyu , hadua ra'ala' , to hadua rapalahii .
40024042	Toe pai' ku'uli' mo'inga'-inga'-koi , apa' uma ni'incai nto'uma Pue'-ni rata .
40024043	" Poinono lolita rapa'-ku toi : ane na'inca ami'-mi pue' tomi jaa hangkuja ngkabengia topanako rata , bate mo'inga'-inga'-i-hawo , uma napelele'-ra mesua' hi rala tomi-na .
40024044	Hewa toe wo'o kana rodo ami'-mokoi mpopea-a , apa' uma ni'incai tempo karata-ku Aku' Ana' Manusia' .
40024045	" Rapa'-na ria hadua batua to monoto nono-na pai' to tida mpobago bago maradika-na . Batua toei na'ongko' maradika-na jadi' topohawa' mpohawai' batua ntani'-na pai' mpowai'-ra pongkoni'-ra butu eo-na .
40024046	Uma mowo kamarasi'-na ane maradika-na rata nculii' ngkai pomakoa'-na pai' mporata-i bula-na mpobago bago-na .
40024047	Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi , maradika-na mpo'ongko'-i pai' mpowai'-i kuasa mpewili' hawe'ea ka'uaa'-na .
40024048	" Aga ane dada'a-di kehi-na batua toei , na'uli' hi rala nono-na : ` Uma-ile sohi' tumai maradika-e . '
40024049	Ngkai ree , natepu'u-mi mpoweba' hingka batua-na , pai'-i ntora ngkoni' pai' nginu hante tauna topalangu-langu .
40024050	Ntaa' we'i , bula-na lempe' moto hewa toe , muu-mule' rata-mi maradika-na hi eo pai' hi jaa to uma na'incai .
40024051	Batua toei raweba' ntarurua' , pai' rapetadi hi mali-na , rapohewa topebagiu . Hi ria-i geo' pai' ntodohaka .
40025001	" Ane rata nculii'-apa mpai' jadi' Magau' , kajadia' hewa lolita rapa' toi : Hampulu' toronaa mopatuju hilou mpotomu topemua' , hore-hore ngkeni hulu'-ra .
40025002	Lima-ra to wojo , lima-ra to monoto nono-ra .
40025003	Lima toronaa to wojo toera , ngkeni moto-ra hulu'-ra , aga uma-ra ngkeni lana .
40025004	Lima toronaa to monoto nono-ra mpokeni hulu'-ra hante lana talaa-ra .
40025005	Apa' mahae rahi karata topemua' , tetunu'-ramo toronaa toera , ka'omea-na leta' omea-ramo .
40025006	" Mentongo' bengi-mi , lako' ria-di tauna to mekio' , ra'uli' : ` Etu-imi tumai topemua' ! Mai-mokoi mpotomu-i . '
40025007	Pemata-rami toronaa to hampulu' toera , hore-hore mporodo hulu'-ra .
40025008	Toronaa to wojo mpo'uli'-raka ema'-ra to monoto nono-ra : ` Bale , mai-kaiwo lana-ni hangkedi' , neo' mate-mi-kaina hulu'-kai . '
40025009	" Ratompoi' to monoto nono-ra toera : ` Uma-kaiwo hono' ! Hilou-mokoi ulu me'oli hi topobalu' lana . '
40025010	Hilou-ramo-rawo toronaa to wojo toera mpo'oli lana . Lingku'-ra hilou , rata mpu'u-imi topemua' . Lima toronaa to monoto toera , apa' rodo ami'-mi-rana hulu'-ra , kaliliu mesua'-ramo dohe topemua' rala tomi posusaa' , pai' wobo' ra'unca-mi .
40025011	" Oti toe rata wo'o-ramo-rawo toronaa to wojo toera . Mekio'-ra ngkai mali-na , ra'uli' : ` Pue' ! Pue' ! Bea-kaka-kaiwo wobo' ! '
40025012	" Na'uli' topemua' : ` Uma-koi ku'incai . ' "
40025013	Napohudu Yesus lolita rapa'-na toe hewa toi : " Toe pai' kana mo'inga'-inga'-koi , apa' uma ni'incai nto'uma-a rata .
40025014	" Ane rata nculii'-apa mpai' jadi' Magau' , kajadi'-na hewa lolita rapa' tohe'i : Hadua maradika mopatuju hilou hi ngata to molaa . Kako'ia-na me'ongko' , mpokio'-i pahawaa'-na napontonui doi-na , bona lingku'-na rapopodaga rapali'-ki donihi-na .
40025015	Nawai'-ra hore-hore ntuku' pakulea'-ra . Hadua nawai' lima ncobu doi bulawa , to hadua roncobu , pai' to hadua wo'o hancobu . Pai'-i me'ongko'-mi .
40025016	Pahawaa' to mporata lima ncobu doi bulawa toei , kaliliu napopodaga mpali' donihi-na , narata mpu'u-mi donihi-na lima ncobu wo'o .
40025017	Wae wo'o pahawaa' to mporata roncobu , narata wo'o-hawo donihi-na roncobu .
40025018	Aga pahawaa' to mporata hancobu-wadi , hilou-i mpokae tana' napontawui doi maradika-na .
40025019	" Mahae ngkai ree , nculii'-imi maradika toei , pai' nakio'-ra pahawaa'-na , napongincai pompewili'-ra doi-na .
40025020	Pahawaa' to mporata lima ncobu doi bulawa , tumai-i mpotonu hi maradika-na hampulu' ncobu , na'uli' : ` Maradika , to nutonu-ka wengi lima ncobu . Hilo , oi-mi ana'-na , lima ncobu wo'o . '
40025021	" Na'uli' maradika-na : ` Lompe'-mi ! Nupopomako' lompe' pobago to kuwai'-koko . Wae-pi , apa' lawi' monoa'-ko hi to hangkedi' , kusarumaka lau-moko hi to wori' . Mai-moko , mo'oha' hante aku' , pai' goe'-moko hangkaa-ngkania hante aku' . '
40025022	" Pahawaa' to mporata roncobu doi bulawa , rata wo'o-imi-hawo , na'uli' : ` Maradika , roncobu wengi to nuwai'-ka . Hilo , oi-mi ana'-na roncobu wo'o . '
40025023	" Na'uli' maradika toei : ` Lompe'-mi ! Nupopomako' lompe' pobago to kuwai'-koko . Wae-pi , apa' lawi' monoa'-ko hi to hangkedi' , kusarumaka lau-moko hi to wori' . Mai-moko , mo'oha' hante aku' , pai' goe'-moko hangkaa-ngkania hante aku' . '
40025024	" Oti toe , rata wo'o-imi-hawo pahawaa' to mporata hancobu , na'uli' : ` Maradika , ku'inca kaseke-nu . Nupepae to bela-kowo hinu'a-nu , nu'ala' to uma nukarokoi .
40025025	Me'eka'-a , toe pai' hilou-a mpowuni doi-nu hi rala tana' . Jadi' , ohe'i-mi doi-nu nculii' . '
40025026	" Na'uli'-mi maradika toei : ` Iko pahawaa' to dada'a pai' to lose ! Ane nu'inca kampepae-ku to bela hinu'a-ku , ane nu'inca kampo'ala'-ku to uma kukarokoi ,
40025027	napa pai' uma nupopesua' lau doi-ku hi bank , bona ane rata-apa , kurua' nculii' hante ana'-na ! '
40025028	Na'uli' wo'o-mi maradika toei hi pahawaa' kahadua-na : ` Ala' doi to hi hi'a , wai'-ki to ria-ki hampulu' ncobu .
40025029	Apa' tauna to rasarumaka hante anu to rawai'-ki , rawai' tena-i-pidi bona kawoo-woria'-ki . Aga tauna to uma rasarumaka , anu hangkedi' to ria hi hi'a , ra'alai' lau-imi .
40025030	Pai' pahawaa' to uma motuju tetui , petadi-imi hi mali-na hi kabengia-na . Hi ria-i ntora geo' pai' ntodohaka . '
40025031	" Aku' Ana' Manusia' , ane rata nculii'-apa mpai' , mehini mpu'u-mi baraka'-ku , pai' radohei-a hawe'ea mala'eka-ku . Mohura-a mpai' moparenta hewa Magau' hi pohuraa to ncola .
40025032	Hawe'ea manusia' morumpu hi nyanyoa-ku pai' kugaa'-ra jadi' rontuda , hewa hadua topo'ewu mpogaa' bima ngkai kebe' .
40025033	Tauna to mpobabehi konoa Alata'ala kupahantuda hi mali ka'ana-ku , pai' tauna topesapuaka hi mali ki'ii-ku .
40025034	" Pai' Aku' Magau' , ku'uli'-raka to hi mali ka'ana-ku : ` Mai-mokoi to nagane' Tuama-ku ! Mesua'-mokoi hi rala Kamagaua'-ku , po'ohaa'-ni kuporodo ami'-mikokoi ngkai lomo' kajadi' dunia' .
40025035	Apa' nto'u-ku mo'oro' , niwai'-a pongkoni' . Ngkamara-a , niwai'-a ue ininu . Liu-a hi tomi-ni , nipopehani-a .
40025036	Uma ria pohea-ku , niwai'-a pohea . Peda'-a , nikinomo-a . Hi rala tarungku'-a , nipencuai'-a . '
40025037	" Metompoi'-ra to hi mali ka'ana-ku , ra'uli' : ` Pue' , nto'uma-ko kihilo mo'oro' pai' kiwai'-ko koni' , ba ngkamara pai' kiwai'-ko ue ?
40025038	Nto'uma-ko liu hi tomi-kai , pai' kipopehani-ko ? Nto'uma-ko kihilo uma ria pohea-nu , pai' kiwai'-ko pohea ?
40025039	Nto'uma-ko kihilo peda' ba hi rala tarungku' , pai' tilou-kai mpencuai'-ko ? '
40025040	" Pai' Aku' Magau' , kutompoi'-ra : ` Bona ni'inca : napa to nibabehi mpotulungi ompi'-ku tohe'ira lau , nau' hadua ompi'-ku to kedi' lia katuwu'-na , batua-na , hibalia nibabehi hi Aku'-mi . '
40025041	" Oti toe mpai' , ku'uli'-raka to hi mali ki'ii-ku : ` Malai-mokoi ngkai rei , koi' to natotowi Tuama-ku ! Mesua'-mokoi hi rala apu to jela' ncuu , to raporodo ami'-miki Magau' Anudaa' pai' mala'eka to mpotuku'-i .
40025042	Apa' nto'u-ku mo'oro' , uma-a niwai' koni' . Ngkamara-a , uma-a niwai' ue ininu .
40025043	Liu-a hi tomi-ni , uma-a nipopehani . Uma ria pohea-ku , uma-a niwai' pohea . Peda'-a , hi rala tarungku'-a , uma-a nipencuai' . '
40025044	" Ra'uli' wo'o-mi-rawo mpai' mpo'uli'-ka : ` Pue' , nto'uma-ko kihilo mo'oro' ba ngkamara ba hewa tauna toliu , ba uma-ko moheai , ba peda' ba ratarungku' , pai' uma-ko kitulungi ? '
40025045	" Pai' Aku' Magau' , kutompoi'-ra : ` Bona ni'inca : apa' uma-koina nitulungi-ra tauna to kedi' tuwu'-ra tohe'i-era lau , batua-na , Aku'-mi to uma nitulungi tetu-e . ' "
40025046	Napohudu Yesus lolita-na , na'uli' : " Hawe'ea tauna to dada'a toera lau ratadi hi rala naraka pai' rahuku' duu' kahae-hae-na , pai' tauna to monoa' mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na . "
40026001	Kahudu-na Yesus mpololita hawe'ea tohe'e , na'uli' mpo'uli'-raka ana'guru-na :
40026002	" Ni'inca wa karo'eo-na-damo eo bohe Paskah ? Pai' Aku' Ana' Manusia' rapewai' hi pale bali'-ku bona raparika' . "
40026003	Nto'u toe , imam pangkeni pai' totu'a to Yahudi morumpu hi tomi Imam Bohe to rahanga' Kayafas .
40026004	Mohawa'-ramo , ra'uli' : " Beiwa akala-ta mpolede pai' mpohoko' Yesus bona rapatehi-ie ?
40026005	Agina neo' ulu tahoko'-i nto'u eo bohe , nee-neo' mpai' bara' ntodea . "
40026006	Nto'u Yesus hi ngata Betania , hilou-i hi tomi hadua tauna to rahanga' Simon topohaki' poko' .
40026007	Bula-na hi ree , rata hadua tobine ngkeni hameha' butolo' ihia' lana honga to masuli' lia oli-na . Bula-na Yesus ngkoni' , tumai tobine toei mpotua lana honga toe hi woo'-na tanda pebila'-na .
40026008	Karahilo-na ana'guru-na napa to nababehi tobine toei , moroe-ramo , ra'uli' : " Napa-hawo pai' rakerei lana to masuli' oli-na hewa tetu ?
40026009	Ke agina rapobalu' lau bona oli-na rawai'-raka tokabu . "
40026010	Na'inca Yesus pekiri-ra , toe pai' na'uli'-raka : " Napa pai' nipedahi nono-na tobine toei ! To nababehi hi Aku' toe-le , lompe' .
40026011	Apa' tokabu-hana , ria oa' loga-ni mpotulungi-ra apa' ria oa'-ra doo-ni . Aga Aku' , uma-a mpai' ria oa' doo-ni .
40026012	Natuai-a hante lana toe , mpakasadia ami' woto-ku hi karatana-ku mpai' .
40026013	Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : hi humalili' dunia' , hiapa-apa Kareba Lompe' rapalele , napa to nababehi tobine toei we'i bate ralolita , uma mpai' ralipo'-lipo' . "
40026014	Nto'u toe , hadua ngkai ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua , to rahanga' Yudas Iskariot , hilou hi imam pangkeni .
40026015	Na'uli'-raka : " Ane kutonu Yesus hi rala pale-ni , napa to niwai'-ka ? " Rabila'-mi doi pera' tolu mpulu' , pai' rawai'-ki .
40026016	Ngkai ree , Yudas mpopali' loga to lompe' mpobalu' Yesus hi bali'-na .
40026017	Hi eo to lomo'-na hi Posusa' Roti to Uma Raragii , rata-ramo ana'guru-na hi Yesus , ra'uli'-ki : " Hiapa konoa-nu kiporodo pongkoni' Paskah to takoni'-e mpai' ? "
40026018	Na'uli'-raka : " Hilou-mokoi hi rala ngata hi tomi ni'anu , uli'-ki hewa toi : ` Na'uli' Guru : Rata-mi tempo-ku , doko'-a mo'eo bohe Paskah hi tomi-nu hante ana'guru-ku . ' "
40026019	Ana'guru Yesus toera , hilou mpu'u-ramo hewa to nahubui-raka , pai'-ra mporodo-mi pongkoni' Paskah .
40026020	Kamobengi-na , Yesus hante ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua mohura ngkoni' .
40026021	Bula-ra ngkoni' toe , na'uli'-mi Yesus : " Pe'epei-koi : hadua ngkai olo'-ni mpobalu'-a mpai' hi bali'-ku . "
40026022	Mpo'epe tohe'e , peda'-mi nono-ra ana'guru-na , pai' mepekune'-ramo hadua bo hadua hi Yesus , ra'uli' : " Bela-hawo aku' to nutoa'-e Pue' ? "
40026023	Na'uli' Yesus : " Tauna to mpololo' roti hi banga' uta hangkaa-ngkania hante Aku' , hi'a-mi to mpobalu'-a .
40026024	Makono mpu'u , Aku' Ana' Manusia' bate mate hewa to ralowa hi rala Buku Tomoroli'-e . Aga mpe'ahii' tauna to mpobalu'-a tetui . Ke lompe' lau-pi ane uma-i na'ote tina-na . "
40026025	Ngkai ree , na'uli' wo'o-mi-hawo Yudas , to mpobalu'-ie mpai' : " Bela-hawo aku' to nutoa'-e Guru ? " Na'uli' Yesus : " Hewa to nu'uli' tetu-midi ! "
40026026	Bula-ra ngkoni' , na'ala'-mi Yesus roti pai' naposampayai mpo'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala . Oti toe , napihe-pihe pai' natonu-raka ana'guru-na , na'uli' : " Ala'-mi , koni'-mi . Toi-mi woto-ku . "
40026027	Oti toe na'ala' wo'o sangkiri' to ihia' anggur , na'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala pai' natonu-raka , na'uli' : " Nginu-mokoi omea ,
40026028	apa' toi-mi raa'-ku to rabowo ane mate-a mpai' . Raa'-ku toi mpai' mporohoi pojanci to mpoposidai' Alata'ala hante manusia' , bona jeko' tauna to wori' ra'ampungi .
40026029	Bona ni'inca : ntepu'u ngkai wae lau , uma-apa nginu anggur duu'-na rata tempo-na Tuama-ku jadi' Magau' hi dunia' bo'u . Nto'u toe mpai' mpo'inu-a anggur to bo'u hangkaa-ngkania hante koi' hi rala Kamagaua'-na . "
40026030	Oti toe morona'-ramo hanyala rona' pe'une' . Kahudu-ra morona' , malai-ramo ngkai ngata hilou hi Bulu' Zaitun .
40026031	Na'uli'-mi Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Bengi toe mpai' lau , hawe'ea-ni , molengo pepangala'-ni hi Aku' , apa' ria te'uki' Lolita Alata'ala to mpo'uli' hewa toi : ` Kupatehi topo'ewu toei , pai' bima inewu-na pagaa'-gaa'-ramo . '
40026032	Aga ane tuwu' nculii'-apa mpai' , meri'ulu-a hilou hi tana' Galilea , bona hirua' hi ria-ta-damo mpai' . "
40026033	Ngkai ree , na'uli'-mi Petrus : " Nau' hawe'ea tauna molengo pepangala'-ra hi Iko Pue' , aku' uma ! "
40026034	Na'uli' Yesus : " Mpu'u ku'uli'-koko : kako'ia-na turua' manu' bengi toe mpai' lau , mpolia' tolu ngkani-moko mposapu kanu'inca-ku . "
40026035	Na'uli' Petrus : " Nau'-a mate hangkaa-ngkania dohe-nu , uma mpu'u kusapu kaku'inca-nu ! " Wae wo'o-rawo pololita-ra ana'guru-na to ntani'-na .
40026036	Oti toe , rata-ramo hi pampa to rahanga' Getsemani . Hi ree-i mpo'uli'-raka ana'guru-na : " Koi' , mohura hi rei-mokoi . Aku' , lou hi ree-a mai ulu mosampaya . "
40026037	Aga Petrus pai' ana' Zebedeus to rodua , nabawai-ra hilou dohe-na . Nto'u toe , susa' pai' mokaratu-mi nono-na .
40026038	Na'uli'-raka : " Susa' lia nono-ku , hewa to neo' mate-ama ku'epe . Rehe'i-mokoi ulu , dohei-a mojaga . "
40026039	Oti toe hilou-imi molaa hangkedi' , pai'-i motumpa , mosampaya , na'uli' : " Tuama-ku , ane ma'ala , pomolaa-ka-kuwo kaparia to neo' mporumpa'-a toi . Aga bela konoa-ku Aku' to jadi' , agina konoa-nu Iko moto . "
40026040	Oti toe , nculii'-imi hi ana'guru-na to tolu toera , narata-ra bula-ra leta' moto . Na'uli' mpo'uli'-ki Petrus : " Hilo ! Hajaa-wadi uma nidadahi mojaga dohe-ku ?
40026041	Mojaga pai' mosampaya-mokoi bona neo'-koi mporata pesori . Hi rala nono-ni dota moto-koi mpobabehi to makono , aga uma nidadahi apa' manusia' bate lente . "
40026042	Ngkai ree , hilou wo'o-imi mosampaya , na'uli' : " Tuama-ku , ane kaparia toi uma ma'ala rawi'iha-ka , bate konoa-numi to majadi' . "
40026043	Oti toe , nculii' wo'o-imi mporata ana'guru-na , leta' wo'o-ra-wadi apa' mopoke' mata-ra .
40026044	Hangkani wo'o-ipi Yesus mpalahii-ra hilou mosampaya katolu ngkani-na . Posampaya-na toe hibalia hante posampaya-na to we'i .
40026045	Ka'oti-na mosampaya toe , nculii' wo'o-imi hi ana'guru-na to tolu toera , pai' na'uli'-raka : " Turu pai' leta' oa'-pada-koi ? Hilo-dile , rata-mi tempo-na Aku' Ana' Manusia' rapobalu' pai' ratonu hi tauna to dada'a .
40026046	Memata-mokoi ! Hilo , etu-imi tumai tauna to mpobalu'-a . Kita-mi lou . "
40026047	Bula-na Yesus mololita-pidi , rata-imi Yudas , hadua ngkai ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua . Pai' dohe-na wori' wo'o tau ntani'-na to ngkeni piho' pai' sumampu . Hira' toe rapahawa' imam pangkeni pai' totu'a to Yahudi .
40026048	Yudas mpo'uli' ami'-miraka tanda bona ra'inca kato'uma-nai Yesus , na'uli' : " Hema mpai' to ku'eki , Hi'a-mi Yesus . Hoko'-imi ! "
40026049	Jadi' , karata-ra hi ree , kahilou-nami Yudas mpohirua'-ki Yesus , na'uli' : " Wori' tabe , Guru ! " pai' na'eki-i ntuku' ada-ra to Yahudi .
40026050	Na'uli' Yesus : " Toe-tanoe pai' tumai-koe , bale ! " Katumai-rami tauna to wori' mpohoko' Yesus .
40026051	Ngkai ree , hadua tauna to dohe Yesus mpowute' piho'-na natime-ki batua Imam Bohe , bela mpoholu tilinga-na .
40026052	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki : " Unco' nculii' piho'-nu ! Apa' hema to mpohenta piho' mpopatehi doo , bate rapatehi wo'o-i-hawo mpai' hante piho' .
40026053	Ha uma nu'incai , ane mpopetulungi-a hi Tuama-ku , napesahui mpahawa' tumai hampulu' rontuda tantara mala'eka-na , ba melabi tena !
40026054	Aga ane ta'ewa-ra to mpohoko'-a toi-e , uma mpai' madupa' lolita to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' owi to mpo'uli' hawe'ea toe lau kana majadi' hi Aku' . "
40026055	Nto'u toe , na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus mpo'uli'-raka tauna to wori' toera : " Ha toperampaki-a toi-e , pai' mingki' tumai-koi ntali piho' pai' sumampu mpohoko'-ae ! Butu eo-na mohura moto-a hi rala Tomi Alata'ala metudui' , napa pai' uma-a nihoko' nto'u toe ?
40026056	Aga to hewa toi-le kana majadi' , bona madupa'-mi napa to ra'uki' nabi-nabi owi hi rala Buku Tomoroli' . " Oti toe , metibo'-ramo hawe'ea ana'guru-na mpalahii-i .
40026057	Ngkai ree , tauna to mpohoko' Yesus mpokeni-i hilou hi tomi Imam Bohe Kayafas . Hi ria morumpu-ramo guru-guru agama pai' totu'a to Yahudi .
40026058	Petrus metuku' ngkawao-wadi , duu'-na rata hi berewe tomi Imam Bohe . Mesua'-i hi berewe pai'-i mohura dohe topojaga , apa' doko' na'inca ba napa mpai' to majadi' hi Yesus .
40026059	Nto'u toe , imam pangkeni pai' hawe'ea topohura agama morumpu hi tomi Kayafas . Mpali'-ra sabi' boa' to mpakilu Yesus , bona ngalai' rahuku' mate-i .
40026060	Aga nau' wori' sabi' boa' to mpo'uli' napa to nababehi Yesus , uma raruai' to masipato' rahuku' mate-ki . Ka'omea-na , ria rodua sabi' to tumai hi nyanyoa topohura to hibalia lolita-ra ,
40026061	ra'uli' : " Tauna toii , ria-i-hana mpo'uli' : ` Tomi Alata'ala ma'ala kugero , pai' rala-na tolu eo kuwangu nculii' . ' "
40026062	Kamokore-nami Imam Bohe pai'-i mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Ha uma nutompoi'-ra to mpakilu-ko toe-e ? "
40026063	Aga Yesus , uma-i winihi . Na'uli' wo'o-mi Imam Bohe : " Hante hanga' Alata'ala to Tuwu' , uli'-kakai to makono ! Makono mpu'u ka' Iko-na Magau' Topetolo' , Ana' Alata'ala-e ? "
40026064	Na'uli' Yesus : " Io' , hewa to nu'uli' tetu-e . Pai' ku'uli' tena : rata mpai' tempo-na nihilo-a Aku' Ana' Manusia' , mohura pai' moparenta hi mali ka'ana Alata'ala to Mobaraka' , pai' nihilo wo'o-a mpai' mana'u tumai ngkai suruga hi rala limu' . "
40026065	Mpo'epe toe we'i , Imam Bohe mpoheu' baju-na ngkai kamoroe-na , pai' na'uli' : " Tau toii mpopohibalia woto-na hante Alata'ala ! Uma-pi mingki' ria sabi' . Ni'epe moto-mi-koiwo lolita-na mpokedi' Alata'ala .
40026066	Beiwa-mi-koiwo pompowile-nie ? " Ratompoi' topohura : " Kana rahuku' mate-imile ! "
40026067	Ngkai ree , ra'uelikui lio-na pai'-i raweba' . Ria wo'o to mpohopo'-i , pai' ra'uli'-ki :
40026068	" Ee Magau' Topetolo' ! Pe'uli' pe' ba hema to mpohopo'-koe ! "
40026069	Nto'u toe , Petrus mohura hi berewe . Nto'u pohura-na toe , tumai hadua tobine to mobago hi tomi Imam Bohe , na'uli'-ki Petrus : " Ba iko wo'o-di doo-na Yesus to Galilea toei-e mai ? "
40026070	Aga nasapu Petrus hi nyanyoa-ra omea , na'uli' : " Uma-kuna ku'incai napa to nu'uli' ! "
40026071	Ngkai ree hilou wo'o-imi Petrus mokore mohu' hi wobo' wala . Ria wo'o hadua tobine mpohilo-i pai' mpo'uli'-raka tauna to hi ree : " Hi'a toi wo'o-le to dohe Yesus to Nazaret toei-e mai . "
40026072	Nasapu wo'o-wadi Petrus hante mosumpa , na'uli' : " Uma-kuna ku'incai-i tau tetui ! "
40026073	Uma mahae ngkai ree , tauna to mokore hi ree mpomohui' Petrus , ra'uli'-ki : " Iko mpu'u-di hadua doo-nae ! Incana ngkai kotu basa-nu Katogalilea-nu . "
40026074	Mosumpa tena-i Petrus mpotuna' woto-na , na'uli' : " Uma mpu'u-kuwo ku'incai-i ! " Nto'u toe turua'-mi manu' .
40026075	Nakiwoi-mi Petrus lolita Yesus ngone to mpo'uli'-ki : " Kako'ia-na turua' manu' , mpolia' tolu ngkani-moko mposapu kanu'inca-ku . " Kamalai-nami Petrus hilou hi mali-na , pai'-i geo' ngkai kapeda' nono-na .
40027001	Mepupulo ngkii , hawe'ea imam pangkeni pai' totu'a to Yahudi mpobotuhi : Yesus kana rapatehi .
40027002	Jadi' , rahoo'-imi pai' rakeni hilou rabua' hi Gubernur Pilatus .
40027003	Ane Yudas , to mpobalu' Yesus hi bali'-na toei , kana'inca-na karahuku' mate-na mpai' Yesus , soho'-mi nono-na . Kahilou-nami hi imam pangkeni pai' totu'a to Yahudi , napoponculi'-raka doi pera' to tolu mpulu' mpepa' ,
40027004	pai' na'uli' : " Mojeko'-ama ! Mpobalu'-a-kuna tauna to uma masala' , alaa-na rahuku' mate-i ! " Ratompoi'-i : " Napa ki'uli' kai' ! Iko moto-kowo pue' sala' ! "
40027005	Ngkai ree , Yudas mpetadi doi tohe'e hi rala Tomi Alata'ala , pai'-i hilou mengkahunca' .
40027006	Imam pangkeni mpotima' doi toe , pai' ra'uli' : " Doi toi , doi posula' raa' . Ntuku' atura agama , doi to hewa tohe'e uma ma'ala rapuna' hi rala peti' pompunaa' doi pepue' hi Tomi Alata'ala . "
40027007	Hibalia-mi pohawa'-ra , doi toe ra'oli-ki tana' to rahanga' Tana' Topobabehi Kura , bona tana' toe rapontanai-raka tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi .
40027008	Toe pai' tana' toe rahanga' Tana' Raa' duu' tempo toi .
40027009	Hante babehia-ra toe , madupa'-mi napa to nalowa nabi Yeremia owi , hewa toi moni-na : " Ntuku' ada to Israel , oli hadua batua tolu mpulu' doi pera' . Jadi' , ra'ala'-mi tolu mpulu' doi pera' toe ,
40027010	pai' ra'oli-ki tana' topobabehi kura . Tohe'e majadi' ntuku' hawa' Pue' Alata'ala hi aku' . "
40027011	Ane Yesus we'i , karakeni-na hi Gubernur Pilatus , mokore-i hi nyanyoa-na . Pilatus mpekune'-i : " Ha Iko mpu'u-mi Magau' to Yahudi-e ? " Na'uli' Yesus : " Wae mpu'u , hewa to nu'uli' tetu . "
40027012	Imam pangkeni pai' totu'a to Yahudi mpodulu mpakilu-i . Aga uma-i winihi .
40027013	Toe pai' Pilatus mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Ha uma nu'epei hawe'ea to rapakilu-kokoe ? "
40027014	Uma hamelaa nahono' Yesus , alaa-na napokakonce lia Gubernur .
40027015	Butu eo bohe Paskah , Gubernur biasa mpobahaka hadua tauna to ratarungku' , ba hema konoa ntodea .
40027016	Jadi' , mpae toe , ria hadua to ratarungku' to ra'inca lia ntodea . Hanga'-na Yesus Barabas .
40027017	Jadi' , hi pohura-na Pilatus mpohurai kara-kara Yesus toe , wori'-mi tauna morumpu . Mepekune' Pilatus mpekune'-ra : " Hema to nipokono kubahaka-kokoi mpae tohe'i ? Yesus Barabas , ba Yesus to rahanga' Kristus-di ? "
40027018	Pilatus mpo'uli' hewa toe , apa' na'inca ka'uma-na-hawo masala'-i Yesus ; pangkeni to Yahudi mpotonu Yesus hi hi'a apa' kamohingi'-ra-wadi .
