40027019	Nto'u pohura-na Pilatus hi pohuraa pobotuhia toe , rata suro ngkai tobine-na to mpo'uli'-ki : " Neo'-konae' nuhuku'-i tauna to uma masala' tetui ! Apa' ngkai Hi'a alaa-ku mo'ompo' to mekoroi' bengi ngone-e . "
40027020	Aga imam pangkeni pai' totu'a to Yahudi , kaliliu moto-ra mpo'ukei' ntodea , ra'uli'-raka : " Perapi'-koi hi Gubernur bona Barabas nabahaka , pai' Yesus to nahuku' mate ! "
40027021	Jadi' , mepekune' Gubernur Pilatus hi ntodea , na'uli' : " Ngkai hira' rodua tohe'i , hema to nipokono kubahaka-kokoi ? " Ratompoi' : " Barabas ! "
40027022	Napekune' tena Pilatus : " Ane wae , kupopai-imi Yesus to rahanga' Kristus ? " Metompoi'-ra omea : " Raparika'-i ! "
40027023	Mepekune' tena-i-pidi Pilatus : " Hiaa' napa sala'-na ? " Rapesukui lau-mi mejeu' : " Parika'-imi ! "
40027024	Ka'omea-na nahilo Pilatus uma-pi ria kalaua-na mpololitai-ra , apa' kameroo-rodoa' lau-ramo . Toe pai' na'ala' ue napowano hi nyanyoa ntodea pai' na'uli' : " Mowano-a ! Bona nihilo , ka'uma-na-kuwo kugalo kanipatehi-na tau toii ! Koi' moto-koiwo to mpotangku . "
40027025	Metompoi' ntodea , ra'uli' : " Io' , kai' moto-kaiwo pai' hante muli-kai to mpokolo kamate-na . "
40027026	Ngkai ree , nabahaka-miraka Barabas , pai' nahubui tantara-na mpoweba' Yesus . Oti toe natonu-miraka bona raparika' .
40027027	Oti toe , tantara Gubernur mpokeni Yesus mesua' hi rala tomi Gubernur , pai'-ra mpokio' hawe'ea doo-ra tumai mpotipuhi-i .
40027028	Raroncu-ki pohea-na pai' rapasuai'-i baju to mperelei to hewa baju magau' .
40027029	Rababehi hameha' songko ngkai walaa to morui to hewa songko magau' , pai' rasongkoi-ki . Rawai' wo'o-i lua' hameha' hi pale ka'ana-na , hewa lua' to nakamu magau' , pai'-ra mowingkotu' hi nyanyoa-na , ra'uli' : " Wori' tabe , Magau' to Yahudi ! "
40027030	Ra'uelikui-i pai' ra'ala' lua' to hi pale-na rapao'-ki woo'-na .
40027031	Ka'oti-na rapopo'ore' hewa toe , raroncu-mi baju to rabajui-ki we'i pai' ra'uncoi' nculii'-i pohea-na moto-mi . Oti toe rakeni-imi hilou hi mali ngata bona raparika' .
40027032	Hi lengko ohea hirua'-ra hante hadua tauna to rahanga' Simon to Kirene . Tantara to Roma mpewuku Simon toe mpopaha'a kaju parika'-na Yesus .
40027033	Uma mahae rata-ramo hi po'ohaa' to rahanga' Golgota , batua-na Bulu' Banga'woo' .
40027034	Hi ree , Yesus rapopo'inui anggur to ragalo hante pokuli' to mopai' . Ka'oti-na napemita , oja'-i mpo'inu .
40027035	Raparika'-imi , pai' pohea-na rabagi-bagi hante ntene' undi hewa pompenoa'-ra .
40027036	Oti toe , mohura-ramo hilau mojaga .
40027037	Hi kaju parika'-na hi lolo woo'-na rapataka' hampepa' papan . Hi papan toe te'uki' napa to rapakilu-ki Yesus , hewa toi moni-na : TOI-MI YESUS MAGAU' TO YAHUDI .
40027038	Ria wo'o rodua toperampaki raparika' dohe-na , hadua mali ka'ana-na hadua mali ki'ii-na .
40027039	Tauna to liu hi ree , ngkololi-ra mpopo'ore'-i ,
40027040	ra'uli' : " Nu'uli'-kona mpogero-ko Tomi Alata'ala pai' nuwangu nculii' rala-na tolu eo ! Ane Ana' Alata'ala mpu'u-ko , tulungi woto-nu moto ! Mana'u-moko ngkai kaju parika' tetu ! "
40027041	Wae wo'o imam pangkeni , guru agama pai' totu'a to Yahudi mpopo'ore'-i , ra'uli' :
40027042	" Tau ntani'-na natulungi-ramo , woto-na moto-pi uma nakulei' ntulungi . Hiaa' bo Hi'a he'e Magau' to Israel ! Agina mana'u-i ngkai kaju parika'-na toe , pai' lako' tapangala'-i .
40027043	Ncarumaka Alata'ala-i , pai' na'uli' Ana' Alata'ala-i . Mai tahilo Alata'ala mpobahaka-i , ane dota-i . "
40027044	Ntahawe' toperampaki to raparika' dohe-na , meruge' wo'o-ra-rawo mporuge'-i hewa toe .
40027045	Tebua'-mi eo , muu-mule' mobengi hobo' hi ngata toe rala-na tolu jaa .
40027046	Jaa tolu ncimonou' , mekio'-imi Yesus napasimuku mpo'uli' : " Alata'ala-ku ! Alata'ala-ku ! Napa pai' nupalahii-a ? " Hi rala basa Yahudi : " Eli ! Eli ! Lama sabakhtani ? "
40027047	Ba hangkuja dua to mokore mohu' hi kaju parika'-na mpo'epe pe'au-na toe , ra'uli' : " Epe , mpokio' nabi Elia-i ! "
40027048	Ria hadua to mokeno hilou mpo'ala' hampu'u wunga to hewa lomo' , nabangkahi hi rala ue anggur to mo'onco , natu'u hi wuntu hompea pai' napopoju'ui-ki Yesus bona na'inu .
40027049	Ria wo'o to mpo'uli' : " Popea ulu , tahilo ba tumai mpu'u-i Elia mpotulungi-i . "
40027050	Oti toe me'au tena-i Yesus napesukui , pai' modupe'-mi inoha'-na .
40027051	Nto'u toe , kain porini-olo' to tetoe hi rala Tomi Alata'ala muu-mule' mobika' ntongo' ngkai lolo-na rata hi une'-na . Ria wo'o linu , pai' watu bohe paheka'-heka' .
40027052	Wori' daeo' mobea-mi , pai' wori' tauna to monoa' ingku-ra owi rapotuwu' nculii' .
40027053	Ka'oti-na Yesus tuwu' nculii' , mehupa'-ra ngkai daeo'-ra , pai'-ra mesua'-hi ngata Yerusalem , ngata to moroli' toe . Wori' tauna mpohilo-ra .
40027054	Tadulako tantara hante tantara-tantara doo-na to mpojaga Yesus , me'eka' lia-ramo mpo'epe linu pai' mpohilo hawe'ea to jadi' toe . Ra'uli' : " Ana' Alata'ala mpu'u-i-tawo' ! "
40027055	Hi ree , wori' wo'o tobine to menaa ngkawao . Hira' toe tobine to mpotuku' pai' mpotulungi Yesus , ntepu'u ngkai pobago-na hi tana' Galilea .
40027056	Hanga'-na to hadua , Maria Magdalena . To hadua wo'o , Maria tina-na Yakobus pai' Yusuf . Pai' hadua wo'o tobine-na Zebedeus .
40027057	Neo' limpa-mi eo , tumai hadua tauna to mo'ua' to ngkai ngata Arimatea , hanga'-na Yusuf . Yusuf toei , topetuku' Yesus wo'o-i-hawo .
40027058	Hilou-i hi Pilatus mperapi' woto Yesus . Pilatus mpohubui tantara-na mpowai'-i Yusuf woto-na Yesus .
40027059	Na'ala' mpu'u-mi , naputu' hante kain to bula ,
40027060	pai' napopoturu hi rala daeo' . Daeo' toe , daeo' to bo'u-pidi , daeo' pomporodoa-na Yusuf moto , to ratowi hi panapa bulu' watu . Oti toe , naluli' hameha' watu to bohe na'unca-ki daeo' toe , pai'-i malai-mi .
40027061	Aga Maria Magdalena pai' Maria to ntani'-na , mohura-ra hi mai hi mali daeo' .
40027062	Kamepulo-na hi Eo Sabat , imam-imam pangkeni pai' to Parisi hilou hangkaa-ngkania hi Pilatus ,
40027063	ra'uli' : " Tua Gubernur , kikiwoi lolita topebagiu toei ngone lou , bula-na tuwu'-pidi na'uli' : ` Kaliu-na tolu eo , tuwu' nculii'-a . '
40027064	Jadi' , toe pai' kiperapi' bona Tua mpohubui tantara hilou mpojaga daeo'-na toe ria , radongo lompe' duu'-na rata hi eo katolu-na , bona neo' ria loga ana'guru-na lou mpanako woto-na . Ra'uli' mpai' hi ntodea tuwu' nculii'-i , duu'-na wori'-mi tauna to rabagiu . Helee , meliu lau-mi mpai' kawori' tauna to mpotuku'-i ngkai to mpotuku'-i bula-na tuwu'-pidi . "
40027065	Na'uli' Pilatus : " Ria moto tantara . Keni-ramo hilou mpodongo daeo'-na hudupakulea'-ni . "
40027066	Hilou mpu'u-ramo hi daeo' . Rasaa' watu po'unca-na , bona uma ma'ala raderu' , pai' rahubui tantara mpodongo daeo' toe , bona neo' ria to mpokabiboi .
40028001	Timpaliu-mi eo pepuea' , kako'ia-na mehupa' eo hi eo Mingku , Maria Magdalena pai' Maria to ntani'-na hilou mpokamata daeo' .
40028002	Ncorobaa ria linu bohe , apa' hadua mala'eka Pue' mana'u ngkai suruga tumai mpoderu' watu po'unca daeo' , pai'-i mohura hi lolo-na .
40028003	Lence-na mekiroi' hewa kila' , pai' pohea-na bula ngehe .
40028004	Tantara to mpodongo hi ree , me'eka' lia-ramo , moridi'-ra , pai' uma-rapa tono mokore , hewa to mate-ramo .
40028005	Na'uli' mala'eka mpo'uli'-raka tobine toera : " Neo'-koi me'eka' , ku'inca moto mpali'-koi Yesus to mate raparika' .
40028006	Uma-ipi-hana ria hi rehe'i . Tuwu' nculii'-imi , hewa to na'uli'-kokoie wengi . Mai hilo karatu'ua-na wengi .
40028007	Wae-pi , hilou-mokoi pesahui , uli'-raka ana'guru-na katuwu'-na nculii'-mi . Hilou meri'ulu-i hi tana' Galilea . Hi ria-damo mpai' , pai'-i nihilo . Kiwoi napa to ku'uli'-kokoi ! "
40028008	Rapesahui-mi-rawo tobine toera malai ngkai daeo' . Me'eka' moto-ra , aga goe' lia wo'o-ra . Pokeno-rami hilou apa' doko' raparata to jadi' toe hi ana'guru-na Yesus .
40028009	Muu-mule' etu-imi Yesus mpohirua'-raka pai' natabe-ra . Tumai-ramo mpomohui'-i , rakupui witi'-na pai' ranyompa-i .
40028010	Na'uli' mpo'uli'-raka : " Neo' me'eka' ! Hilou-mokoi , uli'-raka ompi'-ku bona hilou-ra hi Galilea , hi ria mpai' rahilo-a . "
40028011	Lingku'-ra tobine toera hilou , ba hangkuja dua tantara to mpodongo daeo' hilou hi rala ngata , pai'-ra mpoparata hi imam pangkeni hawe'ea to jadi' hi daeo' we'i .
40028012	Mohawa'-ramo imam pangkeni toera hante totu'a to Yahudi to ntani'-na . Kabotu' lolita-ra , agina mpowai'-ra tantara wori' doi po'ompo wiwi-ra , bona neo' ra'uli' hilau .
40028013	Ra'uli' imam pangkeni toera mpo'uli'-raka tantara : " Uli'-koi hewa toi : ` Mentongo' bengi ngone , topetuku' Yesus tumai mpanako woto-na bula-kai leta' . '
40028014	Ane na'epe Gubernur tohe'e , kai'-damo mpololitai-i bona neo'-koi rapoo-popai . "
40028015	Radoa-mi-rawo tantara doi toe , pai' ra'uli' hewa to oti ratudui'-raka . Duu' rata hi eo tohe'i , motote oa' lolita toe hi to Yahudi .
40028016	Ana'guru-na Yesus to hampulu' hadua toera hilou hi tana' Galilea , hi bulu' to natudo' ami'-raka Yesus .
40028017	Rahilo mpu'u-imi hi ria , pai' ranyompa-i . Aga ria wo'o tauna to morara'-pidi nono-ra .
40028018	Yesus mpomohui'-ra pai' na'uli'-raka : " Hawe'ea kuasa hi suruga pai' hi dunia' ratonu-maka .
40028019	Jadi' , hilou-mokoi hi humalili' dunia' , tudui' hawe'ea tauna jadi' topetuku'-ku . Niu'-ra hi rala hanga' Alata'ala to Tuama , to Ana' pai' Inoha' Tomoroli' .
40028020	Tudui'-ramo mpotuku' hawe'ea to kuhawai'-kokoi . Kiwoi-koi : kudohei moto-koi duu'-na hi kahudua dunia' . "
41001001	Tohe'i-mi Kareba Lompe' , tutura katuwu'-na Yesus Kristus , Ana' Alata'ala .
41001002	Tutura-na ntepu'u ngkai karata-na Yohanes Topeniu' . Karata-na Yohanes toei , telowa ami'-mi hi rala sura nabi Yesaya . Hante wiwi nabi , Alata'ala mpo'uli'-ki Ana'-na hewa toi : Hi'a toi-mi suro-ku , kuhubui-i meri'ulu ngkai Iko , bona mporodo ohea-nu . "
41001003	" Mekio'-i hi papada to wao' , na'uli' : ` Neo' rata-imi Pue' ! Porodo ami'-miki ohea-na . Nipakalempe ami'-mi ohea to natara mpai' . ' "
41001004	Hewa to ra'uki' toe , mehupa' mpu'u-imi Yohanes Topeniu' hi papada to wao' . Mpoparata-i Lolita Alata'ala hi ntodea , na'uli' : " Medea-mokoi ngkai jeko'-ni , pai' kana tumai-koi kuniu' bona Alata'ala mpo'ampungi jeko'-ni . "
41001005	Wori' tauna to hilou hi papada to wao' doko' mpo'epe lolita-na Yohanes . Ria-ra ngkai ngata Yerusalem pai' ngkai hawe'ea ngata hi tana' Yudea . Hilou-ra mpangaku' jeko'-ra , pai' naniu'-ra hi ue Yordan , tanda kamedea-ra ngkai jeko'-ra .
41001006	Pohea-na Yohanes rababehi ngkai wulu porewua to rahanga' unta . Salepe'-na ngkai kuliba . Koni'-na lari pai' ue wani .
41001007	Mpopalele-i kareba toi : " Ngkabokoa' ngkai aku' , tumai mpai' to meliu kuasa-na ngkai aku' . Bangku' mowilingkudu mpobongka koloro sapatu'-na , uma-a-kuwo natao .
41001008	Aku' mponiu'-koi hante ue tanda kamedea-ni ngkai jeko'-ni . Aga Hi'a mpai' mponiu'-koi hante Inoha' Tomoroli' . "
41001009	Rala-na ha'eo , Yesus me'ongko' ngkai ngata Nazaret hi tana' Galilea , tumai mpopeniu' hi Yohanes . Yohanes mponiu'-i hi ue Yordan .
41001010	Wae ka'oti-na raniu' , mencore-imi ngkai ue , pai' mpohilo-imi langi' mobea pai' Inoha' Tomoroli' mana'u tumai molence mpo-danci mangkebodo hompo hi Hi'a .
41001011	Alata'ala mololita ngkai langi' mpo'uli'-ki : " Iko toi-mi Ana'-ku to kupe'ahi' . Iko-mi to mpakagoe' nono-ku . "
41001012	Oti toe , Inoha' Tomoroli' mpakeni Yesus lou hi papada to wao' .
41001013	Opo' mpulu' eo-i hi ria . Bula-na hi papada toe , Magau' Anudaa' mposori-i . Binata to me'ila dohe-na , pai' mala'eka mpomawai-i .
41001014	Ko'ia mahae ngkai ree , Yohanes Topeniu' rahoko' pai'-i ratarungku' . Nto'u toe , hilou-imi Yesus hi tana' Galilea , pai'-i mpopalele Kareba Lompe' to ngkai Alata'ala ,
41001015	na'uli' : " Neo' rata-mi tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia' ! Medea-mokoi ngkai jeko'-ni , pangala'-mi Kareba Lompe' . "
41001016	Bula-na momako' hi wiwi' rano Galilea , mpohilo-i rodua tauna . Hanga'-ra : Simon hante Andreas ompi'-na . Nto'u toe , bula-ra mebau' hi rano mojala' , apa' toe-mi-rawo bago-ra .
41001017	Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Mai-mokoi ntuku'-a ! Uma-pokoi mebau' mpali' uru . Ngkai wae lau , kuwai'-koi pobago mpotudui' tauna mepangala' hi Aku' . "
41001018	Karapalahii-nami jala'-ra , pai' ntepu'u eo toe mpotuku' Yesus-ramo .
41001019	Napaliliu-mi Yesus momako' , ko'ia molaa ngkai ree mpohilo wo'o-imi rodua to ntali ompi' : Yakobus pai' Yohanes , ana'-na Zebedeus . Hira' toe , bula-ra mpokolompehii jala'-ra hi rala sakaya .
41001020	Nakio'-ramo mpotuku'-i . Jadi' , rapalahii-mi tuama-ra hi rala sakaya hante tauna to dohe-ra to ngkoni' gaji' , pai' mpotuku' Yesus-ramo .
41001021	Ngkai ree , Yesus hante topetuku'-na hilou hi ngata Kapernaum . Hi eo pepuea' to Yahudi , mesua'-imi hi rala tomi posampayaa pai' natepu'u-mi metudui' .
41001022	Konce-ramo tauna to mpo'epe tudui'-na . Apa' uma-i metudui' hewa guru-guru agama . Petudui'-na , hewa tauna to mokuasa mpu'u .
41001023	Nto'u toe , ria hadua tauna to nahawi' anudaa' , mesua' wo'o-i-hawo hi tomi posampayaa toe , pai'-i mejeu' :
41001024	" Ee Yesus to Nazaret ! Doko' nupopai-dakaie ? Ba doko' nuropuhi-dakaie ? Ku'inca moto-kole , ka' Iko-na Suro to moroli' ngkai Alata'ala-e . "
41001025	Yesus mpo'uli'-ki anudaa' toei : " Ngkaba'i-ko ! Palai-ko ngkai tauna tetui ! "
41001026	Tauna toei moridi' sabana anudaa' , pai'-i me'au , pai' malai-mi anudaa' to mpohawi'-i .
41001027	Konce omea-ramo tauna to mpohilo , alaa-na momepololitai-ramo ra'uli' : " Uma mowo-e' ! Toi-e tudui' to bo'u , ria mpu'u baraka'-na ! Mpopalai-i anudaa' , bo ratuku' mpu'u-diki-hana hawa'-nae ! "
41001028	Ngkai ree , kamolele-nami kareba to mpotompo'wiwi Yesus hobo' hi tana' Galilea .
41001029	Kanculii'-ra Yesus hante ana'guru-na ngkai tomi posampayaa toe , hilou-ramo hi tomi-ra Simon pai' Andreas . Yakobus pai' Yohanes hilou wo'o dohe-ra .
41001030	Hi ria , piniana-na Simon tobine ntora turu apa' ngkelengi'-i . Rapesahui mpo'uli'-ki Yesus kapeda'-na .
41001031	Ngkai ree , hilou-imi Yesus hi poturua-na , nakamu pale-na pai' napopemata-i . Ncaliu mo'uri'-imi , pai'-i mpolayani-ra .
41001032	Ncimonou' toe , limpa-mi eo , wori' tauna tumai hi Yesus mpokeni hawe'ea to peda' ba to nahawi' seta .
41001033	Wori' pue' ngata tumai morumpu hi berewe tomi Simon .
41001034	Wori' tauna to napaka'uri' ngkai haki'-ra to wori' nyala . Wori' wo'o seta to mpesuai' tauna napopalai . Aga seta toera , uma-ra napiliu mololita , apa' ra'inca moto Kahi'a-na Ana' Alata'ala .
41001035	Kamepulo-na parabaja-pidi , memata-imi Yesus pai'-i malai ngkai ngata hilou hi kawaoa'-na , lou mosampaya .
41001036	Simon hante doo-na hilou mpali'-i . Kararua'-na , ra'uli'-ki :
41001037	" Wori' tauna mpali'-ko Guru . "
41001038	Na'uli'-raka : " Hilou-tamo hi ngata ntani'-na to mohu' bona mpokeni Lolita Alata'ala hi ria wo'o-a . Apa' toe-mi patuju-ku tumai hi dunia' . "
41001039	Ngkai ree , kahilou-nami Yesus hante ana'guru-na mpokeni Lolita Alata'ala hi hawe'ea ngata hi tana' Galilea . Metudui'-i hi rala tomi-tomi posampayaa , pai'-i mpopalai seta to mpesuai' tauna .
41001040	Ria hadua tauna to mohaki' poko' rata hi Yesus . Powingkotu'-nami mpopetulungi , na'uli' : " Ane ma'ala , paka'uri'-a-kuwo ! "
41001041	Metumu'-mi ahi'-na Yesus mpohilo-i . Toe pai' najama-i pai' na'uli'-ki : " Ma'ala moto , kupaka'uri'-moko ! "
41001042	Hampinisi mata , moronto-mi haki'-na , mo'uri'-imi .
41001043	Oti toe , Yesus mpohubui-i hilou , na'uli'-ki : " Kutagi mpu'u-ko ,
41001044	neo' nulolita hi hema-hema napa to jadi' tohe'i-e . Hilou-moko ulu mpopehuwu woto-nu hi imam , bona nahilo kamo'uri'-numi , pai' keni pepue'-nu ntuku' parenta to te'uki' hi rala Atura Musa , bona monoa' hi hawe'ea tauna kamo'uri'-nu mpu'u-mi . "
41001045	Ntaa' we'i , kahilou-na tauna toei , ntora nalolita lau-mi hiapa-apa kanapaka'uri'-na Yesus . Alaa-na , Yesus uma-ipi bisa mesua' hi rala ngata apa' wori' rahi tauna mpotipuhi-i . Mo'oha' hi mali ngata-i-damo hi kawaoa'-na . Aga nau' wae , uma oa' ria kaputua-na tauna tumai ngkai wori' ngata doko' mpohirua'-ki .
41002001	Ba hangkuja kahae-na ngkai toe , Yesus nculii' hilou hi ngata Kapernaum . Motolele-mi karia-na Yesus hi rala tomi ,
41002002	toe pai' wori' tauna himuhu doko' mpohilo-i . Kahimuhu-ra toe , alaa-na bihi'-mi hi rala tomi , rata-rata hi wobo' bihi' tauna . Naparata-raka Lolita Alata'ala .
41002003	Bula-na mololita tohe'e , tumai opo' tauna mpokowa' doo-ra to pungku .
41002004	Uma ria ohea-ra mpomohui' Yesus apa' bihi' rahi tauna . Toe pai' ngkahe' tuka'-ramo hilou hi lolo tomi , ratangka' ata' to hintoto Yesus , pai' ra'ulu doo-ra ntali ali'-na hilou hi rala tomi .
41002005	Nahilo Yesus kabohe pepangala'-ra toe , na'uli'-mi hi topungku toei : " Ana'-ku , te'ampungi-mi jeko'-nu . "
41002006	Ria wo'o-ra-rawo ba hangkuja dua guru agama Yahudi to mohura hi rala tomi toe . Kedi' nono-ra mpo'epe lolita-na Yesus toe , ra'uli' hi rala nono-ra :
41002007	" Daho' rahi-i-hana tauna toei mololita hewa tetu ! Ha na'uli'-hana hibalia tuwu'-na hante tuwu'-na Alata'ala ? Uma ria ntani'-na to ma'ala mpo'ampungi jeko' , hadua Alata'ala-wadi . "
41002008	Ntaa' na'inca moto-di Yesus napa to hi pekiri-rae . Toe pai' na'uli'-raka : " Napa-di pai' hewa tetu pekiri-nie ?
41002009	Aku' Ana' Manusia' , ria mpu'u kuasa-ku hi dunia' mpo'ampungi jeko' . Tapi' ane ku'uli'-ki topungku toei : ` Te'ampungi-mi jeko'-nu , ' uma ni'incai ba te'ampungi mpu'u-di jeko'-na ba uma-di . Aga ane ku'uli' : ` Memata-moko , lulu-mi ali'-nu pai' momako'-moko , ' nihilo mpai' kadupa'-na ba ka'uma-na . Jadi' , kupopohiloi-koi karia-na kuasa-ku mpo'ampungi jeko' . " Ngkai ree , kamewili'-nami hi topungku toei ,
41002010	
41002011	na'uli'-ki : " Memata-moko , lulu-mi ali'-nu , pai'-ko nculii'-mi ! "
41002012	Pemata-na mpu'u-mi topungku toei , nalulu ali'-na , pai'-i momako' hilou rasabii' tauna to wori' . Karahilo-na tauna to wori' napa to jadi' toe , konce omea-ramo , pai'-ra mpo'une' Alata'ala , ra'uli' : " Ko'ia ria tahiloi hewa to jadi' tohe'i ! "
41002013	Oti toe , hilou wo'o-imi Yesus hi wiwi' rano . Wori' lia tauna morumpu , pai' natudui'-ra .
41002014	Bula-na momako' , mpohilo-i hadua topesingara' paja' to rahanga' Lewi ana'-na Alfeus , bula-na mohura hi kantoro'-na . Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki : " Tuku'-ama ! " Kamokore-nami Lewi kaliliu mpotuku'-i .
41002015	Oti toe , Yesus pai' ana'guru-na ngkoni' hi tomi Lewi , pai' wori' wo'o-ra topesingara' paja' pai' tau ntani'-na to ra'uli' ntodea dada'a kehi-ra tumai ngkoni' dohe-ra , apa' wori'-ra to mpotuku' Yesus .
41002016	Ria wo'o hi ree ba hangkuja dua guru agama to mpotuku' tudui' Parisi . Kampohilo-ra Yesus ngkoni' dohe tauna to dada'a kehi-ra toe , ra'uli'-mi mpo'uli'-raka ana'guru-na : " Napa pai' guru-ni ngkoni' hangkaa-ngkania hante topesingara' paja' pai' tauna topojeko'-e ! "
41002017	Yesus mpo'epe lolita-ra toe , toe pai' napololitai-ra hante lolita rapa' toi , na'uli' : " Tauna to uma peda' , uma mingki' rapokulii' . Tauna to peda'-wadi-hawo to paraluu rapokulii' . Uma-a tumai mpokio' tauna to monoa' ingku-ra . Katumai-ku toi-le , mpokio' topojeko'-a-kuna bona medea-ra ngkai jeko'-ra . "
41002018	Rala-na hangkani , topetuku' Yohanes Topeniu' pai' to Parisi bula-ra mopuasa' . Ria-mi tauna rata hi Yesus mpekune'-i : " Topetuku'-na Yohanes Topeniu' mopuasa' , wae wo'o topetuku' to Parisi , mopuasa' wo'o-ra . Hiaa' topetuku'-nu Iko , napa pai' uma-ra mopuasa' ? "
41002019	Yesus mpotompoi'-ra hante lolita rapa' toi , na'uli'-raka : " Ane tauna hi posusaa' poncamokoa , ha mopuasa'-ra-rana bula-ra mpo'ema' topemua' ? Uma-hawo . Bula-na ria-pidi topemua' dohe-ra , uma-ra mopuasa' .
41002020	Tapi' rata mpai' tempo-na , topemua' ra'ala' ngkai laintongo'-ra . Nto'u toe-damo , pai' lako' mopuasa'-rada . "
41002021	Oti toe Yesus mpo'uli' lolita rapa' to ronyala-pi , na'uli' : " Uma ria haduaa tauna to mpotelepei baju to hae hante pontaia' to bo'u . Apa' pontaia' to bo'u mongkuru' mpai' , duu'-na mpoheu' baju to hae toe , alaa-na kaboo-bohea lau-mi heu'-na .
41002022	Wae wo'o uma ria tauna to mpotua anggur to bo'u hi rala pontu'ua to hae . Apa' ane dede'-ipi mpai' , mopengka lau-mi pontu'ua to hae toe , alaa-na mobowo lau-mi anggur , pai' mpadaa'-mi pontu'ua-na . Jadi' , anggur to bo'u kana ra'ihii' hi pontu'ua to bo'u wo'o-hawo . "
41002023	Hangkani hi eo pepuea' , Yesus pai' ana'guru-na ntara rala bonea . Bula-ra mpotara bonea toe , ana'guru-na mpotepo' wua' gandum pai' raru'a .
41002024	To Parisi to hi ree mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Napa-di-rana pai' ana'guru-nu mpotiboki atura agama-tae ? Mobago-ra-rana hi eo pepuea' . "
41002025	Na'uli' Yesus : " Ha uma ria nibasa napa to nababehi Magau' Daud owi nto'u Abyatar jadi' Imam Bohe-e ? Nto'u-na Daud hante ema'-na mo'oro' pai' uma ria anu rakoni' , mesua'-imi hi rala tomi pepuea' , pai'-i mpokoni' roti to rapopepue' hi Alata'ala , pai' nabagi wo'o-raka doo-na . Ntuku' ada agama-ta , imam-wadi-hana to ma'ala mpokoni' roti toe . Aga nau' wae , gau'-na Daud toe uma-hawo naposala' . "
41002026	
41002027	Ngkai ree , na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus : " Alata'ala mpobabehi eo pepuea' bona mpotulungi manusia' . Bela manusia' to rababehi bona napari'une' ada eo pepuea' .
41002028	Jadi' , Aku' Ana' Manusia' , ria kuasa-ku mpo'uli' napa to ma'ala rababehi hi eo pepuea' . "
41003001	Rala-na hangkani , mesua' wo'o-imi Yesus hi rala tomi posampayaa . Hi ree , ria hadua tauna to mate pale-na hamali .
41003002	Ria wo'o-ra hi ree to Parisi to tungkai' doko' mpali' kasalaa' Yesus meka' mobago-i hi eo pepuea' , apa' doko' rapakilu-i . Jadi' , ralelemata-i meka' ba mepaka'uri' mpu'u-i hi eo pepuea' .
41003003	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki tauna to mate pale-na hamali : " Mai-ko mokore hi laintongo' rehe'i . "
41003004	Oti toe , na'uli'-raka to Parisi : " Ntuku' ada agama-ta , to'uma to ma'ala tababehi hi eo pepuea' : mpobabehi to lompe'-di ba to dada'a ? Mpotulungi doo ba mpatehi doo ? " Tapi' to Parisi toera , oja'-ra mpotompoi'-i , ngkaba'i-ra-wadi .
41003005	Mogolili Yesus mponaa-ra . Moroe-i pai' peda' nono-na apa' motu'a rahi nono-ra . Toe pai' na'uli' mpo'uli'-ki tauna to mate pale-na hamali toei : " Tanoa pale-nu ! " Kanatanoa-nami pale-na , mo'uri'-imi .
41003006	Palai-ra to Parisi ngkai tomi posampayaa toe , pai'-ra morumpu hante tauna to tono' hi Magau' Herodes . Mpali' akala-ra bona Yesus rapatehi .
41003007	Yesus hante ana'guru-na malai ngkai ree hilou hi wiwi' rano . Wori' to Galilea ntuku'-i . Wori' wo'o to tumai ngkai tana' Yudea ,
41003008	ngkai Yerusalem , ngkai tana' Idumea , ngkai dipo ue Yordan , ria wo'o ngkai ngata Tirus pai' Sidon . Wori' rahi tauna to tumai hi Yesus apa' ra'epe hawe'ea to nababehi .
41003009	Wori' tauna to mohaki' napaka'uri' , alaa-na mome'upi'-ra tauna lou mpomohui'-i doko' mpoganga-i . Ngkai kawori' tauna , toe pai' nahubui ana'guru-na mporodo sakaya nahawi' , nee-neo' mpai' ra'upi'-i ntodea .
41003010	
41003011	Rata wo'o-ra tauna to napesuai' anudaa' . Kampohilo-ra Yesus kaliliu mowingkotu'-ra hi nyanyoa-na , pai'-ra mejeu' , ra'uli' : " Iko-mi Ana' Alata'ala ! "
41003012	Aga natagi mpu'u-ra , bona neo' ra'uli' kahema-nai .
41003013	Oti toe , Yesus manake' hilou hi bulu'-na , pai'-i mpokio' tauna hema-hema to napokono . Rata mpu'u-ramo ,
41003014	pai' napelihi hampulu' rodua-ra , na'uli'-raka : " Kupelihi-koi bona nipodohe-a , pai' bona kusuro-koi mpopalele Kareba Lompe' .
41003015	Pai' kuwai'-koi kuasa mpopalai seta . "
41003016	Tohe'i-mi hanga'-ra to hampulu' rodua toera : Simon ( Yesus mpohanga'-i Petrus ) ; oti toe , Yakobus ana' Zebedeus ; pai' Yohanes ompi'-na Yakobus ( Yesus mpohanga'-ra Boanerges -- batua-na : tauna to hewa berese ) ; oti toe , Andreas ; Filipus ; Bartolomeus ; Matius ; Tomas ; Yakobus ana' Alfeus ; Tadeus ; Simon to Zelot ; pai' Yudas Iskariot ( hi'a mpai' to mpobalu' Yesus hi bali'-na ) .
41003017	
41003018	
41003019	
41003020	Oti toe , Yesus nculii' hilou hi tomi . Aga wori' wo'o-wadi tauna to tumai mpotipuhi-i , alaa-na Yesus pai' ana'guru-na uma-ra tepongkoni' .
41003021	Toe pai' ria tauna to mpo'uli' : " Wuli-imile ! " Kara'epe-na ompi'-na Yesus tohe'e , hilou-ramo ke mpo'ala'-i .
41003022	Ria wo'o hi ree guru agama Yahudi to lako' rata ngkai Yerusalem . Ra'uli' guru agama toera : " Ah , napesuai' Beelzebul-i-hanale , magau' hawe'ea seta . Magau' seta toe-mile to mpowai'-i kuasa mpopalai seta-e . "
41003023	Toe pai' Yesus mpokio'-ra bona mpomohui'-i , pai' napololitai-ra hante ba hangkuja nyala lolita rapa' , na'uli' : " Ha beiwa-hawo seta mpopalai hingka seta-na ?
41003024	Ane rapa'-na ria hadua magau' , pai' ntodea hi rala kamagaua'-na ntora mosisala , uma mpai' ntaha mahae kamagaua'-na toe .
41003025	Ane tau hantina ntora motuda' , bate pagaa'-gaa' mpai' posantinaa-ra .
41003026	Wae wo'o hi kamagaua' seta . Ane hi rala kamagaua' seta ria posisalaa pai' potudaa' , kamagaua'-na toe uma ntaha mahae , kahudua-nami mpai' toe .
41003027	" Seta ma'ala rarapai'-ki tauna to parimuku . Ane mesua'-ta hi rala tomi tauna to parimuku doko' mpo'ala' ihi' tomi-na , kana tahoo' ncala'-i , pai' lako' ma'ala tapatau' rewa-na . Wae wo'o , ane Aku' mpopalai seta , batua-na , meliu kuasa-ku ngkai seta .
41003028	" Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : Hawe'ea jeko' manusia' pai' lolita pesapuaka-ra ma'ala ra'ampungi .
41003029	Aga hema to mposapuaka Inoha' Tomoroli' , uma ria ampungia-ra duu' kahae-hae-na . Pesapuaka-ra toe raposala' duu' kahae-hae-na . "
41003030	Pai' hewa toe lolita-na Yesus , apa' ria to mpo'uli' kanahawi'-na anudaa'-i , uma rapangalai' kangkai Inoha' Tomoroli' kuasa-na .
41003031	Ngkai ree , rata-mi tina-na pai' ompi'-na Yesus mokore hi mali tomi . Mpohubui-ra tauna mpokio'-i tumai hi mali-na bona rapololitai .
41003032	Nto'u toe , wori' tauna mpotololiki Yesus . Ra'uli'-ki : " Guru , tina-nu pai' ompi'-nu , oe-ra ria hi mali-na mpali'-ko . "
41003033	Yesus mponaa tauna to mpotololiki-i , pai' na'uli' : " Ane tina-ku pai' ompi'-kule , hira' toe-ramo lau .
41003034	
41003035	Apa' hema-hema to mpobabehi konoa Alata'ala , hira'-mi ompi'-ku pai' hira'-mi tina-ku . "
41004001	Rala-na hangkani , metudui' wo'o-imi Yesus hi wiwi' rano . Wori' lia tauna morumpu mpotololiki-i . Ngkai kawori' tauna , toe-mi pai' hilou-i mohawi' sakaya to hi lolo ue , mohura-i hi rala-na pai' tauna to wori' mokore hi talinti .
41004002	Wori' nyala to natudui'-raka hante lolita rapa' . Hewa tohe'i na'uli'-raka :
41004003	" Pe'epei ! Ria hadua topohawu' hilou mohawu' .
41004004	Rala mpohawu'-na toe , ria hawua'-na to monawu' hi mata ohea . Rata danci mpotilo' hawua' toe duu'-na oti .
41004005	Ria wo'o to monawu' hi tana' to watua , hangkedi'-wadi tana'-na . Hinawu'-na toe sohi' lia tuwu' , apa' moreni' tana'-na .
41004006	Kamorani'-na eo , molaju-imi duu'-na bangi , apa' uma monala rali'-na .
41004007	Ria wo'o to monawu' hi laintongo' rui . Tuwu' rui mpo'upi' hinawu' toe , alaa-na uma-i mowua' , mate lau-idi .
41004008	Ria wo'o hawua' to monawu' hi tana' to morudu' . Tuwu' lompe' hawua' toe kakaa-kamaa , alaa-na mowua' . Ria to nte tolu mpulu' ngkani ngkai hinawu'-na , ria to ono mpulu' , ria wo'o to ha'atu ngkani ngkai hinawu'-na . "
41004009	Ka'oti-na mpololita lolita rapa' toe , na'uli'-miraka : " Hema-koi to tilingaa , pe'epei lompe' ! "
41004010	Oti toe , nto'u-na Yesus hadudua-na , ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua pai' topetuku'-na to ntani'-na tumai mpekune'-i : " Napa-die batua-na lolita rapa' toe-e we'i ? "
41004011	Na'uli' Yesus : " Owi , Alata'ala ko'ia mpopo'incai manusia' beiwa-i mpai' jadi' Magau' hi dunia' . Aga hewa toe lau , napopo'incai-mokoi tudui' toe . Tapi' ane tauna to bela topetuku'-ku , kutudui'-ra hante lolita rapa' ,
41004012	bona madupa'-mi lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpo'uli' : ` Pe'epe moto-ra , aga uma oa' ra'incai batua-na . Pehilo moto-ra , aga hewa to uma oa' monoto rahiloi . Jadi' , uma oa'-ra nculii' hi Alata'ala , pai' jeko'-ra uma te'ampungi . ' "
41004013	Oti toe , Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Ane uma ni'incai batua lolita rapa' toe we'i , beiwa kani'inca-na batua lolita rapa' to ntani'-na ?
41004014	Topohawu' , hira'-mi tauna to mpoparata Lolita Alata'ala .
41004015	Ria tauna to ma'ala rarapai'-ki hawua' to monawu' hi mata ohea . Ra'epe moto Lolita Alata'ala , aga Magau' Anudaa' mpohilingai' nono-ra , alaa-na uma-pi rapoinono lolita toe .
41004016	" Ria wo'o tauna to ma'ala rarapai'-ki hawua' to monawu' hi tana' to watua . Kara'epe-na Lolita Alata'ala , ncaliu goe' nono-ra .
41004017	Aga uma morali' mpu'u Lolita Alata'ala hi rala nono-ra , toe pai' uma-ra ntaha mahae . Ane rabalinai'-ra ba rapakasusa' sabana pepangala'-ra hi Lolita Alata'ala , kamo'ungkere'-rami .
41004018	" Ria wo'o tauna to rarapai'-ki hawua' to monawu' hi olo' rui . Ra'epe moto Lolita Alata'ala ,
41004019	aga sese'-ra ntora mpenonoi katuwu'-ra hi rala dunia' toi , doko'-ra mporumpu rewa dunia'-wadi , pai' wori' nyala kahinaa hi rala nono-ra . Hawe'ea toe mposesei'-ra , alaa-na uma ria po'ohaa' Lolita Alata'ala hi rala nono-ra , pai' uma ria kalaua-na lolita toe hi katuwu'-ra .
41004020	" Ria wo'o tauna to rarapai'-ki hawua' to monawu' hi tana' to morudu' . Mpo'epe-ra Lolita Alata'ala , kaliliu ratarima . Hi tauna toe-ramo Lolita Alata'ala mowua' mpu'u . Ria to mowua' hangkedi' , ria to mowua' wori' , ria to mowua' wori' lia . "
41004021	Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus : " Ha ria-ta to mpokeni palita hi rala tomi pai' tapopoi' hante kura ba tatu'u hi une' poturua ? Tantu uma-hawo ria . Palita bate ratu'u hi pontu'ua-na bona nahinii hobo' .
41004022	Apa' hawe'ea to tewuni kana rapopehuwu , pai' hawe'ea to kalerua kana jadi' kahiloa .
41004023	Hema-koi to tilingaa , pe'epei lompe' ! "
41004024	Na'uli' tena Yesus : " Penotohi mpu'u-koi napa to ni'epe tohe'i-e . Apa' kawoo-woria' Lolita Alata'ala to nibagi-ki doo , kawoo-woria' wo'o to nanotohi-kokoi Alata'ala -- ba melabi tena-pi ngkai ree .
41004025	Tauna to mpotarima Lolita Alata'ala , ranotohi nono-ra bona kawoo-woria' to ra'inca . Aga tauna to uma dota mpotarima Lolita Alata'ala , nau' ria hangkedi' to ra'inca , ra'alai' lau-ra . "
41004026	Na'uli' Yesus : " Ane Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia' , kajadi'-na hewa lolita rapa' tohe'i : Hadua tauna mpotujai' bonea-na .
41004027	Hi bengi-na turu-i , hi eo-na memata-i . Kahae-na toe , tinuja'-na tuwu' kaboo-bohea . Aga beiwa tinuja'-na tuwu' pai' jadi' bohe , uma-hawo na'incai .
41004028	Ngkai tana' moto-hawo pehupaa' wua'-na . Lomo'-na rau-na pai' kaho-na to mehupa' , ngkai ree huwu-mi , duu'-na mo'ihi .
41004029	Kataha'-na pae , hilou-imi pue'-na ngkeni are' nasoe-ki , apa' tempo-nami mepae . "
41004030	Na'uli' Yesus : " Ane Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia' , beiwa kajadi'-na ? Kajadi'-nale hewa lolita rapa' tohe'i :
41004031	Ria tauna to mpohawu' unto' hawi hi tana' .
41004032	Unto' toe monete' lia , meliu kakedi'-na ngkai hawe'ea unto' to ria hi dunia' . Aga ane rahawu'-i-damo pai'-i tuwu' , meliu kabohe-na ngkai ngkojo to ntani'-na . Ra'a-na mopanga molanga , duu'-na rapopetai danci pai' rapengkamoui . "
41004033	Wae-mi Yesus mpoparata Lolita Alata'ala hi ntodea hante wori' nyala lolita rapa' , ntuku' pakulea'-ra mpopaha .
41004034	Uma ria to natudui'-raka ane uma hante lolita rapa' . Aga ane Hi'a-damo pai' ana'guru-na , nanotohi-miraka omea .
41004035	Ncimonou' toe wo'o , Yesus mpo'uli'-raka ana'guru-na : " Hilou-tamo hi dipo rano . "
41004036	Jadi' , apa' hi rala sakaya ami'-imi Yesus , pe'ongko'-rami mpalahii ntodea to hi wiwi' rano . Ria wo'o sakaya ntani'-na hi ree to mpotuku'-ra .
41004037	Ko'ia mahae , rata-mi ngolu' bohe . Ntepu'u-mi balumpa mporumpa' sakaya-ra , alaa-na neo' ponu'-mi sakaya-ra hante ue .
41004038	Yesus leta' moto-i molunai hi wuntu sakaya . Kahilou-rami ana'guru-na mpolike-i , ra'uli'-ki : " Guru ! Napa-di pai' nupelele' moto-ta neo' matala-tamoe ? "
41004039	Pemata-nami Yesus pai'-i mpotagi ngolu' pai' balumpa , na'uli' : " Mento'o-ko ngolu' ! Rodo-moko balumpa ! " Mento'o mpu'u-mi-hawo ngolu' , pai' muu-mule' molino nculii'-mi rano .
41004040	Na'uli'-mi Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Napa pai' me'eka' rahi-koie ? Ha uma ria pepangala'-nie ? "
41004041	Me'eka' lia-ramo ana'guru-na , pai' momepololitai-ramo , ra'uli' : " Hema mpu'u-idi-hana tau toii-e ? Ngolu' pai' rano molino-di-hana ntuku' hawa'-na ! "
41005001	Ngkai ree , rata-ramo hi dipo rano , hi tana' Gerasa .
41005002	Hi tana' Gerasa toe , ria hadua tauna to nahawi' anudaa' . Hi daeo'-wadi po'ohaa'-na . Uma-i tono rahoo' nau' hante rante , apa' uma mowo karoho-na . Pontu-na witi'-na pai' pale-na rahoo' , aga koloro pai' rante ma'ala oa' nadupe' . Ngkai kamoroho-na toe , pai' uma ria haduaa to daho' mpodongo-i . Hi eo-na hi bengi-na ntora dao'-dao'-na hi daeo' pai' hi bulu'-na , pai' kakakio'-kio' , pai'-i mposerohi woto-na hante watu . Jadi' , wae pana'u-na Yesus ngkai rala sakaya , mehupa'-mi tauna to kahawia' toei ngkai daeo' .
41005003	
41005004	
41005005	
41005006	Kampohilo-na Yesus ngkai molaa , pokeno-nami hilou mperapai-i , pai'-i mowingkotu' hi nyanyoa-na mponyompa-i .
41005007	Yesus mpohubui anudaa' malai , na'uli' : " Malai-moko ngkai tauna tetui ! " Mejeu' tau toei na'uli' : " Ee Yesus Ana' Alata'ala to hi suruga ! Napa-di-kona pai' tumai-koe ? Hante hanga' Alata'ala merapi'-a bona neo'-a-kuwo nusesa' . "
41005008	
41005009	Yesus mpekune'-i : " Hema hanga'-nu ? " Na'uli' : " Hanga'-ku Legion , apa' wori'-kai hampo'emaa' to mesua' hi tau toii . " ( Hanga' Legion tohe'e , batua-na : moncobu . )
41005010	Rajojo seta toera merapi' hi Yesus bona neo'-ra napopalai ngkai ngata toe .
41005011	Uma molaa ngkai ree , ria wori' wawu mojume hi panapa bulu' .
41005012	Anudaa' toera merapi' hi Yesus , ra'uli' : " Hubui-kai mesua' hi wawu toera mai . "
41005013	Napiliu moto-ra Yesus . Ngkai ree , malai mpu'u-ramo anudaa' toera kaliliu mesua' hi wawu . Pesua'-ra hi wawu toe , mparampuli-ramo-rawo wawu hilou mengkajuala' hi rano , mate bonga-ramo hi rala ue -- kawori'-ra ria nte roncobu ma'a .
41005014	Karahilo-na tauna to mpodoo wawu toera napa to jadi' , pokeno-rami hilou hi rala ngata pai' hi bonea to mohu' mpoparata kajadia' toe . Toe pai' tumai-ramo pue' ngata doko' mpohilo napa to jadi' .
41005015	Karata-ra hi Yesus , rahilo-rawo tauna to kahawia' toei , mohura rodo-imi , moheai-i , pai' monoto-mi nono-na . Mpohilo toe , me'eka'-ramo .
41005016	Tauna to mpohilo kajadia' toe mpotutura napa to jadi' hi tauna to kahawia' , pai' napa to jadi' hi wawu-ra .
41005017	Ngkai ree , pue' ngata merapi' hi Yesus bona malai-i ngkai ngata-ra . Jadi' , mohawi' nculii'-imi hi rala sakaya .
41005018	Bula-na Yesus mohawi' toe , tauna to kahawia'-e ngone merapi' bona ma'ala-i hilou dohe-na .
41005019	Tapi' uma-i napiliu , na'uli'-ki : " Nculii'-moko hilou hi tomi-nu , uli'-raka hingka ngata-nu napa to nababehi Pue' Ala hi iko , pai' ahi'-na hi iko . "
41005020	Hilou-imi-hawo hi tana' Dekapolis ( batua-na : Hampulu' Ngata ) , mpopalele napa to nababehi Yesus hi woto-na . Konce hawe'ea tauna to mpo'epe .
41005021	Nculii' wo'o-imi Yesus hilou hi dipo rano . Karata-na hi dipo-na , wori' wo'o-mi tauna mpotipuhi-i . Bula-na hi wiwi' rano-pidi ,
41005022	rata hadua pangkeni tomi posampayaa to Yahudi , hanga'-na Yairus . Kampohilo-na Yesus , powingkotu'-nami hi nyanyoa-na
41005023	mpopetulungi , na'uli' : " Neo' mate lia-imi dei'-ku hi tomi . Lou-ta hi tomi-ku , nujama-ka-kuwo bona mo'uri'-i , bona neo'-i-hawo mate . "
41005024	Hilou mpu'u-imi Yesus dohe-na , pai' mo'iko wo'o tauna ntuku'-ra . Wori' tauna mpo'upi' Yesus .
41005025	Hi olo' ntodea , ria hadua tobine , hampulu' rompae-imi moraa' , uma ria kantotoa'-na .
41005026	Mompae-mpae-imi mpopepokulii' hi dokter , duu'-na oti-mi ihi' tomi-na napobalu' bona ria napobayari-raka . Aga uma oa' ria kamo'uria'-na , tedonihii lau-di haki'-na .
41005027	Wori'-mi to na'epe to mpotompo'wiwi Yesus . Toe pai' na'uli' hi rala nono-na : " Nau' baju-na-wadi kureo , mo'uri'-ale mpai' ! " Jadi' mengkahipi'-imi-hawo hilou hi olo' tauna to wori' mpomohui' Yesus ngkai tilingkuria-na , pai' naganga mpu'u-mi-hawo baju-na .
41005028	
41005029	Wae kanaganga-na , hampinisi mata mentoda'-mi poraa'-na . Ncaliu na'inca kamo'uri'-nami .
41005030	Nto'u toe wo'o-hawo , Yesus mpo'inca karia-na baraka' malai ngkai Hi'a . Kame'ili'-nami hi tauna to wori' , na'uli' : " Hema to mpoganga baju-kue ? "
41005031	Ra'uli' ana'guru-na : " Guru , nuhilo moto-kowole kawori' tauna to mpo'upi'-koe . Beiwa-kona pai' nupekune' hema to mpoganga-ko ? "
41005032	Aga Yesus menaa ntololikia-na mpali' tauna to mpoganga-i .
41005033	Na'inca tobine toei napa to jadi' hi woto-na . Kamoridi'-nami-hawo me'eka' , pai' tumai-i mowingkotu' hi nyanyoa Yesus mpangaku' hawe'ea-na .
41005034	Yesus mpo'uli'-ki tobine toei : " Ana'-ku , mo'uri'-moko sabana pepangala'-nu hi Aku' . Nculii'-moko hante kalompea' tuwu'-nu . Mo'uri'-moko , uma-pi ria haki'-nu . "
41005035	Bula-na Yesus mololita-pidi , rata-mi ba hangkuja dua suro ngkai tomi Yairus mpo'uli'-ki Yairus : " Mate-imi-hana ana'-nu . Neo'-pi mposusai' Guru . "
41005036	Pe'epe moto-i Yesus napa to ra'uli' suro toera . Na'uli' mpo'uli'-ki Yairus : " Neo' mere' nono-nu ! Pangala' moto-mi-hana ! "
41005037	Kakaliliu-nami Yesus mako' , aga uma napiliu tauna to wori' mpodohei-i mesua' hi rala tomi Yairus , muntu' Petrus , Yakobus pai' Yohanes ompi'-na Yakobus-wadi .
41005038	Karata-na hi tomi Yairus , na'epe-hawo merodo'-ra-damo tauna , hangaa pogeo'-ra-damo pai' motantangi' rahuduwukui .
41005039	Kamesua'-na hi rala tomi , na'uli'-raka : " Napa pai' merodo' rahi-koi geo'-e ! Uma-i-hawo-le mate-e . Leta'-i-wadi . "
41005040	Mpo'epe toe we'i , rapotawai-i-wadi . Ngkai ree , Yesus mpohubui-ra omea malai ngkai rala tomi , pai'-i mesua' hi kamar poturua ana' toei , hante tina pai' tuama-na , pai' ana'guru-na to tolu .
41005041	Nakamu pale-na ana' toei , pai' na'uli'-ki : " Memata-moko ana' ! " Hi rala basa-ra to Yahudi , moni-na hewa toi : " Talita kum ! "
41005042	Pemata-nami ana' toei kaliliu momako' . ( Umuru-na hampulu' rompae . ) Uma mowo kakonce-ra tauna to mpohilo .
41005043	Aga Yesus mpotagi-ra , na'uli' : " Neo' mpu'u nilolita napa to lako' jadi' toi . " Pai' na'uli' wo'o : " Wai'-imi ana' tetui koni'-na . "
41006001	Oti toe , Yesus me'ongko' ngkai ngata toe hilou hi ngata-na moto hante ana'guru-na .
41006002	Hi eo pepuea' , hilou-i hi tomi posampayaa mpotudui' tauna . Wori' tauna hi ree . Kampo'epe-ra tudui' Yesus , konce-ra ra'uli' : " Hema-di to mpotudui'-i hawe'ea toe-e ? Kapantea napa-di to ria hi Hi'a-e ? Beiwa pai' ma'ala-i mpobabehi anu mekoncehi ?
41006003	Bo topowangu tomi-i-wadi , ana' Maria . Ompi'-na , hira' Yakobus , Yoses , Yudas pai' Simon . Ompi'-na tobine , ria moto wo'o-ra dohe-ta hi rehe'i . " Toe pai' oja'-ra mepangala' hi Yesus .
41006004	Ngkai ree , Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Hadua nabi bate rabila' hiapa kahilouaa-na . Aga hi ngata-na pai' tomi-na , pai' dohe ompi'-na moto , uma lau-i rabila' . "
41006005	Jadi' , Yesus mpokehele-ra apa' uma-ra mepangala' . Toe pai' uma-i bisa mpobabehi wori' anu mekoncehi hi ria . Sampale to nababehi , mpojama ba hangkuja dua topeda' bona mo'uri'-ra .
41006006	
41006007	Mpokio'-i ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua , nasuro-ra rodua-rodua hampo'emaa' , pai' nawai'-ra kuasa mpopalai anudaa' .
41006008	Kako'ia-ra me'ongko' , natudui'-ra hewa toi : " Neo'-koi ngkeni napa-napa hi pomakoa'-ni , muntu' lua'-wadi . Neo' ngkeni pongkoni' ba boku ba doi hi rala karepe' .
41006009	Ma'ala moto-koi mpake' lihi witi' , aga neo' ngkeni rontonga' baju . "
41006010	Na'uli' wo'o-mi : " Ane rata-koi hi hameha' ngata pai' ratarima-koi hi tomi hantomi , mo'oha' hi ree-mokoi duu'-ni kaliliu hilou mpai' hi ngata ntani'-na .
41006011	Ane ria pue' ngata to uma dota mpotarima-koi , ane oja'-ra mpo'epe lolita to nikeni , wae kanipalahii-na ngata-ra , tonta awu to mentaka' hi palanta' witi'-ni , tanda kanahuku'-ra mpai' Alata'ala . "
41006012	Ka'oti-na Yesus mpotudui' ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua toera , me'ongko'-ramo hilou mpotudui' tauna bona medea-ra ngkai jeko'-ra .
41006013	Wori' seta to rapopalai . Pai' wori' wo'o tauna to peda' ragelai' hante lana pai' rapaka'uri' .
41006014	Nto'u toe , Magau' Herodes Antipas mpo'epe kareba napa to nababehi Yesus , apa' hanga' Yesus rapotompo'wiwi hiapa-apa . Ria to mpo'uli' : " Yesus toei lou , Yohanes Topeniu'-ile tuwu' nculii' ! Toe-hana pai' ria baraka'-na mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi toe-e . "
41006015	Aga ria wo'o to mpo'uli' : " Yesus toei , nabi Elia to owi-i . " Hiaa' ria wo'o to mpo'uli' : " Nabi mpu'u-i , hewa nabi to owi . "
41006016	Kana'epe-na Magau' Herodes tohe'e , na'uli'-mi : " Yohanes Topeniu' mpu'u-i-tano Yesus toei lou-e ! Kupehubui wengi rapata' wuroko'-na , aga tuwu' nculii'-imi . "
41006017	Hewa toi tutura kamate-na Yohanes Topeniu' . Magau' Herodes mpo'ago pai' mpotobine Herodias , tobine ompi'-na moto to rahanga' Filipus . Wori' ngkani Yohanes mpokamaro Herodes ngkai gau'-na toe , na'uli'-ki : " Uma-ko ma'ala mpotobine era-nu tetui ! Gau'-nu tetu mpotiboki Atura Musa . " Ngkai ree , Herodes mpohubui tantara-na hilou mpohoko' Yohanes . Rahoko' mpu'u-imi , rahoo' pai'-i ratarungku' .
41006018	
41006019	Ane Herodias-e , mowuku-damo nono-na hi Yohanes , doko' napatehi . Aga uma-i mologa mpopadupa' roe-na toe ,
41006020	apa' Herodes mpohubui tantara-na mpojaga-i hi rala tarungku' . Me'eka'-i mpatehi Yohanes apa' na'inca , tauna to monoa'-i pai' moroli' wo'o-i . Ane Herodes mpo'epe Yohanes mpololitai-i , mokarara' nono-na , aga goe' wo'o-i mpo'epe-i mololita .
41006021	Hi eo pompokiwoia kaputua Magau' Herodes , ria-mi loga-na Herodias . Hi eo toe , Magau' Herodes mpobabehi posusa' mpokiwoi eo kaputua-na . Mpokio'-i wori' maradika , tadulako pai' pangkeni to ngkai tana' Galilea .
41006022	Bula posusa' toe , ana'-na Herodias tobine mesua' pai' modero' . Goe' lia-i Magau' Herodes mpohilo podero' toronaa toei , wae wo'o torata-na . Na'uli' mpo'uli'-ki toronaa toei : " Ane ria ba napa to nupokono , perapi'-mi , bate kuwai'-ko . "
41006023	Mosumpa wo'o-i , na'uli' : " Nau' ba napa mpu'u-mi to nuperapi' , nau' hantanga' ngkai poparenta-ku , bate kuwai'-ko ! "
41006024	Palai-nami toronaa toei hilou mpekune' tina-na , na'uli' : " Ina' , napa to kuperapi'-e ? " Na'uli' tina-na : " Perapi'-mi woo'-na Yohanes Topeniu' ! "
41006025	Kanculii'-nami hilou hi Magau' , kaliliu na'uli' : " Merapi'-a woo'-na Yohanes Topeniu' wae lau , ratu'u hi lolo dula . "
41006026	Mpo'epe pomperapia' toe-di , soho' lia-mi nono-na Magau' . Aga uma-pi ma'ala nadii' nculii' lolita-na hi toronaa toe , apa' mpolia' mosumpa-imi we'i ra'epe torata-na .
41006027	Kaliliu napahawa' hadua tantara-na hilou mpo'ala' woo' Yohanes Topeniu' . Kahilou-nami-hawo tantara toe hi tarungku' mpopata' wuroko'-na .
41006028	Woo'-na toe nakeni tumai natu'u hi lolo dula pai' natonu-ki toronaa toei , pai' toronaa toei mpowai' tina-na .
41006029	Kara'epe-na topetuku'-na Yohanes kamate-nami , hilou-ramo-rawo mpo'ala' woto-na , pai' ratana .
41006030	Suro to nahubui Yesus mpopalele Lolita Alata'ala wengi , nculii'-ramo ngkai pomakoa'-ra , pai' ratutura-miki Yesus hawe'ea to rababehi pai' to ratudui'-raka ntodea .
41006031	Nto'u toe , wori' lia tauna to hilou-tumai , alaa-na ntahawe' ngkoni' neo' uma-pi ria loga-ra . Toe pai' na'uli' Yesus hi topetuku'-na : " Kita hilou hi kawaoa'-na mpalahii tauna to wori' , bona ma'ala-ta mento'o hampai' . "
41006032	Jadi' , mohawi' sakaya-ramo hilou hi kawaoa'-na .
41006033	Ntaa' pehilo moto-di-hana tauna pe'ongko'-rae , pai' ra'inca wo'o toaa'-ra . Jadi' , wori' tauna ngkai hawe'ea ngata to mohu' , pokeno-rami hilou hi wiwi' rano , rata meri'ulu lau-ra ngkai Yesus hante ana'guru-na .
41006034	Pehompo-na Yesus ngkai sakaya , nahilo-hawo wori' tauna mpopea-i . Metumu'-mi ahi'-na mpohilo-ra , apa' hiloa-ra hewa bima to uma te'ewu . Kanatudui'-rami wori' nyala .
41006035	Neo' solo-mi eo , tumai-ramo ana'guru-na mpomohui'-i , ra'uli'-ki : " Guru , wao'-hana hi rehe'i lau , pai' neo' limpa-mi eo .
41006036	Agina tahubui-ramo tauna toera lau hilou hi ngata pai' tomi hi bonea to mohu' bona mpo'oli pongkoni'-ra . "
41006037	Na'uli' Yesus : " Koi'-mi to mpopokoni'-ra . " Hampetompoi' ana'guru-na : " Ei' ! Ha napa-mi-kaina to kiwai'-rakae ? Nau' ro'atu doi pera' kipope'oli-ki roti , uma-le hono' mpopokoni' tauna to hewa toe lau kadea-ra . "
41006038	Na'uli' Yesus : " Kamata pe' , hangkuja meha' roti to ria hi koi'-e . " Ka'oti-na rapehiloi , ra'uli' : " Ria-le , lima meha'-wadi , pai' rongkaju bau' uru . "
41006039	Ngkai ree , Yesus mpohubui tauna to wori' mohura omea mopantuda-ntuda hi kowo' , apa' wori' kowo' to mata' nto'u toe .
41006040	Pohura-rami pantuda-ntuda , butu ntuda-na ria nte ha'atu , ria wo'o to nte lima mpulu' .
41006041	Oti toe , na'ala'-mi roti to lima meha' pai' uru to rongkaju , pai'-i ngkongoa' hi langi' mosampaya . Oti toe , napihe-pihe-mi roti , pai' nawai'-raka ana'guru-na bona rabagi hi ntodea . Pai' uru to rongkaju , nabagi wo'o-raka omea .
41006042	Ngkoni' omea-ramo duu'-ra bohu .
41006043	Ka'oti-ra ngkoni' , rarumpu-mi toro-na roti pai' bau' , hampulu' roluncu-pi .
41006044	Kawori'-ra to ngkoni' roti toe , ba ria nte lima ncobu paka' tomane .
41006045	Oti toe Yesus mpohubui ana'guru-na mosakaya meri'ulu hilou hi dipo rano hi ngata Betsaida , pai'-i mpohubui tauna to wori' nculii' hilou hi tomi-ra .
41006046	Ponculi'-ra ntodea , manake'-imi hilou hi bulu'-na lou mosampaya .
41006047	Mobengi-mi , hi laintongo' rano-ramo ana'guru-na . Hiaa' Hi'a , hi role-nai-pidi hadudua-na .
41006048	Nahilo-hawo kawuhe-ramo mowose , apa' ngolu' mewui mpotomu sakaya-ra . Parabaja-mi , momako'-imi hilou hi lolo ue mpototoaka-ra , ntani' naliu-ra .
41006049	Karahilo-na to momako' hi lolo ue , pe'au-rami me'eka' , ra'uli' : " Etu tope'ekahi ! "
41006050	Wilingkoroa omea-ramo mpohilo-i . Ncaliu na'uli'-raka Yesus : " Pakaroho nono-ni ! Neo' me'eka' ! Aku'-mile toi-e . "
41006051	Kangkahe'-nami hi rala sakaya dohe-ra , ngolu' wo'o haliu ora-mi . Uma mowo kakonce-ra , apa' kuyu-ramo .
41006052	Apa' nau' ko'ia-ra mahae mpohilo tanda mekoncehi to nababehi hante roti-e ngone , ko'ia oa' monoto hi rala nono-ra kahema-na mpu'u-i Yesus . Morara' oa'-pidi nono-ra mepangala' .
41006053	Karata-ra hi dipo rano , mencore-ramo hi tana' to rahanga' Genesaret .
41006054	Pehompo-ra ngkai sakaya , rahilo-rawo pue' ngata Kayesus-na to rata hi ngata-ra .
41006055	Pokeno-rami hilou hi ngata-ngata to mohu' , pai'-ra tumai mpokowa' doo-ra to peda' . Hiapa-apa kara'epea-na ria-i , hi ree wo'o-mi tauna mpokeni doo-ra topeda' .
41006056	Hiapa kahiloua-na Yesus hi rala ngata bohe ba ngata kedi' , rakeni tumai doo-ra topeda' pai' rapopoturu hi wiwi' karajaa , pai'-ra merapi' hi Yesus bona napiliu-ra mporeo nau' kampa' wuntu baju-na-wadi . Hawe'ea to mporeo baju-na , haliu mo'uri'-ramo .
41007001	Hangkani ria-ra to Parisi pai' guru agama Yahudi to ngkai Yerusalem mpohirua'-ki Yesus .
41007002	Mpohilo-ra ba hangkuja dua topetuku' Yesus ngkoni' hante uma-ra mowano ncala' ntuku' ada agama Yahudi .
41007003	Apa' hawe'ea to Yahudi , mo'ipi lia-ra mpotuku' ada totu'a-ra , hangkedia'-nami hira' to mpotuku' tudui'-ra to Parisi . Ko'ia-ra ngkoni' ane ko'ia-ra mowano ntuku' ada .
41007004	Ane nculii'-ra ngkai pomako'-ra hi rala ngata , kana moniu'-ra ulu ntuku' ada kako'ia-ra mpoganga pongkoni' . Pai' wori' wo'o-pi ada to ratarima ngkai totu'a-ra to ratuku' lia , hewa rapa'-na ada mpobohoi' sangkiri' , kura pai' rewa to rababehi ngkai ngkala .
41007005	Toe pai' to Parisi nte guru-guru agama toera we'i mpokamaro Yesus , ra'uli' : " Napa pai' ana'guru-nu , uma-ra mpotuku' ada totu'a-tae ? Ngkoni'-ra , uma-ra mowano ncala' . "
41007006	Na'uli' Yesus : " Koi'-le , hi mali-na-wadi petuku'-ni hi Alata'ala ! Makono mpu'u lolita to na'uki' nabi Yesaya owi to mpolowa-koi , hewa toi moni-na : Na'uli' Alata'ala : ` Tauna tohe'era mpobila'-a hi wiwi-ra-wadi , nono-ra molaa ngkai Aku' .
41007007	Uma ria kalaua-ra mpopue'-a , apa' tudui'-ra tudui' manusia'-wadi , bela tudui' ngkai Aku' . '
41007008	Jadi' , hawa' Alata'ala nikalempei' moto , hiaa' moroho lia-damo pongkakamu-ni ada manusia' . "
41007009	Ngkai ree , na'uli' tena-raka Yesus : " Koi'-le , pante lia-koi mpelelii' hawa' Alata'ala bona mpotuku' ada-ni moto .
41007010	Hi rala Atura Musa te'uki' hewa toi : ` Kana tabila' tuama pai' tina-ta . ' Pai' ` hema to mpotipo' tuama-na ba tina-na kana rapatehi . '
41007011	Hiaa' koi' metudui' hewa toi : uma-pi mingki' tabila' tina pai' tuama-ta , asala ta'uli'-raka hewa toi : ` Napa to masipato' kuwai'-kokoi totu'a , oti-mi kupajadi' pepue' hi Alata'ala . ' Tauna to mpo'uli' hewa toe , nibahaka-imi ngkai kinolo-na mpotulungi tina pai' tuama-na .
41007012	
41007013	Jadi' , Lolita Alata'ala uma nisaile' , ada to nitarima ngkai totu'a-ni , tetu lau-mi to nitudui'-raka ntodea . Wori'-pidi to hewa tohe'i to nibabehi . "
41007014	Oti toe Yesus mpokio' wo'o-mi tauna to wori' bona mpomohui'-i , na'uli'-raka : " Epe omea-koi bona ni'inca :
41007015	Nau' ba napa-napa to takoni' , uma-hawo toe to mpakada'a-ta hi poncilo Alata'ala . Kehi to mehupa' ngkai rala nono-ta , toe-die to mpakada'a-ta hi poncilo Alata'ala-e . ( (
41007016	Jadi' , hema-koi to tilingaa , pe'epei lompe' ! ) ) "
41007017	Oti toe , Yesus mpalahii tauna to wori' , pai'-i mesua' hi rala tomi . Ana'guru-na mpekune'-i ba napa patuju tudui'-na toe we'i .
41007018	Na'uli' mpo'uli'-raka : " Ha uma wo'o-koiwo nipaha-e ? Pongkoni' to mesua' hi rala nganga-ta ngkai mali-na , bela-hawo toe to mpakada'a-ta hi poncilo Alata'ala .
41007019	Apa' pongkoni' toe , uma mesua' hi rala nono-ta . Mesua' hi ta'i-ta-wadi , pai' ngkai ree kaliliu tatadi . " Hante lolita-na toe , Yesus mpakanoto ka'uma-na ria pongkoni' to rapalii' .
41007020	Na'uli' tena-raka : " Aga kehi pai' gau'-ta , toe-dile to mpakada'a-ta hi poncilo Alata'ala-e , apa' kehi pai' gau'-ta toe mehupa' ngkai nono-ta .
41007021	Ngkai nono manusia' mehupa' pekiri to dada'a , pai' alaa-na ria to mogau' sala' hi tobine ba hi tomane , manako , mepatehi ,
41007022	mobualo' , mebagiu , metipo' , pai' mpobabehi wori' nyala to dada'a . Mpokahina anu doo , mohingi' , molangko nono , nakeni hina nono to dada'a , uma tuduia' .
41007023	Hawe'ea gau' dada'a to hewa toe-mi lau mehupa' ngkai nono manusia' . Toe-mi to mpakada'a tauna hi poncilo Alata'ala-e . "
41007024	Ngkai ree , hilou-imi Yesus hi tana' to mohu' hi ngata Tirus , pai'-i mesua' hi rala tomi . Patuju-na bona ke neo' ra'incai tauna karata-na . Aga karata-na uma ma'ala wuniia' .
41007025	Hi ngata toe , ria wo'o hadua totina , ana'-na tobine kahawia' . Kana'epe-na totina toei karia-na Yesus hi ngata , katumai-nami mowingkotu' hi nyanyoa-na mpopetulungi , na'uli' : " Popalai-ka-kuwo seta to mpohawi' ana'-ku ! " Hiaa' tobine toei , bela-i to Yahudi , to Fenisia-i-hana ngkai tana' Siria .
41007026	
41007027	Toe pai' na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki : " Aku' , mpotulungi to Yahudi-a-kuna ulu . Uma lompe' mpo'ala' koni' ana' , pai' rarora-ki dike' . "
41007028	Na'uli'-mi-hawo tobine toei : " Makono moto-di Pue' . Aga dike' to hi une' meja' wo'o-hawo-le , biasa-ra ngkoni' koni' ana' to mohewu' ngkai lolo meja' . "
41007029	Ngkai ree , na'uli'-mi Yesus : " Kono wo'o-kowo petompoi'-nu ! Wae-pi , nculii'-moko , malai-mi seta to mpesuai' ana'-nu . "
41007030	Kanculii'-nami totina toei . Rata hi tomi , nahilo ana'-na rodo-imi hi poturua-na , apa' malai mpu'u-mi seta .
41007031	Ngkai ree , Yesus mpalahii ngata Tirus mpokaliliu pomako'-na ntara hi ngata Sidon , pai' nculii' wo'o-imi hilou hi rano Galilea , rata hi tana' Dekapolis .
41007032	Hi ree , ria to mpokeni hadua tauna to wongo pai' to neo' uma howa' mololita . Merapi'-ra bona najama-i-hawo .
41007033	Yesus mpokeni tauna toei ngkai laintongo' ntodea . Ka'oti-na napatani'-i , nape'uso karawe-na hi tilinga-na ntimalia , mpetiliku-i , pai'-i mpojama jila'-na tauna toei .
41007034	Oti toe , ngkongoa'-imi hi langi' mpo'osu' inoha'-na pai' mpo'uli' : " Mobea-mi ! " ( Hi rala basa-ra to Yahudi , moni-na hewa toi : " Efata ! " )
41007035	Pe'epe mpu'u-imi-hawo , pai' jila'-na molengkue'-mi . Lonto'-mi-hawo pololita-na .
41007036	Ngkai ree , Yesus mpotagi-ra tauna to wori' bona neo' ra'uli' hi hema-hema napa to jadi' tohe'e . Aga nau' wae kanatagi-ra , hangkedi'-na lau-mi karatolele-na .
41007037	Uma mowo kakonce-ra ntodea , ntora ra'uli'-mi : " Hawe'ea to nababehi , lompe' . Tauna to wongo napaka'uri' , pe'epe-ramo ! Tauna to uma howa' mololita , howa'-ramo mololita ! "
41008001	Uma mahae ngkai ree , wori' wo'o-mi tauna morumpu dohe Yesus . Apa' uma-hawo ria pongkoni'-ra , nakio'-ra ana'guru-na pai' na'uli'-raka :
41008002	" Tuna-kuna nono-ku mpohilo tauna to wori' toera lau . Tolu eo-ramo dohe-ku , uma ria pongkoni'-ra .
41008003	Hiaa' ane kuhubui-ra nculii' hilou hi tomi-ra ntali oro'-ra , meka' molinga'-ra mpai' hi ohea . Apa' ria-ra to ngkai kalaa-na . "
41008004	Ra'uli' ana'guru-na : " Ngkaiapa-tana mpai' tarata pongkoni' tapokoni'-raka , bo wao'-hana hi rehe'i lau ? "
41008005	Napekune'-ra : " Hangkuja roti to ria hi koi'-e ? " Ra'uli'-ki : " Pitu meha' . "
41008006	Ngkai ree , nahubui-ramo tauna to wori' mohura hi tana' . Na'ala'-mi roti pai'-i mpo'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala . Oti toe , napihe-pihe-mi pai' nawai'-raka ana'guru-na mpobagi-bagi-raka tauna to wori' .
41008007	Ria wo'o-raka bau' uru to kedi' ba hangkuja ma'a . Naposampayai wo'o pai' nahubui ana'guru-na mpobagi hi ntodea .
41008008	Ngkoni'-ramo duu'-ra bohu . Kawori'-ra to ngkoni' nto'u toe , ba opo' ncobu . Ka'oti-ra ngkoni' , rarumpu-mi toro-na , pitu luncu-pi . Oti toe , Yesus mpohubui-ra nculii' hilou hi tomi-ra ,
41008009	
41008010	pai' Hi'a hante ana'guru-na mohawi' sakaya hilou hi ngata Dalmanuta .
41008011	Ba hangkuja dua to Parisi rata hi Yesus , pai' ratepu'u-mi mpomehono'-ki doko' mposori-i . Ra'uli'-ki : " Babehi-mi anu mekoncehi bona monoto ki'inca kangkai Alata'ala-na mpu'u-ko . "
41008012	Kana'epe-na Yesus lolita-ra , na'osu'-mi inoha'-na pai' na'uli' : " Napa-di pai' tauna to tuwu' tempo toi merapi' tanda mekoncehi-e ? Uma-a dota ! Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : uma-koi kupopohiloi tanda mekoncehi hewa to niperapi' . "
41008013	Kanapalahii-rami , mehawi'-imi hi sakaya hilou hi dipo rano .
41008014	Hi pomako'-ra tohe'e , ana'guru-na Yesus uma mpokiwoi ngkeni boku , muntu' hameha' roti to ria hi rala sakaya .
41008015	Yesus mpololitai-ra hante hanyala walatu , na'uli' : " Pelompehi-koi , mo'inga'-inga' hi ragi-ra to Parisi pai' ragi Magau' Herodes ! "
41008016	Aga uma ra'incai batua-na walatu toe , helee momepololitai moto-ramo , ra'uli' : " Pai' na'uli' hewa toe-le , apa' uma ria roti-ta . "
41008017	Ntaa' na'inca-di Yesus napa to ra'uli' ana'guru-nae , toe pai' na'uli'-raka : " Napa pai' ntora mpololita ka'uma-na ria roti-nie ? Ko'ia oa'-tano nipaha-e ? Ha uma oa' monoto nono-ni , jau-mi ni'epe tudui'-ku , jau nihilo kabaraka'-ku ? Mataa pai' tilingaa moto-koi , hiaa' uma oa' nipaha napa to nihilo pai' to ni'epe ? Ha uma nikiwoi ,
41008018	
41008019	roti to lima meha' kupihe-pihe kupokoni'-raka tauna to lima ncobu ? Hangkuja luncu-pi toro-na to nirumpu ? " Ra'uli' ana'guru-na : " Hampulu' roluncu . "
41008020	Napekune' tena Yesus : " Pai' roti to pitu meha' kupokoni'-raka to opo' ncobu , hangkuja luncu wo'o-pi toro-na to nirumpu ? " Ra'uli' : " Pitu luncu-pi . "
41008021	Na'uli' tena-raka : " Hiaa' uma oa' nipaha toe ? "
41008022	Ngkai ree , rata-ramo hi ngata Betsaida . Hi ngata toe , ria to ngkeni hadua towero hi Yesus . Merapi'-ra bona najama-i-hawo .
41008023	Yesus mpokamu pale-na , pai' natete'-i hilou hi mali bola' . Na'uelikui mata-na pai' naganga . Oti toe , napekune'-i : " Ria to nuhilo ba napa-napa ? "
41008024	Towero toe menaa-naa pai' na'uli' : " Kuhilo tauna , mokao' hewa kaju to mako' hilou tumai . "
41008025	Oti toe , naganga tena mata-na , pai' nahubui-i menaa . Mo'uri' mpu'u-miki mata-na . Hawe'ea to nahilo , monoto-mi .
41008026	Oti toe , Yesus mpohubui-i nculii' hilou hi tomi-na , na'uli'-ki : " Nculii'-moko hilou hi tomi-nu , aga neo'-ko mesua' hi rala ngata mpo'uli'-raka pue' ngata napa to jadi' toi . "
41008027	Yesus hante ana'guru-na hilou hi ngata to mohu' Kaisarea Filipi . Hi lengko ohea , napekune'-ra , na'uli' : " Ntuku' ponguli' ntodea , hema-a Aku' toi-e ? "
41008028	Ra'uli'-ki : " Ria to mpo'uli' Yohanes Topeniu'-ko tuwu' nculii' . Ria wo'o to mpo'uli' nabi Elia-ko . Ria wo'o-ra to mpo'uli' Iko hadua nabi to owi tuwu' nculii' . "
41008029	Napekune' tena-ra , na'uli' : " Hiaa' koi'-koiwo mpo'uli' hema-a Aku' toi-e ? " Natompoi' Petrus : " Iko-mi Magau' Topetolo' ! "
41008030	Ngkai ree , Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Neo' ulu ni'uli' hi hema-hema ka' Aku'-na Magau' Topetolo' . "
41008031	Oti toe , natepu'u-mi Yesus mpotudui' ana'guru-na napa to kana jadi' hi woto-na . Na'uli'-raka : " Aku' Ana' Manusia' kana mporata wori' kaparia . Rasapuaka-a mpai' totu'a ngata , imam pangkeni hante guru agama . Rapatehi-a mpai' , aga tolu eo oti toe , tuwu' nculii' moto-a . "
41008032	Hawe'ea toe napolonto' mpo'uli'-raka . Aga Petrus mpo'ai'-i hi ncori-na pai' nakorai'-i .
41008033	Yesus me'ili' pai' mponaa ana'guru-na , pai'-i ngkaroe Petrus , na'uli'-ki : " Palai-ko topesori ! Pekiri-nu tetu-le pekiri manusia' , bela pekiri Alata'ala . "
41008034	Oti toe , Yesus mpokio' tauna to wori' bona morumpu hangkaa-ngkania hante Hi'a pai' ana'guru-na . Na'uli'-raka : " Hema to doko' mpotuku'-a kana mpobahaka konoa-na moto , pai' kana napaha'a kaju parika'-na -- batua-na : kana natuku' hawa'-ku nau' napomate-ki . Oti toe-di pai' lako' ma'ala-i mpotuku'-a .
41008035	Hema to mpentaei konoa-na moto , uma-i mpai' mporatai katuwua' to lompe' . Aga hema to mpobahaka konoa-na moto sabana petuku'-na hi Aku' pai' sabana Kareba Lompe' , nau' napomate-ki , hi'a mpai' to mporata katuwua' to lompe' .
41008036	Napa kalaua-na tarumpu hawe'ea ka'uaa' dunia' , ane uma taratai katuwua' to lompe' hi eo mpeno-na .
41008037	Apa' uma ria napa-napa to ma'ala tasula'-ki katuwua' to lompe' toe .
41008038	" Mo'oha'-koi hi laintongo' tauna to dada'a pai' to uma mpotuku'-a . Aga hema to me'ea' mpangaku' petuku'-na hi Aku' pai' mpoka'ea' tudui'-ku , Aku' wo'o mpai' me'ea' mpangaku' kahi'a-na topetuku'-ku ane rata-apa mpai' ngkai suruga . Nto'u toe mpai' , Aku' Ana' Manusia' mana'u tumai hante mala'eka-mala'eka to moroli' , mehini-a hante baraka'-na Tuama-ku . "
41009001	Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus : " Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : Ngkai olo'-ni koi' toi , ria-koi mpai' to ko'ia mate kako'ia-na nihilo Alata'ala moparenta hante baraka'-na . "
41009002	Ono mengi ngkai ree , Yesus mpobawai tolu ana'guru-na hilou dohe-na hi bulu' to molangko . Ana'guru to tolu toera : Petrus , Yakobus pai' Yohanes . Muntu' Yesus hante ana'guru-na to tolu toera-wadi to hi ria . Bula-ra hi ria , mobali'-mi lence-na .
41009003	Pohea-na hangaa mengea' meringkila' , uma ria haduaa hi rala dunia' tohe'i to ma'ala mo'uja' duu'-na mengea' hewa toe .
41009004	Rahilo-rawo ana'guru-nae , ria rodua nabi to owi mpololitai Yesus . Nabi toera , Elia pai' Musa .
41009005	Ngkai ree Petrus mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Guru , lompe' lia-ta mo'oha' hi rehe'i . Agina kibabehi-damo tolu bamaru' : hameha' bagia-nu Pue' , hameha' bagia-na Musa , pai' hameha' wo'o bagia-na Elia . "
41009006	Kakono-na , uma-hawo na'incai Petrus napa to na'uli' toe , apa' nto'u toe bula-ra me'eka' lia .
41009007	Nto'u toe wo'o , rata-mi limu' mpokamoui-ra , pai' ngkai rala limu' ra'epe topololita to mpo'uli' : " Hi'a toi-mi Ana'-ku to kupe'ahi' . Pe'epei lolita-na ! "
41009008	Hampegoli we'i , ranaa-rawo ntololikia-ra , uma-pi ria tau ntani'-na dohe-ra , hadua Yesus-damo .
41009009	Pana'u-ra ngkai lolo bulu' toe , Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Neo' ulu nilolita hi hema-hema napa to nihilo we'i , duu'-na Aku' Ana' Manusia' memata ngkai kamatea . "
41009010	Ratuku' mpu'u-miki hawa'-na toe , uma mpu'u-rawo ralolita kajadia' toe hi hema-hema . Aga hi himpau hira' moto bate ntora rapomepekunei' ba napa patuju-na Yesus mpo'uli' kamemata-na mpai' ngkai kamatea .
41009011	Mepekune'-ramo hi Yesus , ra'uli' : " Napa pai' guru agama mpo'uli' nabi Elia ncala'-di to ri'ulu rata , pai' lako' rata-idi Magau' Topetolo'-e ? "
41009012	Na'uli'-raka : " Makono mpu'u-di . Elia kana rata mperi'ulu , apa' hi'a to mporodo hawe'ea-na . Aga beiwa-ama Aku' Ana' Manusia' ? Napa pai' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' te'uki' kamporata-ku wori' kaparia pai'-a raruge' tauna ?
41009013	Aga ane nabi Elia , ku'uli'-kokoi , mpolia' rata-imile Elia-e , aga pangkeni ngata-ta mpo'ewa-i ntuku' konoa-ra , hewa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' . "
41009014	Oti toe , Yesus pai' ana'guru-na to tolu toera , mana'u-ramo ngkai lolo bulu' mpohirua'-raka ana'guru to ntani'-na . Rata hi ria , rahilo-rawo wori' tauna mpotipuhi ana'guru-na , pai' ba hangkuja dua guru agama bula-ra mpomehono'-raka .
41009015	Pehilo-ra tauna to wori' toera etu-mi tumai Yesus . Wae kampohilo-ra , konce-ramo . Pokeno-rami hilou mpohirua'-ki .
41009016	Yesus mpekune'-ra : " Napa to nipomepekunei' hante guru agama toera ? "
41009017	Hadua ngkai tauna to wori' toera mpo'uli' : " Guru , oi-kuwo ana'-ku , kukeni bona nupaka'uri'-i . Uma-i howa' mololita apa' napesuai' anudaa'-i .
41009018	Ane napesuai' wo'o-ipi anudaa'-e , modungka-i hi tana' , mowura' nganga-na , kakakeji'-keji' ngihi'-na , pai' mokadu hudu woto-na . Kuperapi'-ramo ana'guru-nu mpopalai anudaa'-na , aga uma rakulei' . "
41009019	Na'uli' Yesus : " Uma mowo-koie' . Ko'ia oa'-tano mepangala'-koie ! Ni'uli'-koina hangkuja tena-pi kahae-ku dohe-ni , hangkuja tena-pi kahae-na kupengkatarii kalente pepangala'-nie ! Keni tumai ana' tetui ! "
41009020	Rakeni mpu'u-mi ana' toei hi Yesus . Wae pehilo-na anudaa' toei mpohilo Yesus , napakako'o wo'o-mi woto ana' toei duu'-na modungka-i pai'-i ngkawulela' hi tana' , nganga-na mowura' .
41009021	Mepekune'-i Yesus hi tuama-na ana' toei , na'uli' : " Hangkuja-mi hae-na narata haki' toi-e ? " Na'uli' tuama-na : " Ngkai kakedia'-nami-hana .
41009022	Wori' ngkani-mi anudaa' mpodungka-i hi rala apu ba hi rala ue doko' napatehi . Ane ma'ala Guru , poka'ahi' pai' tulungi-ka-kaiwo ! "
41009023	Na'uli' Yesus : " Napa pai' nu'uli' ` ane ma'ala-e ? ' Hawe'ea ma'ala jadi' hi tauna to mepangala' . "
41009024	Hampetompoi' tuama-na ana' toei napesukui : " Mepangala'-ama Pue' ! Tulungi-a-kuwo , apa' aku' toi kura' rahi pepangala'-ku . "
41009025	Nahilo Yesus kawoo-woria' tauna to mokeno tumai morumpu . Kanahawai'-nami anudaa' toe , na'uli' : " Ee anudaa' to mepakawongo pai' mepakawojo tetu-ko ! Petibo'-ko ngkai ana' tetui , pai' neo'-pi nupesuai' nculii' . "
41009026	Pe'au-nami ana' toei , kakapadi-padi woto-na , pai' malai-mi anudaa' . Kamalai-na anudaa' , uma-pi molengo ana' toei , hewa tomate-imi , alaa-na wori' to mpo'uli' : " Mate-imi ! "
41009027	Aga Yesus mpokamu pale-na mpotulungi-i memata . Memata mpu'u-imi-hawo ana' toei .
41009028	Oti toe , Yesus pai' ana'guru-na malai ngkai ree mesua' hi rala tomi . Pesua'-ra hi rala tomi , mepekune'-ramo hi Yesus , ra'uli' : " Guru , napa pai' uma kipakulei' mpopalai anudaa' toei-e we'i ? "
41009029	Na'uli'-raka : " Anudaa' to hewa tohe'e uma-hana ma'ala rapopalai hante inca napa-napa , muntu' hante mosampaya . "
41009030	Oti toe , Yesus pai' ana'guru-na malai ngkai ree mpokaliliu pomako'-ra ntara hi tana' Galilea . Patuju-na Yesus bona neo' ra'incai ntodea kahiapa-na ,
41009031	apa' nto'u toe bula-na mpotudui' ana'guru-na . Na'uli'-raka : " Aku' Ana' Manusia' , ratonu-a mpai' hi kuasa manusia' . Rapatehi-a mpai' , aga tolu eo oti toe , tuwu' nculii'-a . "
41009032	Aga ana'guru-na uma mpo'incai patuju-na Yesus . Hiaa' uma wo'o-ra daho' mpekune'-i .
41009033	Rata-ramo hi ngata Kapernaum . Hi rala tomi-ramo , mepekune'-i Yesus hi ana'guru-na , na'uli' : " Napa-die to ntora nilolita hi lengko ohea-e we'i ? "
41009034	Uma-ra winihi , apa' to rapomehonoi' hi lengko ohea we'i , ba hema-ra to meliu kabohe tuwu'-ra .
41009035	Jadi' , mohura-imi Yesus pai'-i mpokio' ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua , na'uli'-raka : " Hema to doko' meliu bohe tuwu'-na , kana tuwu' mengkadingki'-i , meliu kadingki'-na ngkai hawe'ea doo-na , pai' kana jadi' pahawaa' hi hawe'ea doo-na . "
41009036	Oti toe , na'ala' hadua ana' to kedi' , napopokore hi laintongo'-ra . Nakupui ana' toei pai' na'uli'-raka ana'guru-na :
41009037	" Hema to mpotarima hadua ana' to kedi' hewa ana' toii sabana petuku'-na hi Aku' , batua-na Aku'-mi to natarima . Pai' hema to mpotarima-a , uma muntu' Aku' to natarima , mpotarima wo'o-i Alata'ala to mposuro-a . "
41009038	Na'uli' Yohanes mpo'uli'-ki : " Guru , ria kihilo hadua tauna mpopalai seta hante hanga'-nu , aga kitagi-i apa' bela-i topetuku'-ta . "
41009039	Na'uli' Yesus : " Neo'-i ratagi , apa' tauna to mpobabehi anu mobaraka' hante hanga'-ku , uma-ra mpai' kaliliu mporuge'-a .
41009040	Tauna to uma mpo'ewa-ta , batua-na hira'-mi to tono' hi kita' .
41009041	" Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : ane ria to mpotulungi-koi apa' topetuku' Kristus-koi , bate mporata-i hiwili-na hi eo mpeno . Nau' ue mara-wadi nawai'-koi ni'inu sabana petuku'-ni hi Aku' , bate mporata-i mpai' hiwili-na .
41009042	" Aga hema to mpopanawu' hadua ana' to kedi' hewa ana' toii alaa-na uma-ipi mepangala' hi Aku' , bohe mpu'u mpai' pehuku'-na Alata'ala hi tauna tetui . Agina lau-pi hameha' watu po'ahaa' to bohe ratoe hi wuroko'-na pai'-i ratene' hi rala tahi' .
41009043	" Ane rapa'-na pale-ta hamali mpakeni-ta mojeko' , pua' lau-imi . Agina hamali-damo pale-ta , asala mporata-ta katuwua' to lompe' dohe Alata'ala . Agina lau-pi toe , ngkai palea ntimalia-ta , hiaa' ka'omea-na mesua' naraka-tamo hi rala apu to jela' ncuu . ( (
41009044	Apa' hi ria mpai' , tauna nakoni' ule ncuu pai' rasesa' hi rala apu . ) )
41009045	Ane rapa'-na witi'-ta hamali mpakeni-ta mojeko' , pua' lau-imi . Agina hamali-damo witi'-ta , asala mporata-ta katuwua' to lompe' dohe Alata'ala . Agina lau-pi toe , ngkai witia' ntimalia-ta , hiaa' ka'omea-na ratadi-ta hi rala naraka . ( (
41009046	Hi ria mpai' , tauna nakoni' ule ncuu pai' rasesa' hi rala apu . ) )
41009047	Pai' ane rapa'-na mata-ta hamali mpakeni-ta mojeko' , jungki' lau-mi . Agina hamali-wadi mata-ta pai'-ta jadi' ntodea Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua'-na . Agina lau-pi toe , ngkai mataa ntimalia-ta , hiaa' ka'omea-na ratadi-ta hi rala apu naraka .
41009048	Hi ria mpai' , tauna nakoni' ule ncuu pai' rasesa' hi rala apu .
41009049	Ntuku' Atura Musa , hawe'ea pongkoni' to rapopepue' hi Alata'ala kana rapoii' . Wae wo'o butu dua tauna kana rapomoroli' hante apu .
41009050	" Poi' wori' kalaua-na . Aga ane mobali'-mi kapoi'-na alaa-na mononto , napa tena to ma'ala mpakapoi'-i ? Wae wo'o , koi' to mpotuku'-a kana hewa poi' : Neo' nipelele' pepangala'-ni jadi' lente . Kana tuwu' hintuwu'-koi . "
41010001	Malai-imi Yesus ngkai ree hilou hi tana' Yudea pai' hi dipo ue Yordan . Wori' wo'o-mi tauna tumai mpotipuhi-i , pai' hewa to lalaua natudui' wo'o-ramo .
41010002	Ria ba hangkuja dua to Parisi rata mpali' kedo' . Rapekune'-i : " Ntuku' atura agama-ta , ba ma'ala moto-hawo tomane mpogaa'-ki tobine-nae ? "
41010003	Na'uli' Yesus : " Napa parenta to nawai'-kokoi nabi Musa ? "
41010004	Ratompoi' to Parisi : " Musa mpiliu tomane mpogaa'-ki tobine-na , asala nababehi ncala' sura mpogaa' . "
41010005	Na'uli' Yesus : " Musa mpo'uki' pai' mpoparata-kokoi parenta toe-le , apa' ngkai kamotu'a maga-ni , uma tuduia' .
41010006	Aga ngkai lomo' kajadi' dunia' , nto'u Alata'ala mpajadi' manusia' , napajadi'-ra hadua tomane pai' hadua tobine .
41010007	` Toe pai' tomane kana mpalahii tina pai' tuama-na , pai' kana tuwu' hintuwu' hante tobine-na ,
41010008	bona hira' tau rodua toe jadi' hewa hadua lau-ra-damo . ' Jadi' , hi poncilo Alata'ala , tau hancamoko uma-pi rodua , hadua lau-ramo .
41010009	Toe pai' ku'uli'-kokoi : ane ntoa' Alata'ala mpoposidai'-ra , manusia' uma ma'ala mpogaa'-ra . "
41010010	Oti toe , Yesus pai' ana'guru-na mesua' hi rala tomi . Bula-ra hi rala tomi ana'guru-na mpekune'-i , ra'uli' : " Beiwa mpu'u-hawo gau' pogaa' tohe'e we'i-e ? "
41010011	Na'uli'-raka : " Hema to mpogaa'-ki tobine-na pai'-i ncamoko hante tobine to ntani'-na , mobualo'-i-hana , mpobualohi tobine-na to lomo'-na .
41010012	Wae wo'o tobine to mpogaa'-ki tomane-na pai'-i ncamoko hante tomane to ntani'-na , mobualo' wo'o-i-wadi-hawo . "
41010013	Hangkani , ria tauna to mpokeni ana'-ra hi Yesus bona najama pai' nagane'-ra . Aga ana'guru-na mpokaroe tauna toera .
41010014	Mpohilo toe-di , kamoroe-nami Yesus mpokaroe ana'guru-na , na'uli'-raka : " Pelele' moto-ra ana' tetura tumai hi Aku' , neo'-ra nitagi . Apa' tauna to hewa toe-ramo to jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua'-na .
41010015	Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : Ane uma-koi mengkoru hi Alata'ala hewa ana' , uma-koi mpai' jadi' ntodea-na hi rala Kamagaua'-na . "
41010016	Ka'oti-na mpo'uli' toe , nakupui-ramo ana' toera , najama-ra pai'-ra nagane' .
41010017	Neo' me'ongko' wo'o-imi Yesus mpokaliliu pomako'-na , muu-mule' mokeno tumai hadua tauna mperapai-i , kaliliu mowingkotu' hi nyanyoa-na , pai'-i mepekune' , na'uli' : " Guru to lompe' , napa-kuwo to kana kubabehi bona mporata-a-kuwo katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na ? "
41010018	Na'uli' Yesus : " Napa pai' nu'uli' tauna to lompe'-a ? Uma ria ntani'-na to lompe' , hadua Alata'ala-wadi .
41010019	Nu'inca moto parenta to te'uki' hi rala Atura Pue' : ` Neo' mepatehi , neo' mobualo' , neo' manako , neo' mosabi' boa' , neo' mebagiu , pai' kana tabila' tina pai' tuama-ta . ' "
41010020	Na'uli' tauna toei : " Guru , hawe'ea parenta tetu lau , kutuku' omea-mi ngkai kakedia'-ku . "
41010021	Yesus mpomonaa-i hante ahi'-na , pai' na'uli'-ki : " Hanyala-pi to kana nubabehi . Lou-moko ulu mpobalu' rewa-nu , pai' doi oli-na wai'-raka tokabu . Ane nubabehi hewa toe , bohe mpai' rasi' to nurata hi rala suruga . Oti toe , pai' tumai-moko mpotuku'-a . "
41010022	Kana'epe-na lolita-na Yesus tohe'e , peda'-mi nono-na . Kamalai-nami ngkai ree hante susa' nono-na , apa' wori' rewa-na .
41010023	Yesus mpomonaa ana'guru-na to mokore ntololikia-na , pai' na'uli'-raka : " Mokoro rahi tauna to wori' rewa-ra mengkoru hi Alata'ala bona Hi'a jadi' Magau'-ra . "
41010024	Rapokakonce ana'guru-na mpo'epe lolita-na tohe'e . Toe pai' na'uli' tena-raka : " Ana'-ana'-ku , mokoro mpu'u manusia' mengkoru hi Alata'ala bona Hi'a jadi' Magau'-ra .
41010025	Mojoli-pi hama'a unta ntara hi wulou' jaru , ngkai tauna to mo'ua' mengkoru hi Alata'ala bona Hi'a jadi' Magau'-ra . "
41010026	Mpo'epe toe-di , hangkedi' kakonce-ra ana'guru-na , ra'uli' : " Ei' , ane wae-di , hema lau-damo to ma'ala mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-nae ! "
41010027	Yesus mponaa-ra pai' na'uli'-raka : " Ane hante pakulea' manusia'-le , uma ami' hema . Aga ane Alata'ala , ma'ala oa' madupa' , apa' hi Alata'ala uma ria to uma madupa' . "
41010028	Ngkai ree , na'uli' Petrus mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Hiaa' kai' , kipalahii omea-mi-kaina bona mpotuku'-ko . "
41010029	Na'uli' Yesus : " Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : Hema-hema to mpalahii ompi'-na , tina-na ba tuama-na , ana'-na ba tomi-na ba bonea-na sabana mpotuku'-a pai' sabana Kareba Lompe' ,
41010030	bate mporata-i mpai' hiwili to bohe . Hi dunia' toi mporata-i ha'atu ngkani kawori' tomi , ompi' , tina , ana' , bonea -- pai' mporata wo'o-i pebalinai' . Pai' hi eo mpeno-na mpai' , mporata wo'o-i katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na .
41010031	Aga wori' tauna to bohe tuwu'-ra tempo toi jadi' kedi' tuwu'-ra hi eo mpeno . Pai' wori' wo'o tauna to kedi' tuwu'-ra tempo toi jadi' bohe tuwu'-ra hi eo mpeno . "
41010032	Yesus hante ana'guru-na mpokaliliu pomako'-ra hilou hi Yerusalem . Yesus momako' ri'ulu , ana'guru-na hi boko' . Koro' ana'guru-na mpohilo-i , pai' tauna to metuku' hi boko' wo'o me'eka' omea-ramo . Toe pai' nakio' wo'o-mi ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua mopahantani' , pai' na'uli'-raka napa to kana jadi' mpai' hi woto-na .
41010033	Na'uli' : " Epe-koi ! Hilou-tamo tohe'i-e mpotoa' Yerusalem . Hi ria mpai' , Aku' Ana' Manusia' ratonu hi imam pangkeni pai' guru agama , pai' rabotuhi bona rapatehi-a . Oti toe ratonu-a hi tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi .
41010034	Rapopo'ore'-a , ra'uelikui , raweba' , pai' rapatehi . Aga tolu eo oti toe tuwu' nculii' moto-a . "
41010035	Oti toe , Yakobus pai' Yohanes , ana'-na Zebedeus , mpomohui' Yesus , ra'uli'-ki : " Guru , ria hanyala to doko' kiperapi' ngkai Iko . "
41010036	Na'uli' Yesus : " Napa to niperapi' kuwai'-koi ? "
41010037	Ra'uli' : " Ane nupopehuwu mpai' baraka'-nu pai'-ko jadi' Magau' , piliu-kai mohura pai' moparenta dohe-nu , hadua hi mali ka'ana-nu , hadua hi mali ki'ii-nu . "
41010038	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Uma ni'incai napa to niperapi' tetu . Ha nipakule' mpai' mpokolo kaparia to kana kukolo Aku'-e ? Ha nipakule' mpotodohaka to kutodohaka-e mpai' ? "
41010039	Ra'uli' : " Kipakule' moto ! " Na'uli' Yesus : " Makono , bate nikolo mpu'u mpai' kaparia hewa to kukolo , pai' nitodohaka napa to kutodohaka .
41010040	Aga ane hema to mohura hi mali ka'ana-ku ba hi mali ki'ii-ku , bela Aku' to mpakatantu tetu . Alata'ala-hana to mpakatantu hema to mporata bagia tetu . "
41010041	Kara'epe-na ana'guru-na to hampulu' pomperapia' Yakobus pai' Yohanes toe , moroe-ramo .
41010042	Toe pai' Yesus mpokio'-ra omea , pai' na'uli'-raka : " Ni'inca moto kasoa-ra topoparenta to uma mpo'incai Alata'ala mpoparentai ntodea-ra . Tauna to bohe pangka'-ra mpewuku ntodea-ra mpotuku' hawa'-ra .
41010043	Aga koi' , neo' hewa toe kehi-ni ! Hema-koi to doko' bohe pangka'-na kana jadi' pahawaa' .
41010044	Pai' hema to doko' bohe hanga'-na kana jadi' batua hi hawe'ea doo-na .
41010045	Bangku' Aku' Ana' Manusia'-e' , patuju-ku tumai hi dunia' , uma bona jadi' topohawa' . Pai'-a tumai-le , bona jadi' pahawaa' , duu'-na mpewai' woto-ku rapatehi mpotolo' sala' tauna to wori' . "
41010046	Yesus pai' ana'guru-na rata hi ngata Yerikho . Nto'u-ra malai ngkai ngata , wori' tauna mpotuku'-ra . Hi wiwi' ohea mohura hadua tauna to wero kakarapi'-rapi' . Hanga'-na Bartimeus ( batua-na : ana' Timeus ) .
41010047	Kana'epe-na Bartimeus Kayesus to Nazaret to liu , kamekio'-nami na'uli' : " Yesus , muli Magau' Daud ! Poka'ahi'-a-kuwo ! "
41010048	Wori' tauna mpokaroe-i , ra'uli' : " Ngkalino-ko ! " Aga hangkedi' kanapesukui-na mekio' : " Muli Magau' Daud , poka'ahi'-a-kuwo ! "
41010049	Mentoda'-imi Yesus pai' na'uli' : " Kio'-i tumai ! " Karakio'-nami towero toei , ra'uli'-ki : " Pakaroho nono-nu ! Mokore-moko , apa' nakio'-moko ! "
41010050	Kamokore-nami towero toei , nabahaka abe'-na hi ohea pai' napesahui hilou hi Yesus .
41010051	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki : " Napa to nupokono kubabehi-koko ? " Natompoi' towero toei : " Guru , bona pehilo-a-kuwo ! "
41010052	Na'uli' Yesus : " Hilou-moko . Kupaka'uri'-moko sabana pepangala'-nu hi Aku' . " Ncaliu pehilo-imi , pai'-i mpotuku' Yesus .
41011001	Kamohu'-ra hi ngata Yerusalem , rata-ramo hi ngata Betfage pai' Betania hi Bulu' Zaitun . Hi ree , Yesus mpohubui rodua ana'guru-na hilou meri'ulu ,
41011002	na'uli'-raka : " Hilou-mokoi hi ngata to tanyanyohi toe mai . Wae pesua'-ni mpai' rala ngata , nihilo mpai' hama'a ana' keledai tehoo' , to ko'ia hangkania rahawi' . Bongka koloro-na pai' keni-i tumai .
41011003	Ane ria to mpekune'-koi napa pai' nibongka-i , uli'-raka hewa toi : ` Apa' naparaluu Pue' , napebolo ulu pai' napoponculi' moto mpai' . ' "
41011004	Kahilou-rami ana'guru-na to rodua toera , rarata mpu'u-mi hama'a ana' keledai tehoo' hi wiwi' ohea mohu' wobo' tomi . Karabongka-nami-rawo .
41011005	Tauna to mokore hi ree mpekune'-ra : " Napa pai' nibongka keledai tetu-e ? "
41011006	Ratompoi' hewa to na'uli'-raka Yesus we'i . Mpo'epe toe , rapelele' wae-ramo mpokeni keledai toe .
41011007	Karata-ra nculii' , ralampii-mi keledai toe hante baju-ra , pai' mehawi'-imi Yesus .
41011008	Hilou-ramo mpotoa' Yerusalem . Wori' tauna mpotuku'-ra . Ria-ra to meri'ulu , ria wo'o-ra to hi boko' . Wori'-ra mpokodo pohea-ra hi mata ohea to natara Yesus , pai' hantongo' wo'o-ra hilou mpo'ala' rau-rau kaju hi pampa pai' rakodo hi mata ohea , bona mpobila'-i . Tauna to wori' toera , ntora mogora-ra mpo'uli' : Une'-imi Pue' Ala ! " Pue' mpogane' Magau' to tumai mpokeni hanga'-na ! "
41011009	
41011010	" Pue' mpogane' poparenta-na . Moparenta-i mpai' hewa ntu'a-ta owi , Magau' Daud . " Une'-imi Pue' Ala to hi rala suruga ! "
41011011	Karata-na Yesus hi ngata Yerusalem , kaliliu mesua'-i hi rala Tomi Alata'ala . Napomonaa ntololikia-na mponaa omea . Oti toe , apa' neo' mobengi-mi , nculii' wo'o-imi hante ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua hilou turu hi ngata Betania .
41011012	Kamepulo-na , me'ongko' wo'o-ramo ngkai Betania lou hi Yerusalem . Hi ohea , mo'oro'-i Yesus .
41011013	Molaa-pidi , nahilo-hawo hangkaju kaju ara to mobumu-damo rau-na -- hiaa' ko'ia tempo powuaa'-na . Hilou-imi hi kaju toe , pai' nanaa meka' ba ria wua'-na . Aga uma ria nau' hantakua .
41011014	Toe pai' natotowi kaju toe , na'uli' : " Ngkai eo toe lau , uma-pi ria mpai' haduaa tauna to mpokoni' wua' ngkai kaju toi ! " Ana'guru-na mpo'epe lolita-na toe .
41011015	Rata wo'o-ramo hi Yerusalem , hilou-imi Yesus hi berewe Tomi Alata'ala . Hi ree-i mpopalai tauna to mobabalu' . Nabilingko-raka meja'-meja' posulaa'-ra doi , pai' nabilingko wo'o pohuraa topobabalu' danci mangkebodo .
41011016	Uma napiliu tauna mpokeni rewa ntara berewe Tomi Alata'ala toe .
41011017	Natudui'-ra , na'uli' : " Ha uma ni'incai napa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' ? Alata'ala mpo'uli' hewa toi : ` Tomi-ku mpai' jadi' tomi posampayaa to rapake' tauna humalili' dunia' . ' Hiaa' koi'-koina , niponcawa tomi toperampaki-di ! "
41011018	Kara'epe-na imam pangkeni pai' guru agama napa to nababehi Yesus toe , rapali'-mi akala-ra doko' mpopatehi-i . Koro'-ra , apa' hawe'ea tauna goe' mpo'epe tudui'-na .
41011019	Neo' mobengi-mi , Yesus hante ana'guru-na malai ngkai ngata , lou turu hi Bulu' Zaitun .
41011020	Kamepulo-na mepupulo ngkii-pidi , hilou wo'o-ramo hi Yerusalem . Hi lengko ohea , rahilo-rawo kaju ara to natotowi Yesus wengi , mate-mi , bangi rata hi rali'-na .
41011021	Nakiwoi-mi Petrus lolita-na Yesus . Toe pai' na'uli' mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Guru ! Hilo-dile kaju ara to nutotowi wengi-e , molaju-mi ! "
41011022	Na'uli' Yesus : " Mepangala'-mokoi hi Alata'ala !
41011023	Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : Ane rapa'-na ria tauna to mpo'uli'-ki bulu' tohe'i : ` Te'ongko'-moko , mengkanawu' hi rala tahi' ! ' bate majadi' , asala neo' morara' nono-na pai' mepangala' mpu'u-i napa to na'uli' bate madupa' .
41011024	Jadi' , pe'epei lolita-ku toi : Ane mosampaya-koi mperapi' napa-napa , pangala'-mi-hana kanawai'-nimi Alata'ala napa to niperapi' , pai' bate nitarima .
41011025	" Pai' ane mosampaya-koi , ane ria to nipodaa'-ki doo-ni , ampungi-i ulu , bona Tuama-ni to hi suruga wo'o mpo'ampungi sala'-ni . ( (
41011026	Aga ane uma-di ni'ampungi doo-ni , wae wo'o Tuama-ni to hi suruga uma mpo'ampungi sala'-ni . ) ) "
41011027	Rata wo'o-ramo Yesus pai' ana'guru-na hi Yerusalem . Nto'u-ra momako'-mako' hi berewe Tomi Alata'ala , rata-ra imam pangkeni , guru agama pai' pangkeni to Yahudi to ntani'-na .
41011028	Mepekune'-ra hi Yesus , ra'uli' : " Uli'-kakai , ngkaiapa huraa-nu mpobabehi hawe'ea tetu hi Tomi Alata'ala ! Hema to mpowai'-ko kuasa hewa tetu-e ? "
41011029	Na'uli' Yesus : " Aku' wo'o , ria pompekunea'-ku hi koi' . Tompoi'-ka ulu , pai' lako' ku'uli' wo'o-kuwo kangkaiapa kuasa-ku mpobabehi hawe'ea toe lau .
41011030	Ngkaiapa kuasa-na Yohanes Topeniu' mponiu' tauna ? Ngkai Alata'ala-di , ba ngkai manusia'-di ? "
41011031	Momepololitai-ramo pangkeni to Yahudi toera , ra'uli' : " Beiwa-tale' mpotompoi'-ie ? Ane ta'uli' ngkai Alata'ala kuasa-na , na'uli'-taka mpai' : ` Ane wae , napa pai' uma-i nipangala' ? '
41011032	Hiaa' mokoro wo'o ane ta'uli' ngkai manusia'-wadi kuasa-na . " Pangkeni to Yahudi toera me'eka' mporuge' Yohanes Topeniu' , apa' mpoka'eka'-ra ntodea , apa' hawe'ea ntodea mpo'uli' Yohanes toe hadua nabi mpu'u .
41011033	Jadi' , ratompoi'-i : " Uma ki'incai . " Toe pai' na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Ane wae , uma wo'o-kuwo ku'uli'-kokoi kangkaiapa kuasa-ku mpobabehi toe lau . "
41012001	Oti toe Yesus mpololitai pangkeni to Yahudi toera hante lolita rapa' , na'uli' : " Ria hadua tauna to mpohu'ai bonea-na hante anggur . Nawala ntololikia-na , nakae tana' mpobabehi torobo' pompeaa' anggur , pai' natunya' pongko pompodooa . Oti toe , napewai' bonea-na rapobago hi ba hangkuja dua tauna , pai' hilou-imi hi ngata to molaa .
41012002	Rata-mi tempo pohopua' wua' anggur , napahawa' hadua batua-na hilou mperapi' bagia-na hi to mpodoo bonea-na toera .
