41012003	Tapi' to mpodoo bonea toera mpohoko' batua-na , rapao' pai' rapopalai mara .
41012004	Oti toe , pue' bonea mpahawa' tena hadua batua-na . Rata ria , rapao' wo'o-i-wadi-hawo , weho woo'-na , ralibui' ntarurua' pai'-i rapopalai .
41012005	Ngkai ree , nahubui tena hadua batua-na . Rata ria , rapatehi lau-imi . Bate hewa toe-mi kehi-ra hi butu dua batua to napahawa' : ria to raweba' , ria to rapatehi .
41012006	" Uma-pi hema to napahawa' pue' bonea toei , metoro hadua ana' woto-na to nape'ahi'-damo . Ka'omea-na napahawa' ana'-na toe hilou hi to mpodoo bonea-na , na'uli' : ` Bate rapengkorui-ile mpai' . '
41012007	" Ntaa' we'i , to mpodoo bonea toera , mohawa'-ramo ra'uli' : ` Etu-mi tumai ana'-na , hi'a mpai' to jadi' pue' bonea toi-e . Kita tapatehi-i , bona bonea-na toi kita'-mi pue'-na . '
41012008	Karahoko'-nami ana' toei , rapatehi pai' ratadi hi mali bonea . "
41012009	Ngkai ree , Yesus mpo'uli'-raka pangkeni to Yahudi : " Jadi' , napa-mi to nababehi pue' bonea toei ? Bate tumai-ile mpopatehi-ra to mpodoo bonea-na , pai' bonea-na nawai'-raka tau ntani'-na .
41012010	Tantu nibasa-mi lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpolowa pesapuaka-ni hi Aku' , hewa toi moni-na : ` Watu to ratadi topowangu tomi , watu toe lau-mi to jadi' poko parawatu .
41012011	Tohe'e majadi' ntuku' konoa Pue' Ala , uma mowo kalompe'-na hi poncilo-ta . ' "
41012012	Kara'epe-na pangkeni to Yahudi lolita-na Yesus tohe'e , doko' rahoko'-i apa' ra'inca kahira'-na to natoa' hante lolita rapa' toe . Aga uma-ra daho' mpohoko'-i , apa' mpoka'eka'-ra ntodea . Jadi' , malai-ramo mpalahii-i .
41012013	Ngkai ree , pangkeni to Yahudi mpohubui ba hangkuja dua to Parisi pai' tauna to tono' hi Magau' Herodes hilou hi Yesus . Patuju-ra doko' mpahala'nawu'-i hante pompekunea'-ra .
41012014	Karata-ra hi Yesus , ra'uli'-ki : " Guru , ki'inca Guru tau monoa' . Metudui'-ko hante kalonto'-lonto'-na mpo'uli' napa konoa Alata'ala hi manusia' . Uma nupengkorui ba hema-hema , apa' uma-ko mpelence tauna . Toe pai' kipekune'-ko : ntuku' atura agama-ta , ba ma'ala moto-ta mpobayari paja' hi Kaisar , ba uma-di ? Kana tabayari , ba uma mingki' tabayari ? "
41012015	Na'inca Yesus patuju nono-ra to tewunii' . Toe pai' na'uli'-raka : " Napa pai' nipali' kahala'kedoa' pololita-kue ? Keni pe' tumai doi to biasa nibayari-ki paja' , doko' kuhilo . "
41012016	Ngkai ree , ratonu-miki hampepa' doi pera' . Na'uli' : " Lence hema pai' hanga' hema to hi doi toi ? " Ra'uli' : " Lence pai' hanga' Kaisar . "
41012017	Na'uli' : " Ane wae-di , wai'-ki Kaisar napa to masipato' rawai'-ki Kaisar . Pai' wai'-ki Alata'ala napa to masipato' rawai'-ki Alata'ala . " Konce-ramo mpo'epe tompoi'-na toe .
41012018	Oti toe , ba hangkuja dua to Saduki rata hi Yesus . To Saduki toera , pangkeni agama Yahudi to mposapuaka tauna to mate tuwu' nculii' hi eo mpeno . Karata to Saduki toera , ra'uli'-ki Yesus :
41012019	" Guru , nabi Musa mpo'uki' hi rala buku atura hewa toi : ane hadua tomane mate hiaa' uma-ki ria ana'-na , pudupuhe-na kana mpotobine balu-na bona ria-ki-hawo muli-na .
41012020	Jadi' , ria pitu to ntali ompi' paka' tomane . To ulumua' motobinei , mate-i uma ria ana'-na .
41012021	Tu'ai-na mpotobine balu-na . Mate wo'o-i-wadi-hawo , hiaa' ko'ia-i mo'anai' . Wae wo'o to majadi' hi katolu-na ,
41012022	duu' rata hi kapitu-na . Mate omea-ramo hante uma ria ana'-ra . Ka'omea-na , mate wo'o-imi-hawo tobine toei .
41012023	Jadi' , hi eo mpeno , ane tuwu' nculii' mpu'u-di hawe'ea tomate-e , hema-ramo mpai' pue' tobine toei , apa' pitu-ramo to mpotobine-i . "
41012024	Na'uli' Yesus : " Sala' mpu'u pekiri-ni tetu-e , apa' uma nipaha ihi' Buku Tomoroli' , uma wo'o ni'incai baraka'-na Alata'ala .
41012025	Apa' ane tuwu' nculii'-ramo tauna to mate , katuwu'-ra hewa katuwu' mala'eka hi rala suruga , uma-rapa motobinei ba motomanei .
41012026	Ha ko'ia ria nibasa lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpakanoto katuwu'-ra nculii' tomate-e ? Hi rala buku Atura Musa , tabasa tutura-na beiwa Alata'ala mpololitai nabi Musa ngkai rala julumpu to jela' . Nto'u toe , Abraham , Ishak pai' Yakub mahae-ramo mate . Aga nau' wae , Alata'ala mpo'uli'-ki Musa hewa toi : ` Aku' toi-mi Alata'ala to napue' Abraham , Alata'ala to napue' Ishak , Alata'ala to napue' Yakub . '
41012027	Jadi' , ngkai lolita-na Alata'ala toe , monoto-mi ta'inca katuwu'-ra moto Abraham , Ishak pai' Yakub . Apa' bela tauna to mate to mepue' hi Alata'ala , tauna to tuwu'-hana to mpopue'-i . Sala' rahi-koina pekiri-ni tetu-e . "
41012028	Nto'u toe , hadua guru agama Yahudi rata hi Yesus . Na'epe pomehono'-ra to Saduki hante Yesus we'i , pai' na'uli' hi rala nono-na : " Lompe' mpu'u tompoi'-na Yesus tetui ! " Toe pai' mepekune' wo'o-imi-hawo hi Yesus , na'uli' : " Parenta to'uma to poko-na ngkai hawe'ea parenta ? "
41012029	Na'uli' Yesus : " Toi-mi parenta to poko-na : ` Pe'epei-koi to Israel ! Pue'-ta Pue' Alata'ala hadua-na-wadi .
41012030	Kana tapoka'ahi'-i hante nono-ta mpu'u , tatonu hawe'ea katuwu'-ta hi Hi'a , tapoka'ahi'-i hudu inca-ta pai' hudu pakulea'-ta . '
41012031	Pai' tohe'i-mi parenta karonyala-na : ` Kana tapoka'ahi' doo-ta hewa pompoka'ahi'-ta woto-ta moto . ' Uma ria parenta ntani'-na to meliu kabohe-na ngkai to ronyala tohe'i . "
41012032	Na'uli'-mi guru agama toei hi Yesus : " Makono mpu'u-di Guru ! Makono lia to nu'uli' tetu-e . Pue' Ala bate hadua-na-wadi , uma ria ntani'-na .
41012033	Pai' kana tapoka'ahi'-i hante nono-ta mpu'u , hante hawe'ea pekiri-ta pai' hudu pakulea'-ta . Pai' kana tapoka'ahi' doo-ta hewa woto-ta moto . Toe to meliu kalompe'-na ngkai hawe'ea porewua pai' rewa ntani'-na to tapopepue' hi Alata'ala . "
41012034	Na'epe Yesus kamonoto tompoi'-na tauna toei . Toe pai' na'uli'-ki : " Neo' jadi' ntodea hi rala Kamagaua' Alata'ala mpu'u-moko ! " Ngkai ree , uma-pi hema to daho' mpekune' ba napa-napa hi Yesus .
41012035	Nto'u-na Yesus metudui' hi Tomi Alata'ala , na'uli' : " Napa pai' guru agama mpo'uli' Magau' Topetolo' muli-na Magau' Daud ?
41012036	Hiaa' bo Daud moto mpokahangai'-i Pue'-na . Hante petete' Inoha' Tomoroli' Daud mpotompo'wiwi Magau' Topetolo' hewa toi : Pue' Ala mpo'uli'-ki Pue'-ku : ` Mohura-moko hi mali ngka'ana-ku duu'-na kupopengkoru hawe'ea bali'-nu hi Iko . '
41012037	
41012038	Nto'u-na Yesus mpotudui' ntodea , na'uli'-raka : " Pelompehi-koi , neo'-koi mpenau' kehi-ra guru agama . Goe'-ra modao' mpopake' baju to moloe , pai' goe'-ra ane tauna hi wiwi' karajaa motingkua' mpotabe-ra .
41012039	Goe'-ra rapopohura hi pohuraa karabilaa' hi tomi posampayaa . Goe'-ra ane rapopohura-ra hi pohuraa to lompe' hi posusaa' .
41012040	Mpobagiu-ra tobine tobalu , pai'-ra mpohagoi tomi-ra . Rawunii' kadada'a gau'-ra tohe'e hante mosampaya rapomoloe-loe . Motomo lia mpai' huku'-ra . "
41012041	Yesus mohura mohu' peti' pompunaa' doi pepue' , pai'-i mponaa tauna to mpopuna' doi pepue'-ra hi rala-na . Wori' tauna to mo'ua' mpopuna' doi uma hangke-ngkedi' .
41012042	Nto'u toe , rata wo'o-hawo hadua tobine tobalu to mpe'ahii' tuwu'-na , napuna' wo'o-hawo doi pepue'-na . To napuna' tohe'e , rompepa' doi ngkala , hangkedi' lia oli-na .
41012043	Yesus mpokio' ana'guru-na pai' na'uli'-raka : " Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : tobalu to mpe'ahii' tuwu'-na tohe'e mai , meliu pewai'-na ngkai pewai' to rapuna' hawe'ea tau ntani'-na .
41012044	Apa' hira' mewai' ngkai labi ka'uaa'-ra . Tapi' tobine toei , nau' hewa apa-mi kampe'ahii'-na , napewai' omea-mi to ria hi hi'a , nau' kakono-na to naparaluu-hawo hi katuwu'-na eo-eo-na . "
41013001	Oti toe , malai-imi Yesus ngkai rala Tomi Alata'ala . Ria hadua ngkai ana'guru-na mpo'uli'-ki : " Guru , hilo mpu'u-konae' tomi toe-e ! Hilo watu-na ! Uma mowo kancola-na ! "
41013002	Na'uli' Yesus : " Nuhilo wa tomi to bohe toe-e lau ? Uma mpai' ria hamehaa' watu to bate pomeduncu-na . Bate ragero omea mpai' . "
41013003	Oti toe , hilou-imi Yesus hi Bulu' Zaitun pai'-i mohura mposinyanyohi-ki Tomi Alata'ala . Petrus , Yakobus , Yohanes pai' Andreas tumai mpololitai-i nto'u uma ria tau ntani'-na .
41013004	Ra'uli' : " Uli'-kakai ba nto'uma kadupa'-na to nu'uli' toe-e we'i , pai' napa mpai' to jadi' tanda ane hawe'ea toe neo' madupa'-pi . "
41013005	Na'uli' Yesus : " Pelompehi , neo'-koi ma'ala rabagiu .
41013006	Apa' wori' mpai' tauna to mehupa' to mpo'uli' kahira'-na Magau' Topetolo' , alaa-na wori' mpai' tauna to rabagiu .
41013007	Mpo'epe-koi mpai' kareba panga'ea ngkai kalaa-na , ni'epe wo'o moni panga'ea to mohu' . Aga neo' me'eka' , apa' hawe'ea toe kana jadi' ulu , tapi' kajadia' toe uma mpobatuai karata-nami kahudua dunia' .
41013008	Nto'u toe mpai' , wori' ngata mosipanga'ei , magau' hadua mpo'ewa magau' kahadua-na . Hiapa-apa ria linu pai' oro' . Aga hawe'ea toe lau lako' pontepu'ua-na-pidi , hewa pontodohaka hadua tobine to neo' mo'ana' .
41013009	" Aga koi' tohe'i , mo'inga'-inga'-koi ! Apa' koi' mpai' bate rahoko' pai' rakeni hi topohura agama . Raweba'-koi hi rala tomi posampayaa . Rabua'-koi hi topoparenta pai' hi magau' sabana petuku'-ni hi Aku' . Nto'u toe mpai' , ria loga-ni mpo'uli'-raka pepangala'-ni hi Aku' .
41013010	Pai' Kareba Lompe' kana raparata hi humalili' dunia' kako'ia-na Eo Kiama .
41013011	Ane rahoko'-koi pai' rakeni hi topohura , neo'-koi me'eka' ba napa mpai' petompoi'-ni . Ane rata-damo tempo-ni mololita , uli'-mi-hana napa to natu'u Pue' Ala hi rala nono-ni . Apa' napa to ni'uli' nto'u toe , bela ngkai pekiri-ni moto . Lolita-ni tetu mehupa' ngkai Inoha' Tomoroli' .
41013012	" Rata mpai' tempo-na hawe'ea tauna mpokahuku'-koi sabana petuku'-ni hi Aku' . Ria mpai' tauna to mpewai' ompi'-ra ba ana'-ra moto bona rapatehi sabana petuku'-ra hi Aku' . Ria wo'o ana' to mpo'ewa totu'a-ra pai' mpopatehi-ra . Aga tauna to tida mepangala' hi Aku' duu' hi ka'omea-na , mporata-ra kalompea' hi eo mpeno .
41013013	
41013014	" Owi nabi Daniel mpolowa karata-na to rahanga' ` Topegerohi to dada'a . ' ( Hema to mpobasa lolita pelowa toe , penotohi mpu'u batua-na ! ) Jadi' , ane nihilo to nalowa Daniel toe mokore hi pokorea to ratagi-ki , agina tauna to mo'oha' hi Yudea metibo' hilou hi bulu'-na .
41013015	Tauna to mohura hi parawa-na neo'-pi leba' mesua' hi rala tomi-na mpo'ala' ba napa-napa .
41013016	Tauna to hi bonea , neo'-pi nculii' hi ngata mpo'ala' pohea-na . Kaliliu metibo' !
41013017	Mpe'ahii'-ra mpai' tobine to nto'u-ra motina'i pai' to mpentii' ana'-ra nto'u toe , apa' mokoro mpai' petibo'-ra .
41013018	Mekakae-koi hi Alata'ala bona eo petiboa'-ni toe neo' nto'u tempo lengi' .
41013019	Apa' nto'u toe mpai' rata pesesa' to ko'ia ria hangkania jadi' ngkai lomo'-na Alata'ala mpajadi' dunia' rata tempo tohe'i , pai' uma wo'o-pi-hawo mpai' ria jadi' hi eo boko'-na .
41013020	Aga naredehi moto mpai' Pue' Ala tempo kaparia toe , apa' ane uma naredehi tempo-na , bate uma ria haduaa to tuwu' . Jadi' , apa' napoka'ahi'-ra tauna to napelihi pai' to napobagia , toe pai' naredehi mpai' tempo kaparia toe .
41013021	" Nto'u toe mpai' , ane ria to mpo'uli'-kokoi : ` Hilo , Magau' Topetolo' ohe'i-imi , ' ba ` Hilo , ohe'e-i mai Magau' Topetolo' , ' neo' nipangalai' .
41013022	Apa' mehupa' mpai' wori' tauna to boa' to mpo'uli' kahira'-na Magau' Topetolo' , ba to mpo'uli' kahira'-na nabi . Mpobabehi-ra tanda mekoncehi pai' tanda to mobaraka' , bona mpobagiu-ra wori' tauna . Ane ke ma'ala , ntahawe' tauna to napelihi Alata'ala rabagiu wo'o .
41013023	Aga koi' tohe'i , mo'inga'-inga'-koi ! Ku'uli' ami'-mikokoi hawe'ea tohe'e kako'ia-na jadi' .
41013024	" Jadi' , nto'u toe mpai' , ane timpaliu-pi tempo kaparia toe , hawe'ea anu to mobaraka' hi langi' ralengo . Eo mobali' mobengi , wula uma-pi mehini , betue' roda' ngkai langi' .
41013025	
41013026	Nto'u toe-damo mpai' , hawe'ea tauna mpohilo-a , Aku' Ana' Manusia' , mana'u tumai hi rala limu' . Uma mowo kabaraka'-ku pai' pehini-ku nto'u toe .
41013027	Kuhubui mala'eka-ku hilou mporumpu tauna to kupobagia ngkai humalili' dunia' , ngkai wuntu dunia' pai' ngkai wuntu langi' .
41013028	" Petonoi-koi napa to kutudui'-kokoi hante lolita rapa' kaju ara . Ane nihilo rau-na mela' pai' mohulu-i , ni'inca-mi kaneo'-na mara eo .
41013029	Wae wo'o ane nihilo-damo kajadia' toe we'i lou , ni'inca-mi neo' madupa' mpu'u-mi to ku'uli' we'i .
41013030	Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : hawe'ea toe we'i bate madupa' kako'ia-na mate omea tauna to tuwu' tempo toi .
41013031	Langi' pai' dunia' mogero mpai' , tapi' lolita-ku bate-bate-na duu' kahae-hae-na .
41013032	" Aga ane eo pai' jaa kadupa'-na hawe'ea toe , muntu' Tuama-ku-wadi to mpo'inca . Uma ria to ntani'-na to mpo'inca . Bangku' mala'eka to hi suruga-hawoe' , uma wo'o-rawo ra'incai . Bangku' Aku' Ana'-nae' , uma wo'o-kuwo ku'incai .
41013033	Toe pai' kana mo'inga'-inga' pai' mojaga-koi , apa' uma ni'incai tempo kadupa'-na .
41013034	Ane rata nculii'-apa mpai' , kajadi'-na hewa lolita rapa' tohe'i . Hadua pue' tomi mopatuju hilou hi ngata to molaa . Kako'ia-na me'ongko' , nahubui pahawaa'-na mpewili' tomi-na , hore-hore nawai'-ra bago-ra . Hi tompodoo wobo' na'uli'-ki : ` Mo'inga'-inga'-koe' ! '
41013035	Jadi' , kana mo'inga' mpu'u-ra , apa' uma ra'incai ba nto'uma karata-na pue' tomi , ba ncimonou'-di ba ntongo' bengi-di ba mepulo ngkii ba nto'u eo mehupa' . Nee-neo' mpai' rata ncorobaa-imi pai' narata-ra bula-ra leta' . Wae wo'o kana mo'inga'-inga'-koi , apa' uma ni'incai nto'uma-a rata .
41013036	
41013037	Napa to ku'uli'-kokoi tohe'i , ku'uli' wo'o hi hawe'ea tauna : Mo'inga'-inga'-hawoe' ! "
41014001	Ro'eo-damo rata-mi Eo Paskah pai' Posusa' Roti to uma Raragii . Imam pangkeni pai' guru agama bula-ra mpali' akala-ra mpolede Yesus bona rapatehi bongo-i .
41014002	Ra'uli' : " Aga neo' ulu tababehi nto'u eo bohe , nee-neo' mpai' bara' ntodea . "
41014003	Nto'u Yesus hi ngata Betania , hilou-i hi tomi hadua tauna to rahanga' Simon topohaki' poko' . Bula-na hi ree , rata hadua tobine ngkeni hameha' butolo' ihia' lana honga to masuli' lia oli-na , to rababehi ngkai rali' kaju to mohonga . Bula-na Yesus ngkoni' , tobine toei mpopengka butolo' toe pai' natua hi woo' Yesus bona mpobila'-i .
41014004	Ba hangkuja dua to hi ree , moroe-ra mpohilo napa to nababehi tobine toei . Momepololitai-ramo ra'uli' : " Napa-mi-hawo kalaua-na lana honga rakerei mara hewa toe !
41014005	Ke agina lau-pi-hawo rapobalu' nte oli tolu atu labi doi pera' , pai' doi oli-na rawai'-raka tokabu . " Toe pai' moroe-ra mpokaroe tobine toei .
41014006	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Pelele' moto-i-hana . Napa pai' nipedahi nono-na ? To nababehi hi Aku' toe-le , lompe' .
41014007	Apa' tokabu-hana , ria oa'-ra dohe-ni . Ane dota-koi ntulungi-ra , ria oa' loga-ni . Aga Aku' , uma-a mpai' ria oa' dohe-ni .
41014008	Tobine toei mpobabehi napa to nakule' mpobabehi . Natuai-a hante lana honga mporodo ami'-mi woto-ku hi karatana-ku mpai' , kako'ia-na rata tempo-na .
41014009	Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : hi humalili' dunia' , hiapa-apa Kareba Lompe' rapalele , napa to nababehi tobine toei bate ralolita , uma mpai' ralipo'-lipo' . "
41014010	Nto'u toe , hadua ngkai ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua , to rahanga' Yudas Iskariot , hilou hi imam pangkeni , mpo'uli'-raka patuju-na mpobalu' Yesus hi hira' .
41014011	Goe'-ramo mpo'epe patuju-na toe , pai' rajanci-ki rawai'-i doi . Ngkai ree , Yudas mpopali' loga to lompe' mpobalu' Yesus hi bali'-na .
41014012	Rata-mi eo to lomo'-na hi Posusa' Roti to Uma Raragii , nto'u bima Paskah rasumale' . Nto'u toe , ana'guru-na Yesus mpo'uli'-ki : " Hiapa-kai mporodo pongkoni' Paskah to takoni'-e mpai' ? Hiapa konoa-nu ? "
41014013	Yesus mpohubui rodua ana'guru-na , na'uli'-raka : " Hilou-mokoi hi rala ngata . Ria mpai' to mpohirua'-kokoi hadua tomane to ngkeni pontomua'-na oti ntomu' . Tuku'-imi .
41014014	Ane mesua'-i hi rala tomi , uli'-ki pue' tomi : ` Na'uli' Guru : Hiapa-kuwo pobabehia-ku Posusa' Paskah hante ana'guru-ku ? '
41014015	Pue' tomi toe mpai' mpotudo'-kokoi hameha' kamar to hi lolo-na to bohe . Kamar toe teporodo ami'-mi , hono'-mi rewa-na . Hi retu-mokoi mpai' mporodo-taka pongkoni' Paskah-ta . "
41014016	Hilou mpu'u-ramo ana'guru-na to rodua toera mesua' rala ngata . Rarata mpu'u-mi hewa to na'uli'-raka , pai'-ra mporodo-mi pongkoni' Paskah .
41014017	Mobengi-mi , rata-imi Yesus hante ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua .
41014018	Bula-na mohura ngkoni' , na'uli'-mi : " Pe'epei-koi : Ria hadua ngkai koi' , to ngkoni' hante Aku' toe lau , to mpobalu'-a mpai' hi bali'-ku . "
41014019	Mpo'epe tohe'e , kapeda'-nami nono-ra ana'guru-na , pai' mepekune'-ramo hadua bo hadua hi Yesus , ra'uli' : " Bela-hawo aku' to nutoa'-e Pue' ? "
41014020	Na'uli' Yesus : " To mpobalu'-ale , hadua ngkai koi' to hampulu' rodua tohe'i-e , to mpodulu'-ka .
41014021	Makono mpu'u , Aku' Ana' Manusia' bate mate hewa to ralowa hi rala Buku Tomoroli'-e . Aga mpe'ahii' tauna to mpobalu'-a tetui . Ke lompe' lau-pi ane uma-i na'ote tina-na . "
41014022	Bula-ra ngkoni' , na'ala'-mi Yesus roti pai' naposampayai , mpo'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala . Oti toe , napihe-pihe pai' natonu-raka , na'uli' : " Ala'-mi , koni'-mi . Toi-mi woto-ku . "
41014023	Oti toe na'ala' wo'o sangkiri' to ihia' anggur , na'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala pai' natonu-raka . Nginu omea-ramo ngkai sangkiri' toe .
41014024	Na'uli'-raka : " Toi-mi raa'-ku to rabowo ane mate-a mpai' bona mpotolo' wori' tauna . Raa'-ku toi mporohoi pojanci to mpoposidai' Alata'ala hante manusia' .
41014025	Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : ntepu'u ngkai wae lau , uma-apa nginu anggur duu'-na rata tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia' . Nto'u toe-damo mpai' , pai' lako' ku'inu anggur to bo'u hi rala Kamagaua'-na . "
41014026	Oti toe , morona'-ramo hanyala rona' pe'une' . Kahudu-ra morona' , malai-ramo ngkai ngata hilou hi Bulu' Zaitun .
41014027	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka ana'guru-na : " Hawe'ea-ni mpai' , molengo pepangala'-ni hi Aku' , apa' ria te'uki' Lolita Alata'ala to mpo'uli' hewa toi : ` Kupatehi topo'ewu toei , alaa-na bima-na pagaa'-gaa'-ramo . '
41014028	Aga ane tuwu' nculii'-apa mpai' , meri'ulu-a hilou hi tana' Galilea , bona hirua' hi ria-ta-damo mpai' . "
41014029	Na'uli' Petrus : " Nau' hawe'ea tauna molengo pepangala'-ra hi Iko Pue' , aku' uma ! "
41014030	Na'uli' Yesus : " Mpu'u ku'uli'-koko : Bengi toe mpai' lau , kako'ia-na turua' manu' karongkani-na , mpolia' tolu ngkani-moko mposapu kanu'inca-ku . "
41014031	Aga hangkedi' kanaperohoi-na Petrus lolita-na , na'uli' : " Nau'-a mate hangkaa-ngkania dohe-nu , uma mpu'u kusapu kaku'inca-nu ! " Wae wo'o-rawo lolita-ra ana'guru-na to ntani'-na .
41014032	Rata-ramo hi pampa to rahanga' Getsemani . Hi ree na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka ana'guru-na : " Koi' , mohura hi rei-mokoi mpopea-a , bula-ku hilou mosampaya . "
41014033	Aga Petrus , Yakobus pai' Yohanes nabawai hilou dohe-na . Nto'u toe pepa-mi na'epe pai' mokaratu-mi nono-na .
41014034	Na'uli'-raka : " Susa' lia nono-ku , hewa to neo' mate-ama ku'epe . Rehe'i-mokoi ulu mojaga . "
41014035	Oti toe , hilou-imi molaa hangkedi' , pai'-i motumpa hi tana' mosampaya . Rala posampaya-na merapi'-i bona ane ma'ala uma-i-hawo mporata kaparia toe .
41014036	Na'uli' : " Tuama-ku ! Uma ria to uma majadi' ane Iko Mama mpo'uli' . Wi'iha-ka-kuwo kaparia to neo' mporumpa'-a toi . Aga bela konoa-ku Aku' to jadi' , agina konoa-nu Iko moto . "
41014037	Oti toe , nculii'-imi hi ana'guru-na to tolu , narata-ra bula-ra leta' moto . Na'uli' mpo'uli'-ki Petrus : " Simon ! Ba leta'-dako-konae ! Hajaa-wadi uma nudadahi mojaga ?
41014038	Mojaga pai' mosampaya-mokoi , bona neo'-koi mporata pesori . Hi rala nono-ni dota moto-koi mpobabehi to makono , aga uma nidadahi apa' manusia' bate lente . "
41014039	Ngkai ree , hilou wo'o-imi mosampaya . Posampaya-na toe hibalia hante posampaya-na to lomo'-na .
41014040	Oti toe , nculii' wo'o-imi mporata ana'guru-na , leta' wo'o-ra-wadi apa' mopoke' rahi mata-ra . Nakehele-ra , aga uma-ra winihi apa' uma ra'incai ba napa to ra'uli'-ki .
41014041	Hilou wo'o-imi mosampaya katolu ngkani-na , pai' oti toe , nculii' wo'o-imi hi ana'guru-na , na'uli'-raka : " Turu pai' leta' oa'-pada-koi ? Naporae'-mi ! Rata-mi tempo-na Aku' Ana' Manusia' rapobalu' pai' ratonu hi tauna to dada'a .
41014042	Memata-mokoi ! Hilo , etu-imi tumai to mpobalu'-a . Kita-mi lou . "
41014043	Bula-na Yesus mololita-pidi , rata mpu'u-imi Yudas , hadua ngkai ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua . Pai' dohe-na wori' wo'o tau ntani'-na to ngkeni piho' pai' sumampu . Hira' toe rapahawa' imam pangkeni , guru agama pai' totu'a to Yahudi .
41014044	Yudas mpo'uli' ami'-miraka tanda bona ra'inca kato'uma-nai Yesus , na'uli' : " Hema mpai' to ku'eki , Hi'a-mi . Hoko'-imi , keni-i hilou , jaga lompe'-i . "
41014045	Jadi' , karata-ra hi ree , kahilou-nami Yudas mpohirua'-ki Yesus , na'uli' : " Guru ! " pai'-i na'eki ntuku' ada-ra to Yahudi .
41014046	Katumai-rami tauna to wori' mpohoko' Yesus .
41014047	Ngkai ree , hadua tauna to mokore mohu' Yesus mpowute' piho'-na natime-ki batua Imam Bohe , bela mpoholu tilinga-na .
41014048	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka tauna to mpohoko'-i : " Ha toperampaki-a toi-e , pai' mingki' tumai-koi ntali piho' pai' sumampu mpohoko'-ae !
41014049	Butu eo-na ria moto-a dohe-ni hi Tomi Alata'ala metudui' , napa pai' uma-a nihoko' nto'u toe ? Aga tohe'i kana jadi' , bona madupa'-mi to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' . "
41014050	Ngkai ree , metibo'-ramo hawe'ea ana'guru-na mpalahii-i .
41014051	Ria wo'o hadua kabilasa mpotuku' Yesus nto'u toe , motapui'-i-wadi hante abe' to bula . Ria-ra to doko' mpohoko'-i ,
41014052	toe pai' naroncu-mi abe'-na , pai'-i metibo' molawa .
41014053	Ngkai ree , Yesus rakeni hilou hi tomi Imam Bohe . Hi ria , morumpu-ramo hawe'ea imam pangkeni , guru agama pai' totu'a to Yahudi to ntani'-na .
41014054	Petrus metuku' ngkawao-wadi , duu'-na rata hi berewe tomi Imam Bohe . Hi ria mohura-i moneru dohe topojaga .
41014055	Nto'u toe , imam pangkeni pai' hawe'ea topohura agama mpali' sabi' to mpakilu Yesus , bona ngalai' rahuku' mate-i . Aga uma raruai' sala'-na .
41014056	Wori' moto sabi' to mpopakilu-i , aga uma hibalia lolita-ra .
41014057	Ria ba hangkuja dua to mokore pai' to mosabi' boa' , ra'uli' :
41014058	" Tauna toii , ki'epe-i-kaina mpo'uli' hewa toi : ` Kugero Tomi Alata'ala to nawangu manusia' , pai' rala-na tolu eo kuwangu to ntani'-na , to bela manusia' mpowangu . ' "
41014059	Hiaa' posabi'-ra toe , uma wo'o-wadi hibalia .
41014060	Kamokore-nami Imam Bohe hi nyanyoa hawe'ea topohura , pai' na'uli'-ki Yesus : " Ha uma nutompoi'-ra to mpakilu-ko toe-e ? "
41014061	Aga Yesus , uma-i winihi , uma-i metompoi' nau' hamelaa . Hangkani-pi Imam Bohe mpekune'-i : " Ha Iko mpu'u-mi Magau' Topetolo' , Ana' Alata'ala to Moroli' ? "
41014062	Na'uli' Yesus : " Aku'-mi , pai' nihilo moto-a mpai' , Aku' Ana' Manusia' , mohura pai' moparenta hi mali ka'ana Alata'ala to Mobaraka' , pai' nihilo wo'o-a mana'u tumai ngkai suruga hi rala limu' . "
41014063	Mpo'epe toe we'i , Imam Bohe mpoheu' baju-na ngkai kamoroe-na , pai' na'uli' : " Uma-pi mingki' ria sabi' !
41014064	Ni'epe moto-mi-koiwo lolita-na mpokedi' Alata'ala . Beiwa-mi-koiwo kabotu'-ni ? " Hibalia-mi kabotu'-ra omea , ra'uli' : " Bate masala'-imile , kana rahuku' mate-i ! "
41014065	Ngkai ree , ria-ra to mpo'uelikui-i , ria wo'o to mpopo'ore'-i : rakaramuai lio-na , raweba'-i , pai' ra'uli'-ki : " Ee nabi ! Pe'uli' pe' ba hema to mpoweba'-koe ! " Topojaga wo'o-hawo , mehopo' wo'o-ramo-rawo .
41014066	Nto'u toe , Petrus hi berewe-pidi . Bula-na hi berewe toe , tumai hadua tobine topobago hi tomi Imam Bohe .
41014067	Kampohilo-na Petrus moneru , nanaa-i pai' na'uli'-ki : " Ba iko wo'o-di hadua doo-na Yesus to Nazaret toei-e mai ? "
41014068	Aga nasapu Petrus , na'uli' : " Uma ku'incai-i , pai' uma kupaha ba napa to nu'uli' ! " Ngkai ree moderu'-imi hilou mohu' hi wobo' wala . Turua'-mi manu' .
41014069	Pehilo wo'o-imi tobine toei , na'uli'-raka tauna to hi ree : " Hi'a tetu wo'o-di doo-na Yesus toei-e mai . "
41014070	Aga nasapu mperii wo'o-wadi Petrus . Uma mahae ngkai ree , tauna to mokore hi ree mpo'uli' wo'o-miki : " Iko mpu'u-di doo-nae ! Apa' to Galilea wo'o-ko-kowo . "
41014071	Kamosumpa-nami Petrus mpotuna' woto-na , na'uli' : " Uma mpu'u ku'incai tauna to ni'uli' tetui ! "
41014072	Nto'u toe , turua'-mi manu' karongkani-na . Nakiwoi-mi Petrus lolita-na Yesus ngone to mpo'uli'-ki : " Kako'ia-na turua' manu' karongkani-na , mpolia' tolu ngkani-moko mposapu kanu'inca-ku . " Kageo'-nami Petrus kaka'utu-utu .
41015001	Mepupulo ngkii , hawe'ea topohura agama nte imam pangkeni pai' guru agama pai' totu'a to Yahudi to ntani'-na , mohawa' wo'o-ramo . Rahoo'-imi Yesus , rakeni hilou rabua' hi Gubernur Pilatus .
41015002	Mepekune'-i Pilatus : " Ha Iko mpu'u-mi Magau' to Yahudi-e ? " Na'uli' Yesus : " Wae mpu'u , hewa to nu'uli' tetu . "
41015003	Wori' nyala pepakilu to raparata imam pangkeni hi Pilatus .
41015004	Toe pai' mepekune' wo'o-i-pidi : " Uma-ko dota metompoi'-e ? Wori' nyala-mi to raparata kehi-nu . "
41015005	Aga Yesus bate uma-pi winihi , alaa-na napokakonce mpu'u Pilatus .
41015006	Butu eo bohe Paskah , Pilatus biasa-na mpobahaka hadua tauna to ratarungku' , ba hema to raperapi' ntodea .
41015007	Hi mpae toe , ria hi rala tarungku' hadua to me'ewa hi topoparenta , to rahanga' Barabas . Barabas pai' doo-na , ria-ramo mpopatehi tauna rala pe'ewa-ra hi topoparenta .
41015008	Jadi' , morumpu-ramo ntodea , raperapi' hi Pilatus bona nabahaka hadua to ratarungku' hewa to biasa nababehi butu mpae-na .
41015009	Napekune'-ra : " Beiwa , dota-koi ane kubahaka-kokoi Magau' to Yahudi toii ? "
41015010	Pilatus mpo'uli' hewa toe , apa' na'inca ka'uma-na-hawo masala'-i Yesus ; imam pangkeni mpotonu Yesus hi hi'a ngkai kamohingi'-ra-wadi .
41015011	Aga imam pangkeni mpo'ukei' ntodea , ra'uli'-raka : " Perapi'-koi bona nabahaka-taka Barabas ! " Merapi' Barabas mpu'u-ramo .
41015012	Ngkai ree , na'uli' wo'o-mi Pilatus mpo'uli'-raka ntodea : " Ane rapa'-na Barabas to kubahaka-kokoi , kupopai-imi tauna to ni'uli' magau'-ni to Yahudi-e ? "
41015013	Pejeu'-rami ntodea , ra'uli' : " Parika'-i ! "
41015014	Napekune' Pilatus : " Hiaa' napa sala'-na ? " Rapesukui lau-mi mejeu' : " Parika'-imi ! "
41015015	Pilatus doko' ngala' nono ntodea , toe pai' nabahaka-miraka Barabas . Oti toe , nahubui-mi tantara-na mpoweba' Yesus pai' natonu-miraka bona raparika' .
41015016	Oti toe , tantara mpokeni Yesus hilou hi po'ohaa'-ra to hi rala tomi Gubernur , pai'-ra mpokio' hawe'ea doo-ra tumai .
41015017	Ra'uncoi'-imi hante baju to mperelei to hewa baju magau' . Rababehi hameha' songko ngkai walaa to morui to hewa songko magau' , pai' rasongkoi-ki .
41015018	Oti toe , pai'-i rapopo'ore' , ra'uli'-ki : " Wori' tabe , Magau' to Yahudi ! "
41015019	Woo'-na rapao' hante lua' , ra'uelikui-i , pai' motingkua'-ra ntani' hewa to mpobila'-i .
41015020	Ka'oti-na rapopo'ore' hewa toe , raroncu-mi baju to mperelei-e we'i , pai' ra'uncoi' nculii'-imi pohea-na ami' . Oti toe , rakeni-imi hilou hi mali ngata bona raparika' .
41015021	Hi lengko ohea , hirua'-ra hante hadua tauna to lako' rata hi ngata , pai' rapewuku-ki hi'a-mi mpopaha'a kaju parika'-na Yesus . Hanga'-na Simon to Kirene , tuama-ra hira' Aleksander pai' Rufus .
41015022	Ko'ia mahae , rata-ramo hi po'ohaa' to rahanga' Golgota , batua-na Bulu' Banga'woo' .
41015023	Hi ree , Yesus rapopo'inui anggur to ragalo pokuli' to rahanga' mur , aga uma-i dota mpo'inu .
41015024	Oti toe , tantara mpoparika'-i , pai'-ra mpobagi-bagi pohea-na hante mpotene' undi hewa pompenoa'-ra , ba hema-ra to mporata .
41015025	Nto'u karaparika'-na toe , jaa sio mepulo .
41015026	Hi kaju parika'-na hi ntoto woo'-na , ria ukia' to mpo'uli' napa to rapakilu-ki , hewa toi moni-na : MAGAU' TO YAHUDI .
41015027	Ria wo'o rodua toperampaki raparika' dohe-na , hadua mali ka'ana-na hadua mali ki'ii-na . ( (
41015028	Jadi' , napa to rababehi toe , madupa'-mi lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpo'uli' : " Magau' Topetolo' rapohewa tauna to dada'a . " ) )
41015029	Tauna to liu hi ree , ngkololi-ra mpopo'ore'-i , ra'uli' : " Hahi Â¡ Nu'uli'-kona mpogero-ko Tomi Alata'ala pai' nuwangu nculii' rala-na tolu eo !
41015030	Ane wae-di , tulungi moto-mi woto-nu ! Mana'u-moko ngkai kaju parika' tetu ! "
41015031	Wae wo'o imam pangkeni hante guru agama ntora mpopo'ore'-i . Momepololitai-ramo ra'uli' : " Tau ntani'-na natulungi-ramo . Woto-na moto-pi uma nakulei' ntulungi .
41015032	Hiaa' bo ra'uli' Hi'a Magau' Topetolo' , Magau' to Israel ! Ane tahilo mpu'u-i mana'u ngkai kaju parika'-na toe mai , lako' tapangala'-idi . " Ntahawe' tauna to raparika' dohe-na , meruge' wo'o-ra-rawo .
41015033	Tebua'-mi eo , muu-mule' mobengi hobo' hi ngata toe rala-na tolu jaa .
41015034	Jaa tolu ncimonou' , mekio'-imi Yesus napasimuku mpo'uli' : " Alata'ala-ku , Alata'ala-ku ! Napa pai' nupalahii-a ? " Hi rala basa Yahudi hewa toi moni-na : " Eloi , Eloi , lama sabakhtani ? "
41015035	Ba hangkuja dua to mokore mohu' hi kaju parika'-na mpo'epe pe'au-na toe , ra'uli' : " Epe-dile ! Mpokio' nabi Elia-i . "
41015036	Hadua mokeno hilou mpo'ala' hampu'u wunga to hewa lomo' , nabangkahi hi rala ue anggur to mo'onco , natu'u hi wuntu hompea pai' napopoju'ui-ki Yesus bona na'inu . Na'uli' : " Popea , tahilo ba tumai mpu'u-i Elia mpopana'u-i ngkai kaju parika' ! "
41015037	Ngkai ree , kame'au-nami Yesus napesukui , pai' modupe'-mi inoha'-na .
41015038	Nto'u toe , kain porini-olo' to tetoe hi rala Tomi Alata'ala mobika' ntongo' ngkai lolo-na rata hi une'-na .
41015039	Tadulako tantara to mokore mponyanyohi kaju parika' toe mpohilo beiwa kamate-na Yesus . Na'uli' : " Ana' Alata'ala mpu'u-i-tawo' ! "
41015040	Ria wo'o hi ree ba hangkuja dua tobine to menaa ngkawao . Hanga'-na to hadua , Maria Magdalena . To hadua wo'o , Maria tina-ra Yakobus to tu'ai pai' Yoses . Pai' hadua wo'o , Salome .
41015041	Tobine toe-ramo to mpotuku' pai' mpotulungi Yesus bula-na hi tana' Galilea . Pai' wori' wo'o-pidi tobine to ntani'-na to mpotuku' Yesus tumai ngkai Galilea rata hi Yerusalem .
41015042	Eo karaparika'-na Yesus toe , eo pomporodoa , batua-na , eo kako'ia-na eo pepuea' , pai' ntuku' ada to Yahudi ntepu'u ncimonou' toe , rapalii'-mi mobago . Jadi' , neo' limpa-mi eo ,
41015043	tumai-mi hadua tauna to rahanga' Yusuf to Arimatea . Yusuf toei , hadua topohura agama Yahudi to rabila' , mahae moto-imi-hana mpopea tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia' . Yusuf mpedahoi' hilou hi Pilatus mperapi' woto-na Yesus .
41015044	Konce-i Pilatus mpo'epe kasohi'-na mate Yesus . Toe pai' nakio'-mi tadulako tantara napompekunei' ba mahae-imi Yesus mate .
41015045	Kana'epe-na Pilatus lolita tadulako tohe'e , napiliu-imi Yusuf mpo'ala' woto Yesus .
41015046	Yusuf mpo'oli kain to bula bona nahompui'-ki . Napopana'u-mi woto-na ngkai kaju parika' pai' naputu' hante kain toe . Oti toe natu'u hi rala daeo' to ralonga' hi panapa bulu' watu , pai' naluli' hameha' watu na'unca-ki wobo' daeo' toe .
41015047	Maria Magdalena pai' Maria tina-na Yoses mpetonoi kahiapa-na woto-na Yesus ratu'u .
41016001	Katimpaliu-na eo pepuea' , Maria Magdalena , Maria tina-na Yakobus , pai' Salome , hilou-ra mpo'oli anu mohonga . Patuju-ra , doko' hilou mpolanai woto-na Yesus hante to mohonga toe .
41016002	Jadi' , mepupulo ngkii eo Mingku , lako' moweka' , hilou-ramo hi daeo' .
41016003	Hi lengko ohea momepololitai-ramo , ra'uli' : " Hema-mi-tawo to mpotulungi-ta mpoderu' watu po'unca wobo' daeo' ? " Apa' watu toe ria bohe lia . Ntaa' we'i , karata-ra hi daeo' , rahilo-rawo tederu'-mi watu .
41016004	
41016005	Pesua'-rami hi rala daeo' , mpohilo-ra hadua kabilasa mohura tono' mali ka'ana-na , moheai hante pohea to bula . Konce tobine toera mpohilo-i .
41016006	Na'uli' kabilasa toei : " Neo'-koi konce ! Mpali' Yesus to Nazaret-koi , to mate raparika' . Tuwu' nculii'-imi ! Uma-ipi ria hi rehe'i . Hilo karatu'ua-na wengi .
41016007	Wae-e lau , hilou-mokoi , uli'-raka Petrus pai' ana'guru-na to ntani'-na katuwu'-na nculii'-mi . Uli'-raka hewa toi : Hilou meri'ulu-i hi tana' Galilea . Hi ria-damo mpai' , pai'-i nihilo , hewa to oti na'uli'-kokoi wengi . "
41016008	Pehupa'-ra tobine toera ngkai rala daeo' , pokeno-rami metibo' , apa' wulunga pai' moridi'-ramo . Uma-ra ulu mpololitai hema-hema , apa' ngkai kame'eka'-ra .
41016009	Pemata-na Yesus ngkai kamatea mepupulo ngkii hi eo Mingku , lomo'-na mpopehuwu-i woto-na hi Maria Magdalena . Maria tohe'ei , ria-i Yesus mpopalai pitu seta to mpohawi'-i .
41016010	Hilou-imi Maria hi topetuku'-na Yesus , narata-ra bula-ra geo' pai' peda' nono-ra . Na'uli'-raka : " Tuwu' nculii'-imi-hana Pue' , kuhilo-imi we'i ! " Aga uma raparasaya hawe'ea to najarita Maria toe .
41016011	
41016012	Oti toe , Yesus mpopehuwu wo'o-mi woto-na hi rodua topetuku'-na bula-ra mako' hilou hi mali ngata . Nto'u toe , lence-na mobali' , alaa-na uma ra'incai Kayesus-na .
41016013	Ponculi'-rami to rodua toera mpo'uli'-raka doo-ra kampohilo-ra Yesus . Aga uma wo'o raparasaya .
41016014	Ngkai ree , mehupa' wo'o-imi hi ana'guru-na to hampulu' hadua bula-ra ngkoni' . Nakamaro-ra apa' kura' pepangala'-ra pai' motu'a nono-ra . Nau' ria-mi tauna to mpohilo-i , uma oa'-ra dota mparasaya katuwu'-na nculii' mpu'u-imi .
41016015	Na'uli'-raka : " Hilou-mokoi hi humalili' dunia' , mpopalele Kareba Lompe' hi hawe'ea tauna .
41016016	Hema to mepangala' pai' raniu' , tehore-ra ngkai huku' jeko'-ra . Aga hema to uma mepangala' bate rahuku' .
41016017	Pai' hema to mepangala' , kuwai'-ra kuasa mpobabehi tanda-tanda to hewa toi : Hante hanga'-ku mpopalai-ra seta . Mololita-ra hante basa to uma ra'incai ngkai baraka' Inoha' Tomoroli' .
41016018	Ria-ra to ngkamu ule , ba paia-na nginu rasu , aga uma moto-ra moapa . Mpojama-ra tauna to peda' , bona mo'uri'-ra topeda' . "
41016019	Ka'oti-na Pue' Yesus mpololitai-ra , te'ongko'-imi hilou hi suruga , pai'-i mohura hi mali ka'ana Alata'ala .
41016020	Ngkai ree , topetuku'-na hilou mpopalele Kareba Lompe' hiapa-apa . Pue' mobago hangkaa-ngkania dohe-ra , pai' nawai'-ra kuasa mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi bona mporohoi kamakono-na Kareba to rakeni .
42001001	Teofilus to rabila' : Wori'-mi tauna mperao mpo'uki' dala ngkatuwu'-na Yesus , hewa to jadi' ba hangkuja mpae to liu hi laintongo'-ta .
42001002	To ra'uki' tohe'e , hibalia hante tutura to raparata-taka tauna to mpohilo mata moto-mi hawe'ea to jadi' toe ngkai lomo'-na pai' to jadi' pangkeni Lolita Pue' .
42001003	Jadi' , ka'oti-ku mpewulihi' hawe'ea-na ngkai tawu-na hante kanoto-noto-na , ku'uli' agina aku' wo'o-kuwo mpo'uki' tutura-na ntuku' pomeduncu-na .
42001004	Patuju-ku , bona nu'inca kamakono-na mpu'u napa to oti-mi ratudui'-koko .
42001005	Nto'u Magau' Herodes moparenta hi tana' Yudea , ria hadua imam to rahanga' Zakharia . Zakharia toei , ngkai posantina imam muli Abia . Hanga' tobine-na , Elisabet , muli imam wo'o-i-hawo .
42001006	Tau hancamoko toera , monoa' ingku-ra hi poncilo Alata'ala , apa' ratuku' hawe'ea parenta pai' atura Pue' hante uma ria kasalaia'-na .
42001007	Aga uma-ra mo'anai' , apa' Elisabet lalo , pai' tu'a-ramo roduaa-ra .
42001008	Hangkani , megoli-mi tempo-na imam-imam muli Abia to mpokamu bago Alata'ala , pai' Zakharia mpobago bago imam hi Tomi Alata'ala .
42001009	Ntuku' ada-ra , mpenoa'-ra ba hema-ra to rapelihi mesua' hi rala Tomi Alata'ala mpotunu dupa' . Zakharia-mi to mpela pompenoa'-ra .
42001010	Jadi' , bula ntodea mosampaya hi mali-na , Zakharia mesua' hi rala Tomi Alata'ala mpotunu dupa' .
42001011	Nto'u toe , mehupa'-mi hadua mala'eka Pue' hi mali ngka'ana meja' pontunua dupa' .
42001012	Kanahilo-na Zakharia mala'eka toei , konce pai' me'eka' lia-imi .
42001013	Na'uli' mala'eka toei : " Zakharia , neo'-ko me'eka' , apa' Pue' Ala mpo'epe pomperapia'-nu . Elisabet tobine-nu mo'ana' mpai' , hadua ana' tomane . Ana' tetui kana nuhanga' Yohanes .
42001014	Uma mpai' mowo kagoe'-nu mpokagoe' ana'-nu tetui . Wori' tauna mpokagoe' kaputu-na .
42001015	Hi'a jadi' tau bohe hi poncilo Pue' . Uma-i ma'ala nginu anggur ba napa-napa to melanguhi , pai' Inoha' Tomoroli' mpokuasai-i ngkai lomo' kaputu-na .
42001016	Wori' muli Israel natete' nculii' bona mepangala'-ra hi Alata'ala to rapue' ntu'a-ra owi .
42001017	Ana'-nu tetui mpai' jadi' suro to mako' meri'ulu ngkai Pue' hante kuasa pai' kabaraka'-na nabi Elia owi . Napopohintuwu' ana'-ana' hante tuama-ra . Pai' tauna to uma mpotuku' Pue' natete' nculii' hi ohea to monoa' bona monoto nono-ra . Hawe'ea toe nababehi bona mporodo nono ntodea , bona sadia-ramo mpotarima Pue' . "
42001018	Na'uli' Zakharia mpo'uli'-ki mala'eka : " Hiaa' , beiwa kaku'inca-na kamakono-na to nu'uli' tetu-e ? Apa' tu'a-amadie , pai' tobine-ku tu'a wo'o-imi-hawo . "
42001019	Natompoi' mala'eka toei : " Aku' toi Gabriel , pahawaa' Alata'ala to ngkai suruga . Alata'ala mposuro-a tumai mpoparata-koko kareba toe .
42001020	Napa to ku'uli'-koko toe we'i , bate madupa' ane rata-pi mpai' tempo-na . Aga iko-kona , apa' uma nuparasaya lolita-kue , wae-pi ngkai wae lau , uma-poko howa' mololita duu'-na madupa' mpu'u lolita-ku . "
42001021	Bula-na Zakharia hi rala Tomi Alata'ala , kapea-pea-ramo ntodea hi mali-na . Ingu'-ra apa' mahae rahi-i .
42001022	Pehupa'-na hi mali-na , uma-ipi howa' mpololitai-ra . Muntu' mohuka'-i-damo pai' bate uma-i howa' mololita . Toe pai' ra'inca-mi ntodea karia-na to nahilo hi rala Tomi Alata'ala .
42001023	Hudu-mi pobago-na Zakharia hi Tomi Alata'ala , nculii'-imi hilou hi tomi-na .
42001024	Ko'ia mahae ngkai ree , motina'i mpu'u-imi Elisabet . Lima mula kahae-na Elisabet uma mehupa'-hupa' ngkai rala tomi-na , pai' na'uli' :
42001025	" Tohe'i-e ahi'-na Pue' hi aku' . Natulungi-a mo'anai' , bona uma-apa me'ea' sabana kalalo-ku . "
42001026	Kahono'-na ono mula Elisabet motina'i , Alata'ala mpohubui mala'eka Gabriel hilou hi tana' Galilea , hi ngata to rahanga' Nazaret ,
42001027	bona mpohirua'-ki hadua toronaa to rahanga' Maria . Toronaa toei , bula-na mokamae' hante hadua kabilasa to rahanga' Yusuf , muli Magau' Daud owi .
42001028	Karata-na mala'eka hi ria , na'uli'-ki Maria : " Wori' tabe ! Pue' mpogane'-ko pai' mpodohei-ko ! "
42001029	Konce-i Maria mpo'epe lolita mala'eka toei , pai'-i mopekiri ba napa batua petabe-na toe .
42001030	Na'uli' wo'o-mi mala'eka : " Neo'-ko me'eka' Maria , apa' iko-mi to napokono Alata'ala bona mporata pegane'-na .
42001031	Motina'i-ko mpai' , pai'-ko mo'ana' , hadua ana' tomane . Ana' tetu mpai' kana nuhanga' Yesus .
42001032	Hi'a mpai' jadi' tauna to bohe tuwu'-na , pai'-i rahanga' Ana' Alata'ala to hi suruga . Pai' Pue' Alata'ala mpo'ongko'-i jadi' Magau' , hewa Magau' Daud , ntu'a-na owi .
42001033	Hi'a jadi' magau' to mpoparentai hawe'ea muli Yakub duu' kahae-hae-na , pai' poparenta-na uma ria kahudua-na . "
42001034	Na'uli' Maria mpo'uli'-ki mala'eka : " Beiwa-hawo kajadi'-na to nu'uli' tetu-e ? Apa' ko'ia-a-kuwo motomanei . "
42001035	Na'uli' mala'eka : " Inoha' Tomoroli' mpai' mana'u hi iko , pai' kabaraka' Alata'ala to hi suruga ngkamoui-ko . Toe pai' ana' to putu toe mpai' rahanga' moroli' , Ana' Alata'ala .
42001036	Epe-dile : ompi'-nu Elisabet-ele , to tu'a lia-imi pai' to ra'uli' doo lalo-ie , motina'i ono mula-imi-hawo ! Mo'ana'-i mpai' , hadua ana' tomane .
42001037	Apa' napa-napa to na'uli' Alata'ala bate kana madupa' . "
42001038	Na'uli' Maria : " Aku' toi batua-na Pue' , mengkoru-ama hi hawa'-na , bona napadupa' patuju-na hi aku' , hewa to nu'uli'-ka tetu . " Oti toe , malai-imi mala'eka mpalahii Maria .
42001039	Ngkai ree , pe'ongko'-nami Maria hilou hi ngata to hi bulu'-na hi tana' Yudea .
42001040	Karata-na hi tomi Zakharia , pesua'-nami pai'-i mpotabe Elisabet .
42001041	Kana'epe-na Elisabet petabe-na Maria toe , pongkale-nami ana' to hi rala puanaka-na , pai' Elisabet , nakuasai Inoha' Tomoroli'-imi .
42001042	Mekio'-imi napesukui mpo'uli'-ki Maria : " Iko-mi-kona to nagane' Alata'ala meliu ngkai hawe'ea tobine ntani'-na , pai' Alata'ala mpogane' ana' to nupotina'i-ki tetu .
42001043	Ha hema-a-kuwo aku' toi-e , pai' iko tina-na Pue'-ku tumai mpokinomo-a !
42001044	Wae kaku'epe-na petabe-nu , ana' to hi rala-ku ncaliu mongkale nakeni kagoe'-na .
42001045	Morasi' mpu'u-ko , apa' nupangala' lolita Pue' , apa' napa to na'uli'-koko bate madupa' . "
42001046	Na'uli' Maria : Mpo'une'-a Pue' hante nono-ku mpu'u .
42001047	Goe' lia-a , apa' Alata'ala Magau' Tompohore-a ngkai huku' jeko'-ku .
42001048	Nakiwoi-awa-kuwo , aku' batua-na to mpe'ahii' . Ngkai wae lau , hawe'ea tauna mpo'uli' ka'aku'-na tobine to nagane' Alata'ala .
42001049	Apa' Alata'ala to mokuasa mpopehuwu kabaraka'-na hi aku' . Moroli' hanga'-na !
42001050	Ma'ahi'-i hi hawe'ea tauna to mengkoru hi Hi'a , duu' rata hi muli-muli-ra .
42001051	Nababehi anu mobaraka' hante kuasa-na : Tauna to molangko nono-ra nagaro' bona uma oko patuju-ra .
42001052	Magau'-magau' napohu ngkai pangka'-ra . Tauna to dingki' tuwu'-ra napomolangko .
42001053	Tauna to mo'oro' nabohui hante pongkoni' to lompe' . Tauna topo'ua' napopalai hante ngkeni woto mara .
42001054	Napopohiloi ahi'-na hi kita' muli Israel , batua-na owi . Natulungi-ta hewa to najanci hi ntu'a-ta owi . Uma nalipo' pojanci-na hi Abraham pai' hi muli-na duu' kahae-hae-na . "
42001055	
42001056	Ba tolu mula kahae-na Maria mo'oha' hante Elisabet , pai' lako' nculii'-idi hilou hi tomi-na .
42001057	Rata-mi tempo-na Elisabet mo'ana' . Mo'ana' mpu'u-imi , hadua ana' tomane .
42001058	Tongki-ra pai' ompi'-ra mpo'epe beiwa Pue' mpopohiloi ahi'-na hi Elisabet hi kanawai'-na ana'-na toe , toe pai' goe' wo'o-ramo-rawo hangkaa-ngkania hante Elisabet .
42001059	Ntuku' ada-ra to Yahudi , kahono'-na walu eo umuru-na ana' toei , tumai-ramo tongki pai' ompi'-ra mpotini'-i ntuku' ada-ra to Yahudi . Patuju-ra doko' mpohanga'-i Zakharia , mpongkona'-ki tuama-na moto , ntuku' ada-ra .
42001060	Tapi' na'uli' Elisabet mpo'uli'-raka : " Neo' waetu ! Bate Yohanes hanga'-na . "
42001061	Hampetompoi'-ra : " Hiaa' bo uma-hanale ria ompi'-ni to rahanga' tetu-e ! "
42001062	Ngkai ree , rahuka'-ki Zakharia rapompekunei' ba napa to doko' nahanga'-ki ana'-na .
42001063	Zakharia mperapi' hameha' po'ukia' pai' na'uki' : " Hanga'-na Yohanes . " Konce omea-ramo .
42001064	Nto'u toe , muu-mule' howa' nculii'-imi mololita , pai'-i mpo'une'-une' Alata'ala .
42001065	Me'eka' omea-ramo tongki-ra , pai' kareba toe molele hobo' hi bulu'-na Yudea .
42001066	Hawe'ea to mpo'epe kareba toe mokanono , ra'uli' : " Ha jadi' napa-i mpai' ana' toei ? " Apa' Pue' mpodohei-i hante baraka'-na .
42001067	Ane Zakharia , tuama ana' toei , Inoha' Tomoroli' mpokuasai-i , pai'-i mpohowa' lolita Alata'ala , na'uli' :
42001068	" Mai-tamo kita' muli Israel , mpo'une' Alata'ala Pue'-ta ! Apa' hompo-imi tumai mpotulungi-ta kita' ntodea-na . Tumai-i mpobahaka-ta ngkai bali'-ta .
42001069	Nawai'-tamo Tadulako to mobaraka' to mpokeni kalompea' . Tadulako toei , muli Magau' Daud , batua-na owi .
42001070	Ngkai owi hante wiwi nabi-nabi to moroli' , Pue' mpojanci
42001071	kanabahaka-ta mpai' ngkai bali'-ta , nabahaka-ta ngkai kuasa-ra to mpokahuku'-ta .
42001072	Napopohiloi mpu'u-mi ahi'-na hi ntu'a-ta owi . Napadupa'-mi janci-na to moroli' .
42001073	Mojanci pai' mosumpa-i hi Abraham ntu'a-ta owi , kanabahaka-ta ngkai kuasa bali'-ta , bona ma'ala-ta mpopue'-i hante uma ria ka'ekaa'-ta ,
42001074	
42001075	bona kita' jadi' topetuku'-na to moroli' pai' to monoa' hi poncilo-na , duu' kahae-hae-na .
42001076	Hiaa' ane iko , ana'-ku , iko mpai' rahanga' nabi Pue' Ala to hi suruga . Apa' iko-mi mpai' to mako' meri'ulu ngkai Pue' , bona mporodo ohea-na .
42001077	Iko mpai' to mpopo'incai ntodea-na ohea bona Alata'ala mpowai'-ra kalompea' pai' mpo'ampungi jeko'-ra .
42001078	Apa' ma'ahi' lia Alata'ala Pue'-ta . Toe pai' hompo-imi tumai mpotulungi-ta . Tumai-i ngkai suruga hewa eo mebere' .
42001079	Tumai-i mpobajahi nono tauna to hi rala kabengia-na pai' to me'eka' mpoka'eka' kamatea . Natete'-ta hi ohea to mpotoa' kalompea' tuwu' . "
42001080	Ana' Zakharia toei , kaboo-bohea kamonoo-notoa nono-na . Mo'oha'-i hi papada to wao' , duu'-na rata tempo-na natepu'u-mi mpokeni Lolita Pue' hi muli Israel .
42002001	Nto'u toe , rata hawa' ngkai Kaisar Agustus , mpohawai' bona hawe'ea tauna hi humalili' kamagaua' Roma ra'uki' hanga'-ra bona ra'inca kadea-ra .
42002002	Pobilaa' tauna to lomo'-na tohe'i rababehi nto'u-na Kirenius jadi' gubernur hi tana' Siria .
42002003	Hawe'ea tauna hilou mpope'uki' hanga'-ra , hore-hore hi ngata totu'a-ra .
42002004	Wae wo'o Yusuf me'ongko' ngkai ngata Nazaret , mpo'ema' Maria kamae'-na to bula-na motina'i-mi . Me'ongko'-ramo ngkai tana' Galilea , manake' hilou hi tana' Yudea , mpotoa' ngata Betlehem , ngata kaputua Magau' Daud owi . Yusuf kana mpope'uki' hanga'-na hi ria , apa' hi'a muli Magau' Daud .
42002005	
42002006	Nto'u-ra hi Betlehem toe , rata-mi tempo-na Maria mo'ana' .
42002007	Mo'ana' mpu'u-imi , hadua ana' tomane , ana' ulumua'-na . Ana'-na toei naputu' pai' napopoturu hi rala paiwa' , apa' ihia'-mi tomi torata .
42002008	Hi mali ngata Betlehem , ria ba hangkuja dua topo'ewu . Bula-ra mpodoo bima-ra hi papada ngkabengia toe ,
42002009	muu-mule' mehupa'-mi hadua mala'eka Pue' mpohirua'-raka , pai' kabaraka' Pue' mehini mpohinii-ra , alaa-na me'eka' lia-ramo .
42002010	Na'uli' mala'eka toei mpo'uli'-raka : " Neo'-koi me'eka' , apa' katumai-ku toi mpokeni kareba lompe' hi koi' , kareba to mpakagoe' lia hawe'ea tauna .
42002011	Eo toe lau hi ngata Magau' Daud , putu-mi Magau' Tompohore-koi ngkai huku' jeko'-ni , Hi'a-mi Kristus , Pue' .
42002012	Toi-mi pompetonoi-na bona ni'inca kamakono-na lolita-ku : mporua'-koi mpai' hadua ana'lei raputu' pai' rapopoturu hi rala paiwa' . "
42002013	Hampinisi mata mehupa' wo'o-mi wori' mala'eka to ngkai suruga dohe mala'eka to lomo'-na we'i . Mpo'une'-ra Alata'ala , ra'uli' :
42002014	" Mai-tamo mpo'une' Alata'ala to hi suruga ! Pai' hi dunia' , tauna to napokono mporata kalompea' tuwu' . "
42002015	Ngkai ree , nculii'-ramo mala'eka hilou hi suruga , pai' mohawa'-ramo topo'ewu toera , ra'uli' : " Kita-mi hilou hi Betlehem mpohilo kajadia' to na'uli'-taka Pue' . "
42002016	Kahilou-rami , pai' rarua' mpu'u-mi Maria pai' Yusuf , hante ana'lei-ra to turu hi rala paiwa' .
42002017	Karahilo-na ana' toei , ralolita-mi napa to na'uli'-raka mala'eka mpotompo'wiwi-i .
42002018	Konce omea tauna to mpo'epe lolita topo'ewu toera .
42002019	Aga Maria mpotimamahi hawe'ea to jadi' toe hi rala nono-na , pai' ntora napenonoi .
42002020	Nculii'-ramo topo'ewu toera , pai' halengko ohea mpo'une' pai' mpobila' Alata'ala-ramo , apa' hawe'ea to ra'epe pai' to rahilo , bate hewa to na'uli'-raka mala'eka .
42002021	Ntuku' ada-ra to Yahudi , kahono'-na walu eo umuru-na , Ana' toei ratini' pai' rahanga'-i Yesus , hanga' to nahanga'-ki mala'eka kako'ia-na napotina'i-ki tina-na .
42002022	Oti toe , rata-mi tempo-na Yusuf pai' Maria kana mpobabehi ada ka'oti-na mo'ana' , ntuku' Atura Pue' to na'uki' Musa . Nto'u toe , ana'lei-ra toe rakeni hilou hi Yerusalem bona ratonu hi Pue' ,
42002023	hewa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Atura Pue' : " Butu dua ana' tomane to ulumua' kana ratonu hi Pue' bona jadi' bagia-na . "
42002024	Rakeni wo'o pepue'-ra , ntuku' hawa' to te'uki' hi rala Buku Atura Pue' : hamoko korokou ba roma'a ana' mangkebodo .
42002025	Hi Yerusalem nto'u toe , ria hadua tauna to rahanga' Simeon . Simeon toei , tau monoa' to mengkoru hi Alata'ala . Inoha' Tomoroli' mpodohei-i , pai'-i ncarumaka kaneo'-na rata-mi tempo-na Alata'ala mpotulungi muli Israel .
42002026	Hangkani , Inoha' Tomoroli' mpo'uli'-ki hewa toi : " Ko'ia-ko mate ane ko'ia nuhiloi Magau' Topetolo' to najanci Pue' Ala . "
42002027	Jadi' , nto'u-na Yusuf pai' Maria mpokeni Yesus ana'lei-ra hi Tomi Alata'ala bona ratonu hi Alata'ala ntuku' Atura Musa , Inoha' Tomoroli' mpopakeni Simeon mesua' hi Tomi Alata'ala .
42002028	Kana'ala'-nami ana'lei toei , napanawi pai'-i mpo'une' Alata'ala , na'uli' :
42002029	" O Pue' , nau' mate-ama , uma-pi beiwa . Oha-mi nono-ku , apa' madupa'-mi janci-nu .
42002030	Hante mata-ku moto-mi mpohilo Topetolo' to ngkai Iko Pue' ,
42002031	to nuporodo hi hawe'ea manusia' .
42002032	Topetolo' toei , hewa baja to mponotohi nono tauna to bela-ra muli Israel . Pai'-i mpokeni karabilaa' hi kai' muli Israel to nupobagia . "
42002033	Tina pai' tuama ana' toei konce mpo'epe lolita Simeon mpotompo'wiwi ana'-ra .
42002034	Simeon mpogane'-ra , pai' na'uli'-ki Maria : " Ngkai Ana'-nu toii , wori' mpai' muli Israel monawu' mporata silaka , aga wori' wo'o to tehore bona mporata kalompea' . Hi'a-mi to napelihi pai' nasuro tumai Pue' Ala , aga wori' tauna mposapuaka-i mpai' ,
42002035	alaa-na telohu-mi ihi' nono-ra . Hiaa' iko Maria , narumpa'-ko-hana mpai' kasusaa' nono , hewa to rajalo piho' . "
42002036	Nto'u karata-ra Yusuf pai' Maria hi Tomi Alata'ala toe , ria wo'o-hawo hi ree hadua nabi tobine to tu'a lia-mi . Hanga'-na Hana , ana' Fanuel , ngkai posantina-na Asyer . Nto'u toe , umuru-na walu mpulu' opo' mpae . Pitu mpae-i-wadi motomanei . Ngkai ree , balu-imi pai' uma-ipi motomanei . Tida oa'-i hi Tomi Alata'ala , hi eo-na hi bengi-na ntora mosampaya pai' mopuasa'-i mepue' hi Pue' Ala .
42002037	
42002038	Jadi' , nto'u Yusuf pai' Maria hi Tomi Alata'ala toe , rata wo'o-imi-hawo Hana , mpo'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala , pai' ntora mpotompo'wiwi Ana' toei hi hawe'ea tauna to mpopea tempo-na Alata'ala mpobahaka to Yerusalem ngkai bali'-ra .
42002039	Ka'oti-ra Yusuf pai' Maria mpobabehi hawe'ea to ratuntu' hi rala Buku Atura Pue' , nculii'-ramo hilou hi ngata Nazaret hi tana' Galilea .
42002040	Ana'-ra toei , kaboo-bohea pai' karoo-rohoa . Monoto lia nono-na , pai' Alata'ala mpogane'-i .
42002041	Butu mpae-na , tina pai' tuama-na Yesus hilou hi Yerusalem mpokaralai eo bohe to Yahudi to rahanga' Eo Paskah .
42002042	Hono'-mi hampulu' rompae umuru-na Yesus , hilou wo'o-ramo ngkaralai eo bohe toe hewa kabiasaa-ra .
42002043	Katimpaliu-na eo bohe toe , nculii'-ramo hilou mpotoa' ngata-ra . Aga Yesus-hana , uma-i mpotuku'-ra . Hi ria-i-pidi hi Yerusalem , aga uma ra'incai totu'a-na .
42002044	Ra'uli'-rawo , metuku' moto-i dohe doo hampomakoa'-ra . Ha'eo-ramo momako' , lako' rapali'-idi hi doo-ra pai' ompi'-ra .
42002045	Aga uma-i raruai' . Toe pai' nculii'-ra hi Yerusalem mpopali'-i .
42002046	Tolu eo-ramo mepali' , lako' rarua'-idi hi Tomi Alata'ala . Mohura-i hi laintongo' guru agama , mpe'epei pai' mepekune' .
42002047	Hawe'ea tauna to mpo'epe-i mpo'uli' : " Uma mowo kapante-nae' ! Uma mowo kamonoto tompoi'-na ! "
42002048	Konce tina pai' tuama-na mpohilo-i . Na'uli' tina-na : " Uto' , napa-di-kona pai' nupohewa toe-kaie ! Kai' tuama-nu , sese'-kai mpopali'-ko ! "
42002049	Na'uli'-raka : " Ha napa pai' nipali'-a ? Ha uma ni'incai kana hi rala tomi Tuama-kua ? "
42002050	Tapi' uma rapaha batua lolita-na .
42002051	Oti toe , hidohea-ramo nculii' hilou hi Nazaret , pai' bate mengkoru-i hi hawa' tina pai' tuama-na . Tina-na mpotimamahi hawe'ea to jadi' toe hi rala nono-na .
42002052	Yesus kaboo-bohea pai' kamonoo-notoa nono-na . Alata'ala mpokono-i , wae wo'o manusia' .
42003001	Hi kahampulu' lima mpae-na poparenta Kaisar Tiberius hi ngata Roma , Pontius Pilatus jadi' gubernur hi tana' Yudea pai' Herodes Antipas to moparenta hi Galilea . Filipus ompi'-na Herodes moparenta hi Iturea pai' hi Trakhonitis , pai' Lisanias moparenta hi Abilene .
42003002	To jadi' Imam Bohe nto'u toe , Hanas pai' Kayafas . Hi mpae tohe'e , Alata'ala mpoparata lolita-na hi Yohanes ana' Zakharia hi papada to wao' .
42003003	Jadi' , momako'-imi Yohanes mure'-nca'u ue Yordan mpoparata Lolita Alata'ala hi ntodea , na'uli' : " Medea-mokoi ngkai jeko'-ni , pai' kana tumai-koi kuniu' , bona Alata'ala mpo'ampungi jeko'-ni . "
42003004	Yohanes toei mpopadupa' napa to te'uki' hi rala sura nabi Yesaya owi , moni-na hewa toi : Ria tauna to mekio' hi papada to wao' , na'uli' : ` Neo' rata-imi Pue' ! Porodo ami'-miki ohea-na ! Nipakalempe ami'-mi ohea to natara mpai' !
42003005	To lobu'-na kana ra'ihii' , to molangko pai' to pabulu'-bulu' kana rapohimpaya' . To pahiku-hiku rapomonoa' , pai' to moloke'-loke' rapokalempe .
42003006	Oti toe , hawe'ea manusia' mpohilo Alata'ala mpohore ntodea-na ngkai jeko'-ra . ' "
42003007	Wori' tauna tumai mpopeniu' hi Yohanes . Na'uli' Yohanes mpo'uli'-raka : " He koi' to bengku' gau'-ni ! Napa pai' tumai-koie ? Ba ni'uli'-koina , ma'ala mpai' nipasalewa roe Pue' Ala to neo' mporumpa'-koi ?
42003008	Ane bongko medea-mokoi ngkai jeko'-ni , babehi-mokoi gau' to lompe' . Pai' neo' nipoperaha kamuli-na Abraham-koi ! Bona ni'inca : muli Abraham bisa napajadi' Alata'ala ngkai watu-watu toe lau .
42003009	Neo' rata-mi pehuku' Alata'ala ! Pehuku'-na hewa pati to rodo ami'-mi hi tawu kaju . Butu ngkaju-na to uma lompe' wua'-na , bate ratoki pai' ratene' hi rala apu . "
42003010	Ntodea mpekune' Yohanes , ra'uli' : " Ane wae , napa-kaiwo to kana kibabehi ? "
42003011	Na'uli' Yohanes : " Hema-koi to rontonga' baju-ni , hantonga' wai'-raka-rawo to uma nakariai . Pai' tauna to ria pongkoni'-ra , bagii-ra-rawo to uma ria pongkoni'-ra . "
42003012	Rata wo'o-ra-rawo topesingara' paja' mpopeniu' hi Yohanes . Mepekune'-ra , ra'uli' : " Guru , napa-kaiwo to kana kibabehi-e ? "
42003013	Natompoi'-ra : " Neo'-koi mesingara' melabi ngkai to rapakatantu topoparenta . "
42003014	Rata wo'o-ra-rawo tantara mpekune'-i , ra'uli' : " Hiaa' beiwa wo'o-ka-kaiwo kai' ! Napa-kaiwo to kana kibabehi-e ? " Na'uli'-raka : " Neo'-koi mporampaki rewa doo , pai' neo' mpo'ekahi ntodea bona rawai'-koi doi . Hangkuja-mi-hawo gaji'-ni , tarima-mi hante kagoea' nono . "
42003015	Nto'u toe , ntodea ntora mpopea karata-na Magau' Topetolo' to najanci Alata'ala . Hawe'ea-ra mepekune' hi rala nono-ra , meka' ba lue' Yohanes lau-mi Magau' Topetolo' to rapopea toe .
42003016	Toe pai' Yohanes mpo'uli'-raka omea : " Ane aku'-le , mponiu'-koi hante ue-wadi , tanda kamedea-ni ngkai jeko'-ni . Tapi' tumai-i mpai' to meliu kuasa-na ngkai aku' . Bangku' jadi' pahawaa'-na to mpobongka koloro sapatu'-na , uma-a-kuwo natao . Hi'a mpai' to mponiu'-koi hante Inoha' Tomoroli' pai' hante apu .
42003017	Hi'a ma'ala rarapai'-ki tauna to mpowiri' pae . Nagaa' pae to mo'ihi ngkai to lopa'-na duu'-na me'itu' . Pae to mo'ihi napuna' hi rala wilulu-na , pai' to lopa'-na nasuwe hi rala apu to jela' ncuu duu' kahae-hae-na . "
42003018	Hewa toei Yohanes mpokeni Kareba Lompe' hi ntodea , pai' naparesai'-ra nte wori' nyala tudui'-na .
42003019	Pai' nakamaro wo'o kasalaa'-na Herodes Antipas , topoparenta hi tana' Galilea , apa' Herodes mpo'ago pai' mpotobine Herodias , tobine ompi'-na moto . Yohanes mpokamaro-i sabana gau'-na toe , pai' sabana hawe'ea gau'-na to dada'a ntani'-na .
42003020	Jadi' , kana'epe-na Herodes pekamaro Yohanes toe , uma-di nabalii' gau'-na to dada'a , nadonihii lau-di : nahoko' lau-imi Yohanes pai'-i natarungku' .
42003021	Kako'ia-na Yohanes ratarungku' , bula-na meniu'-pidi mponiu' ntodea , Yesus wo'o-hawo tumai mpopeniu' . Ka'oti-nai raniu' , bula-na mosampaya , muu-mule' tebea-mi langi' ,
42003022	pai' Inoha' Tomoroli' mana'u tumai dungku hi Yesus , lence-na hewa danci mangkebodo . Pai' Alata'ala mololita ngkai suruga mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Iko toi-mi Ana'-ku to kupe'ahi' . Iko-mi to mpakagoe' nono-ku . "
42003023	Nto'u umuru Yesus kira-kira tolu mpulu' mpae , natepu'u-mi pobago-na . Ntuku' pomporataa tauna , Yesus ana' Yusuf , Yusuf ana' Eli ,
42003024	Eli ana' Matat , Matat ana' Lewi , Lewi ana' Malkhi , Malkhi ana' Yanai , Yanai ana' Yusuf ,
42003025	Yusuf ana' Matica , Matica ana' Amos , Amos ana' Nahum , Nahum ana' Hesli , Hesli ana' Nagai ,
42003026	Nagai ana' Maat , Maat ana' Matica , Matica ana' Simei , Simei ana' Yosekh , Yosekh ana' Yoda ,
42003027	Yoda ana' Yohanan , Yohanan ana' Resa , Resa ana' Zerubabel , Zerubabel ana' Sealtiel , Sealtiel ana' Neri ,
42003028	Neri ana' Malkhi , Malkhi ana' Adi , Adi ana' Kosam , Kosam ana' Elmadam , Elmadam ana' Er ,
42003029	Er ana' Yesua , Yesua ana' Eliezer , Eliezer ana' Yorim , Yorim ana' Matat , Matat ana' Lewi ,
42003030	Lewi ana' Simeon , Simeon ana' Yehuda , Yehuda ana' Yusuf , Yusuf ana' Yonam , Yonam ana' Elyakim ,
42003031	Elyakim ana' Melea , Melea ana' Mina , Mina ana' Matata , Matata ana' Natan , Natan ana' Daud ,
42003032	Daud ana' Isai , Isai ana' Obed , Obed ana' Boas , Boas ana' Salmon , Salmon ana' Nahason ,
42003033	Nahason ana' Aminadab , Aminadab ana' Admin , Admin ana' Arni , Arni ana' Hezron , Hezron ana' Peres , Peres ana' Yehuda ,
42003034	Yehuda ana' Yakub , Yakub ana' Ishak , Ishak ana' Abraham , Abraham ana' Terah , Terah ana' Nahor ,
42003035	Nahor ana' Serug , Serug ana' Rehu , Rehu ana' Peleg , Peleg ana' Eber , Eber ana' Salmon ,
42003036	Salmon ana' Kenan , Kenan ana' Arpakhsad , Arpakhsad ana' Sem , Sem ana' Nuh , Nuh ana' Lamekh ,
42003037	Lamekh ana' Metusalah , Metusalah ana' Henokh , Henokh ana' Yared , Yared ana' Mahalaleel , Mahalaleel ana' Kenan ,
42003038	Kenan ana' Enos , Enos ana' Set , Set ana' Adam , Adam ana' Alata'ala .
42004001	Pe'ongko'-na Yesus ngkai ue Yordan , Inoha' Tomoroli' mpokuasai-i pai' mpakeni-i hilou hi papada to wao' .
42004002	Mo'oha'-i hi ria opo' mpulu' bengi , pai'-i nasori Magau' Anudaa' . Kahae-na toe , uma ria hanyalaa to nakoni' . Timpaliu opo' mpulu' bengi toe , mo'oro'-imi .
42004003	Na'uli' Magau' Anudaa' mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Ane Ana' Alata'ala mpu'u-ko , wae-pi hubui watu toe mewali pongkoni' ! "
42004004	Natompoi' Yesus : " Hi rala Buku Tomoroli' te'uki' hewa toi : ` Manusia' uma tuwu' ngkai pongkoni'-wadi . ' "
42004005	Oti toe , Magau' Anudaa' mpokeni-i hilou hi kalangkoa-na . Hampinisi mata-wadi napopohiloi-i hawe'ea kamagaua' hi dunia' ,
42004006	pai' na'uli'-ki : " Kuasa mpoparentai hawe'ea kamagaua' toera lau pai' hawe'ea ka'uaa'-na , kuwai'-koko Iko omea-mi mpai' , apa' aku' omea pue'-na , pai' ma'ala kupewai' hi hema konoa-ku .
42004007	Jadi' , ane mepue'-ko hi aku' , kuwai'-koko Iko omea-mi toe lau . "
42004008	Natompoi' Yesus : " Hi rala Buku Tomoroli' te'uki' hewa toi : ` Kana mepue'-ta hi Pue'-ta , Pue' Ala . Muntu' Hi'a-wadi to natao tapengkorui . ' "
42004009	Oti toe , Magau' Anudaa' mpopakeni-i hilou hi Yerusalem , napopokore-i hi lolo wumu Tomi Alata'ala , pai' na'uli'-ki : " Ane Ana' Alata'ala mpu'u-ko , mengkanawu'-ko pe' ngkai rei !
42004010	Uma-ko mpai' moapa , apa' ria te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' : ` Pue' Ala mpohubui mala'eka-na mpetalawai'-ko , bona neo'-ko silaka .
42004011	Rahorongko-ko , bona witi'-nu uma dungku hi watu . ' "
42004012	Natompoi' Yesus : " Te'uki' wo'o hewa toi : ` Neo' tasori Pue'-ta , Pue' Ala . ' "
42004013	Ka'oti-na Magau' Anudaa' mposori Yesus hante hawe'ea pesori toe , malai-imi mpopea loga to lompe' .
42004014	Oti toe , Yesus nakuasai Inoha' Tomoroli' , pai'-i nculii' hilou hi tana' Galilea . Hi humalili' Galilea , molele-mi kareba to mpo'uli' napa to nababehi .
42004015	Metudui'-i hi tomi-tomi posampayaa to Yahudi , pai' hawe'ea tauna mpo'une'-i .
42004016	Hilou-imi Yesus hi Nazaret , ngata kabohea-na . Pai' hewa kabiasaa-na , mesua'-imi hi tomi posampayaa hi Eo Sabat , eo pepuea'-ra to Yahudi . Mokore-imi bona mpobasa Buku Tomoroli' .
42004017	Ratonu-ki sura nabi Yesaya . Napali' duu'-na mporua' lolita tohe'i :
42004018	" Inoha' Pue' Ala hompo hi Aku' , apa' nawati'-ama mpokeni Kareba Lompe' hi tauna to mpe'ahii' tuwu'-ra . Nasuro-a mpo'uli'-raka to ratawani : ` Tebahaka-mokoi ! ' Nasuro-a mpo'uli'-raka towero : ` Pehilo-mokoi ! ' Nahubui-a mpobahaka-ra to rapobatua .
42004019	Nahubui-a mpopalele kareba-na , karata-nami tempo-na Pue' mpopohiloi ahi'-na hi ntodea-na . "
42004020	Ka'oti-na nabasa toe we'i , nalulu nculii'-mi sura toe , natonu-ki pue' bago , pai'-i mohura bona metudui' . Hawe'ea tauna to hi rala tomi posampayaa toe mpodulu mponaa-i doko' mpo'epe lolita-na .
42004021	Na'uli'-miraka : " Eo toe lau , madupa'-mi lolita Buku Tomoroli' toe , nto'u kani'epe-na kubasa we'i . "
42004022	Konce omea-ramo to mpo'epe-i , ra'uli' : " Lompe' lia pololita-na ! Uma mowo kanoto-na ! Hiaa' bo ana' Yusuf-i-wadi-hawo . "
42004023	Ngkai ree , na'uli' mpo'uli'-raka : " Bate ria-koi mpai' to mpo'uli'-ka walatu tohe'i : ` Ee dokter , paka'uri' moto-mi-kowo woto-nu ! Ane bongko nabi mpu'u-ko , anu mekoncehi to ki'epe nubabehi hi Kapernaum , babehi wo'o hi rehe'i hi ngata-nu moto . ' "
42004024	Na'uli' tena-raka Yesus : " Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi , uma ria nabi to rabila' hi ngata-na moto .
42004025	Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : napa to jadi' tempo toi , bate hewa to jadi' hi tempo-na nabi Elia owi . Nto'u toe , tolu mpae ono mula hangaa mara eo , alaa-na rata oro' bohe hi hawe'ea ngata . Wori' moto tobine tobalu hi tana' Israel to mpe'ahii' tuwu'-ra nto'u toe .
42004026	Tapi' Pue' Ala uma mpohubui Elia mpotulungi haduaa ngkai tobalu toera . To nahubui-ki hilou hi ngata Sarfat , mpotulungi hadua tobine tobalu to Sidon , bela-i-hana to Israel .
42004027	Wae wo'o nto'u nabi Elisa owi , wori' moto topohaki' poko' hi tana' Israel . Aga uma-ra haduaa to napaka'uri' nabi Elisa . Muntu' Naaman , tauna to Siria . "
42004028	Mpo'epe lolita-na Yesus toe we'i , moroe lia-ramo hawe'ea tauna to hi rala tomi posampayaa .
42004029	Pokore-rami mpopalai-i hilou hi mali ngata , pai' rakeni hilou hi bingke-na , apa' ngata-ra hi lolo bulu' . Patuju-ra ke mpotulaka-i hi bingke-na bona mate-i .
42004030	Ntaa' we'i , Yesus mako' mpe'olo' tauna to wori' , pai' nculi' palai-nami .
42004031	Oti toe , Yesus hilou hi ngata Kapernaum hi tana' Galilea . Karata-na hi ree , metudui' wo'o-i hi tomi posampayaa hi Eo Sabat .
42004032	Konce-ramo tauna to mpo'epe tudui'-na , apa' mololita-i hewa tauna to mokuasa .
42004033	Ria wo'o hi ree hadua tauna to napesuai' seta to dada'a lia . Mejeu'-imi na'uli' :
42004034	" Ee Yesus to Nazaret Doko' nupopai-dakaie ? Ba doko' nuropuhi-dakaie ? Ku'inca moto-kole , ka' Iko-na Suro to moroli' ngkai Alata'ala-e . "
42004035	Yesus mpo'uli'-ki seta toei : " Ngkaba'i-ko ! Palai-ko ngkai tauna tetui ! " Seta to mpesuai' tau toei mpodungka-i hi laintongo' ntodea , pai'-i malai , aga uma-i napopai-pai .
42004036	Konce omea-ramo tauna to mpohilo , pai' momepololitai-ramo , ra'uli' : " Uma mowo kabaraka' lolita-nae' ! Napake' kuasa-na mpopalai anudaa' , malai mpu'u-ramo-rana . "
42004037	Ngkai ree , molele-mi kareba hiapa-apa hi tana' Galilea , to mpo'uli' napa to nababehi Yesus .
42004038	Oti toe , malai-imi Yesus ngkai rala tomi posampayaa , hilou hi tomi Simon . Nto'u toe , piniana-na Simon tobine ngkelengi' gaga . Jadi' merapi'-ra hi Yesus bona natulungi-i-hawo .
42004039	Lou-imi Yesus mokore hi ncori poturua-na , pai' na'uli' : " Palai-ko haki' ! " Ncaliu mo'uri'-imi , pai' memata-i mpolayani-ra .
42004040	Limpa-mi eo , wori' tauna tumai hi Yesus , mpokeni hawe'ea ompi'-ra to peda' hante wori' nyala haki'-ra . Naganga-ra butu dua-na pai' napaka'uri'-ra .
42004041	Pai' wori' wo'o seta napopalai ngkai tauna to rapesuai' . Seta to napopalai toera , kaka'au-au-ra , ra'uli' : " Iko-mi Ana' Alata'ala ! " Aga natagi mpu'u-ra bona neo'-ra mololita , apa' ra'inca Kahi'a-na Magau' Topetolo' .
42004042	Kamepulo-na , malai-imi Yesus ngkai ngata toe , hilou hi kawaoa'-na . Wori' tauna mpali'-i , duu'-na rarua'-i . Merapi'-ra bona neo'-ipi mpalahii-ra .
42004043	Tapi' na'uli' mpo'uli'-raka : " Kana hilou wo'o-a hi ngata-ngata ntani'-na , mpoparata-raka kareba lompe' to mpo'uli' neo' rata-mi tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia' . Apa' toe-mi patuju-na Alata'ala mposuro-a tumai . "
42004044	Ngkai ree , Yesus hilou mpokeni Lolita Pue' hi tomi posampayaa hobo' hi tana' Yudea .
42005001	Hangkani , bula-na Yesus mokore hi wiwi' rano Genesaret , wori' tauna mome'upi' doko' mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala .
42005002	Mpohilo-i romeha' sakaya hi wiwi' rano . Nto'u toe , topebau' mencore ngkai sakaya-ra hilou hi role-na mpobohoi' jala'-ra .
42005003	Hilou-imi Yesus mpohawi' sakaya to hameha' , sakaya-na Simon , pai' naperapi' bona Simon mpotoko sakaya ngkai wiwi' rano hangkedi' . Oti toe , pai' mohura-imi hi rala sakaya mpotudui' ntodea .
42005004	Kahudu-na metudui' , na'uli' mpo'uli'-ki Simon : " Toko tena hilou hi kanalaa-na , pai' tene' jala'-ni bona mporata-koi bau' . "
42005005	Na'uli' Simon : " Guru , hamengia-makai ngone mobago , aga uma hama'aa ihi' jala'-kai . Aga nau' wae , kutene' moto , lawi' nuhubui-kai . "
42005006	Ngkai ree , karatene'-na jala'-ra , wori' mpu'u-mi bau' to mesua' hi rala-na , alaa-na ntepu'u morenta-mi jala'-ra .
42005007	Mekawe-ra hi doo-ra to hi rala sakaya kahameha'-na bona tumai mengawa' . Tumai mpu'u-ramo-rawo pai' ra'ihii'-mi sakaya romehaa' , duu'-na neo' matala nakeni katomo-na .
42005008	Kanahilo-na Simon Petrus kabaraka'-na Yesus toe , powingkotu'-nami hi nyanyoa-na , na'uli' : " Neo'-apa numohui' , Pue' ! Apa' aku' toi tauna topojeko' . "
42005009	Simon mololita hewa toe , apa' hi'a pai' hawe'ea doo-na wilingkoroa mpohilo kawori' bau' to nawoko' jala'-ra .
42005010	Wilingkoroa wo'o-ra-rawo Yakobus pai' Yohanes , rodua ana' Zebedeus to mobago dohe Simon . Ngkai ree , na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki Simon : " Neo' me'eka' . Ntepu'u wae lau , uma-poko mebau' . Kuwai'-moko pobago to bo'u : mpotudui' tauna jadi' topetuku'-ku . "
42005011	Oti toe , radii' sakaya-ra hi role-na , rapalahii omea-mi , pai' mpotuku' Yesus-ramo .
42005012	Hangkani , bula-na Yesus hi rala ngata , rata hadua tauna to mohaki' poko' hobo' woto-na . Kampohilo-na Yesus , powingkotu'-nami , lio-na dungku hi tana' . Merapi'-i hi Yesus , na'uli' : " Pue' , ane ma'ala , paka'uri'-a-kuwo ! "
42005013	Yesus mpojama-i pai' na'uli'-ki : " Ma'ala moto . Kupaka'uri'-moko ! " Hampinisi mata , mo'uri'-imi .
42005014	Oti toe , Yesus mpotagi-i , na'uli' : " Neo' nulolita to jadi' tohe'i hi hema-hema . Hilou-moko ulu mpopehuwu woto-nu hi imam , bona nahilo kamo'uri'-numi , pai' keni pepue'-nu ntuku' parenta to na'uki' Musa , bona monoa' hi hawe'ea tauna kamo'uri'-nu mpu'u-mi . "
42005015	Ntaa' molele lau-midi kareba-na hiapa-apa-e , alaa-na mo'iko tauna mpotuku' Yesus doko' mpo'epe lolita-na pai' mpopepaka'uri' .
42005016	Tapi' Yesus biasa hilou hi kawaoa'-na pai' mosampaya .
42005017	Rala-na ha'eo nto'u Yesus metudui' , ria ba hangkuja dua to Parisi pai' guru agama mohura hi ree . Ria-ra ngkai ngata-ngata hi tana' Galilea , Yudea , pai' ngkai ngata Yerusalem wo'o . Baraka' ngkai Pue' Ala ria hi Yesus bona mepaka'uri' .
42005018	Nto'u toe , tumai-ra ba hangkuja tauna mpokowa' hadua topungku to turu hi rala pokowaa' . Rapali' ohea-ra mesua' hi tomi doko' mpokeni doo-ra hi Yesus .
42005019	Aga uma-ra teliu mesua' , apa' bihi' rahi tauna . Toe pai' ngkahe' tuka'-ramo mpokeni doo-ra hilou hi lolo tomi , rahungka' ata' pai' ra'ulu-i ntali pokowaa'-na hilou hi nyanyoa Yesus hi laintongo' ntodea .
42005020	Kanahilo-na Yesus kabohe pepangala'-ra , na'uli'-mi hi topungku toei : " Ompi' , te'ampungi-mi jeko'-nu . "
42005021	Mololita-ramo guru agama pai' to Parisi toera hi rala nono-ra , ra'uli' : " Hema rahi-idi tauna toei mai , pai' daho'-i mpo'uli' hibalia tuwu'-na hante Alata'ala-e ? Uma ria haduaa to ma'ala mpo'ampungi jeko' , muntu' Alata'ala-wadi . "
42005022	Na'inca moto Yesus napa to hi rala nono-ra . Toe pai' na'uli'-raka : " Napa pai' nipekiri hewa tetu-e ?
42005023	Aku' Ana' Manusia' , ria mpu'u kuasa-ku hi dunia' mpo'ampungi jeko' . Tapi' ane ku'uli'-ki topungku toei mai : ` Te'ampungi-mi jeko'-nu , ' uma ni'incai ba te'ampungi mpu'u-di jeko'-nae ba uma-di . Aga ane ku'uli' : ` Memata pai' mako'-moko , ' nihilo mpai' kadupa'-na ba ka'uma-na .
42005024	Jadi' , kupopohiloi-koi karia-na kuasa-ku mpo'ampungi jeko' . " Ngkai ree , kamewili'-na hi topungku toei , na'uli'-ki : " Ku'uli'-koko , memata-moko , ongko'-mi pokowaa'-nu , pai' nculii'-moko . "
42005025	Pemata-na mpu'u-mi topungku toei , rasabii' tauna to wori' , na'ongko' poturua-na , pai'-i nculii' hilou hi tomi-na . Pai' hi lengko ohea ntora mpo'une' Alata'ala-imi .
42005026	Konce lia hawe'ea tauna mpohilo tohe'e , pai'-ra mpo'une' Alata'ala . Hante mogalo me'eka' wo'o-ra , ra'uli' : " Uma mowo kajadia' to tahilo eo toe we'i lau ! "
42005027	Oti toe , malai-imi Yesus , pai' hi lengko ohea mpohilo-i hadua topesingara' paja' bula-na mohura hi kantoro'-na , hanga'-na Lewi . Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki : " Tuku'-ama . "
42005028	Pokore-nami mpalahii omea , pai'-i mpotuku' Yesus .
42005029	Lewi mpobabehi karamea bohe hi tomi-na , mpotorata Yesus . Wori' wo'o topesingara' paja' pai' tau ntani'-na rakio' ngkoni' dohe-ra .
42005030	Mpohilo toe , ba hangkuja dua pangkeni agama pai' guru agama to mpotuku' tudui' Parisi , ntora ngkunuti . Ra'uli' mpo'uli'-raka ana'guru-na Yesus : " Napa pai' ngkoni' pai' nginu-ko-koina hangkaa-ngkania hante topesingara' paja' pai' topojeko'-e ? "
42005031	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Tauna to uma peda' , uma mingki' rapokulii' . Tauna to peda'-wadi-hawo to paraluu rapokulii' .
42005032	Uma-a tumai mpokio'-ra to monoa' ingku-ra . Katumai-ku toi-le , mpokio' topojeko'-a bona medea-ra ngkai jeko'-ra . "
42005033	Nto'u toe , ria to mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Topetuku'-na Yohanes Topeniu' , jau-ra-hana mopuasa' pai' mosampaya . Wae wo'o topetuku'-ra to Parisi . Hiaa' topetuku'-nu Iko-kona , ngkoni' pai' nginu oa'-ra-wadi . Napa pai' uma-ra mopuasa'-e ? "
42005034	Yesus mpotompoi'-ra hante lolita rapa' toi , na'uli' : " Tauna hi posusaa' poncamokoa , ha mopuasa'-ra-rana bula-ra mpo'emai' topemua' ? Uma-hawo .
42005035	Tapi' rata mpai' tempo-na , topemua' ra'ala' ngkai laintongo'-ra . Nto'u toe-damo , pai' lako' mopuasa'-rada . "
42005036	Oti toe , Yesus mpo'uli' lolita rapa' toi , na'uli'-raka : " Uma ria tauna to mpotai' hanceu' pontaia' ngkai baju to bo'u pai' natelepei-ki baju to hae . Apa' ane wae , narenta lau-mi baju to bo'u . Pai' uma wo'o mpai' lompe' lence-na pontaia' to bo'u toe hi baju to hae .
42005037	Wae wo'o , uma ria tauna to mpotua anggur to bo'u hi rala pontu'ua to hae . Apa' ane dede'-i mpai' , mopengka lau-mi pontu'ua to hae toe , alaa-na mobowo anggur , pai' mpadaa' wo'o-mi pontu'ua-na .
42005038	Anggur to bo'u bate kana ra'ihii' hi pontu'ua to bo'u wo'o-wadi-hawo .
42005039	" Uma ria tauna to dota nginu anggur to bo'u ane oti-i-damo mpo'inu to hae . Apa' na'uli' mpai' : ` Anggur to hae to motomo' . ' "
42006001	Hangkani Yesus pai' ana'guru-na ntara rala bonea nto'u Eo Sabat , eo pepuea'-ra to Yahudi . Bula-ra mpotara bonea toe , ana'guru-na mpotepo' wua' gandum , raporo bona molepa' kuluma-na , pai' raru'a .
42006002	To Parisi to hi ree mpokamaro-ra , ra'uli' : " Napa pai' nitiboki atura agama-ta ? Mobago-dako-koina hi eo pepuea' ! "
42006003	Na'uli'-raka Yesus : " Ha uma ria nibasa napa to nababehi Magau' Daud pai' doo-doo-na owi nto'u-ra mo'oro'-e ?
42006004	Mesua'-i hi rala tomi pepuea' , pai' nakoni' roti to rapopepue' hi Alata'ala , pai' nabagi wo'o-raka doo-na . Ntuku' ada agama-ta , imam-wadi-hana to ma'ala mpokoni' roti toe . Aga nau' wae , gau'-na Daud toe uma-hawo naposala' . "
42006005	Ngkai ree , na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus : " Aku' Ana' Manusia' , ria kuasa-ku mpo'uli' napa to ma'ala rababehi hi eo pepuea' . "
42006006	Hangkani wo'o nto'u Eo Sabat , hilou-i metudui' hi tomi posampayaa . Hi tomi posampayaa toe , ria hadua tauna to mate pale ka'ana-na .
42006007	Ba hangkuja dua to Parisi pai' guru agama to hi ree mpolelemata-i Yesus , meka' ba mepaka'uri'-i mpai' hi Eo Sabat . Patuju-ra , mpali' kedo' bona rapakilu-i mobago hi Eo Sabat .
42006008	Aga na'inca moto Yesus anu hi nono-ra . Toe pai' na'uli' mpo'uli'-ki tauna to mate pale-na hamali toei : " Mai-moko mokore hi laintongo' rei ! " Hilou mpu'u-imi-hawo mokore hi ree .
42006009	Ngkai ree , na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Kupekune'-koi ulu . Ntuku' atura agama-ta , to'uma to ma'ala tababehi hi Eo Sabat : mpobabehi to lompe'-di ba to dada'a ? Mpotulungi doo ba mpatehi doo ? "
42006010	Mogolili Yesus mponaa-ra omea , pai' na'uli'-ki topeda' toei : " Tanoa pale-nu ! " Kanatanoa-na pale-na , mo'uri'-imi .
42006011	Ngkai ree , uma mowo karoe-ra guru agama pai' to Parisi . Toe pai' mohawa'-ramo mpali' reke-ra , ba rapopai-i Yesus .
42006012	Nto'u toe , Yesus hilou hi bulu'-na , pai' mosampaya-i hamengia hi Alata'ala .
42006013	Kabaja-na , nakio'-ramo topetuku'-na pai' napelihi hampulu' rodua ngkai laintongo'-ra . To hampulu' rodua toera , nahanga' suro-na .
42006014	Hanga'-ra : Simon ( Yesus mpohanga'-i Petrus ) ; pai' Andreas ompi'-na Simon ; Yakobus ; Yohanes ; Filipus ; Bartolomeus ; Matius ; Tomas ; Yakobus ana' Alfeus ; Simon to rahanga' to Zelot ; Yudas ana' Yakobus ; pai' Yudas Iskariot , to mpobalu' Yesus hi bali'-nae mpai' .
42006015	
42006016	
42006017	Oti toe , mana'u-imi Yesus ngkai lolo bulu' hante ana'guru-na , pai'-ra mento'o hi lempe-na . Hi ree , wori'-mi topetuku'-na mpopea-i , pai' wori' lia tauna morumpu . Tauna toera ngkai humalili' tana' Yudea , ngkai ngata Yerusalem pai' ngkai ngata Tirus pai' Sidon to hi wiwi' tahi' .
42006018	Patuju-ra tumai , doko' mpo'epe lolita Yesus pai' mpopepaka'uri' . To napesuai' seta tumai wo'o pai' napaka'uri'-ra .
42006019	Wori' tauna mpali' ohea doko' mpoganga Yesus , apa' ria baraka' to mehupa' ngkai woto-na to mpaka'uri'-ra omea .
42006020	Yesus mponaa topetuku'-na pai' na'uli'-raka : Morasi'-koi tokabu , apa' koi' to jadi' ntodea Alata'ala , pai' Hi'a jadi' Magau'-ni .
42006021	Morasi'-koi to mo'oro' tempo toi , apa' rabohui moto-koi mpai' . Morasi'-koi to geo' tempo toi , apa' goe' moto-koi mpai' .
42006022	" Morasi'-koi ane rapokahuku'-koi , rapopalai-koi , raruge' pai' rapomohoa hanga'-ni sabana petuku'-ni hi Aku' Ana' Manusia' .
42006023	Apa' wae wo'o gau' ntu'a-ra mpobalinai' nabi-nabi to owi . Jadi' , ane rapohewa toe-koi , mohajo-koi pai' pakagoe' moto nono-ni , apa' bohe mpai' rasi' to nirata hi rala suruga .
42006024	" Aga silaka-koi topo'ua' tempo toi , apa' mpolia' nirata-mi-koina kagoea'-ni .
42006025	Silaka-koi to bohu tempo toi , apa' mo'oro'-koi mpai' . Silaka-koi to goe' tempo toi , apa' susa' pai' geo'-koi mpai' .
42006026	Silaka-koi ane hawe'ea tauna mpo'une'-koi , apa' wae wo'o ntu'a-ra owi mpo'une' nabi-nabi to boa' .
42006027	" Aga hi koi' to mpo'epe lolita-ku wae-e lau , ohe'i hawa'-ku : Kana tapoka'ahi' bali'-ta , mo'ingku lompe' hi tauna to mpokahuku'-ta .
42006028	Gane'-ra to mpokamo-ta , posampayai-ra to dada'a hi kita' .
42006029	Ane ria tauna to mpohopo' kulimpi-ta hamali , neo' rapehawai . Tonu lau wo'o-ki to hamali . Ane ria to mpo'agoi-ta abe'-ta , wai' wo'o lau-i baju-ta .
42006030	Ane ria to mperapii'-ta , wai'-ra-rawo . Ane ria to mpo'agoi ba napa-napa rewa-ta , neo' raperapi' nculii' .
42006031	Napa po'ingku to tapokono rababehi doo hi kita' , toe wo'o to kana tababehi hi doo .
42006032	" Ane tapoka'ahi' muntu' tauna to mpoka'ahi'-ta-wadi , uma mpai' nagane'-ta Alata'ala . Bangku' tauna to dada'a gau'-ra , ma'ahi' moto-ra hi tauna to mpoka'ahi'-ra .
42006033	Ane lompe' po'ingku-ta muntu' hi tauna to lompe' po'ingku-ra hi kita' , uma mpai' nagane'-ta Alata'ala . Bangku' tauna to dada'a , bate lompe' po'ingku-ra hi tauna to lompe' po'ingku-ra hi hira' .
42006034	Ane kita' mpewai' doi-ta rahenta muntu' hi tauna to ta'inca bisa mpoponculi'-taka , uma mpai' nagane'-ta Alata'ala . Bangku' tauna to dada'a , dota wo'o-ra-rawo rapohentai doi hingka todada'a-ra , apa' ncarumaka-ra rapoponculi' moto-raka mpai' .
42006035	" Neo' hewa tetu ! Kana tapoka'ahi' bali'-ta , mo'ingku lompe' hi hira' . Wai'-ra hema to doko' mpohentai-ta , pai' neo' ncarumaka ponculia'-na . Ane wae po'ingku-ta , bohe mpai' rasi' to tarata hi eo mpeno , pai' tatuku'-mi po'ingku Pue' Ala to hi suruga . Apa' manara-i Pue' hi tauna to uma mpo'incai mpo'uli' tarima kasi pai' hi tauna to dada'a .
42006036	Kana ma'ahi'-ta , hewa kama'ahi'-na Pue' Ala Tuama-ta .
42006037	" Neo'-ta mpotudo' sala' doo , bona uma wo'o mpai' Pue' Ala mpotudo' sala'-ta . Neo' mpo'uli' tauna to masala' kana rahuku' , bona uma wo'o mpai' Pue' Ala mpohuku'-ta . Ampungi sala' doo , Pue' Ala wo'o mpai' mpo'ampungi sala'-ta .
42006038	Kana tawai' doo-ta , Pue' Ala wo'o mpowai'-ta . Nawai'-ta pewai' to lompe' lia , to oti-mi ralengo pai' ra'oo' , duu'-na moloju' . Apa' pohuka' to tapake' hi doo , tetu wo'o-hawo mpai' to rapopohuka'-taka . "
42006039	Pai' na'uli' wo'o Yesus lolita rapa' tohe'i : " Ane towero mpotete' hingka towero-na , bate moluli'-ra mpai' hi rala kinali .
42006040	Pai' uma ria ana' sikola to meliu karabila'-na ngkai guru-na . Ane hudu-miki posikola-na , pai' lako' hibalia-idi hante guru-na .
42006041	" Napa pai' mponaa-ta gege' hi mata doo , hiaa' wince' kaju to hi mata-ta moto uma ta'incai karia-na !
42006042	Beiwa-ta ma'ala mpo'uli'-ki doo : ` Ompi' , mai kulali gege'-nu , ' bo uma moto tahiloi wince' kaju to hi mata-ta . Neo' mpetolompei' kehi ! Kana talali ulu wince' kaju to hi mata-ta , bona monoto mata-ta mpolali gege' doo .
42006043	" Uma ria kaju to lompe' mowua' to dada'a . Wae wo'o uma ria kaju to dada'a mowua' to lompe' .
42006044	Butu nyala kaju ra'inca kalompe'-na hi powua'-na . Wua' ara uma rahopu' ngkai walaa to morui . Wua' anggur uma rahopu' ngkai jilata .
42006045	Wae wo'o manusia' . Tauna to lompe' , bate mpohowa' lolita to lompe'-ra , apa' lawi' nono-ra ihia' to lompe' . Tauna to dada'a , dada'a wo'o lolita-ra , apa' nono-ra ihia' to dada'a . Apa' napa ihi' nono-ta , toe wo'o-mi to howa' hi wiwi-ta .
42006046	" Napa pai' nikio'-a ` Pue' ! Pue' ! ' bo uma-di nituku' hawa'-kue !
42006047	Tauna to tumai hi Aku' mpo'epe pai' mpotuku' tudui'-ku , hira' hewa tauna hi rala lolita rapa' tohe'i :
42006048	Hadua tauna mpowangu tomi , nakae tana' napomonala pai' nahu'a parawatu to moroho . Rata uda bohe pai' ue mowo' mporumpa' tomi toe , aga uma-i molengo apa' moroho parawatu-na .
42006049	Aga tauna to mpo'epe lolita-ku pai' uma ratuku' , hira' hewa hadua tauna to mpowangu tomi hi lolo tana'-wadi hante uma ria parawatu-na . Rata ue mowo' mporumpa' tomi toe , kamodungka-nami , pai' gaga kagero-na . "
42007001	Kahudu-na Yesus mpotudui' ntodea hawe'ea toe , hilou-imi hi ngata Kapernaum .
42007002	Hi ngata toe , ria hadua tadulako tantara to Roma , ria-ki batua-na to napoka'ahi' lia . Batua-na toei peda' danca , neo' mate .
42007003	Kana'epe-na tadulako toei karia-na Yesus hi ngata-na , nahubui ba hangkuja dua pangkeni to Yahudi hilou mpopetulungi hi Yesus , bona tumai-i mpaka'uri' batua-na .
42007004	Karata-ra hi Yesus , merapi' mpu'u-ra , ra'uli' : " Tadulako toei ria , natao lia nutulungi ,
42007005	apa' napoka'ahi'-ta kita' to Yahudi , pai' ria-i mpowai'-kai doi mpowangu tomi posampayaa-kai . "
42007006	Ngkai ree , hilou mpu'u-imi Yesus dohe-ra . Kamohu'-na Yesus hi tomi-na , tadulako toei mpohubui wo'o-ramo ba hangkuja dua doo-na hilou mpohirua'-ki Yesus mpo'uli'-ki hewa toi : " Tuama , uma-ko mingki' tumai hi tomi-ku , apa' aku' toi bela-a to Yahudi , uma-a natao nupencuai' .
42007007	Toe pai' uma-a daho' tilou hi Iko Tuama , apa' uma-a natao mpohirua'-koko . Nau' lolita hamela-wadi nu'uli' , bate mo'uri'-i mpai' batua-ku .
42007008	Apa' aku' toi-e , pahawaa' wo'o-a-wadi-kuwo , pai' ria wo'o-ra-kuwo to kuhawai' . Ane rapa'-na ria hawa'-ku hi hadua tantara mpo'uli'-ki : ` Hilou-ko ! ' bate hilou-i . Ane mekio'-a hi tantara kahadua-na : ` Mai-ko ! ' bate tumai-i . Ane ku'uli'-raka batua-ku : ` Babehi toe ! ' bate rababehi . Wae wo'o-kowo Iko Tuama , napa to nu'uli' hi retu , bate madupa' hi rei . "
42007009	Konce-i Yesus mpo'epe lolita ngkai tadulako toei . Toe pai' me'ili'-imi hi ntodea to mpotuku'-i , pai' na'uli'-raka : " Uma mowo pepangala'-na tau toei ria ! Nau' hi to Yahudi muli Israel , ko'ia ria haduaa kurata to bohe pepangala'-na hewa tauna toei ria . "
42007010	Oti toe , nculii'-ramo suro toera hi tomi tadulako . Karata-ra hi ria , mpolia' mo'uri'-imi batua-na .
42007011	Uma mahae ngkai toe , hilou-imi Yesus hi ngata to rahanga' Nain , hante ana'guru-na pai' wori' tau ntani'-na dohe-ra .
42007012	Mohu'-ramo hi wobo' wuntu ngata , rahilo-rawo wori' tauna mehupa' ngkai rala ngata , mpokowa' tomate . Tomate toei , hadua kabilasa , ana' hadudua , tina-na balu-mi . Wori' pue' ngata mpodohei tina-na hilou hi daeo' .
42007013	Kanahilo-na Pue' Yesus tobine toei , metumu'-mi ahi'-na pai' na'uli'-ki : " Neo'-pi-hawo geo' ! "
42007014	Hilou-imi mpoganga pokowa' , mentoda'-ramo to mokowa' . Na'uli' Yesus : " Kabilasa ! Kuhubui-ko memata ! "
42007015	Kabilasa to mate toei we'i , kaliliu mohura-imi pai'-i mololita . Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki tina-na : " Oi-mi ana'-nu , totina . "
