42007016	Tauna to mpohilo kajadia' toe , me'eka' omea-ramo , pai'-ra mpobila' Alata'ala , ra'uli' : " Hadua nabi to mobaraka' mehuwu-mi hi laintongo'-ta ! Hompo mpu'u-imi Alata'ala tumai mpotulungi ntodea-na ! "
42007017	Kareba toe molele hobo' hi tana' Yudea pai' ntololikia-na .
42007018	Ana'guru-na Yohanes Topeniu' mpoparata-ki hawe'ea to nababehi Yesus toe . Toe pai' mpokio'-i rodua ana'guru-na ,
42007019	pai' nahubui-ra hilou hi Pue' Yesus , na'uli'-raka : " Hilou-mokoi hi Yesus pai' uli'-ki retu : ` Ba Iko-mi Magau' Topetolo' to najanci Alata'ala , ba ria-pidi to ntani'-na to kipopea ? ' "
42007020	Hilou mpu'u-ramo suro to rodua toera , pai' ra'uli'-ki Yesus : " Pai'-kai tumai Guru , nahubui-kai Yohanes mpekune'-ta , ba kita'-midi Magau' Topetolo' to najanci Pue' Ala , ba ria-pidi to ntani'-na to kipopea . "
42007021	Nto'u toe wo'o-hawo , Yesus mpaka'uri' wori' topeda' ngkai haki'-ra , napopalai anudaa' ngkai tauna to rahawi' , pai' napaka'uri' towero bona pehilo-ra .
42007022	Na'uli'-mi Yesus mpo'uli'-raka suro Yohanes toera hewa toi : " Nculii'-mokoi , uli'-ki Yohanes hi retu napa to nihilo pai' to ni'epe : towero pehilo-mi , tokejo momako' monoa'-mi , topohaki' poko' mo'uri' , towongo pe'epe , tomate kupotuwu' nculii' , pai' Kareba Lompe' kuparata-raka to mpe'ahii' tuwu'-ra .
42007023	Marasi'-ra tauna to uma morara' nono-ra hi Aku' . "
42007024	Palai-ra suro Yohanes toera , mololita-imi Yesus hi ntodea , mpotompo'wiwi Yohanes . Na'uli' : " Napa patuju-ni hilou mpohirua'-ki Yohanes Topeniu' hi tana' to wao' ? Ba doko'-koi mpohilo tauna to morara' nono-na , to hewa pimpi to molue nawui ngolu' hilou tumai ? Uma-hawoe' .
42007025	Jadi' , hilou doko' mpohilo napa-dikoie ? Ba doko' mpohilo tauna to ncola pohea-na ? Uma wo'o , apa' po'ohaa' tauna to ncola pohea-ra pai' to mo'ua' katuwu'-ra , hi tomi magau'-ra-wadi-hana .
42007026	Jadi' , hilou doko' mpohilo napa-dikoie ? Ba doko' mpohilo nabi-dikoi ? Ane tetu , makono lia . Apa' Yohanes tetui meliu ngkai nabi to ntani'-na .
42007027	Apa' hi'a tetu-mi to mporodo nono-ra ntodea mpotarima-a , hewa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' owi . Na'uli' Alata'ala : ` Hi'a toi-mi suro-ku , kuhubui-i meri'ulu ngkai Iko , bona mporodo ohea-nu . ' "
42007028	Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus : " Pe'epei lompe' : ngkai hawe'ea tauna to putu hi rala dunia' toi , uma ria haduaa to meliu kabohe tuwu'-na ngkai Yohanes . Aga ngkai wae lau , marasi' mpu'u-ra tauna to jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua'-na . Nau' to kedi' lia tuwu'-ra , meliu kamarasi'-ra ngkai Yohanes . "
42007029	Hawe'ea tauna , nte to mpesingarai' paja' , mpo'epe lolita Yesus toe mpotompo'wiwi Yohanes . Mpo'epe toe , ratarima-mi Lolita Alata'ala , apa' oti-ramo mpopeniu' hi Yohanes .
42007030	Hiaa' to Parisi pai' guru agama-rana , oja'-ra mpotarima patuju Alata'ala hi tuwu'-ra , bo oja'-ra mpopeniu' hi Yohanes .
42007031	Na'uli' wo'o Yesus : " Uma mowo tauna to tuwu' tempo toi ! Toi-mi lolita rapa'-ku to kurapai'-raka :
42007032	Hira' hewa ana' to mohura hi wiwi' karajaa , to ntora momekio' hi doo-ra , ra'uli' : ` Kibawai-koi molalowe , uma-koi dota goe' dohe-kai . Kibawai-koi motantangi' , uma wo'o-koi dota geo' dohe-kai . '
42007033	Batua-na : Yohanes Topeniu' uma nipokonoi , Aku' wo'o uma nipokonoi . Katumai-na Yohanes , mopuasa'-i pai' uma-i nginu to melanguhi . Nipoka'oja'-i , ni'uli' : ` Kahawia'-i-hanale ! ' Hiaa' katumai-ku Aku' Ana' Manusia' , nginu-a , ngkoni'-a . Nipoka'oja' wo'o-a-wadi , ni'uli' : ` Hilo-i ! Tojampa , topalangu-langu , bale-ra topesingara' paja' pai' doo-ra topojeko' ! '
42007034	
42007035	Aga nau' wae , ta'inca kamonoto-na patuju Alata'ala ane tanaa gau' hawe'ea topetuku'-na . "
42007036	Ria hadua to Parisi , hanga'-na Simon , mpohinta' Yesus ngkoni' hi tomi-na . Hilou mpu'u-imi Yesus hi tomi-na , mohura pai'-ra ngkoni' .
42007037	Hi rala ngata toe , ria hadua tobine topojeko' , uma tumotoa gau'-na . Kana'epe-na karia Yesus ngkoni' hi tomi to Parisi toei , tumai-i ngkeni hameha' butolo' ihia' lana honga .
42007038	Tumai-imi mpomohui' witi' Yesus , pai'-i geo' . Nasiii' witi'-na Yesus hante ue mata-na . Oti toe nabongka wuluwoo'-na , napomporihi-ki witi'-na , na'eki pai' natuai hante lana honga .
42007039	Nahilo to Parisi babehia tobine toei . Mololita bongo-imi hi rala nono-na , na'uli' : " Ane bongko nabi mpu'u-i tau toei , ke na'inca kahema-na tobine to mpoganga-i toe , ka'uma-na tumotoa gau'-na . "
42007040	Ngkai ree , na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki to Parisi toei : " Simon , ria to doko' ku'uli'-koko . " Na'uli' Simon : " Uli'-mile Guru . "
42007041	Na'uli' Yesus : " Ria rodua tauna to mo'inta hi tauna to ma'ala rapohentai doi . Hadua mpohenta lima atu doi pera' , to hadua lima mpulu'-wadi .
42007042	Ngkai ka'uma-napi rakulei' mpobayari inta-ra , na'uli'-mi tauna to rapohentai toei : ` Uma-pi mingki' nibayari inta-ni . ' Jadi' , hema ngkai hira' to rodua toera to meliu ahi'-ra hi popa'intaa-ra ? "
42007043	Natompoi' Simon : " Ba tauna to wori' inta-na tu ? " Na'uli' Yesus : " Makono tompoi'-nu . "
42007044	Oti toe , pai' me'ili'-imi hi tobine toei pai' na'uli'-ki Simon : " Ha nuhilo tobine toei-e ? Karata-ku hi tomi-nu we'i , uma nuporodo ue pobohoi' witi'-ku , ntuku' ada-ta hi torata . Hiaa' tobine toei , nabohoi'-hana witi'-ku hante ue mata-na pai' naporihi hante wuluwoo'-na .
42007045	Iko , uma-a nutabe hante pe'eki ntuku' ada-ta . Hiaa' tobine toei , uma nabahakai mpo'eki witi'-ku ngkai lomo'-ku rata duu' toe lau .
42007046	Iko , uma nulanai woo'-ku ntuku' ada-ta hi torata . Hiaa' tobine toei mpobowohi witi'-ku hante lana honga to masuli' oli-na .
42007047	Jadi' , bo ma'ahi' lia-ie , toe pai' monoa'-mi kata'inca-na , jeko'-na to wori' te'ampungi-mi . Aga tauna to hangkedi'-wadi te'ampungi jeko'-na , hangkedi' wo'o-wadi-hawo ahi'-na . "
42007048	Oti toe na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki tobine toei : " Te'ampungi-mi jeko'-nu . "
42007049	Mpo'epe toe , momepololitai-ramo tauna to mpohimpongkoni'-raka , ra'uli' : " Hema-idie tau tetui-e , pai' daho'-i mpo'ampungi jeko'-e ? "
42007050	Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus hi tobine toei : " Tebahaka-moko ngkai huku' jeko'-nu sabana pepangala'-nu hi Aku' . Hilou-moko hante kalompea' tuwu'-nu . "
42008001	Oti toe , Yesus mpodaoi' wori' ngata mpopalele Kareba Lompe' , na'uli' : " Neo' rata-mi tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia' . " Ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua mpodohei-i .
42008002	Ria wo'o ba hangkuja dua tobine to mpodohei-ra . Tobine toera , tobine to napaka'uri' Yesus ngkai haki'-ra ba ngkai anudaa' to mpohawi'-ra . To hadua , Maria to biasa-na rahanga' Magdalena . Ria-i hangkani Yesus mpopalai pitu anudaa' ngkai Maria toei .
42008003	To hadua wo'o , Yohana tobine-na Khuza , topohawa' hi rala tomi Magau' Herodes . Ria wo'o Susana , pai' wori'-pidi tobine ntani'-na . Tobine toera mpake' doi-ra moto mpotulungi Yesus pai' ana'guru-na .
42008004	Uma ria kaputua tauna ngkai ngata ntani'-na tumai hi Yesus . Wori'-mi tauna to morumpu , Yesus mpololitai-ra hante lolita rapa' toi , na'uli' :
42008005	" Ria hadua topohawu' hilou mohawu' . Rala mpohawu'-na toe , ria hawua'-na monawu' hi mata ohea , alaa-na rapopongko tauna pai' natilo' danci .
42008006	Ria wo'o to monawu' hi tana' to watua . Tuwu' moto hinawu' toe , aga kaliliu molaju apa' bangi tana'-na .
42008007	Ria wo'o to monawu' hi laintongo' rui . Tuwu' rui hangkaa-ngkania hante hinawu' , alaa-na rui mpo'upi' hinawu' duu'-na mate .
42008008	Ria wo'o hawua' to monawu' hi tana' to morudu' . Tuwu' hinawu' toe , morudu' lia , wua'-na ha'atu ngkani ngkai hinawu'-na . " Oti lolita rapa'-na toe , na'uli'-mi Yesus : " Hema-koi to tilingaa , pe'epei lompe' ! "
42008009	Ana'guru-na mpekune' Yesus ba napa-i batua lolita rapa' toe .
42008010	Na'uli' Yesus : " Owi , Alata'ala ko'ia mpopo'incai manusia' beiwa-i mpai' jadi' Magau' hi dunia' . Aga hewa toe lau , napopo'incai-mokoi tudui' toe . Aga ane ntodea-hana , kutudui'-ra hante lolita rapa' , bona madupa' lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpo'uli' : ` Pe'epe moto-ra , aga uma oa' ra'incai batua-na . Pehilo moto-ra , aga hewa to uma oa' monoto rahilo . '
42008011	" Tohe'i-mi batua lolita rapa'-ku we'i : Hawua' to rahawu' , tetu-mi Lolita Alata'ala .
42008012	Hawua' to monawu' hi mata ohea mpobatuai tauna to mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala , aga Magau' Anudaa' mpohilingai' nono-ra , alaa-na uma-ra mepangala' , pai' uma-ra tebahaka ngkai huku' jeko'-ra .
42008013	" Hawua' to monawu' hi watu mpobatuai tauna to mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala pai' ratarima hante goe' nono-ra . Mepangala' moto-ra , aga pepangala'-ra tetu uma moroho , hewa hinu'a to uma morali' . Toe pai' ane rata-damo pesori , mo'ungkere'-ramo , uma-rapa mepangala' .
42008014	" Hawua' to monawu' hi laintongo' rui mpobatuai tauna to mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala , aga ntora mpenonoi katuwu'-ra hi rala dunia' , doko' mo'ua' pai' doko' mporata kagoea' . Hawe'ea toe mposesei'-ra , alaa-na uma-ra kaliliu mpotuku' Lolita Alata'ala , pai' uma ria kalaua-na hi katuwu'-ra .
42008015	" Hawua' to monawu' hi tana' to morudu' mpobatuai tauna to mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala , pai' lolita toe rakakamu hante kanoa' pai' karoli' nono-ra . Ntaha-ra mpotuku' Lolita Alata'ala , duu'-na ria kalaua-na hi katuwu'-ra .
42008016	" Uma ria tauna to mposuwe palita pai' napopoi' ba natu'u hi une' poturua . Palita bate natu'u hi pontu'ua-na bona hini-na rahilo tauna to mesua' .
42008017	Apa' hawe'ea to tewuni kana rapopehuwu . Pai' hawe'ea to kalerua kana rahungke pai' jadi' kahiloa .
42008018	" Toe pai' ku'uli' , pelompehi-koie' beiwa-koi mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala . Apa' tauna to mpotarima Lolita Alata'ala , ranotohi nono-ra bona kawoo-woria' to ra'inca . Aga tauna to uma dota mpotarima Lolita Alata'ala , nau' ria hangkedi' to ra'inca , ra'alai' lau-ra . "
42008019	Hangkani , tina pai' ompi'-na Yesus tumai doko' mpohirua'-ki , aga uma-ra teliu apa' wori' rahi tauna .
42008020	Ria hadua to mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Guru , tina-nu pai' ompi'-nu , oe-ra ria hi mali-na , doko' mpohirua'-koko . "
42008021	Tapi' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Ane to kupotina pai' to kupo'ompi'-le , tauna to mpo'epe pai' mpotuku' Lolita Alata'ala . "
42008022	Rala-na ha'eo , Yesus hante ana'guru-na mohawi' sakaya . Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Hilou-tamo hi dipo rano . " Me'ongko'-ramo .
42008023	Bula-ra mosakaya , leta'-imi Yesus . Muu-mule' rata-mi ngolu' bohe hi rano mporumpa'-ra . Sakaya-ra napesua' ue , alaa-na neo' matala-ramo .
42008024	Ana'guru-na hilou hi Yesus mpolike-i , ra'uli' : " Guru ! Guru ! Mate-ta toi-e ! " Pemata-nami Yesus pai'-i mpotagi ngolu' pai' balumpa to mekoroi' toe . Mento'o-mi ngolu' , pai' rano molino nculii' . Rodo omea-mi .
42008025	Ngkai ree , na'uli'-mi Yesus hi ana'guru-na : " Napa pai' uma-a nipangala'-e ? " Konce pai' me'eka'-ramo , pai' momepololitai-ramo , ra'uli' : " Hema mpu'u-idi tau toii-e ? Bangku' ngolu' pai' balumpa nahawai' , ratuku' mpu'u-diki-hana hawa'-nae ! "
42008026	Kaliliu-ramo mosakaya , duu'-na rata hi tana' Gerasa to hi dipo rano ngkai tana' Galilea .
42008027	Ria hi ree hadua pue' ngata to rapesuai' seta to wori' . Mahae-imi tauna toei uma moheai pai' uma-i mo'oha' hi tomi . Hi daeo'-wadi po'ohaa'-na . Jau-i kahawia' . Nau' rahilu'-i hante koloro pai' rante pai' radongo ncuu , ma'ala oa' nadupe' pohilu'-na pai' metibo' hilou hi kawaoa'-na , apa' nakeni karoho seta to mpohawi'-i . Nto'u Yesus mehompo ngkai sakaya hilou hi role-na , tumai-imi tauna to kahawia' toei mpohirua'-ki . Kampohilo-na Yesus , pe'au-nami pai'-i mowingkotu' hi nyanyoa-na . Yesus mpohubui seta toera malai . Na'uli' tau toei mpesukui : " Ee Yesus , Ana' Alata'ala to hi suruga ! Napa-di-kona pai' tumai-koe ? Kuperapi' bona neo'-a-kuwo nusesa' ! "
42008028	
42008029	
42008030	Yesus mpekune'-i : " Hema hanga'-nu ? " Natompoi' : " Legion . " ( " Legion " tohe'e , batua-na " moncobu , " apa' wori' seta to mpohawi'-i . )
42008031	Raperapi' mpu'u seta toera bona neo'-ra nawuso hilou hi rala wulou'laa to uma tepetudu kanala-na .
42008032	Uma molaa ngkai ree , ria wori' wawu mojume hi panapa bulu' . Seta toera merapi' hi Yesus , ra'uli' : " Piliu-ka-kaiwo mesua' hi wawu toera mai . " Napiliu moto-ra .
42008033	Malai mpu'u-ramo seta ngkai rala tauna toei , kaliliu mesua' hi wawu . Pesua'-ra hi wawu toe , mparampuli-ramo-rawo wawu hilou mengkajuala' hi rano , mate bonga-ramo hi rala ue .
42008034	Karahilo-na to mpodoo wawu kajadia' toe , mokeno-ramo hilou hi ngata pai' bonea to mohu' mpoparata kajadia' toe .
42008035	Toe pai' tumai-ramo pue' ngata doko' mpohilo napa to jadi' . Karata-ra hi Yesus , rahilo-rawo tauna to biasa-na napesuai' seta , mohura rodo-imi hi ncori Yesus . Moheai-i pai' monoto-mi nono-na . Me'eka'-ramo .
42008036	Tauna to mpohilo kajadia' toe mpotutura beiwa Yesus mpaka'uri' tauna to kahawia' .
42008037	Ngkai ree , hawe'ea tauna hi tana' Gerasa toe merapi' hi Yesus bona malai-imi ngkai ngata-ra , apa' me'eka' lia-ra . Jadi' mohawi' sakaya-imi nculii' hilou hi dipo-na .
42008038	Ane tauna to napaka'uri' Yesus , merapi'-i bona ma'ala-i hilou dohe-na . Tapi' uma-i napiliu , na'uli'-ki :
42008039	" Nculii'-moko hilou hi tomi-nu pai' uli'-raka retu napa to nababehi Alata'ala hi iko . " Hilou mpu'u-imi mpopalele hi rala ngata napa to nababehi Yesus hi woto-na .
42008040	Karata-na Yesus nculii' hi dipo rano , goe'-ramo tauna to wori' mpotomu-i , apa' hawe'ea-ra ntora mpopea-i .
42008041	Nto'u toe , rata hadua pangkeni tomi posampayaa hi ngata toe , hanga'-na Yairus . Mowingkotu'-i hi nyanyoa Yesus , naperapi' bona hilou-i hi tomi-na .
42008042	Apa' ria ana'-na tobine hadudua-wadi , umuru-na hampulu' rompae , peda' neo' mate . Hilou mpu'u-i Yesus dohe-na . Bula-ra momako' hilou hi tomi-na Yairus , mome'upi'-damo tauna to wori' mpo'upi' Yesus .
42008043	Hi olo' ntodea , ria hadua tobine , hampulu' rompae-imi ntora moraa' , pai' uma ria katontoa'-na , nau' wori'-mi to mpokulii'-i .
42008044	Tumai-imi tobine toei mpomohui' Yesus ngkai tilingkuria-na pai' naganga wuntu baju-na . Hampinisi mata mentoda'-mi poraa'-na .
42008045	Mepekune'-imi Yesus : " Hema to mpoganga-ae ? " Mancapu omea-ra . Na'uli' Petrus : " Guru , apa' wori' rahi tauna mpotipuhi-ta , mome'iho'-ra-damo mpo'upi'-ko . "
42008046	Na'uli' Yesus : " Bate ria-di to mpoganga-ae ! Ku'inca-le , apa' ria kabaraka' to malai ngkai woto-ku . "
42008047	Na'inca tobine toei ka'uma-na tewunii' babehia-na . Jadi' moridi'-i tumai mowingkotu' hi nyanyoa Yesus . Napangaku' hi ntodea kahi'a-na to mpoganga baju Yesus pai' kamo'uri'-nami ngkai haki'-na .
42008048	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki : " Ana'-ku , mo'uri'-moko sabana pepangala'-nu hi Aku' . Nculii'-moko hante kalompea' tuwu'-nu . "
42008049	Bula-na Yesus mololita-pidi , rata-mi suro ngkai tomi Yairus to mpo'uli'-ki Yairus : " Mate-mi ana'-nu . Neo'-pi mposusai' Guru . "
42008050	Kana'epe-na Yesus lolita toe , na'uli' mpo'uli'-ki Yairus : " Neo' mere' nono-nu . Pangala'-mi-hana , mo'uri' moto-i mpai' ana'-nu . "
42008051	Karata-ra hi tomi Yairus , Yesus uma mpiliu kabua'-bua' tauna mesua' dohe-na . Muntu' Petrus , Yohanes , Yakobus hante tina pai' tuama ana' toei-wadi to ma'ala mesua' .
42008052	Hawe'ea tauna to morumpu hi tomi Yairus geo' pai' motantangi' , mpotantangii' ana' to mate toei . Na'uli' Yesus : " Neo'-pi-hawo geo' . Uma-ile mate-e , leta'-i-wadi-hawo . "
42008053	Mpo'epe toe , rapotawai-i-wadi , apa' ra'inca kamate-na mpu'u-mi .
42008054	Oti toe , Yesus mpokamu pale-na ana' toei pai' na'uli'-ki : " Memata-moko ana' ! "
42008055	Mo'inoha' nculii'-imi ana' toei , pai' kaliliu memata-imi . Na'uli' Yesus : " Wai'-i pongkoni' . "
42008056	Konce mpu'u-ramo totu'a-na . Aga Yesus mpotagi-ra , bona neo' ra'uli' hi hema-hema napa to jadi' toe .
42009001	Yesus mpokio' ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua morumpu , pai' nawai'-ra kuasa pai' kabaraka' mpopalai hawe'ea seta pai' mpaka'uri' topohaki' .
42009002	Napahawa'-ra hilou mpaka'uri' topeda' pai' mpopalele kareba-na : " Neo' rata-mi tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia' . "
42009003	Kako'ia-ra me'ongko' , na'uli'-raka : " Neo'-koi ngkeni napa-napa hi pomakoa'-ni . Neo' ngkeni boku ba pongkoni' ba doi . Neo' ngkeni rontonga' baju ba lua' .
42009004	Ane ratarima-koi hi rala tomi hantomi , mo'oha' hi ree-mokoi duu'-ni kaliliu hilou hi ngata ntani'-na .
42009005	Ane rata-koi hi ngata pai' uma-koi ratarima , wae kanipalahii-na ngata tetu , tonta awu to mentaka' hi palanta' witi'-ni , tanda kanahuku'-ra mpai' Alata'ala . "
42009006	Ka'oti-na Yesus mpotudui'-ra , me'ongko'-ramo hilou hi ngata-ngata . Hiapa pomakoa'-ra , mpokeni-ra Kareba Lompe' pai' mpaka'uri' topeda' .
42009007	Nto'u toe , topoparenta hi Galilea , Herodes Antipas . Kana'epe-na Herodes hawe'ea to nababehi Yesus toe , napoka'ingu' lau-mi . Apa' ria to mpo'uli' : " Yesus toei lou , Yohanes Topeniu' tuwu' nculii'-imi . "
42009008	Ria wo'o to mpo'uli' Yesus toei nabi Elia owi mehupa' nculii' . Ria wo'o to mpo'uli' Yesus toei hadua nabi to owi memata nculii' .
42009009	Na'uli' Herodes : " Ane Yohanes Topeniu' , kuhubui-mi wengi tauna mpopata' wuroko'-na . Hiaa' Yesus toe-e lou , hema mpu'u-i-hawo ? Wori'-mi ku'epe to mpotompo'wiwi-i . " Toe pai' Herodes doko' mpohirua'-ki Yesus .
42009010	Rata nculii'-ramo suro Yesus to hampulu' rodua toera , pai' ratutura-ki Yesus hawe'ea to rababehi . Oti toe , Yesus mpo'ema'-ra hilou hi kawaoa'-na mohu' hi ngata Betsaida .
42009011	Ntaa' ra'inca-di ntodea kahilou-rae . Toe pai' metuku'-ramo mpotuku' Yesus . Karata-ra hi Yesus , natarima moto-ra pai' natudui'-ra tudui' to mpotompo'wiwi Kamagaua'-na Alata'ala . Pai' hema-hema to mohaki' napaka'uri' .
42009012	Neo' limpa-mi eo , rata-ramo ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Guru , agina tahubui-ramo ntodea toera lau hilou mpali' pongkoni'-ra pai' poturua-ra hi ngata pai' bonea to mohu' . Apa' wao'-hana hi rehe'i lau . "
42009013	Na'uli' Yesus : " Koi'-mi to mpopokoni'-ra . " Ra'uli' ana'guru-na : " Beiwa-mi-kaina ! Apa' muntu' lima meha' roti pai' rongkaju bau' uru-wadi to ria hi kai'-e . Ha kana hilou-kai mpo'oli pongkoni' to rapokoni'-raka tauna to wori' toera lau ? "
42009014	( Kawori'-ra kira-kira lima ncobu paka' tomane-pidi . ) Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka ana'guru-na : " Hubui-ra mohura mopantuda-ntuda , nte lima mpulu' tauna hantuda . "
42009015	Ratuku'-mi ana'guru-na napa to nahubui-raka Yesus .
42009016	Mohura-ra omea , na'ala'-mi Yesus roti to lima meha' pai' uru to rongkaju , pai'-i ngkongoa' hi langi' mosampaya . Oti toe napihe-pihe-mi roti pai' nabibe'-bibe' bau' , pai' nawai'-raka ana'guru-na bona rabagi hi ntodea .
42009017	Ngkoni' omea-ramo duu'-ra bohu . Ka'oti-ra ngkoni' , ana'guru-na mporumpu toro koni' . Metoro-pi hampulu' roluncu .
42009018	Rala-na ha'eo , Yesus mosampaya hadudua-na , pai' rata ana'guru-na dohe-na . Napekune'-ra , na'uli' : " Ntuku' ponguli' ntodea , hema-a Aku' toi-e ? "
42009019	Ratompoi' : " Ria to mpo'uli' Yohanes Topeniu'-ko tuwu' nculii' . Aga ria wo'o to mpo'uli' nabi Elia-ko . Ria wo'o to mpo'uli' Iko hadua nabi to owi tuwu' nculii' . "
42009020	Napekune' tena-ra : " Hiaa' koi'-koiwo mpo'uli' , hema-a Aku' toi-e ? " Natompoi' Petrus : " Iko-mi Magau' Topetolo' to najanci Alata'ala ! "
42009021	Ngkai ree , Yesus mpotagi mpu'u-ra , na'uli' : " Neo' ulu ni'uli' hi hema-hema ka' Aku'-na Magau' Topetolo' . "
42009022	Na'uli' wo'o-mi : " Aku' Ana' Manusia' kana mporata wori' kaparia . Rasapuaka-a mpai' totu'a ngata , imam pangkeni hante guru agama . Rapatehi-a mpai' , aga hi eo katolu-na tuwu' nculii' moto-a . "
42009023	Ngkai ree , Yesus mpololitai hawe'ea tauna , na'uli' : " Hema to doko' mpotuku'-a kana mpobahaka konoa-na moto , pai' kana napaha'a kaju parika'-na butu eo-na -- batua-na : kana natuku' hawa'-ku nau' napopate-ki . Oti toe-di pai' lako' ma'ala-i mpotuku'-a .
42009024	Hema to mpentaei konoa-na moto , uma-i mpai' mporatai katuwua' to lompe' . Aga hema to mpobahaka konoa-na moto sabana petuku'-na hi Aku' , nau' napopate-ki , hi'a-mi mpai' to mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na .
42009025	Napa kalaua-na tarumpu hawe'ea ka'uaa' dunia' , tapi' kao'-ta moto morugi apa' uma taratai katuwua' to lompe' hi eo mpeno-na .
42009026	" Hema to me'ea' mpangaku' petuku'-na hi Aku' pai' mpoka'ea' tudui'-ku , Aku' wo'o mpai' me'ea' mpangaku' kahi'a-na topetuku'-ku ane rata-apa mpai' ngkai suruga . Nto'u toe mpai' , Aku' Ana' Manusia' mana'u tumai hante mala'eka-mala'eka to moroli' , mehini-a hante baraka'-ku pai' hante baraka'-na Tuama-ku .
42009027	Pe'epei to ku'uli'-kokoi tohe'i : ria-koi mpai' hi rehe'i to ko'ia mate kako'ia-na nihilo Alata'ala jadi' Magau' . "
42009028	Kira-kira hamingku ngkai pololita-na toe , Yesus mpobawai Petrus , Yohanes pai' Yakobus manake' hilou hi lolo bulu' , lou mosampaya .
42009029	Bula-na Yesus mosampaya , mobali'-mi lence-na , pai' pohea-na mewali mengea' meringkila' .
42009030	Muu-mule' ria rodua tauna to mpololitai-i , hira' nabi Musa pai' Elia .
42009031	Mehini pai' ncola wo'o-ra-rawo to rodua toera . Mololita-ra , mpotompo'wiwi kamate-na Yesus to napadupa' mpai' hi ngata Yerusalem .
42009032	Nto'u toe , Petrus pai' doo-na leta' luru' . Kamolike-ra , rahilo-rawo Yesus mehini ncola hante tauna to rodua to dohe-na .
42009033	Kaneo'-ra me'ongko'-mi to rodua toera , na'uli' Petrus : " Guru , lompe' lia-ta mo'oha' hi rehe'i ! Agina kibabehi-damo tolu bamaru' hi rehe'i . Hameha' bagia-nu Guru , hameha' bagia-na Musa , pai' hameha' wo'o bagia-na Elia . " ( Aga uma-hawo na'incai kahompoa lolita-na . )
42009034	Bula-na mololita-pidi Petrus , rata-mi limu' mpokamoui-ra . Me'eka'-ramo mpohilo limu' to mpoputu'-ra .
42009035	Mpo'epe-ra topololita ngkai rala limu' to mpo'uli' : " Hi'a toi-mi Ana'-ku to kupelihi . Pe'epei-mi lolita-na ! "
42009036	Kamolino-na topololita , rahilo-rawo ana'guru-na , hadudua-na Yesus-damo . Pana'u-ra ngkai bulu' toe , ana'guru-na to tolu toera mengkalino-wadi , uma-ra ulu mpololita hi hema-hema napa to rahilo hi lolo bulu' toe .
42009037	Kamepulo-na mana'u-ramo ngkai lolo bulu' , pai' wori' tauna mpohirua'-ki Yesus .
42009038	Ria hadua tomane hi laintongo' tauna to wori' to mekio' , na'uli' : " Guru ! Tulungi-a ! Pehiloi-ka-kuwo ana'-ku . Hadudua hi'a-wadi-ka-kuwo ana'-ku .
42009039	Ane napesuai' anudaa'-i , kaka'au-au-i pai' kakapadi-padi-i , duu'-na mowura' nganga-na . Neo' uma ria palaia-na anudaa' toe mpopedahi-i .
42009040	Kuperapi'-ramo ana'guru-nu mpopalai anudaa' toe , aga uma rakulei' . "
42009041	Na'uli' Yesus : " Uma mowo-koie' ! Ko'ia oa'-tano mepangala'-koie ! Mesapuaka oa'-pidi-koi mposapuaka konoa Alata'ala ! Ni'uli'-koina hangkuja tena-pi kahae-ku dohe-ni , hangkuja tena-pi kahae-na kupengkatarii kalente pepangala'-nie ! Keni tumai ana'-nu ! "
42009042	Bula-na ana' toei momako' hilou hi Yesus , modungka-imi napakeni seta to mpohawi'-i , pai' kakapadi-padi woto-na . Yesus mpopetibo' anudaa' , pai' mpaka'uri' ana' toei . Oti toe na'uli'-ki tuama-na : " Ala'-mi ana'-nu . Mo'uri'-imi . "
42009043	Konce omea-ramo tauna mpohilo baraka' Alata'ala to bohe tohe'e .
42009044	" Penonoi lompe'-e' lolita-ku toi : Aku' Ana' Manusia' bate ratonu mpai' hi kuasa manusia' . "
42009045	Aga ana'guru-na uma mpo'incai patuju-na , apa' tewunii'-raka batua-na , alaa-na uma rapaha . Hiaa' uma wo'o-ra daho' mpekune'-i ba napa batua lolita-na toe .
42009046	Ana'guru-na Yesus momehono' , ba hema-ra to meliu kabohe tuwu'-ra .
42009047	Na'inca Yesus napa to hi rala nono-ra . Toe pai' na'ala' hadua ana' to kedi' napopokore hi ncori-na ,
42009048	pai' na'uli'-raka : " Hema to mpotarima ana' to kedi' toi sabana petuku'-na hi Aku' , batua-na Aku'-mi to natarima . Pai' hema to mpotarima-a , mpotarima wo'o-imi Pue' Ala to mposuro-a . Hema-koi to tuwu' mengkadingki' , hi'a-mi to bohe mpu'u tuwu'-na . "
42009049	Na'uli' Yohanes : " Guru , ria kihilo hadua tauna mpopalai seta hante hanga'-nu , aga kitagi-i apa' bela-i topetuku'-ta . "
42009050	Na'uli' Yesus : " Neo'-i ratagi , apa' tauna to uma mpo'ewa-ta , batua-na hira'-mi to tono' hi kita' . "
42009051	Mohu'-mi tempo-na Yesus me'ongko' hilou hi suruga , napomonoa'-mi bate mpotoa'-i Yerusalem .
42009052	Nahubui ba hangkuja dua topetuku'-na meri'ulu ngkai Hi'a . Mesua'-ra to rahubui toera hi ngata to Samaria bona mporodo hawe'ea-na kako'ia-na Yesus rata .
42009053	Aga pue' ngata toera , oja'-ra mpotarima Yesus , apa' ra'inca kampotoa'-na Yerusalem .
42009054	Yakobus pai' Yohanes mpo'epe karapoka'oja'-ra pue' ngata toera . Toe pai' ra'uli'-ki Yesus : " Pue' , ane nupokono , kiperapi' apu ngkai langi' mpomampuhi pue' ngata toera lau ! "
42009055	Tapi' Yesus mpe'ili'-ra pai' mpotagi-ra .
42009056	Oti toe , kaliliu-ramo hilou hi ngata ntani'-na .
42009057	Hi pomakoa'-ra toe , ria hadua tauna to mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Hiapa kahiloua-nu Pue' , doko' kutuku'-ko . "
42009058	Yesus mpotompoi'-i , na'uli' : " Bangko' ria pulo'u-ra , pai' danci ria peta-ra , aga Aku' Ana' Manusia' uma-kuna ria tomi-ku kupoturui . "
42009059	Oti toe , pai' na'uli' Yesus hi kahadua-na : " Tuku'-a . " Aga natompoi' tau toei : " Pue' , piliu-a-kuwo ulu nculii' hi tomi-ku . Ane mate-damo tuama-ku pai'-i ratana , bo kutuku'-moko . "
42009060	Yesus mpotompoi'-i hante walatu toi , na'uli' : " Pelele' moto-ramo tomate mpotana hingka tomate-ra . Aga iko-kona , hilou-moko mpopalele kareba Kamagaua' Alata'ala . "
42009061	Ria wo'o kahadua-na mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Pue' , dota moto-a mpotuku'-ko . Aga piliu-a ulu nculii' mpalakana hi ompi'-ku . "
42009062	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki : " Tauna to ntepu'u-mi mopajeko' , uma-hawo lompe' ane kaka'ili'-ili'-i . Tauna to hewa toe kehi-ra , uma-ra natao jadi' topobago hi rala Kamagaua'-na Alata'ala . "
42010001	Oti toe , Pue' Yesus mpelihi wo'o-mi pitu mpulu' topetuku' to ntani'-na pai' nahubui-ra momako' rodua-rodua meri'ulu ngkai Hi'a hilou hi butu-butu ngata to natara mpai' .
42010002	Na'uli' mpo'uli'-raka : " Tauna to doko' mpo'epe Kareba Lompe' ma'ala rarapai'-ki pae to taha' . Wori' pae to kana rapepae , aga topepae uma-ra wori' . Toe pai' kana mekakae-koi hi pue' bonea , niperapi' bona nahubui tauna hilou mepae hi bonea-na .
42010003	" Hilou-mokoi , aga pelompehi , apa' kuhubui-koi hilou hi olo' tauna to dada'a . Koi' mpai' hewa bima hi olo' serigala .
42010004	Neo' ngkeni karepe' doi ba boku ba sapatu' ropasa . Neo' mengkahae mpololitai tauna hi lengko ohea .
42010005	" Ane mesua'-koi hi rala tomi hantomi , ncaliu ni'uli' : ` Kalompea' ngkai Pue' rata hi koi' pue' tomi ! '
42010006	Ane lompe' nono-ra pue' tomi mpotarima-koi , bate nagane' mpu'u-ra mpai' Pue' Ala . Aga ane uma-rada dota mpotarima-koi , uma-ra mpai' mporata rasi' ngkai pegane'-ni tetu .
42010007	Hantomi lau-wadi po'ohaa'-ni , neo'-koi pantoli-ntoli hi kahantomi-na bula-ni mpokeni Kareba Lompe' hi ngata tetu . Pongkoni' napa to rawai'-kokoi , koni'-mi-hana , apa' topobago masipato' mpotarima gaji'-na .
42010008	" Ane mesua'-koi hi rala ngata pai'-koi ratarima , koni'-mi-hana napa to ratonu-kokoi .
42010009	Paka'uri' topeda' to hi rala ngata , pai' uli'-raka pue' ngata : ` Rata-mi tempo-na , Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi laintongo'-ni . '
42010010	Aga ane mesua'-koi hi rala ngata pai' uma-koi ratarima , hilou-mokoi hi karajaa pai' mpo'uli' :
42010011	` Nau' awu ngata-ni to mentaka' hi palanta' witi'-kai , kitonta bona nihilo . Aga kiwoi-koie' : neo' rata-mi tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' ! ' "
42010012	Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus hi topetuku'-na : " Ku'uli'-kokoi , hi Eo Kiama , meliu pehuku'-na Alata'ala mpohuku' pue' ngata toera ngkai pehuku'-na hi pue' ngata Sodom owi .
42010013	" Silaka-koi to Yahudi to mo'oha' hi ngata Korazim pai' hi Betsaida ! Wori' moto-mi tanda mekoncehi kubabehi hi ngata-ni , aga uma oa'-koi medea ngkai jeko'-ni . Ane rapa'-na tanda mekoncehi toe rababehi hi rala ngata Tirus pai' Sidon , ke mahae-ramo-rana medea ngkai jeko'-ra , nau' bela-ra to Yahudi . Ke mpo'ala' karu'-ramo rapohea , pai' mohura-ra mpohawui' woto-ra hante awu , tanda kasoho' nono-ra .
42010014	Jadi' , hi Eo Kiama mpai' , meliu-pi pehuku'-na Alata'ala hi koi' ngkai pehuku'-na hi to Tirus pai' to Sidon .
42010015	" Pai' koi' wo'o to Kapernaum ! Ha ni'uli'-koina na'ongko' napomolangko-koi mpai' Alata'ala-e ? Uma-e' ! Natadi pai' nahuku' lau-dakoi mpai' . "
42010016	Oti toe , Yesus mololita tena hi topetuku'-na , na'uli' : " Tauna to mpotarima lolita-ni , batua-na lolita-ku Aku' to ratarima . Tauna to mposapuaka-koi , batua-na Aku' to rasapuaka . Pai' tauna to mposapuaka-a , mposapuaka wo'o-ra Pue' Ala to mposuro-a . "
42010017	Ba hangkuja kahae-na ngkai toe , nculii'-ramo topetuku' to pitu mpulu' toera . Goe' mpu'u-mi nono-ra , ra'uli'-ki Yesus : " Pue' , bangku' seta wo'o mengkoru hi kai' pai' metibo'-ra , ane kipopalai-ra hante hanga'-nu . "
42010018	Na'uli' Yesus : " Kuhilo-di Magau' Anudaa'-e monawu' ngkai langi' hewa kila' !
42010019	Jadi' , bona ni'inca : kuwai'-mokoi kuasa , bona ma'ala-koi mpolisa ule ba lipa pai' mpodagi hawe'ea karohoa bali'-ta . Uma hema to mposerohi-koi .
42010020	Aga nau' wae , neo' nipokagoe' kamengkoru-ra seta hi koi' . Agina mpokagoe'-koi kate'uki'-nami hanga'-ni hi rala suruga . "
42010021	Nto'u toe Yesus nakuasai Inoha' Tomoroli' , pai'-i mololita ngkai kagoe' nono-na , na'uli' : " O Mama , Pue' langi' pai' dunia' ! Mpo'uli'-a tarima kasi , apa' hawe'ea toe lau nupopohiloi-raka tauna to uma pe'incai , tapi' nuwunii'-raka tauna to nginca pai' tauna to pante . Apa' wae-mi konoa-nu Mama .
42010022	" Hawe'ea-na natonu-maka Tuama-ku . Uma ria haduaa to mpo'inca kahema-ku Aku' Ana' Alata'ala , muntu' Tuama-ku to mpo'inca-a . Wae wo'o uma ria to mpo'incai hema-i Tuama-ku , muntu' Aku' Ana'-na to mpo'inca-i , pai' hema-hema to kupopo'incai kahema-nai Tuama-ku . "
42010023	Ngkai ree , bona neo' ra'epe doo , me'ili'-imi hi ana'guru-na , na'uli'-raka : " Morasi' mpu'u-koi , apa' nihilo-mi-koina hawe'ea tohe'i .
42010024	Apa' wori' moto nabi pai' magau' owi to doko' mpohilo napa to nihilo koi' toi , aga uma-rana rahiloi . Doko' lia-ra mpo'epe napa to ni'epe-mi koi' , aga uma-rana ra'epei . "
42010025	Ria hadua guru agama Yahudi to doko' mpemai-mai kasala' petompoi' Yesus . Napekune'-i : " Guru , napa-hawo to kana kubabehi bona mporata-a katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na ? "
42010026	Na'uli' Yesus : " Napa to te'uki' hi rala Atura Pue' ? Beiwa to nubasa ? "
42010027	Natompoi' guru agama toei : ` Kana tapoka'ahi' Pue'-ta Pue' Alata'ala hante nono-ta mpu'u , tatonu hawe'ea katuwu'-ta hi Hi'a , tapoka'ahi'-i hudu pakulea'-ta , pai' hudu inca-ta . ' Pai' ` Kana tapoka'ahi' doo-ta hewa pompoka'ahi'-ta woto-ta moto . ' "
42010028	Na'uli' Yesus : " Kono-mi petompoi'-nu . Babehi-mi hewa tetu , mporata moto-ko mpai' katuwua' to lompe' . "
42010029	Aga guru agama toei uma dota radagi , mpoperaha-i kamonoa' po'ingku-na . Toe pai' na'uli' : " Hiaa' hema doo-ku to kana kupoka'ahi'-e ? "
42010030	Natompoi' Yesus : " Ria hadua tomane to mako' ngkai Yerusalem mana'u hilou hi ngata Yerikho . Hi lengko ohea-i mpohirua'-ki toperampaki . Ra'agoi-i rewa-na pai' pohea-na , pai'-i rapao' duu'-na neo' mate , pai' rapalahii moto-imi hi ohea .
42010031	Ko'ia mahae ngkai ree , ria wo'o-hawo hadua imam ntara hi ohea toe . Kanahilo-na tauna to weho toei , napelelii' pai' kaliliu moto-i .
42010032	Wae wo'o , hadua topobago hi Tomi Alata'ala liu hi ree . Kanahilo-na tauna to weho toei , napelelii' wo'o-i-wadi-hawo pai'-i kaliliu .
42010033	" Uma mahae ngkai ree , liu wo'o-hawo hadua to Samaria to bula-na hi pomakoa'-na . Kanahilo-na tauna to weho toei , metumu'-mi ahi'-na .
42010034	Kahilou-nami mpomohui'-i , nabohoi' weho-na hante lana pai' anggur pai' nawewe . Oti toe napopehawi'-i hi keledai-na pai' nakeni-i hilou hi tomi torata , pai' napodoo-i hi ree .
42010035	Kamepulo-na na'ala' rompepa' doi pera' , nawai'-ki pue' tomi pai' na'uli'-ki : ` Pewili'-i-hawo ulu tauna toei hi rehe'i . Nculii' moto-a mpai' pai' kubayari omea ongkoso'-nu ane ria pelabia-na ngkai tetu . ' "
42010036	Hudu-mi jarita-na toe , napekune' Yesus hi guru agama toei , na'uli' : " Ntuku' pomporataa-nu , ngkai to tolu toera , hema-ra to ma'ahi' hi doo to rarampaki toei ? "
42010037	Natompoi' guru agama toei : " Tauna to mpotulungi-i . " Na'uli' Yesus : " Koi'-moko , babehi wo'o-kowo hewa tetu . "
42010038	Rala pomakoa'-ra toe , Yesus pai' ana'guru-na mehani hi ngata . Hi rala ngata toe , ria hadua tobine to rahanga' Marta to mpotorata Yesus .
42010039	Ria wo'o ompi'-na Marta , tobine wo'o-wadi , hanga'-na Maria . Maria toei mohura mohu' hi witi'-na Yesus ntora mpe'epei lolita-na .
42010040	Hiaa' Marta-hana , sese'-i-damo mpo'urusi torata . Kahilou-nami Marta hi Yesus pai' na'uli'-ki : " Pue' , ha nupokono ompi'-ku tetui mpelele'-a mobago hadudua-ku ! Uli'-ki pe' mpongawa'-ae . "
42010041	Na'uli' Pue' Yesus : " Ee' Marta ! Sese' pai' kawuhe rahi-ko mpenonoi to wori' nyala .
42010042	Hiaa' kakono-na , to paraluu nubabehi hanyala lau-wadi , toe-mi mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala . Ane Maria , napelihi-mi bagia to lompe' , pai' bagia toe uma mpai' ra'alai' ngkai hi'a . "
42011001	Hangkani Yesus mosampaya . Kahudu-na mosampaya , hadua ana'guru-na mpo'uli'-ki : " Pue' , tudui' wo'o-ka-kaiwo mosampaya , hewa Yohanes Topeniu' mpotudui' ana'guru-na . "
42011002	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Ane mosampaya-koi , uli' hewa tohe'i : Mama , pomperapia'-kai bona hawe'ea tauna mpobila' hanga'-nu to moroli' , bona Iko jadi' Magau' hi dunia' .
42011003	Wai'-kai pongkoni' to kiparaluu eo-eo-na .
42011004	Ampungi jeko'-kai , apa' kai' wo'o mpo'ampungi hawe'ea tauna to masala' hi kai' . Pai' neo'-kai nupelele' rasori . "
42011005	Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus mpo'uli'-raka ana'guru-na : " Rapa'-na hilou-ta hi doo-ta mentongo' bengi pai' ta'uli'-ki : ` Bale , wai'-a-kuwo pongkoni' tolu mputu' .
42011006	Apa' ria bale-ku to lako' rata , hiaa' uma-kuna ria napa-napa to kuwai'-ki . '
42011007	" Ha natompoi'-ta mpai' hewa tohe'i : ` Neo'-a nusaleroi . Wobo' tehohoki-mi . Ana'-ku leta' omea-ramo dohe-ku . Uma-a bisa memata mpowai'-ko ba napa-napa . '
42011008	Uma mpai' hewa toe tompoi'-na . Nau' bale-ta uma dota memata pai' mpowai'-ta napa-napa , aga apa' uma tabahakai pai' uma-ta me'ea' mperapii'-i , memata oa'-i mpowai'-ta napa to taparaluu .
42011009	" Jadi' ku'uli'-kokoi : Perapi'-mi hi Alata'ala , nawai' moto-ta mpai' . Pali' kaparaluua-ta hi Alata'ala , tarata moto mpai' . Neo' tabahakai mpopebea wobo' , Alata'ala mpobea moto-taka mpai' wobo'-na .
42011010	Apa' hema to merapi' bate rawai' . Hema to mpali' bate mporata . Hema to mpopebea wobo' , bate rabea-ki wobo' .
42011011	Ha ria-koi to mpowai' ule hi ana'-ni ane merapi'-i bau' ?
42011012	Ba mpowai'-i pehede' ane merapi'-i ntolumanu' ? Tantu uma .
42011013	Nau' hewa apa-mi kadada'a-nie , ni'inca moto mpowai' to lompe' hi ana'-ni . Peliu-liu-nami Tuama-ni to ria hi rala suruga ! Bate nawai' Inoha' Tomoroli' hi tauna to merapi' hi Hi'a . "
42011014	Rala-na ha'eo , Yesus mpopalai seta ngkai hadua tauna to uma howa' mololita . Wae kanawuso-na seta toe , howa'-imi tauna toei mololita . Konce-ramo ntodea .
42011015	Aga ria wo'o-ra to mpo'uli' : " Kuasa-na tetu-le ngkai Beelzebul , magau' hawe'ea seta . Toe-hawo pai' ria baraka'-na mpopalai seta-e . "
42011016	Ria wo'o-ra hantongo' to doko' mposori Yesus . Merapi'-ra hi Yesus bona napopohiloi-ra anu mekoncehi bona monoa' ra'inca kangkai Alata'ala-na mpu'u-i .
42011017	Ntaa' na'inca-di Yesus napa to hi rala nono-rae . Toe pai' na'uli'-raka : " Ane rapa'-na ria hadua magau' , pai' ntodea hi rala kamagaua'-na ntora mome'ewa , bate mogero mpai' kamagaua'-na toe . Wae wo'o tau hantomi to ntora motuda' , bate pagaa'-gaa'-ra mpai' .
42011018	Wae wo'o hi kamagaua'-na seta . Ane seta mpo'ewa hingka seta-na , bate mogero mpai' kamagaua'-na seta . Hiaa' ni'uli'-koina , mpopalai-a seta hante baraka' Beelzebul , magau' seta .
42011019	Aga ria wo'o doo-ni moto to mpopalai seta . Hante kuasa napa doo-ni tetu mpopalai seta ? Tantu hante kuasa Alata'ala . Jadi' , ngkai pobabehi doo-ni moto , monoto-mi kamasala' pebalihi-ni tetu .
42011020	Tapi' Aku' , mpopalai-a seta hante baraka' Alata'ala . Ngkai toe , monoa'-mi ni'inca karata-nami tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi laintongo'-ni .
42011021	" Seta ma'ala rarapai'-ki tauna to parimuku . Ane tauna to parimuku mpodongo tomi-na hante rewa panga'e-na , uma moapa ihi' tomi-na .
42011022	Aga ane tumai hadua to meliu karoho-na mpo'ewa-i pai' mpodagi-i , nahagoi-i hawe'ea rewa panga'e-na to nasarumaka pai' nabagi-bagi ihi' tomi-na hi doo-doo-na . Jadi' , ane Aku' mpopalai seta , batua-na meliu kuasa-ku ngkai seta .
42011023	" Hema to uma tono' hi Aku' , kakono-na bali'-ku-imi . Hema to uma mpotulungi-a mobago , hi'a to mpobalinai' bago-ku .
42011024	" Rapa'-na ria anudaa' to mpohawi' tauna . Malai-imi anudaa' toei , pai'-i modao'-dao' hi kawaoa'-na mpali' po'ohaa'-na . Apa' uma ria naruai' , na'uli'-mi : ` Agina nculii' lau-ama hi po'ohaa' to kupalahii-mi toe wengi ria . '
42011025	Ponculi'-na hilou hi tauna to napalahii-e wengi , nahilo-hawo uma ria to mpo'ohai'-i . Tauna toei hewa tomi to molela' tepehaii , hinapa' hiloa-na .
42011026	Toe pai' hilou ncala'-i mpokio' pitu hingka anudaa'-na to meliu kadada'a-ra ngkai hi'a . Tumai-ramo mesua' hi tauna to napalahii toe-e wengi , pai' mo'oha'-ramo hi ree . Ka'omea-na tampai kampe'ahii' tauna toei ngkai lomo'-na . "
42011027	Bula-na Yesus mololita , hadua tobine hi laintongo' ntodea mpo'uli' mpesukui : " Morasi' mpu'u-i-hana tobine to mpo'ote pai' to mpentii'-ko ! "
42011028	Na'uli' Yesus : " Aga to morasi' mpu'u-le , tauna to mpo'epe pai' mpotuku' Lolita Alata'ala . "
42011029	Nto'u tauna to wori' mpotipuhi Yesus , napokaliliu lolita-na , na'uli' : " Dada'a lia tauna to tuwu' tempo toi . Merapi'-ra bona kupopohiloi-ra tanda mekoncehi . Aga uma hanyalaa tanda mekoncehi to rapopohiloi-raka . Sampale to rapopohiloi-raka mpai' , tanda hewa to jadi' hi nabi Yunus owi .
42011030	Hewa Yunus jadi' tanda to rapokakonce pue' ngata Niniwe owi , wae wo'o Aku' Ana' Manusia' jadi' tanda to rapokakonce tauna to tuwu' tempo toi .
42011031	Hi Eo Kiama mpai' , raja bine ngkai Selatan rapotuwu' nculii' hangkaa-ngkania hante koi' to tuwu' tempo toi , pai'-i mpotudo' sala'-ni . Apa' momako'-i tumai ngkai ngata to molaa lia , doko' mpu'u-i mpo'epe lolita Magau' Salomo to pante lia . Hiaa' ria-mi hi laintongo'-ni to meliu kabohe tuwu'-na ngkai Salomo , aga uma oa' nipangalai' lolita-na .
42011032	Wae wo'o hi Eo Kiama mpai' , pue' ngata Niniwe rapotuwu' nculii' hangkaa-ngkania hante koi' to tuwu' tempo toi , pai'-ra mpotudo' sala'-ni . Apa' hira' , medea-ramo-rana ngkai jeko'-ra kampo'epe-ra pololita nabi Yunus . Hiaa' ria-mi hi laintongo'-ni to meliu kabohe tuwu'-na ngkai Yunus , aga uma oa' nipangalai' lolita-na .
42011033	" Uma ria tauna mposuwe palita pai' nawuni ba napopoi' hante kura . Palita bate ratu'u hi pontu'ua-na bona hini-na rahilo tauna to mesua' .
42011034	Mata-ta ma'ala rarapai'-ki hulu' . Ane lompe' mata-ta , monoto pehilo-ta . Aga ane mogawu mata-ta , hewa mobengi pehilo-ta .
42011035	Wae wo'o-hawo hante nono-ta . Kana tapelompehi mpu'u : ane Pue' mpobajahi nono-ta , neo' tapomobengi nculii' .
42011036	Ane Pue' mpobajahi nono-ta duu'-na uma-pi ria kabengia-na , mobaja mpu'u katuwu'-ta omea , hewa tomi to nabajahi palita . "
42011037	Hudu-mi Yesus mololita , ria hadua to Parisi mpokio'-i lou ngkoni' hi tomi-na . Hilou mpu'u-imi ngkoni' .
42011038	Konce to Parisi toei mpohilo Yesus ngkoni' , apa' uma-i leba' mowano ntuku' ada agama-ra .
42011039	Toe pai' Pue' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki : " Koi' to Parisi-le hewa tauna to mpobohoi' sangkiri' pai' piri hi mali-na-wadi , hiaa' hi rala-na babo' moto . Ada agama to kahiloa hi mali-na nituku' lia , hiaa' hi rala nono-ni , dada'a-koi pai' mpokahina anu doo-koi .
42011040	Wojo mpu'u-koi ! Ha woto-ta-wadi to napajadi' Pue' ? Ha uma napajadi' wo'o nono-ta ?
42011041	Napa to hi rala sangkiri' pai' piri-ni wai'-raka to mpe'ahii' tuwu'-ra . Ane hewa toe-mi po'ingku-ni , hawe'ea jadi' moroli' hi koi' .
42011042	" Silaka-koi to Parisi ! Ntahawe' hinu'a to kedi' hewa tarangkada' pai' kula' pai' hinu'a ntani'-na nipopepue' hampobagiahampulu' hi Alata'ala . Hiaa' parenta to bohe , hewa po'ingku to monoa' hi doo-ni pai' ahi' hi Pue' Ala , uma nisaile' . Kakoo-kono-na , ke parenta to bohe toe-hanale to kana nituku'-e , pai' neo' wo'o nilipo' mpotuku' parenta to kedi' .
42011043	" Silaka-koi to Parisi ! Apa' goe'-koi mohura hi pohuraa karabilaa' hi tomi posampayaa , pai' goe'-koi ane tauna hi wiwi' karajaa motingkua' mpotabe-koi .
42011044	Silaka-koi , apa' koi' hewa daeo' to uma ka'incanaa , to uma ria pompetonoi-na . Tauna mpolisa daeo' toe , aga uma ra'incai karia-na anu pope hi rala-na . Lompe'-koi hi mali-na , tapi' dada'a hi rala nono-ni . "
42011045	Hadua guru agama Yahudi mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Guru , hante lolita-nu tetu , kai' wo'o to nusalai' ! "
42011046	Mehono' Yesus : " Silaka wo'o-dakoi guru agama ! Apa' nipopokoloi ntodea hante parenta pai' ada to motomo . Hiaa' uma-koi dota mpotulungi-ra ngkolo kinolo toe . Nau' hangkaju karawe-ni uma nihuko-raka .
42011047	Silaka-koi ! Nipenasa-damo mpakalompe' daeo'-ra nabi to owi , hiaa' ntu'a-ni moto-mi to mpatehi nabi toera .
42011048	Hante pobabehi-ni tetu , nipangaku' moto-mi kanipokono-na kehi ntu'a-ni tetu . Hira' mpatehi nabi to owi , pai' koi' mpakalompe' daeo'-ra .
42011049	Aga monoto lia patuju-na Alata'ala , na'uli' hewa toi : ` Kupahawa' mpai' nabi-ku pai' suro-ku hilou hi tauna toera . Hantongo'-ra mpai' rapatehi , hantongo'-ra rasesa' . '
42011050	Ka'omea-na mpai' , koi' to tuwu' tempo toi rahuku' sabana hawe'ea nabi to rapatehi ngkai lomo' kajadi' dunia' ,
42011051	ntepu'u ngkai karapatehi-na Habel owi , rata-rata hi karapatehi-na nabi Zakharia , to rapatehi hi berewe Tomi Alata'ala hi olo' meja' pontunua pepue' pai' tomi to moroli' . Wae mpu'u-di ! Koi' to tuwu' tempo toi bate rahuku' sabana hawe'ea kasalaa' totu'a-ni toe .
42011052	" Silaka-koi guru agama ! Kakoo-kono-na , ke koi'-di to mpotudui' ntodea ohea bona mpo'inca Alata'ala . Ntaa' koi' moto uma dota mpotuku' ohea toe , pai' nilawa' lau wo'o-di tauna to doko' mpotuku'-e . "
42011053	Malai-imi Yesus ngkai ree . Pai' ntepu'u tempo toe , gigi mpu'u-mi nono-ra guru agama pai' to Parisi . Toe pai' rapemai-mai-i hante wori' nyala pompekunea'-ra ,
42011054	pai' ralelemata ncuu-i , mpali' kasalaa' hi pololita-na .
42012001	Ngkai kamoncobu-ncobu-ra tauna to morumpu doko' mpohilo Yesus , mome'upi'-ra alaa-na momepopongko ngkawiti' . Nto'u toe , Yesus mpololitai ana'guru-na , na'uli' : " Mo'inga'-inga'-koi hi ragi-ra to Parisi . Batua-na , neo' nituku' kehi-ra . Apa' hira' toe lompe' hi mali-na-wadi dada'a moto hi rala nono-ra .
42012002	Tapi' hawe'ea kehi-ra to tewunii' bate kahiloa mpai' . Pai' hawe'ea to hi rala nono-ra bate telohu mpai' .
42012003	Jadi' , napa to ni'uli' hi bengi-na bate ralohu hi eo-na . Pai' napa to niwara'-ki doo hi rala tomi to tehohoki , bate ratolele hobo' hi rala ngata .
42012004	" Ompi'-ompi' , pe'epei lompe' lolita-ku : neo'-koi mpoka'eka' manusia' to doko' mpopatehi-koi , apa' hudu ree-wadi pakulea'-ra .
42012005	Sampale-di to kana nipoka'eka' , Alata'ala . Apa' mokuasa-i mpatehi-koi , pai' mokuasa wo'o-i mpotadi-koi hi rala naraka . Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi , Hi'a-mi to kana nipoka'eka' .
42012006	" Lima ma'a rone biasa-na rapobalu' nte rompepa' doi see-wadi . Aga nau' wae , uma ria hama'aa to uma nakiwoi Pue' Ala .
42012007	Peliu-liu-nami koi' . Bangku' kawori' wuluwoo'-ni nabila' pai' na'inca omea . Jadi' neo'-koi me'eka' . Meliu-pi pompewili'-na Alata'ala hi koi' ngkai pompewili'-na rone to wori' .
42012008	" Pe'epei lompe' lolita-ku : hema to mpangaku' hi doo kahi'a-na topetuku'-ku , hi'a wo'o mpai' kupangaku' hi nyanyoa hawe'ea mala'eka Alata'ala , ku'uli' : ` Tau toei topetuku'-ku . '
42012009	Aga hema to mposapu-a hi doo , hi'a wo'o mpai' kusapu hi nyanyoa mala'eka Alata'ala , ku'uli' : ` Bela-i topetuku'-ku . '
42012010	" Tauna to ncapuaka-a , Aku' Ana' Manusia' , ma'ala-pidi te'ampungi sala'-na . Aga tauna to mporuge' Inoha' Tomoroli' , uma-pi ma'ala ampungia sala'-na .
42012011	" Ane rakeni-koi hi tomi posampayaa pai' rapakilu-koi hi topohura agama ba topoparenta sabana petuku'-ni hi Aku' , neo'-koi me'eka' ba beiwa mpai' tompoi'-ni ba napa mpai' to kana ni'uli' .
42012012	Apa' hinto'u toe mpai' , Inoha' Tomoroli' moto mpotudui'-koi napa to kana ni'uli' . "
42012013	Ria hadua ngkai laintongo' ntodea mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Guru , uli'-ki ompi'-ku bona nawai'-a-kuwo bagia-ku ngkai sosora totu'a-kai . "
42012014	Na'uli' Yesus : " Ompi' , hema to mpo'ongko'-a jadi' topohura to mpobagi-kokoi sosora totu'a-ni ? "
42012015	Oti toe na'uli'-raka tauna to wori' : " Mo'inga'-inga'-koi pai' pelompehi , bona neo'-koi mpokahina ba apa-apa rewa dunia' . Apa' nau' wori' rewa-ta , uma ngkai rewa toe pai' lompe' tuwu'-ta . "
42012016	Ngkai ree , Yesus mpololitai-ra hante hanyala lolita rapa' , na'uli' : " Ria hadua topo'ua' to tebua' lompe'-ki polia'-na .
42012017	Na'uli'-mi hi rala nono-na : ` Napa-le' to kubabehi-e ? Uma-pi liu poropo'-ku kupontimamahii wua' polia'-ku .
42012018	Aa , kurata reke ! Kukero lau-di poropo'-ku , pai' kuwangu to meliu kabohe-na , bona hi retu-mi mpai' pontimamahia hawe'ea pae-ku pai' rewa-ku .
42012019	Oti toe mpai' , uma-apa mobago , apa' wori'-mi timamahia-ku , hono' nte ba hangkuja mpae kupake' . Wae-pi , ntora-ama , ngkoni' , nginu , pai' ntora goe'-a-damo ! '
42012020	" Ntaa' we'i Alata'ala mpo'uli'-ki tauna toei : ` He towojo ! Bengi toe mpai' lau , ra'alai'-moko inoha'-nu . Jadi' , hawe'ea to nurumpu tetu , hema-mi mpai' pue'-na ? '
42012021	" Wae-mi katuwu' tauna to doko' mporumpu ka'uaa' hi dunia' , tapi' mpe'ahii' tuwu'-ra hi poncilo Alata'ala . "
42012022	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka ana'guru-na : " Toe pai' ku'uli'-kokoi , neo'-koi sese' mpopekiri tuwu'-ni . Neo' ni'uli' : ` Napa-le' to takoni'-e ? Napa-le' to tapohea-e ? '
42012023	Apa' katuwu'-ni meliu ngkai pongkoni' pai' pohea .
42012024	Penonoi-dile danci kaa'-e . Uma-ra molia' , uma-ra mepae , uma ria poropo'-ra ba wilulu-ra . Aga nau' wae , Alata'ala mpowai' moto-ra pongkoni' . Peliu-liu-nami koi' , apa' hi poncilo Alata'ala meliu tuwu'-ni ngkai katuwu' danci , pai' meliu pompewili'-na hi koi' ngkai pompewili'-na hi danci .
42012025	Napa wo'o kalaua-na wori' rahi pekiri-ni ? Apa' nau' sese' ncuu-ta mpopekiri , uma-ta bisa mpodonihii umuru-ta nau' kampa' hamengi .
42012026	Jadi' , ane to kedi' toe uma nipakulei' mpobabehi , napa pai' wori' rahi pekiri-ni ?
42012027	Penonoi-dile katuwu' wunga-e . Uma-ra mobago , uma-ra mpobabehi pohea-ra . Tapi' ku'uli'-kokoi , bangku' Magau' Salomo-hawoe' hante hawe'ea ka'uaa'-na , pohea-na uma hewa kancola wunga toera lau .
42012028	Kowo' hi papada tuwu' eo toe lau , mepulo rasuwe oti . Aga nau' wae , Alata'ala mpakancola moto kowo' toe . Peliu-liu-nami koi' ! Meliu pompewili' Alata'ala hi koi' . Jadi' , napa pai' uma nipangala' pompewili'-nae ?
42012029	Jadi' neo'-koi sese' rahi mpenonoi napa to nikoni' ba napa to ni'inu . Neo'-koi me'eka' .
42012030	Hawe'ea tetu lau to ntora rapali' tauna to uma mpo'incai Alata'ala . Hiaa' Tuama-ni hi suruga mpo'inca kaparaluua-ni .
42012031	Kana mengkoru-ta hi Alata'ala bona Hi'a jadi' Magau'-ta . Ane toe tababehi , to ntani'-ntani'-na nawai' moto-ta mpai' .
42012032	" Koi' to mpotuku'-a , uma-koi hangkuja-na . Aga nau' wae , neo'-koi me'eka' . Apa' Alata'ala Tuama-ni mpopelihi-mokoi ngkai kabula rala-na , napajadi'-koi ntodea-na hi rala Kamagaua'-na .
42012033	Toe pai' ku'uli' , pobalu'-mi rewa-ni , pai' oli-na wai'-raka tokabu . Babehi-mokoi karepe' to uma bisa moheu' . Batua-na , babehi kehi to lompe' . Apa' kehi to lompe' toe ma'ala rarapai'-ki rewa to nitimamahi hi suruga , to uma ria karontoa-na , apa' uma ria to mpanako pai' uma ria anutuwu' to mposerohi .
42012034	Apa' hiapa pontimamahia rewa-ta , retu wo'o nono-ta .
42012035	" Neo'-koi lempe' , mo'inga'-inga' oa'-koi mpopea karata-ku . Agina-koi hewa batua to mpopea karata-na maradika-ra ngkai posusaa' poncamokoa . Batua toera , sadia-mi pohea-ra , pai' palita-ra rapobaa ncuu , bona ane rata-ipi mpai' maradika-ra pai'-i mpopebea wobo' , kaliliu rabea-ki .
42012036	
42012037	Morasi' batua to narata maradika-ra bula-ra mojaga pai' mpopea karata-na . Apa' maradika toei mpai' mpehoo' abe' hi hope'-na , napopohura-ra pai' natonui-ra .
42012038	Morasi' mpu'u-ra batua to narata maradika-ra rodo moto-ra mpopea-i , nau' mentongo' bengi ba paia-na liu mentongo' bengi .
42012039	" Poinono lolita rapa'-ku toi : Ane na'inca ami'-mi pue' tomi jaa hangkuja topanako rata , bate mojaga-i bona neo'-ra mesua' .
42012040	Hewa toe wo'o kana rodo ami'-mokoi mpopea-a , apa' uma ni'incai tempo karata-ku Aku' Ana' Manusia' . "
42012041	Napekune' Petrus hi Yesus : " Pue' , ba hi kai'-wadi lolita rapa' tetu-e , ba hi ntodea wo'o-di ? "
42012042	Na'uli' Pue' : " Rapa'-na ria hadua batua to monoto nono-na pai' to tida mpobago bago maradika-na . Batua toei na'ongko' maradika-na jadi' topohawa' to mpohawai' batua ntani'-na pai' mpobagi-raka pongkoni'-ra butu eo-na .
42012043	Uma mowo kamorasi'-na ane maradika-na rata nculii' ngkai pomakoa'-na pai' mporata-i bula-na mpobago bago-na .
42012044	Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi , maradika-na mpo'ongko'-i pai' mpowai'-i kuasa mpewili' hawe'ea ka'uaa'-na .
42012045	Aga silaka mpai' batua to mpo'uli' : ` Uma-ile sohi' rata maradika-e . ' Natepu'u-mi mpoweba' hingka batua-na ba tobine ba tomane , pai'-i ntora ngkoni' pai' nginu duu'-na palangu-langu .
42012046	Ntaa' we'i , bula-na lempe' moto hewa toe , muu-mule' rata-mi maradika-na hi eo pai' hi jaa to uma na'incai . Batua toei raweba' ntarurua' pai' rapetadi hi mali-na , raponcawa tauna to uma mepangala' hi Alata'ala .
42012047	" Batua to mpo'inca moto konoa maradika-na , tapi' uma-i mo'inga'-inga' pai' uma nababehi konoa maradika-na , batua toei bate raweba' mperegea .
42012048	Aga batua to uma-hawo mpo'incai konoa maradika-na , pai'-i mpobabehi to natao raweba'-ki , raweba' moto-i , aga huka'-na-wadi . Apa' hema to rawai' wori' , wori' wo'o to ratuntu' ngkai hi'a . Hema to ratonui wori' , rapomperapii' wori' wo'o-i .
42012049	" Katumai-ku toi , tumai mpobaa apu hi dunia' . Pai' konoa-ku bona apu toe sohi' rapobaa-mi .
42012050	Ria-pidi pontodohakaa to kana kutodohaka , pai' uma oa' rodo nono-ku ane pontodohakaa toe ko'ia madupa' .
42012051	Ha ni'uli'-koina katumai-ku toi , tumai mpopohintuwu' tauna ? Uma-e' ! Katumai-ku toi , tumai mpoposisala tauna .
42012052	Ntepu'u ngkai tempo toi , tau hantina to nte lima rala-na hantomi mosisala : tolu hamali , rodua hamali .
42012053	To tuama mpo'ewa ana'-na tomane , ana' tomane mpo'ewa tuama-na . To tina mpo'ewa ana'-na tobine , pai' ana' tobine mpo'ewa tina-na . To piniana mpo'ewa minia-na , pai' to minia mpo'ewa piniana-na . "
42012054	Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus hi tauna to wori' : " Ane nihilo limu' mehupa' tono' hi kasoloa , ni'uli' udaa mpai' . Udaa mpu'u .
42012055	Ane mewui ngolu' ngkai tono' selatan , ni'uli' mara eo mpai' , pai' bate wae mpu'u .
42012056	He koi' to lompe' hi mali-na-wadi ! Ni'inca lia mpelence tanda hi langi' pai' hi dunia' . Napa-di pai' uma ni'incai mpelence napa to nababehi Pue' Ala tempo toi !
42012057	" Napa pai' uma oa' nipakanoto nono-ni pai' mpangaku' napa to monoa' !
42012058	Ane rapa'-na ria to doko' mpakilu-ta hi totu'a ngata , agina tahuduwukui mpo'oti kara-kara-ta bula-ta hi lengko ohea-pidi . Nee-neo' mpai' nakeni mpu'u-ta hi topohura , pai' topohura mpai' mpotonu-ta hi polisi , pai' polisi mpopesua'-ta hi rala tarungku' .
42012059	Mpu'u ku'uli' : uma-tapa tebahaka ngkai rala tarungku' ane da koo-ko'ia oti tabayari waya'-ta . "
42013001	Nto'u toe wo'o-hawo , ria tauna mpololitai Yesus , mpololita ba hangkuja dua to Galilea to rapatehi ntuku' hawa' Pilatus bula-ra mpotonu pepue'-ra hi Pue' Ala .
42013002	Mpotompoi' lolita toe , na'uli'-mi Yesus : " Ba ni'uli'-koina wae , pai' hewa toe rahi kamate-ra to Galilea toera , apa' meliu jeko'-ra ngkai hawe'ea to Galilea to ntani'-na ?
42013003	Uma-e' waetu ! Ku'uli'-kokoi : ane uma-koi medea ngkai jeko'-ni , bate rahuku' wo'o-koiwo mpai' omea .
42013004	Wae wo'o to hampulu' walu to mate nadungkahi tomi to molangko hi Siloam . Apa' oo-raka kamate-rae , meka' ba lue' ni'uli' melabi-rana sala'-ra ngkai hawe'ea to Yerusalem ?
42013005	Uma-e' waetu ! Ku'uli'-kokoi : ane uma-koi medea ngkai jeko'-ni , bate rahuku' wo'o-koiwo mpai' omea . "
42013006	Oti toe , Yesus mpo'uli'-raka lolita rapa' toi . Na'uli' : " Ria hadua tauna to mpohu'a kaju ara hi pampa-na . Hangkani hilou-imi mpongoa'-ngoa' ba ria wua'-na . Ntaa' uma-di ria hamehaa'-e .
42013007	Toe pai' na'uli' mpo'uli'-ki tompodoo pampa-na : ` Hilo , tolu mpae-mi ntora tumai-a mpehiloi kaju toei ba ria wua'-na , uma oa' ria . Toki lau-mi ! Napa kalaua-na tuwu' hi rehe'i mpe'oti mara rudu' tana' . '
42013008	" Na'uli' tompodoo pampa toei : ` Pelele'-mi ulu tuwu' hampae toi-pi Maradika . Kukawahi-damo , pai' kutaui' tana' to morudu' ngkai mali-na .
42013009	Meka' ba lue' mowua'-i-hawo mpai' mpae boko' . Ane uma oa'-i mowua' , tatoki-imi . ' "
42013010	Hangkani , Yesus metudui' hi tomi posampayaa nto'u Eo Sabat , eo pepuea'-ra to Yahudi .
42013011	Hi ree , ria hadua tobine , hampulu' walu mpae-imi peda' , apa' napesuai' seta-i . Tobine toei bungku' , uma nakulei' mokore monoa' .
42013012	Kanahilo-na Yesus tobine toei , nakio'-i pai' na'uli'-ki : " Ina' , mo'uri'-moko , uma-pi ria haki' to mpohoo'-ko . "
42013013	Oti toe najama tobine toei , kaliliu mokore monoa'-imi , pai'-i mpo'une' Alata'ala .
42013014	Ngkai ree , kamoroe-nami pangkeni tomi posampayaa toei , apa' Yesus mpaka'uri' tauna hi Eo Sabat . Toe pai' na'uli' mpo'uli'-raka tauna to wori' : " Ono eo , eo pobagoa-ta . Hi eo toe , ma'ala-koi tumai mpopepaka'uri' , neo' hi Eo Sabat ! "
42013015	Na'uli' Pue' Yesus : " He koi' to lompe' hi mali-na-wadi ! Hi Eo Sabat , hema-ta to uma mpobahaka japi ba jara'-ta , takeni hilou hi mali gimpu pai' tapoponginu ?
42013016	Hiaa' hi rehe'i , ria hadua tobine muli Abraham , hampulu' walu mpae-imi nahoo' Magau' Anudaa' . Ha uma-hana ma'ala tabahaka-i ngkai pohoo'-na hi Eo Sabat ? "
42013017	Lolita-na Yesus tohe'e mpo'eai' bali'-na . Tapi' ane ntodea , goe'-ra-rana mpohilo hawe'ea anu mekoncehi to nababehi .
42013018	Ngkai ree , na'uli' Yesus : " Ane Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia' , beiwa kajadi'-na ? Kajadi'-nale , hewa lolita rapa' tohe'i :
42013019	Ria hadua tauna ngala' unto' hawi , lou nahawu' hi pampa-na . Unto' toe tuwu' kaboo-bohea , duu'-na jadi' hangkaju kaju , pai' danci mpobabehi peta-ra hi ra'a-na . "
42013020	Oti toe , na'uli' wo'o-mi : " Ane Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia' , kajadi'-na hewa lolita rapa' tohe'i :
42013021	Hadua tobine mpo'ala' ragi hangkedi' , nagalo hante lunu to wori' . Mahae-hae , woke'-mi omea . "
42013022	Rala pomakoa'-na hilou hi Yerusalem , Yesus mpotara ngata to bohe pai' ngata to kedi' , mpotudui' tauna .
42013023	Ria hadua tauna mpekune'-i : " Pue' , ba hangkedi'-wadi tauna to mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-nae ? " Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka ntodea :
42013024	" Mporata katuwua' to lompe'-le , ma'ala rarapai'-ki tauna to mesua' ntara hi wobo' to jopi' . Pari-pari-koi mesua' ntara wobo' to jopi' toe . Apa' wori'-hana mpai' to mpali' ohea-ra mesua' , aga uma-rapa ma'ala mesua' .
42013025	Apa' rata mpai' tempo-na , mokore-imi pue' tomi toe hilou mpo'unca wobo' . Ane rapa'-na mokore hi mali-na-pidi-koi nto'u toe , mpopebea wobo'-koi , ni'uli' : ` Pue' , bea-kaka-kaiwo ! ' " Natompoi'-koi mpai' : ` Uma-koi ku'incai , ba to ngkaiapa-koi . '
42013026	" Ni'uli'-ki : ` Ei' ! Ngkoni' pai' nginu-madakaie dohe-nue Pue' ! Ria-moko metudui' hi rala ngata-kai ! '
42013027	" Na'uli'-kokoi mpai' : ` Uma-koi ku'incai ba to ngkaiapa-koi . Palai-koi ngkai rei , koi' paka' to mo'ingku dada'a . '
42013028	" Nto'u toe mpai' , geo' pai' ntodohaka-mokoi , apa' nihilo Abraham , Ishak pai' Yakub hante hawe'ea nabi , mohura goe'-goe'-ra hi rala Kamagaua' Alata'ala , hiaa' koi' ra'uncahi hi mali-na .
42013029	Wori' wo'o mpai' tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi to jadi' ntodea Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua'-na . Tumai-ra ngkai tono' mata'eo pai' ngkai kasoloa pai' ngkai humalili' dunia' , mohura goe'-goe' omea-ra mpai' mpokaralai posusaa' hi rala Kamagaua' Alata'ala .
42013030	Ka'omea-na mpai' , wori' tauna to kedi' tuwu'-ra tempo toi jadi' bohe tuwu'-ra hi eo mpeno . Pai' wori' tauna to bohe tuwu'-ra tempo toi jadi' kedi' tuwu'-ra hi eo mpeno . "
42013031	Nto'u toe wo'o , ria ba hangkuja dua to Parisi rata hi Yesus pai' mpo'uli'-ki : " Malai-moko ngkai rei , apa' Magau' Herodes doko' mpopatehi-ko . "
42013032	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Koi' , uli'-ki tope'akalai tetui hewa tohe'i : Eo toe lau pai' mepulo , mobago-a-pidi , mpopalai seta pai' mpaka'uri' topeda' . Pai' hi eo katolu-na , kupohudu-mi pobago-ku .
42013033	Aga eo toe mpai' lau , mepulo pai' romengi mpai' , bate kana kaliliu-ama mpotoa' Yerusalem . Apa' uma-hawo masipato' hadua nabi rapatehi hi ngata ntani'-na , kana hi ngata Yerusalem .
42013034	" Ee to Yerusalem ! to Yerusalem ! Nipatehi-ra-koina nabi-nabi , pai' nipana' watu-ra-koina tauna to nasuro-kokoi Alata'ala . Wori' ngkani-mi kupehuka' ngkupui-koi , hewa hama'a manu' tina mpo'urui ana'-na hi une' pani'-na , aga uma-koi dota .
42013035	Jadi' , bona ni'inca : Tomi pepuea'-ni napalahii-kokoi mpai' Pue' Ala . Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi , uma-apa nihiloi , duu'-na rata tempo-na ni'uli' : ` Une'-imi to rata mpokeni hanga' Pue' Ala ! ' "
42014001	Hangkani nto'u Eo Sabat , Yesus hilou ngkoni' hi tomi hadua pangkeni to Parisi . Bula-na hi ree , ralelemata-i mpopali' sala'-na .
42014002	Muu-mule' rata hadua tauna to mohaki' ngkumowu , mowoto witi' pai' pale-na .
42014003	Yesus mpekune'-ra guru agama pai' to Parisi , na'uli' : " Ntuku' atura agama-ta , ma'ala-ta mpaka'uri' topeda' hi Eo Sabat , ba uma-di ? "
42014004	Guru agama pai' to Parisi toera , oja'-ra mpotompoi'-i . Ngkai ree , Yesus mpojama topeda' toei , napaka'uri' pai' nahubui-i hilou .
42014005	Oti toe na'uli'-raka : " Ane rapa'-na ria ana'-ta ba japi-ta monawu' hi rala buwu hi Eo Sabat , ha uma sahu ta'ore'-i tumai , nau' hi eo pepuea'-e ? "
42014006	Aga uma hema to daho' mpohono'-i .
42014007	Hi tomi to Parisi toe , Yesus mpohilo ria torata to doko' mohura hi pohuraa karabilaa' . Toe pai' natudui'-ra hante lolita rapa' toi .
42014008	Na'uli' : " Ane rakio'-ko hilou hi posusaa' poncamokoa , neo' mohura hi pohuraa karabilaa' . Meka' ba ria-di mpai' to rakio' to meliu karabila'-na ngkai iko .
42014009	Tumai mpai' pue' tomi mpo'uli'-koko hewa toi : ` Wai'-ki hi'a-hana pohuraa tetu ! ' Me'ea'-ko mpai' hilou mohura hi kadingkia'-na .
42014010	Jadi' , ane rakio'-ko hilou hi posusaa' , agina mohura-ko hi kadingkia'-na , bona pue' tomi mpai' mpo'uli'-koko : ` Bale , mai-ta mohura hi pohuraa to lompe' toe mai . ' Ane hewa toe , rabila' lau-moko hi mata ntodea .
42014011	Hawe'ea to mpomolangko nono-ra , Pue' Ala mpodingkihi-ra , pai' hawe'ea to mpakadingki' nono-ra , Pue' Ala mpomolangko-ra . "
42014012	Oti toe , mololita wo'o-imi Yesus mpololitai pue' tomi . Na'uli' : " Ane takio' tauna ngkaralai posusa'-ta , ba ngkoni' mpo'eo ba ngkabengia , neo' mpokio' bale-ta , ompi'-ta , ba topo'ua' rala ngata . Apa' bate rakio' wo'o-ta mpai' , alaa-na tehiwili-mi kehi-ta .
42014013	Jadi' ane tababehi posusa' , kio' tauna tokabu , tokeru , topungku pai' towero .
42014014	Ane wae pobabehi-ta , Pue' Ala mpogane'-ta mpai' , apa' tauna to hewa toe uma mpokulei' mpohiwili kehi-ta . Kehi-ta tetu nahiwili moto mpai' Pue' Ala hi Eo Kiama , nto'u kanapotuwu'-ra nculii' tauna to monoa' hi poncilo-na . "
42014015	Bula-ra ngkoni' toe , hadua torata mpo'epe lolita-na Yesus , pai' na'uli'-ki : " Marasi' tauna to mpokaralai posusa' hi rala Kamagaua'-na Alata'ala . "
42014016	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki tauna toei : " Hangkani ria hadua tauna to mpobabehi susa' bohe , pai' mpokio' wori' tauna .
42014017	Sadia-mi omea , nahubui pahawaa'-na hilou mpo'uli'-raka to rakio' : ` Mai-tamo hilou hi posusaa' , apa' sadia-mi omea . '
42014018	Aga tauna to rakio' toera , motance omea-ra . To lomo'-na mpo'uli' : ` Lako' me'oli tana'-a , pai' kana hilou ulu kupehiloi . Merapi' ampu-a , uma-a tilou . '
42014019	To hadua-na mpo'uli' : ` Lako' mpo'oli japi-a lima moko , hilou kuperao mpake'-ra mopajeko' . Merapi' ampu-a , uma-a tilou ! '
42014020	To ntani'-na wo'o mpo'uli' : ` Aku' lako' oti ncamoko-a . Uma-a bisa tilou . '
42014021	" Pahawaa' toei nculii' hilou hi pue' susa' mpowoli' lolita-ra toe . Uma-pi mowo kamoroe-na pue' susa' , na'uli'-ki pahawaa'-na : ` Pesahui hilou hi karajaa pai' hi porompengaa ohea hi rala ngata . Bawai-ramo tumai tokabu , tokeru , towero , pai' topungku . ' Hilou mpu'u-imi-hawo pahawaa' toei mpotuku' hawa' pue' susa' .
42014022	" Karata-na nculii' , na'uli' mpo'uli'-ki pue' susa' : ` Tuama , hawa'-nu kupopomako'-mi , aga ko'ia ihia' tomi-nu , ria-pidi pohuraa . '
42014023	" Na'uli' pue' susa' : ` Hilou tena-ko hi ohea bohe pai' ohea to kedi' hi mali ngata , pewuku-ra tauna tumai , bona tomi-ku ihia' hobo' .
42014024	Mpu'u ku'uli' , ngkai hawe'ea tauna to kukio' toera lou , uma haduaa-ra to mpokoni' ba apa-apa hi posusa'-ku . ' "
42014025	Wori' tauna mpotuku' Yesus rala pomakoa'-na . Yesus mewili' hi tauna toera pai' na'uli'-raka :
42014026	" Tauna to doko' mpotuku'-a , aga uma meliu pe'ahi'-na hi Aku' ngkai pe'ahi'-na hi tina-na , tuama-na , tobine-na , ana'-na , ompi'-na , ba paiana woto-na moto-mi , uma-i ma'ala jadi' topetuku'-ku .
42014027	Tauna to jadi' topetuku'-ku kana mpopaha'a kaju parika'-na -- batua-na kana sadia-i mporata kaparia ba paiana rapatehi sabana petuku'-na hi Aku' . Jadi' , tauna to uma dota mpopaha'a kaju parika'-na pai' mpotuku'-a , uma-i ma'ala jadi' topetuku'-ku .
42014028	" Ane ria to doko' mpowangu tomi bohe , napohura-ki ulu mporeke ongkoso' pompowangu-na , ba hono' mpai' doi-na ba uma-di .
42014029	Apa' ane mpolia' natu'u-mi parawatu-na pai' uma hudu nawangu apa' naka'otii doi-na , hawe'ea tauna to mpohilo mpotawai-i ,
42014030	ra'uli' : ` Ii , ni'anu-di doko' mpowangu tomi bohe , ntaa' uma-di hono' doi-nae ! '
42014031	" Wae wo'o , ane hadua magau' to ria tantara-na hampulu' ncobu manga'e hante hadua magau' to ria tantara-na rompulu' ncobu , kana napekiri ncala' , ba rakule' mpo'ewa-ra ba uma-di .
42014032	Ane na'inca ka'uma-na mpai' hompe tantara-na , molaa-pidi bali'-na , nahubui-mi suro hilou mpali' kahintuwuaa' . "
42014033	Yesus mpokaliliu lolita-na , na'uli' : " Wae wo'o koi' , ane uma-koi mpobahaka hawe'ea to ria hi koi' , uma-koi ma'ala jadi' topetuku'-ku .
42014034	" Poi' , wori' kalaua-na . Aga ane mobali'-mi kapoi'-na alaa-na uma-pi mopoi' , napa tena to ma'ala mpakapoi'-i ?
42014035	Uma ntoto-pi ria tuju-na , ba raruduhi-ki hinu'a ba rapopai-pai . Agina ratadi lau-imi . Hema-koi to tilingaa , pe'epei lompe' ! "
42015001	Rala-na ha'eo , wori' topesingara' paja' pai' tau ntani'-na to ra'uli' ntodea dada'a kehi-ra rata mpo'epe lolita Yesus .
42015002	To Parisi pai' guru agama mporuge'-i , ra'uli' : " Ii , tau toe-idi mai mpobale-raka topojeko' , pai' ngkoni' dohe-rae . "
42015003	Toe pai' Yesus mpololitai-ra hante lolita rapa' toi .
42015004	Na'uli' : " Rapa'-na ria doo-ta to ria-ki bima-na ha'atu ma'a . Ane moronto hama'a , napa to nababehi ? Bate napalahii bima-na to sio mpulu' sio hi papada , pai'-i hilou mpali' bima-na to moronto duu'-na narua' .
42015005	Ane narua'-pi , uma mowo kagoe'-na . Ngkai kagoe'-na napololopongko' bima-na toei , pai' nakeni nculii' hilou hi tomi-na .
42015006	Oti toe , pai'-i mpokio' bale-na pai' tongki-na , na'uli'-raka : ` Mai-mokoi goe' dohe-ku . Apa' bima-ku to moronto kurua' nculii'-imi . '
42015007	Wae wo'o , ane hadua topojeko' medea ngkai jeko'-na , meliu kagoe'-ra ihi' suruga mpokagoe'-i ngkai kagoe'-ra mpokagoe' sio mpulu' sio tauna to monoa' po'ingku-ra , to uma-ra-rana mingki' medea .
42015008	" Rapa'-na ria hadua tobine to ria-ki hampulu' mpepa' doi pera'-na . Ane moronto hampepa' , napa to nababehi ? Mposuwe palita-i pai'-i mpehaii tomi-na , pai' napali' hiapa-apa karontoa-na , duu'-na narua' .
42015009	Wae kanarua'-na , nakio'-ramo bale-na pai' tongki-na , na'uli'-raka : ` Mai-mokoi goe' dohe-ku . Apa' kurua' nculii'-mi doi-ku to moronto . '
42015010	Wae wo'o-ra mala'eka Alata'ala mpokagoe' hadua tauna topojeko' to medea ngkai jeko'-na . "
42015011	Na'uli' tena Yesus : " Ria hadua tuama to ria-ki rodua ana'-na tomane .
42015012	Tokahudu mpo'uli'-ki tuama-ra : ` Mama , wai' ami'-ama-kuna bagia-ku ngkai rewa-nu . ' Jadi' , nabagi mpu'u-mi rewa-na hi ana'-na to rodua toera .
42015013	" Ba hangkuja eo olo'-na ngkai ree , ana'-na tokahudu mpobalu' bagia-na , pai'-i hilou hi ngata to molaa . Hi ria-i mpo'oti mara doi-na hante kehi to uma tumotoa .
42015014	Ka'oti doi-na omea , ria-mi oro' hi ngata toe , duu'-na mpe'ahii'-mi tuwu'-na .
42015015	Hilou-imi hi pue' ngata doko' ngkoni' gaji' . Pue' ngata toei mpohubui-i mpodoo wawu-na .
42015016	Ngkai kamo'oro'-na , mehina-imi-hawo doko' mpokoni' kano wawu . Hiaa' uma hema to mpowai'-i pongkoni' .
42015017	" Ka'omea-na , mokanono-imi , na'uli' : ` Topobago hi tomi tuama-kule , melabi lia pongkoni'-ra . Hiaa' aku'-mi-kuna hi rehe'i , neo' mate modupu'-ama .
42015018	Wae-pi , nculii'-ama hilou hi tuama-ku , ku'uli'-damo-ki : Mama , masala'-ama hi Pue' Ala pai' hi Mama wo'o .
42015019	Uma-apa natao nukio' ana'-nu Mama . Agina nuponcawa batua-nua-damo . '
42015020	Kame'ongko'-nami hilou hi tuama-na . " Molaa-i-pidi ngkai tomi-na , pehilo-mi tuama-na . Ngkai kama'ahi'-na , pokeno-nami hilou mpohirua'-ki ana'-na , nakupui pai' na'eki .
42015021	Na'uli'-mi to ana' : ` Mama , masala'-ama hi Pue' Ala pai' hi Mama wo'o . Uma-apa natao nukio' ana'-nu . . . . '
42015022	" Aga tuama-na mpokio' topobago-na , pai' na'uli'-raka : ` Pesahui , ala' pohea to lompe' lia , pai' heai-i . Uncoi' karawe-na hante hinci , pai' sapatui' wo'o-i .
42015023	Oti toe , hilou-koi mpohoko' ana' japi to morudu' pai' nisumale' . Ngkoni'-ta goe'-goe' !
42015024	Apa' ana'-ku tohe'ii , ma'ala-mi ta'uli' mate-imi , aga tuwu' nculii'-imi . Moronto-i , aga kurua' nculii'-imi . ' Kamosusa'-rami .
42015025	" Nto'u toe , lingku' ana'-na to ulumua' hi bonea . Ponculi'-na ngkai bonea , mohu'-mi hi tomi , na'epe-hawo to molalowe pai' moni karamea .
42015026	Nakio' hadua topobago-ra , napompekunei' ba moapa-ra hi tomi .
42015027	Na'uli' topobago toei : ` Tu'ai-nule , rata nculii'-imi-hawo ! Tuama-nu mpehubui mposumale' ana' japi to morudu' , apa' ana'-na to moronto narua' nculii'-mi hante kalompea'-na . '
42015028	" Kamoroe-nami ana' to ulumua' toei , oja'-i mesua' hi rala tomi . Tuama-na hilou mpobawai-i mesua' .
42015029	Tapi' na'uli' to ana' : ` Mompae-mpae-ama mobago huduwuku-ku mpobago-koko Mama . Uma-kuna hangkania-a mposapuaka hawa'-nu . Hiaa' ntahawe' hama'a kebe'-kuwo , ko'ia-kuna ria nuwai'-a bona kubabehi-kuwo kagoea' hante bale-ku .
42015030	Hiaa' ana'-nu tetui to mpe'oti hinyai' rewa-nu hante tobine to ele' , wae kanculii'-na nusumale' lau-ki japi to morudu' ! '
42015031	" Na'uli' tuama-na : ` Ana' , iko-le tida dohe-ku oa'-ko-kona . Ihi' tomi-kule , iko wo'o pue'-na .
42015032	Hiaa' toto-na lia-ta mosusa' goe'-goe' , apa' tu'ai-nu to mate-imi-hana , tuwu' nculii'-imi . Moronto-imi , tapi' tarua' nculii'-imi-hawo . ' "
42016001	Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus mpo'uli'-raka ana'guru-na : " Ria hadua topo'ua' , pai' ria-ki hadua topobago-na to ngkakamu doi-na . Ria to mpakilu topobago toei hi topo'ua' , ra'uli' : ` Ntora napewai' mara-hana doi-nu ! '
42016002	Toe pai' topo'ua' toei mpokio' topobago-na , na'uli'-ki : ` Napa-di to ku'epe to rapakilu-koko toi-e ? Wae lau , popehuwu-ka hawe'ea buku popa'intaa . Ngkai eo toe lau , uma-pi iko to ngkakamu ka'uaa'-ku ! '
42016003	" Mokanono-imi topobago toei , na'uli' : ` Napa-le' to kubabehi-e ? Naleso'-ama mpai' sepu'-ku ngkai bago-ku . Momangki uma kukulei' . Kakarapi'-rapi' , me'ea'-a . '
42016004	Ngkai ree na'uli' : ` Aa , ria akala-ku ! Apa' neo' raleso'-ama ngkai bago-kue , agina mpali' ncala'-a bale-ku wori'-wori' , bona hira' mpai' mpotarima-a hi tomi-ra . '
42016005	" Jadi' ngkai ree , nakio'-mi butu dua tauna to mo'inta hi sepu'-na . Hi to lomo'-na na'uli' : ` Hangkuja inta-nu hi sepu'-ku ? '
42016006	" Metompoi' tauna toei : ` Tolu ncobu lite lana . ' " Na'uli' topobago toei : ` Oi sura popa'intaa-nu . Mohura-moko , uki' pesahui , hancobu lima atu lite-wadi ! '
42016007	" Oti toe , pai' na'uli'-ki karodua-na : ` Hiaa' iko , hangkuja-kowo inta-nu ? ' " Natompoi'-hawo : ` Hancobu karu' pae . ' " Na'uli' topobago toei : ` Ohe'i sura inta-nu , uki'-mi walu atu karu'-wadi . '
42016008	" Kana'epe-na topo'ua' napa to nababehi topobago-na to bengku' gau'-na tetui , na'une' lau-imi , apa' pante-i-hana mpali' akala-na bona lompe' katuwu'-na . Apa' tauna to uma mpo'incai Pue' Ala , meliu kapante-ra mpo'urusi katuwu'-ra hante hingka doo-ra , ngkai kapante-ra tauna to hi rala kabajaa-na Pue' Ala mpo'urusi katuwu'-ra hi eo mpeno .
42016009	" Toe pai' ku'uli'-kokoi : Kana tapake' ka'uaa' hi dunia' tohe'i mpotulungi doo , bona ane uma-pi mpai' mokalaua ka'uaa' dunia' toi , ratarima lompe'-ta hi po'ohaa' to tida duu' kahae-hae-na .
42016010	Tauna to ma'ala rasarumaka hante rewa to hangkedi' , ma'ala wo'o-i rasarumaka hante rewa to wori' . Tauna to uma monoa' kehi-na hante rewa to hangkedi' , uma wo'o mpai' monoa' kehi-na hante rewa to wori' .
42016011	Jadi' , ane uma lompe' pompewili'-ta hi ka'uaa' dunia' tohe'i , hema to mposarumaka-ta hi poko ka'uaa' to hi suruga ?
42016012	Ane uma lompe' pompewili'-ta hi rewa to rasarumaka-taka hi dunia' toi , hema mpai' to mpowai'-ta rewa to jadi' anu-ta moto hi suruga ?
42016013	" Uma-hawo ria hadua topobago mobago hi rodua tua . Apa' hadua mpai' nape'ahi' , hadua napokahuku' . Hadua natuku'-ki hawa'-na , hadua nasapuaka . Wae wo'o koi' , uma-koi bisa mpotuku' konoa Alata'ala , pai' hamali-koi ntora mporumpu rewa dunia' . "
42016014	To Parisi mpo'epe hawe'ea lolita Yesus toe . Rapotawai lau-i-wadi , apa' hira' toe-mi to mpokahina doi .
42016015	Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Koi' tetu-mi mpemanoa' po'ingku-ni hi poncilo manusia' . Aga Alata'ala mpo'inca ihi' nono-ni . Apa' napa to rabila' manusia' , napokahuku' Alata'ala .
42016016	" Napa to te'uki' hi rala Atura Musa pai' sura nabi bate-na rapake'-pidi duu' rata hi tempo Yohanes Topeniu' . Ngkai tempo toe , rapalele-mi Kareba Lompe' to mpo'uli' Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia' . Pai' wori' tauna mpohuduwukui doko' jadi' ntodea-na hi rala Kamagaua'-na toe .
42016017	Tapi' butu mela to te'uki' hi rala Atura Pue' bate kana madupa' . Mojoli-pi langi' pai' dunia' mokero , ngkai hamela lolita hi rala Atura Pue' uma madupa' .
42016018	" Hema to mpogaa'-ki tobine-na pai' ncamoko hante tobine ntani'-na , mobualo'-i-hana . Pai' tauna to mpotobine kabulisa doo , mobualo' wo'o-i-hawo .
42016019	" Ria hadua topo'ua' . Pohea-na hewa pohea magau' , paka' to masuli' oli-na . Tuwu'-na butu eo-na hewa toposusa'-damo .
42016020	Hi wobo'-na ratu'u hadua tauna to kabu , hanga'-na Lazarus . Woto-na hobo' paka' waka' .
42016021	Doko'-i-hawo ngkoni' rupu' to mohewu' ngkai meja' topo'ua' toei . Wae-mi-hawo kampe'ahii'-na , rata wo'o-pi dike' mpojilai' waka'-na .
42016022	" Rala-na ha'eo , mate-imi tokabu toei , pai' mala'eka mpokeni-i hilou hi pohuraa to lompe' hi ncori Abraham . Topo'ua' toei , mate wo'o-imi-hawo , pai'-i ratana .
42016023	Hi po'ohaa' tomate , ntora ntodohaka-i . Hampengoa'-na ngkai ree , nahilo-hawo molaa lia , oe-imi mai Abraham , hante Lazarus mohura hi ncori-na .
42016024	Pekio'-nami topo'ua' toei , na'uli' : ` Mama Abraham ! Poka'ahi'-a-kuwo ! Hubui-i Lazarus mpotubu' karawe-na hi rala ue pai' tumai natudohi-ka-kuwo jila'-ku . Pepa rahi-mi ku'epe rala apu tohe'i ! '
42016025	" Na'uli' Abraham : ` Kiwoi-dile ana' : Bula-nu tuwu'-pidi hi rala dunia' , iko mporata hawe'ea to lompe' , hiaa' Lazarus-hana mporata-i paka' to dada'a . Tempo toi , tetanta'u-imi hi rehe'i , pai' iko-kowo , mporata pepa-moko .
42016026	Hiaa' etu , hi olo'-ta ria tumata to bohe lia . Tauna ngkai rehe'i uma bisa tilou hi retu , pai' tauna ngkai retu uma bisa tumai hi rehe'i . '
42016027	" Ngkai ree , na'uli' wo'o topo'ua' toei : ` Ane wae-di Mama , kuperapi' bona nuhubui-i Lazarus hilou hi tomi tuama-ku .
42016028	Apa' ria-ra-pidi lima ompi'-ku . Hubui-i Lazarus mpopo'ingai'-ra bona neo'-ra mpai' tumai hi po'ohaa' pontodohakaa toi . '
42016029	" Na'uli' Abraham : ` Ria-miraka sura to na'uki' Musa pai' nabi-nabi ntani'-na . Mpotuku' napa to te'uki' hi rala sura toe-ra-damo-rawo . '
42016030	" Na'uli' topo'ua' toei : ` Ane muntu' toe-wadi , uma hono' ! Kana ria tomate tuwu' nculii' hilou mpololitai-ra , pai' lako' medea-rada ngkai jeko'-ra ! '
42016031	" Na'uli' Abraham : ` Ane lolita nabi Musa pai' nabi ntani'-na uma rapangalai' , uma oa'-ra mpai' mepangala' , nau' gati ria mpu'u tomate tuwu' nculii' . ' "
42017001	Yesus mpololitai ana'guru-na , na'uli' : " Bate ria to mpopanawu' tauna alaa-ra mojeko' . Aga silaka-ra tauna to mepanawu' toera !
42017002	Agina lau-pi hameha' watu po'ahaa' ratoe hi wuroko'-ra , pai'-ra ratene' hi rala tahi' , ngkai mpopanawu'-ra nau' hadua tauna to hangkedi' pepangala'-na duu'-na mpobabehi jeko' .
42017003	Toe pai' kana mo'inga'-inga'-ta ! " Ane ompi'-ta mpobabehi to sala' hi kita' , tudui'-i . Ane soho'-pi nono-na , ampungi-i .
42017004	Nau' pitu ngkani rala-na ha'eo-i masala' hi kita' , pai' butu ngkani-na tumai-i merapi' ampu , ampungi-i-hawo . "
42017005	Ra'uli' suro Pue' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki : " Pue' , pakaroho-kaka-kaiwo pepangala'-kai ! "
42017006	Na'uli' Pue' Yesus : " Ane rii-ria-mi pepangala'-ni nau' hangkutuno'-wadi , ma'ala ni'uli'-ki kaju to bohe tohe'i : ` Mowuka-moko ngkai rei , mentoli-ko ree mai hi rala tahi' ! ' bate mentoli mpu'u-i ntuku' hawa'-ni .
42017007	" Rapa'-na ria batua-ta to molia' ba to mpodoo porewua . Ane nculii'-i ngkai pehompoa-na , napa to ta'uli'-ki ? Ba ta'uli' wae : ` Sahu tumai ngkoni' ' ?
42017008	Uma-hawo . Tantu ta'uli'-ki hewa tohe'i : ` Porodo-mi pongkoni'-ku ! Moheai-ko to uma babo' . Peka'au-a bula-ku nginu pai' ngkoni' . Oti-a-damo ngkoni' , pai' lako' ngkoni'-dako-kowo . '
42017009	Uma-hawo mingki' ta'uli' tarima kasi hi batua-ta , apa' muntu' mpotuku' hawa'-i-wadi .
42017010	Wae wo'o koi' . Ane oti-mi nituku' hawe'ea to napahawa'-kokoi Alata'ala , uli'-mi-hana : ` Kai'-kaiwo-le , batua biasa-wadi-ka-kaiwo . To kibabehi-le , muntu' to rapahawa'-kakai . ' "
42017011	Rala pomakoa'-na hilou hi Yerusalem , Yesus ntara hi sipa' tana' to Samaria pai' to Galilea .
42017012	Kamesua'-na hi rala ngata , rata-mi hampulu' topohaki' poko' mpohirua'-ki . Ngkai molaa-ra-wadi mekio' ,
42017013	ra'uli' : " Yesus ! Guru ! Poka'ahi'-ka-kaiwo ! "
42017014	Kanahilo-ra Yesus , na'uli'-miraka : " Hilou-mokoi mpopehuwu woto-ni hi imam . " Hilou mpu'u-ramo . Bula-ra momako' , mo'uri'-ramo .
42017015	Kanahilo-na to hadua mo'uri'-imi , kanculii'-nami hilou hi Yesus , mpo'une'-une' Alata'ala napesukui .
42017016	Karata-na hi Yesus , motingkua'-imi mpo'uli' tarima kasi . Hi'a toei to Samaria .
42017017	Na'uli' Yesus : " Ha uma hampulu' to kupaka'uri'-e ? Hiapa-ramo to sio ?
42017018	Beiwa pai' muntu' hadua toei-wadi to nculii' mpo'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala-e ? Hiaa' bela-i he'e to Yahudi ! "
42017019	Ngkai ree , na'uli' wo'o-mi mpo'uli'-ki tauna toei : " Mokore-moko , pai'-ko hilou-mi . Mo'uri'-moko sabana pepangala'-nu hi Aku' . "
42017020	Ba hangkuja dua to Parisi mpekune' Yesus , nto'uma Alata'ala tumai jadi' Magau' hi dunia' . Na'uli' Yesus : " Kamagaua' Alata'ala-le uma ntepu'u hante tanda-tanda to kahiloa .
42017021	Uma mpai' ria to mpo'uli' : ` Hilo , ohe'i-mi Kamagaua'-na Alata'ala , ' ba ` Etu-mi mai Kamagaua' Alata'ala , ' apa' Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi laintongo'-ni . "
42017022	Oti toe , Yesus mpololitai ana'guru-na . Na'uli' : " Rata mpai' tempo-na , doko' lia-koi mpohilo-a nau' kampa' ha'eo , aga uma-apa nihiloi .
42017023	Nto'u toe mpai' , ria to mpo'uli'-kokoi : ` Magau' Topetolo' oe-imi ria ! ' Ba ria to mpo'uli' : ` Ohe'i-imi ! ' Aga neo'-koi hilou mpotuku'-ra !
42017024	Apa' ane rata nculii' mpu'u-apa mpai' , karata-ku incana hobo' hi dunia' . Hewa kila' mpohinii raoa ngkai wuntu-na hamali rata hi wuntu-na hamali , hewa toe wo'o mpai' hi eo karataa-ku , Aku' Ana' Manusia' .
42017025	Aga lomo'-lomo'-na , kana rasesa'-a pai' rasapuaka tauna to tuwu' tempo toi .
42017026	" Hewa to majadi' hi tempo nabi Nuh owi , hewa toe wo'o mpai' to jadi' hi eo karata-ku Aku' Ana' Manusia' .
42017027	Hi tempo nabi Nuh , tauna ntora ngkoni' , nginu , rapoponcamoko pai' mepoponcamoko , kawae-kawae-na duu'-na nabi Nuh mesua' hi rala sakaya bohe pai' ue mowo' mpopatehi-ra omea .
42017028	Wae wo'o kalempe' tauna owi hi ngata Sodom nto'u Lot mo'oha' hi ria . Tauna ntora ngkoni' , nginu , mobabalu' , molia' pai' mpowangu tomi .
42017029	Ntaa' palai-na Lot ngkai Sodom , hompo-mi apu pai' watu to morea' ngkai langi' mpopatehi-ra omea .
42017030	Wae wo'o mpai' kalempe'-ra manusia' hi eo karata-ku nculii' hi dunia' mpopehuwu kabaraka'-ku .
42017031	" Hi eo toe mpai' , sohi' metibo'-koi ! Tauna to mohura hi parawa , neo'-pi leba' mesua' hi rala tomi mpo'ala' rewa-na . Wae wo'o tauna to hi bonea , neo'-pi leba' nculii' mpo'ala' napa-napa hi rala ngata .
42017032	Kiwoi-dile napa to jadi' hi tobine-na Lot-e !
42017033	Hema to mpentaei konoa-na moto , uma-i mpai' mporatai katuwua' to lompe' . Aga hema to mpobahaka konoa-na sabana petuku'-na hi Aku' , nau' napopate-ki , hi'a lau-mi mpai' to mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na .
42017034	" Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : Hi eo ponculia'-ku mpai' , tauna rodua to more'eli turu ngkabengia , hadua ra'ala' , to hadua rapalahii .
42017035	Rodua tobine to motongke' momanyu , hadua ra'ala' , to hadua rapalahii . ( (
42017036	Rodua tauna mo'ema' mobago hi bonea , hadua ra'ala' , to hadua rapalahii . ) ) "
42017037	Hudu lolita Yesus toe , ana'guru-na mpekune'-i , ra'uli' : " Hiapa mpai' kajadia' tetu-e , Pue' ? " Yesus mpotompoi'-ra hante walatu toi : " Ane ria anu mate , incana moto apa' wori' danci morumpu mpokoni' . Wae wo'o mpai' karata-ku nculii' : uma-a tumai ngkawuni , incana moto mpai' . "
42018001	Oti toe , Yesus mpo'uli' hanyala lolita rapa' , mpotudui' ana'guru-na bona tida-ra mosampaya pai' neo' mere' nono-ra .
42018002	Na'uli' : " Rala ngata hamola' , ria hadua topobotuhi to uma mengkoru hi Alata'ala pai' uma wo'o-i mposaile' ba hema-hema .
42018003	Hi ngata toe wo'o , ria hadua tobine tobalu . Wori' ngkani-imi hilou mponyanyo topobotuhi toei ngkeni kara-kara-na , na'uli' : ` Tulungi-a-kuwo mposinyanyo-ki bali'-ku . '
42018004	" Lomo'-lomo'-na , topobotuhi toei uma dota mpotulungi-i . Aga ka'oo-omea-na na'uli' hi rala nono-na : ` Nau' uma-a mengkoru hi Alata'ala pai' uma wo'o-a mposaile' ba hema-hema ,
42018005	agina kutulungi lau-imi tobalu toei , apa' najojo rahi tumai mposaleroi-a . Apa' ane uma kutulungi-i , uma oa' mpai' nabahakai tumai , alaa-na kupo'oha lau wo'o-kuwo mpai' . ' "
42018006	Oti toe , na'uli' Pue' Yesus : " Pe'epei-koi napa to na'uli' topobotuhi toei . Nau' uma monoa' nono-na , dota moto-i mpotulungi tobalu to ntora mperapii'-i .
42018007	Peliu-liu-nami Alata'ala doko' mpotulungi topetuku'-na to mekakae ncuu hi eo-na pai' hi bengi-na . Ba ni'uli'-koina , napeka'au ncala' pai' lako' natulungi-rae ?
42018008	Uma-hawoe' ! Bate napesahui moto-hawo mpotulungi-ra . Aga ane rata nculii'-apa mpai' , Aku' Ana' Manusia' , ha ria-ra-pidi kurua' tauna to mepangala' hi rala dunia' toi ? "
42018009	Oti toe , Yesus mpo'uli' hanyala-pi lolita rapa' . Lolita rapa' toi mpotoa' tauna to mpo'uli' hira'-wadi to monoa' , pai'-ra mporuge' doo .
42018010	Na'uli' Yesus : " Rodua tauna hilou hi Tomi Alata'ala , lou mosampaya . To hadua to Parisi , to hadua topesingara' paja' .
42018011	To Parisi toei mokore pai' mosampaya hi rala nono-na , na'uli' : ` Oo Alata'ala , mpo'uli'-a tarima kasi , apa' uma-a hewa tau ntani'-na -- toperampaki , to bengku' nono-ra , topobualo' , ba hewa topesingara' paja' toei mai .
42018012	Aku' , mopuasa'-a rongkani rala-na hamingku . Pai' hampobagiahampulu' ngkai hawe'ea pomporataa-ku kuwai'-koko Pue' . '
