42018013	" Hiaa' topesingara' paja' toei-hawo , mokore ngkawao-i-wadi , pai' uma-i daho' ngkongoa' hi langi' . Ntora mporera' hunamu-nai , pai' na'uli' : ` Oo Alata'ala ! Poka'ahi'-a-kuwo , tauna topojeko' toi-a ! ' "
42018014	Ngkai ree , napohudui Yesus lolita-na , na'uli' : " Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : kanculii'-ra hi tomi , topesingara' paja' toe-imi to jadi' monoa' hi poncilo-na Alata'ala , bela to Parisi toei . Apa' hawe'ea to mpomolangko nono-ra , Pue' Ala mpodingkihi-ra . Pai' hawe'ea to mpakadingki' nono-ra , Pue' Ala mpomolangko-ra . "
42018015	Hangkani , ria tauna to mpokeni ana'lei-ra hi Yesus bona najama pai' nagane'-ra . Mpohilo toe we'i , moroe-ramo ana'guru-na , mpokaroe-ra to mpokeni ana'-ra toe .
42018016	Aga Yesus mpokio' ana' toera pai' na'uli' mpo'uli'-raka ana'guru-na : " Pelele' moto-ra ana' tetura tumai hi Aku' , neo'-ra nitagi . Apa' tauna to hewa toe-ramo to jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua'-na .
42018017	Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : Ane uma-koi mengkoru hi Alata'ala hewa ana' , uma-koi mpai' jadi' ntodea-na hi rala Kamagaua'-na . "
42018018	Hangkani , hadua pangkeni to Yahudi mpekune' Yesus , na'uli' : " Guru to lompe' , napa to kana kubabehi bona mporata-a-kuwo katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-nae ? "
42018019	Na'uli' Yesus : " Napa pai' nu'uli' tauna to lompe'-a ? Uma ria ntani'-na to lompe' , hadua Alata'ala-wadi .
42018020	Nu'inca moto parenta to te'uki' hi rala Atura Pue' : ` Neo' mobualo' , neo' mepatehi , neo' manako , neo' mosabi' boa' , pai' kana tabila' tina pai' tuama-ta . ' "
42018021	Na'uli' tau toei : " Hawe'ea parenta tetu lau , kutuku' omea-mi ngkai kakedia'-ku . "
42018022	Mpo'epe toe , na'uli'-mi Yesus : " Hanyala-pi to kana nubabehi . Pobalu'-mi hawe'ea rewa-nu pai' doi oli-na bagi-raka tokabu . Ane nubabehi hewa toe , bohe mpai' rasi' to nurata hi rala suruga . Oti toe , pai' tumai-moko mpotuku'-a . "
42018023	Kana'epe-na lolita tohe'e , peda'-mi nono-na , apa' mo'ua' lia-i .
42018024	Nahilo-mi Yesus kapeda' nono-na . Toe pai' na'uli' : " Mokoro rahi tauna to wori' rewa-ra mengkoru hi Alata'ala bona Hi'a jadi' Magau'-ra .
42018025	Mojoli-pi hama'a unta ntara hi wulou' jaru ngkai tauna to mo'ua' mengkoru hi Alata'ala bona Hi'a jadi' Magau'-ra . "
42018026	Konce-ramo tauna to mpo'epe lolita Yesus tohe'e , ra'uli' : " Ane wae-di , hema lau-damo to ma'ala mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-nae ? "
42018027	Na'uli' Yesus : " Ane hante pakulea' manusia'-le , uma ami' hema . Aga nakule' moto Alata'ala mpobabehi to meliu ngkai pakulea' manusia' . "
42018028	Ngkai ree , na'uli' Petrus : " Hiaa' kai' , kipalahii-mi-kaina rewa-kai , pai' kituku'-ko . "
42018029	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka ana'guru-na : " Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : hema-hema to mpalahii tomi-na , tobine-na , ompi'-na , totu'a-na ba ana'-na apa' mpotuku' hawa' Alata'ala Magau'-na ,
42018030	tauna toe-mi to mporata wori' ngkani hiwili-na hi dunia' toi . Pai' hi eo mpeno mporata wo'o-i katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na . "
42018031	Yesus mpokio' ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua mopahantani' pai' na'uli'-raka : " Epe-koi ! Hilou-tamo tohe'i-e mpotoa' Yerusalem . Hi ria mpai' hawe'ea to ra'uki' nabi-nabi owi to mpolowa Ana' Manusia' kana madupa' hi Aku' .
42018032	Ratonu-a mpai' hi tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi . Rapopo'ore'-a , raruge' , ra'uelikui ,
42018033	raweba' , pai'-a rapatehi . Aga hi eo katolu-na , tuwu' nculii' moto-a . "
42018034	Aga hawe'ea to na'uli' toe , bate uma rapaha ana'guru-na . Apa' batua-na tewunii'-raka , uma ra'incai kahompoa lolita-na .
42018035	Mohu'-mi Yesus hi ngata Yerikho , ria hadua tauna to wero mohura hi wiwi' ohea karapi'-rapi' .
42018036	Kampo'epe-na wori' tauna liu , napekune' : " Napa-die ? "
42018037	Ra'uli'-ki : " Yesus to Nazaret-le liu oe-e lou ! "
42018038	Mpo'epe toe we'i , pekio'-nami towero toei , na'uli' : " Yesus , muli Magau' Daud ! Poka'ahi'-a-kuwo ! "
42018039	Tauna to momako' ri'ulu ngkai Yesus mpokaroe-i , ra'uli' : " Ngkalino-ko ! " Aga hangkedi' kanapesukui-na mekio' , na'uli' : " Muli Magau' Daud , poka'ahi'-a-kuwo ! "
42018040	Ngkai ree , mentoda'-imi Yesus pai' na'uli' : " Keni tumai towero toei mai ! " Rakeni mpu'u-miki . Karata-na hi ree , Yesus mpekune'-i , na'uli' : " Napa to nupokono kubabehi-koko ? "
42018041	Natompoi' towero toei : " Pue' , bona pehilo-a-kuwo ! "
42018042	Na'uli' Yesus : " Ane wae , pehilo-moko ! Kupaka'uri'-ko sabana pepangala'-nu hi Aku' . "
42018043	Ncaliu pehilo mpu'u-imi . Ngkai ree , ntora mpotuku' Yesus-imi , pai' mpo'uli' wori' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala . Hawe'ea tauna to mpohilo kajadia' toe , mpo'une' Alata'ala-ramo .
42019001	Nto'u karata-na Yesus hi ngata Yerikho , momako' ncuu-i ntara rala ngata toe .
42019002	Hi ngata toe , ria hadua topo'ua' to mpokapalai' topesingara' paja' , hanga'-na Zakheus .
42019003	Doko'-i-hawo mpohilo beiwa lence-na Yesus . Aga uma-i bisa mpohilo apa' wori' rahi tauna , bo hi'a he'e tauna to dingki' .
42019004	Jadi' , pokeno-nami mpori'uluhi ntodea , pai'-i ngkahe' kaju ara bona ma'ala-i-hawo mpopanto' Yesus ane liu-ipi hi ree .
42019005	Kaliu-na Yesus hi ree , pengoa'-nami pai' na'uli' : " Zakheus , pesahui mana'u ! Apa' eo toe lau , kana mehani-a hi tomi-nu . "
42019006	Napesahui mpu'u-mi-hawo Zakheus mana'u , pai' goe'-i mpotarima Yesus hi tomi-na .
42019007	Kapehilo-ra ntodea hilou-i Yesus hi tomi Zakheus , ngkunuti-ramo , ra'uli' : " Ii , napa-di pai' mencua' hi tomi topojeko'-i-hanae ! "
42019008	Bula-na Pue' Yesus hi tomi Zakheus , mokore-imi Zakheus mpo'uli'-ki : " Pue' , bagi ntongo' ngkai rewa-ku kuwai'-raka tokabu , pai' hema-hema to kubagiu , kupoponculi' opo' ngkani ngkai to kubagiu-raka . "
42019009	Na'uli' Yesus : " Hi eo toe lau , tauna hi tomi toi tebahaka ngkai huku' jeko'-ra , apa' Zakheus toii , muli Abraham wo'o-i-hawo .
42019010	Apa' toe-mile pai' tumai-ae , Aku' Ana' Manusia' . Tumai-a mpopali' tauna to molaa ngkai Alata'ala , pai' mpohore-ra ngkai huku' jeko'-ra . "
42019011	Neo' rata-imi Yesus hi Yerusalem , toe pai' wori' tauna mpo'uli' neo' rata mpu'u-mi tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia' . Jadi' , bula ntodea mpe'epei lolita-na , na'umpui' wo'o-mi lolita-na hante hanyala lolita rapa' .
42019012	Na'uli' : " Ria hadua maradika mopatuju hilou hi ngata to molaa , lou ralanti' jadi' magau' pai' nculii' .
42019013	Jadi' , kako'ia-na me'ongko' , mpokio'-i hampulu' pahawaa'-na pai' nawai'-ra hore-hore hampepa' doi bulawa . Na'uli' maradika toei : ` Mobabalu'-koi hante doi to kuwai'-kokoi tetu lingku'-ku hilou . '
42019014	Aga hi ngata maradika toe , ria wo'o-rawo tauna to mpokahuku'-i . Pe'ongko'-na maradika tohe'e , rapahawa' suro hilou mpotuku'-i pai' mpo'uli' : ` Oja'-ka-kaina maradika tetu jadi' magau'-kai ! '
42019015	" Aga ra'ongko' moto-i jadi' magau' , pai' nculii'-imi hilou hi ngata-na . Karata-na hi ngata , nakio'-ramo pahawaa'-na mpohirua'-ki , napongincai kahangkuja-nami rasi' to rarata .
42019016	To lomo'-na rata pai' na'uli' : ` Magau' , doi bulawa to hampepa' to nuwai'-ka , ria-mi ana'-na hampulu' . '
42019017	" Na'uli' magau' toei : ` Lompe'-mi , iko pahawaa' to lompe' . Wae-pi , apa' monoa'-ko hi to hangkedi' , ku'ongko'-moko jadi' topohawa' to mpohawai' hampulu' ngata . '
42019018	" Pahawaa' karodua-na rata wo'o pai' mpo'uli' : ` Magau' , doi bulawa to hampepa' to nuwai'-ka , jadi' lima mpepa'-mi . '
42019019	" Na'uli' wo'o-mi magau' hi karodua-na tohe'ei : ` Iko wo'o ku'ongko' jadi' topohawa' hi lima ngata . '
42019020	" Ngkai ree , rata wo'o-imi-hawo pahawaa' kahadua-na . Na'uli' : ` Oi-mi doi-nu Magau' . Kutimamahi lompe' , kuputu' hante lenco .
42019021	Me'eka'-a hi Magau' , apa' ku'inca kasoa-nu . Nupepae to bela-kowo hinu'a-nu , nu'ala' to uma nukarokoi . '
42019022	" Na'uli' magau' mpo'uli'-ki : ` Iko pahawaa' to dada'a ! Ane nu'inca kasoa-ku , ane nu'inca kampepae-ku to bela hinu'a-ku , pai' kampo'ala'-ku to uma kukarokoi ,
42019023	napa pai' doi-ku uma nupopesua' hi bank , bona ane rata-apa , ku'ala' hante ana'-na ! '
42019024	Oti toe , na'uli' wo'o-mi hi tauna to mokore hi ncori-na : ` Ala' doi to hi tauna tetui , pai' wai'-ki to ria-ki hampulu' . '
42019025	" Ingu'-ramo to napahawa' toera , ra'uli' : ` Napa pai' hewa tetu , Magau' ? Apa' ria-miki-hana hampulu' mpepa' ! '
42019026	" Na'uli' magau' : ` Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : Tauna to ma'ala rasarumaka hante anu to rawai'-ki , rawai' tena-i-pidi . Tapi' tauna to uma rasarumaka , anu hangkedi' to ria hi hi'a , ra'alai' lau-i .
42019027	Pai' wae lau , keni-ramo tumai bali'-ku to mpoka'oja'-a jadi' magau'-ra . Patehi-ramo hi rehe'i bona kuhilo ! ' "
42019028	Ka'oti-na Yesus mpo'uli' hawe'ea toe , pomako'-nami meri'ulu ngkai doo-na hilou hi Yerusalem .
42019029	Mohu'-ramo hi ngata Betfage pai' Betania hi bulu' Zaitun , nahubui rodua ana'guru-na mako' meri'ulu .
42019030	Na'uli'-raka : " Hilou-mokoi hi ngata to tanyanyohi toe mai . Ane mesua'-pokoi hi rala ngata , nihilo mpai' hama'a ana' keledai to tehoo' . Keledai toe ko'ia hangkania rahawi' . Bongka koloro-na pai' keni-i tumai .
42019031	Ane ria tauna mpekune'-koi napa pai' nibongka-i , uli' : ` Apa' Pue' mparaluu-i . ' "
42019032	Hilou mpu'u-ramo ana'guru-na to rodua tohe'era , pai' rarata bate hewa to na'uli'-raka Yesus .
42019033	Bula-ra mpobongka keledai toe , mepekune'-mi pue'-na : " Napa pai' nibongka keledai tetu-e ? "
42019034	Ratompoi' : " Apa' Pue' mparaluu-i . "
42019035	Karakeni-nami hilou hi Yesus , ralampii hante baju-ra , pai' rapopehawi'-i Yesus .
42019036	Kaliu-na Yesus mpohawi' keledai tohe'e , tauna mpokodo baju-ra hi mata ohea , tanda pebila'-ra .
42019037	Mohu'-mi hi ngata Yerusalem , hi pana'ua-na hi bulu' Zaitun , hawe'ea topetuku'-na to wori' toe ntepu'u mpo'une' Alata'ala . Mogora-ra-damo nakeni kagoe' nono-ra sabana hawe'ea anu mekoncehi to rahilo .
42019038	Ra'uli' hi rala pe'une'-ra : Pue' Ala mpogane' Magau' to tumai mpokeni hanga'-na ! " Une'-imi Pue' Ala to hi suruga , apa' nawai'-tamo kalompea' . "
42019039	Ngkai ree , ba hangkuja dua to Parisi to hi olo' tauna to wori' mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Guru , tagi-ramo ana'guru-nu bona neo'-ra mpo'uli' hewa tetu ! "
42019040	Na'uli' Yesus : " Uma-e' ! Apa' ane mengkalino-ra ana'guru-ku , watu toe lau-ramo mpai' to mogora mpo'une'-a . "
42019041	Kamoo-mohua'-imi Yesus hi Yerusalem , duu'-na mpohilo-i ngata toe . Kageo'-nami mpokageoi' ngata toe .
42019042	Na'uli' : " Mpe'ahii'-koi to Yerusalem ! Uma mowo kalompe'-na ane ke ni'inca napa to ngkeni-kokoi kalompea' tuwu' hi eo toe lau . Aga hawe'ea toe teleru ngkai mata-ni .
42019043	Rata mpai' tempo-na , bali'-ni mpanga'ei ngata-ni , ratipuhi ntololikia hante wala , duu'-na uma-pi ria ohea metibo' .
42019044	Raropuhi mpai' ngata-ni hante hawe'ea ihi'-na , duu'-na uma-pi ria watu to bate pomeduncu-na . Apa' uma-koina nisaile' karata-na Pue' Ala doko' mpotulungi-koi . "
42019045	Oti toe , Yesus mesua' hi berewe Tomi Alata'ala pai'-i mpopalai tauna to mobabalu' hi ree .
42019046	Na'uli'-raka : " Hi rala Buku Tomoroli' , Alata'ala mpo'uli' hewa toi : ` Tomi-ku , tomi posampayaa . ' Hiaa' koi'-koina , niponcawa tomi toperampaki-di ! "
42019047	Butu eo-na Yesus metudui' hi Tomi Alata'ala . Imam pangkeni hante guru agama pai' pangkeni to Yahudi ntani'-na mpali' akala-ra doko' mpatehi-i ,
42019048	aga uma ria ohea-ra mpobabehi anu hi nono-ra , apa' lutu-ramo ntodea mpe'epei lolita-na .
42020001	Rala-na ha'eo Yesus metudui' pai' mparata Kareba Lompe' hi wori' tauna hi Tomi Alata'ala . Muu-mule' rata-ramo imam pangkeni hante guru agama pai' pangkeni to Yahudi ntani'-na . Ra'uli' mpo'uli'-ki Yesus :
42020002	" Uli'-kakai pe' ngkaiapa huraa-nu mpobabehi hawe'ea tetu hi Tomi Alata'ala ! Hema to mpowai'-ko kuasa tetu-e ? "
42020003	Na'uli' Yesus : " Aku' , ria wo'o-kuwo pompekunea'-ku hi koi' .
42020004	Uli'-ka pe' , ngkaiapa kuasa-na Yohanes Topeniu' mponiu' tauna ? Ngkai Alata'ala-di , ba ngkai manusia'-di ? "
42020005	Momepololitai-ramo pangkeni to Yahudi toera , ra'uli' : " Beiwa-tale' mpotompoi'-ie ? Ane ta'uli' ngkai Alata'ala kuasa-na , na'uli' mpai' : ` Ane wae , napa pai' uma-i nipangala' ? '
42020006	Hiaa' ane ta'uli' ngkai manusia'-wadi kuasa-na , rawatuhi-ta mpai' ntodea toera lau , apa' hawe'ea-ra mpo'uli' Yohanes hadua nabi . "
42020007	Toe pai' ratompoi' : " Uma ki'incai kangkaiapa kuasa-na . "
42020008	Toe pai' na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Ane wae , uma wo'o-kuwo ku'uli'-kokoi kangkaiapa kuasa-ku mpobabehi toe lau ! "
42020009	Oti toe , Yesus mpololitai ntodea , mpo'uli'-raka lolita rapa' tohe'i : " Ria tau hadua mpohu'ai bonea-na hante anggur , oti toe napewai' bonea-na rapobago hi ba hangkuja dua tauna , pai' hilou-imi hi ngata to molaa , pai' mahae-i tida hi ria .
42020010	Rata-mi tempo mpohopu' wua' anggur , napahawa' hadua batua-na hilou mperapi' bagia-na hi tompodoo bonea-na toera . Tapi' tompodoo bonea-na toera mpopao' suro tetu pai'-i rapopalai mara .
42020011	Oti toe , pue' bonea toei mpopahawa' tena wo'o-pi hadua batua . Aga rapao' wo'o-i-wadi-hawo , ralibui' pai' rapopalai mara .
42020012	Oti toe wo'o , nahubui tena batua katolu-na . Aga raserohi wo'o-i-wadi pai' rapetadi hi mali bonea .
42020013	" Ngkai ree , na'uli'-mi pue' bonea toei : ` Napa-le' to kubabehi-e ? Agina ana'-ku to kupe'ahi' moto lau-mi kupahawa' hilou , apa' bate rapengkorui-ile mpai' . '
42020014	" Ntaa' we'i , karahilo-na tompodoo bonea toera ana' pue' bonea tohe'ei , mohawa'-ramo , ra'uli' : ` Etu-mi tumai ana'-na ! Hi'a mpai' to jadi' pue' bonea tohe'i-e . Kita tapatehi-i bona bonea-na toi kita'-mi pue'-na . '
42020015	Ngkai ree , radii'-imi hilou hi mali bonea pai'-i rapatehi . " Jadi' , napa mpai' to nababehi pue' bonea toei hi tauna to mpodoo bonea-na ?
42020016	Bate tumai-ile mpopatehi-ra , pai' nawai' bonea-na hi tau ntani'-na . " Kara'epe-na ntodea lolita rapa' tohe'e , ra'uli'-mi : " Neo' mpu'u-kona jadi' hewa tetu-e' ! "
42020017	Yesus mponaa-ra pai' na'uli'-raka : " Hiaa' toe-mile batua-na walatu to hi rala Buku Tomoroli' to mpo'uli' : ` Watu to ratadi topowangu tomi , watu toe lau-mi to jadi' poko parawatu . '
42020018	Hewa kura to monawu' hi watu mopengka , hewa kura to napitihi watu moreja' , hewa toe wo'o mpai' tauna to mposapuaka-a . "
42020019	Guru agama pai' imam pangkeni mpo'inca kahira'-na to natoa' Yesus hante lolita rapa'-na toe we'i . Toe pai' ria-mi nono-ra doko' mpohoko'-i hi jaa toe wo'o . Aga uma-ra daho' , apa' mpoka'eka'-ra ntodea .
42020020	Jadi' rapali' loga to lompe' . Mpopahawa'-ra tauna hilou mpolelemata-i . Tauna toera , ntani' hewa tauna to monoa' nono-ra , tapi' patuju-ra mpo'opa kasala' lolita-na , bona rapakilu-i hi gubernur .
42020021	Karata-ra hi Yesus , ra'uli'-mi to rapahawa' toera : " Guru , ki'inca hawe'ea lolita-nu pai' tudui'-nu makono omea . Metudui'-ko hante kalonto'-lonto'-na mpo'uli' napa konoa Pue' Ala hi manusia' , pai' uma-ko mpelence tauna .
42020022	Jadi' , toe pai' kiperapi' bona nu'uli'-kakai Guru : ntuku' atura agama-ta , ba ma'ala moto-ta mpobayari paja' hi Kaisar , ba uma-di ? "
42020023	Yesus mpo'inca pepanawu'-ra . Toe pai' na'uli'-raka :
42020024	" Popohiloi-a ulu doi hampepa' ! Lence hema pai' hanga' hema to hi doi tetu-e ? " Ratompoi' : " Lence pai' hanga' Kaisar . "
42020025	Ngkai ree , na'uli'-mi Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Ane wae-di , wai'-ki Kaisar napa to kasipato'-na rawai'-ki Kaisar , pai' wai'-ki Alata'ala napa to kasipato'-na rawai'-ki Alata'ala . "
42020026	Ka'omea-na madagi-ramo bali' Yesus toera . Uma raruai' nau' hanyalaa sala' lolita-na hi nyanyoa ntodea . Konce-ra mpo'epe tompoi'-na , toe pai' ngkalino-ramo .
42020027	Ba hangkuja dua tauna to mpotuku' tudui' to Saduki rata hi Yesus . To Saduki toera , pangkeni agama Yahudi to ncapuaka tauna to mate tuwu' nculii' hi eo mpeno . Karata to Saduki toera , ra'uli'-ki Yesus :
42020028	" Guru , nabi Musa mpo'uki' hi rala buku atura hewa toi : ane hadua tomane mate hiaa' uma-ki ria ana'-na , pudupuhe-na kana mpotobine balu-na , bona ria-ki-hawo muli tomate toei .
42020029	Jadi' , ria pitu ntali ompi' , paka' tomane . To ulumua' motobinei , mate-i hante uma ria ana'-na .
42020030	Tu'ai-na mpotobine balu-na , aga mate wo'o-i-wadi , ko'ia napoka'alai mo'anai' .
42020031	Wae oa'-mi to jadi' hi katolu-na duu'-na hi kapitu-na . Mate omea-ra hante uma ria ana'-ra .
42020032	Ka'omea-na mate wo'o-imi-hawo tobine toei .
42020033	Jadi' , hi eo mpeno , ane tuwu' nculii' mpu'u-di hawe'ea tomate-e , hema-ramo mpai' pue' tobine toei , apa' pitu-ramo mpotobine-i . "
42020034	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Tauna hi dunia' toi motobinei pai' motomanei .
42020035	Aga tauna to napotuwu' nculii' Pue' Ala pai' to masipato' mporata bagia hi dunia' to bo'u mpai' , uma-rapa-hana motobinei ba motomanei .
42020036	Apa' tuwu'-ra hewa tuwu' mala'eka , uma-rapa mate . Ana' Alata'ala-ramo , apa' napotuwu' nculii'-ramo Alata'ala .
42020037	" Ane katuwu'-ra nculii' tomate-e , nabi Musa moto to mpakanoto katuwu'-ra nculii' . Hi rala jarita julumpu to jela' , Musa mpokahangai' Pue' Ala hewa toi : ` Alata'ala to napue' Abraham , to napue' Ishak , pai' to napue' Yakub . '
42020038	Jadi' , ngkai lolita-na nabi Musa toe , monoto-mi ta'inca katuwu'-ra moto Abraham , Ishak pai' Yakub . Apa' bela tauna to mate to mepue' hi Alata'ala , tauna to tuwu'-hana to mpopue'-i . Apa' hi Alata'ala hawe'ea tauna tuwu' . "
42020039	Oti toe , ba hangkuja dua guru agama mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Lompe' lia petompoi'-nu Guru . "
42020040	Ngkai ree , uma-rapa daho' mepekune' ba napa-napa hi Yesus .
42020041	Ngkai ree , mepekune' wo'o-imi-hawo Yesus mpo'uli'-raka guru agama toera : " Beiwa pai' ra'uli' Magau' Topetolo' muli-na Magau' Daud ?
42020042	Hiaa' bo Daud moto-hawo mpokahangai'-i Pue'-na . Hi rala Buku Rona' na'uli' : Pue' Ala mpo'uli'-ki Pue'-ku : ` Mohura-moko hi mali ngka'ana-ku duu'-na kupopengkoru hawe'ea bali'-nu hi Iko . '
42020043	
42020044	
42020045	Bula tauna mpe'epei lolita-na Yesus toe we'i , napololitai ana'guru-na , na'uli' :
42020046	" Pelompehi-koi , neo'-koi mpenau' kehi-ra guru agama . Apa' goe'-ra modao' mpopake' baju to moloe , goe'-ra ane tauna hi wiwi' karajaa motingkua' mpotabe-ra . Goe'-ra rapopohura hi pohuraa karabilaa' hi tomi posampayaa , goe'-ra ane rapopohura-ra hi pohuraa to lompe' hi posusaa' .
42020047	Mpobagiu-ra tobine tobalu pai' rahagoi tomi-ra . Pai'-ra mpowunii' kadada'a gau'-ra tohe'e hante mosampaya rapomoloe-loe . Huku'-ra motomo lia mpai' . "
42021001	Hi rala Tomi Alata'ala , Yesus mpohilo topo'ua' mpopuna' doi hi rala peti' pompunaa' doi pepue' .
42021002	Mpohilo wo'o-i hadua tobalu to mpe'ahii' tuwu'-na mpopuna' rompepa' doi ngkala .
42021003	Na'uli' Yesus : " Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : tobalu to mpe'ahii' tuwu'-na tohe'e mai , meliu pewai'-na ngkai pewai' hawe'ea tauna toera lau .
42021004	Apa' hira' mewai' ngkai labi ka'uaa'-ra . Tapi' tobine toei , nau' hewa apa-mi kampe'ahii'-na , napewai' omea-mi-hana to ria hi hi'a , to naparaluu-hawo hi katuwu'-na . "
42021005	Nto'u toe , ria tauna mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Lompe' lia Tomi Alata'ala toi , apa' rawangu hante watu to ncola pai' rarampai hante rewa to rapopepue' hi Pue' Ala . " Toe pai' na'uli' Yesus :
42021006	" Rata mpai' tempo-na hawe'ea to nihilo toe lau ragero , uma-pi mpai' ria hamehaa' watu to bate pomeduncu-na . "
42021007	Ngkai ree , mepekune'-ra ana'guru-na mpekune'-i : " Guru , nto'uma mpai' kadupa'-na to nu'uli' toe-e we'i ? Pai' napa mpai' to jadi' tanda ane neo' madupa'-pi ? "
42021008	Na'uli' Yesus : " Pelompehi , neo'-koi ma'ala rabagiu . Apa' wori' mpai' tauna to mehupa' to mpo'uli' kahira'-na Magau' Topetolo' . Ria wo'o to mpo'uli' karata-na mpu'u Eo Kiama . Aga neo' nituku'-ra .
42021009	Neo' wo'o-koi me'eka' mpo'epe kareba to mpo'uli' wori' tauna manga'e pai' mpo'ewa topoparenta . Apa' hawe'ea tohe'e kana jadi' mperi'ulu . Tapi' ko'ia-hawo rata mpu'u-mi kahudua dunia' . "
42021010	Ngkai ree , Yesus mpokaliliu lolita-na , na'uli' : " Hi eo toe mpai' , wori' ngata mosipanga'ei , magau' hadua mpo'ewa magau' kahadua-na .
42021011	Ria mpai' linu bohe , pai' hiapa-apa ria haki' ropu' pai' oro' . Pai' hi langi' ria tanda bohe to mewulungahi .
42021012	Aga kako'ia-na hawe'ea toe jadi' , koi' mpai' rahoko' pai' rabalinai' . Rapakilu-koi hi rala tomi posampayaa , pai'-koi ratarungku' . Rabua'-koi hi magau' pai' hi topoparenta sabana petuku'-ni hi Aku' .
42021013	Nto'u toe mpai' , ria loga-ni mpo'uli'-raka pepangala'-ni hi Aku' .
42021014	Pakaroho ami'-mi nono-ni , neo'-koi mingki' mpekiri ncala' ba beiwa mpai' tompoi'-ni .
42021015	Aku' moto-damo mpai' to mpowai'-koi petompoi' to monoto , alaa-na uma ria haduaa ngkai bali'-ni to mpokule' mpobaro ba mposapuaka napa to ni'uli' .
42021016	Nto'u toe mpai' , hawe'ea tauna mpokahuku'-koi sabana petuku'-ni hi Aku' . Ntahawe' totu'a-ni , ompi'-ni , posantina-ni , pai' ema'-ni mpewai'-koi hi bali'-ni . Hantongo'-koi mpai' rapatehi .
42021017	
42021018	Aga kakoo-kono-na uma moto-koi moapa . Nau' hangkaho wuluwoo'-ni uma mpai' ria to moronto .
42021019	Ane uma mogego' pepangala'-ni hi Aku' , bate mporata-koi katuwua' to lompe' .
42021020	" Ane nihilo-damo ngata Yerusalem toi ratipuhi tantara bali' , ni'inca-mi ka'uma-napi mahae Yerusalem ragero .
42021021	Nto'u toe mpai' , tauna to mo'oha' hi Yudea , agina metibo'-ra hilou hi bulu'-na . Tauna to hi rala ngata agina metibo' ngkai rala ngata . Pai' tauna to hi mali ngata neo'-pi leba' mesua' hi rala ngata .
42021022	Apa' tempo toe mpai' , tempo pehukua' Alata'ala , bona madupa'-mi hawe'ea to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' .
42021023	Mpe'ahii'-ra mpai' tobine to nto'u-ra motina'i pai' to mpentii' ana'-ra hi tempo toe , apa' mokoro petibo'-ra . Apa' ngata toi narumpa' silaka bohe , pai' Pue' Ala mpohuku' pue' ngata .
42021024	Ria-ra mpai' to jadi' konia' piho' . Ria-ra to ratawani pai' rapatau' hi humalili' dunia' . Pai' ngata Yerusalem toi ralisa tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi , duu'-na hudu tempo to napakatantu-raka Pue' Ala .
42021025	" Nto'u toe mpai' , ria tanda hi eo , hi wula pai' hi betue' . Hawe'ea manusia' mokaratu nono-ra pai' ingu' mpo'epe pomoni pai' pojago tahi' .
42021026	Ria mpai' tauna to mate ngkokore nakeni kawulunga-ra , mpohilo to jadi' hi humalili' dunia' . Apa' hawe'ea anu to mobaraka' hi langi' ralengo .
42021027	Nto'u toe-damo mpai' , hawe'ea tauna mpohilo-a , Aku' Ana' Manusia' , mana'u tumai hi rala limu' . Uma mowo pehini-ku pai' kabaraka'-ku nto'u toe .
42021028	Ane hawe'ea toe ntepu'u majadi' , pakaroho-mi nono-ni pai' mengoa'-mokoi , apa' neo' rata-mi tempo-na rabahaka-koi ngkai kaparia-ni . "
42021029	Yesus mpololitai ana'guru-na hante lolita rapa' tohe'i , na'uli' : " Petonoi-koi kaju ara pai' kaju-kaju ntani'-na wo'o .
42021030	Ane nihilo-damo mela'-mi rau-na , ni'inca-mi ka'uma-napi mahae mara eo .
42021031	Wae wo'o ane nihilo-damo kajadia' toe we'i lou , ni'inca-mi ka'uma-napi mahae Alata'ala jadi' Magau' mpu'u-mi hi dunia' .
42021032	" Mpu'u ku'uli'-kokoi : hawe'ea toe we'i bate madupa' kako'ia-na mate omea tauna to tuwu' tempo toi .
42021033	Langi' pai' dunia' mogero moto mpai' . Tapi' lolita-ku bate-bate-na duu' kahae-hae-na .
42021034	" Mo'inga'-inga'-koi , neo'-koi sese' ntora mosusa' pai' nginu palangu-langu , ba ntora mpenonoi katuwu'-ni hi dunia' , alaa-na lempe' moto-koi hi eo karata-ku . Apa' rata ncorobaa-a mpai' .
42021035	Karata-ku mpai' mporumpa' hawe'ea tauna hi dunia' hewa tewo' mpowoko' wulehu' .
42021036	Mo'inga'-inga'-koi pai' tida mekakae hi Pue' Ala , bona moroho-koi ntaha hawe'ea kaparia to neo' jadi' toe , duu'-na mpohirua'-ka Aku' Ana' Manusia' . "
42021037	Hi eo-na , Yesus metudui' hi Tomi Alata'ala . Hi bengi-na , hilou-i hi mali ngata Yerusalem , pai'-i turu hi Bulu' Zaitun .
42021038	Butu mepulo-na ntodea morumpu hi Tomi Alata'ala doko' mpo'epe tudui'-na .
42022001	Mohu'-mi eo bohe to Yahudi to rahanga' Posusa' Roti to Uma Raragii , to rahanga' wo'o Eo Paskah .
42022002	Nto'u toe , imam pangkeni pai' guru agama mpali' ohea-ra ke mpatehi bongo Yesus , apa' me'eka'-ra mpoka'eka' ntodea .
42022003	Ngkai ree , Magau' Anudaa' mesua' hi rala nono Yudas , to rahanga' wo'o Iskariot , hadua ngkai ana'guru-na Yesus to hampulu' rodua .
42022004	Toe pai' hilou-imi mpololitai imam pangkeni hante kapala' polisi Tomi Alata'ala , ba beiwa akala-na mpobalu' Yesus hi hira' .
42022005	Goe'-ramo mpo'epe lolita Yudas toe , ra'uli'-ki : " Ane nutonu Yesus hi kai' , kiwai'-ko doi . "
42022006	Na'io'-mi Yudas , pai' ngkai ree napali' loga to lompe' mpobalu' Yesus hi bali'-na hante uma ra'incai ntodea .
42022007	Rata-mi tempo-na Posusa' Roti to Uma Raragii . Pai' eo to lomo'-na hi rala posusa' tohe'e , eo posumalea' bima to rakoni' hi Eo Paskah .
42022008	Yesus mpohubui Petrus pai' Yohanes , na'uli'-raka : " Hilou-mokoi mporodo-taka pongkoni' Paskah-ta . "
42022009	Rapekune'-i : " Hiapa Pue' nupokono kipomporodoi-e ? "
42022010	Na'uli'-raka : " Ane mesua'-koi mpai' hi rala ngata , hirua'-koi hante hadua tomane to ngkeni pontomua' oti ntomu' . Tuku'-i rata hi tomi pesuaa'-na .
42022011	Rata hi tomi pesuaa'-na , uli'-ki pue' tomi hewa toi : ` Na'uli' Guru : Hiapa-kuwo pobabehia-ku Posusa' Paskah hante ana'guru-ku ? '
42022012	Pue' tomi toei mpai' mpotudo'-kokoi hameha' kamar to bohe hi lolo-na . Kamar toe teporodo ami'-mi , hono'-mi rewa-na . Hi retu-mi mpai' niporodo pongkoni' Paskah-ta . "
42022013	Hilou mpu'u-ramo Petrus pai' Yohanes , pai' rarata mpu'u-mi hewa to na'uli'-raka Yesus , pai'-ra mporodo-mi pongkoni' Paskah .
42022014	Karata-na mpu'u-mi tempo ngkoni' pongkoni' Paskah tohe'e , mohura-imi Yesus hante suro-na hi tomi toe .
42022015	Na'uli'-raka : " Doko' lia-a ngkoni' dohe-ni hi Eo Paskah toi , kako'ia-ku mporata kaparia .
42022016	Apa' bona ni'inca : uma-apa ngkoni' pongkoni' Paskah to hewa toi , duu'-na madupa' mpu'u-mi batua-na posusa' toi nto'u Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia' . "
42022017	Oti toe , Yesus mpo'ala' sangkiri' to ihia' anggur , na'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala , pai' na'uli'-raka ana'guru-na : " Ala'-mi tohe'i pai' nibagi-bagi .
42022018	Apa' bona ni'inca : ntepu'u ngkai wae lau , uma-apa nginu anggur duu'-na rata mpu'u-mi tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia' . "
42022019	Oti toe , na'ala'-mi roti , pai' ka'oti-nai mpo'uli' tarima kasi hi Pue' Ala , napihe-pihe pai' natonu-miraka , na'uli' : " Roti to kutonu-kokoi toi , toi-mi woto-ku ( ( to kutonu mpotolo'-koi . Babehi-mokoi ada toi bona mpokiwoi-a . "
42022020	Wae wo'o , ka'oti-ra ngkoni' , na'ala' sangkiri' to ihia' anggur pai' na'uli'-raka : " Ihi' sangkiri' toi mpobatuai pojanci Alata'ala to bo'u , to mpoposidai' Alata'ala pai' manusia' . Pojanci toe , rapadupa' hante raa'-ku , to rabowo mpai' ane mate-a mpotolo'-koi . ) )
42022021	" Aga hilo pe' , tauna to mpobalu'-a mpai' , ria-imi hi rehe'i lau , ngkoni' dohe-ku toi-e !
42022022	Aku' Ana' Manusia' bate kana mate hewa to napakatantu Alata'ala . Aga mpe'ahii' tauna to mpobalu'-a tetui ! "
42022023	Kara'epe-na ana'guru-na toe , momepekune'-ramo ba hema-ra mpai' to mpobabehi hewa toe .
42022024	Ngkai ree , momehono'-ramo ana'guru-na Yesus , ba hema-ra to meliu kabohe pangka'-ra .
42022025	Toe pai' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Ane hi tauna to uma mpo'incai Alata'ala , uma mowo kasoa-na magau' mpohawai' ntodea . Pai' tauna to bohe pangka'-ra doko' rahanga' ` to mpotiroi ntodea . '
42022026	Aga koi' , neo' hewa tetu ! Timali-na lau-di . Hema-koi to meliu kabohe pangka'-na kana mo'ingku hewa to kedi' lia tuwu'-na . Pai' tauna to mehawai' kana mo'ingku hewa hadua pahawaa' .
42022027	Kupekune'-koi ulu : hema to meliu kabohe pangka'-na ? To mohura ngkoni'-di , ba to metonui-di ? Tantu tauna to mohura . Hiaa' ohe'i-a hi laintongo'-ni hewa tauna to mpotonui-koi .
42022028	" Koi' tohe'i-e lau , ria oa'-koi dohe-ku hi rala hawe'ea kasusaa'-ku .
42022029	Jadi' , hewa Tuama-ku mpowai'-a kuasa moparenta , wae wo'o Aku' mpowai'-koi kuasa moparenta .
42022030	Toe pai' goe' wo'o-ko-koiwo mpai' ngkoni' pai' nginu dohe-ku hi rala Kamagaua'-ku ane jadi' Magau'-apa mpai' . Pai' mohura moto-koi mpai' hi pohuraa to hampulu' romeha' , mpoparentai to Israel to hampulu' rontina . "
42022031	Oti toe , Pue' Yesus mpololitai Simon Petrus , na'uli' : " Ee' , Simon ! Epe : Magau' Anudaa' rawai' loga mposori-koi omea . Hewa pae to ratapi , hewa toe wo'o mpai' kagaga-na pesori to mporumpa'-koi .
42022032	Aga kuposampayai ami'-moko Simon , bona neo' lelu' pepangala'-nu . Jadi' , ane monoto nculii' mpai' nono-nu , iko kana mporohoi nono doo-nu . "
42022033	Na'uli' Petrus : " Pue' , nau' ratarungku'-a mpai' ba paiana rapatehi-a dohe-nu , sadia moto-a mpotuku'-ko ! "
42022034	Na'uli' Yesus : " Petrus , bona nu'inca : kako'ia-na turua' manu' bengi toe mpai' lau , mpolia' tolu ngkani-moko mposapu kanu'inca-ku . "
42022035	Oti toe Yesus mpololitai-ra , na'uli' : " Nto'u kakuhubui-ni wengi hilou ngkeni Kareba Lompe' , uma-koi kupiliu mpokeni karepe' doi ba boku ba sapatu' . Ha ria-mokoi nakakurai' ba napa-napa-e ? "
42022036	Ratompoi' : " Uma-hawo . " Na'uli' Yesus : " Aga hewa toe lau , hema-koi to ria doi-ni ba boku-ni kana nikeni . Pai' hema-koi to uma ria piho'-ni , pobalu' baju-ni nipope'oli piho' .
42022037	Apa' ria lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpo'uli' : ` Magau' Topetolo' mpai' rapohewa tauna to dada'a . ' Pai' napa to te'uki' toe kana madupa' hi Aku' . Apa' napa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' to mpolowa-a , neo' madupa' mpu'u-mi wae lau . "
42022038	Ra'uli' ana'guru-na : " Pue' , ohe'i moto piho' romata . " Na'uli' Yesus : " Wae-mi . "
42022039	Oti toe , malai-imi Yesus ngkai rala ngata , pai' hewa kabiasaa-na hilou-imi hi Bulu' Zaitun , pai' ana'guru-na hilou wo'o dohe-na .
42022040	Karata-ra hi ria , na'uli' mpo'uli'-raka : " Mosampaya-mokoi bona neo'-koi mporata pesori . "
42022041	Oti toe , pai' hilou-i molaa hala' ngkai hira' , pai'-i mowilingkudu mosampaya .
42022042	Na'uli' : " Tuama-ku , ane dota-ko , wi'iha-ka-kuwo kaparia to neo' mporumpa'-a tohe'i . Aga bela konoa-ku Aku' to jadi' , agina konoa-nu Iko moto . " ( (
42022043	Ngkai ree , mehupa'-mi hadua mala'eka ngkai suruga mporohoi-i .
42022044	Hangkedi' kanahuduwukui-na mosampaya , apa' pepa mpu'u na'epe . Ini'-na tudo' hi tana' hewa raa' . ) )
42022045	Oti mosampaya , mokore-imi hilou nculii' hi ana'guru-na . Narata-ra bula-ra leta' , nakeni kasusa' nono-ra .
42022046	Na'uli'-raka : " Napa-di pai' leta'-koie ! Memata-mokoi pai' mosampaya bona neo'-koi mporata pesori . "
42022047	Bula-na Yesus mololita-pidi , muu-mule' rata-mi tauna hampodooa . Yudas , hadua ngkai ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua , hi'a-mi to mpakeni-ra . Karata-ra hi ree , hilou-imi Yudas mpomohui' Yesus , doko' natabe-i hante me'eki ntuku' ada-ra to Yahudi .
42022048	Aga Yesus mpo'uli'-ki : " Ee' Yudas , ha hante petabe-nu tetu-tanoe nupobalu'-a , Aku' Ana' Manusia'-e ! "
42022049	Karahilo-na ana'guru-na napa to neo' jadi' , ra'uli' : " Pue' , ki'ewa-ramo hante piho' ! "
42022050	Ngkai ree , hadua ngkai ana'guru-na mpotime batua Imam Bohe , bela mpoholu tilinga ka'ana-na .
42022051	Na'uli' Yesus : " Neo'-pi ! " Pai' najama tilinga-na napaka'uri'-ki .
42022052	Oti toe , Yesus mpololitai-ra imam pangkeni pai' polisi Tomi Alata'ala hante pangkeni to Yahudi to tumai mpohoko'-i . Na'uli'-raka : " Ha toperampaki-a toi-e , pai' mingki' tumai-koi ntali piho' pai' sumampu-e !
42022053	Butu eo-na ria lalau-a dohe-ni hi Tomi Alata'ala , tapi' uma-koi hema to dungku pale-ni hi Aku' nto'u toe . Tempo mobengi-damo pai' lako' daho'-koi mpohoko'-a . Toi-mi tempo-ni koi' , pai' tempo-na magau' kabengia ! "
42022054	Ngkai ree , rahoko' mpu'u-imi , pai'-i rakeni hilou hi tomi Imam Bohe . Petrus metuku' ngkawao-wadi .
42022055	Hi laintongo' berewe , rapobaa apu raponerui , pai' Petrus hilou wo'o-hawo mohura dohe-ra mpotololiki apu .
42022056	Hadua tobine topobago hi tomi Imam Bohe mpohilo Petrus bula-na moneru . Napelence pai' na'uli' : " Tau tetui , hadua doo-na Yesus ! "
42022057	Nasapu Petrus , na'uli' : " Uma-kuna ku'incai-i ! "
42022058	Uma mahae ngkai ree , kahadua-na mpohilo Petrus pai' na'uli'-ki : " Iko wo'o-mi hadua doo-ra ngone ! " Na'uli' wo'o Petrus : " Uma ! Bela aku' . "
42022059	Ba ria hajaa ngkai ree , hadua wo'o-mi mpo'uli' : " Bate hi'a mpu'u-di doo-nae , apa' to Galilea wo'o-i-hawo ! "
42022060	Na'uli' Petrus : " Napa to nu'uli' tetu , uma-kuna ku'incai ! " Bula-na Petrus mololita-pidi , turua'-mi manu' ,
42022061	pai' Pue' me'ili' mponaa-i . Ngkai ree , nakiwoi-mi lolita-na Pue' to mpo'uli'-ki : " Kako'ia-na turua' manu' bengi mpai' , mpolia' tolu ngkani-moko mposapu kanu'inca-ku . "
42022062	Palai-nami Petrus hilou hi mali-na , pai'-i geo' ngkai kapeda' nono-na .
42022063	Tauna to mpodongo Yesus mpopo'ore'-i pai' mpohopo'-i .
42022064	Raputu' lio-na bona neo'-i pehilo , pai'-i rapekune' : " Ee nabi ! Pe'uli' pe' ba hema to mpohopo'-koe ! "
42022065	Wori' wo'o-pidi lolita peruge'-ra mporuge'-i .
42022066	Kamobaja-na , hawe'ea imam pangkeni pai' guru agama hante pangkeni to Yahudi ntani'-na moromu , pai' Yesus rakeni hi nyanyoa-ra .
42022067	Ra'uli' topohura toera mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Uli'-kakai hi rehe'i , ha Iko mpu'u-mi Magau' Topetolo'-e ? " Na'uli' Yesus : " Nau' ku'uli'-kokoi , bate uma-le nipangalai'-e .
42022068	Pai' ane Aku' mepekune' hi koi' , bate uma-le nitompoi'-ae .
42022069	Aga ngkai wae-e lau , Aku' Ana' Manusia' mohura pai' moparenta hi mali ngka'ana Alata'ala to Mobaraka' . "
42022070	Ra'uli' wo'o-mi topohura toera : " Ane wae-di , Ana' Alata'ala mpu'u-ko ? " Na'uli' Yesus : " Wae mpu'u-di , hewa to ni'uli' tetu-e . "
42022071	Ngkai ree , ra'uli'-mi : " Uma-pi mingki' ria sabi' ! Ta'epe moto-mi ngkai wiwi-na kasalaa'-na ! "
42023001	Oti toe , mokore-ramo hawe'ea topohura toera pai' Yesus rakeni hilou hi Gubernur Pilatus .
42023002	Karata-ra hi ria , rapakilu-imi , ra'uli' : " Tau toii kirata bula-na mpopanawu' ntodea ! Na'uli'-raka neo' mpobayari paja' hi Kaisar . Pai' na'uli' wo'o , Hi'a-mi Kristus , hadua magau' . "
42023003	Jadi' , mepekune' Pilatus hi Yesus : " Ha Iko mpu'u-mi Magau' to Yahudi-e ? " Na'uli' Yesus : " Wae mpu'u , hewa to nu'uli' tetu-e . "
42023004	Ngkai ree , na'uli' Pilatus hi imam pangkeni pai' hi ntodea : " Uma-kuna kuruai' sala'-na tau toii . "
42023005	Tapi' rajojo lau-mi mpo'uli' : " Na'ukei' ntodea hante tudui'-na , hobo' hi tana' to Yahudi . Lomo'-na hi Galilea-i , hiaa' wae lau rata-imi hi rehe'i . "
42023006	Kana'epe-na Pilatus tohe'e , mepekune'-i : " Ha to Galilea-i ? "
42023007	Ratompoi' : " Io' , to Galilea-i-hawo . " Mpo'epe toe , Pilatus mpohubui tauna mpokeni Yesus hilou hi Magau' Herodes , apa' Herodes toei topoparenta hi tana' Galilea . Pai' nto'u toe , hi Yerusalem wo'o-i-hawo Herodes .
42023008	Goe' lia-imi Herodes mpohilo Yesus , apa' mahae-imi mpo'epe tauna mpotompo'wiwi-i , pai' doko' nahilo-i . Nasarumaka , Yesus mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi bona nahilo .
42023009	Toe pai' wori' pompekunea'-na hi Yesus , aga Yesus uma winihi .
42023010	Imam pangkeni pai' guru agama ria wo'o-ra hi ree , karapo'-damo lolita-ra mpopakilu Yesus hi Herodes .
42023011	Oti toe , Herodes hante tantara-na mpopo'ore' pai' mporuge' Yesus . Raheai-i hante pohea magau' , pai' rakeni nculii'-i hilou hi Pilatus .
42023012	Hi eo tohe'e momekalompei'-ramo Herodes pai' Pilatus , hiaa' ri'ulu mosisala-ra .
42023013	Ngkai ree , Pilatus mporumpu hawe'ea imam pangkeni pai' totu'a ngata hante ntodea ,
42023014	pai' na'uli'-raka : " Tau toii nikeni tumai , ni'uli' mpopanawu'-i ntodea . Kuparesa'-imi hi nyanyoa-ni omea , aga uma ria kuruai' hanyalaa gau'-na to dada'a hewa to nipakilu-ki .
42023015	Wae wo'o-hawo pomporata-na Herodes , apa' napoponculi'-imi hi aku' . Tau toii , uma-i mpobabehi ba napa-napa to masipato' rahuku' mate-ki .
42023016	Jadi' , kuweba'-i-wadi pai' kubahaka-i . " ( (
42023017	Pilatus mpo'uli' hewa toe , apa' biasa-na butu Eo Paskah kana nabahaka hadua tauna to ratarungku' , bona mpo'ala' nono ntodea . Toe pai' na'uli' : " Kuweba'-i-wadi pai' kubahaka-i . " ) )
42023018	Mpo'epe toe , mogora-ramo ntodea mpo'uli' : " Patehi-imi ! Bahaka-kakai Barabas ! "
42023019	Barabas toe ratarungku' sabana pe'ewa-na hi topoparenta hi rala ngata pai' topepatehi wo'o-i .
42023020	Jadi' , apa' Pilatus doko' mpobahaka Yesus , toe pai' mololita tena-i hi ntodea .
42023021	Aga rajojo lau-mi mogora , ra'uli' : " Parika'-i ! Parika'-i ! "
42023022	Nakatolu-ngkanii Pilatus mpo'uli'-raka : " Hiaa' napa-mile sala'-nae ? Uma ria kuruai' nau' hanyalaa sala'-na to masipato' rahuku' mate-ki . Kuweba'-i-wadi pai' kubahaka . "
42023023	Aga rahudukulei' lau-mi merapi' bona Yesus raparika' . Ka'omea-na medagi mpu'u-ramo .
42023024	Napomonoa'-mi Pilatus bona Yesus rahuku' mate , ntuku' pomperapia'-ra .
42023025	Pai' napomonoa' wo'o mpobahaka-raka tauna to raperapi' , to ratarungku' sabana pe'ewa-na pai' pepatehi-na . Yesus ratonu hi tantara to Roma bona rapatehi ntuku' konoa-ra to Yahudi .
42023026	Ngkai ree , rakeni-imi Yesus hilou hi mali ngata , pai' hi lengko ohea hirua'-ra hante hadua tauna to rahanga' Simon to Kirene . Hi'a tohe'ei , lako' rata hi ngata . Tantara to Roma mpentoe Simon , rapewuku-i mpaha'a kaju parika' hilou dohe-ra mpotuku' Yesus .
42023027	Bula-na Yesus rakeni hilou hi mali ngata , wori' tauna to metuku' . Ria wo'o-ra ba hangkuja dua tobine to metuku' . Tobine toera mpokageoi' pai' mpotantangii'-i .
42023028	Yesus mpewili'-ra pai' na'uli'-raka : " Ee tobine to Yerusalem , neo'-a nikageoi' . Agina woto-ni moto pai' ana'-ni nikageoi' .
42023029	Apa' rata mpai' tempo-na tauna mpo'uli' : ` Marasi' lau-ramo tobine to lalo , to uma hangkania mo'ana' , pai' to uma hangkania mpentii' ana' ! '
42023030	Nto'u toe mpai' , tauna mpololitai bulu' hewa toi : ` Duruhi-makai bulu' ! Lulihi-makai watu ! '
42023031	Apa' ane Aku' , to uma ria sala'-ku , rapohewa toe , peliu-liu-nami mpai' koi' . "
42023032	Nto'u Yesus rakeni hilou raparika' toe , ria wo'o rodua tau ntani'-na to rakeni hilou dohe-na bona rapatehi . To rodua toe , paka' to dada'a gau'-ra .
42023033	Karata-ra hi po'ohaa' to rahanga' Bulu' Banga'woo' , raparika'-imi Yesus . Pai' to rodua to dada'a gau'-ra toera , raparika' wo'o-ramo-rawo , hadua hi mali ka'ana-na hadua mali ki'ii-na .
42023034	Yesus mosampaya , na'uli' : " Tuama-ku , ampungi-ra-rawo , apa' uma ra'incai napa to rababehi . " Tantara to mpoparika' Yesus mpotene' undi hewa pompenoa'-ra , ba hema-ra to mporata pohea-na .
42023035	Wori' tauna tumai mokore hilau merono . Wae wo'o pangkeni to Yahudi mpopo'ore'-i , ra'uli' : " Tau ntani'-na natulungi-ramo . Agina woto-na moto-pi natulungi , ane makono Kahi'a-na Magau' Topetolo' to napelihi Alata'ala-e ! "
42023036	Tantara-tantara wo'o mpopo'ore'-i . Ramohui'-i pai' rapopo'inui-i anggur to mo'onco ,
42023037	pai' ra'uli' : " Ane Magau' to Yahudi mpu'u-ko , wae-pi tulungi moto-mi-kowo woto-nu ! "
42023038	Hi kaju parika'-na Yesus hi ntoto woo'-na ria ukia' hewa toi : TOI-MI MAGAU' TO YAHUDI .
42023039	Hadua todada'a to raparika' dohe-na Yesus , mpolibui' Yesus , na'uli' : " Nu'uli'-kona Iko Magau' Topetolo'-e ! Ane bongko wae , tulungi-mi woto-nu pai' kai' wo'o-kaiwo ! "
42023040	Aga to hadua-i-hana mpotanee' doo-na , na'uli'-ki : " Ha uma-ko me'eka'-e ? Uma-ko mengkoru hi Alata'ala-e ? Rahuku' mate omea-ta toi-e .
42023041	Aga huku'-ta kita' rodua , toto-na-tana ntuku' kadada'a gau'-ta . Hiaa' Hi'a-hana , uma ria sala'-na . "
42023042	Oti toe , pai'-i mpololitai Yesus , na'uli' : " Yesus , kiwoi-a-kuwo , ane rata-poko mpai' jadi' Magau' ! "
42023043	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki : " Mpu'u ku'uli'-koko : eo toe mpai' lau , ria-ko dohe-ku hi Firdaus . "
42023044	Tebua'-mi eo , muu-mule' uma-pi mehini eo . Hangaa mobengi-mi hobo' hi ngata toe , duu' rata jaa tolu .
42023045	Kain porini-olo' to tetoe hi rala Tomi Alata'ala , mobika' ntongo' jadi' rontau .
42023046	Oti toe , me'au-imi Yesus napesukui mpo'uli' : " Tuama-ku , hi rala pale-nu kutonu-mi kao'-ku ! " Ka'oti-na mololita hewa toe , modupe'-mi inoha'-na .
42023047	Kanahilo-na tadulako tantara napa to jadi' toe , mpo'une' Alata'ala-imi , na'uli' : " Makono mpu'u-tawo ! Hi'a he'e tauna to monoa' ! "
42023048	Hawe'ea tauna to morumpu merono , karahilo-na napa to jadi' toe , nculii'-ramo hilou hi tomi-ra , pai' halengko ohea mporera'-rera' hunamu-ra .
42023049	Ane hawe'ea pome'inca-na Yesus hante tobine-tobine to mpotuku'-i ngkai Galilea , mokore molaa-ra mpohilo hawe'ea to jadi' toe .
42023050	Ria hadua tomane to rahanga' Yusuf to ngkai ngata Arimatea hi tana' Yudea . Yusuf toei , tauna to lompe' pai' monoa' ingku-na , pai' to mpopea wo'o tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia' . Nau'-i hadua topohura hi Polibua' Bohe Agama to Yahudi , aga uma napokonoi hawa' pai' kabotu'-ra to mpo'uli' Yesus kana rapatehi .
42023051	
42023052	Yusuf toei hilou hi Gubernur Pilatus mperapi' woto-na Yesus .
42023053	Napopana'u-mi woto Yesus ngkai kaju parika'-na , naputu' hante kain to bula , pai' napopoturu hi rala daeo' to ralonga' hi panapa bulu' . Daeo' toe bo'u-pidi , ko'ia hangkania rapotanai .
42023054	Eo toe , eo pomporodoa , pai' ntuku' ada to Yahudi ntepu'u ncimonou' toe rapalii' mobago , apa' ntepu'u-mi eo pepuea' .
42023055	Toe pai' tobine to mpodohei Yesus ngkai Galilea mpotuku' Yusuf hilou hi daeo' toe . Rahilo beiwa woto Yesus ratu'u hi rala daeo' .
42023056	Oti toe , nculii'-ramo hilou hi ngata , mporodo rampa-rampa hante lana honga bona ragelai'-ki woto Yesus . Oti toe , hi eo pepuea' rapento'oi-mi mobago ntuku' Atura Musa .
42024001	Eo Mingku mepupulo ngkii , tobine toera hilou hi daeo' mpokeni anu mohonga to oti-mi raporodo .
42024002	Rata hi ria , rahilo-rawo watu po'unca-na tederu'-mi .
42024003	Pesua'-rami hi rala daeo' , aga uma raruai' woto-na Pue' Yesus .
42024004	Bula-ra mokore nakeni ka'ingu'-ra , muu-mule' mehupa' rodua tomane to moheai meringkila' mokore hi ncori-ra .
42024005	Wulunga-ramo tobine toera , pai'-ra motumpa hi tana' . Ra'uli' to rodua toera mpo'uli'-raka : " Napa pai' nipali' tauna to tuwu' hi olo' tomate ?
42024006	Uma-ipi ria hi rehe'i . Tuwu' nculii'-imi ! Kiwoi-dile napa to na'uli'-kokoi wengi hi Galilea-e .
42024007	Na'uli' : Ana' Manusia' kana ratonu hi tauna to dada'a bona raparika' , aga hi eo katolu-na tuwu' nculii'-i . "
42024008	Ngkai ree , rakiwoi mpu'u-mi lolita Yesus .
42024009	Ponculi'-rami ngkai daeo' , pai' ratutura hawe'ea to jadi' toe hi ana'guru Yesus to hampulu' hadua pai' hi hawe'ea topetuku' ntani'-na .
42024010	Tobine toera , hira' Maria Magdalena , Yohana , pai' Maria tina Yakobus , pai' tobine ntani'-na to dohe-ra . Ratutura hawe'ea to jadi' toe hi suro Yesus .
42024011	Aga suro toera uma mpangalai' lolita-ra , ra'uli' lolita to ratamangko-wadi .
42024012	Hiaa' Petrus-hana , pokeno-nami hilou hi daeo' . Pengkabungku'-nami mpelongi' hi rala-na , nahilo muntu' hompu'-na-damo to hi ree . Oti toe , nculii'-imi hilou hi tomi-na , pai' ntora mokanono mpenonoi napa to jadi' tohe'e .
42024013	Hi eo toe wo'o , rodua topetuku' Yesus mako' hilou hi ngata Emaus , kalaa-na kira-kira hampulu' hakilo ngkai Yerusalem .
42024014	Bula-ra momako' toe , ntora mololita-ra , mpololita hawe'ea to lako' jadi' .
42024015	Bula-ra mololita pai' momepekune' , muu-mule' rata-imi Yesus mpomohui'-ra pai' mako' dohe-ra .
42024016	Pehilo moto-ra , aga ria anu to mpohilingai'-ra , alaa-na uma ra'incai Kayesus-na .
42024017	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Napa-die to ntora nilolita ngkalako'-e ? " Mentoda'-ra hante lence to monto' .
42024018	To hadua , to rahanga' Kleopas , mpekune' Yesus , na'uli' : " Ha lako' rata-ko-tanoe hi Yerusalem-e , pai' uma-di nu'incai napa to jadi' ba hangkuja eo to liu toi-e ? "
42024019	Na'uli' Yesus : " Napa-die ? " Hampetompoi'-ra : " To jadi' hi Yesus to Nazaret-le ! Hi'a nabi to mobaraka' hi pobago-na pai' pololita-na , lompe' hi poncilo Alata'ala pai' hi poncilo ntodea .
42024020	Imam pangkeni pai' totu'a ngata-ta mpotonu-i hi topoparenta bona rahuku' mate . Oti toe , raparika' mpu'u-i .
42024021	Hiaa' haru'-mi-kaina nono-kai , apa' ki'uli' Hi'a-mi mpai' to mpobahaka-ta to Israel ngkai bali'-ta . Eo toe lau , eo katolu-nami ngkai karapatehia-na .
42024022	Hiaa' toe-e , ba hangkuja dua tobine doo-kai mpolahoi ta'i-kai , apa' hilou-ra hi daeo'-na mepupulo ngone ,
42024023	tapi' woto-na uma-pi raruai' . Nculii'-ramo ra'uli'-kakai kampohilo-ra mala'eka to mpo'uli' tuwu' nculii'-imi .
42024024	Ngkai ree , ba hangkuja dua doo-kai hilou hi daeo' . Rata hi ria , rahilo bate hewa to ra'uli' tobine toera . Aga Yesus uma rahiloi . "
42024025	Oti toe , Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Wojo mpu'u-koi ! Uma oa'-tanoe niparasaya hawe'ea to ra'uli' nabi owi-e !
42024026	Magau' Topetolo' , bate kana mporata kaparia ncala'-i , pai' lako' mporata-i kabohe tuwu'-na . "
42024027	Ngkai ree , Yesus mpakanoto-raka hawe'ea to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' to mpolowa woto-na , ntepu'u ngkai sura to na'uki' nabi Musa duu' rata hi hawe'ea sura nabi .
42024028	Mohu'-mi ngata to ratoa' , Yesus ntani' kaliliu-i .
42024029	Ntaa' ratagi-idi , ra'uli'-ki : " Mehani-tamo ulu hi rehe'i ! Ncimonou'-mi , neo' mobengi-mi . " Jadi' mehani mpu'u-imi Yesus dohe-ra .
42024030	Mohura-ramo hangkaa-ngkania bona ngkoni' . Yesus mpo'ala' roti , naposampayai , napihe-pihe pai' natonu-miraka .
42024031	Nto'u toe , lako' monoto-rada , pai' ra'inca Kayesus-na . Ngkai ree , hangaa mengkaronto-imi , uma-ipi rahiloi .
42024032	Momepololitai-ramo , ra'uli' : " Toe-tawo' pai' tuna nono-ta hi ohea-e we'i , bula-na mpololitai-ta pai' mpakanoto-taka ihi' Buku Tomoroli'-e ! "
42024033	Pe'ongko'-ra wo'o-mi nculii' hilou hi Yerusalem , mpohirua'-raka ana'guru Yesus to hampulu' hadua , to bula-ra morumpu hante doo-ra .
42024034	Ra'uli' to morumpu toera : " Makono mpu'u-di , katuwu'-na nculii' Pue'-e ! Mehupa'-imi hi Simon ! "
42024035	Jadi' , to rodua to lako' rata toera mpotutura wo'o-mi-rawo napa to jadi' hi lengko ohea we'i , pai' kara'inca-na Yesus nto'u kampopihe-pihe-na roti .
42024036	Bula-ra mololita-pidi , muu-mule' mokore wo'o-imi Yesus hi laintongo'-ra , pai'-i mpotabe-ra , na'uli' : " Kalompea' rata hi koi' . "
42024037	Hakene-radile me'eka' , apa' ra'uli'-rana mpohilo-ra kiu .
42024038	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Napa pai' me'eka'-koi pai' morara' nono-nie ?
42024039	Hilo-dile rari' to hi pale-ku pai' to hi witi'-kue . Aku'-mile toi-e ! Ganga-a pai' petonoi , apa' ane rate-hana , uma-hawo ihia pai' wukua hewa to nihilo hi Aku' toi-e . "
42024040	Oti toe , pai' napopohiloi-ramo pale pai' witi'-na .
42024041	Ncaruku' raparasaya Kahi'a-na mpu'u-mi . Wule' mokanganga-ramo nakeni kagoe' nono-ra mogalo ingu' . Toe pai' Yesus mpekune'-ra , na'uli' : " Ha ria koni'-ni ? "
42024042	Ratonu-miki bau' uru to ratunu .
42024043	Nadoa-mi pai' nakoni' , bona rahilo kabela-na-hawo kiu .
42024044	Oti toe , na'uli'-miraka : " Toe-mile to ku'uli'-kokoie bula-ku dohe-ni-pidi . Butu nyala-na to mpolowa woto-ku to te'uki' hi rala sura to na'uki' nabi Musa pai' sura nabi-nabi pai' Buku Rona' Daud , hawe'ea-na kana madupa' . "
42024045	Oti toe , nanotohi nono-ra bona rapaha ihi' Buku Tomoroli' .
42024046	Na'uli' : " Hi rala Buku Tomoroli' te'uki' : Aku' Magau' Topetolo' kana mporata kaparia pai' kana rapatehi , pai' hi eo katolu-na tuwu' nculii' .
42024047	Pai' hi rala hanga'-ku Kareba Lompe' kana rapalele hi hawe'ea tauna , bona medea-ra ngkai jeko'-ra pai' Alata'ala mpo'ampungi-ra . Kareba toe kana rapalele hi humalili' dunia' , ntepu'u ngkai Yerusalem .
42024048	Koi'-mile to jadi' sabi' ngkai hawe'ea tohe'e-e lau .
42024049	" Pe'epei lompe' : kupakatu moto mpai' Inoha' Tomoroli' tumai hi koi' , hewa to najanci Tuama-ku . Aga kana nipopea ulu hi rala ngata toi , duu'-na baraka' ngkai Alata'ala mana'u tumai mporohoi-koi . "
42024050	Oti toe , Yesus mpo'ema'-ra hilou hi mali ngata Yerusalem , mohu' hi ngata Betania . Na'ongko' pale-na pai' nagane'-ramo .
42024051	Bula-na mpogane'-ra toe , kate'oo-ongkoa'-imi mpogaa'-raka pai' hilou-imi hi suruga .
42024052	Mowilingkudu-ramo mponyompa-i , pai' goe' lia nono-ra nculii' hilou hi Yerusalem .
42024053	Eo-eo-na tida-ra hi rala Tomi Alata'ala mpo'une'-une' Alata'ala .
43001001	Lomo'-na , kako'ia-na dunia' rapajadi' , mpolia' ria-imi-hana Lolita . Lolita toei , dohe Alata'ala-i , pai' Lolita toei , Hi'a moto-mi Alata'ala .
43001002	Ngkai lomo'-na-imi dohe Alata'ala-e .
43001003	Hi'a-mi to napopale Alata'ala mpopajadi' hawe'ea to rapajadi' . Uma ria hanyalaa to jadi' ane uma Hi'a .
43001004	Hi'a-mi pehupaa' katuwua' , pai' Hi'a-mi baja to mpobajahi nono manusia' .
43001005	Baja toe mehini ncuu hi rala kabengia-na , pai' kabengia uma mpakulei' mpopatehi-i .
43001006	Rata hadua tauna to nasuro Alata'ala , hanga'-na Yohanes Topeniu' .
43001007	Karata-na Yohanes toe , hi'a-mi jadi' sabi' to mpopalele baja toe hi hawe'ea tauna , bona hawe'ea-ra mpo'epe posabi'-na pai' mepangala' hi baja toei .
43001008	Yohanes , bela-hawo hi'a baja toe-e . Pai'-i tumai , mpopalele baja toe hi hawe'ea tauna .
43001009	Lolita toei , Hi'a-mi poko baja to mpobajahi nono hawe'ea tauna , rata-i hi rala dunia' .
43001010	Hi'a-mi to napopale Alata'ala mpopajadi' dunia' toi . Tapi' karata-na hi dunia' , tauna hi dunia' uma mpo'incai-i .
43001011	Rata-i hi ngata-na moto , tapi' hingka ngata-na uma dota mpotarima-i .
43001012	Tapi' hema-hema to mpotarima-i pai' mepangala' hi Hi'a , nawai'-ra huraa jadi' ana' Alata'ala .
43001013	Uma-ra mewali ana' Alata'ala sabana totu'a-ra , bela wo'o ngkai kuasa manusia' , ba ngkai poncamoko . Alata'ala moto to mpopajadi'-ra ana'-na .
43001014	Lolita toei , mewali manusia'-imi , pai'-i mo'oha' hi laintongo'-ta . Kai' , kihilo-mi-kaina kabaraka'-na . Kabaraka'-na toe narata ngkai Tuama-na , apa' Hi'a-mi Ana'-na to Hadudua . Ngkai Hi'a toe-mi pai' alaa-na ta'inca Alata'ala pai' kabula rala-na hi kita' .
43001015	Yohanes Topeniu' mpopo'incai ntodea kahema-na Lolita toei . Mekio'-i napesukui na'uli' : " Hi'a toi-mile to ku'uli'-e wengi ! Ku'uli' : ria mpai' to tumai ngkabokoa' ngkai aku' , aga meliu kabaraka'-na ngkai aku' . Apa' kako'ia-ku putu , mpolia' ria-imi-hana . "
43001016	Uma ria ka'otia ahi'-na , pai' ngkai ahi'-na toe nagane'-tamo omea , uma ria kaputua-na rasi' to tarata ngkai Hi'a .
43001017	Ngkai nabi Musa tatarima Atura Pue' Ala . Tapi' ngkai Yesus Kristus toe-mi pai' ta'inca mpu'u-i Alata'ala , pai' kabula rala-na hi kita' .
43001018	Uma ria haduaa to mpohilo Alata'ala . Tapi' Ana'-na to Hadudua toei , to tida oa' hi ncori-na , Hi'a-mi to mpakanoto Alata'ala hi kita' .
43001019	Hewa toi posabi'-na Yohanes Topeniu' mpo'uli' kahema-nai Yesus . Topoparenta to Yahudi hi Yerusalem mposuro ba hangkuja dua imam pai' to Lewi hilou hi Yohanes . Karata-ra hi Yohanes , mepekune'-ra : " Pai'-kai tumai toi-e , tumai mpekune'-ko ba hema-ko . Ba iko mpu'u-mi Magau' Topetolo'-e ? "
43001020	Yohanes mpotompoi'-ra hante kalonto'-lonto'-na , na'uli'-raka : " Bela-kuwo aku' Magau' Topetolo' . "
43001021	Mepekune' tena-ra : " Ane wae , hema-ko ? Ba nabi Elia-dako ? " Na'uli' Yohanes : " Bela wo'o . " Mepekune' tena-ra : " Ba iko lau-midi nabi bohe to rajanci owi , to ra'uli' tumai mpai' hi rala dunia'-e ? " Na'uli' Yohanes : " Bela wo'o . "
43001022	Ngkai ree , ra'uli' tena : " Ane wae , uli'-kakai ba hema mpu'u-ko , bona ria woli'-na kiparata-raka to mposuro-kai . Beiwa petompoi'-nu kahema-na mpu'u-ko . "
43001023	Yohanes mpotompoi'-ra hante lolita nabi Yesaya owi , na'uli' : " Aku' toi-le , Tauna to mekio' hi papada to wao' : ' Neo' rata-imi Pue' . Porodo ami'-miki ohea-na ! ' "
43001024	Ra'uli' wo'o-mi suro to Parisi toera : " Ane bela-ko Magau' Topetolo' , bela-ko nabi Elia , bela wo'o-ko nabi to rajanci , napa-di pai' mponiu'-ko tauna-e ? "
43001025	
43001026	Na'uli' Yohanes : " Aku'-le mponiu' tauna hante ue-wadi . Tapi' rata mpai' hadua tauna ngkabokoa' ngkai aku' . Ria moto-imile hi laintongo'-ni tempo toi-e , tapi' uma-i ni'incai . Bangku' jadi' pahawaa'-na mpobongka koloro sapatu'-na , uma-a-kuwo natao . "
43001027	
43001028	Hawe'ea toe jadi' hi ngata Betania , hi peniua'-na Yohanes hi dipo ue Yordan .
43001029	Kampeneo-na , Yohanes mpohilo Yesus rata mpotoa'-i . Na'uli'-mi hi ntodea : " Hilo ! Etu-imi tumai Ana' Bima to naporodo Alata'ala . Hi'a-mi to jadi' tolo' woto to mpolali jeko' manusia' .
43001030	Hi'a-mi to ku'uli'-e wengi . Ku'uli' rata-i ngkabokoa' ngkai aku' , aga meliu kabaraka'-na ngkai aku' . Apa' kako'ia-ku putu , mpolia' ria-imi-hana .
43001031	Lomo'-na wengi , ko'ia wo'o-kuwo ku'incai Kahi'a-nami Magau' Topetolo' . Hiaa' katumai-ku toi-e , bona mponiu'-ra to Israel hante ue pai' mpotudo'-raka kahema-na Magau' Topetolo' toe-e . "
43001032	Ria wo'o-mi posabi'-na Yohanes toi . Na'uli' : " Lomo'-na uma ku'incai Kayesus-na Magau' Topetolo' . Tapi' Alata'ala mpohubui-a mponiu' tauna hante ue , pai' na'uli'-ka hewa toi : ' Ane nampa' nuhilo mpai' Inoha' Tomoroli' mana'u pai' rodo hi hadua tauna , Hi'a-mi mpai' to mponiu' tauna hante Inoha' Tomoroli' . ' Jadi' , kuhilo mpu'u-mi Inoha' Tomoroli' mana'u ngkai suruga molence danci mangkebodo , mehompo pai' mengkarodo hi Yesus . Toe pai' toi-ka lolita-ku : Yesus , Hi'a-mi Ana' Alata'ala . "
43001033	
43001034	
43001035	Kampeneo-na , ria wo'o-i Yohanes hi ree hante ana'guru-na rodua .
43001036	Kanahilo-na Yesus liu , na'uli' : " Hilo , etu-imi tumai Ana' Bima Alata'ala ! "
43001037	Kara'epe-na ana'guru-na lolita toe , kahilou-rami mpotuku' Yesus .
43001038	Yesus mewili' , nahilo-ra mpotuku'-i . Napekune'-ra : " Napa to nipali'-e ? " Ra'uli'-ki : " Hiapa po'ohaa'-nu Guru ? "
43001039	Na'uli' Yesus : " Mai-mokoi , nihilo moto mpai' . " Hilou mpu'u-ramo mpotuku'-i rata hi po'ohaa'-na . Pai' hi ree-ramo dohe-na ngkai jaa opo' duu' mobengi .
43001040	Ana'guru-na Yohanes toera mpotuku' Yesus , apa' mpo'epe-ra lolita-na Yohanes Topeniu' we'i . Hadua ngkai to rodua toera , hanga'-na Andreas , ompi'-na Simon Petrus .
43001041	Kaliliu hilou-imi Andreas mpopali' Simon , na'uli'-ki : " Kirua'-imi-kaina Mesias ! " ( batua-na : Magau' Topetolo' ) .
43001042	Pai' napo'ema'-imi hilou hi Yesus . Yesus mponaa Simon , pai' na'uli'-ki : " Iko Simon ana'-na Yohanes . Aga ntepu'u tempo toi , rahanga' Kefas-moko . " ( Hanga' " Kefas " hi rala basa-ra to Yahudi , hibalia hante hanga' " Petrus " hi rala basa Yunani . Batua-na : watu . )
43001043	Kampeneo-na , Yesus mopatuju hilou hi tana' Galilea . Kako'ia-na me'ongko' , hilou-imi mpohirua'-ki Filipus pai' na'uli'-ki : " Tuku'-ama ! "
43001044	Filipus toei , ngkai ngata Betsaida , ngata-ra hira' Andreas pai' Petrus .
43001045	Ngkai ree , hilou wo'o-imi-hawo Filipus mpohirua'-ki doo-na to rahanga' Natanael , na'uli'-ki : " Kirua'-imi-kaina Magau' Topetolo'-e , hewa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Atura Musa pai' sura nabi owi ! Hanga'-na Yesus ngkai Nazaret , ana'-na Yusuf . "
43001046	Hampetompoi' Natanael : " Ha ria wo'o-hawo to lompe' to mehuwu ngkai Nazaret-e ? " Na'uli' Filipus : " Mai-moko , nuhilo moto-i mpai' ! " Hilou-ramo hi Yesus .
43001047	Yesus mpohilo Natanael tumai mpohirua'-ki , na'uli' : " Etu-i tumai hadua to Yahudi to mpo'uhi mpu'u kehi-na Israel ntu'a-na owi , bela-i topebagiu ! "
43001048	Na'uli' Natanael : " Ngkaiapa kanu'incaa-ku Guru ? " Na'uli' Yesus : " Kako'ia-na nakio'-ko Filipus , kuhilo-mokole , hi tawu kaju ara toe-e ria . "
43001049	Na'uli' Natanael : " Ana' Alata'ala mpu'u-ko-tawo' , Guru ! Iko mpu'u-mi Magau' to Israel ! "
43001050	Na'uli' Yesus : " Nupangala' apa' ku'uli' kakuhilo-nu hi tawu kaju ara-e ? Nuhilo tena-pi mpai' to meliu kabohe-na ngkai tetu . "
43001051	Oti toe , na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus : " Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : nihilo mpai' langi' tebea pai' mala'eka Alata'ala ngkahe' pai' mana'u tumai hi Aku' , Ana' Manusia' . "
43002001	Timpaliu ro'eo ngkai toe , ria susa' poncamokoa hi ngata Kana hi tana' Galilea . Tina-na Yesus mpokaralai susa' toe .
43002002	Pai' Yesus hante ana'guru-na , rakio' wo'o-ra-rawo ngkaralai susa' toe .
43002003	Bula-ra mosusa' toe , naka'otii-ramo ue anggur . Tina-na Yesus mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Naka'otii-ra ue anggur . "
43002004	Na'uli' Yesus : " Napa pai' nu'uli'-ka hewa tetu-e , Ina' ? Ko'ia rata tempo-na kupopo'incai-ra kahema-ku . "
43002005	Ngkai ree , na'uli' tina-na Yesus mpo'uli'-raka topobago : " Napa-napa mpai' to nahubui-kokoi Yesus , nibabehi-e' ! "
43002006	Hi tomi toe , ria ono meha' pontu'ua ue to rababehi ngkai watu . Pontu'ua ue toe rapake' rapontu'ui ue pobohoi' witi' pai' pale , ntuku' ada-ra to Yahudi . Kawori' ihi'-na , nte ha'atu lite butu meha'-na .
43002007	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka topobago toera : " Ihii' pontu'ua ue tetu lau hante ue . " Ra'ihii' mpu'u-mi rapoponu' .
43002008	Oti toe , na'uli' wo'o-miraka : " Tolou' hangkedi' , keni hilou hi tompohawai' susa' . " Ratolou' mpu'u-mi pai' rakeni hilou hi topohawa' .
43002009	Topohawa' toei mpemita ue to rakeni-ki . Bela-pi ue nonto , mobali'-mi mewali ue anggur . Aga uma-hawo na'incai kangkaiapa-na , muntu' topobago-wadi to mpo'inca . Ka'oti-na mpemita ue anggur toe , mekio'-i mpokio' topemua' ,
43002010	pai' na'uli'-ki : " Kabiasaa-ta-hawo , anggur to motomo'-di-hawo to ri'ulu ratua-raka torata . Ane oha-ra-damo nginu , pai' lako' ratua to uma ncako motomo' . Hiaa' iko-kona mpotalaa anggur to motomo' , pai' lako' tempo toi-di nupewai' ratua ! "
43002011	Yesus mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi toe hi ngata Kana hi tana' Galilea . Toe-mi tanda mekoncehi to lomo'-na to nababehi . Hante tanda toe napopohiloi kabaraka'-na , pai' ana'guru-na mepangala' hi Hi'a .
43002012	Hudu susa' toe , hilou-imi hi ngata Kapernaum hante tina-na , ompi'-na pai' ana'guru-na . Mo'oha' hi ree-ramo ba hangkuja mengi .
43002013	Neo' rata-mi tempo-na eo bohe agama Yahudi to rahanga' Eo Paskah . Jadi' , hilou-imi Yesus hi Yerusalem mpokaralai eo bohe toe .
43002014	Hi berewe Tomi Alata'ala , mpohilo-i tauna to mpobalu' japi , bima pai' danci mangkebodo . Ria wo'o tauna to mposula' doi mohura hi ree .
43002015	Yesus mpobabehi poweba' ngkai koloro , pai' nawuso omea-ra ngkai berewe Tomi Alata'ala , hante bima pai' japi-ra . Meja'-ra toposula' doi nabilingko , alaa-na pahawu'-hawu'-mi doi-ra .
43002016	Na'uli'-raka topobabalu' danci mangkebodo : " Koi' , keni omea tetu lau hilou hi mali-na ! Tomi Tuama-ku neo' niponcawa tomi pobabalua' ! "
43002017	Ana'guru-na mpokiwoi lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpo'uli' hewa tohe'i : " Dede' nono-ku , apa' kupe'ahi' Tomi-nu Pue' . "
43002018	Ngkai ree , topoparenta to Yahudi mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Napa ntoto-kowo huraa-nu mpobabehi tetu-e ? Ane ria mpu'u huraa-nu , popohiloi-kai tanda mekoncehi ! "
43002019	Na'uli' Yesus : " Gero-mi-hana Tomi Alata'ala toi , nihilo moto mpai' kadupa'-na rala-na tolu eo kuwangu nculii' . "
43002020	Konce-ra topoparenta to Yahudi , ra'uli' : " Beiwa ! ? Tomi Alata'ala toi rawangu rala-na opo' mpulu' ono mpae , hiaa' nu'uli'-kona nuwangu nculii' rala-na tolu eo-wadi ? "
43002021	Api' woto-nadi to nawalatu Yesus , mpokahangai' Tomi Alata'ala-e .
43002022	Ngkabokoa'-na ngkai toe , katuwu'-na nculii' mpu'u-mi Yesus , ana'guru-na mpokiwoi lolita-na toe-e . Ngkai ree rapangala'-mi napa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' pai' napa to na'uli' Yesus .
43002023	Bula-na Yesus hi Yerusalem mpokaralai Eo Paskah toe , wori' tauna to mepangala' hi Hi'a , apa' rahilo tanda-tanda mekoncehi to nababehi .
43002024	Aga Yesus uma mpangala'-ra , apa' na'inca nono hawe'ea tauna .
43002025	Uma mingki' kahadua-na to mpo'uli'-ki kabeiwa-na manusia' , apa' na'inca ami' napa to hi rala nono manusia' .
43003001	Ria hadua tauna to rahanga' Nikodemus . Nikodemus toei , to Parisi pai' pangkeni agama Yahudi .
43003002	Rala-na hamengi , rata-i mpohirua'-ki Yesus , na'uli'-ki : " Guru , to ki'inca , Iko hadua guru to nasuro Alata'ala , apa' uma ria tauna to bisa mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi hewa to nubabehi , ane uma-i nadohei Alata'ala . "
43003003	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki : " Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : Ane tauna uma putu nculii' , uma-i mpai' jadi' ntodea Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua'-na . "
43003004	Na'uli' Nikodemus : " Ha beiwa-hawo tauna to motu'a-mi putu nculii'-e ? Ha bisa-i mempuna' hi rala puanaka tina-na , pai'-i putu karongkani-nae ? "
43003005	Na'uli' Yesus : " Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : Ane tauna uma putu hante ue pai' hante baraka' Inoha' Alata'ala , uma-i jadi' ntodea Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua'-na .
43003006	Manusia' tuwu' hi rala dunia' toi , apa' putu ngkai totu'a-na . Tapi' katuwua' kao'-na to bo'u narata ngkai Inoha' Tomoroli' .
43003007	Jadi' , neo' nupokakonce lolita-ku tohe'i to mpo'uli' : koi' omea kana putu nculii' .
43003008	Rapa'-na ngolu' , mewui hiapa kalaua-na . Wule' sere-na ta'epe , uma ta'incai kangkaiapa-na ba hilou hiapa-i . Wae wo'o hante tauna to putu ngkai baraka' Inoha' Alata'ala . "
43003009	Na'uli' Nikodemus : " Beiwa wo'o-hawo kawali-na tetu-e ? "
43003010	Na'uli' Yesus : " Iko-le hadua guru to Israel to rabila' , hiaa' uma-di-kona nu'incai batua-na lolita-ku toi-e !
43003011	Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : Kai' mpo'uli' napa to ki'inca , kilolita napa to kihilo . Hiaa' uma-di nipangalai' lolita-kai .
43003012	Ane kututura-kokoi napa to jadi' hi dunia' , uma nipangala' . Peliu-liu-nami mpai' ane kututura-kokoi napa to jadi' hi suruga .
43003013	Uma ria haduaa tauna hi dunia' to manake' hilou hi suruga . Muntu' Aku'-wadi to mpo'inca napa to jadi' hi suruga , apa' Aku' Ana' Manusia' to mo'oha' hi suruga ngkai owi pai' to mana'u tumai ngkai suruga .
43003014	" Owi hi papada to wao' , nabi Musa mpobabehi lence ule ngkai ngkala , pai' natu'u hi doe hampole kaju pai' natunya' napopokore . Hema-hema to natilo' ule , ane rangoa' lence ule ngkala toe , tuwu' moto-ra . Jadi' , hewa ule ngkala toe rapokalangko owi , wae wo'o mpai' Aku' Ana' Manusia' kana rapokalangko ,
43003015	bona hema-hema to mepangala' hi Aku' mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na . "
43003016	Hewa toi-mi Alata'ala mpoka'ahi' hawe'ea tauna hi dunia' , alaa-na napewai' Ana'-na to Hadudua , bona hema-hema to mepangala' hi Ana'-na toe , uma-ra mporata huku' , tapi' mporata-ra katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na .
43003017	Bela patuju-na Alata'ala mposuro Ana'-na tumai hi dunia' bona mpohuku' manusia' . Patuju-na mposuro Ana'-na tumai-le , bona mpohore manusia' ngkai huku' jeko'-ra .
43003018	Tauna to mepangala' hi Ana' Alata'ala , uma-ra rahuku' . Aga tauna to uma mepangala' , monoa'-mi kanahuku'-ra Alata'ala , apa' uma-ra dota mepangala' hi Ana' Alata'ala to Hadudua toei .
43003019	Rata-imi hi dunia' mpokeni baja hi hawe'ea tauna . Tapi' manusia' mpokono-pi bengi ngkai baja , apa' dada'a kehi-ra . Toe pai' Alata'ala mpohuku'-ra .
43003020	Hawe'ea tauna to mpobabehi kehi to dada'a , mpokahuku' baja . Uma-ra dota rata hi kabajaa-na , bona neo' mpai' kahiloa kehi-ra to dada'a .
43003021	Tauna to monoa' kehi-ra rata hi kabajaa-na , bona kahiloa po'ingku-ra pai' bona monoto-mi kampotuku'-ra konoa Alata'ala .
43003022	Oti toe , Yesus pai' ana'guru-na hilou hi tana' Yudea . Bula-ra hi ree , meniu'-ra mponiu' tauna to doko' jadi' topetuku'-na .
43003023	Nto'u toe , Yohanes Topeniu' ko'ia-i ratarungku' . Meniu'-i hi ngata Ainon , uma molaa ngkai ngata Salim , apa' hi ree wori' ue . Butu eo-na tauna hilou mpopeniu' hi Yohanes .
43003024	
43003025	Rala-na ha'eo , ba hangkuja dua ana'guru Yohanes momehono' hante to Yahudi mpomehonoi' ada peniu' rala agama .
43003026	Hilou-ramo hi Yohanes ra'uli'-ki : " Guru , nukiwoi-pidi wengi tauna to dohe-ta hi dipo ue Yordan , to nutudo'-kakaie ? Oe-imi ria , meniu' wo'o-i-hawo , pai' kawoo-woria' tauna lou hi Hi'a ! "
43003027	Na'uli' Yohanes : " Kita' manusia' uma mporata napa-napa ane uma pewai'-na Alata'ala .
43003028	Ni'epe moto-mi wengi lolita-ku . Ku'uli' : aku' bela Magau' Topetolo' . Pai'-a tumai-kuwo-le , tumai meri'ulu ngkai Hi'a mporodo-ki ohea-na .
43003029	" Ane rapa'-na hi susa' poncamokoa , topemua'-di-hana to jadi' poko-na , apa' hi'a-mi pue' tobine to rapemuai' . Ane bale-na topemua'-hawo-le , mokore-i mpopanene'-wadi-ki-hawo pai' mpe'epei hawa'-na . Pai' goe'-i mpo'epe libu' topemua' . Wae-mi-kuwo aku'-e , aku' hewa bale-na topemua' . Goe'-a , pai' gana kagoea'-ku , apa' kawoo-woria' tauna mpotuku'-i Yesus .
43003030	Hi'a-mi to kana tepaiwongko tuwu'-na , pai' aku' kana tepai'ara' tuwu'-ku . "
43003031	Yesus , Hi'a-mi to tumai ngkai suruga , pai' meliu tuwu'-na ngkai hawe'ea . Tauna to ngkai dunia' , bate manusia' biasa , pai' lolita-na mpololita napa-napa to jadi' hi dunia' . Aga Yesus , ngkai suruga-i-hana , pai' meliu tuwu'-na ngkai hawe'ea .
43003032	Lolita-na mpololita napa to nahilo pai' to na'epe , tapi' uma ria to mpangala' lolita-na .
43003033	Aga hema to mpangala' lolita-na mpo'uli' : " Bate makono-hanale lolita Alata'ala-e . "
43003034	Apa' Hi'a-mi to nasuro Alata'ala mpohowa' lolita-na , pai' Alata'ala mpowai'-i Inoha' Tomoroli' hante uma ria huka'-na .
43003035	Alata'ala to Tuama mpoka'ahi' Ana'-na , pai' nawai'-imi hawe'ea kuasa-na .
43003036	Tauna to mepangala' hi Ana'-na toei , mporata-ramo katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na . Tauna to uma mengkoru hi Ana'-na toei , uma-ra mporata katuwua' . Mporata roe Alata'ala lau-rada duu' kahae-hae-na .
43004001	To Parisi mpo'epe kawoo-woria' tauna to hilou mpopeniu' hi Yesus jadi' topetuku'-na , alaa-na meliu-pi kawori'-na topetuku'-na Yesus ngkai topetuku'-na Yohanes Topeniu' .
43004002	( Kakoo-kono-na , bela-hawo Yesus to meniu' , ana'guru-na to meniu' . )
43004003	Jadi' , kana'inca-na Yesus kara'epe-nami to Parisi kareba toe , malai-imi ngkai tana' Yudea hilou nculii' hi tana' Galilea .
43004004	Rala pomako'-na tohe'e , kana mpotara tana' Samaria-i .
43004005	Neo' tebua'-mi eo-na , rata-imi hi ngata to Samaria to rahanga' Sikar , uma molaa ngkai tana' to napewai' Yakub owi hi Yusuf ana'-na . Hi mali ngata toe , ria hameha' buwu to rahanga' buwu Yakub . Mohura-imi Yesus hi wiwi' buwu toe , apa' lenge'-imi momako' .
43004006	
43004007	Ana'guru-na kaliliu hilou hi ngata me'oli pongkoni' . Ko'ia mahae , rata hadua tobine to Samaria tumai ntomu' . Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki : " Totina , wai'-a-kuwo ue ku'inu . "
43004008	
43004009	Konce tobine toei , apa' biasa-na to Yahudi morungku mposigalo-raka to Samaria . Toe pai' na'uli' : " Iko to Yahudi , aku' to Samaria-a . Napa pai' daho'-ko mperapii'-a ue ? "
43004010	Na'uli' Yesus : " Ane ke nu'inca kabohe rasi' to nawai' Alata'ala , pai' ane nu'inca-a kahema-ku Aku' to mperapii'-ko ue , tantu merapi' wo'o-ko-kowo hi Aku' , pai' kuwai'-ko ue to tuwu' . "
43004011	Na'uli' tobine toei : " Ngkaiapa-kona ue to tuwu' to nu'uli' tetu-e , bo uma-di ria potolou'-nue , hiaa' buwu toi monala-hana .
43004012	Buwu toi sosora ngkai Yakub , ntu'a-kai owi . Hi'a nginu ue ngkai rei moto-i-hawo , wae wo'o ana'-na pai' porewua-na . Ha nu'uli'-kona meliu kabohe tuwu'-nu ngkai Yakub , pai' ma'ala-ko mpewai' ue to meliu kalompe'-na ngkai ue buwu toi-e ? "
43004013	Na'uli' Yesus : " Hawe'ea tauna to nginu ue ngkai buwu toi , ngkamara nculii'-ra-pidi mpai' .
43004014	Tapi' hema to mpo'inu ue to kuwai'-raka , uma-rapa ngkamara duu' kahae-hae-na . Apa' ue to kuwai'-raka toe , jadi' ue tuwu' to mo'ili ncuu hi rala nono-ra -- batua-na , mporata-ra katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na . "
43004015	Na'uli' tobine toei : " Ane wae , wai'-ama-kuna ue tetu , bona uma-apa ngkamara oa' , pai' uma-apa mingki' tumai ntomu' butu eo-na hi rehe'i . "
43004016	Na'uli' Yesus : " Koi' ulu , kio' tomane-nu , pai'-ko nculii' tumai . "
43004017	Na'uli' tobine toei : " Uma-kuna motomanei-a . " Na'uli' Yesus : " Makono-di ,
43004018	apa' lima ngkani-mokole motomanei-e , pai' tomane-nu tetu-e lou , bela tomane-nu moto . Jadi' , makono lia lolita-nu we'i-e . "
43004019	Na'uli' tobine toei : " Ei' , nabi-ko-tawo' !
43004020	Kai' to Samaria , mepue' hi bulu' tohe'i moto-ka-kaiwo , hi bulu' pepuea' ntu'a-kai . Hiaa' koi' to Yahudi mpo'uli' , kana hi Yerusalem-wadi pepuea' to makono . "
43004021	Na'uli' Yesus : " Pangala'-mi lolita-ku toi : Rata mpai' tempo-na , uma-pi wule' hi Yerusalem-wadi tauna mpopue' Alata'ala , uma wo'o hi bulu' toi-wadi .
43004022	Koi' to Samaria , uma ni'incai kahema-na to nipue' . Kai' to Yahudi , ki'inca kahema-na to kipue' , apa' ria pojanci Alata'ala to mpo'uli' kalompea' manusia' mehuwu ngkai laintongo' to Yahudi .
43004023	Tapi' rata mpai' tempo-na -- pai' toi-mi tempo-na -- tauna to mepue' mpu'u-mpu'u hi Alata'ala to Tuama , kana mpopue'-i hante kuasa Inoha' Tomoroli' , pai' ntuku' ohea to makono . Pepue' to hewa toe-mi to napokono Alata'ala to Tuama .
43004024	Alata'ala , Hi'a-mi Inoha' . Jadi' , tauna to mpopue'-i , kana mepue' hante kuasa Inoha' Tomoroli' pai' ntuku' ohea to makono . "
43004025	Na'uli' tobine toei : " Io' , to ku'inca-na , rata mpai' Magau' Topetolo' , to rahanga' Kristus . Ane rata-ipi mpai' , Hi'a to mpakanoto omea hi kita' . "
43004026	Na'uli' Yesus : " Aku'-mile toi-e , to mpololitai-ko wae-e lau . "
43004027	Bula-ra mololita , rata-ramo ana'guru-na ngkai ngata . Konce-ra mpohilo Yesus mpololitai hadua tobine . Aga uma haduaa to daho' mpopekune' tobine toei ba napa paraluu-na . Uma wo'o-ra daho' mpekune' Yesus ba napa pai' napololitai-i .
43004028	Ngkai ree , tobine toei mpalahii-mi pontomua'-na hi ree , ncaliu hilou hi ngata mpo'uli'-raka hingka ngata-na :
43004029	" Kita hilou mpohilo tauna to mpolohu-ka hawe'ea gau'-ku . Meka' ba lue' Hi'a mpu'u-mi Magau' Topetolo'-e ! "
43004030	Toe pai' hilou-ramo hi mali ngata doko' mpohirua'-ki Yesus .
43004031	Lingku'-na tobine toe hilou hi rala ngata , ana'guru-na Yesus mpo'uli'-ki : " Guru , mai-tamo ngkoni' . "
43004032	Aga na'uli' Yesus : " Ria-ka-kuna koni'-ku to uma ni'incai . "
43004033	Momepekune'-ramo ana'guru-na ra'uli' : " Hema-die to mpowai'-i pongkoni'-e ? "
43004034	Toe pai' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Pongkoni'-kule , mpotuku' konoa Pue' Ala to mposuro-a , pai' mposipolea pobago to nawai'-ka .
43004035	Koi' biasa mpo'uli' lolita bulawa toi : Opo' mula-damo pai' lako' mepae-ta . Aga Aku' mpo'uli'-kokoi : Naa-dile , oe lau bonea to mperenene-damo pae-na pai' to hangaa rapepae-damo .
43004036	Tauna to mepae bate mporata gaji'-ra , alaa-na topepae pai' to ntuja' goe' hangkaa-ngkania . Wua' to rapepae , batua-na , tauna to mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na .
43004037	Jadi' , makono lolita bulawa to mpo'uli' : ' Kahadua-na to ntuja' , kahadua-na to mpepae . '
43004038	Kuhubui-koi mpepae to bela tinuja'-ni . Tau ntani'-na to mpotuja' , koi' to mpepae wua' pobago-ra . "
43004039	Hi ngata to Samaria toe , wori' tauna to mepangala' hi Yesus , apa' ra'epe lolita tobine toe we'i to mpo'uli' : " Nalohu-maka hawe'ea gau'-ku . "
43004040	Jadi' , kahilou-rami mpohirua'-ki Yesus , pai' raperapi' bona mehani-i hi ngata-ra . Mehani mpu'u-imi hi ree romengia .
43004041	Ngkai ree , kawoo-woria' tena pue' ngata to mepangala' hi Yesus , apa' ra'epe moto-mi lolita-na .
43004042	Ra'uli' mpo'uli'-ki tobine toei : " Wae lau kipangala' mpu'u-mi , uma muntu' ngkai lolita-nu iko-wadi . Apa' ki'epe ntilinga moto-mi lolita-na , pai' ki'inca Kahi'a-na mpu'u-mi Magau' Tompohore manusia' ngkai huku' jeko'-ra . "
43004043	Timpaliu romengia hi Samaria , Yesus mpokaliliu pomako'-na hilou hi tana' Galilea .
43004044	Ria hangkani Yesus mpo'uli' : " Hadua nabi uma biasa rabila' hi ngata-na moto . "
43004045	Jadi' , karata-na hi Galilea , tauna mpotarima-i hante kagoe' nono-ra , apa' ria-ra wengi hi Yerusalem mpokaralai eo bohe Paskah , pai' mpohilo hante mata-ra moto-mi hawe'ea anu mekoncehi to nababehi hi ria nto'u toe .
43004046	Rata wo'o-imi Yesus hi ngata Kana hi Galilea , hi ngata pompobalia'-na ue jadi' anggur . Uma molaa ngkai Kana toe , ria hadua topohawa' hi ngata Kapernaum , to mobago hi tomi raja , peda' gaga ana'-na .
43004047	Kana'epe-na topohawa' toei karata-na Yesus hi Galilea ngkai Yudea , hilou-imi hi ngata Kana mpohirua'-ki , na'uli'-ki : " Pue' , hilou-ta hi Kapernaum , nupaka'uri'-ka-kuwo ana'-ku , apa' neo' mate-imi . "
43004048	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki : " Ane uma-koi mpohilo tanda mekoncehi pai' anu mobaraka' , uma oa'-koi mepangala' ! "
43004049	Na'uli' topohawa' toei : " Pue' , hilou-tamo sohi' , mate mpai' ana'-ku ! "
43004050	Na'uli' Yesus : " Nculii'-moko , mo'uri'-imi ana'-nu . " Napangala' mpu'u-mi topohawa' toei lolita Yesus , pai' nculii' mpu'u-imi-hawo .
43004051	Hi lengko ohea-i-pidi , ba hangkuja dua batua-na mpotomu-i , ra'uli'-ki : " Mo'uri'-imile ana'-nue ! "
43004052	Napekune'-ramo : " Jaa hangkuja-i mo'uri'-e ? " Ra'uli' : " Wengi , ba jaa satu mpo'eo tu , uma-ipi ngkelengi' . "
43004053	Nakiwoi-mi topohawa' , nto'u-na toe mpu'u-mi wengi Yesus mpo'uli'-ki : " Mo'uri'-imi ana'-nu . " Ngkai ree , topohawa' toei pai' hira' hantomia , mepangala'-ramo hi Yesus .
43004054	Toe-mi tanda mekoncehi karongkani-na to nababehi Yesus hi Galilea karata-na ngkai Yudea .
43005001	Oti toe , nculii'-imi Yesus hilou hi Yerusalem bona mpokaralai-i eo bohe to Yahudi hi ria .
43005002	Hi Yerusalem , mohu' hi wobo' wala to rahanga' Wobo' Bima , ria wuhu' , hi rala basa Yahudi hanga'-na Betesda . Ntololikia wuhu' toe , ria lima meha' pengkawinaraa .
43005003	Hi retu , wori' tauna to peda' . Ria towero , ria tokejo , ria topungku , ntora turu hi pengkawinaraa , ( ( mpopea kamojago-na ue wuhu' .
43005004	Apa' pontu-na ria mala'eka Pue' mana'u tumai hi wuhu' toe mpojago ue-na . Pai' hema to ri'ulu mehompo hi rala wuhu' nto'u ue-na mojago , mo'uri'-i ngkai haki' to natodohaka . ) )
43005005	Ria hi ree hadua tomane , tolu mpulu' walu mpae-imi peda' .
43005006	Yesus mpohilo-i turu hi ree , pai' na'inca kamahae-nami peda' . Napekune'-i : " Dota-ko mo'uri' ? "
43005007	Na'uli' topeda' toei : " Pue' , apa' uma-kuwo hema to mpokeni-a hilou rala wuhu' nto'u mojago ue-na . Ke lako' hilou-a-kuwo , to ntani'-na wo'o-mi to mpori'uluhi-a . "
43005008	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki : " Memata-moko , lulu-mi ali'-nu , pai' mako'-moko . "
43005009	Kamo'uri'-nami tau toei , nalulu-mi ali'-na , pai'-i momako'-mi . Tohe'e jadi' hi Eo Sabat , eo pepuea'-ra to Yahudi .
43005010	Toe pai' topoparenta to Yahudi mpokamaro tauna to lako' mo'uri' toei , ra'uli'-ki : " Eo Sabat-hanale toe-e lau ! Uma-ko ma'ala ngkeni ali'-nu . "
43005011	Na'uli' tauna toei : " Apa' nahubui-a-kuwo tauna to mpaka'uri'-a we'i , na'uli'-ka : ' Lulu-mi ali'-nu pai' mako'-moko . ' "
43005012	Rapekune'-i : " Hema-i to mpohubui-ko ngkeni ali'-nue ? "
43005013	Tapi' uma na'incai kahema-na to mpaka'uri'-i , apa' Yesus uma-pi ria hi ree , mpolia' hilou-imi hi olo' tauna to wori' .
43005014	Uma mahae ngkai ree , Yesus mpohirua'-ki tauna toei hi Tomi Alata'ala , pai' na'uli'-ki : " Mo'uri'-moko , neo'-pi-hawo mpobabehi jeko' , bona neo' mpai' narumpa'-ko ba napa-napa to meliu kada'a-na . "
43005015	Ngkai ree , hilou-imi tauna toei mpohirua'-raka topoparenta to Yahudi , na'uli'-raka Kayesus-na to mpaka'uri'-i .
43005016	Toe pai' topoparenta to Yahudi ntepu'u mpobalinai' Yesus , apa' mepaka'uri'-i-hana hi Eo Sabat .
43005017	Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Tuama-ku mobago duu' eo toi , pai' Aku' wo'o kana mobago . "
43005018	Ngkai ree , rahuduwukui-mi topoparenta to Yahudi mpali' ohea-ra mpopatehi-i . Apa' uma wule' kampotiboki-na ada hi Eo Sabat , tapi' na'uli' wo'o-hana ka' Alata'ala-na Tuama-na ; jadi' , napopohibalia-hana woto-na hante Alata'ala .
43005019	Toe pai' na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : Aku' Ana' Alata'ala , uma-a bisa mobago ntuku' konoa-ku moto . Muntu' to kuhilo ngkai Tuama-ku , toe-mi to kupobago . Napa-napa bago Tuama-ku , tetu wo'o-kuwo bago-ku .
43005020	Apa' Tuama-ku mpoka'ahi'-a , pai' napopohiloi-a hawe'ea to napobago . Kakupaka'uri'-na topeda' toe ngone ria , pai' kubabehi wo'o mpai' pobago to meliu kabohe-na ngkai toe , alaa-na konce mpu'u-mokoi mpai' .
43005021	Hewa Tuama-ku mpopemata tomate pai' mpowai'-ra katuwua' , wae wo'o Aku' mpowai' katuwua' hi hema-hema to kupelihi .
43005022	Tuama-ku moto uma mpobotuhi kara-kara manusia' . Hawe'ea kuasa pompobotuhi natonu-mi hi Aku' Ana'-na .
43005023	Nababehi toe , bona hawe'ea tauna mpobila'-a hewa pompobila'-ra Tuama-ku . Hema to uma mpobila'-a , uma wo'o-ra mpobila' Tuama-ku to mposuro-a .
43005024	" Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : Hema to mpo'epe lolita-ku pai'-ra mepangala' hi Pue' Ala to mposuro-a , bate mporata-ra katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na . Uma-ra mpai' rahuku' sabana jeko'-ra . Tebahaka-ramo ngkai kamatea , mporata-ramo katuwua' .
43005025	Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : Rata mpai' tempo-na -- pai' toi-mi tempo-na -- tauna tomate mpo'epe libu' Ana' Alata'ala , pai' hira' to mpo'epe mporata katuwua' to bo'u .
43005026	Apa' hewa Tuama-ku mobaraka' mpowai' katuwua' , wae wo'o nawai'-a baraka' mpowai' katuwua' .
43005027	Nawai' wo'o-a kuasa mpobotuhi kara-kara manusia' , apa' Aku' Ana' Manusia' .
43005028	" Neo' nipokakonce lolita-ku toi , apa' rata mpai' tempo-na hawe'ea tauna to hi rala daeo' mpo'epe libu'-ku ,
43005029	pai'-ra memata ngkai daeo'-ra . To mpobabehi gau' to lompe' rapopemata bona mporata katuwua' to lompe' . To mpobabehi gau' to dada'a rapopemata bona rahuku' .
43005030	" Aku' , uma-a bisa mpobabehi napa-napa ntuku' konoa-ku moto . Kubotuhi ntuku' to nahawai'-ka Alata'ala . Pobotuhi-ku monoa' , apa' uma-a mpotuku' dota-ku moto , mpotuku'-a kadota-na Pue' Ala to mposuro-a .
43005031	" Ane ke Aku' moto-wadi to mpo'uli' ka' Aku'-na suro Alata'ala , pai' uma ria tau ntani'-na to mposabii'-a , uma ni'incai ba makono lolita-ku ba uma-di .
43005032	Tapi' ria moto kahadua-na to mposabii'-a , pai' ku'inca kamakono-na posabi'-na toe .
43005033	Koi' mpohubui doo-ni hilou hi Yohanes Topeniu' wengi , pai' na'uli'-miraka posabi'-na . Napa to na'uli' toe , bate makono omea .
43005034	Aga kakoo-kono-na uma kuparaluu posabi' ngkai manusia' . Kupopokiwoii-koi lolita-na Yohanes toe-e , bona mporata-koi kalompea' .
43005035	Yohanes toei hewa lampu to mehini pai' ngkeni kabajaa-na hi koi' . Pai' koi' , goe' lia moto-koi mpo'epe lolita-na . Aga kagoe'-ni tetu hampai'-wadi .
43005036	" Aga Aku' , ria-ka-kuna sabi' to mpakanoto kahema-ku , pai' sabi' toei meliu ngkai posabi'-na Yohanes . Ane ninaa lompe' pobago-ku , toe-mile to mposabii' kahema-kue . Napa to kupobago hewa toe lau , pobago to nahawai'-ka Tuama-ku bona kuposipolea . Pobago-ku toi-mi to mpakanoto ka' Aku'-na suro Tuama-ku .
43005037	Pai' meliu ngkai toe , Tuama-ku to mposuro-a , Hi'a moto-mi jadi' sabi'-ku mpo'uli' kahema-ku . Tapi' koi' , ko'ia hangkania ni'epei libu'-na , ko'ia nihiloi lence-na .
43005038	Lolita-na uma nitimamahi hi rala nono-ni , apa' uma-koi mepangala' hi Aku' to nasuro .
43005039	Koi' mpewulihi' ihi' Buku Tomoroli' , apa' ni'uli' mporata-koi katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na ngkai Buku Tomoroli' toe . Hiaa' Buku Tomoroli' moto wo'o-mi to mpotompo'wiwi-a .
43005040	Aga nau' wae , uma oa'-koi dota tumai hi Aku' , bona mporata katuwua' to lompe' toe .
43005041	" Uma-a mpopebila' hi manusia' .
43005042	Apa' ku'inca moto-koi , ka'uma-na ria ahi'-ni hi Alata'ala .
43005043	Katumai-ku toi , mpokeni-a hanga'-na Tuama-ku , aga uma-koi dota mpotarima-a . Ane ria to tumai mpokeni hanga'-ra moto-wadi , nitarima lau-ra .
43005044	Beiwa kamepangala'-ni hi Aku'-e , apa' doko' rabila' doo-wadi-koi , uma-koi mpali' pebila' to ngkai Alata'ala to Hadudua .
43005045	Aga neo' ni'uli' wae , Aku' mpai' to mpakilu-koi hi Tuama-ku . Nabi Musa moto-mi to mpakilu-koi . Ni'uli'-koina ngkai petuku'-ni hi hawa' Musa pai'-koi mporata kalompea' .
43005046	Tapi' ane bongko nipangala' mpu'u-i Musa , tantu nipangala' wo'o-a Aku'-e , apa' napa to na'uki' Musa , Aku'-mi kadungkua-na .
43005047	Bangku' to na'uki' Musa uma nipangala' , peliu-liu-nami ka'uma-na nipangala' lolita-ku . "
43006001	Oti toe , hilou-imi Yesus hi dipo Rano Galilea , to rahanga' wo'o Rano Tiberias .
43006002	Wori' lia tauna mpotuku'-i , apa' rahilo hawe'ea tanda mekoncehi to nababehi , mpaka'uri' topeda' .
43006003	Manake'-i lou hi panapa bulu' hante ana'guru-na , pai' mohura-imi hi ree .
43006004	Nto'u toe , neo' rata-mi eo bohe agama Yahudi to rahanga' Eo Paskah .
43006005	Yesus mponaa ntololikia-na , nahilo-hawo , mo'iko-ra-damo tauna tumai mpomohui'-i . Na'uli' mpo'uli'-ki Filipus : " Hiapa-ta me'oli pongkoni' , tapokoni'-raka tauna to wori' toera lau ? "
43006006	( Kakoo-kono-na , na'inca ami' moto-mi napa mpai' to nababehi . Napekune' hewa toe hi Filipus , apa' doko' naponciloi pepangala'-na . )
43006007	Na'uli' Filipus : " Nau' ro'atu doi pera' tapope'oli-ki pongkoni' pai' butu dua-ra tawai' hore hangkedi'-wadi , uma oa' hono' . "
43006008	Ngkai ree , hadua ana'guru-na to rahanga' Andreas , ompi'-na Simon Petrus , mpo'uli' :
