43006009	" Ohe'i hadua ana' to mobokui lima meha' roti pai' tinapa uru roma'a , aga napa-mile kalaua-na hi tauna to wori' hewa toe-e lau ? "
43006010	Na'uli' Yesus : " Hubui-ramo mohura ! " Jadi' mohura-ramo hi kowo' raponcawa ali' , apa' wori' kowo' hi ree . Hi olo' ntodea toe , ria ba lima ncobu paka' tomane .
43006011	Ngkai ree , na'ala'-mi roti , na'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala , pai' nabagi-bagi hi tauna to wori' to mohura . Hewa toe wo'o pompobabehi-na hante bau' uru . Ngkoni'-ramo omea duu'-ra bohu .
43006012	Bohu-ramo omea , na'uli' Yesus hi ana'guru-na : " Rumpu-koi toro-na , bona neo' ria to rakerei . "
43006013	Rarumpu mpu'u-mi , hampulu' roluncu-pi toro-na ngkai lima meha' roti to rakoni' tauna to wori' we'i .
43006014	Karahilo-na ntodea tanda mekoncehi tohe'e , momepololitai-ramo , ra'uli' : " Hi'a mpu'u-mi-tawo' nabi to rajanci owi-e , to ra'uli' rata mpai' hi dunia' toi-e ! "
43006015	Jadi' , ria patuju-ra doko' mpewuku-i jadi' magau'-ra . Kana'inca-na Yesus patuju-ra toe , malai-imi ngkai ree hilou hi bulu'-na .
43006016	Ncimonou' tohe'e , mana'u-ramo ana'guru-na hilou hi rano mpopea-i .
43006017	Rapopea duu' mobengi , ko'ia oa'-i rata . Jadi' , mosakaya moto-ramo hilou mpotoa' ngata Kapernaum .
43006018	Bula-ra mosakaya toe , rata ngolu' bohe mporumpa'-ra , alaa-na bohe balumpa hi rano .
43006019	Lima ba ono kilo-ramo ngkai talinti , rahilo-rawo , etu-imi tumai Yesus momako' hi lolo ue mpototopa-ra . Aga uma ra'incai Kayesus-na . Me'eka' lia-ramo .
43006020	Na'uli' Yesus : " Neo' me'eka' ! Aku'-mile toi-e . "
43006021	Mpo'epe toe-di , goe'-ramo mpodoa Yesus hi rala sakaya . Pesua'-na Yesus hi rala sakaya , rata-ramo hi wiwi' talinti to ratoa' .
43006022	Kampeneo-na , wori' tauna hi dipo rano mpopali' Yesus , ra'uli' : " Hiapa-imidie ? Uma-idi mohawi' sakaya dohe ana'guru-nae ngone . Hiaa' uma ria sakaya ntani'-na hi rei ngone , muntu' sakaya to rahawi' ana'guru-na-wadi . "
43006023	Ngkai ree , rata wo'o tauna ngkai ngata Tiberias hi rala sakaya-ra , pai'-ra mencore mohu' hi pongkonia'-ra ntodea wengi , to mpokoni' roti to nagane' Pue' Yesus .
43006024	Kara'inca-na ntodea ka'uma-napi ria Yesus hi ree , ntahawe' ana'guru-na uma wo'o-pi ria , mosakaya wo'o-ramo-rawo hilou hi Kapernaum mpopali'-i .
43006025	Karata-ra ntodea hi dipo rano mpohirua'-ki Yesus , rapekune'-i : " Nto'uma-ko rata hi rehe'i-e , Guru ? "
43006026	Na'uli' Yesus : " Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : Ku'inca moto-le patuju-ni mpali'-ae . Uma ba kani'inca-na batua-na tanda mekoncehi to kubabehi . Nipali'-ale apa' bohu-mokoi kupokoni' .
43006027	Neo'-koi mobago mpali' pongkoni' to sohi' oti pai' waha' . Mobago-koi mpali' pongkoni' to uma ria kawahaa'-na pai' to mpowai' katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na . Aku' Ana' Manusia' to mpowai'-koi pongkoni' tohe'e , apa' Alata'ala to Tuama mpotudo' ka' Aku'-nami to napelihi pai' to napokono . "
43006028	Mepekune'-ra ntodea : " Napa to kana kipobago bona pobago-kai ntuku' konoa Alata'ala ? "
43006029	Na'uli' Yesus : " Toi-mile pobago to napokono Alata'ala-e : mepangala' hi Aku' to nasuro . "
43006030	Ra'uli' wo'o-mi ntodea : " Ane wae , tanda napa to nupopohiloi-kakai , bona kipangala'-ko kangkai Alata'ala-na mpu'u-ko ? Napa to nubabehi ?
43006031	Wai'-ka-kaiwo pongkoni' , hewa to rakoni' ntu'a-ta owi . Bula-ra hi papada to wao' , ngkoni'-ra pongkoni' to rahanga' manna , hewa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' : ' Nawai'-ra pongkoni' ngkai suruga . ' "
43006032	Na'uli' Yesus : " Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : Bela nabi Musa owi to mpowai' pongkoni' ngkai suruga . Tempo toi-e , Tuama-ku-hana to mpowai'-koi pongkoni' to mpu'u-mpu'u ngkai suruga .
43006033	Pongkoni' to nawai' Alata'ala , batua-na , to mana'u tumai ngkai suruga pai' to mpowai' katuwua' hi manusia' . "
43006034	Ra'uli'-ki ntodea : " Ane wae , wai'-ka-kaiwo pongkoni' tetu butu-butu eo-na ! "
43006035	Na'uli' Yesus : " Aku' toi-mi pongkoni' to mpowai' katuwua' . Hema to tumai hi Aku' uma-rapa mo'oro' , pai' hema to mepangala' hi Aku' uma-rapa ngkamara , duu' kahae-hae-na .
43006036	Aga hewa to ku'uli' we'i , nau' nihilo-ama , uma oa'-a nipangala' .
43006037	Hawe'ea tauna to nawai'-maka Tuama-ku , bate tumai hi Aku' . Pai' hema-hema to tumai hi Aku' , bate kutarima-i pai' uma-i kupopalai .
43006038	Apa' tumai-a ngkai suruga , uma mpobabehi konoa-ku moto . Tumai-a mpobabehi konoa-na Alata'ala to mposuro-a .
43006039	Toi-mi konoa-na : bona ngkai hawe'ea tauna to nawai'-ka , neo' mpai' ria haduaa to moronto , bate kupopemata-ra omea hi Eo Kiama .
43006040	Toi-mi konoa Tuama-ku : bona hawe'ea to mpohilo pai' to mepangala' hi Aku' Ana'-na mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na , pai' kupopemata-ra hi Eo Kiama . "
43006041	Ngkai ree , mparangkunutia-ramo to Yahudi , apa' na'uli'-hana Yesus , Hi'a-mi pongkoni' to mana'u tumai ngkai suruga .
43006042	Momepololitai-ramo ra'uli' : " Ah , Hi'a toe-le Yesus , ana' Yusuf . Ta'inca moto tina-na pai' tuama-na . Napa-di-hana pai' na'uli' ngkai suruga-ie ? "
43006043	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Neo'-koi ngkunuti .
43006044	Uma ria haduaa to ma'ala tumai hi Aku' , ane uma-ra nakeni Tuama-ku to mposuro-a . Pai' kupopemata-ra omea hi Eo Kiama .
43006045	Hi rala sura nabi-nabi owi te'uki' hewa toi : ' Alata'ala mpotudui' hawe'ea topetuku'-na . ' Jadi' , hawe'ea tauna to mpo'epe pai' mpotarima tudui'-na Tuama-ku , bate tumai-ra hi Aku' .
43006046	Aga neo' ni'uli' wae , ria mpu'u-ramo to mpohilo Tuama-ku . Muntu' Aku'-wadi to mpohilo-i , apa' Aku' ngkai Alata'ala-a-kuna .
43006047	Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : hema to mepangala' hi Aku' , mporata-ramo katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na .
43006048	Aku'-mi pongkoni' to mpowai' katuwua' .
43006049	" Pongkoni' to rahanga' manna to rakoni' ntu'a-ni owi hi papada to wao' uma mpowai' katuwua' , apa' mate omea moto-ra .
43006050	Aga uma hewa toe ane pongkoni' to mana'u tumai ngkai suruga . Hema-hema to ngkoni' pongkoni' toi , uma-ra mate .
43006051	Aku' toi-mi pongkoni' to mana'u tumai ngkai suruga , pongkoni' to tuwu' . Tauna to ngkoni' pongkoni' toi tuwu' duu' kahae-hae-na . Pongkoni' to tuwu' tohe'i , batua-na woto-ku to kupewai' bona manusia' mporata katuwua' . "
43006052	Kara'epe-na to Yahudi lolita-na Yesus toe , momehono'-ramo himpau hira' , ra'uli' : " Beiwa-i ma'ala mpewai' woto-na hi kita' bona takoni'-e ? "
43006053	Toe pai' na'uli'-raka : " Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : Ane uma nikoni' woto-ku , Aku' Ana' Manusia' , pai' uma ni'inu raa'-ku , uma-koi mporata katuwua' kao'-ni .
43006054	Tauna to ngkoni' woto-ku pai' nginu raa'-ku , mporata-ramo katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na , pai' kupopemata-ra hi Eo Kiama .
43006055	Apa' woto-ku pongkoni' mpu'u , pai' raa'-ku ininu mpu'u .
43006056	Tauna to ngkoni' woto-ku pai' nginu raa'-ku , tida-ra hintuwu' hante Aku' , pai' Aku' hante hira' .
43006057	" Tuama-ku to mposuro-a , Hi'a-mi pehupaa' katuwua' , pai' Aku' tuwu' ngkai Hi'a . Wae wo'o tauna to ngkoni' woto-ku , mporata-ra katuwua' ngkai Aku' .
43006058	Toi mpu'u-mile pongkoni' to mana'u ngkai suruga-e , uma hewa manna to rakoni' ntu'a-ni owi . Nau'-ra ngkoni' manna toe , bate mate oa'-ra . Tapi' tauna to ngkoni' pongkoni' toi-e , tuwu'-ra duu' kahae-hae-na . "
43006059	Yesus mpololita hawe'ea toe nto'u petudui'-na hi tomi posampayaa hi Kapernaum .
43006060	Kampo'epe-ra lolita Yesus toe we'i , wori' topetuku'-na mpo'uli' : " Ah ! Mokoro rahi tudui' toe-e . Hema mpai' to mpokule' mpotuku' ! "
43006061	Ntaa' na'inca moto-di Yesus kangkunuti-ra topetuku'-nae . Toe pai' na'uli'-raka : " Ha nipokedi' nono mpo'epe tudui'-ku we'i ?
43006062	Ane wae-di , beiwa mpai' ane nihilo-apa , Aku' Ana' Manusia' , ngkahe' nculii' hilou hi po'ohaa'-ku ami' ?
43006063	Inoha' Alata'ala-hana to mpowai' katuwua' . Kuasa manusia' uma ria kalaua-na . Lolita to kupohowa'-kokoi mehuwu ngkai Inoha' Alata'ala pai' mpowai' katuwua' .
43006064	Aga nau' wae , ria moto-koi hantongo' to uma mepangala' . " Yesus mpo'uli' hewa toe apa' na'inca ami'-mi ngkai lomo'-na kahema-ra to uma mepangala' hi Hi'a , pai' na'inca wo'o kahema-na mpai' to mpobalu'-i hi bali'-na .
43006065	Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus : " Toe pai' ku'uli'-mi we'i , uma haduaa to ma'ala tumai hi Aku' ane uma-ra napiliu Tuama-ku . "
43006066	Ntepu'u ngkai tempo toe , wori' topetuku'-na Yesus mpalahii-i . Uma-rapa dota mpotuku'-i .
43006067	Jadi' , mepekune' wo'o-imi hi ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua , na'uli' : " Ha malai wo'o-koi mpai' koi'-e ? "
43006068	Na'uli' Simon Petrus : " Ha hilou hi hema-makai mpai' Pue' ? Iko-wadi to mpohowa' lolita to mpowai' katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na .
43006069	Kipangala'-mi pai' ki'inca ka' Iko-na Suro to moroli' ngkai Alata'ala . "
43006070	Na'uli' Yesus : " Aku' moto-mile to mpelihi-koi to hampulu' rodua toi-e . Nau' wae , hadua ngkai koi' mewali seta mpai' . "
43006071	To natoa' Yesus , Yudas ana' Simon Iskariot . Apa' nau' Yudas hadua ngkai ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua , hi'a mpai' to mpobalu' Yesus hi bali'-na .
43007001	Oti toe , Yesus modao' hi tana' Galilea . Uma-ipi dota hilou hi tana' Yudea , apa' topoparenta to Yahudi hi ria doko' mpopatehi-i .
43007002	Nto'u toe , neo' rata-mi eo bohe to Yahudi to rahanga' Posusa' Pobamaru' .
43007003	Jadi' , ompi'-na Yesus mpobawai-i hilou hi Yudea mpokaralai eo bohe toe , ra'uli'-ki : " Neo'-hawo ntora hi rehe'i ! Hilou-tamo hi Yudea , bona topetuku'-nu mpohilo anu mekoncehi to nubabehi .
43007004	Uma-ko mpai' jadi' tau bohe ane ntora hi rehe'i-wadi-ko . Ane mpobabehi anu mekoncehi mpu'u-ko , popohiloi hawe'ea tauna hi dunia' ! "
43007005	Hewa toe-mi lolita-ra ompi'-na Yesus , apa' uma wo'o-ra-rawo mepangala' hi Hi'a .
43007006	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Ko'ia rata tempo-na kupopehuwu woto-ku . Ane koi'-koina , uma beiwa ba nto'uma-koi hilou hi Yerusalem ,
43007007	apa' uma ria tauna to mpokahuku'-koi . Aku'-e , rapokahuku'-a-kuna tauna to dada'a hi dunia' toi , apa' ntora ku'uli'-raka kadada'a kehi-ra .
43007008	Meri'ulu-mokoi hilou hi posusaa' toe ria . Aku' , ko'ia-a-kuna hilou , apa' ko'ia rata tempo-ku . "
43007009	Wae-mi lolita Yesus hi ompi'-na , pai' tida moto-imi hi Galilea .
43007010	Hilou mpu'u-ramo ompi'-na Yesus hi Yerusalem bona mpokaralai Posusa' Pobamaru' hi ria . Ntaa' metuku' bongo moto-idi-hawo Yesus-e , aga hadudua-na bona neo' ra'incai ntodea .
43007011	Hi posusaa' toe , topoparenta to Yahudi ntora mpopali'-i , ra'uli' : " Hiapa-imidi Yesus-e ? "
43007012	Pai' ntodea wo'o , mparanusi-ramo mpotompo'wiwi-i . Ria-ra to mpo'uli' : " Tauna to lompe' moto-i-hawo . " Hantongo' wo'o mpo'uli' : " Uma-di ! Topebagiu-i-hana ! "
43007013	Tapi' uma haduaa to daho' mpolonto' , apa' me'eka' wo'o-ra wa hi topoparenta to Yahudi .
43007014	Pentongoa' posusa' tohe'e , Yesus mesua' hi rala Tomi Alata'ala , pai' natepu'u-mi metudui' .
43007015	Konce-ra topoparenta to Yahudi mpo'epe tudui'-na , ra'uli' : " Beiwa pai' na'inca ihi' Buku Tomoroli' , bo uma-i-hawo mosikola-e ? "
43007016	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " To kutudui'-kokoile , tudui' ngkai Alata'ala to mposuro-a , bela tudui'-ku moto .
43007017	Hema to doko' mpobabehi konoa Alata'ala , ra'inca mpai' kangkaiapa-na tudui'-ku toi , ba ngkai Alata'ala mpu'u-di ba lolita-ku moto-wadi .
43007018	Tauna to mpokeni lolita-na moto , mpope'une'-i-wadi . Tapi' tauna to mpali' karabilaa'-na Alata'ala to mposuro-i , tauna to monoa'-i , uma ria pebagiua-na .
43007019	Nabi Musa owi mpowai'-koi Atura Pue' . Tapi' uma-koi ria haduaa to mpotuku' Atura toe . Napa pai' doko' nipatehi-a ? "
43007020	Ra'uli' ntodea : " Wuli-ko ! Hema to doko' mpopatehi-ko ? "
43007021	Na'uli' Yesus : " Mekehele-koi , apa' mpaka'uri'-a tauna hi Eo Sabat .
43007022	Hiaa' koi' wo'o mobago moto hi Eo Sabat ane mpobabehi-koi ada petini' . Nabi Musa owi mpohubui-koi mpotini' ana'-ni . ( Tapi' kakoo-kono-na ada petini' toe ngkai ntu'a-ta owi to meri'ulu ngkai Musa , bela ngkai Musa moto . ) Ane ria ana'-ni to kana ratini' hi Eo Sabat , bate nitini' moto-i .
43007023	Jadi' , ane metini'-koi hi Eo Sabat bona neo' ntiboki Atura Musa , napa pai' nikaroe-a apa' mpaka'uri'-a tauna hi Eo Sabat bona hobo' woto-na lompe' ?
43007024	Neo' ranaa to kahiloa hi mali-na-wadi . Pakanoa' powile-ni bona nihilo napa to makono . "
43007025	Kara'epe-na pue' ngata Yerusalem lolita-na Yesus toe , ingu'-ramo . Ria-ra to mpo'uli' : " Ha bela tauna toe-imi mai to rapali' pangkeni-ta , doko' rapatehi-e ?
43007026	Hiaa' he'e-imi mai metudui' hante uma ria kakoo-koroa'-na , pai' uma hema to mpokamaro-i . Ba lue' ra'inca lau-mi pangkeni-ta Kahi'a-na Magau' Topetolo'-e ?
43007027	Aga uma-hawo masipato' Kahi'a-na Magau' Topetolo' , apa' ta'inca kangkaiapa-na . Ane rata mpu'u mpai' Magau' Topetolo' to rajanci owi-e , uma mpai' hema to mpo'incai kangkaiapa-na . "
43007028	Jadi' , bula-na Yesus metudui' hi rala Tomi Alata'ala , mekio'-i napesukui , na'uli' : " Ni'uli' ni'inca moto kahema-ku pai' kangkaiapa-ku . Tumai-a , uma ntuku' konoa-ku moto . Tumai-a mpotuku' konoa-na Alata'ala to mposuro-a . Hi'a-mi to masipato' rapangala' . Tapi' koi' uma mpo'incai-i .
43007029	Aku' , ku'inca-i apa' ngkai Hi'a pehupaa'-ku , pai' Hi'a to mposuro-a . "
43007030	Nto'u toe , ria-ra to doko' mpohoko'-i , aga uma hema to dungku pale-ra hi Hi'a , apa' ko'ia rata tempo-na .
43007031	Wori' hi olo' tau ntodea to mepangala' hi Hi'a , ra'uli' : " Magau' Topetolo' mpu'u-i-tawo' , baa' wori'-di tanda mekoncehi to nababehi-e . "
43007032	Ria-ra to Parisi to mpo'epe kamparanusi-ra ntodea mpotompo'wiwi Yesus . Toe pai' to Parisi hante imam pangkeni mpohubui ba hangkuja dua topojaga Tomi Alata'ala hilou mpohoko'-i .
43007033	Nto'u toe , Yesus mpololitai ntodea , na'uli'-raka : " Hampai'-a-damo dohe-ni . Nculii'-a mpai' hilou hi Hi'a to mposuro-a .
43007034	Nipali'-a mpai' , aga uma-apa niruai' . Pai' hi kahilouaa-ku uma-koi bisa hilou . "
43007035	Ingu'-ramo topoparenta to Yahudi mpo'epe lolita-na , pai' momepekune'-ramo , ra'uli' : " Hilou hiapa-ile' , pai' na'uli' uma-i mpai' taruai'-e ? Meka' ba hilou-i mo'oha' dohe to Yahudi to mposowo'-ra to Yunani , pai'-i mpotudui'-ra to Yunani .
43007036	Pai' napa batua lolita-na to mpo'uli' , tapali'-i aga uma-i taruai' , pai' uma-ta bisa hilou hi kahilouaa-na ? "
43007037	Eo ka'omea-na susa' tohe'e , eo to meliu karapomobohe-na . Hi eo toe , mokore-imi Yesus hi rala Tomi Alata'ala , pai'-i mekio' : " Hema-koi to ngkamara , tumai-mokoi hi Aku' pai' nginu !
43007038	Hewa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' : hema to mepangala' hi Aku' , ngkai nono-ra mo'ili wori' ue to tuwu' . "
43007039	Lolita-na Yesus toe mpowalatu Inoha' Tomoroli' , to mehompo mpai' hi tauna to mepangala' hi Hi'a . Nto'u pololita-na Yesus toe , Inoha' Tomoroli' ko'ia mehompo hi topetuku'-na , apa' Yesus ko'ia rapomobohe .
43007040	Wori' tauna mpo'epe lolita Yesus toe , pai' ria-ra hantongo' to mpo'uli' : " Bate Hi'a-mile nabi to najanci Alata'ala owi-e . "
43007041	Hantongo' wo'o-ra mpo'uli' : " Magau' Topetolo' mpu'u-idi ! " Aga ria wo'o-ra to mpo'uli' : " Ah , to Galilea-i-hanale ! Uma masipato' Magau' Topetolo' mehupa' ngkai Galilea .
43007042	Rala Buku Tomoroli' te'uki' : Magau' Topetolo' muli Magau' Daud , pai' mehupa' ngkai ngata Betlehem , ngata kaputua Daud . "
43007043	Alaa-na momehono' lau-ramo ntodea : hantongo'-ra mepangala' hi Yesus , hantongo' uma .
43007044	Ria-ra to doko' mpohoko'-i , aga uma hema to dungku pale-ra .
43007045	Topojaga Tomi Alata'ala to rahubui mpohoko' Yesus , nculii'-ramo hilou hi to Parisi pai' imam pangkeni . Uma-ra oko mpohoko'-i . Ra'uli' pangkeni toera : " Napa-di pai' uma-i nihoko' pai' nikeni tumai-e ? "
43007046	Ratompoi' : " Apa' ko'ia ria ki'epei tauna to mololita hewa Hi'a ! "
43007047	Mehono' to Parisi toera : " Ei'-e ! Ha nabagiu wo'o-moko-koiwo koi'-e ?
43007048	Hilo , uma ria hadua pangkeni ba to Parisi to mepangala' hi Yesus .
43007049	Muntu' ntodea to mpangala'-i , apa' uma ra'incai Atura Musa . Harala-rada ! "
43007050	Ngkai ree , mololita wo'o-mi-hawo hadua to Parisi to rahanga' Nikodemus . Nikodemus toei , ria-imi hangkani mpencuai' Yesus . Na'uli' Nikodemus mpo'uli'-raka doo-na :
43007051	" Ntuku' atura-ta-hawo , uma-ta ma'ala mpohuku' tauna ane ko'ia-hawo ra'epe noa'-na pai' raparesa' gau'-na . "
43007052	Hampetompoi' doo-na : " Ha ngkai Galilea wo'o-ko-kowo iko-e ! Wile-dile pai' kamata rala Buku Tomoroli'-e . Uma ria nabi to mehupa' ngkai Galilea . "
43007053	Oti toe , nculii'-ramo , hore-hore hilou hi tomi-ra .
43008001	Tapi' Yesus hilou hi Bulu' Zaitun .
43008002	Kampeneo-na mepupulo ngkii , hilou wo'o-imi hi Tomi Alata'ala . Tumai-ramo ntodea mpomohui'-i , pai' mohura-imi mpotudui'-ra .
43008003	Bula-na metudui' toe , rata-ramo guru agama hante to Parisi , mpokeni hadua tobine to rarata bula-na mobualo' , rapopokore-i hi laintongo' ntodea .
43008004	Ra'uli' mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Guru , tobine tetui rarata kongko bula-na mobualo' !
43008005	Hi rala Atura Musa , ria parenta to mpo'uli' : tobine to mogau' hewa toe kana rapana' watu duu'-na mate . Jadi' Iko , beiwa-kowo pobotuhi-nu ? "
43008006	Patuju pompekunea'-ra toe , mpali' kedo' , bona ma'ala-ra mposalai' Yesus . Tapi' Yesus , uma-i winihi . Motungka'-i-wadi mo'uki' hi tana' hante karawe-na .
43008007	Ka'omea-na , apa' rajojo mpekune'-i , mebago'-imi pai' na'uli'-raka : " Hema-koi to uma ria jeko'-ni , hi'a-mi to lomo'-na mpopana' tobine toei ! "
43008008	Oti toe , motungka' wo'o-imi , pai'-i mo'uki' tena hi tana' hante karawe-na .
43008009	Kara'epe-na pangkeni to Yahudi lolita Yesus tohe'e , pengkawusili-rami hadua hadua , ntepu'u ngkai totu'a duu' rata hi to mongura . Ka'omea-na , malai omea-ramo , muntu' Yesus-damo to hi ree hante tobine toei hi laintongo' ntodea .
43008010	Ngkai ree , mebago'-imi Yesus pai' mpo'uli'-ki tobine toei : " Hiapa-ramo we'i to mpakilu-koe ? Ha uma-rapa ria to doko' mpohuku'-koe ? "
43008011	Natompoi' tobine toei : " Uma-pi hema , Pue' . " Na'uli' Yesus : " Aku' wo'o uma mpohuku'-ko . Wae-pi , hilou-moko , pai' nubahakai-mi mpobabehi jeko' . " ) )
43008012	Oti toe , mololita wo'o-imi Yesus hi to Yahudi , na'uli' : " Aku' toi-mi baja to mpobajahi nono manusia' . Tauna to mpotuku'-a , uma-ra momako' hi rala kabengia-na . Mporata-ra baja to mpowai' katuwua' . "
43008013	Ra'uli' to Parisi : " Uma-le makono lolita-nue , apa' mpo'une' woto-nu moto-moko-kona . "
43008014	Na'uli' Yesus : " Nau' mpotompo'wiwi woto-ku moto-ale , makono oa' lolita-ku , apa' ku'inca kangkaiapa-ku , pai' ku'inca hiapa kahilouaa-ku . Aga koi' , uma ni'incai .
43008015	Koi' mpohurai kara-kara ntuku' pekiri manusia' . Aku' , uma-a mpohurai kara-kara hema-hema .
43008016	Ane rapa'-na mpohurai-a kara-kara tauna , pobotuhi-ku bate monoa' , apa' uma hadudua-ku . Tuama-ku to mposuro-a , Hi'a-mi doo-ku .
43008017	" Hi rala Buku Atura-ni moto te'uki' hewa tohe'i : ' Ane ria nte rodua sabi' to hibalia lolita-ra , posabi'-ra toe ma'ala rapangala' . '
43008018	Ria-mi rodua sabi'-ku : Aku' moto-mi hadua , pai' karodua-na Tuama-ku to mposuro-a . "
43008019	Ra'uli' to Parisi : " Ha hiapa-i tuama-nue ? " Na'uli' Yesus : " Apa' uma ni'incai-a , toe pai' uma wo'o ni'incai Tuama-ku . Ane ke ni'inca mpu'u-a , tantu ni'inca wo'o-i Tuama-ku . "
43008020	Hawe'ea toe na'uli' Yesus bula-na metudui' hi rala Tomi Alata'ala , mohu' peti' pompunaa' doi pepue' . Ko'ia oa'-i rahoko' , apa' ko'ia rata tempo-na .
43008021	Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus hi topoparenta to Yahudi : " Hilou-a mpai' , pai' nipali'-a , aga mate-koi mpai' ntali jeko'-ni-pidi . Hi kahilouaa-ku uma-koi bisa hilou . "
43008022	Mpo'epe toe , momepololitai-ramo topoparenta to Yahudi , ra'uli' : " Napa batua-na lolita-na toe-e we'i ? Ba doko' mengkahunca'-idi , pai' na'uli' uma-ta bisa hilou hi kahilouaa-nae . "
43008023	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Koi'-le ngkai kadingkia'-na , Aku' ngkai kalangkoa-na . Koi' ngkai dunia' toi , Aku' uma-a ngkai dunia' toi .
43008024	Toe pai' ku'uli'-kokoi , mate-koi mpai' ntali jeko'-ni . Apa' ane uma nipangala' lolita-ku to mpo'uli' kahema-ku , bate mate mpu'u-koi ntali jeko'-ni . "
43008025	Rapekune'-i : " Ha hema mpu'u-ko-kowo Iko-e ? " Na'uli' Yesus : " Napa-pi kalaua-na mpololitai-koi !
43008026	Wori'-pidile ke to ku'uli' mposalai'-koie . Tapi' Hi'a to mposuro-a , masipato' lia-i rapangala' , pai' napa to ku'epe ngkai Hi'a , toe-mi to kuparata hi koi' to hi dunia' . "
43008027	To na'uli' Yesus tohe'e , mpotompo'wiwi Tuama-na , tapi' uma ra'incai batua-na .
43008028	Toe pai' na'uli' tena-raka : " Ane nipokalangko-apa mpai' , Aku' Ana' Manusia' , lako' ni'inca-di ka' Aku'-nami . Uma ria hanyalaa to kubabehi ntuku' konoa-ku moto . Muntu' mpo'uli'-a napa to natudui'-ka Tuama-ku .
43008029	Hi'a-mi to mposuro-a , pai' nadohei oa'-a . Uma-a napelele' hadudua-ku , apa' kubabehi oa' napa to mpakagoe' nono-na . "
43008030	Ka'oti-na Yesus mpo'uli' hawe'ea toe , wori' tauna mepangala' hi Hi'a .
43008031	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka to Yahudi to mepangala' hi Hi'a : " Ane tida-koi mpotuku' tudui'-ku , koi' jadi' topetuku'-ku mpu'u .
43008032	Pai' ane topetuku'-ku mpu'u-mokoi , ni'inca mpu'u mpai' tudui' to makono , alaa-na tebahaka-mokoi . "
43008033	Hampetompoi'-ra : " Kai' toi-le , muli Abraham ! Uma-ka-kaina ria rapobatua . Napa-di pai' nu'uli' tebahaka-kai mpai' ? "
43008034	Na'uli' Yesus : " Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : hawe'ea tauna to mpobabehi jeko' , napobatua jeko'-ramo .
43008035	Ane batua , uma monoa' katida-na hi tomi maradika-na . Aga ane ana' maradika moto-hana , monoa' katida-na hi tomi tuama-na .
43008036	Jadi' , ane Aku' mpobahaka-koi ngkai jeko'-ni , tebahaka mpu'u-mokoi , apa' Aku' Ana' Alata'ala-a .
43008037	Ku'inca moto-le kamuli-na Abraham-koie . Aga ria-koi to doko' mpatehi-a , apa' uma nipoinono lolita-ku .
43008038	Napa to kuhilo hi Tuama-ku , tetu-mi to ku'uli'-kokoi . Hiaa' koi'-koina mpobabehi napa to natudui'-kokoi tuama-ni . "
43008039	Ra'uli' to Yahudi : " Tuama-kaile , Abraham ! " Na'uli' Yesus : " Ane muli Abraham mpu'u-koi , tantu nituku' po'ingku-na .
43008040	Kuparata-kokoi tudui' to makono to kutarima ngkai Alata'ala , hiaa' doko' nipatehi lau-ada ! Uma hewa po'ingku-ni tetu po'ingku-na Abraham .
43008041	Po'ingku-ni tetu bate mpotuku' po'ingku tuama-ni ! " Hampetompoi' to Yahudi : " Aga kai'-le , bela-kai ana' una ! Tuama-kai hadua lau-wadi , Hi'a-mi Alata'ala . "
43008042	Na'uli' Yesus : " Ane bongko Alata'ala mpu'u Tuama-ni , ke nipoka'ahi'-a , apa' Aku' ngkai Alata'ala-a , pai' ohe'i-ama naposuro . Uma-a tumai ntuku' konoa-ku moto . Tumai-a ntuku' konoa-na Alata'ala , apa' Hi'a to mposuro-a .
43008043	Uma ami' ni'incai batua-na lolita-ku , apa' uma-koi ntaha mpo'epe tudui'-ku .
43008044	Magau' Anudaa'-hanale tuama-nie ! Pai' doko' oa'-koi mpotuku' konoa tuama-ni tetu . Ngkai lomo'-na , topepatehi ami'-imi . Uma-i ria mpo'uli' napa to makono , apa' uma ria napa-napa to makono hi hi'a . Ane moboa'-i , gati-nami-hana , apa' topoboa' ami'-i , pai' hawe'ea tauna to moboa' mpo'uhi kehi-na .
43008045	Jadi' , toe pai' uma-a nipangala' , apa' mpo'uli' to makono-a-kuna .
43008046	Hema-koi to ma'ala mpotudo' karia jeko'-ku ? Ane mpo'uli'-a anu makono , napa-di pai' uma-a nipangala'-e ?
43008047	Tauna to napo'ana' Alata'ala doko' mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala . Tapi' koi' , uma-koi dota mpo'epe lolita-ku , apa' bela-koi ana' Alata'ala . "
43008048	To Yahudi mporuge'-i Yesus , ra'uli' : " To Samaria-ko ! Wuli-ko , hewa to ki'uli' ami'-mi ! "
43008049	Na'uli' Yesus : " Uma-a wuli . Aku' mpobila' Tuama-ku . Hiaa' koi' , uma nibila'-a .
43008050	Uma-a mpope'une' . Alata'ala-damo to mpobila'-a , pai' Hi'a to mpobotuhi kamakono-ku ba ka'uma-na .
43008051	Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : Hema to mpotuku' lolita-ku , uma-ra mate , tuwu'-ra duu' kahae-hae-na . "
43008052	Ra'uli' to Yahudi : " Wae lau ki'inca mpu'u-mi kawuli-nu ! Bangku' Abraham-hawoe' , mate moto-i . Wae wo'o hawe'ea nabi owi , mate moto-ra . Hiaa' nu'uli'-kona , hema to mpotuku' lolita-nu uma-ra mate .
43008053	Ha nu'uli'-kona meliu tuwu'-nu ngkai ntu'a-ta Abraham , to mahae-imi mate ? Ha meliu tuwu'-nu ngkai hawe'ea nabi to mate-ramo ? Nu'uli' hema rahi-dakoe ? "
43008054	Na'uli' Yesus : " Ane rapa'-na mpakalangko woto-ku moto-a , uma ntoto ria kalaua-na . Tapi' Tuama-kumi to mpakalangko-a . Ni'uli'-koina Kahi'a-na Alata'ala to nipue' .
43008055	Tapi' kakoo-kono-na uma-i ni'incai . Ane Aku' , ku'inca-i . Ane rapa'-na ku'uli' uma-i ku'incai , boa'-ama hewa koi' . Apa' ku'inca mpu'u-i , pai' kutuku' lolita-na .
43008056	Ane ntu'a-ni Abraham , goe'-i apa' na'inca kanahilo-na mpai' eo karataa-ku . Jadi' hewa toe lau , nahilo-mi karataa-ku pai' goe' lia-imi . "
43008057	Ra'uli' to Yahudi : " Umuru-nule , ko'ia hono' lima mpulu' mpae . Ha pasi' nuhilo-imi-kona Abraham-e ? "
43008058	Na'uli' Yesus : " Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : Kako'ia-na putu Abraham , Aku' toi , mpolia' ria-ama ! "
43008059	Kara'epe-na to Yahudi toe we'i , ntima' watu-ramo doko' rawatuhi-ki bona mate-imi . Ntaa' we'i , mengkawusili-imi Yesus ngkai Tomi Alata'ala .
43009001	Bula-na Yesus momako' , mpohilo-i hadua tauna to wero ngkai lomo' kaputu-na .
43009002	Ana'guru-na mpekune'-i : " Guru , napa pai' wero ami'-i ngkai kaputu-nae ? Ba jeko'-na moto-di , ba jeko' totu'a-nadi ? "
43009003	Na'uli' Yesus : " Bela jeko'-na moto , pai' bela wo'o jeko' totu'a-na . Toi jadi' bona tauna mpohilo baraka' Alata'ala to madupa' hi woto-na .
43009004	Bula-na mobaja-pidi , kana tapobago bago-na Alata'ala to mposuro-a . Apa' neo' rata-mi bengi-na , pai' uma-pi hema to mobago .
43009005	Bula-ku hi dunia'-pidi , Aku' toi-mi baja to mpobajahi nono manusia' . "
43009006	Ka'oti-na mololita hewa toe , na'uelikui-mi tana' , nagalo hante tana' hangkedi' bona morege' , nagelai'-ki mata-na towero toei ,
43009007	pai' na'uli'-ki : " Hilou-ko monoku hi wuhu' Siloam . " ( Hanga' " Siloam " toe , batua-na " Rasuro . " ) Kahilou-nami monoku . Ponculii'-na , pehilo-imi-hawo .
43009008	Ngkai ree , tongki-na pai' tauna to biasa mpohilo-i kakarapi'-rapi' , momepekune'-ramo ra'uli' : " Hema-idi toe-e mai ? Ha bela hi'a-mi towero to biasa mohura kakarapi'-rapi'-e ? "
43009009	Ria to mpo'uli' : " Hi'a-midi ! " Aga ria wo'o mpo'uli' : " Bela-e' . Kahibalia lence-ra-wadi-hawo . " Hiaa' hi'a moto-mi-hawo mpo'uli' : " Aku'-midi ! "
43009010	Jadi' , rapekune'-i : " Ha beiwa pai' alaa-na pehilo-ko ? "
43009011	Na'uli'-raka : " Tauna to rahanga' Yesus mpobabehi rege' , nagelai'-ki mata-ku , na'uli'-ka : ' Hilou-ko monoku hi wuhu' Siloam . ' Hilou mpu'u-ama monoku , ngkai ree pehilo-ama-kuwo ! "
43009012	Rapekune'-i : " Hiaa' hiapa-imi we'i ? " Na'uli'-raka : " Uma-kuwo ku'incai . "
43009013	Yesus mpogalo ueliku-na hante tana' pai' mpaka'uri' towero toe we'i nto'u Eo Sabat , eo pepuea'-ra to Yahudi . Jadi' , towero to pehilo-mi toei rakeni hilou hi to Parisi .
43009014	
43009015	To Parisi wo'o-mi-rawo mpekune'-i , ra'uli' : " Beiwa pai' alaa-na pehilo-koe ? " Na'uli'-raka : " Nagelai' mata-ku hante rege' , pai' kamonoku-ku , pehilo-ama . "
43009016	Ba hangkuja dua ngkai to Parisi toera mpo'uli' : " Tauna to mpobabehi tetu , uma-i ngkai Alata'ala , bo uma-i mpotuku' palia-ta hi Eo Sabat . " Tapi' to hantongo' mpo'uli' : " Hiaa' ane topojeko'-i , ngkaiapa-di baraka'-na mpobabehi wori' tanda mekoncehi hewa tohe'i-e ? " Alaa-na , ria lau-mi pomehonoa' hi himpau hira' .
43009017	Ngkai ree , mepekune' tena-ra to Parisi hi towero toei , ra'uli' : " Beiwa-kowo iko , napa to nu'uli' , apa' napaka'uri'-koko mata-nue . " Na'uli' towero toei : " Tantu Hi'a hadua nabi . "
43009018	Tapi' topoparenta to Yahudi , uma-ra mparasaya kahi'a-na mpu'u-mi towero-e ngone , pai' muu-mule' pehilo-imi . Toe pai' rakio' tina pai' tuama-na bona mpohirua'-raka ,
43009019	pai' rapompekunei' : " Ha makono mpu'u tauna toii ana'-ni , to ni'uli' wero ngkai lomo' kaputu-nae ? Hiaa' beiwa pai' alaa-na pehilo-i ? "
43009020	Ra'uli'-rawo tina pai' tuama-na : " To ki'inca-le , bate ana'-kai mpu'u-i-hawo , pai' wero mpu'u-i ngkai lomo' kaputu-na .
43009021	Aga beiwa pai' alaa-na pehilo-i , uma-kaiwo ki'incai . Pai' hema to mpaka'uri'-i , uma wo'o-kaiwo ki'incai . Kama-imi-hawo , pekune'-ki hi'a moto-mi-koiwo . Ma'ala-imi metompoi' moto . "
43009022	Tina pai' tuama-na mpo'uli' hewa toe , apa' me'eka'-ra hi topoparenta to Yahudi . Apa' hibalia-mi pohawa'-ra : hema-hema to mpo'uli' Kayesus-na Magau' Topetolo' rapopalai ngkai tomi posampayaa .
43009023	Toe pai' totu'a-na mpo'uli' : " Kama-imi-hawo , pekune'-ki hi'a moto-mi-koiwo . "
43009024	Oti toe , rakio' tena-i tauna to wero toei we'i , pai' ra'uli'-ki : " Alata'ala mpotiroi-ta ! Jadi' , uli' mpu'u-e' napa to makono ! Ki'inca moto-i Yesus tetui tauna topojeko' . "
43009025	Na'uli'-raka : " Aku'-le , uma ku'incai ba topojeko'-i ba uma . Sampale to ku'inca , wero-a wengi , tempo toi pehilo-ama . "
43009026	Ngkai ree , rapekune' tena-i : " Napa to nababehi-koko ? Beiwa-i mpaka'uri'-ko ? "
43009027	Natompoi'-ra : " Oti-mi kututura-kokoi we'i , ha uma ni'epei ? Napa pai' nipengeei oa'-e ? Ba doko' jadi' ana'guru-na lau-dakoie ? "
43009028	Ngkai ree , ralibui'-imi pai' ra'uli'-ki : " Iko-le ana'guru-na tau tetu-e ! Kai' ana'guru-na nabi Musa-ka-kaina !
43009029	Monoa' ki'inca Alata'ala mpoparata lolita-na hi Musa owi . Tapi' Yesus tetui , uma ki'incai kangkaiapa-na . "
43009030	Mehono'-i towero toei : " Me'ingui' lia-koi ! Ni'uli' uma ni'incai kangkaiapa-na , hiaa' napaka'uri' mata-ku !
43009031	Ta'inca moto Alata'ala uma mpotompoi' pomperapia' tauna topojeko' . Sampale-di mpobini'-i tilinga-na hi hema-hema to mengkoru hi Hi'a pai' to mpotuku' hawa'-na .
43009032	Ngkai lomo' kajadi' dunia' , ko'ia ria ta'epei tutura-na tauna towero ngkai lomo' kaputu-na ma'ala rapaka'uri' .
43009033	Ane Yesus uma-i ngkai Alata'ala , tantu uma-i bisa mpobabehi napa-napa . "
43009034	Hampetompoi'-ra : " Iko tetu to ponu' jeko' ngkai kaputu-nu , nta'ena' metudui' ! " Ngkai ree , rapopalai-imi ngkai tomi posampayaa .
43009035	Yesus mpo'epe karapopalai-na ngkai tomi posampayaa . Jadi' hilou-imi mpohirua'-ki , pai' na'uli'-ki : " Ha mepangala'-ko hi Ana' Manusia'-e ? "
43009036	Na'uli' tauna toei : " Uli'-ka-kuwo kahema-nai , bona kupangala'-i . "
43009037	Na'uli' Yesus : " Nuhilo-imile ! Hi'a-mile to mpololitai-koe . "
43009038	Na'uli' tauna toei : " Kupangala' , Pue' ! " pai' mowilingkudu-imi mponyompa-i .
43009039	Na'uli' Yesus : " Katumai-ku hi dunia' toi , tumai mpobotuhi kara-kara manusia' , bona tauna to wero ma'ala pehilo , pai' tauna to mpo'uli' pehilo moto-ra , wero lau-ra . "
43009040	Ba hangkuja dua to Parisi to hi ree mpo'epe lolita-na Yesus . Ra'uli' mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Ha nu'uli'-kona wero wo'o-kai kai'-e ? "
43009041	Na'uli' Yesus : " Ane rapa'-na hewa towero mpu'u-koi apa' uma ni'incai napa to makono , ke uma-koi masala' . Tapi' , apa' ni'uli'-koina pehilo moto-koie , bate masala'-koi-hawo . "
43010001	Na'uli' Yesus : " Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : ane ria tauna to mesua' hi rala gimpu ngkahe' wala , pai' uma-i ntara hi wobo' , topanako pai' toperampaki-i-hana .
43010002	Ane topo'ewu , mesua' ntara hi wobo' moto-i .
43010003	Topodongo wobo' mpobea-ki wobo' , pai' bima-na mpetonoi libu'-na ane nakio' hanga'-ra butu-butu ma'a-na , pai' nakeni-ra hilou hi mali-na .
43010004	Kanakeni-ra hilou hi mali-na omea , mako' meri'ulu-i ngkai bima-na , pai' bima-na mpotuku'-i , apa' ra'inca mpetonoi libu'-na .
43010005	Uma-ra mpotuku' tau ntani'-na . Ane ria tauna to bela topo'ewu-ra to mpokio'-ra , rapetiboi'-i , apa' uma ra'incai mpetonoi libu'-na . "
43010006	Yesus mpo'uli' walatu toe hi to Parisi , aga uma ra'incai patuju-na .
43010007	Toe pai' na'uli' wo'o-mi : " Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : Aku' toi-mi wobo' to natara bima mesua' hi rala gimpu .
43010008	Hawe'ea tauna to rata meri'ulu ngkai Aku' , topanako pai' toperampaki-ra-hana . Aga bima-ku uma mposaile' pekio'-ra .
43010009	Aku' toi-mi wobo' . Hema to mesua' ntara hi Aku' , mporata-ra kalompea' . Hira' hewa bima to mesua' hi rala gimpu pai' mehupa' hilou hi mali-na mporata kowo' to morudu' .
43010010	Patuju-na topanako-le , tumai doko' manako , mepatehi pai' megerohi . Tapi' Aku' tumai bona manusia' mporata katuwua' to uma mowo kalompe'-na .
43010011	" Aku' toi-mi topo'ewu to lompe' . Kupewai' tuwu'-ku bona bima-ku tuwu' .
43010012	Ane tauna to baha ragaji' , uma lompe' pompo'ewu-na , apa' bela hi'a pue' bima . Ane mpohilo-i serigala tumai , metibo'-i mpalahii bima ewua-na . Jadi' bima toe nadapa' pai' nahungongo' serigala , alaa-na pagaa'-gaa'-ramo .
43010013	Tauna to ragaji' toei metibo' , apa' mobago baha ragaji'-wadi . Uma-i mposaile' ewua-na .
43010014	" Aku' toi-mi topo'ewu to lompe' . Hewa Tuama-ku mpo'inca-a , pai' Aku' mpo'inca Tuama-ku , wae wo'o Aku' mpo'inca bima-ku , pai' bima-ku mpo'inca-a . Kupewai' tuwu'-ku bona bima-ku tuwu' .
43010015	
43010016	" Ria wo'o-pidi bima-ku to ntani'-na , to uma hi rala gimpu toi . Hira' wo'o mpai' kana kukeni tumai . Rapetonoi mpai' libu'-ku , bona hawe'ea bima-ku jadi' mopahantuda lau , pai' hadua-ku-wadi to mpo'ewu-ra omea .
43010017	" Tuama-ku mpoka'ahi'-a , apa' kupewai' tuwu'-ku bona kurua' nculii' tuwu'-ku .
43010018	Uma ria haduaa to mpatehi-a ane uma konoa-ku . Ku'agi mate hante karoli'-roli' nono-ku . Ria kuasa-ku mpewai' tuwu'-ku bona rapatehi , pai' ria wo'o kuasa-ku tuwu' nculii' . Toe-mi hawa' to kutarima ngkai Tuama-ku . "
43010019	Kara'epe-na to Yahudi pololita-na Yesus toe , momehono' wo'o-ramo .
43010020	Wori'-ra to mpo'uli' : " Kahawia'-ile ! Wuli-i ! Napa-pi kalaua-na tape'epei lolita-na . "
43010021	Aga ria wo'o to mpo'uli' : " Uma-di ! Tauna to napesuai' seta-le uma-hawo mololita hewa toei . Ha bisa wo'o-hawo seta mpaka'uri' tauna to wero-e ? "
43010022	Hi Yerusalem nto'u toe , tauna mpobabehi karamea mpokiwoi eo bohe pompowatia' Tomi Alata'ala owi . Nto'u toe , tempo lengi' .
43010023	Yesus momako' hi berewe Tomi Alata'ala , hi pengkawinaraa to rahanga' Pengkawinaraa Salomo .
43010024	Topoparenta to Yahudi mpotipuhi Yesus pai' ra'uli'-ki : " Napa pai' nupelele' oa'-kai ingu' , uma oa' nupakalonto' kahema-nue ? Ane bongko Magau' Topetolo' mpu'u-kole , uli' pakalonto' lau-mi . "
43010025	Na'uli' Yesus : " Oti-mi ku'uli'-kokoie , aga uma-koi dota mpangala' . Anu mekoncehi to kubabehi hante kuasa Tuama-ku , toe-mi to mpakanoto kahema-ku .
43010026	Tapi' uma oa' nipangala' , apa' bela-koi bima-ku .
43010027	Bima-ku mpetonoi libu'-ku . Ku'inca moto-ra , pai'-ra mpotuku'-a .
43010028	Kuwai'-ra katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na , pai' monoa'-mi ka'uma-ra mpai' rahuku' hi naraka . Uma ria haduaa to ma'ala mpo'agoi-a bima-ku .
43010029	Tuama-ku meliu kabaraka'-na ngkai hawe'ea , pai' Hi'a-mi to mpowai'-a bima-ku . Uma ria haduaa to ma'ala mpo'ago-ra ngkai Tuama-ku .
43010030	Aku' pai' Tuama-ku , hadua lau-wada-kai . "
43010031	Ngkai ree , to Yahudi mpotima' watu doko' rapana'-ki Yesus bona mate-i .
43010032	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Nihilo moto-a mpobabehi bago to lompe' ntuku' hawa' Tuama-ku . Ngkai bago-ku tohe'e , to'uma to masipato' nipatehi-ka ? "
43010033	Ra'uli' to Yahudi : " Bela ngkai pobago-nu to lompe' , pai' doko' kipatehi-ko . Pai' doko' kipatehi-kole apa' mpokedi' Alata'ala-ko-kona ! Api' manusia' biasa-wadi-ko , nu'uli'-kona Alata'ala-ko ! "
43010034	Na'uli' Yesus : " Hi rala Buku Atura-ni ria te'uki' Lolita Alata'ala hi pangkeni to Yahudi owi , hewa toi moni-na : ' Koi' , raponcawa Alata'ala-koi . '
43010035	Napa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' tetu , uma ria balia'-na . Jadi' , ane Buku Tomoroli' mpo'uli' ' Alata'ala-koi' hi tauna to mpotarima Lolita Alata'ala owi , peliu-liu-nami Aku' .
43010036	Apa' Aku' toi-e , to nawati' Tuama-ku , napowiwi napowiti' tumai hi dunia' . Jadi' , napa pai' ni'uli'-ka mpokedi'-a Alata'ala apa' ku'uli' ka' Aku'-na Ana'-na ?
43010037	" Ane rapa'-na uma kubabehi bago to ngkai Tuama-ku , neo'-a nipangala' .
43010038	Tapi' ane kubabehi moto-mi bago to ngkai Tuama-kue , kana nipangala'-a sabana pobago-ku toe . Nau' Aku' moto uma nipangalai' , kana nipangala' kangkai Alata'ala-na pobago-ku . Ane mepangala'-koi hi pobago-ku toe , ni'inca mpai' pai' monoto mpu'u hi nono-ni kahintuwu'-ku hante Tuama-ku , pai' Tuama-ku hintuwu' hante Aku' . "
43010039	Mpo'epe toe-di , to Yahudi doko' wo'o-ramo mpohoko'-i , aga tepetibo' moto-i .
43010040	Ngkai ree , malai wo'o-imi Yesus hilou hi dipo ue Yordan , hi peniua'-na Yohanes ri'ulu , pai'-i mo'oha' hi ria .
43010041	Wori' tauna hilou mpohirua'-ki , ra'uli' : " Yohanes uma mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi . Aga hawe'ea to na'uli' mpotompo'wiwi Yesus , makono omea . "
43010042	Toe pai' wori' tauna hi ree mepangala' hi Yesus .
43011001	Hadua tomane to rahanga' Lazarus mo'oha' hi ngata Betania hante ompi' bine-na Maria pai' Marta . ( Maria toe-mi mpai' to mpolanai witi' Yesus hante lana honga pai' naporihi hante wuluwoo'-na . ) Hangkani , peda'-i Lazarus .
43011002	
43011003	Ompi' bine-na to rodua toera mposuro tauna hilou hi Yesus , mpo'uli'-ki : " Pue' , bale-nu to nupe'ahi' , peda'-i . "
43011004	Kana'epe-na Yesus kareba toe , na'uli' : " Haki'-na tetu-e ria , uma napomate-ki . Toe jadi' bona Alata'ala rapomobohe , pai' bona Aku' wo'o , Ana'-na , rapomobohe . "
43011005	Yesus mpoka'ahi' Marta , Maria , pai' Lazarus .
43011006	Aga kana'epe-na kapeda'-na Lazarus , uma-i ulu hilou , bate hi po'ohaa'-na moto-i ro'eo-pi kahae-na .
43011007	Timpaliu ro'eo toe-di , pai' lako' na'uli'-raka ana'guru-na : " Kita-mi hilou nculii' hi tana' Yudea . "
43011008	Ra'uli' ana'guru-na : " Guru , ko'ia mahae to Yahudi hi ria doko' mpopatehi-ko . Napa wo'o-mi pai' doko' hilou hi ria-koe ? "
43011009	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Ha uma hampulu' rojaa to mobaja rala-na ha'eo ? Tauna to momako' hi eo-na , uma-ra tewinci' , apa' mpohilo-ra pehini eo to mpobajahi dunia' toi .
43011010	Aga tauna to momako' hi bengi-na , bate tewinci'-ra , apa' uma ria to mpobajahi-ra . "
43011011	Hewa toe-mi lolita Yesus , pai' oti toe na'uli' tena : " Bale-ta Lazarus , leta'-i . Hilou-a mpolike-i . "
43011012	Kakoo-kono-na , lolita-na Yesus toe mpowalatu kamate-na Lazarus . Tapi' ana'guru-na uma mpopaha walatu toe , ra'uli' leta' mpu'u-i Lazarus . Toe pai' ra'uli'-ki Yesus : " Pue' , ane leta'-i , mo'uri' moto-i mpai' . "
43011013	
43011014	Jadi' , nalohu lau-miraka batua walatu-na , na'uli' : " Mate-imi Lazarus .
43011015	Pai' goe'-a apa' uma kukaralai nto'u toe . Apa' napa to jadi' toe mpai' ria , mpokeni kalompea' hi koi' , bona mepangala'-koi hi Aku' . Hilou-tamo hi Lazarus . "
43011016	Tomas , to ra'atu Ntomoropa' , mpo'uli'-raka hingka ana'guru-na : " Kita-mi hilou mpotuku'-i , bona mate-ta hangkaa-ngkania hante Hi'a . " Jadi' hilou mpu'u-ramo hi tana' Yudea .
43011017	Karata-ra hi ngata Betania , mpolia' opo' mengi-imi Lazarus ratana .
43011018	Betania tohe'e mohu' Yerusalem , kira-kira tolu kilo kalaa-na .
43011019	Jadi' , wori'-ra to Yahudi to tumai mpotanta'u Marta pai' Maria hi kamate ompi'-ra toe .
43011020	Marta mpo'epe kaneo'-na rata-mi Yesus , kahilou-nami mpotomu-i . Tapi' Maria , hi tomi moto-i-hana .
43011021	Na'uli' Marta hi Yesus : " Pue' , ane ke hi rehe'i-ko wengi , ke uma-i mate ompi'-ku .
43011022	Aga nau' wae , ku'inca moto : napa-napa to nuperapi' hi Alata'ala tempo toi , bate nawai'-ko . "
43011023	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki : " Memata moto-ile mpai' ompi'-nue . "
43011024	Na'uli' Marta : " Io' , to ku'inca-le , memata moto mpu'u-i mpai' hi Eo Kiama , nto'u hawe'ea tomate rapopemata . "
43011025	Na'uli' Yesus : " Aku' toi-mi to mpopemata tomate , pai' to mpowai' katuwua' . Tauna to mepangala' hi Aku' , nau' mate-ra , tuwu' moto-ra mpai' .
43011026	Pai' hawe'ea tauna to tuwu' pai' mepangala' hi Aku' , bate uma-ra mate , duu' kahae-hae-na . Ha nupangala' to ku'uli' toe-e ? "
43011027	Na'uli' Marta : " Io' Pue' , kupangala' ka' Iko-na Ana' Alata'ala , Magau' Topetolo' to najanci Alata'ala owi to tumai hi dunia' . "
43011028	Ka'oti-na Marta mpo'uli' toe , hilou-imi hi tomi mpokio' Maria , pai' mpowara'-i na'uli'-ki : " Oe-imi ria Guru , doko' napohirua'-koko ! "
43011029	Mpo'epe tohe'e , napesahui Maria hilou mpohirua'-ki Yesus .
43011030	Nto'u toe , Yesus ko'ia mesua' hi rala ngata , hi mali ngata-i-pidi , hi kahiruaa'-na hante Marta we'i .
43011031	To Yahudi to mpodoo eo mpohilo kasosa-na Maria malai ngkai tomi . Ra'uli' : " Hilou hi daeo'-i tu , hilou motantangi' hi ria ! " Jadi' , hilou wo'o-ra-rawo mpotuku'-i .
43011032	Karata Maria hi pento'oa-na Yesus we'i , pai' kampohilo-na Yesus , powingkotu'-nami hi nyanyoa-na , pai' na'uli'-ki : " Pue' , ane ke hi rehe'i-ko , ke uma-i mate ompi'-ku . "
43011033	Kanahilo-na Yesus Maria motantangi' hante tauna to dohe-na , susa' pai' tuna-mi nono-na .
43011034	Napekune'-ra : " Ratana hiapa-i ? " Ra'uli' : " Mai-moko Pue' , kipo'ema'-ko hilou bona nuhilo . "
43011035	Mo'ili-mi ue mata-na Yesus .
43011036	Ra'uli' to Yahudi : " Hilo ! Uma mpu'u mowo kama'ahi'-na hi Lazarus ! "
43011037	Aga ria wo'o-ra to mpo'uli' : " Tauna towero napaka'uri' . Ha uma-i bisa mpaka'uri' Lazarus bona ke uma-i-hawo mate-e ? "
43011038	Ngkai ree , peda' wo'o-mi nono-na Yesus , pai'-i hilou hi daeo' . Daeo' toe , wulou' to ratowi hi panapa bulu' , pai' ra'unca hante watu to bohe .
43011039	Na'uli' Yesus : " Deru' watu tetu ! " Na'uli' Marta , ompi'-na tomate : " Neo'-pi rabea , Pue' . Mohoa-imi , apa' opo' mengi-imi ratana . "
43011040	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki Marta : " Ha uma ku'uli'-mikoko we'i , ane mepangala'-ko , nuhilo moto mpai' kabohe baraka'-na Alata'ala . "
43011041	Oti toe , raderu' mpu'u-mi watu po'unca daeo' . Yesus ngkongoa' hi langi' , na'uli' : " Tuama-ku , mpo'uli'-a tarima kasi , apa' nu'epe pomperapia'-ku tohe'i .
43011042	Ku'inca , bate nu'epe oa' lolita-ku . Aga tohe'i kupesukui mpo'uli' , bona ra'epe tauna to wori' to hi rehe'i lau , bona rapangala' ka' Iko-na mpu'u to mposuro-a . "
43011043	Oti toe , napesukui mekio' : " Lazarus ! Tumai-moko ! "
43011044	Mehupa'-imi tauna to mate toei ngkai rala daeo'-na . Pale-na pai' witi'-na teputu'-pidi hante hompu'-na , pai' woo'-na tehoo' hante lenco . Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Bongka pomputu'-na bona lompe' pomako'-na . "
43011045	Wori' to Yahudi to mpokinomo Maria nto'u toe , pai' rahilo napa to nababehi Yesus . Pai' wori'-ramo to mepangala' hi Hi'a .
43011046	Aga ria wo'o-ra hantongo' hilou hi to Parisi mpoparata napa to nababehi Yesus toe .
43011047	Toe pai' to Parisi hante imam pangkeni mpobabehi porumpua bohe hante topohura agama to ntani'-na . Ra'uli' : " Napa-koiwo to kana tababehi ? Apa' wori' mpu'u tanda mekoncehi to nababehi-e .
43011048	Ane tapelele' oa'-i , hawe'ea tauna mpai' mepangala' hi Hi'a omea-ramo . Ka'omea-na mpai' , tantara to Roma tumai mpogero ngata-ta hante Tomi Alata'ala . "
43011049	Ngkai ree , hadua ngkai laintongo'-ra to rahanga' Kayafas , Imam Bohe hi mpae toe , mpo'uli' : " Uma ni'incai napa-napa !
43011050	Uma ni'incai kalompea' ntodea . Agina lau-pi tau hadua mate mposampei ntodea , bona neo' mpai' ragero ngata-ta omea . "
43011051	Patuju-na Kayafas mpo'uli' hewa toe : Yesus kana rapatehi . Tapi' ria wo'o batua to kahanyala-na , to uma-hawo natungkai' . Apa' lawi' hi'a-mi Imam Bohe hi mpae toe-e , lolita-na mpolowa kamate-na mpai' Yesus mpotolo' to Yahudi .
43011052	Pai' uma muntu' to Yahudi-wadi . Ngkai kamate-na Yesus toe mpai' , hawe'ea ana' Alata'ala to pahawu'-hawu' hi humalili' dunia' rarumpu pai' rapahantuda lau .
43011053	Ntepu'u eo toe , hahawa' lau-ramo topoparenta to Yahudi mpopatehi Yesus .
43011054	Jadi' , toe pai' uma-ipi modao' hi rala tana'-ra to Yahudi , bona neo'-ipi rahiloi ntodea . Malai-imi ngkai ree hilou hi ngata to rahanga' Efraim hi wiwi' papada to wao' , pai' mo'oha' hi ree-imi hante ana'guru-na .
43011055	Nto'u toe , neo' rata-mi eo bohe agama Yahudi to rahanga' Eo Paskah . Kako'ia rata eo bohe toe , wori' tauna ngkai ngata ntani'-na hilou hi Yerusalem , bona mpobohoi' woto-ra ntuku' ada agama-ra .
43011056	Tauna to morumpu hi Yerusalem toe ntora mpopali' Yesus . Bula-ra moromu hi Tomi Alata'ala , momepololitai-ramo , ra'uli' : " Beiwa-koiwo pomporataa-ni ? Meka' uma-i mpai' tumai mpokaralai posusa' ? "
43011057	Ane imam pangkeni pai' to Parisi , ria ami' parenta-ra hi ntodea to mpo'uli' : " Hema-hema-koi to mpo'inca kahiapa-na Yesus , ncaliu ni'uli'-kakai , bona rahoko'-i . "
43012001	Ono eo kako'ia-na Eo Paskah , hilou-imi Yesus hi Betania , ngata katidaa-na Lazarus , to napotuwu' nculii'-e wengi .
43012002	Mpobabehi-ra karamea , apa' goe'-ra mpotarima Yesus hi ngata-ra . Marta moruhe , Lazarus mpohimpohura-ki Yesus pai' torata ntani'-na .
43012003	Bula-ra ngkoni' , tumai-i Maria ngkeni hantanga' lite lana honga . Lana toe rababehi ngkai rali' kaju to mohonga , masuli' lia oli-na . Natua lana toe hi witi'-na Yesus pai' naporihi hante wuluwoo'-na . Mohonga-damo hobo' hi rala tomi .
43012004	Hadua ana'guru-na Yesus to rahanga' Yudas Iskariot -- to mpobalu' Yesus hi bali'-nae mpai' -- mpo'uli' :
43012005	" Masuli' lia oli-na lana tetu , nte tolu atu doi pera' . Napa-di-hana pai' uma rapobalu' lau , pai' doi-na rawai'-raka tokabu ! "
43012006	Kakoo-kono-na , Yudas uma kamposaile'-na mpu'u tokabu . Api' katomanako-nadi ! Apa' hi'a to ntimamahi doi-ra , pai' pontu-na na'ala' bongo .
43012007	Na'uli' Yesus : " Pelele' moto-i-hawo ! Napa to nababehi toi , mpenonoi eo karatana-ku mpai' .
43012008	Ane tokabu , ria-pidi loga-ni mpotulungi-ra . Tapi' Aku' , neo' uma-pi ria loga-ni mpotulungi-a , apa' uma-apa mahae dohe-ni . "
43012009	Wori' to Yahudi mpo'epe karia-na Yesus hi Betania , toe pai' mo'iko-ra hilou doko' mpohilo-i . Pai' doko' wo'o-ra mpohilo Lazarus , to napotuwu' nculii' Yesus-e wengi .
43012010	Jadi' , mohawa' wo'o-ramo imam pangkeni doko' mpopatehi Lazarus .
43012011	Apa' ngkai hi'a pai' alaa-na wori' to Yahudi mpalahii-ra pai' mepangala' hi Yesus .
43012012	Kamepulo-na , wori' tauna hi Yerusalem mpo'epe kahilou-na Yesus mpotoa' ngata-ra . Nto'u toe , wori' lia tauna morumpu hi Yerusalem apa' neo' rata-mi Eo Paskah .
43012013	Mpo'ala'-ra palampa , pai' hilou-ra mpotomu-i . Ntora mekio'-ra : Une'-imi Pue' Ala ! " Pue' mpogane' Magau' to tumai mpokeni hanga'-na ! " Pue' mpogane' Magau' to Israel ! "
43012014	Yesus mpo'ala' hama'a keledai to mongura , pai' nahawi' . Pehawi'-na tohe'e mpopadupa' lolita nabi owi to mpo'uli' :
43012015	" Neo'-koi me'eka' , pue' ngata Sion . Hilo ! Etu-i tumai Magau'-ni . Mpohawi'-i hama'a ana' keledai . "
43012016	Nto'u toe , ko'ia rapaha ana'guru-na napa batua-na to jadi' toe . Aga ka'oti-na Yesus rapatehi pai' rapomobohe , rakiwoi-mi napa to jadi' hi Yesus toe , hewa to telowa ami' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' .
43012017	Hi Yerusalem nto'u toe , ria wo'o wori' tauna to dohe Yesus wengi nto'u kanakio'-na Lazarus ngkai rala daeo' pai' mpotuwu'-i nculii' . Tauna toera ntora mpojarita kajadia' toe .
43012018	Ngkai toe-mi pai' alaa-na wori' rahi tauna hilou mpotomu-i Yesus , apa' ra'epe Kahi'a-na to mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi toe .
43012019	Momepololitai-ramo to Parisi , ra'uli' : " Madagi-tamo toi-e ! Hilo-dile , hawe'ea tauna hi dunia' mpotuku'-i . "
43012020	Ngkai kawori' tauna to hilou hi Yerusalem mepue' nto'u Eo Paskah toe , ria wo'o ba hangkuja dua to Yunani .
43012021	To Yunani toera hilou hi Filipus , ra'uli'-ki : " Doko'-ka-kaiwo mpohirua'-ki Yesus . " ( Filipus tohe'e ngkai ngata Betsaida hi tana' Galilea . )
43012022	Filipus hilou mpo'uli'-ki Andreas , pai' hira' roduaa hilou mparata-ki Yesus .
43012023	Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Rata-mi tempo-na , Aku' Ana' Manusia' rapomobohe .
43012024	Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : Aku' ma'ala rarapai'-ki pae . Ane pae toe uma ratuja' hi tana' pai' ra'urihi hewa tomate , bate-na oa'-i . Tapi' ane ratuja'-i-damo , wori'-mi mpai' wua'-na .
43012025	Tauna to mpentaei konoa-na moto , moronto-ki mpai' katuwu'-na hi eo mpeno-na . Aga tauna to mpobahaka konoa-na hi dunia' toi , mporata-i mpai' katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na .
43012026	Hema-koi to doko' jadi' topobago-ku , kana mpotuku'-a , bona hiapa kahiloua-ku , retu wo'o-koi . Tuama-ku mpai' mpobila'-koi to jadi' topobago-ku .
43012027	" Susa' nono-ku toi-e . Uma ku'incai napa to kana ku'uli' . Ria hi rala nono-ku doko' mekakae : ' Mama , bahaka-a-kuwo ngkai kaparia to neo' mporumpa'-a toi-e ! ' Aga bo toe-mi pai' tumai-a hi rala dunia' , bona mpotodohaka kaparia toe .
43012028	Ku'uli' hewa toi : Mama , pomobohe-mi hanga'-nu ! " Ngkai ree , ria to mololita ngkai langi' mpo'uli'-ki Yesus : " Oti-mile kupomobohe hanga'-kue , pai' kupomobohe tena-pi mpai' . "
43012029	Ntodea to mpo'epe lolita ngkai langi' toe , mpo'uli' : " Toe lou moni kuna ! " Aga hantongo' mpo'uli' : " Bela-hawo kuna . Ria-hana mala'eka mpololitai-i . "
43012030	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Lolita to ni'epe toe we'i , rapohowa' uma bona mpotulungi Aku' . Rapohowa' bona mpotulungi koi'-hana .
43012031	Rata-mi tempo-na Alata'ala kana mpohurai hawe'ea kasalaa' manusia' hi dunia' . Pai' rata wo'o tempo-na Magau' Anudaa' to mpokuasai dunia' toi kana rapopalai .
43012032	Aga Aku' , ane rapokalangko-apa mpai' hi wongko dunia' , kukeni hawe'ea tauna tumai hi Aku' . "
43012033	Lolita-na Yesus toe , mpowalatu beiwa mpai' karapatehi-na .
43012034	Ra'uli' ntodea : " Hi rala Atura Pue' kibasa : Magau' Topetolo' tuwu' duu' kahae-hae-na . Napa-kona pai' nu'uli' Ana' Manusia' kana rapokalangko hi wongko dunia' ? Ana' Manusia' to'uma wo'o-pi to nu'uli' tetu-e ? "
43012035	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Hampai'-damo , pai' baja to mpobajahi-koi tempo toi-e , uma-pi ria dohe-ni . Kaliliu-mokoi mako' bula-na mobaja-pidi , bona neo'-koi narata bengi . Tauna to mako' hi rala kabengia-na , uma ra'incai hiapa kahiloua-ra .
43012036	Mepangala'-mokoi hi Aku' bula-ku ria-pidi dohe-ni mpobajahi-koi , bona mobaja nono-ni . " Ka'oti-na Yesus mpo'uli' hawe'ea toe , malai-imi ngkai ree , pai' uma-ipi mpopehuwu woto-na hi ntodea .
43012037	Nau' wori' tanda mekoncehi to nababehi Yesus hi mata to Yahudi , uma oa'-ra mepangala' hi Hi'a .
43012038	Jadi' , madupa'-mi lolita nabi Yesaya owi to mpo'uli' : Pue' , uma hema to mpangala' kareba to kikeni . Nau' nupopohiloi-ra kabaraka'-nu , uma oa' rapangalai' . "
43012039	Jadi' , uma-ra bisa mepangala' , apa' ria wo'o Lolita Alata'ala to na'uki' nabi Yesaya owi , to mpo'uli' :
43012040	" Na'uli' Pue' Ala : ' Tungkai' kupakawero-ra , bona uma-ra pehilo . Kupakako'o nono-ra , bona nono-ra uma monoto . Ka'omea-na mpai' uma-ra nculii' hi Aku' , toe pai' uma-ra kuwai' kalompea' . ' "
43012041	Lolita toe na'uki' nabi Yesaya owi , apa' nahilo ami'-mi kabaraka'-na Yesus , pai' nalowa-i .
43012042	Aga nau' wae , wori' moto pangkeni to Yahudi to mepangala' hi Yesus . Aga mepangala' bongo-ra-wadi , apa' me'eka'-ra nee-neo' mpai' to Parisi mpopalai-ra ngkai tomi posampayaa .
43012043	Apa' konoa-ra doko' ra'une' hingka doo-ra , uma rasaile' pe'une' to ngkai Alata'ala .
43012044	Yesus mpesukui mekio' , na'uli' : " Tauna to mepangala' hi Aku' , uma muntu' Aku' to rapangala' . Mepangala' wo'o-ramo hi Pue' Ala to mposuro-a .
43012045	Tauna to mpohilo-a , mpohilo Pue' Ala wo'o-ra to mposuro-a .
43012046	Tumai-a hi dunia' toi jadi' baja , bona hawe'ea tauna to mepangala' hi Aku' uma-pi mo'oha' hi rala kabengia-na .
43012047	" Tauna to mpo'epe lolita-ku pai' uma ratuku' , bela Aku' to mpohuku'-ra . Apa' bela patuju-ku tumai hi dunia' toi bona mpohuku' manusia' . Tumai-ale , bona mpobahaka-ra ngkai huku'-ra .
43012048	Tauna to mposapuaka-a pai' uma mpotarima lolita-ku , ria-mi mpai' to mpohuku'-ra . Lolita-ku to kupohowa' , toe-mi mpai' to mpohuku'-ra hi Eo Kiama .
43012049	Apa' mololita-a uma ngkai konoa-ku moto . Ku'uli' pai' kulolita napa to napahawa'-ka Tuama-ku , apa' Hi'a-mi to mposuro-a tumai .
43012050	Pai' ku'inca : hawa'-na toe mpowai' katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na . Jadi' , napa to ku'uli' toi-e , bate lolita to na'uli' ami'-maka Tuama-ku . "
43013001	Neo' rata-mi eo bohe Paskah . Na'inca Yesus , neo' rata-mi tempo-na mpalahii dunia' pai' hilou nculii' hi Tuama-na . Nape'ahi'-ra to jadi' bagia-na hi dunia' toi , pai' bate napoka'ahi'-ra duu' hi ka'omea-na .
43013002	Yesus pai' ana'guru-na ngkoni'-ra ngkabengia . Magau' Anudaa' mpowara' Yudas ana' Simon Iskariot , mpo'usoki-i mpobalu' Yesus hi bali'-na .
43013003	Na'inca Yesus , Tuama-na mpowai'-i hawe'ea kuasa-na . Na'inca wo'o kangkai Alata'ala-nai , pai' nculii' hilou hi Alata'ala wo'o-i mpai' .
43013004	Toe pai' pokore-nami , naroncu baju-na , pai' na'ala' abe' napehoo' hi hope'-na .
43013005	Oti toe , na'ala' ue natua hi batili , natepu'u-mi mpobohoi' witi' ana'guru-na , pai' naporihi hante abe' to hi hope'-na .
43013006	Katelili-na hi Simon Petrus , na'uli' Petrus : " Pue' , ncako Iko rahi-di mpobohoi' witi'-kue ? "
43013007	Na'uli' Yesus : " Tempo toi , ko'ia nu'incai napa to kubabehi toi . Mpeno-damo , pai' lako' nu'inca . "
43013008	Na'uli' Petrus : " Neo' , Pue' ! Neo' mpu'u nubohoi' witi'-ku ! " Na'uli' Yesus : " Ane uma-ko kubohoi' , uma ria posidaia'-nu hante Aku' . "
43013009	Na'uli' Simon Petrus : " Ane wae-di Pue' , neo' muntu' witi'-ku-wadi ! Hante pale pai' woo'-ku wo'o . "
43013010	Na'uli' Yesus : " Tauna to lako' oti moniu' , uma-pi babo' , me'itu'-mi hobo' woto-na , uma-pi mingki' rabohoi' tena . Muntu' witi'-na-damo to kana rabohoi' . Koi' , tebohoi'-mokoi , aga uma hawe'ea-ni . "
43013011	Yesus mololita hewa toe , apa' na'inca ami' kahema-na mpai' to mpobalu'-i hi bali'-na . Toe pai' na'uli' : " Tebohoi'-mokoi , aga uma hawe'ea-ni . "
43013012	Ka'oti-na Yesus mpobohoi' witi'-ra , na'unco' nculii'-mi baju-na , pai'-i mohura , pai' na'uli'-raka : " Ha ni'inca wa napa to lako' kubabehi-kokoie ?
43013013	Aku' , nikio'-a Guru-ni pai' Pue'-ni , pai' bate wae mpu'u .
43013014	Aku' Pue' pai' Guru-ni mobago hewa hadua batua mpobohoi' witi'-ni . Jadi' , koi' wo'o kana momebohoi' ngkawiti' .
43013015	Kupopohiloi-koi tonco toe we'i , bona nipenau' kehi-ku : hewa Aku' mpotulungi-koi , koi' wo'o kana mpotulungi doo .
43013016	" Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : hadua batua uma meliu tuwu'-na ngkai maradika-na . Hadua suro uma meliu tuwu'-na ngkai to mposuro-i .
43013017	Ane ni'inca-damo tudui' toi , marasi'-koi ane nituku' .
43013018	" Napa to ku'uli'-e we'i , uma mpobelahi-koi omea . Ku'inca ami' hema to kupelihi . Tapi' kana madupa' lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpo'uli' : ' Tauna to mpodulu'-ka , hi'a-mi mpai' to jadi' bali'-ku . '
43013019	Tohe'i ku'uli' ami'-mikokoi kako'ia-na jadi' , bona ane madupa'-pi mpai' , nipangala'-mi lolita-ku to mpo'uli' kahema-ku .
43013020	Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : hema to mpotarima suro-ku , hewa Aku' moto-mi to natarima . Wae wo'o , hema to mpotarima-a , hewa Tuama-ku moto-mi to natarima , apa' Hi'a-mi to mposuro-a . "
43013021	Ka'oti-na Yesus mololita hewa toe , susa'-mi nono-na , pai' na'uli' : " Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : Hadua ngkai olo'-ni mpai' mpobalu'-a hi bali'-ku . "
43013022	Momenaa-ramo ana'guru-na nakeni ka'ingu'-ra , apa' uma ra'incai kahema-na to natoa' .
43013023	Hadua ana'guru-na to nape'ahi' , mohura hi ncori-na .
43013024	Simon Petrus mpokini' mata ana'guru to hadua toei , na'uli'-ki : " Ee , pekune'-i pe' Guru-e , ba hema to natoa'-e . "
43013025	Toe pai' ana'guru toei mpomohui' Yesus , pai' mpekune'-i : " Hema-i , Pue' ? "
43013026	Na'uli' Yesus : " Tauna to kuwai' roti to oti kulolo' hi rala nede' , hi'a-mi mpai' . " Kana'ala'-nami hampui' roti , nalolo' hi rala nede' , pai' nawai'-ki Yudas , ana' Simon Iskariot .
43013027	Kanadoa-na Yudas roti toe , Magau' Anudaa' mesua'-mi hi rala nono-na . Oti toe , na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki : " Napa to doko' nubabehi , babehi-mi sohi' . "
43013028	Ane doo-ra to ngkoni' dohe-ra , uma ra'incai napa pai' Yesus mololita hewa toe hi Yudas .
43013029	Hantongo'-ra mpo'uli' meka' Yesus mpohubui Yudas mpo'oli ba napa-napa to raparaluu hi posusa'-ra , ba mpowai' doi hi tokabu . Apa' Yudas to ntimamahi doi-ra .
43013030	Kanadoa-na Yudas roti toe , palai-nami hilou hi mali-na . Nto'u toe , mobengi-mi .
43013031	Palai-na Yudas ngkai ree , na'uli'-mi Yesus : " Wae lau Aku' Ana' Manusia' rapomobohe . Pai' napa to jadi' hi Aku' mpai' mpomobohe wo'o Alata'ala .
43013032	Ane napa to jadi' hi Aku' mpomobohe Alata'ala , Alata'ala wo'o mpai' mpomobohe-a hante baraka'-na . Pai' sohi' kadupa'-na .
43013033	Ana'-ana'-ku , uma-apa mahae dohe-ni . Nipali'-a mpai' , aga hewa to oti ku'uli'-raka topoparenta to Yahudi wengi , wae wo'o ku'uli'-kokoi : Hi kahilouaa-ku uma-koi bisa hilou .
43013034	" Kuwai'-koi hawa' to bo'u : Momepoka'ahi'-mokoi . Hewa Aku' mpoka'ahi'-koi , wae wo'o koi' kana momepoka'ahi' hadua bo hadua .
43013035	Ane momepoka'ahi'-koi , hawe'ea tauna mpo'inca kakoi'-na mpu'u-mi topetuku'-ku . "
43013036	Napekune' Simon Petrus hi Yesus : " Hilou hiapa-ko , Pue' ? " Na'uli' Yesus : " Hi kahilouaa-ku , ko'ia-ko bisa hilou . Mpeno-damo , nutuku'-a . "
43013037	Na'uli' tena Petrus : " Ha napa pai' uma-a ma'ala mpotuku'-ko wae-e lau Pue' ? Ku'agi mate sabana petuku'-ku hi Iko ! "
43013038	Na'uli' Yesus : " Ha nu'agi mpu'u mate sabana Aku' ? Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : Kako'ia-na manu' turua' mpai' , mpolia' tolu ngkani-moko mposapu kanu'inca-ku . "
43014001	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka ana'guru-na : " Neo' susa' nono-ni ! Mepangala'-mokoi hi Alata'ala , pai' mepangala' wo'o-koi hi Aku' .
43014002	Hi tomi Tuama-ku , wori' po'ohaa' . Hilou-a mporodo-kokoi po'ohaa'-ni . Ane ke uma hewa toe , ke uma-hawo ku'uli'-kokoi .
43014003	Ane hudu-a-damo mporodo po'ohaa'-ni , nculii' moto-a mpai' tumai mpo'ala'-koi , kukeni-koi hilou hi po'ohaa'-ku , bona hiapa po'ohaa'-ku , hi ree wo'o-koi dohe-ku .
43014004	Ni'inca moto ohea hilou hi po'ohaa'-ku . "
43014005	Na'uli' Tomas : " Uma-kaiwo ki'incai hiapa kahilouaa-nu Pue' . Beiwa-kaina kaki'inca-na ohea-nae ? "
43014006	Na'uli' Yesus : " Aku' toi-mi ohea , Aku' to makono , pai' to mpowai' katuwua' . Uma haduaa to rata hi Tuama-ku , ane uma ntara hi Aku' .
43014007	Ane ntoa' ni'inca-ama Aku'-e , tantu ni'inca wo'o-imi Tuama-ku . Ngkai wae-e lau , ni'inca-imi pai' nihilo-imi . "
43014008	Na'uli' Filipus : " Pue' , popohiloi-ka-kaiwo Tuama-nu , bona oha nono-kai . "
43014009	Na'uli' Yesus : " Ko'ia oa'-tano nu'incai-ae , Filipus ! Hiaa' bo mahae-ama dohe-ni ! Hema to mpohilo-a , mpohilo wo'o-ramo Tuama-ku . Jadi' , napa-di pai' nuperapi' bona kupopohiloi-koi Tuama-kue ?
43014010	Ha uma oa' nuparasaya ka' Aku'-na hintuwu' hante Tuama-ku pai' Tuama-ku hintuwu' hante Aku' ? Napa to ku'uli'-kokoi toe , uma ku'uli' ntuku' konoa-ku moto . Tuama-ku to tida hintuwu' hante Aku' , Hi'a-mi pue' bago .
43014011	Pangala'-ama-hana , ka' Aku'-na hintuwu' hante Tuama-ku pai' Tuama-ku hintuwu' hante Aku' . Nau' uma nipangalai' lolita-ku , pangala'-mi apa' nihilo-mi hawe'ea to kubabehi .
43014012	" Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : Tauna to mepangala' hi Aku' , ma'ala-ra mpobabehi hewa to kubabehi -- ba melabi tena-pi ngkai to kubabehi -- apa' hilou-a mpai' mo'oha' dohe Tuama-ku .
43014013	Jadi' , napa-napa to niperapi' hante hanga'-ku , bate kuwai'-koi , bona to kubabehi toe mpobila' Tuama-ku .
43014014	Ba napa-napa to niperapi' hante hanga'-ku , kuwai'-koi .
43014015	" Ane nipoka'ahi'-a , nituku'-mi hawa'-ku .
43014016	Kuperapi' hi Tuama-ku , bona nawai'-koi hadua Topetulungi to ntani'-na , bona Hi'a-damo mpodohei-koi duu' kahae-hae-na .
43014017	Topetulungi toei , Hi'a-mi Inoha' Alata'ala , to mpotete'-koi hi tudui' to makono . Tauna to uma mepangala' uma bisa mpotarima-i , apa' uma-i rahiloi pai' uma wo'o-i ra'incai . Aga koi' , ni'inca-imi , apa' nadohei-mokoi wae lau , pai' mo'oha'-i mpai' hi rala nono-ni .
43014018	" Uma-koi kupalahii jadi' ilu . Nculii' moto-a mpai' tumai hi koi' .
43014019	Hampai' lia-damo , tauna to hi dunia' uma-pi mpohiloi-a . Aga koi' , nihilo moto-a . Tuwu' moto-koi mpai' , apa' Aku' tuwu'-a .
43014020	Ane rata-pi mpai' tempo toe , ni'inca-mi ka' Aku'-na hintuwu' hante Tuama-ku , pai' koi' hintuwu' hante Aku' , pai' Aku' hintuwu' hante koi' .
43014021	" Tauna to mpotarima pai' mpotuku' hawa'-ku , hira'-mi to mpoka'ahi'-a . Tuama-ku mpoka'ahi' tauna to mpoka'ahi'-a , pai' Aku' wo'o mpoka'ahi'-ra , pai' kupopohiloi-ra woto-ku . "
43014022	Yudas ( aga bela Yudas Iskariot ) mpekune' Yesus : " Pue' , napa pai' nupopehuwu woto-nu hi kai'-wadi , uma hi hawe'ea tauna hi dunia' ? "
43014023	Na'uli' Yesus : " Kupopehuwu woto-ku hi tauna to mpoka'ahi'-a pai' to mpotuku' lolita-ku . Tuama-ku mpoka'ahi' tauna to hewa toe . Tuama-ku pai' Aku' hilou hi tauna toera , pai' mo'oha'-makai dohe-ra .
43014024	Tauna to uma mpoka'ahi'-a , uma-ra mpotuku' lolita-ku . Lolita to ni'epe ngkai Aku' , uma ngkai Aku' moto . Ngkai Tuama-ku to mposuro-a .
43014025	" Hawe'ea toe we'i lau ku'uli'-kokoi nampa' hi ria-a-pidi dohe-ni .
43014026	Tapi' ane rata-ipi mpai' Inoha' Tomoroli' , Hi'a-mi to mpotudui'-koi butu nyala-na , pai' napopokiwoii-koi hawe'ea to oti-mi ku'uli'-kokoi , apa' Hi'a-mi Topetulungi to nahubui tumai Tuama-ku jadi' sulewata-ku .
43014027	" Kalompea' kutu'u-kokoi . Kalompea' to ngkai Aku' moto-mi to kuwai'-kokoi . To kuwai'-kokoi toi-e , uma hewa to nirata ngkai dunia' toi . Neo' susa' nono-ni , pai' neo' me'eka' .
43014028	Ni'epe lolita-ku we'i to mpo'uli' : Hilou-a , aga nculii' moto-a mpai' tumai hi koi' . Ane nipoka'ahi' mpu'u-a , nipokagoe' moto kahilou-ku toi hi Tuama-ku , apa' Tuama-ku meliu kabohe-na ngkai Aku' .
43014029	Toe-e ku'uli' ami'-mikokoi kako'ia-na jadi' , bona ane madupa'-pi mpai' , nipangala'-mi .
43014030	" Uma-pi wori' loga-ku mpololitai-koi , apa' neo' rata-mi Magau' Anudaa' . Hi'a-mi to mpokuasai dunia' tohe'i , aga uma ria kuasa-na hi Aku' .
43014031	Aga toi kana jadi' , bona hawe'ea tauna mpo'inca kakupoka'ahi'-na Tuama-ku pai' kutuku' oa' hawe'ea to nahawai'-ka . Mokore-mi , pai' hilou-tamo . "
43015001	Na'uli' Yesus : " Aku' toi-mi woto kaju to makono , pai' Tuama-ku pue' bonea .
43015002	Hawe'ea ra'a to mentaka' hi Aku' to uma mowua' , nalali . Pai' hawe'ea ra'a to mentaka' hi Aku' pai' to mowua' , napeholui pai' napegalihi , bona kawoo-woria' wua'-na .
43015003	Koi' , tepegalihi-mokoi -- batua-na , moroli'-mokoi napakaroli' lolita to ku'uli'-kokoi .
43015004	" Tida-mokoi hintuwu' hante Aku' , pai' Aku' wo'o hante koi' . Ra'a to mohepi' ngkai woto kaju , uma-i mowua' . Ra'a bate kana mentaka' hi woto-na bona mowua'-i . Wae wo'o koi' : Sampale-koi mowua' ane tida-koi hintuwu' hante Aku' .
43015005	" Aku' toi-mi woto kaju , pai' koi'-mi ra'a-na . Tauna to tida hintuwu' hante Aku' pai' Aku' hante hira' , wori' powua'-ra . Aga ane mogaa'-koi ngkai Aku' , uma-koi bisa mpobabehi napa-napa .
43015006	Hema to uma tida hintuwu' hante Aku' bate ratadi , hewa karatadi-na ra'a to mohepi' duu'-na jadi' bangi . Ra'a to hewa toe , rarumpu pai' ratene' hi rala apu .
43015007	Ane tida-koi hintuwu' hante Aku' pai' lolita-ku tida hi rala nono-ni , perapi'-mi-hana hi Alata'ala ba napa-napa konoa-ni , bate nawai'-koile .
43015008	Ane mowua' wori'-koi , Tuama-ku rapomobohe . Ane hewa toe-mi po'ingku-ni , topetuku'-ku mpu'u-mokoi .
43015009	Hewa Tuama-ku mpoka'ahi'-a , wae wo'o Aku' mpoka'ahi'-koi . Tida-mokoi mohu' hi Aku' bona nirasai ahi'-ku .
43015010	Ane nituku'-mi hawa'-ku , tida mpu'u-koi mohu' hi Aku' pai' nirasai mpu'u ahi'-ku , hewa Aku' wo'o mpotuku' hawa' Tuama-ku pai'-a tida mohu' hi Hi'a pai' mporasai ahi'-na .
43015011	" Hawe'ea tohe'i ku'uli'-kokoi , bona goe' nono-ni hante kagoea' to ngkai Aku' , pai' bona gana kagoea'-ni .
43015012	" Toi-mi hawa'-ku : Momepoka'ahi'-mokoi , hewa Aku' wo'o mpoka'ahi'-koi .
43015013	Ane ria tauna to mpewai' tuwu'-na bona doo-na tuwu' , bohe mpu'u ahi'-na toe . Uma ria ahi' to meliu ngkai ahi' tauna to mpewai' tuwu'-na bona mpotulungi doo-na .
43015014	Doo-ku omea-mokoi , ane nituku' hawa'-ku .
43015015	Uma-pokoi kukahangai' batua-ku , apa' batua uma mpo'incai napa to hi rala nono pue'-na . Wae-e lau , doo-ku mpu'u-mokoi , apa' ku'uli'-mikokoi hawe'ea to na'uli'-ka Tuama-ku .
43015016	Bela koi' to mpopelihi-a . Aku'-dile to mpelihi-koie . Kuwai'-koi bago hilou hi rala dunia' bona mowua' wori' . Pai' powua'-ni toe uma mpai' moronto , ria kalaua-na duu' kahae-hae-na . Jadi' , napa to niperapi' hi Tuama-ku hante hanga'-ku , bate nawai'-koi .
43015017	Toi-mi hawa'-ku hi koi' : Momepoka'ahi'-mokoi !
43015018	" Ane tauna to uma mepangala' hi Aku' mpokahuku'-koi , kiwoi : Aku'-mi-hana to ri'ulu rapokahuku'-e .
43015019	Ane rapa'-na hampodooa-koi hante tauna to uma mepangala' , bate rapoka'ahi'-koi , apa' lawi' doo-rakoi . Tapi' kupelihi-mokoi pai' kupatani'-koi ngkai laintongo'-ra , alaa-na uma-pokoi doo-ra . Toe pai' rapokahuku'-koi .
43015020	Kiwoi napa to ku'uli'-kokoi we'i : Hadua batua uma meliu tuwu'-na ngkai maradika-na . Ane ntoa' Aku' rabalinai' , koi' wo'o mpai' rabalinai' . Ane ria to mpotuku' lolita-ku , bate ratuku' wo'o mpai' lolita-ni .
43015021	Hawe'ea tohe'e rababehi hi koi' apa' topetuku'-ku-koi . Hawe'ea tohe'e rababehi hi koi' , apa' uma-i ra'incai Alata'ala to mposuro-a .
43015022	Ane ke uma-a tumai mpololitai-ra , ke uma-ra-hawo masala' . Tapi' , apa' tumai mpu'u-ama mpololitai-rae , toe pai' uma ria wuniia'-na sala'-ra .
43015023	Tauna to mpokahuku'-a , mpokahuku' wo'o-ra Tuama-ku .
43015024	" Hi laintongo' ntodea kubabehi anu mekoncehi , to ko'ia ria rababehi tau ntani'-na . Ane ke uma kubabehi hewa toe , ke uma-ra masala' . Tapi' rahilo moto-mi napa to kubabehi , pai' rapokahuku' oa'-a , pai' rapokahuku' wo'o-i Tuama-ku .
43015025	Aga bate kana hewa toe , bona madupa' lolita to te'uki' hi rala Buku Atura-ra to mpo'uli' : ' Rapokahuku'-a nau' uma ria sabana . '
43015026	" Tumai-i mpai' Inoha' Tomoroli' , batua-na , Inoha' to mehuwu ngkai Alata'ala pai' to mpotete'-koi hi tudui' to makono . Hi'a-mi mpai' Topetulungi to kuhubui tumai hi koi' ngkai Tuama-ku . Ane tumai-ipi mpai' , Hi'a-mi to jadi' sabi'-ku .
43015027	Pai' koi' wo'o jadi' sabi'-ku , apa' koi'-mi to dohe-ku ngkai pontepu'ua bago-ku hi dunia' .
43016001	" Hawe'ea tohe'i ku'uli'-kokoi , bona neo' mere' nono-ni duu'-na nibahakai mepangala' hi Aku' .
43016002	Rapopalai-koi mpai' ngkai tomi posampayaa . Uma muntu' toe , rata mpai' tempo-na ria tauna to doko' mpopatehi-koi , apa' ra'uli'-rana , toe-mi konoa Alata'ala .
43016003	Hawe'ea toe rababehi hi koi' , apa' uma ra'incai Tuama-ku , pai' Aku' wo'o , uma-a ra'incai .
43016004	Ku'uli'-kokoi tohe'i , bona ane madupa'-pi mpai' , nikiwoi-mi ka'oti-nami ku'uli'-kokoi .
43016005	Aga wae-e lau , neo' hilou-ama hi Tuama-ku to mposuro-a , pai' uma-koi haduaa to mpekune'-a ba hiapa kahiloua-ku .
43016006	Wule' susa' nono-ni-wadi mpo'epe lolita-ku we'i to mpo'uli' neo' hilou-ama .
43016007	Aga kakoo-kono-na , rasi'-nidi ane hilou-ae ! Apa' ane uma-a hilou , uma-i mpai' tumai Topetulungi . Aga ane hilou-apa mpai' , kuhubui moto-i tumai hi koi' .
43016008	" Ane tumai-i mpai' Inoha' Tomoroli' , Hi'a-damo to mpakanoto hi manusia' kamojeko'-ra . Napakanoto wo'o kamonoa'-ku pai' pehuku' Alata'ala .
43016009	Napakanoto kamojeko'-ra apa' uma-ra mepangala' hi Aku' .
43016010	Napakanoto wo'o kamonoa'-ku , apa' hilou-ama mpai' hi Tuama-ku , pai' uma-apa nihiloi .
43016011	Napakanoto wo'o kanahuku'-ra mpai' Alata'ala tauna to mojeko' , apa' nahuku'-imi Magau' Anudaa' to mpokuasai dunia' tohe'i .
43016012	" Wori'-pidi to doko' ku'uli'-kokoi , aga ko'ia nikulei' mpotarima omea tempo toi .
43016013	Ane tumai-i mpai' Inoha' Tomoroli' , Hi'a-damo to mpotete'-koi pai' mpopo'incai-koi hawe'ea tudui' to makono . Uma-i mololita ntuku' konoa-na moto . Napa to na'epe ngkai Tuama-ku , toe-mi to nalolita . Pai' naparata-kokoi napa to jadi' hi eo mpeno .
43016014	Hi'a mpai' to mpomobohe-a , apa' lolita to natarima ngkai Aku' , toe-mi to naparata-kokoi .
43016015	Hawe'ea to ria hi Tuama-ku , bagia-ku omea-mi . Toe pai' ku'uli' : napa to natarima Inoha' Tomoroli' ngkai Aku' , toe-mi to naparata-kokoi . "
43016016	Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus : " Hampai'-damo pai' uma-apa nihiloi . Hampai' wo'o-damo , nihilo wo'o-ama . "
43016017	Ingu'-ramo ana'guru-na , pai' ria-ra to momepekune' , ra'uli' : " Napa-die pai' na'uli'-taka : ' Hampai'-damo pai' uma-apa nihiloi . Hampai' wo'o-damo , nihilo wo'o-ama' ? Napa wo'o pai' na'uli' : ' Hilou-a hi Tuama-ku' ? "
43016018	Momepekune' ncuu-ra , ra'uli' : " Napa pai' na'uli' oa' ' Hampai'-damo' ? Uma ta'incai batua-na . "
43016019	Na'inca Yesus kadoko'-ra mpekune'-i . Toe pai' na'uli'-raka : " Ntora momepekune'-koi ba napa batua-na lolita-ku we'i to mpo'uli' : ' Hampai'-damo pai' uma-apa nihiloi . Hampai' wo'o-damo , nihilo wo'o-ama . '
43016020	Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : geo' pai' motantangi'-koi mpai' , tapi' tauna to uma mepangala' hi Aku' , goe' moto-ra . Susa' mpai' nono-ni , tapi' kasusaa'-ni mobali' jadi' kagoea' .
43016021	Kagoea'-ni toe , hewa kagoea' to narata hadua tobine to neo' mo'ana' . Lomo'-na ntodohaka-i , apa' gati tempo-nami mo'ana' . Tapi' ane putu-damo ana'-na , uma-pi napenonoi pontodohakaa-na , goe'-imi apa' putu-mi ana'lei hi rala dunia' .
43016022	Wae wo'o mpai' koi' . Tempo toi susa' nono-ni . Tapi' kupohirua' moto-kokoi mpai' . Nto'u toe , goe' nculii'-mokoi , pai' uma hema to mpo'alai'-koi kagoea'-ni tetu .
43016023	" Nto'u toe mpai' , uma-pi mingki' nipekune'-a ba napa-napa . Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : napa-napa to niperapi' hi Tuama-ku hante hanga'-ku , bate nawai'-koi .
43016024	Duu' hewa toe lau , ko'ia-koi ria merapi' napa-napa hante hanga'-ku . Wule' perapi'-mi-hana , nirata moto mpai' , bona gana mpu'u kagoea'-ni . "
43016025	" Hawe'ea tohe'i ku'uli'-kokoi hante walatu . Tapi' rata mpai' tempo-na , uma-apa mowalatu . Kupololitai-koi hante kalonto'-na mpotompo'wiwi Tuama-ku .
43016026	Nto'u toe mpai' , merapi'-koi hi Tuama-ku hante hanga'-ku . Uma mingki' Aku' to mperapi'-kokoi hi Tuama-ku ,
43016027	apa' napoka'ahi'-koi . Napoka'ahi'-koi , apa' nipoka'ahi'-a , pai' nipangala' ka' Aku'-na to ngkai Alata'ala .
43016028	Ngkai Tuama-ku mpu'u-ada , pai' tumai-ama hi dunia' toi . Wae-e lau , kupalahii-mi dunia' toi , nculii'-ama hilou hi Tuama-ku . "
43016029	Ra'uli' ana'guru-na : " Tempo toi , lonto'-mi lolita-nu Pue' , uma-poko mowalatu .
43016030	Monoto mpu'u-mi hi kai' : Pue' to mpo'inca omea . Uma-pi mingki' ria to mpekune' ba napa-napa hi Iko . Toe pai' kipangala' ka' Iko-na to ngkai Alata'ala . "
43016031	Na'uli' Yesus : " Ha mepangala' mpu'u-mokoi wae lau ?
43016032	Kiwoi ! Rata mpai' tempo-na -- pai' toi-mi tempo-na -- koi' mpai' pagaa'-gaa' hore-hore nculii' hi tomi-ni , pai' Aku' nipalahii hadudua-ku . Aga uma hadudua-ku mpu'u , apa' Tuama-ku mpodohei-a .
43016033	Hawe'ea toi ku'uli'-kokoi , bona mporata-koi kalompea' tuwu' ngkai posidaia'-ni hante Aku' . Bula-ni hi rala dunia' toi-pidi , bate rabalinai'-koi . Aga pakaroho nono-ni , apa' kudagi-mi dunia' toi . "
43017001	Ka'oti-na Yesus mpo'uli' hawe'ea toe , mengoa'-imi hi langi' pai'-i mosampaya , na'uli' : " Tuama-ku , rata-mi tempo-na ! Pomobohe-ama Aku' Ana'-nu , bona Aku' wo'o mpomobohe-ko Mama .
43017002	Nuwai'-ama kuasa hi hawe'ea manusia' , bona tauna to nuwai'-maka , kuwai'-ra katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na .
43017003	Ane ra'inca-ko Mama , ka' Iko-na Alata'ala to makono to uma ria karodua-na , pai' ane ra'inca Yesus Kristus suro-nu , toe-mi ohea-ra mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na .
43017004	Hi rala dunia' toi kupopehuwu-mi kabohe tuwu'-nu Mama , kuposipolea-mi bago to nuwai'-ka .
43017005	Toe pai' kuperapi' bona nupopehuwu kabohe tuwu'-ku dohe-nu Mama , hewa kabohe tuwu'-ta hangkaa-ngkania kako'ia-na dunia' tohe'i rapajadi' .
43017006	" Ane doo-ku tohe'ira lau , to nuwai'-maka ngkai rala dunia' toi-e , kupopo'incai-ramo kahema-nu Mama . Bagia-nu ami'-ramo , nutonu-ra hi Aku' , pai' ratuku'-mi lolita-nu .
43017007	Wae lau , ra'inca-mi : hawe'ea to nuwai'-ka , bate ngkai Iko Mama .
43017008	Kuparata-miraka hawe'ea lolita to nuparata-ka . Ratarima-mi , pai' ra'inca-mi Aku' toi ngkai Mama mpu'u-a , pai' rapangala'-mi ka' Iko-na to mposuro-a .
43017009	" Kuposampayai-ra doo-ku tohe'i-ra lau . Uma kuposampayai hawe'ea tauna hi dunia' . To kuposampayai toi-e , muntu' tauna to nuwai'-maka Mama , apa' lawi' hira'-mi bagia-nu .
43017010	Hawe'ea tauna to kupobagia , bagia-nu Mama . Pai' hawe'ea tauna to nupobagia , bagia-ku . Hira'-mi to mpopehuwu kabohe tuwu'-ku .
43017011	" Neo' tilou-ama Mama , uma-apa mahae hi dunia' toi . Aga ane ana'guru-ku toira lau , hi dunia' toi-ra-pidi . O Tuama-ku to moroli' , pewili'-ramo hante kabaraka' hanga'-nu -- hante hanga' to nuwai'-ka . Pewili'-ramo bona hanono lau-ra , hewa Mama pai' Aku' hanono lau-ta .
43017012	Bula-ku dohe-ra-pidi , Aku' to mpewili'-ra hante kabaraka' hanga'-nu -- hante hanga' to nuwai'-ka . Kujaga-ra pai' uma-ra ria to mporata silaka , ntani'-na ngkai to hadua . Hi'a kana silaka , bona madupa' lolita to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' .
43017013	" Wae-e lau , tilou-ama Mama . Hawe'ea tohe'i ku'uli' bula-ku dohe-ra-pidi hi dunia' toi , bona gana mpu'u kagoea'-ra hante kagoea' to ngkai Aku' .
43017014	Kuparata-miraka lolita-nu , alaa-na tauna to uma mepangala' mpokahuku'-ra , apa' bela-ra doo-ra , hewa Aku' wo'o bela-a doo-ra to uma mepangala' .
43017015	Uma kuperapi' bona nu'ala'-ra ngkai dunia' tohe'i . Pomperapia'-ku , bona nupetalawai'-ra ngkai anudaa' .
43017016	Hewa Aku' bela-a doo-ra to uma mepangala' , wae wo'o ana'guru-ku bela doo-ra .
43017017	Pakaroli'-ramo , pajadi'-ra bagia-nu hante tudui' to makono . Lolita-nu Mama , tetu-mi to makono .
43017018	Hewa Mama mposuro-a tumai hi dunia' , wae wo'o Aku' mposuro-ra hilou hi tau ntani'-na hi dunia' .
43017019	Mama , kutonu katuwu'-ku hi Iko jadi' bagia-nu , bona ana'guru-ku toira mporata kalompea' , pai' bona hira' jadi' bagia-nu hi kampotuku'-ra tudui' to makono .
43017020	" Uma muntu' ana'guru-ku tohe'i-wadi to kuposampayai . Kuposampayai wo'o tauna to mepangala' mpai' hi Aku' ngkai posabi'-ra .
43017021	Pomperapia'-ku , bona hawe'ea-ra hanono lau . Hewa Mama hintuwu' hante Aku' , pai' Aku' hante Mama , kuperapi' bona hira' wo'o hintuwu' hante Kita' . Bona hawe'ea tauna mpangala' ka' Iko-na to mposuro-a .
43017022	" Kuwai'-ramo kabaraka' to nuwai'-ka Mama , bona jadi' hanono lau-ramo , hewa Kita' wo'o hanono lau .
43017023	Aku' hintuwu' hante hira' , pai' Mama hintuwu' hante Aku' , bona hira' mpai' jadi' hanono lau hante karoli'-roli'-na . Ane hewa toe-damo , hawe'ea tauna mpo'inca kanusuro-ku , pai' kanupoka'ahi'-ra hewa kanupoka'ahi'-ku .
43017024	" Mama , konoa-ku bona hira' to nuwai'-ka toi mo'oha' dohe-ku hi po'ohaa'-ku mpai' , bona rahilo kabaraka'-ku . Kabaraka'-ku toi nuwai'-maka , apa' nupoka'ahi'-a ngkai kako'ia-na dunia' rapajadi' .
43017025	O Tuama-ku to monoa' , tauna hi dunia' toi uma mpo'incai-ko . Aga Aku' , ku'inca-ko . Pai' doo-ku tohe'ira lau mpo'inca ka' Iko-na to mposuro-a .
43017026	Kupopo'incai-ramo kahema-nu , pai' bate kupohewa toe oa' mpai' , bona hira' mporasai ahi'-nu hi rala nono-ra , hewa Aku' mporasai ahi'-nu , pai' bona Aku' mo'oha' hi rala nono-ra . "
43018001	Kahudu-na Yesus mosampaya , me'ongko'-imi hante ana'guru-na hilou hi mali ngata . Mpodongka'-ra ue Kidron , pai'-ra hilou hi pampa to hi dipo-na .
43018002	Yudas , to mpobalu' Yesus toei , mpo'inca kahiapa-na pampa toe , apa' Yesus pai' ana'guru-na jau-ra morumpu hi ria .
43018003	Jadi' , imam pangkeni pai' to Parisi mpohubui hampodooa tantara to Roma pai' topojaga Tomi Alata'ala mpo'ema' Yudas hilou hi pampa toe . Mpokeni-ra rewa mpanga'e , lampu pai' hulu' .
43018004	Yesus mpo'inca omea napa to kana jadi' hi woto-na . Toe pai' hilou-imi mpotomu tauna toera , pai' napekune' : " Hema to nipali' ? "
43018005	Ra'uli' : " Yesus to Nazaret . " Na'uli' Yesus : " Aku'-mile toi-e . " Yudas to mpobalu'-i mokore hi ree dohe tantara pai' topojaga toera .
43018006	Nto'u kana'uli'-na-raka Yesus : " Aku'-mile toi-e , " ngkala'ura-ramo pai' modungka-ra hi tana' .
43018007	Napekune' wo'o-mi Yesus : " Hema to nipali'-e ? " Ra'uli' : " Yesus to Nazaret . "
43018008	Na'uli' Yesus : " Ku'uu-uli'-mi we'i ka' Aku'-nami toi-e . Jadi' , ane Aku' mpu'u to nipali' , pelele'-ramo doo-ku tohe'i hilou . "
43018009	( Hante lolita-na Yesus toe , madupa'-mi napa to na'uli' hi rala posampaya-na we'i : " Ngkai hawe'ea tauna to nuwai'-ka , uma ria haduaa to mporata silaka . " )
43018010	Ngkai ree , Simon Petrus mpowute' piho'-na , natime-ki hadua batua Imam Bohe , bela mpoholu tilinga ka'ana-na . Hanga'-na batua toei , Malkus .
43018011	Na'uli' Yesus hi Petrus : " Unco' nculii' piho'-nu ! Ha nu'uli'-kona kupetiboi' kaparia to naponoa' ami'-maka Tuama-kue ? "
43018012	Ngkai ree , tantara to Roma hante tadulako-ra , pai' topojaga to Yahudi mpohoko' Yesus , rahoo' ,
43018013	pai'-i rakeni hilou hi tomi Imam Bohe . Lomo'-na rakeni-i hilou hi Hanas , piniana-na Kayafas . Kayafas toei Imam Bohe hi mpae toe .
43018014	Kayafas toe-mi to mpo'uli'-raka topoparenta to Yahudi wengi : " Agina-pi tau hadua mate mposampei ntodea . "
43018015	Simon Petrus pai' hadua ana'guru ntani'-na mpotuku' Yesus . Ana'guru to hadua toei , pome'inca-na Imam Bohe . Jadi' , mesua'-imi dohe Yesus hi berewe tomi Imam Bohe .
43018016	Petrus mepopea hi mali-na , hi wobo' wala . Ngkai ree we'i , ana'guru to hadua toei , lou nculii' hi mali-na mpololitai tobine to mpojaga wobo' , bona Petrus rapiliu mesua' dohe-na , pai' napo'ema'-i Petrus mesua' hi rala-na .
43018017	Tobine topojaga wobo' toei mpo'uli'-ki Petrus : " Ha bela iko wo'o ana'guru-na tauna toei-e lou ? " Na'uli' Petrus : " Bela ! "
43018018	Nto'u toe , tempo lengi' . Jadi' , ba hangkuja dua batua pai' topojaga mpobaa apu hi berewe hante wuri to morea' , pai'-ra mokore ntololikia-na moneru . Petrus wo'o mokore pai' moneru dohe-ra .
43018019	Hi rala tomi , Imam Bohe mpopekune' Yesus na'uli'-ki : " Hema omea-ra ana'guru-nue ? Napa to nutudui'-raka ? "
43018020	Na'uli' Yesus : " Kabiasaa-ku , mololita hante kalonto'-lonto'-na hi hawe'ea tauna . Metudui'-a hi tomi posampayaa pai' hi Tomi Alata'ala , hi kabiasaa-ta kita' to Yahudi morumpu . Uma ria to kuwunii'-na .
43018021	Jadi' , napa pai' nupekune'-ae ? Pekune' moto-ra-kowo to mpo'epe-a metudui' . Ra'inca moto mpai' napa to ku'uli' . "
43018022	Kana'uli'-na Yesus toe , hadua topojaga to mokore hi ncori-na mpohopo'-i , na'uli' : " Daho' mpu'u-ko-kona mololita hewa tetu hi Imam Bohe-e ! "
43018023	Na'uli' Yesus : " Ane uma makono to ku'uli' , uli' lau-mi hi rehe'i napa sala'-ku . Tapi' ane makono lolita-ku , napa pai' nuhopo'-a ? "
43018024	Ngkai ree , Hanas mpohubui topojaga mpokeni Yesus hilou hi Imam Bohe Kayafas . Nto'u toe , pale-na Yesus tehoo' oa'-pidi .
43018025	Simon Petrus , ria-i-pidi mokore pai' moneru ngkokore dohe topojaga . Ria tauna to mpo'uli'-ki : " Ha bela iko wo'o hadua ana'guru-nae ? " Nasapu Petrus , na'uli' : " Bela-kuwo aku' ! "
43018026	Ria wo'o hi ree hadua batua Imam Bohe . Batua toei , ompi' tauna to naholu Petrus tilinga-na . Na'uli' batua toei mpo'uli'-ki Petrus : " Ha bela iko to kuhilo-e ngone hi pampa toe ria dohe Yesus-e ? "
43018027	Nasapu wo'o-mi Petrus , na'uli' : " Bela ! " Nto'u toe , turua'-mi manu' .
43018028	Mepupulo ngkii , Yesus rakeni ngkai tomi Kayafas hilou hi tomi gubernur . Topoparenta to Yahudi moto , uma-ra mesua' hi rala tomi gubernur , apa' gubernur toe , bela-i to Yahudi , pai' ane mesua'-ra hi rala tomi to bela tomi to Yahudi , jadi' babo'-ra ntuku' atura agama-ra , pai' uma-ra ma'ala ngkoni' pongkoni' Paskah .
43018029	Jadi' , Gubernur Pilatus hilou hi mali-na mpohirua'-raka pai' napekune'-ra : " Napa to nipangadu'-ki tauna toii-e ? "
43018030	Ra'uli' : " Ane ke bela-i tauna to dada'a , ke uma-i kibua' hi Tuama Gubernur . "
43018031	Na'uli' Pilatus : " Keni hilou nculii' , nipohurai-miki sala'-na ntuku' ada agama-ni moto-koiwo ! " Ra'uli' to Yahudi toera : " Kai'-le , uma-kai rapiliu mpohuku' mate tauna . "
43018032	( Toi majadi' bona madupa' napa to na'uli' Yesus mpolowa beiwa mpai' kamate-na . )
43018033	Ngkai ree , Pilatus mesua' nculii' hi rala tomi , napehubui bona Yesus rakeni hi nyanyoa-na , pai' napekune'-i : " Ha Iko mpu'u-mi Magau' to Yahudi-e ? "
43018034	Na'uli' Yesus : " Pompekunea' tetu ngkai Gubernur moto , ba pololita tau ntani'-nadi ? "
43018035	Na'uli' Pilatus : " Kawe' to Yahudi-a ! Hingka to Yahudi-nu moto-kowo hante imam pangkeni to mpokeni-ko hi aku'-e . Napa-di sala' to nubabehi-e ? "
43018036	Na'uli' Yesus : " Kamagaua'-ku bela ngkai dunia' toi . Ane rapa'-na magau' hi dunia' toi mpu'u-a , tauna to mpotuku'-a bate me'ewa bona neo'-a rahoko' pai' rapewai' hi topoparenta to Yahudi . Tapi' Kamagaua'-ku bela ngkai dunia' toi . "
