43018037	Na'uli' wo'o-mi Pilatus : " Ane wae-di , magau' mpu'u-ko ? " Na'uli' Yesus : " Iko moto to mpo'uli' Aku' toi magau' . Pai'-a putu hi dunia' toi , bona mpo'uli' napa to makono . Tauna to mpokono napa to makono , bate mpangala' lolita-ku . "
43018038	Hampetompoi' Pilatus : " Ah ! Napa-i to nu'uli' makono tetu-e ? "
43018039	Aga , ane ntuku'-ki ada-ni lalau , butu mpae-na hi Eo Paskah , kubahaka-kokoi hadua to ratarungku' , ba hema konoa-ni . Jadi' , beiwa : dota-koi ane kubahaka-kokoi Magau' to Yahudi toii-e ? "
43018040	Mejeu'-ra ra'uli' : " Neo' , neo' Hi'a ! Agina Barabas ! " ( Barabas toe , hadua toperampaki . )
43019001	Oti toe , Pilatus mpohubui tantara-na mpoweba' Yesus .
43019002	Tantara toera mpobabehi hameha' songko ngkai walaa to morui , to hewa songko magau' , pai' rasongkoi-ki Yesus . Oti toe , raheai-i hante baju to mperelei hewa baju magau' , rapotingkuai'-i pai' ra'uli'-ki : " Wori' tabe , Magau' to Yahudi ! " Pai'-i rahopo' .
43019003	
43019004	Oti toe , mehupa' wo'o-imi Pilatus lou hi mali-na , pai' na'uli'-raka to Yahudi : " Hilo , kukeni-imi tumai hi koi' , bona ni'inca ka'uma-na kuruai' nau' hanyalaa kasalaa'-na . "
43019005	Ngkai ree , rakeni mpu'u-imi Yesus hi mali-na , mosongkoi rui pai' mobajui hante baju to hewa baju magau' . Na'uli' Pilatus : " Hilo , etu-imi ! "
43019006	Nto'u imam pangkeni pai' topojaga mpohilo Yesus , kamejeu'-rami ra'uli' : " Parika'-imi ! Parika'-imi ! " Na'uli' Pilatus : " Ane doko' niparika'-i , ala'-imi , niparika' moto-imi-koiwo , apa' aku' , uma-kuna kuruai' kasalaa'-na . "
43019007	Ra'uli' to Yahudi : " Ane kai'-le , ntuku'-ki atura agama-kai , kana rahuku' mate-i , apa' na'uli'-hana Hi'a Ana' Alata'ala . "
43019008	Kana'epe-na Pilatus toe , hangkedi' kame'eka'-na .
43019009	Mesua' nculii'-imi hi rala tomi , pai' mpekune' tena Yesus : " Ha to apa mpu'u-ko-kowo Iko-e ? " Tapi' Yesus , uma-i winihi .
43019010	Na'uli' wo'o-mi Pilatus : " Oja'-ko mpotompoi'-ae ? Ha uma nu'incai , aku' toi , ria kuasa-ku mpobahaka-ko ba mpoparika'-ko ! "
43019011	Na'uli' Yesus : " Ane Alata'ala uma mpowai'-ko kuasa tetu , uma ria hangkedia' kuasa-nu hi Aku' . Jadi' , tauna to mpotonu-a hi iko , meliu kabohe jeko'-ra ngkai iko . "
43019012	Kana'epe-na Pilatus lolita toe , napali' ohea-na bona mpobahaka Yesus . Aga mejeu' wo'o-ramo to Yahudi , ra'uli' : " Ane nubahaka-i-kona , bela-ko ema'-na Kaisar ! Yesus tetui mpo'uli' Kahi'a-na magau' . Jadi' , mpo'ewa Kaisar-i-hana ! "
43019013	Kana'epe-na Pilatus lolita-ra toe , nakeni-imi Yesus hi mali-na , pai'-i mohura hi pohuraa pobotuhia to rahanga' Ila' Watu . ( Hi rala basa Yahudi hanga'-na Gabata . )
43019014	Nto'u toe , neo' tebua'-mi eo-na , eo pomporodoa nto'u posusa' Paskah . Pilatus mpo'uli'-raka to Yahudi : " Etu-imi magau'-ni ! "
43019015	Mogora-ramo mejeu' , ra'uli' : " Patehi-i ! Patehi-i ! Parika'-i ! " Na'uli' Pilatus : " Beiwa ? Niperapi' kuparika' magau'-nie ? " Hampetompoi' imam pangkeni : " Kaisar-wadi-kaina magau'-kai . "
43019016	Ka'omea-na Pilatus mpotonu Yesus hi hira' bona raparika' .
43019017	Yesus mpaha'a parika'-na hilou hi mali ngata , pai'-i rakeni hilou hi po'ohaa' to rahanga' Bulu' Banga'woo' . ( Hi rala basa Yahudi hanga'-na Golgota . )
43019018	Hi rehe'e-imi raparika' . Ria wo'o rodua tau ntani'-na to raparika' dohe-na . Hadua hi mali ngki'ii-na , hadua hi mali ngka'ana-na , pai' Yesus hi laintongo' .
43019019	Pilatus mpohubui tantara-na mpotaka' hameha' papan hi parika'-na Yesus . Hi papan toe te'uki' : YESUS TO NAZARET , MAGAU' TO YAHUDI .
43019020	Ukia' toe ra'uki' hi rala tolu nyala basa : basa Yahudi , basa Latin , pai' basa Yunani . Wori' to Yahudi mpobasa ukia' toe , apa' poparikaa'-na Yesus mohu' ngata .
43019021	Jadi' , imam pangkeni mpo'uli'-ki Pilatus : " Neo' ra'uki' : Magau' to Yahudi ! Agina ra'uki' : ' Tauna toi mpo'uli' Kahi'a-na magau' to Yahudi . ' "
43019022	Na'uli' Pilatus : " Napa to ku'uki' , bate-nami ! "
43019023	Kahudu-na tantara mpoparika' Yesus , ra'ala'-mi pohea-na pai' rabagi opo' bagia , hore-hore habagia-ra . Aga baju-na-hawo , uma ria daua-na , apa' ratanu' hantau lau .
43019024	Toe pai' mohawa'-ramo tantara , ra'uli' : " Neo' raheu' baju toi . Agina ntene' undi-ta , ba hema-ta to mporata . " Tohe'i majadi' bona madupa' napa to te'uki' owi hi rala Buku Tomoroli' , to mpo'uli' : Ra'ala' pohea-ku rabagi-bagi , pai' baju-ku rapompenoai' . "
43019025	Mohu' kaju parika' Yesus , mokore tina-na pai' hadua ompi' tina-na , tobine wo'o-wadi . Ria wo'o Maria tobine-na Klopas , pai' Maria Magdalena .
43019026	Kanahilo-na Yesus tina-na mokore hi ree hi ncori ana'guru-na to nape'ahi' , na'uli'-miki tina-na : " Ina' , etu-imi mai ana'-nu . "
43019027	Pai' na'uli' wo'o-miki ana'guru-na toei : " Etu-imi tina-nu . " Ngkai ree , ana'guru toei mpewili' tina-na Yesus hi rala tomi-na .
43019028	Na'inca Yesus hudu-mi omea . Jadi' , bona madupa' napa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' , na'uli' : " Ngkamara-a . "
43019029	Hi ree , ria hamanga' ue anggur to mo'onco . Ra'ala' hampuhu' wunga to hewa lomo' , ralolo' hi rala anggur toe , ratu'u hi wuntu ra'a kaju hisop , pai' rapopoju'ui-ki wiwi Yesus bona na'inu .
43019030	Kanapemita-na Yesus , na'uli' : " Hudu-mi ! " Oti toe , ntungka'-imi , pai' modupe'-mi inoha'-na .
43019031	Eo karaparika'-na Yesus toe , eo pomporodoa ( batua-na , eo kako'ia-na Eo Sabat ) , pai' ntuku' palia to Yahudi uma ma'ala ria tomate tetoe hi kaju parika' nto'u Eo Sabat . Peliu-liu-nami apa' Eo Sabat tohe'e meliu kabohe-na ngkai to lalau . Toe pai' topoparenta to Yahudi merapi' hi Pilatus bona tauna to raparika' toera rapui' witi'-ra , bona sohi'-ra mate pai' woto-ra rapopana'u .
43019032	Jadi' , hilou mpu'u-ramo tantara mpopui' witi'-ra to rodua to raparika' dohe Yesus .
43019033	Aga karata-ra hi Yesus , rahilo-rawo mpolia' mate-imi . Uma-pi oko rapui' witi'-na .
43019034	Aga hadua tantara mpojalo lumpeha-na hante ponci'-na . Karajalo-na tohe'e , mo'ili-mi tumai raa' pai' ue .
43019035	Tauna to mpohilo kajadia' toe , hi'a-mi to mpo'uli' napa to nahilo , bona mepangala' wo'o-moko-koiwo . Makono lolita-na , pai' na'inca mpu'u kamakono-na .
43019036	Tohe'i jadi' bona madupa' napa to te'uki' owi hi rala Buku Tomoroli' to mpo'uli' : " Uma mpai' hamehaa' wuku-na to rapui' . "
43019037	Ria wo'o lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpo'uli' : " Hira' mpongoa'-i mpai' to rajalo owi . "
43019038	Oti toe , ria hadua tauna to rahanga' Yusuf , ngkai ngata Arimatea . Mepangala' bongo-i hi Yesus , apa' mpoka'eka'-i topoparenta to Yahudi . Kamate-na Yesus toe , Yusuf hilou hi Pilatus , pai'-i mperapi' woto-na bona ratana . Pilatus mpiliu moto-i . Jadi' , hilou mpu'u-imi Yusuf mpo'ala' woto-na Yesus .
43019039	Dohe Yusuf , ria wo'o Nikodemus , to ria-imi hangkani mpencuai' Yesus ngkabengia . Nikodemus toei ngkeni anu mohonga to rahanga' mur pai' gaharu , kira-kira tolu mpulu' kilo katomo-na .
43019040	To rodua toera mpo'ala' woto Yesus , raputu' hante kain to bula , pai' ragelai' hante anu mohonga toe , ntuku' ada popatana to Yahudi .
43019041	Mohu' poparikaa'-na Yesus , ria pampa , pai' hi rala pampa toe , ria wulou' hi panapa bulu' to raporodo hewa daeo' . Daeo' toe bo'u-pidi , ko'ia rapotanai .
43019042	Jadi' , apa' daeo' toe mohu' , pai' neo' ntepu'u wo'o-mi eo pepuea' , toe pai' rapesahui-mi mpotu'u woto Yesus hi rala daeo' toe .
43020001	Hi eo Mingku mepupulo ngkii , mobee-bengi-pidi , Maria Magdalena hilou hi daeo' . Rata hi ria , nahilo-hawo , watu po'unca-nae tederu'-mi ngkai wobo' daeo' .
43020002	Pokeno-nami hilou hi Simon Petrus pai' ana'guru to hadua to nape'ahi' Yesus , na'uli'-raka : " Ra'ala'-mi-hana woto Pue' ngkai daeo' , pai' uma ki'incai hiapa karatu'ua-na ! "
43020003	Hilou-ramo Petrus hante ana'guru to hadua toei hi daeo' .
43020004	Roduaa-ra mokeno , aga meliu kagasi-na ana'guru to hadua ngkai Petrus , toe pai' ri'ulu-i-hana rata hi daeo' .
43020005	Mengkabungku'-i mpelongi' hi rala-na , aga uma-i ulu mesua' . Nahilo-hawo kain to rahompui'-ki Yesus bate-na moto hi ree .
43020006	Simon Petrus rata ngkabokoa' , kaliliu mesua' . Nahilo wo'o-hawo kain hompu'-na hi ree .
43020007	Aga kain to rapopohoo'-ki woo'-na Yesus , telulu pai' tetu'u ntani' .
43020008	Ngkai ree , ana'guru to hadua , to ri'ulu rata hi daeo' we'i , mesua' wo'o-imi-hawo mpohilo , pai' napangala'-mi .
43020009	Duu' rata hi eo toe , ko'ia oa' rapaha napa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' owi to mpo'uli' : Yesus kana tuwu' nculii' .
43020010	Oti toe , nculii'-ramo ana'guru to rodua toera hilou hi tomi-ra .
43020011	Aga Maria Magdalena mokore hi mali daeo' , ntora geo' . Bula-na geo' , mengkabungku'-i melongi' hi rala daeo' .
43020012	Nahilo-hawo rodua mala'eka , moheai to bula , mohura-ra hi karatu'ua woto-na Yesus wengi , hadua tono' hi woo'-na , to hadua tono' hi witi'-na .
43020013	Mepekune' mala'eka toera hi Maria ra'uli' : " Napa pai' geo'-ko ? " Na'uli' Maria : " Apa' ra'ala'-imi Pue'-ku ngkai rei , pai' uma ku'incai hiapa karatu'ua-na . "
43020014	Ngkai ree , me'ili'-i Maria , nahilo-hawo hadua tauna mokore hi tilingkuria-na . Ntaa' Yesus-midi-hana , aga uma na'incai Kayesus-na .
43020015	Mepekune' Yesus hi Maria : " Napa pai' geo'-ko totina ? Hema to nupali' ? " Na'uli'-hawo we'i Maria , pue' pampa moto to nahilo toe-e . Toe pai' na'uli'-ki : " Ane Iko Tuama to mpo'ala' woto-nae , tudo'-ka-kuwo hiapa pontu'ua-nu , bona ku'ala'-i . "
43020016	Na'uli' Yesus : " Maria . " Pe'ili'-nami Maria hi Yesus , pai' na'uli' hi rala basa Yahudi : " Rabuni ! " ( batua-na : " Guru " ) .
43020017	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki Maria : " Neo'-a ulu nukamu , apa' ko'ia-a mengkahe' hilou hi Tuama-ku . Hilou-ko hi ompi'-ku , uli'-raka kahilou-ku hi Tuama-ku bo Tuama-ni , Alata'ala-ku bo Alata'ala-ni . "
43020018	Kahilou-nami Maria Magdalena mpohirua'-raka ana'guru-na Yesus pai' na'uli' : " Kuhilo-imi-kuna Pue' ! " Pai' naparata-raka hawe'ea to na'uli' Yesus .
43020019	Ngkabengia eo Mingku toe , ana'guru-na Yesus morumpu hi tomi to tehohoki wobo'-na , apa' mpoka'eka'-ra topoparenta to Yahudi . Muu-mule' rata-imi Yesus mokore hi laintongo'-ra , pai' natabe-ra , na'uli' : " Kalompea' rata hi koi' . "
43020020	Oti toe , natudo'-miraka pale pai' lumpeha-na . Uma-pi mowo kagoe'-ra mpohilo Pue'-ra .
43020021	Na'uli' tena Yesus : " Kalompea' rata hi koi' . Hewa Tuama-ku mposuro-a , wae wo'o Aku' mposuro-koi . "
43020022	Oti toe , natuwui'-ramo hante inoha'-na pai' na'uli' : " Doa-mokoi Inoha' Tomoroli' .
43020023	Hema-hema to ni'ampungi jeko'-ra , Alata'ala to mpo'ampungi-ra . Ane uma ni'ampungi jeko'-ra , Alata'ala uma mpo'ampungi-ra . "
43020024	Tomas , hadua ngkai to hampulu' rodua ana'guru Yesus , to ra'atu Ntomoropa' , uma-i-hana ria hante doo-na nto'u karata-na Yesus toe .
43020025	Toe pai' doo-na ntora mpo'uli'-ki : " Kihilo-imi-kaina Pue' ! " Na'uli' Tomas : " Ane ko'ia kuhiloi pakua' to hi pale-na pai' ku'unco' karawe-ku hi pakua' toe , pai' ane ko'ia ku'unco' pale-ku hi jaloa to hi lumpeha-na , bate uma kupangala' . "
43020026	Eo Mingku boko' , morumpu wo'o-ramo ana'guru-na hi rala tomi . Nto'u toe , Tomas , ria wo'o-imi-hawo dohe-ra . Tehohoki omea wobo' , aga nau' wae , muu-mule' rata-imi Yesus mokore hi laintongo'-ra , na'uli'-raka : " Kalompea' rata hi koi' . "
43020027	Oti toe , na'uli' mpo'uli'-ki Tomas : " Tu'u-mi karawe-nu hi rei , pai' hilo pakua' to hi pale-ku . Mai pale-nu , nupe'unco' hi rala jaloa to hi lumpeha-ku . Neo'-pi morara' nono-nu . Pangala'-mi ! "
43020028	Na'uli' Tomas : " Pue'-ku ! Alata'ala-ku ! "
43020029	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki : " Mepangala'-ko apa' nuhilo-ama . Marasi'-ra tauna to mepangala' hi Aku' , nau' ko'ia-a rahiloi . "
43020030	Wori'-pidi tanda mekoncehi to nababehi Yesus pai' to rasabii' ana'guru-na , aga uma te'uki' omea hi rala sura toi .
43020031	Aga napa to ku'uki' hi rehe'i , ku'uki' bona nipangala' Kayesus-na Magau' Topetolo' , Ana' Alata'ala , pai' bona mporata-koi katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na ngkai pepangala'-ni hi Hi'a .
43021001	Oti toe , Yesus mpopehuwu woto-na hangkani-pi hi ana'guru-na , hi wiwi' Rano Tiberias . Hewa toi tutura-na :
43021002	Ba hangkuja dua ana'guru-na morumpu hi ria . Simon Petrus , Tomas to ra'atu Ntomoropa' , Natanael ngkai Kana hi Galilea , to rodua ana' Zebedeus , pai' rodua ana'guru ntani'-na .
43021003	Na'uli' Simon Petrus hi doo-na : " Hilou-a-kuna mebau' . " Ra'uli' doo-na : " Hilou wo'o-ka-kaiwo . " Hilou mpu'u-ramo mohawi' sakaya pai'-ra mojala' hi rano . Aga hamengia toe , uma ria hama'aa woko' jala'-ra .
43021004	Parabaja-mi , Yesus mokore hi talinti , aga uma ra'incai Kayesus-na .
43021005	Na'uli'-raka : " Ana'-ku , ria wa bau'-nie ? " Ra'uli' : " Uma-di ria-e . "
43021006	Na'uli'-raka : " Tene' hi mali ngka'ana sakaya jala'-ni , bate morasi'-koi mpai' . " Ratene' mpu'u-mi jala'-ra , pai' uma-pi rakulei' mpodii' , apa' uma mowo kawori'-na uru to hi rala-na .
43021007	Ngkai ree , ana'guru to nape'ahi' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki Petrus : " Pue'-hana toe-e mai ! " Mpo'epe toe-di Petrus , kana'unco'-nami baju-na ( apa' uma-i mobajui ) , nahoo' hi hope'-na , pai' mengkalitowo'-imi hilou hi rala ue , monangu hilou hi role-na .
43021008	Ana'guru to ntani'-na , bate hi rala sakaya moto-ra , mpodii' jala' to ponu' uru hilou hi wiwi' rano . Uma-ra molaa rahi ngkai role-na , kira-kira ha'atu mete-wadi .
43021009	Kamana'u-ra hi role-na , rahilo-rawo ria-mi apu to rapobaa hi ree hante wuri to morea' , pai' hi lolo apu ria uru pai' ria wo'o roti .
43021010	Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-raka : " Keni-mi tumai ba hangkuja ma'a uru woko' jala'-nie . "
43021011	Simon Petrus ngkahe' hi sakaya pai' nadii' jala'-na tumai hi role-na . Jala' toe bihi' hante uru to bohe : ha'atu lima mpulu' tolu ma'a kadea-ra . Aga nau' wae kawori'-na , uma moto morenta jala' toe .
43021012	Na'uli' Yesus : " Mai-tamo moduhu . " Uma ria haduaa ana'guru to daho' mpekune'-i : " Hema-ko ? " apa' monoto-mi hi nono-ra Kahi'a-na mpu'u-mi Pue' .
43021013	Hilou-imi Yesus mpo'ala' roti pai' nawai'-raka . Napohewa toe wo'o hante bau' uru .
43021014	Tohe'i katolu ngkani-nami Yesus mpopehuwu woto-na hi ana'guru-na ngkai katuwu'-na nculii' .
43021015	Ka'oti-ra ngkoni' , na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli'-ki Simon Petrus : " Simon ana' Yohanes , ha nupe'ahi'-a meliu ngkai doo-nu toera lau mpe'ahi'-a ? " Na'uli' Petrus : " Io' , nu'inca moto Pue' , kakupoka'ahi'-nue . " Na'uli' Yesus : " Ane wae , podoo ana' bima-ku . "
43021016	Oti toe , Yesus mpekune' Petrus karongkani-na : " Simon , ana' Yohanes , ha nupe'ahi'-a ? " Na'uli' Petrus : " Io' , nu'inca moto Pue' , kakupoka'ahi'-nue . " Na'uli' Yesus : " Ane wae , ewu-ra bima-ku . "
43021017	Ngkai ree , Yesus mpekune'-i katolu ngkani-na : " Simon , ana' Yohanes , ha nupoka'ahi' mpu'u-a ? " Peda'-mi nono-na Petrus , apa' Yesus mpekune'-i tolu ngkani ba napoka'ahi' mpu'u-i . Jadi' , na'uli' Petrus : " Pue' , nu'inca hawe'ea-na . Nu'inca kakupoka'ahi'-nu . " Na'uli' Yesus : " Ane wae , podoo bima-ku .
43021018	Makono mpu'u lolita-ku toi : Bula-nu mongura-pidi , iko moto mpehoo' abe' hi hope'-nu , pai'-ko hilou hiapa konoa-nu . Aga ane motu'a-poko mpai' , nutonu pale-nu rahoo' tau ntani'-na , pai'-ko rakeni hilou hi ka'umaa-na nupokonoi . "
43021019	Hante walatu toe , Yesus mpolowa beiwa Petrus rapatehi mpai' , bona mpobila' Alata'ala . Oti toe , na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus , mpo'uli'-ki Petrus : " Tuku'-ama ! "
43021020	Ngkai ree , kame'ili'-nami Petrus , mpohilo-i ana'guru to nape'ahi' Yesus mpotuku'-ra . ( Ana'guru toe-mi to mohura ncori Yesus bula-ra ngkoni' ngkabengia pai' mpekune'-i : " Pue' , hema-idi mpai' to mpobalu'-koe ? " )
43021021	Kanahilo-na Petrus ana'guru toe , napekune' hi Yesus : " Pue' , beiwa-i-hawo mpai' doo-ku toii-e ? "
43021022	Na'uli' Yesus : " Ane konoa-ku tuwu' ncuu-i duu'-ku rata nculii' mpai' , uma mingki' nu'inca iko ! Wule' tuku'-ama-hana . "
43021023	Ngkai ree , molele-mi kareba hi topetuku' Yesus , to mpo'uli' ka'uma-na mpai' mate ana'guru toei . Ntaa' bela-di-hawo toe to na'uli' Yesus-e . Api' wae-di-hawo : " Ane konoa-ku tuwu' ncuu-i duu'-ku rata nculii' , uma mingki' nu'inca iko . "
43021024	Ana'guru toe-imi to mpohilo hawe'ea to jadi' toe , pai' to mpo'uli' posabi'-na . Hi'a-mile to mpo'uki' sura toi-e . Pai' ta'inca kamakono-na lolita-na toi .
43021025	Wori'-pidi to ntani'-ntani'-na to nababehi Yesus . Ane rapa'-na butu nyala-na to nababehi toe ra'uki' hi rala buku , kupekiri nau' humalili' dunia' toi rapontimamahii-ki , ba kana uma-i liu apa' wori' lia buku .
44001001	Teofilus to rabila' : Hi rala sura-ku to lomo'-na , oti-mi ku'uki' hawe'ea to nababehi pai' to napetudui' Yesus , ntepu'u ngkai lomo' pobago-na ,
44001002	duu' rata hi eo kara'ongkoa'-na hilou hi suruga . Ka'oti-na rapatehi pai' rapotuwu' nculii' , wori' ngkani-i mpopehuwu woto-na hi suro-na , bona monoa'-mi ra'inca katuwu'-na nculii' . Rala-na opo' mpulu' eo , rahilo moto-i , pai'-i mpotudui'-ra beiwa patuju-na Alata'ala mpohore manusia' ngkai huku' jeko'-ra pai' mpopajadi'-ra ntodea-na hi rala Kamagaua'-na . Kako'ia-na me'ongko' hilou hi suruga , hante kuasa Inoha' Tomoroli' natu'u hawa'-na hi suro-na to napelihi-ramo toe .
44001003	
44001004	Rala-na hangkani , bula-na morumpu dohe-ra , nawai'-ra hawa' toi . Na'uli'-raka : " Neo' ulu nipalahii ngata Yerusalem . Popea ulu hi rei duu'-na Tuama-ku mpowai'-koi to najanci-mi , to ku'uli'-mikokoi mperi'ulu .
44001005	Apa' Yohanes meniu' hante ue . Tapi' ba hangkuja eo-damo , raniu'-koi hante Inoha' Tomoroli' . "
44001006	Hangkani wo'o , nto'u suro-na morumpu hangkaa-ngkania hante Yesus , mepekune'-ra hi Yesus , ra'uli' : " Pue' , ba tempo toi-mi nubahaka-ta ngkai bali'-ta pai'-ko jadi' Magau' to Israel ? "
44001007	Na'uli' Yesus : " Tuama-ku moto to mponoa' ba nto'uma kadupa'-na hawe'ea patuju to napakatantu-mi hante kuasa-na . Uma mingki' ni'inca koi' .
44001008	Sampale-di , mporata-koi mpai' baraka' ane hompo-ipi Inoha' Tomoroli' hi koi' . Nto'u toe mpai' , koi' jadi' sabi'-ku hi Yerusalem , hi tana' Yudea pai' Samaria , duu' rata hi humalili' dunia' . "
44001009	Ka'oti-na mololita hewa toe , kate'oo-ongkoa'-imi hilou hi langi' . Mengoa'-ramo mpongoa'-i , duu'-na uma-ipi rahiloi apa' naleru limu'-imi .
44001010	Bula-ra mengoa'-pidi hi langi' mponaa pe'ongko'-na , ria ncorobaa rodua tomane moheai pohea to mengea' mokore hi ncori-ra .
44001011	Ra'uli' to rodua toera : " Ee to Galilea ! Napa pai' ntora mengoa'-koi hi langi' ? Yesus to nihilo te'ongko' hilou hi suruga toei lou , wae wo'o-i mpai' nculii' tumai ngkai suruga hewa to nihilo-e we'i . "
44001012	Ngkai ree , nculii'-ramo suro-na ngkai Bulu' Zaitun hilou hi Yerusalem . Bulu' Zaitun toe , ba hakilo kalaa-na ngkai Yerusalem .
44001013	Karata-ra hi ngata , hilou-ramo hi tomi po'ohaa'-ra ngkahe' hilou hi kamar to hi lolo-na . Hanga' suro Pue' Yesus toera : Petrus , Yohanes , Yakobus pai' Andreas , Filipus pai' Tomas , Bartolomeus pai' Matius , Yakobus ana' Alfeus , Simon to Zelot , pai' Yudas ana' Yakobus .
44001014	Hawe'ea-ra morumpu hangkaa-ngkania , pai' tida-ra mosampaya . Dohe-ra , ria wo'o ba hangkuja dua tobine , hante Maria tina-na Yesus pai' ompi'-ompi'-na Yesus .
44001015	Rala-na ha'eo , ria ba ha'atu rompulu'-ra morumpu . Nto'u toe , mokore-imi Petrus hi laintongo' ompi' hampepangalaa'-na toera , pai'-i mololita , na'uli' :
44001016	" Ompi'-ompi' , napa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' kana madupa' . Owi hante wiwi Magau' Daud , Inoha' Tomoroli' mpolowa ami'-mi Yudas , to mpakeni tauna to mpohoko' Yesus .
44001017	Yudas toei , doo-ta moto-i , pai' napo'ana'guru moto-i Pue' Yesus , hibalia hante kita' . "
44001018	( Yudas toei mpo'oli tana' hante doi to narata ngkai gau'-na to dada'a . Hi tana' to na'oli tohe'e , mate monawu'-i , mobenta ta'i tina-na , alaa-na ihi' rala-na malali omea .
44001019	Hawe'ea pue' ngata Yerusalem mpo'inca omea to jadi' tohe'e . Toe pai' tana' tohe'e rahanga' hi rala basa-ra moto Hakal-Dama . Batua-na , Tana' Raa' . )
44001020	Na'uli' wo'o-mi Petrus : " Hi rala Buku Rona' Daud , ria lolita to mpolowa Yudas . Hewa toi moni-na : ` Pelele' moto-miki-hawo po'ohaa'-na wao' . Neo' ria ba haduaa to mpo'ohai' . ' ` Agina huraa-nae na'ala' kahadua-na . ' "
44001021	Ngkai ree , napokaliliu Petrus lolita-na , na'uli' : " Ompi'-ompi' , toe pai' kana ria hadua ngkai olo'-ta tapelihi jadi' sabi' mpodohei-kai mposabii' katuwu'-na nculii'-mi Pue' Yesus . Tauna to tapelihi toe , kana hadua to biasa ami'-mi dohe-ta nto'u-na Pue' Yesus mako' hilou hiapa-apa hante kita' , ntepu'u ngkai pobago-na Yohanes Topeniu' duu' rata hi kara'ongko'-nami Pue'-ta ngkai laintongo'-ta . "
44001022	
44001023	Ngkai ree , rodua tomane to ratudo' . Hanga'-na to hadua , Yusuf Barsabas , pai' to hadua Matias . ( Yusuf toei , ria wo'o to mpohanga'-i Yustus . )
44001024	Oti toe , mosampaya-ramo , ra'uli' : " Pue' , nu'inca omea nono tauna . Yudas , monawu'-imi-hana ngkai bago-na jadi' suro-nu , pai'-i rahuku' ntuku'-ki gau'-na . Toe pai' kiperapi' Pue' , tudo'-kakai hema ngkai hira' to rodua tohe'ira to nupelihi-mi jadi' sampei-na . "
44001025	
44001026	Oti-ramo mosampaya , ratene'-mi undi hewa pompenoa'-ra . To natudo' pompenoa'-ra toe , Matias . Jadi' , ra'ongko' mpu'u-imi jadi' suro Pue' Yesus , bona hono' hampulu' rodua-ra hewa to lomo'-na .
44002001	Rata mpu'u-mi eo bohe to Yahudi to rahanga' Eo Pentakosta , hawe'ea topetuku' Yesus morumpu mopahantuda .
44002002	Muu-mule' ra'epe to moni ngkai langi' , hewa pewui ngolu' to bohe . Moni tohe'e ka'epea hobo' hi rala tomi porumpua-ra .
44002003	Pai' rahilo-rawo anu to hewa apu to molence mpojila' , ngkenele pai' dungku hi butu-butu dua-ra .
44002004	Ngkai ree , nakuasai omea-ramo Inoha' Tomoroli' , pai' ntepu'u-ramo mololita hante basa-basa to ko'ia ra'incai , ntuku' to napopolibu'-raka Inoha' Tomoroli' .
44002005	Nto'u toe wo'o-hawo , ria hi Yerusalem wori' to Yahudi ngkai ngata humalili' dunia' . Tauna tohe'era paka' to mengkoru hi Pue' Ala .
44002006	Kampo'epe-ra moni to hewa ngolu' we'i , mo'iko-ramo tumai morumpu . Ingu'-ra , apa' hore-hore mpo'epe basa-ra moto to rapake' suro Pue' Yesus toera .
44002007	Uma mowo kakonce-ra , ra'uli' : " Napa-koiwo to jadi' tohe'i-e ? Bo paka' to Galilea moto-ra to mololita toera .
44002008	Hiaa' napa-di pai' ta'epe-ra mololita hi rala basa-ta moto ?
44002009	Kita' toi , wori' nyala basa-ta . Ria-ta ngkai tana' Partia , Media , Elam , ngkai Mesopotamia , Yudea pai' Kapadokia . Ria-ta to ngkai tana' Pontus pai' Asia ,
44002010	ngkai Frigia pai' Pamfilia , ngkai Mesir pai' ngkai tana' Libia to mohu' ngata Kirene . Ria-ta to rata ngkai ngata Roma .
44002011	Hantongo'-ta to Yahudi , pai' ria wo'o tau ntani'-na to mesua'-mi hi agama Yahudi . Ria to tumai ngkai tana' Kreta pai' tana' Arab . Hawe'ea-ta himpau mpo'epe-ra mololita hi rala basa-ta moto , mpololita kajadia' bohe to nababehi Alata'ala . "
44002012	Konce pai' ingu' omea-ramo , pai' momepekune'-ra hadua pai' hadua , ra'uli' : " Napa mpu'u-koiwo batua-na to hewa toi-e ? "
44002013	Aga ria wo'o-ra hantongo' to mepopo'ore' , ra'uli' : " Malangu-ra-hanale ! "
44002014	Ngkai ree , mokore-imi Petrus hante doo-na to hampulu' hadua , pai'-i mpololitai tauna to wori' . Mololita-i napesukui , na'uli' : " Ompi'-ompi' to Yahudi , pai' koi' omea to mo'oha' hi Yerusalem ! Pe'epei lompe'-koi , apa' napa to majadi' tohe'i kupakanoto-kokoi .
44002015	Kai' tohe'i-e , uma-kai malangu hewa to ni'uli' , apa' ko'ia-hawo tempo ponginua . Lako' jaa sio mepulo .
44002016	To jadi' tohe'i-e , kadupa'-na to nalowa ami'-mi Pue' Ala owi hante wiwi nabi Yoel , hewa toi moni-na :
44002017	Na'uli' Alata'ala : ` Nto'u kahudua dunia' mpai' , Aku' mpewai' Inoha'-ku hi manusia' omea . Ana'-ni tomane pai' ana'-ni tobine mpohowa' mpai' lolita-ku . Kabilasa-ni mpohilo pangila to kupopohiloi-raka . Totu'a-ni mo'ompo' napa to kupopo'ompoi'-raka .
44002018	Rata-rata hi batua-ku , tomane ba tobine , kuwai'-ra Inoha'-ku hi eo toe mpai' , pai'-ra mpohowa' lolita-ku .
44002019	Kupopohiloi-koi anu mekoncehi hi langi' , pai' tanda mekoncehi hi wongko dunia' wo'o . Ria mpai' raa' pai' apu pai' rangahu to bue' .
44002020	Mobengi mpai' eo , wula molei hewa raa' , kako'ia-na rata Eo Pue' , eo to bohe pai' to mobaraka' lia .
44002021	Nto'u toe mpai' , hema-hema to mekakae hi Pue' bate rahore ngkai huku' jeko'-ra . ' "
44002022	Oti toe , na'umpui' Petrus lolita-na , na'uli' : " Ompi'-ompi'-ku to Israel ! Pe'epei to ku'uli'-kokoi tohe'i . Yesus to Nazaret , Hi'a-mi to napelihi pai' napakatantu Alata'ala jadi' Magau' Topetolo' . Alata'ala mpopo'incai-koi Kayesus-na Magau' Topetolo' , apa' nawai'-i kuasa mpobabehi wori' tanda mekoncehi pai' anu mobaraka' pai' kajadia' bohe . Nihilo moto-mi hawe'ea toe ompi' , pai' ni'inca kamakono-na .
44002023	Yesus toe ratonu hi koi' , pai'-i nipatehi , nitonu hi tauna to dada'a bona raparika' . Ntaa' to jadi' toe , bate ntuku' hawa' to napakatantu ami'-mi Alata'ala , apa' na'inca ami' napa to kana majadi' .
44002024	Koi' mpopatehi Yesus , aga Alata'ala mpotuwu' nculii'-i , nabahaka-i ngkai kuasa kamatea , apa' bate uma-i ma'ala mate oa' .
44002025	Apa' wae to na'uli' Magau' Daud owi mpolowa Yesus , hewa tohe'i : ` Kuhilo , bate Pue' oa' to mpodoo-a . Uma kupoka'eka' ba apa-apa , apa' Pue' to mpotulungi-a .
44002026	Toe pai' goe' lia nono-ku , pai' ntora ku'une'-ko Pue' . Rodo moto-a mpopea-ko .
44002027	Apa' uma nupelele' kao'-ku tida hi po'ohaa' tomate , woto-ku uma nupelele' hi rala daeo' duu'-na pope , apa' Aku' batua-nu to nupelihi .
44002028	Nutudo'-maka ohea mporata katuwua' to lompe' . Hono' lia mpai' kagoea'-ku , ane ria-apa mpai' dohe-nu . ' "
44002029	Ngkai ree , na'uli' wo'o-mi Petrus : " Ompi'-ompi'-ku , ma'ala ta'uli' hante kanoto-noto-na , bela woto-na moto to natoa' lolita Daud toe we'i . Apa' tuama-ta Daud , mate moto-i-hawo pai'-i ratana . Daeo'-na ria hi ngata-ta duu' tempo toi .
44002030	Daud hadua nabi , pai' na'inca ami' napa to nababehi Alata'ala hi eo mpeno . Alata'ala mpobabehi janci-na hi Daud hante mosumpa , na'uli' : hadua mpai' ngkai muli Daud na'ongko' jadi' magau' hewa Daud moto . Jadi' , toe pai' Daud mpolowa ami'-mi katuwu'-na nculii' Magau' Topetolo' , na'uli' : uma-i rapelele' hi po'ohaa' tomate , pai' woto-na uma rapelele' hi rala daeo' duu'-na pope .
44002031	
44002032	" Yesus toe-mile to natoa' lolita Daud-e we'i . Apa' Hi'a-mi to napotuwu' nculii' Alata'ala-e . Kai' toi-mi to jadi' sabi'-na .
44002033	Alata'ala to Tuama mpo'ongko'-imi , napopohura-i hi huraa karabilaa' hi mali ngka'ana-na , pai' nawai'-imi Inoha' Tomoroli' . Ngkai ree , Yesus mpohubui Inoha' Tomoroli' tumai hi kai' , ntuku' janci-na Alata'ala . Jadi' , napa to nihilo pai' to ni'epe-mi toe we'i lau , majadi' sabana kuasa Inoha' Tomoroli' .
44002034	" Ompi'-ompi' , bela-hawo Daud to ngkahe' hilou hi suruga . Tapi' ria lolita-na Daud to mpolowa kangkahe'-na Yesus hilou hi suruga , hewa toi moni-na : Pue' Ala mpo'uli'-ki Pue'-ku : ` Mohura-moko hi mali ngka'ana-ku ,
44002035	duu'-na kupopengkoru hawe'ea bali'-nu hi Iko . '
44002036	Jadi' , toe pai' hawe'ea to Israel kana mpo'inca mpu'u-mpu'u : Yesus to niparika'-e , Hi'a toe-mi to napelihi Alata'ala jadi' Pue' pai' Magau' Topetolo' . "
44002037	Kara'epe-na ntodea lolita Petrus toe , soho'-mi nono-ra , pai' mepekune'-ra hi Petrus pai' hi suro Pue' Yesus ntani'-na , ra'uli' : " Ane wae , napa-mi-kaiwo to kana kibabehi ? "
44002038	Na'uli' Petrus : " Medea-mokoi ngkai jeko'-ni , pai'-koi raniu' butu-butu dua-ni jadi' topetuku' Yesus Kristus . Ngkai ree mpai' , Alata'ala mpo'ampungi jeko'-ni , pai' nawai'-koi Inoha' Tomoroli' .
44002039	Apa' Alata'ala mojanci kanawai'-nata Inoha' Tomoroli' , pai' hi muli-muli-ta , duu' rata hi tauna to molaa . Pojanci Alata'ala toe , bate bagia hawe'ea tauna to nakio' Pue'-ta Pue' Ala jadi' topetuku'-na . "
44002040	Wori' nyala-pi lolita-na Petrus hi ntodea , naparesai'-ra pai' napopo'ingai'-ra , na'uli' : " Medea-mokoi ! Neo'-pi nituku' tauna to dada'a to tuwu' tempo toi , bona neo'-koi narata pehuku' Alata'ala to mporumpa'-ra mpai' ! "
44002041	Wori'-mi tauna to mpopangala' lolita Petrus , pai'-ra raniu' jadi' topetuku' Yesus . Hi eo toe , kawori' tauna to mepangala' hi Yesus , tetampai-mi kira-kira tolu ncobu .
44002042	Topetuku' Yesus to bo'u toera ntora mpopetudui' hi suro Pue' Yesus , pai' tida-ra morumpu hangkaa-ngkania . Ngkoni'-ra hangkaa-ngkania , mpopihe-pihe roti mpokiwoi kamate-na Pue' Yesus , pai' mosampaya wo'o-ra hangkaa-ngkania .
44002043	Wori' anu mobaraka' pai' tanda mekoncehi to rababehi suro Pue' Yesus . Toe pai' me'eka' lia-ramo ntodea .
44002044	Hintuwu'-ramo hawe'ea topepangala' hi Yesus . Rewa-ra raporewa hangkaa-ngkania .
44002045	Ria-ra to mpobalu' ihi' tomi-ra , pai' doi oli-na rabagi-bagi hi doo-ra to nakakurai' .
44002046	Butu eo-na morumpu-ra hi Tomi Alata'ala . Mpopihe-pihe-ra roti mpokiwoi kamate-na Pue' Yesus , pai' ngkoni'-ra hangkaa-ngkania hi rala tomi-ra hante goe' pai' karoli'-roli' nono-ra .
44002047	Ntora mpo'une'-ra Alata'ala , pai' hawe'ea ntodea mpokagoe'-ra . Butu eo-na Pue' mpodonihii kawori'-ra ; batua-na , butu eo-na kawoo-woria' tauna to mepangala' hi Pue' Yesus duu'-na tehore ngkai huku' jeko'-ra .
44003001	Rala-na ha'eo , Petrus pai' Yohanes hilou hi Tomi Alata'ala hi tempo posampaya to Yahudi , jaa tolu ncimonou' .
44003002	Hi wobo' to rahanga' Wobo' Ncola , ria hadua tomane to pungku ngkai kaputu-na . Butu eo-na rakeni oa'-i-hawo hi wobo' toe bona ma'ala-i merapi'-rapi' hi tauna to hilou hi Tomi Alata'ala .
44003003	Kampohilo-na Petrus pai' Yohanes mesua' , kaliliu naperapii'-ra .
44003004	Petrus pai' Yohanes mponaa topungku toei . Na'uli' Petrus mpo'uli'-ki : " Penoto'-kai ! "
44003005	Nanaa mpu'u-ramo , apa' nasarumaka mporata-i doi ngkai hira' .
44003006	Na'uli' wo'o-mi Petrus : " Uma mpu'u ria doi-ku . Aga napa to ria hi aku' , toe to kuwai'-koko : Hante kuasa Yesus Kristus to Nazaret ku'uli' , mako'-moko ! "
44003007	Ngkai ree , Petrus mpokamu pale ka'ana topungku toei bona mokore-i . Hangaa moroho-mi witi'-na .
44003008	Hangkore-i-dile mokore-e , pai'-i momako' hilou tumai . Ngkai ree , mesua'-imi hi rala Tomi Alata'ala dohe Petrus pai' Yohanes , momako' pai' mohajo-hajo mpo'une' Alata'ala .
44003009	Wori' tauna mpohilo-i momako' pai' mpo'une' Alata'ala ,
44003010	pai' ra'inca kahi'a-nami topungku to ntora merapi' hi Wobo' Ncola butu eo-na . Uma mowo kakonce-ra pai' ka'ingu'-ra mpohilo to jadi' toe-e .
44003011	Jadi' , topungku to lako' rapaka'uri' toei mpotuku' oa'-ra Petrus pai' Yohanes . Karata-ra hi pengkawinaraa to rahanga' Pengkawinaraa Salomo , wori' tauna tumai morumpu ngkarumangkai-ra , apa' konce-ra .
44003012	Kanahilo-na Petrus tauna to wori' toera , na'uli'-raka : " Ompi'-ompi'-ku to Israel ! Napa pai' konce-koi mpohilo to jadi' tohe'i-e ? Napa to ntora nikamata-kakai ? Ba ni'uli'-koina , pai'-i momako' tauna toei-e , apa' ria baraka'-kai , ba ngkai kamoroli' nono-kai ? Uma-hawoe' !
44003013	Alata'ala to rapue' ntu'a-ta owi , to napue' Abraham , Ishak pai' Yakub , Alata'ala toe-imi to mpomobohe Batua-na , Hi'a-mi Yesus . Yesus toei to nitonu hi topoparenta-e , pai' to nisapuaka hi Pilatus , nto'u Pilatus ke mpobahaka-i .
44003014	Moroli' pai' monoa'-i-hana , hiaa' nisapuaka-i , pai' niperapi' hi Pilatus bona nabahaka-kokoi hadua topepatehi .
44003015	Nipatehi mpu'u-imi Yesus . Tapi' Alata'ala mpotuwu'-i nculii' , apa' lawi' Yesus-mi to mpowai' katuwua' to lompe' . Kai' toi-mi sabi'-na , apa' kihilo mata-mi-kaina katuwu'-na nculii' .
44003016	Baraka' ngkai hanga' Yesus toe-mi to mpakaroho witi'-na topungku toei-e . Jadi' , tauna to nihilo pai' to ni'inca toi , jadi' mo'uri' sabana pepangala'-na hi Yesus . Ngkai pepangala' hi Yesus , toe pai' mo'uri'-imi hewa to nihilo moto-mi .
44003017	" Ompi'-ompi' , koi' moto-mi hante pangkeni-ta to mpopatehi Yesus-e . Aga ku'inca moto , napa to nibabehi tetu , nibabehi ngkai ka'uma-na-hawo ni'incai kalaua-na .
44003018	Aga nau' wae , ngkai napa to nibabehi tetu , madupa'-mi napa to na'uli' Alata'ala owi hante wiwi hawe'ea nabi , to mpo'uli' : Magau' Topetolo' kana mporata kaparia .
44003019	Toe-mi ompi'-ompi' , medea-mokoi ngkai jeko'-ni , pai'-koi mengkoru hi Pue' Ala , bona na'ampungi jeko'-ni . Ngkai ree mpai' , Pue' Ala mporohoi nono-ni , pai' nahubui tumai Yesus hi kita' . Apa' Hi'a-mi to napakatantu ami' Alata'ala jadi' Magau' Topetolo'-ta .
44003020	
44003021	Tempo toi , Yesus mo'oha' hi suruga , pai' bate tida-i hi ria , duu'-na rata mpai' tempo-na Alata'ala mpobo'ui omea , hewa to na'uli' hante wiwi nabi-nabi-na to moroli' owi .
44003022	" Ompi'-ompi' , ria lolita nabi Musa owi to mpolowa Pue' Yesus , hewa toi moni-na : ` Pue' Ala mpai' mpo'ongko' hadua ngkai ompi'-ni moto jadi' nabi , hewa aku' toi . Koi' kana mpotuku' napa to na'uli'-kokoi nabi toei .
44003023	Hema to uma mpotuku' napa to na'uli' nabi toei , uma-i rapohibilai' ntodea Alata'ala , kana rahuku' mate-i . '
44003024	Nabi-nabi to mpokeni Lolita Pue' owi , ntepu'u ngkai nabi Samuel duu' rata hi nabi-nabi to rata ngkabokoa' ngkai Samuel , hawe'ea-ra mpolowa to jadi' tempo toi .
44003025	Koi'-mile ompi' to mporata rasi' to najanci Alata'ala owi hante wiwi nabi-nabi toe-e . Koi'-mi to mporata rasi' ngkai pojanci Alata'ala hi ntu'a-ta owi . Apa' owi Alata'ala mpo'uli'-ki Abraham hewa toi : ` Ngkai muli-nu mpai' , kugane' hawe'ea tauna hi dunia' . ' Hi koi'-mile ompi' kadupaa'-na pojanci toe-e !
44003026	Jadi' ompi'-ompi' , toe pai' Alata'ala mpotuwu' nculii' Yesus Batua-na , pai' nahubui-i tumai lomo'-lomo'-na hi kita' to Yahudi , bona mpogane'-ta . Pompogane'-na toe , mpomedea-ta ngkai kehi-ta to dada'a . "
44004001	Bula-ra Petrus pai' Yohanes mololita-pidi mpololitai ntodea hi Tomi Alata'ala , rata ba hangkuja dua imam pai' to Saduki hante kapala' polisi Tomi Alata'ala , tumai mpohirua'-raka .
44004002	To Saduki , uma-rana raparasaya katuwu'-ra nculii' mpai' tauna to mate . Toe pai' moroe lia-ra mpo'epe Petrus pai' Yohanes mpotudui' ntodea katuwu'-na nculii' Yesus . Apa' tudui'-ra toe mpakanoto katuwu'-ra nculii' tauna tomate .
44004003	Toe pai' rahoko'-ramo suro to rodua toera , pai' rapopesua' hi rala tarungku' . Apa' neo' mobengi-mi , toe pai' rapotuhu hi ree-ramo ulu , duu' kamepulo-na .
44004004	Aga tauna to mpo'epe lolita-ra Petrus pai' Yohanes hi Tomi Alata'ala we'i , wori'-ramo to mepangala' hi Yesus , alaa-na katedoo-donihia lau-mi kawori' topetuku'-na Yesus , duu'-na lima ncobu-ramo .
44004005	Kamepulo-na , topohura agama , pangkeni to Yahudi pai' guru agama , morumpu omea-ra hi Yerusalem .
44004006	Porumpu-ra toe , hante Imam Bohe Hanas , pai' hante Kayafas , Yohanes , Aleksander pai' hante ompi'-ompi' Imam Bohe ntani'-na .
44004007	Ria-ramo omea , rapehubui-mi bona Petrus pai' Yohanes rakeni mponyanyo-ra . Karata-ra hi ree , mepekune'-ramo topohura toera mpekune' Petrus pai' Yohanes , ra'uli' : " Ngkaiapa kuasa-ni mpaka'uri' topungku tetui ? Hema to mpowai'-koi kuasa tetu ? "
44004008	Nto'u toe , Petrus nakuasai Inoha' Tomoroli' , pai'-i mololita , na'uli' : " Tuama-tuama pangkeni ntodea pai' topohura agama !
44004009	Hewa toe lau niparesa'-kai , apa' mpotulungi-kai tauna to pungku toi-e , doko' ni'inca beiwa-kai mpaka'uri'-i .
44004010	Jadi' , bona ni'inca pai' bona hawe'ea to Israel mpo'inca , tau toii mo'uri' pai' mokore hi rehe'i ngkai kuasa Yesus Kristus to Nazaret . Yesus toei niparika' , tapi' Alata'ala mpotuwu'-i nculii' .
44004011	Hi'a toe-imi to natoa' lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpo'uli' hewa toi : ` Watu to nitadi koi' topowangu tomi , watu toe lau-mi to jadi' poko parawatu . '
44004012	Uma ria ohea ntani'-na mporata kalompea' ngkai Alata'ala , muntu' Yesus-wadi . Apa' hi humalili' dunia' , uma ria haduaa tau ntani'-na , muntu' Yesus-wadi to naparia Alata'ala hi manusia' , Hi'a-wadi to mokuasa mpohore-ta ngkai huku' jeko'-ta . "
44004013	Konce topohura toera mpo'epe Petrus pai' Yohanes mololita hante uma ria kakoo-koroa'-ra , apa' Petrus pai' Yohanes toera , tau biasa-ra-wadi to uma mosikola molangko . Pai' rapelence-ra , kahira'-nami wengi tauna to mpotuku' Yesus .
44004014	Aga topohura toera , uma-ra daho' mebaro . Apa' topungku to rapaka'uri' toei , ria wo'o-i-hawo hi ree mokore dohe-ra Petrus pai' Yohanes .
44004015	Toe pai' rapopalai-ra ulu suro Pue' Yesus toera ngkai porumpua-ra , pai'-ra mohawa' ,
44004016	ra'uli' : " Tapopai-ramo to rodua toera ? Apa' hawe'ea tauna hi Yerusalem mpo'inca kahira'-na to mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi to bohe toe . Hiaa' uma wo'o ma'ala tasapu .
44004017	Aga bona neo' hobo' tauna mpo'epe tudui'-ra , agina ta'ekahi-ra pai' tatagi-ra bona neo'-pi rajojo mpotudui' hema-hema mpokahangai' Yesus . "
44004018	Jadi' oti toe , rakio' nculii' wo'o-ramo Petrus pai' Yohanes mesua' , pai' ra'uli'-raka : " Kitagi mpu'u-koie' , neo'-pi metudui' ba mpokahangai' hanga' Yesus ! "
44004019	Ra'uli' Petrus pai' Yohanes : " Pekiri moto-koi , to'uma to napokono Alata'ala : mpotuku' hawa'-ni koi' , ba mpotuku' hawa' Alata'ala-di .
44004020	Ane kai'-kaina , uma ma'ala kipento'oi mpololita napa to kihilo pai' to ki'epe-mi . "
44004021	Ngkai ree , hangkedi' kamoroe-ra topohura toera mpokaroe Petrus pai' Yohanes . Tapi' ka'omea-na rabahaka moto-ra , apa' uma ria ohea mpohuku'-ra . Apa' hawe'ea ntodea mpo'une' Alata'ala sabana tanda mekoncehi to rababehi toe .
44004022	Apa' tauna to rapaka'uri' toei , umuru-na opo' mpulu' mpae labi-mi .
44004023	Ka'oti-na Petrus pai' Yohanes rabahaka , hilou-ramo mpohirua'-raka doo-ra , pai' ralolita napa to ra'uli'-raka imam pangkeni pai' pangkeni to Yahudi ntani'-na .
44004024	Kara'epe-na doo-ra lolita tohe'e , mekakae-ramo hangkaa-ngkania hi Alata'ala , ra'uli' : " Pue' , Iko to mpajadi' langi' , dunia' pai' tahi' hante hawe'ea ihi'-na .
44004025	Iko to mpopolibu' ntu'a-kai owi , Magau' Daud . Apa' Daud batua-nu , pai' bula-na nakuasai Inoha' Tomoroli' , lolita-na mpolowa ami'-mi pe'ewa hawe'ea tauna mpo'ewa Pue' Yesus . Na'uli' hewa toi : ` Napa-di pai' moroe rahi-ra tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi-e ? Pai' napa wo'o-di pai' ntodea mohawa' doko' mpo'ewa Pue' Ala ? Uma ria tuju-na hawa'-ra toe .
44004026	Magau'-magau' hi dunia' , ngasa'-ramo . Pai' hawe'ea topohawa' , hintuwu'-ra doko' mpo'ewa Pue' Ala pai' Magau' Topetolo' to napelihi-mi . '
44004027	O Pue' , lolita Daud tohe'e madupa' mpu'u-mi . Apa' hi rala ngata toi wengi , hintuwu' mpu'u-ramo Magau' Herodes Antipas pai' Pontius Pilatus , hante ntodea to Yahudi pai' tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi wo'o . Kahintuwua'-ra toe , doko' mpo'ewa Yesus , Batua-nu to Moroli' to nupelihi jadi' Magau' Topetolo' .
44004028	Mohawa'-ra toe , mpopatehi Yesus . Ntaa' to rababehi toe mpopadupa' napa to oti nupakatantu ami'-midi ! Hawe'ea tohe'e madupa'-mi ntuku' kuasa pai' konoa-nu moto Pue' .
44004029	" Wae lau Pue' , epe-mi libu'-ra mpongasai'-kai ! Toe pai' merapi'-makai hi Pue' , kai' batua-nu tohe'i , wai'-kai karohoa bona daho'-kai mpohowa' Lolita-nu .
44004030	Popohiloi-ra kuasa-nu Pue' , bona tauna to mohaki' ma'ala kipaka'uri' , pai' tanda mekoncehi pai' anu mobaraka' ma'ala kibabehi hante kuasa Yesus , Batua-nu to Moroli' . "
44004031	Ka'oti-ra mosampaya hewa toe , kamoduja-nami tomi porumpua-ra , pai' hawe'ea-ra nakuasai Inoha' Tomoroli' . Ngkai ree , daho' mpu'u-ramo mpoparata Lolita Alata'ala hi ntodea .
44004032	Hawe'ea topepangala' hi Yesus , tuwu' hintuwu' pai' hanono lau-ra-damo . Uma ria haduaa to mpo'uli' : " Tohe'i anu-ku moto-kuwo . " Hawe'ea to ria hi hira' rapodulua hangkaa-ngkania .
44004033	Suro Pue' Yesus ntora mpo'uli' posabi'-ra katuwu'-na nculii' Pue' Yesus , pai' uma mowo kamobaraka'-na lolita-ra . Pai' Alata'ala mpogane'-ra omea hante pegane' to bohe lia .
44004034	Uma ria haduaa topetuku' Yesus to nakakurai' . Apa' pontu-na , ria-ra to mpobalu' tana'-ra ba tomi-ra ,
44004035	pai' doi oli-na rakeni hilou ratonu hi suro Pue' Yesus . Doi tohe'e rabagi hi hema-hema to ria kaparaluua-na .
44004036	Wae wo'o-hawo to nababehi Yusuf . Napobalu' tana'-na , pai' doi oli tana'-na natonu-raka suro Pue' Yesus . Yusuf toei hadua to Lewi ngkai tana' Siprus . Suro Pue' Yesus mpohanga' wo'o-i Barnabas . Batua-na : to mporohoi nono .
44004037	
44005001	Ria wo'o hadua tomane , hanga'-na Ananias , hante tobine-na to rahanga' Safira . Ananias toei , mpobalu' wo'o-i-hawo tana'-na .
44005002	Hantongo' doi oli tana'-na toe natonu hi suro Pue' Yesus , na'uli' : " Oi-mi omea doi oli tana'-ku . " Ntaa' natimamahi moto-di-hana hantongo'-e . Babehia-na toe , kahibaliaa-ra hira' hancamoko .
44005003	Na'uli' Petrus mpo'uli'-ki Ananias : " Napa-di-kona pai' nupelele' Magau' Anudaa' mpokuasai nono-nue , doko' mpakawa' Inoha' Tomoroli'-e ? Nu'uli' doi oli tana'-nu nutonu omea-mi , ntaa' nutimamahi moto-di-kona hantongo'-e !
44005004	Kako'ia-na nupobalu' tana' tetu , iko moto-kowo pue'-na . Pai' ka'oti-na wo'o nupobalu' , oli-na bate-na iko moto-kowo pue'-na . Jadi' , napa-di pai' ria patuju nono-nu mpobabehi hewa tetu-e ? Bela kai' toi to nupakawa' . Alata'ala-hana to nupakawa' ! "
44005005	Kana'epe-na Ananias lolita Petrus toe , modungka ncorobaa-imi kaliliu mate . Hawe'ea tauna to mpo'epe to jadi' toe , uma mowo eka'-ra .
44005006	Ngkai ree , ba hangkuja dua tomane mpoputu' woto-na Ananias , pai' rakeni hilou ratana .
44005007	Ba ria nte tolu jaa ngkai ree , rata wo'o-imi-hawo tobine-na Ananias hi Petrus . Aga uma-hawo na'incai napa to jadi' we'i .
44005008	Na'uli' Petrus mpo'uli'-ki : " Uli'-ka pe' , tana'-ni to nipobalu'-e , ba tohe'i omea mpu'u-mi oli-nae ? " Na'uli' Safira : " Io' , tetu mpu'u-mi omea . "
44005009	Na'uli' Petrus : " Napa pai' hibalia nono-ni koi' hancamoko , doko' mpemai-mai roe-na Inoha' Pue' ? Hilo-dile ! Tauna to lako' oti mpotana tomane-nuele , etu-ramo hi wobo' . Iko wo'o mpai' rakeni hilou ratana . "
44005010	Kana'epe-na lolita Petrus toe , kamodungka-na wo'o-mi-hawo kaliliu mate . Karata-ra tauna to muli' mpotana Ananias , rahilo-rawo mate wo'o-imi-hawo tobine-na . Kara'ongko'-na wo'o-mi-hawo hilou ratana ncori daeo' tomane-na .
44005011	Ngkai ree , hawe'ea topepangala' hi Pue' Yesus to mo'oha' hi ree pai' tau ntani'-na wo'o , me'eka' lia-ramo mpo'epe to jadi' toe .
44005012	Wori' tanda mekoncehi pai' anu mobaraka' to rababehi suro Pue' Yesus hi mata ntodea . Hawe'ea tauna to mepangala' hi Pue' Yesus , hanono lau-ra-damo morumpu hi Pengkawinaraa Salomo to hi Tomi Alata'ala .
44005013	Tauna to uma mepangala' hi Yesus , uma-ra daho' morumpu dohe-ra . Aga nau' wae , hawe'ea topepangala' rabila' ntodea .
44005014	Kahaa-haea kawoo-woria' tauna to mepangala' hi Pue' Yesus , lompe' tomane lompe' tobine .
44005015	Wori' tanda mekoncehi to rababehi suro Pue' Yesus , alaa-na wori' topeda' rakeni ntali ali'-ra , rapopoturu hi wiwi' ohea . Apa' rasarumaka ane liu-ipi mpai' Petrus hi ree , nau' ba kampa' kao'-na bela hi woto-ra , mo'uri'-ra .
44005016	Jadi' , mo'iko-ra-damo tauna ngkai ngata-ngata to mohu' , hilou hi ngata Yerusalem mpokeni ompi'-ra to peda' pai' tauna to napesuai' seta . Hawe'ea-ra rapaka'uri' .
44005017	Nto'u toe , Imam Bohe hante doo-doo-na to mpotuku' tudui' to Saduki , mohingi'-ramo hi suro Pue' Yesus . Toe pai' ratepu'u-mi mpobalinai'-ra .
44005018	Suro Pue' Yesus toera rahoko' pai' rapotuhu hi rala tarungku' ngata .
44005019	Ngkabengia toe , hadua mala'eka Pue' mpobea wobo' tarungku' pai' nakeni-ra hilou hi mali-na . Na'uli' mala'eka toei mpo'uli'-raka :
44005020	" Hilou-mokoi mokore hi Tomi Alata'ala , mpoparata hi ntodea hawe'ea lolita to mpowai' katuwua' to bo'u tetu . "
44005021	Jadi' , mepupulo ngkii , hilou mpu'u-ramo hi Tomi Alata'ala pai'-ra mpotudui' ntodea . Nto'u toe wo'o , Imam Bohe pai' doo-na mpokio' hawe'ea pangkeni to Yahudi morumpu mpobabehi porumpua bohe agama Yahudi . Ria-ramo omea , ra'uli' mpo'uli'-raka topobago-ra : " Hilou-mokoi hi tarungku' mpo'ala' suro Pue' Yesus toera ria , pai' keni-ra tumai . "
44005022	Hilou mpu'u-ramo to rapahawa' toera . Ntaa' karata-ra hi tarungku' , uma-rapa ria raratai . Nculii'-ramo hilou hi topohura , ra'uli' :
44005023	" Kihilo-kaiwo wobo' tarungku' bate-na moto tehohoki piri . Pai' polisi topojaga bate-ra moto mpojaga wobo' . Kibea-kaiwo wobo' , uma ria haduaa tauna kiratai hi rala-na ! "
44005024	Kara'epe-na toe , ingu'-ramo kapala' polisi Tomi Alata'ala hante imam pangkeni , ba napa to jadi' hi suro toera . Pai' koro' wo'o-ra , ba napa-di mpai' to jadi' .
44005025	Ngkai ree , rata hadua tauna mpo'uli'-raka : " Epe-koi pe' ! Tauna to nitarungku'-ele ngone , oe moto-ra-hana ria , mpotudui' ntodea hi Tomi Alata'ala ! "
44005026	Kahilou-rami kapala' polisi hante doo-na hi Tomi Alata'ala , mpo'ala'-ra suro toera . Aga uma-ra raweba' , rapelompehi mpu'u mpobawai-ra , apa' me'eka'-ra hi ntodea , nee-neo' mpai' hira' lau to rakahurui , alaa-na ntodea mpopana'-ra hante watu .
44005027	Jadi' , rakeni-ramo suro toera hilou pai'-ra rabua' hi topohura . Imam Bohe mpoparesa'-ra , na'uli' :
44005028	" Kitaa-tagi-mokoi wengi , neo'-pi metudui' mpokahangai' hanga'-na Yesus . Hilo pe' to nibabehi-e ! Hobo' lau-mi ihi' ngata Yerusalem mpo'epe tudui'-ni tetu ! Ba kai' lau-mi to nirai' to masala' hi karapatehi-na tau tetui . "
44005029	Ratompoi' Petrus hante suro Pue' Yesus ntani'-na , ra'uli' : " Kai' bate-na mpotuku' hawa' Alata'ala , bela hawa' manusia' .
44005030	Yesus toe-e nipatehi-i-koina , nipaku' hi kaju parika' . Aga Alata'ala to rapue' ntu'a-ta owi mpotuwu' nculii'-imi
44005031	pai' na'ongko'-imi napopohura hi mali ngka'ana-na , pai' napajadi'-i Pangkeni pai' Magau' Tompohore-ta ngkai huku' jeko'-ta , bona kita' to Israel medea ngkai jeko'-ta pai' mporata ampu .
44005032	Kai' toi-mi to mposabii' hawe'ea toe , kai' hante Inoha' Tomoroli' wo'o to napewai' Alata'ala hi hema-hema to mengkoru hi hawa'-na . "
44005033	Kara'epe-na topohura lolita-ra toe , gigi-mi nono-ra , pai' doko' rapatehi-ra .
44005034	Tapi' ria hadua ngkai olo'-ra to rahanga' Gamaliel . Gamaliel toei , hadua to Parisi pai' guru agama to rabila' hawe'ea tauna . Mokore-imi mpohubui tauna ngkeni-ra suro toera hilou hi mali-na hampai' .
44005035	Oti toe , pai' na'uli'-raka topohura : " Ompi'-ompi'-ku to Israel ! Penonoi lompe'-koi , ba napa to doko' nibabehi hi tauna tohe'i-era .
44005036	Apa' ba hangkuja mpae to liu , ria hadua tomane to rahanga' Teudas . Mpo'uli'-i , hi'a tauna to mobaraka' . Wori' tauna mpotuku'-i , ba ria-ra nte opo' atu . Tapi' ka'omea-na mate rapatehi moto-i , pai' topetuku'-na pagaa'-gaa'-ramo , alaa-na uma-pi kaliliu patuju-ra .
44005037	Hangkani wo'o , nto'u sensus , ria wo'o hadua to Galilea , hanga'-na Yudas . Hi'a wo'o mpakeni wori' tauna mpo'ewa topoparenta . Aga rapatehi wo'o-i-hawo , pai' topetuku'-na pagaa'-gaa' wo'o-wadi .
44005038	Jadi' ompi'-ompi' , toi-ka lolita-ku : neo' tapopai-pai topetuku' Yesus toera lou . Pelele' moto-ra-rawo . Apa' ane ngkai manusia' wadi-hawo tudui' pai' patuju-ra , mogero moto-hawo mpai' .
44005039	Tapi' ane ngkai Alata'ala mpu'u-di tudui'-rae , uma-rale ma'ala tadagi-e . Apa' ane hewa toe-ko-koina , lence-na mpo'ewa Alata'ala lau-tamo . " Jadi' , lolita Gamaliel toe ratarima mpu'u-mi topohura .
44005040	Ngkai ree , rakio' nculii'-ramo suro Pue' Yesus , pai'-ra raweba' . Ra'uli'-raka : " Neo'-pi nitudui' tauna mpokahangai' hanga' Yesus ! " Pai' oti toe , rabahaka-ramo .
44005041	Malai-ramo suro toera ngkai porumpua . Goe'-ra , ra'uli' : " Marasi'-ta apa' Alata'ala mpopelihi-ta bona rabalinai' pai' raruge' sabana petuku'-ta hi Yesus . "
44005042	Butu eo-na hi Tomi Alata'ala ba hi tomi ntani'-na , uma ria kaputua-ra mpotudui' tauna Kareba Lompe' , Kayesus-na Magau' Topetolo' .
44006001	Kahaa-haea kawoo-woria'-mi tauna to mpotuku' Yesus . Lomo'-lomo'-na , topetuku' Yesus paka' to Yahudi . Aga to hantongo'-ra mobasa Yunani , pai' to hantongo' wo'o mobasa Yahudi moto-ra . Nto'u toe , ngkunuti-ramo topetuku' Yesus to mobasa Yunani , mpongkunutii doo-ra to mobasa Yahudi , ra'uli' : " Tobine-kai to balu , uma raratai bagia to rabagi butu eo-na hi to mpe'ahii' . "
44006002	Toe pai' suro Pue' Yesus to hampulu' rodua mpokio' hawe'ea topetuku' Yesus bona morumpu , pai' ra'uli'-raka : " Uma-hawo lompe' ane kai' mpo'urusi pompobagi koni' , apa' uma mpai' hono' loga-kai mpokeni Lolita Alata'ala .
44006003	Jadi' ompi'-ompi' , agina tapelihi ngkai laintongo'-ta tau pitu to lompe' po'ingku-ra , to nakuasai Inoha' Tomoroli' pai' to monoto nono-ra , bona hira'-mi to kiwai' bago mpo'urusi kara-kara pongkoni' toe .
44006004	Apa' pobago-kai kai' to poko-na mpu'u , mosampaya pai' mpokeni Lolita Alata'ala . "
44006005	Lolita suro toera rapo'io'-mi omea . Toe pai' mpopelihi-ramo Stefanus , to mepangala' mpu'u hi Pue' Yesus pai' to nakuasai Inoha' Tomoroli' . Rapelihi wo'o : Filipus , Prokhorus , Nikanor , Timon , Parmenas pai' Nikolaus to Antiokhia . Nikolaus toei , bela-i to Yahudi , aga mesua'-imi hi agama Yahudi .
44006006	To pitu toera rakeni hilou hi suro Pue' Yesus , pai' suro toera mpojama woo'-ra pai' mosampaya merapi' bona Pue' mpogane'-ra .
44006007	Jadi' , ngkai toe-mi pai' kawoo-woria' tauna to mpo'epe Lolita Alata'ala . Pai' katedoo-donihia-mi kawori' topetuku' Yesus hi Yerusalem . Imam-imam moto wo'o , wori'-ramo to mepangala' pai' mengkoru hi Pue' Yesus .
44006008	Ane Stefanus , Alata'ala mpogane' mpu'u-i , nawai'-i kuasa mpobabehi wori' tanda mekoncehi to mpopohiloi kabaraka'-na Alata'ala hi ntodea .
44006009	Aga ria wo'o-ra to mposapuaka . Tomesapuaka toera , anggota tomi posampayaa to rahanga' Tomi Libertini ( batua-na : tomi tauna to rabahaka ngkai karapobatuaa-ra ) . Anggota tomi posampayaa toe , to Yahudi to ngkai ngata Kirene pai' Aleksandria . Hira' toe hante to Yahudi ngkai tana' Kilikia pai' Asia mpomehono'-ki Stefanus .
44006010	Aga uma-ra hompe mpotompoi' lolita Stefanus , apa' Inoha' Pue' Ala mpowai'-i kanotoa nono mololita .
44006011	Toe pai' ba hangkuja dua tauna rawai' doi , bona hira' mpobabehi lolita boa' mpobalihi Stefanus , ra'uli' : " Ki'epe-i-kaina mporuge' Atura Musa pai' mpokedi' Alata'ala ! "
44006012	Ngkai ree , mpo'ukei'-ra ntodea hante pangkeni to Yahudi pai' guru agama , bona moroe-ra hi Stefanus . Kahilou-rami mpohoko'-i pai' rakeni hi topohura agama .
44006013	Karata-ra hi ree , rapope'onga wo'o-ramo-rawo to tungkai' mosabi' boa' . Ra'uli' sabi' boa' toera : " Tau tohe'ii ntora mporuge' Tomi Alata'ala pai' mporuge' Atura Musa !
44006014	Ki'epe-i mololita mpo'uli' : Yesus to Nazaret toe mpogero mpai' Tomi Alata'ala pai' mpobalii' hawe'ea ada to tapososora ngkai nabi Musa . "
44006015	Mpo'epe toe , hawe'ea topohura mponaa Stefanus . Rahilo-rawo , lio-na hewa lio mala'eka .
44007001	Mepekune' Imam Bohe hi Stefanus , na'uli' : " Makono mpu'u hewa to ra'uli' bali'-nu toera-e ? "
44007002	Na'uli' Stefanus : " Ompi'-ompi' , tuama-tuama ! Pe'epei-ka-kuwo ulu lolita-ku ! Owi , nto'u ntu'a-ta Abraham hi tana' Mesopotamia-pidi , kako'ia-na mentoli tumai hi ngata Haran , Alata'ala to bohe kabaraka'-na mehupa' hi ntu'a-ta toei ,
44007003	na'uli'-ki : ` Palahii ngata-nu pai' ompi'-nu . Hilou-ko hi ngata to kutudo'-koko mpai' . '
44007004	Toe pai' napalahii mpu'u-mi tana'-ra to Kasdim tumai hi ngata Haran . Hi ngata Haran toe , tuama-na Abraham mate-mi . Pai' oti toe , Alata'ala mpopentoli wo'o-imi Abraham tumai hi tana' tohe'i , to tapo'ohai'-mi tempo toi-e .
44007005	Nto'u toe , Alata'ala uma mpowai' tana' toi hi Abraham , nau' hampotomia . Sampale-di , Alata'ala mojanci hi Abraham , na'uli' : ` Tana' tohe'i mpai' kuwai'-koko , duu' rata hi muli-muli-nu . ' Hiaa' nto'u toe , ko'ia-hawo ria ana'-na .
44007006	Aga Alata'ala mpo'uli'-ki Abraham hewa toi : ` Muli-nu mpai' mesowo' hi ngata doo . Pue' ngata toera mpai' mpobatua-ra pai' mpobalinai'-ra hante makanca rala-na opo' atu mpae .
44007007	Tapi' oti toe , Aku' moto mpohuku' pue' ngata to mpobatua muli-nu toera , pai' lako' malai-rada ngkai tana' tetu , tumai mpopue'-a hi tana' tohe'i . ' Wae-mi lolita-na Alata'ala hi Abraham .
44007008	Oti toe , Alata'ala mpobabehi pojanci posidaia'-na hante Abraham , pai' nahubui bona Abraham pai' hawe'ea muli-na ratini' . Ada petini' toe jadi' tanda pojanci-na Alata'ala hante muli Abraham . Jadi' , putu mpu'u-mi ana' Abraham to rahanga' Ishak , natini'-imi hi eo kawalu-na . Oti toe wo'o-hawo , Ishak mpotini' Yakub ana'-na . Pai' Yakub mpotini' ana'-na to hampulu' rodua . Pai' hira' toe-mi to jadi' ntu'a-ta kita' to Yahudi .
44007009	" Ntu'a-ta toera mohingi' hi Yusuf ompi'-ra , alaa-na rapobalu'-i pai'-i rapobatua hi tana' Mesir . Aga Alata'ala mpodohei-i ,
44007010	pai' ka'omea-na nabahaka-imi ngkai hawe'ea kaparia-na . Nawai'-i kapantea to mpokagoe' nono Firaun , magau' hi tana' Mesir , alaa-na Firaun mpo'ongko'-i jadi' gubernur tana' Mesir pai' jadi' topohawa' hi rala tomi-na .
44007011	Ngkai ree , rata-mi oro' bohe hobo' hi tana' Mesir pai' tana' Kanaan . Rata-mi oro' bohe toe , wori' tauna to ntodohaka , pai' ntu'a-ta wo'o uma-pi ria pongkoni'-ra .
44007012	Ngkai ree , na'epe Yakub , ria-hana pae rapobalu' hi Mesir . Toe pai' nahubui-ramo ana'-ana'-na , ntu'a-ta toera-e , hilou hi Mesir . Tohe'e pomako'-ra to lomo'-na hilou hi Mesir .
44007013	Kahilou-ra karongkani-na , nalohu-miraka Yusuf kahi'a-nami ompi'-ra . Nto'u toe lako' na'inca-di Firaun kahema-ra ompi'-na Yusuf .
44007014	Oti toe , Yusuf mpakatu kareba hilou hi Yakub tuama-na , mpo'uli'-ki bona hira' hantinaa mentoli hilou hi tana' Mesir . Kawori' tauna to mentoli hilou hi Mesir toe , pitu mpulu' lima .
44007015	Jadi' , mentoli mpu'u-imi Yakub hi tana' Mesir , pai' tida hi ria duu'-na mate . Wae wo'o hawe'ea ana'-na .
44007016	Aga wuku-ra rakeni nculii' moto tumai hi ngata Sikhem pai' ratana hi rala daeo' to na'oli Abraham ngkai muli Hemor hante doi pera' .
44007017	" Mahaa-hae ngkai ree , neo' rata-mi tempo-na Alata'ala mpopadupa' pojanci-na hi Abraham . Momuli-muli-ramo ntu'a-ta hi tana' Mesir , duu'-na wori' lia-ramo .
44007018	Ka'omea-na , ria magau' to moparenta hi Mesir , to uma mpokiwoi kahema-na Yusuf .
44007019	Magau' toei mposapai ntu'a-ta owi pai' nabalinai'-ra . Nahubui-ra mpotadi ana'lei-ra bona mate .
44007020	Nto'u toe , putu-imi-hawo Musa . Musa toei , hadua ana' to subo' lia . Tolu mula-i-wadi rapodoo rala tomi totu'a-na , pai'-i ratadi .
44007021	Hi karatadi-na toe , ana' toronaa Firaun mpotima'-i , pai' napodoo naponcawa ana'-na moto-mi .
44007022	Jadi' , Musa rapoposikola hi hawe'ea kapantea to Mesir , pai' alaa-na mokuasa mpu'u-i hi pololita-na pai' hi pongkale-na .
44007023	" Kahono'-na opo' mpulu' mpae-mi umuru-na Musa , ria patuju-na doko' mpencuai' hingka ompi'-na muli Israel .
44007024	Karata-na hi ria , mpohilo-i hadua to Israel naweba' hadua to Mesir . Kahilou-nami mpehawa-ki ompi'-na , mpopatehi to Mesir toei .
44007025	Na'ulia'-hana Musa , ra'inca moto ompi'-na kahi'a-nami to napopale Alata'ala mpobahaka-ra ngkai karapobatuaa-ra . Ntaa' uma-di ra'incai .
44007026	" Kamepulo-na , nahilo wo'o rodua to motuda' , paka' to Israel . Jadi' , apa' doko' napopohintuwu'-ra , toe pai' na'uli'-miraka : ` Napa pai' motuda' moto-mokoi , koi' ntali ompi' ? '
44007027	Tapi' to hadua to mpoweba'-mi doo-na mpotulaka Musa pai' na'uli'-ki : ` Hema to mpo'ongko'-ko jadi' pangkeni to mpobotuhi kara-kara-kai ?
44007028	Ba doko' mpopatehi aku' wo'o-moko , hewa kampopatehi-nu to Mesir wengi-e ? '
44007029	Kana'epe-na Musa telohu-mi kehi-na toe , metibo'-imi ngkai tana' Mesir hilou tida hi tana' Midian . Hi ria-i motobinei , pai'-i mo'anai' rodua .
44007030	" Opo' mpulu' mpae ngkai ree , mehupa' hadua mala'eka mpohirua'-ki Musa hi tana' to wao' mohu' Bulu' Sinai . Mala'eka toe mehupa' hi rala julumpu to jela' .
44007031	Konce-i Musa mpohilo toe , toe pai' hilou namohui' doko' na'inca ba napa-i-hawo . Nto'u toe , na'epe lolita Pue' to mpo'uli' :
44007032	` Aku'-mi Alata'ala to rapue' ntu'a-nu . Aku'-mi Alata'ala to napue' Abraham , Ishak pai' Yakub . ' Mpo'epe toe , moridi'-imi Musa nakeni eka'-na , pai' uma-ipi daho' mponaa julumpu to jela' toe .
44007033	Na'uli' wo'o-mi Pue' mpo'uli'-ki : ` Roncu sapatu'-nu , apa' tana' to nupokorei tetu-e , tana' to moroli' .
44007034	Kuhilo mpu'u-mi kapai' tuwu'-ra ntodea-ku to Israel hi Mesir . Ku'epe-mi pontodohaka-ra . Toe pai' hompo-ama tumai doko' mpobahaka-ra . Jadi' , tumai-ko , kuhubui-ko hilou hi tana' Mesir , bona mpobahaka-ra to Israel . ' Toe-mi lolita-na Pue' Alata'ala hi Musa .
44007035	" Jadi' , Musa to rasapuaka to Israel wengi , hi'a lau-mi to nahubui Alata'ala hilou mpobahaka-ra . Lomo'-na rasapuaka-i , ra'uli' : ` Hema to mpo'ongko'-ko jadi' pangkeni to mpobotuhi kara-kara-kai ? ' Hiaa' hi'a mpu'u-mi to nakio' Alata'ala hante wiwi mala'eka to mpololitai-i ngkai rala julumpu . Hi'a mpu'u-mi to na'ongko' Alata'ala jadi' pangkeni to mpobahaka-ra .
44007036	Musa toe-mile to mpakeni-ra malai ngkai tana' Mesir . Hi'a-mi to mpobabehi anu mobaraka' pai' tanda mekoncehi hi Mesir , hi Tahi' Molei pai' hi tana' to wao' rala-na opo' mpulu' mpae .
44007037	Musa toe wo'o-mi to mpo'uli'-raka to Israel owi hewa toi : ` Alata'ala mpai' mpo'ongko' hadua ngkai ompi'-ni jadi' nabi hewa aku' toi . '
44007038	Musa toe-mile to mpodoo-ra ntodea to Israel hi tana' to wao'-e . Hi'a-mi to mpo'epe lolita mala'eka to mpololitai-i hi lolo Bulu' Sinai , pai'-i jadi' tauntongo' to mpoparata lolita toe hi ntu'a-ta owi . Hi'a to mpotarima ngkai Pue' Ala lolita to tuwu' to raparata-taka duu' tempo toi-e .
44007039	" Aga ntu'a-ta owi , uma-ra-rana dota mengkoru hi Musa . Rasapuaka-i jadi' pangkeni-ra . Doko' nculii' lau-ramo hilou hi tana' Mesir .
44007040	Ra'uli' mpo'uli'-ki Harun : ` Babehi-taka pinotau to ma'ala tapue' , bona pinotau tetu-damo to mpokeni-ta . Apa' uma-pi ki'incai napa to jadi' hi Musa tetui to mpakeni-ta malai ngkai Mesir . '
44007041	Ngkai ree , rababehi mpu'u-mi lence ana' japi ngkai bulawa . Rapue'-mi lence to rababehi tetu , rasumale'-ki porewua , pai' mosusa'-ramo mpo'une' babehia pale-ra moto .
44007042	Toe pai' Alata'ala mpalahii-ra , napelele'-ra mpopue' betue' hi langi' . Apa' ria Lolita Pue' Ala to te'uki' hi rala sura nabi-nabi , hewa toi moni-na : ` Ee to Israel ! Bula-ni hi tana' to wao' rala-na opo' mpulu' mpae , mposumale'-koi porewua jadi' pepue'-ni . Aga bela hi Aku' pepue'-ni tetu .
44007043	Mepue'-koi hi pue' to rahanga' Molokh , pai' tomi-na nikeni-keni oa' dohe-ni . Mepue' wo'o-koi hi pinotau to molence betue' Refan . Lence-lence toe-mi to nibabehi bona nipue' . Toe pai' kupelele' moto-koi mpai' ratawani , pai' rakeni hilou duu' rata hi mali ria ngata Babel . '
44007044	" Bula-ra ntu'a-ta owi hi tana' to wao' , Pue' Ala mpohubui Musa mpobabehi kemah jadi' tomi pepuea'-ra . Kemah toe jadi' tanda karia-na Alata'ala hi laintongo' to Yahudi , pai' rababehi ntuku' lence to napopohiloi Pue' Ala hi Musa . Jadi' , kemah pepuea' toe rakeni oa' ntu'a-ta owi bula-ra hi tana' to wao' .
44007045	Mahaa-hae ngkai ree , mate-ramo ntu'a-ta hi tana' to wao' toe . Pai' ana'-ra mpokeni kemah pepuea'-ra toe mesua' hi tana' Kanaan toi . Nto'u toe , Alata'ala mpopalai pue' ngata Kanaan , pai' Yosua mpakeni-ra to Israel mpema'ala tana' to tapo'ohai'-mi toi-e . Jadi' kemah pepuea' toe , ria-pidi hi laintongo' to Israel owi , duu' rata hi tempo-na Magau' Daud .
44007046	Daud tohe'e mpakagoe' nono Pue' Ala . Mekakae-i hi Pue' Ala , na'uli' : ` O Alata'ala to napue' Yakub owi , kuperapi' bona nupiliu-a mpowangu tomi po'ohaa'-nu . '
44007047	Aga uma napiliu-i . Ana'-na-damo mpai' to rahanga' Salomo to mpowangu Tomi Alata'ala .
44007048	" Tapi' kakoo-kono-na , Alata'ala uma-i-hana mo'oha' hi tomi to nababehi manusia' . Apa' meliu kabaraka'-na ngkai hawe'ea to rapue' . Ria hadua nabi owi to mpo'uli' hewa toi :
44007049	Na'uli' Pue' Ala : ` Langi' pohuraa-ku , pai' dunia' pentodua-ku . Ha tomi napa-i mpai' to doko' niwangu-kae ? Hiapa mpai' to natao jadi' tomi katidaa-kue ?
44007050	Hiaa' bo Aku'-di to mpajadi' hawe'ea-nae ! ' Wae-mi Lolita Pue' . "
44007051	Na'uli' wo'o-mi Stefanus mpo'uli'-raka totu'a to Yahudi : " Uma mowo katu'a maga-ni ompi' ! Uma mowo kamengkabatu-ni ! Uma mowo kamengkawongo-ni mpe'epei Lolita Pue' Ala ! Bate hibalia hante ntu'a-ta owi-koi , mposapuaka oa' Inoha' Tomoroli' .
44007052	Uma ria haduaa nabi to uma rabalinai' ntu'a-ni owi . Rapatehi-ra suro-suro Alata'ala owi to mpo'uli' karia-na mpai' Batua Alata'ala to monoa' , Hi'a-mi Yesus . Hiaa' hewa toe lau , koi'-mi to mpobalu' Batua Alata'ala toei hi bali'-na . Koi' to mpopatehi-i !
44007053	Koi' to mpotarima Atura Pue' Ala to raparata mala'eka hi ntu'a-ta , aga uma nituku' . "
44007054	Kara'epe-na topohura toera lolita Stefanus , gigi-mi nono-ra , pai' ngkuku' maga-ramo .
44007055	Ngkai ree , Stefanus nakuasai Inoha' Tomoroli' , pai'-i mengoa' hi langi' . Nahilo-mi baraka'-na Alata'ala , pai' nahilo wo'o Yesus mokore hi mali ngka'ana Alata'ala .
44007056	Na'uli' Stefanus : " Hilo-dile ! Kuhilo langi' mobea pai' Ana' Manusia' mokore hi mali ngka'ana Alata'ala ! "
44007057	Ngkai ree , topohura agama toera mpo'ompo tilinga-ra , pai'-ra mejeu' mpesukui bona neo'-pi ra'epei lolita Stefanus . Karaperapai-nami , rahoko'-i ,
44007058	pai'-i radii' hilou hi mali ngata bona rapatehi-i rapana' hante watu . Sabi' boa' to mpobalihi Stefanus mporoncu baju-ra bona lompe' pepana'-ra . Baju-ra toe rawai'-ki hadua tomane to rahanga' Saulus bona nadongo-raka .
44007059	Bula-na Stefanus rapana' , mekakae-imi , na'uli' : " Pue' Yesus , doa-mi kao'-ku ! "
44007060	Oti toe , mowingkotu'-i pai' na'uli' napesukui : " Pue' , neo'-ra nuhuku' ngkai jeko'-ra toi . " Ka'oti-na mololita hewa toe , mate-imi .
44008001	Saulus wo'o-hawo mpokagoe' karapatehi-na Stefanus toe .
44008002	Tauna to mengkoru hi Alata'ala mpo'ala' woto-na Stefanus , rapotantangii' hante nono mpu'u , pai'-i ratana .
44008003	Hiaa' Saulus-hana , ngasa' mpu'u-i mpobalinai' tauna to mepangala' hi Pue' Yesus . Butu-butu ntomi-na napesua' , pai' hema-hema to mepangala' hi Yesus , lompe' tomane lompe' tobine , nahoko' nadii' hilou hi mali-na pai' natonu hi topoparenta bona ratarungku' .
44008004	Jadi' , topetuku' Yesus to metibo' ngkai Yerusalem toera , hiapa kahiloua-ra raparata oa' Lolita Pue' .
44008005	Wae wo'o-hawo Filipus hilou hi ngata hi tana' Samaria , mpoparata-raka Kareba Lompe' Kayesus-na Magau' Topetolo' .
44008006	Nababehi wo'o tanda mekoncehi hi ria . Wae kara'epe-na to Samaria lolita Filipus toe , pai' karahilo-na tanda mekoncehi to nababehi , ratarima-mi kareba to nakeni hante nono-ra mpu'u .
44008007	Apa' napopalai seta ngkai wori' tauna to rapesuai' , alaa-na me'au-au-ramo tauna toera pai' malai mpu'u-mi seta to mpesuai'-ra . Pai' napaka'uri' wo'o wori' tauna topungku pai' tokejo .
44008008	Toe pai' goe' lia-ramo to Samaria toera mpotarima Filipus .
44008009	Hi rala ngata toe , ria hadua tomane to rahanga' Simon . Simon toei hadua topobali'mata . Mahae-imi mpopehuwu pake'-na to rapokakonce to Samaria . Mpo'uli'-i , hi'a tauna to bohe baraka'-na .
44008010	Hi hi'a-damo nono hawe'ea ihi' ngata , lompe' maradika lompe' ntodea , ra'uli' : " Simon toei , ria-ki-hana baraka'-na ngkai Alata'ala to rahanga' Kabaraka' Bohe . "
44008011	Mahae-imi mpakakonce-ra hante pake'-na , duu'-na hawe'ea pue' ngata toe mpotuku'-i pai' mpe'epei hawa'-na .
44008012	Aga karata-na Filipus hi ngata-ra , natudui'-ra Kayesus-na Magau' Topetolo' , pai' natudui'-ra mepangala' hi Yesus bona jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua'-na . Jadi' , wori'-ramo pue' ngata mepangala' hi Yesus pai' mpopeniu' jadi' topetuku' Yesus , lompe' tomane lompe' tobine .
44008013	Ngkai ree , Simon wo'o-hawo mepangala' , pai'-i raniu' . Oti-i raniu' , metuku' oa'-imi hi Filipus , apa' konce-i mpohilo tanda to mekoncehi pai' tanda baraka' to jadi' .
44008014	Suro Pue' Yesus to hi Yerusalem mpo'epe napa to jadi' hi Samaria , apa' ria to mpo'uli'-raka : " To Samaria toera ria , mpotarima Lolita Alata'ala wo'o-ramo-rawo . " Toe pai' mohawa'-ra mpahawa' Petrus pai' Yohanes hilou hi ria .
44008015	Karata-ra Petrus pai' Yohanes hi ria , mosampaya-ramo mpekakae-raka to Samaria to mepangala'-mi hi Pue' Yesus , bona Pue' mpowai'-ra Inoha' Tomoroli' .
44008016	Apa' ko'ia-ra nakahompoi Inoha' Tomoroli' . Muntu' raniu'-ra mpokahangai' hanga' Pue' Yesus .
44008017	Yohanes pai' Petrus mosampaya pai'-ra mpojama to Samaria toera . Jadi' , mporata mpu'u-ramo Inoha' Tomoroli' .
44008018	Nahilo-hawo Simon , hema-hema to rajama suro Pue' Yesus toera , mporata mpu'u-ramo Inoha' Tomoroli' . Toe pai' Simon mpokeni doi-na hilou hi Petrus pai' Yohanes ,
44008019	pai' na'uli'-raka : " Wai'-a-kuwo kuasa-ni tetu , bona hema-hema wo'o-kuwo to kujama , mporata-ra Inoha' Tomoroli' . "
44008020	Na'uli' Petrus mpo'uli'-ki : " Harala ratadi-dako hi rala naraka , ntali doi-nu wo'o ! Ha nu'uli'-kona , pewai' Alata'ala ma'ala ra'oli hante doi ?
44008021	Uma ria huraa-nu mobago dohe-kai , apa' uma monoa' nono-nu hi poncilo Alata'ala .
44008022	Medea-moko ngkai jeko'-nu tetu-e , pai' merapi' hi Pue' bona na'ampungi patuju nono-nu to dada'a .
44008023	Apa' ku'inca mohingi' lia-ko , pai' napobatua jeko'-moko . "
44008024	Na'uli' Simon mpo'uli'-raka Petrus pai' Yohanes : " Perapi'-ka-kuwo hi Pue' bona neo'-a mpai' narumpa' silaka to ni'uli' tetu-e we'i ! "
44008025	Jadi' , kahudu-rami Petrus pai' Yohanes mpoparata Lolita Pue' pai' mporohoi nono-ra to Samaria , nculii'-ramo hilou hi Yerusalem . Hi pomakoa'-ra toe , raparata wo'o Lolita Pue' hi rala wori' ngata hi tana' Samaria .
44008026	Rala-na hangkani , hadua mala'eka Pue' mpololitai Filipus , na'uli' : " Hilou-moko tono' hi selatan , hi ohea to ngkai Yerusalem rata hi Gaza . " ( Ohea tohe'e uma-pi jau ratara . )
44008027	Hilou mpu'u-imi Filipus . Nto'u toe , ria wo'o-hawo hadua to Etiopia to ntara ohea toe nculii' hilou hi ngata-na . To Etiopia toei , tauna to mopangka' bohe , to mpokakamu hawe'ea ihi' tomi raja bine tana' Etiopia to rahanga' Kandake . Ka'oti-na mepue' hi Alata'ala hi Yerusalem , nculii'-imi hi ngata-na mpohawi' kereta to nadii' jara' . Bula-na mohura hi rala kereta-na , mpobasa-i sura nabi Yesaya .
44008028	
44008029	Inoha' Pue' Ala mpololitai Filipus , na'uli' : " Hilou-ko mpomohui' kereta toe mai . "
44008030	Pokeno-nami Filipus hilou mpomohui' kereta toe . Na'epe-hawo , tauna toei mpobasa sura nabi Yesaya . Filipus mpekune'-i , na'uli' : " Nu'inca wa batua-na to nubasa tetu-e ? "
44008031	Na'uli' tau toei : " Beiwa-kona kaku'inca-na , apa' uma ria tauna to mponotohi-ka . " Ngkai ree , nabawai Filipus ngkahe' hi rala kereta-na pai' mohura hi ncori-na .
44008032	Lolita to nabasa hi rala sura nabi Yesaya , hewa toi moni-na : Hi'a hewa hama'a bima to radii' hilou rasumale' . Hewa ana' bima to uma mobee' ane ragunci wulu-na , wae wo'o uma-i mololita nau' hamelaa .
44008033	Raruge'-i pai' rahuku' , hiaa' uma ria sala'-na . Uma ria haduaa tauna to mpotutura karia muli-na apa' rapatehi-i-hana . "
44008034	Ngkai ree , na'uli'-mi to Etiopia toei hi Filipus : " Uli'-ka ba hema-i to natoa' nabi toei , ba woto-na moto-di ba tau ntani'-nadi . "
44008035	Jadi' , ntepu'u ngkai pobasa-na toe we'i , Filipus mpakanoto-ki Kareba Lompe' Yesus .
44008036	Bula-ra mokereta toe , mpohilo-ra ue hi wiwi' ohea . Na'uli' to Etiopia toei mpo'uli'-ki Filipus : " Hilo , ohe'e mai ue . Niu'-ama-kuwo jadi' topetuku' Yesus . " ( (
44008037	Na'uli' Filipus : " Ane nupangala' mpu'u-imi , ma'ala moto-ko kuniu' . " Na'uli' to Etiopia toei : " Kupangala' Yesus Kristus , Hi'a-mi Ana' Alata'ala . " ) )
44008038	Ngkai ree , napopento'o-mi kereta-na , pai'-ra mehompo hilou hi rala ue , pai' Filipus mponiu'-i .
44008039	Pencore-ra ngkai rala ue , muu-mule' Inoha' Pue' Ala mpo'ala' Filipus ngkai ree , alaa-na to Etiopia toei uma-pi mpohiloi-i ba hiapa-imi . Napokaliliu pomako'-na hante nono to goe' .
44008040	Ane Filipus-hawo , muu-mule' mehupa'-imi hi ngata Asdod . Me'ongko'-imi hilou hi ngata Kaisarea , pai' halengko ohea mpoparata-i Kareba Lompe' hi butu-butu ngata to natara .
44009001	Nto'u toe wo'o , ngasa' oa'-imi Saulus mpongasai' pai' mpopatehi topetuku' Pue' Yesus . Hilou-i hi Imam Bohe ,
44009002	pai'-i mperapi' sura kuasa nakeni hilou hi pangkeni tomi posampayaa hi ngata Damsyik , bona ane ria-ra narata to mpotuku' Tudui' Yesus , nahoko' pai' nakeni-ra nculii' hi Yerusalem , ba tomane ba tobine .
44009003	Jadi' , pomako'-na hilou hi Damsyik tohe'e , mohu'-imi hi ngata , muu-mule' mehini ncorobaa baja ngkai langi' mpotipuhi-i .
44009004	Kamodungka-nami pai' na'epe-hawo topololita to mpo'uli'-ki : " Saulus ! Saulus ! Napa pai' nubalinai'-a ? "
44009005	Na'uli' Saulus : " Ha hema-ko Pue' ? " Na'uli' topololita toei : " Aku'-mile Yesus , to nubalinai'-e !
44009006	Wae-pi , memata-moko , mesua' hi rala ngata . Hi ria-damo mpai' ra'uli'-koko napa to kana nubabehi . "
44009007	Ane doo-doo Saulus toera , uma-rapa tepololita , kuyu-ramo nakeni eka'-ra . Apa' ra'epe moto wo'o-rawo topololita toe , aga uma rahiloi hema-i to mololita .
44009008	Ngkai ree , mokore-imi Saulus mpobini' mata-na , aga uma-ipi pehilo . Jadi' , ratete'-i-damo hilou hi rala ngata Damsyik .
44009009	Tolu eo kahae-na bate uma-i pehilo , pai' uma wo'o-i ngkoni' ba nginu .
44009010	Hi ngata Damsyik toe , ria hadua topetuku' Yesus , Ananias hanga'-na . Nto'u toe , mopangila-i . Hi rala pangila-na toe , Pue' Yesus mpokio'-i , na'uli' : " Ananias ! " Na'uli' Ananias : " Oi-a Pue' . "
44009011	Na'uli' Pue' : " Me'ongko'-moko hilou hi ohea to rahanga' Ohea Monoa' , hi tomi-na Yudas . Pekune' hi pue' tomi ba ria to Tarsus to rahanga' Saulus . Saulus toei bula-na mosampaya ,
44009012	pai' hi rala pangila-na nahilo-ko , Ananias . Nahilo-ko hilou mpohirua'-ki pai' mpojama-i bona pehilo nculii'-imi . "
44009013	Na'uli' Ananias : " Pue' , wori' tauna to mpotompo'wiwi Saulus tetui . Wori' pebalinai'-na hi topetuku'-nu to hi Yerusalem .
44009014	Hiaa' tumai wo'o-imi hi rehe'i , hante kuasa ngkai imam pangkeni , bona mpohoko' hawe'ea tauna to mekakae hi Iko Pue' . "
44009015	Na'uli' Pue' mpo'uli'-ki Ananias : " Bate hilou-ko ! Apa' Saulus toei ria , tungkai' kupelihi jadi' topobago-ku . Hi'a mpai' to mpoparata hanga'-ku hi to Yahudi pai' hi tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi , duu' hi magau' wo'o .
44009016	Ku'uli' moto-ki mpai' kaparia to kana natodohaka sabana petuku'-na hi Aku' . "
44009017	Jadi' , hilou mpu'u-imi Ananias hi tomi to na'uli' Pue' we'i . Karata-na hi ria , najama-i Saulus , na'uli'-ki : " Ompi'-ku Saulus ! Pue' Yesus to nuhilo hi lengko ohea katumai-nu toi-e , Hi'a-mi to mpohubui-a tumai mpokinomo-ko . Nahubui-a tumai bona pehilo nculii'-moko , pai'-ko nakuasai Inoha' Tomoroli' . "
44009018	Nto'u toe , ria to hewa ruke uru molepa' ngkai mata Saulus , pai' pehilo mpu'u-imi . Pokore-nami Saulus , pai'-i raniu' jadi' topetuku' Pue' Yesus .
44009019	Oti toe , ngkoni'-imi pai' moroho nculii'-imi .
44009020	Bula-na hi Damsyik toe , hilou oa'-i hi tomi-tomi posampayaa to Yahudi hi Damsyik , pai' na'uli'-raka : " Yesus , Hi'a-mi Ana' Alata'ala . "
44009021	Konce omea-ra to mpo'epe lolita-na , ra'uli' : " Ha beiwa-mi-koiwo tohe'i-e ? Apa' hi'a toe-mi wengi to mpopatehi tauna to mepue' hi Yesus hi Yerusalem . Pai' patuju-na tumai tetu-e , bona mpohoko' wo'o-ra to hi rehe'i pai' mpokeni-ra hi imam pangkeni hi Yerusalem bona rahuku' . "
44009022	Aga kaboo-bohea baraka'-na Saulus metudui' , napakanoto Kayesus-na Magau' Topetolo' . Jadi' , to Yahudi hi Damsyik , uma-pi rakulei' mpobaro-i .
44009023	Ba hangkuja kahae-na ngkai ree , mohawa'-ramo to Yahudi mpopatehi Saulus .
44009024	Pohawa'-ra toe , mpodongo hawe'ea wobo' wala ngata , lompe' hi eo-na lompe' hi bengi-na , bona ane liu-ipi mpai' , rapatehi-imi . Ntaa' na'inca-di Saulus patuju-ra tohe'e-e .
44009025	Jadi' , apa' hawe'ea wobo' radongo , Saulus kana mpali' akala-na bona ma'ala-i metibo' ngkai ngata . Toe pai' rala-na hamengi , ba hangkuja dua ana'guru-na Saulus mpokeni-i hilou hi wala tana' to mpotololiki ngata Damsyik , rapopohura-i hi rala karanci , pai'-i ra'ulu hi rala karanci toe ngkai lolo wala tana' hilou hi mali ngata , pai' kaliliu metibo'-imi .
44009026	Nculii'-imi Saulus hilou hi Yerusalem . Karata-na hi ria , doko' napobale-miraka topetuku' Yesus , aga rapoka'eka'-i , apa' ko'ia rapangalai' kametuku'-na mpu'u-mi hi Yesus .
44009027	Aga Barnabas-hana , hilou-i mpobale-ki Saulus , pai' napo'ema'-imi hilou hi suro Pue' Yesus . Natutura-raka beiwa Saulus mpohilo Pue' Yesus hi lengko ohea kahilou-na hi Damsyik , pai' beiwa Pue' mpololitai-i . Nalolita wo'o-raka kabia'-na Saulus mpokarebai kareba Pue' Yesus hi Damsyik .
44009028	Ngkai ree , hampodooa-ramo Saulus hante topetuku' Yesus hi Yerusalem , pai' modao'-i hobo' ngata mpoparata kareba Pue' Yesus hante uma ria kakoroa'-na .
44009029	Biasa wo'o-i momewai' ngkalolita pai' momehono' hante to Yahudi to mobasa Yunani . Toe pai' to Yahudi toera doko' mpopatehi-i .
44009030	Jadi' , kara'inca-na ompi'-ompi' hampepangalaa'-na karia-ra to doko' mpopatehi-i , rabawa-imi hilou hi ngata Kaisarea . Ngkai Kaisarea toe , rapope'ongko'-imi hilou hi ngata Tarsus .
44009031	Jadi' , nto'u toe uma-pi ria kakoroa'-ra hawe'ea topepangala' hi Pue' Yesus to hi tana' Yudea , Galilea pai' Samaria . Kawoo-woria' tauna to mepangala' hi Yesus pai' kamoroo-rohoa pepangala'-ra . Apa' mengkoru mpu'u-ra hi Pue' Ala , pai' Inoha' Tomoroli' moto to mporohoi nono-ra .
44009032	Petrus modao' mpencuai' topepangala' hi Pue' Yesus hiapa-apa . Rala-na ha'eo , rata-i hi ngata Lida .
44009033	Hi ngata Lida toe , mpohirua'-ki hadua tomane , hanga'-na Eneas . Eneas toei walu mpae-imi pungku , uma-i tepemata ngkai poturua-na .
44009034	Na'uli' Petrus mpo'uli'-ki : " Eneas , Yesus Kristus mpaka'uri'-ko ! Mokore-moko , pai' lulu-mi ali'-nu . " Hinto'u toe mpu'u , mokore-imi Eneas .
44009035	Hawe'ea tauna hi ngata Lida pai' hi Saron mpohilo kamo'uri'-nami , pai' mepangala'-ramo hi Pue' Yesus .
44009036	Uma molaa ngkai Lida toe , ria wo'o ngata to rahanga' Yope . Hi Yope toe , ria hadua tobine to mepangala' hi Yesus , Tabita hanga'-na . Hi rala basa Yunani hanga'-na Dorkas ( batua-na : ruha ) . Lompe' po'ingku-na , pai' wori' petulungia-na hi tauna to mpe'ahii' .
44009037	Nto'u Petrus hi Lida , peda' danca Dorkas toei , kaliliu mate . Ka'oti-na raniu' , ratu'u-i hi kamar to hi lolo-na .
44009038	Topetuku' Yesus hi Yope mpo'epe karia-na Petrus hi Lida , apa' ngata Yope toe mohu'-wadi hi Lida . Toe pai' rahubui rodua tauna hilou hi Petrus , merapi' bona napesahui tumai hi Yope .
44009039	Metuku' mpu'u-imi Petrus hilou dohe-ra . Karata-ra hi Yope , kaliliu rapo'ema'-i hilou hi powataa tomate . Hawe'ea tobine tobalu mpotipuhi Petrus . Geo'-ra pai' rapopohiloi-i baju pai' pohea to nadau-raka Dorkas bula-na tuwu'-pidi .
44009040	Ngkai ree , Petrus mpohubui-ra omea mpalahii kamar toe , pai' powilingkudu-nami mosampaya . Ka'oti-na mosampaya , pai'-i mponyanyohi tomate , na'uli'-ki : " Tabita , memata-moko ! " Hangaa mobini' mpu'u-mi mata-na mponaa Petrus , pai' kaliliu mohura-imi .
44009041	Petrus mpokakamu pale-na pai' mpo'ore'-i duu'-na mokore . Oti toe , nakio' nculii'-ramo topetuku' Yesus pai' tobalu to nahubui malai-e we'i , pai' na'uli'-raka : " Ohe'i-imi bale-ni , tuwu' nculii'-imi . "
44009042	Kajadia' toe rajarita hobo' hi ngata Yope , alaa-na wori' tauna mepangala' hi Pue' Yesus .
44009043	Oti toe , Petrus tida hi Yope ba hangkuja mengi-pidi kahae-na , mo'oha' hi tomi hadua topobago rewa kuliba to rahanga' Simon .
44010001	Hi ngata Kaisarea , ria hadua tomane , hanga'-na Kornelius . Kornelius tohe'ei , pangka'-na kapitee to mpohawai' ha'atu tantara to Roma hi rala hampo'emaa' to rahanga' " Tantara Italia . "
44010002	Bela-i to Yahudi , aga mengkoru mpu'u-i hi Pue' Ala , pai' hira' hantinaa-ra mepue' hi Alata'ala . Wori' doi nawai'-raka to Yahudi to kabu , pai' tida-i mosampaya hi Alata'ala .
44010003	Rala-na ha'eo , ba jaa tolu libe eo wae , mopangila-i Kornelius . Hi rala pangila-na toe , monoto lia nahilo hadua mala'eka Pue' mehupa' pai' mpokio'-i , na'uli' : " Kornelius ! "
44010004	Me'eka'-i Kornelius mponaa mala'eka toei . Metompoi'-i : " Napa-die Pue' ? " Na'uli' mala'eka toei : " Goe'-i Alata'ala mpo'epe posampaya-nu , pai' na'inca kamanara-nu mpotulungi tokabu .
44010005	Wae-pi , hubui tauna hilou hi Yope mpali' hadua tauna to rahanga' Simon Petrus , pai' kio'-i tumai .
44010006	Po'ohaa'-na mohu' hi wiwi' tahi' , hi tomi hadua topobago rewa kuliba , Simon wo'o hanga'-na . "
44010007	Kamalai-na mala'eka to mpololitai-i toe , Kornelius mpokio' rodua pahawaa'-na pai' hadua tantara sarumakaa-na . Tantara sarumakaa-na toe , to mengkoru wo'o-i-hawo hi Pue' Ala .
44010008	Kornelius mpo'uli'-raka napa to lako' nahilo we'i hi rala pangila-na , pai' nahubui-ra hilou hi Yope mpopali' Petrus .
44010009	Kamepulo-na , bula-ra hi lengko ohea-pidi to rahubui toera , kamohu'-ra hi Yope , Petrus wo'o-hawo ngkahe' hilou hi pengkawinaraa to hi lolo tomi to molempe ata'-na , hilou mosampaya .
44010010	Neo' tebua'-mi eo-na , mo'oro'-imi doko' ngkoni' . Jadi' , bula-na mpeka'au kataha' koni' , muu-mule' ria pangila-na .
44010011	Hi rala pangila-na toe , mpohilo-i langi' tebea pai' ria to hewa kumu' to mowela' ratoe hi opo' huno-na pai' ra'ulu tumai hi tana' .
44010012	Hi rala kumu' to ra'ulu toe , mparanyalaa binata , ria omea : to opo' witi'-na , to menyolo , hante danci wo'o .
44010013	Oti toe , na'epe Petrus ria to mpololitai-i , na'uli'-ki : " Ee Petrus ! Mai-moko , sumale'-ramo binata toera lau , pai' nukoni' . "
44010014	Na'uli' Petrus : " Uma-e' Pue' ! Ko'ia ria kukoni' to rapalii' ba to ra'uli' babo' ntuku' ada agama-kai . "
44010015	Na'uli' tena topololita toei mpo'uli'-ki Petrus : " Napa to na'uli' Alata'ala lompe' , neo' nu'uli' iko babo' . "
44010016	Pangila toe tolu ngkani nahilo , pai' oti toe , te'ore' nculii'-mi kumu' toe hilou hi langi' .
44010017	Ngkai ree , ingu'-imi Petrus mpopekiri ba napa batua-na pangila to lako' nahilo toe . Bula-na mopekiri-pidi , rata-ramo suro Kornelius hi ngata Yope . Mepekune'-ra hi pue' ngata kahiapa-na tomi Simon . Ratudo'-raka tomi to rapali' pai' hilou-ramo mokore hi wobo' wala ,
44010018	pai'-ra mepekune' , ra'uli' : " Ba ria hi rehe'i hadua torata to rahanga' Simon Petrus ? "
44010019	Bula-na mopekiri-pidi Petrus , Inoha' Tomoroli' mpo'uli'-ki hewa toi : " Epe pe' ! Ria tolu tauna tumai mpali'-ko .
44010020	Pesahui mana'u . Neo' morara' nono-nu mpotuku'-ra , apa' Aku'-hana to mpohubui-ra . "
44010021	Jadi' , pana'u-nami Petrus ngkai tomi pai' na'uli'-raka to lako' rata toera : " Aku'-mile to nipali'-e . Napa-di to nipali'-kae ? "
44010022	Ratompoi' : " Kai' tohe'i , napowiwi Kapitee Kornelius . Hi'a toe , tauna to monoa' ingku-na . Mengkoru-i hi Alata'ala , pai'-i rabila' hawe'ea to Yahudi . Hadua mala'eka Pue' mpohubui-i mpokio'-ko hilou hi tomi-na , bona na'epe ba napa to nu'uli'-ki . "
44010023	Petrus mpo'uli'-raka suro Kornelius toera : " Turu rei-tamo ulu hamengi . " Turu mpu'u-ramo hamengi hi ree . Kamepulo-na , me'ongko' mpu'u-imi Petrus mpotuku'-ra hilou hi ngata Kaisarea . Pai' ria wo'o ba hangkuja dua ompi' hampepangalaa' ngkai Yope hilou dohe-ra .
44010024	Hamengi-ra hi lengko ohea pai' lako' rata-rada hi Kaisarea . Karata-ra hi ria , mpolia' morumpu-ramo Kornelius hante posantina-na mpopea Petrus . Ria wo'o tongki-na pai' bale-na to nakio' morumpu hi tomi-na .
44010025	Jadi' , karata-na Petrus hi tomi Kornelius , mehompo-imi Kornelius ngkai tomi hilou mpotomu-i . Motingkua'-i hi nyanyoa Petrus mponyompa-i .
44010026	Aga Petrus mpotagi-i , na'ore'-i nculii' pai' na'uli'-ki : " Neo'-hawo wae ! Mokore-moko . Aku' manusia' wo'o-a-wadi-kuwo , hewa iko . "
44010027	Bula-na Petrus mpololitai-i , mesua'-ramo hi rala tomi . Nahilo-hawo Petrus , wori'-mi tauna himuhu .
44010028	Na'uli' Petrus mpo'uli'-raka : " Ni'inca moto-le , ntuku' atura agama-kai , kai' to Yahudi uma ma'ala mposigalo-kokoi tauna to bela-koi to Yahudi ba mesua' hi rala tomi-ni . Aga Alata'ala mpakanoto-ka hi rala pangila-ku wengi , ka'uma-na ria manusia' to babo' ntuku' ada agama ba to rapalii' mposigalo-raka .
44010029	Toe pai' kanikio'-ku tumai , uma-a leba' motance . Jadi' , hewa toe lau , doko' ku'inca ba napa pai' nikio'-a tumai . "
44010030	Na'uli' Kornelius : " Tolu mengi to liu , ba hewa jaa toe-mi lau , bula-ku mosampaya hi tomi-ku jaa tolu libe eo , ria ncorobaa hadua tomane mokore hi nyanyoa-ku . Pohea-na meringkila'-damo .
44010031	Na'uli' tauna toei mpo'uli'-ka : ` Kornelius , Alata'ala mpo'epe posampaya-nu pai' na'inca kamanara-nu .
44010032	Wae-pi , hubui tauna hilou hi ngata Yope mpokio' tauna to rahanga' Simon Petrus . Po'ohaa'-na mohu' hi wiwi' tahi' , hi tomi Simon topobago rewa kuliba . '
